[50,20^1]	loka vyavahāra anusāri tvam prayojanam iti ced syāt matiḥ eṣā sarve eva lokāḥ paraśu ādikam udyamana nipātana ādi kriyā ākhyena ca vyāpāreṇa sa vyāpāram pratipadyamānāḥ karaṇam iti vyavaharanti tad vyavahāram anusaradbhiḥ asmābhiḥ savya apāram iti uktam etat uktam bhavati yathā eva lokaiḥ sa vyāpāra pratītiveśena karaṇa tvam paraśu ādeḥ abhyupagamyate tathā eva asmābhiḥ artha ākārasya jñānasya artha adhigama ātmanā vyāpāreṇa savya apāra tva pratīteḥ karaṇa tvam abhyupagatam loka vyavahārasya eva śabda artham prati pramāṇa tvāt 
[50,20^2]	na ca paraśu ādeḥ api udyamana ādi kriyā ātmakaḥ vyāpāraḥ sva vyatiriktaḥ asti kṣaṇika tvena sarva bhāvānām anāśraya tvāt tad kṛta upayoga abhāvāt ca tathā hi sva hetoḥ eva tat dravyam yadi sa kriyam utpannam tadā artha antara kriyayā na kiṃcid prayojanam vaiyarthyāt atha niṣkriyam tadā artha antara kriyā utpāde api katham sa kriyam bhavet ati prasaṅgāt tasmāt para śu ādeḥ chatrāt i chāyāvat nirantara deśa utpādaḥ eva kriyā iti ucyate tad pratīti vaśena tasya karaṇa tvam yathā tathā jñānasya api krama bhāvinīm nīla pīta ādi aneka ākāra tām dharataḥ sa vyāpāra tvam pratīyate tad vaśena paraśu ādi vat tasya api mukhyam eva karaṇa tvam iti 
[51,14]	yat tāvat kṣaṇika tva balena paraśu ādeḥ artha antara kriyā nirākaraṇam tat na yuktam manoratha mātra tvāt yathā ca akṣaṇikasya eva sataḥ paraśu ādeḥ artha antara bhūtayā eva kriyayā sa kriya tvam tathā uttaratra pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ yadi sa vyāpāra pratīti mātreṇa karaṇa tvam tadā puṃsaḥ api chedakasya sa vyāpāra tvam pratīyate iti karaṇa tvam syāt atha vṛkṣa ādi dvaidhībhāva kriyām prati paraśoḥ pratyāsanna tvena sādhaka tvam tena tasya eva karaṇa tvam na puruṣasya iti nanu evam tarhi pratyāsannasya kriyā sādhakasya karaṇa tvam abhyupagatam tatas ca dvaidhībhāva kriyā vat artha ākāra jñāna sādhyā kriyā sādhanāt vyatiriktā vācya iti katham na artha antaram phalam atha manyase paraśoḥ api na dvaidhībhāva sādhaka tvena karaṇa tvam sarveṣām tad sādhakānām karaṇa tva prasaṅgāt kim tu dvaidhībhāva nimittam āsādya viśiṣṭa ākāreṇa paraśoḥ utpādaḥ asya idam sādhanam iti prasiddhi hetuḥ tad vaśena tasya karaṇa tvam vyavahriyate tathā jñānasya api iti na kṣaṇika tva asiddheḥ kṣaṇika tve hi eṣā prakriyā śobheta tasya asiddhim ca vakṣyāmaḥ 
[52,1]	api ca dvaidhībhāva kriyām prati kasya karaṇa tvam na hi karaṇam antareṇa kriyā sambhavati na ca dvaidhībhāvaḥ eva karaṇam tasya chedya ātmaka tve karma tvena eva prasiddha tvāt artha antara viśleṣa ātmaka tve api kriyā eka rūpā tvena prasiddha tvāt tatas artha antaram anyat karaṇam vācyam tatas ca tad dṛṣṭāntena sarvatra kriyā karaṇayoḥ bheda siddheḥ katham kvacid abhedaḥ iti 
[52,6]	yat ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya jñānayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvānām upapattim abhidhāya jñāna aṃśayoḥ tu sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ vyavasthā āśraya tvāt iti uktam tat ati mahā su bhāṣitam bhinnayoḥ vastunoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ aneka udāharaṇa siddhaḥ api na yuktaḥ eka jñāna aṃśayoḥ tu svarūpeṇa āsatoḥ api yuktaḥ iti kaḥ evam sva pakṣa rāga mohāndhībhūtāt anyaḥ vaktum arhati vyavasthāpakam api vyavasthāpye kriyām kurvat bhavati yathā śiṃśipā tvam vṛkṣe niścayam kurvat iti atas na vyavasthāpaka tve api sādhanasya kriyātaḥ anartha antara tvam vyavasthāpyam tu prameyam na kriyā iti na ayam vastu saṃniveśī vyavahāraḥ iti ayam api na yuktaḥ parihāraḥ sarvathā nirvastuka tve vyavahārasya yasya kasyacid sādhana tva abhidhāna prasaṅgāt tatas ca anya pakṣa vyudāsena artha ākāra jñānasya eva pramāṇa tva pratipādana prayāsaḥ vyarthaḥ iti tasmāt viśiṣṭa ākāra tvam eva karaṇa vyavahāre nimittam tat ca artha antara kriyā anutpattau na yuktam iti 
[52,17]	nanu ca kriyā antara anutpādaka tve api sādṛśya viśiṣṭa utpāda mātreṇa karma ādi kāraka vyavasthā dṛṣṭā tat yathā mātaram anuharati putraḥ pitaram anuharati iti na hi atra pitṛ sadṛśa putra utpāda vyatirekeṇa anya anuharaṇa kriyā vidyate iti yadi na vidyate kāraka vyavasthā api atra tarhi vāstavī mā bhūt yathā gavayaḥ gām anuharati iti ādau sādṛśya pratipatti kriyāyāḥ tu vyatiriktam eva karaṇam cakṣuḥ ādi evam ca yatra kriyā pramāṇena upalabhyate tatra avaśyam chedana kriyāvat tad vyatiriktena karaṇena bhavitavyam anyathā hi ākasmikī kriyā syāt iti na ca adṛṣṭe pitari vastutas tad sadṛśa putra rūpa darśanāt eva pituḥ rūpam gṛhṇāti iti kaścid evam pratipadyate etena eka kāla ja bhrātṛ sadṛśa udāharaṇam vaibhāṣika pakṣe nirastam iti 
[53,8]	api ca jñāne yaḥ nīla ādi artha ākāraḥ sa kim sādhāraṇaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ iti yadi sādhāraṇaḥ sattva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ tadā katham tatas pratikarma vyavasthā sidhyati tad ākārakasya sarvatra aviśeṣāt atha asādhāraṇaḥ nīla tva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ atad vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ vā tadā jñānasya tad sambandhāt abodha ātmaka tva prasaṅgaḥ kasmāt nīlatva sambaddhasya anīlebhyaḥ vyāvṛttasya vā niyamena ābodha ātmaka tva upalambhāt go gavayayoḥ eka ākāra tve api bhinna jātīya tva upalambhāt anekāntaḥ iti ced na tad ākārasya avayava sanniveśa viśeṣa lakṣaṇasya sādhāraṇa tvāt dāru citra ādi mayeṣu api tad ākāra darśanāt etena pitṛ putra ādi udāharaṇam api pratyuktam jñānasya hi rūpa ādi rahita tvāt niravayava tvāt ca tathāvidham api sādṛśyam na asti na ca tathāvidha sādṛśya yogi tve api abodha ātmaka tva prasaktiḥ vyabhicarati tatas ca na jñānam na arthaḥ iti garddabhī kṣīra mathana vat na kiṃcid syāt iti 
[53,19]	sarva arthānām bodha ātmaka tvāt abodha ātma tve dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva na asti kutas jñānasya abodha ātmaka tva prasaktiḥ iti ced nanu etat api vyasanam te nivarttayiṣyāmaḥ mā tu ariṣṭhāḥ mukha ākāra darpaṇa vat iti api na yuktam tasya bhrānta tvāt yadi nāma mukha jñānam tatra abhra antam tad darpaṇa abheda jñānam tu bhrāntam eva iti api ca tatas jñāna sthān nīla ādi artha ākārāt kṣaṇika tva ādi ākāraḥ kim bhinnaḥ atha abhinnaḥ iti yadi bhinnaḥ tatas nīla ādi artha ākārasya akṣaṇika tva ādi prasaṅgaḥ kṣaṇikā ākāra vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇa tvāt akṣaṇika tvasya iti tatas bāhya arthasya api nīla tva ādi siddhi vat akṣaṇika tva ādi siddhiḥ api syāt atha abhinnaḥ tathā api tena artha ākāreṇa arthasya nīla tva ādi siddhi vat kṣaṇika tva ādi siddhiḥ api kṛtā iti anarthakam tad artham anumānam syāt asiddhau vā kṣaṇika tva ādeḥ tad ākārān nīla tva ādeḥ api siddhiḥ na syāt tad ubhaya ākāra jñāna pratibandha aviśeṣāt iti 
[54,6]	syāt etat niścāyakam hi pramāṇam iṣṭam tena aneka svabhāva artha ākāra tve api jñānasya yasmin eva aṃśe saṃskāra pāṭavān niścaya utpādaka tvam tatra eva prāmāṇyam na sarvatra iti sa tarhi niścayaḥ sa ākāraḥ vā nirākāraḥ vā iti sa ākāra tve saḥ api tad artha ākāraḥ kṣaṇika tva ādi ākārāt kim bhinnaḥ atha abhinnaḥ iti pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ tatra api niścaya antara kalpanāyām anavasthā syāt atha nirākāraḥ tadā api niścaya ātmanā sarva artheṣu aviśiṣṭasya jñānasya ayam asya arthasya niścayaḥ iti karma niyamaḥ kutas prasidhyet nirākārasya api kutaścid nimittāt pratikarma vyavasthā asiddhau anyatra api tatas eva tad siddheḥ kim ākāra kalpanayā iti yadi ca artha jñānasya artha ākāraḥ pramāṇam tadā keśa ādi jñānasya api bhrāntasya keśa ādi ākāraḥ pramāṇam syāt 
[54,15^1]	nanu ca avisaṃvādi jñānasya eva artha ākāraḥ pramāṇam iṣyate yasmāt uktam pramāṇam avisaṃvādi jñānam iti atha kim idam avisaṃvādi tvam nāma nanu artha kriyā samartha vastu prāpaka tvam iti uktam yat āha na hi ābhyām artham paricchidya pravarttamānaḥ artha kriyāyām visaṃvādyate iti loke api pūrvam upadarśitam artham prāpayat saṃvādakam ucyate tadvat jñānam api pradarśitam artham prāpayat saṃvādakam iti tathābhūta artha prāpaka tvam ca jñānasya tad artha pravṛtti janaka tvam eva yatas pravṛttau satyām saḥ arthaḥ prāpyate pravṛtti janaka tvam api pravṛtti viṣaya prakāśaka tvam eva na hi jñānam grīvām gṛhītvā puruṣam pravartayati tasmāt artha kriyā samartha vastu pradarśaka tvam eva jñānasya avisaṃvādi tvam pramāṇa lakṣaṇam iti 
[54,15^2]	tat na anumāna lakṣaṇasya apramāṇa tva prasaṅgāt na hi tasya artha kriyā samartha vastu pradarśaka tvam asti asat sāmānya viṣaya tvena bhrānta tva abhyupagamāt abhrānteḥ api artha sambandhāt avisaṃvādaka tvam iti api na yuktam grāhya arthena anumānasya sambandha asambhavāt agrāhya artha sambandhāt avisaṃvādaka tve tu svapna indrajāla ādi jñānānām api kenacid arthena sambandhāt avisaṃvādi tvam prasajyeta adhyavasita artha sambandhāt avisaṃvādaḥ iti ced syāt etat matam dvividhaḥ hi pramāṇānām viṣayaḥ grāhyaḥ ca adhyavaseyaḥ ca iti tatra yadi api anumānasya grāhya artha apekṣayā artha prāpaka tvam na bhavati tathā api adhyavasita artha prāptiḥ asti yatas anumānena api dāha artha kriyā samarthaḥ eva agniḥ adhyavasīyate tad artha kriyā arthinām tatas pravṛtti darśanāt tasmāt pratyakṣa vat adhyavasita artha prāpaka tvena anumānasya api avisaṃvādi tvam iti 
[55,12^1]	sa punar adhyavasāyaḥ kim dṛṣṭam eva artham adhyavasyati atha adṛṣṭam api iti dṛṣṭa adhyavasāyi tve dāha ādi samarthaḥ agniḥ na anumānena adhyavasīyeta tena tasya adṛṣṭa tvāt dṛṣṭa tve vā pratyakṣa vat na bhrānta tvam adṛṣṭa adhyavasāyi tve tu trailokya adhyavasāyaḥ api syāt adṛṣṭa tva aviśeṣāt atha manyase smaraṇa adhyāropasāmarthyāt na trailokya adhyavasāyaḥ yathā pradīpa darśane maṇiḥ eva adhyavasīyate na trailokyam bhrānteḥ evam svabhāva tvāt yat anya darśane anyat adhyavasīyate iti evam tarhi pratyakṣasya api bhrānta tvam prāptam dṛṣṭa vyatirikta kṣaṇa adhyavasāyāt na hi naśva rakṣaṇa adhyavasāye artha kriyā arthinām pravṛttiḥ upapadyate 
[55,12^2]	na ca nīla aṃśaḥ api kṣaṇāt anyaḥ asti yatra pravṛtti ādi avisaṃvādaḥ syāt jñāna mātram tu keśa ādiṣu api aviśiṣṭa tvāt na avisaṃvādī iti yaḥ eva santānaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ eva adhyavasīyate iti na ca yuktam kṣaṇa vyatirekeṇa santānasya api vastutas asambhavāt saṃvṛti sat viṣaya tvam ca pratyakṣasya na iṣṭam anumānena aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt loka saṃvyavahāra mātreṇa pratyakṣasya dṛṣṭa adhyavasāyi tvena abhrānta tve tatas eva anumānasya api tathā abhāvaḥ syāt aviśeṣāt āstām tāvat iyam mahatī kathā 
[56,4]	tathā yogi jñānānām api na vastu sadartha pradarśaka tvam asti atīta anāgatayoḥ asattvena artha kriyā kāritva ayogāt tathā sva saṃvedanasya api pravṛtti viṣaya apradarśaka tvena avisaṃvādi tvam na syāt tat evam avisaṃvādi tvam api na saugata mate vicāra kṣamam tasmāt artha ākāra mātrasya bhrānti jñāne api sambhavāt na pramāṇa tvam 
[56,8^1]	api ca bāhya arthasya abodha svabhāvaḥ pratīyate vā na vā yadi na pratīyate bāhya artha vārttā api tarhi nivṛttā bodha vilakṣaṇa svabhāva apratīteḥ atha pratīyate asau tad ākāreṇa jñānena tad ākāreṇa vāta dākāreṇa vā yadi atadākāreṇa tadvat nīla ādeḥ api anīla ādi ākāreṇa eva jñānena pratītiḥ astu kim nīla ādi ākāreṇa jñānasya kalpitena iti atha abodha svabhāvaḥ api tad ākāreṇa eva jñānena pratīyate nanu evam abodha svabhāva ākāra tādātmya ādi vijñānasya api abodha svabhāva tvam prāptam atha abodha ākāra tādātmye api vijñānasya abodha svabhāva tvam na iṣṭam evam tarhi bodha ākāra tādātmye api nīla ādi ākārasya ajñāna ātmaka tvam eva astu aviśeṣāt 
[56,8^2]	jñāna ajñāna svabhāvayoḥ ca viruddha tvāt eka tvam anupapannam tathā ca dharma kīrtinā eva uktam ayam eva hi bhedaḥ bheda hetuḥ vā bhāvānām yat viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaḥ ca iti tatas ced na bheda siddhiḥ na kasyacid kutas cit bhedaḥ iti ekam dravyam viśvam syāt iti tat evam jñāna artha ākārayoḥ bhinna tvāt na pramāṇa phalayoḥ tādātmyam śākya mate hi upapadyate tatas ca yat uktam avibhāgaḥ api buddhi ātmā viparyāsita darśanaiḥ grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bhedavān iva lakṣyate yathā anudarśanam ca iyam māna meya phala sthitiḥ kriyate avidyamānā api grāhya grāhaka saṃvidām iti 
[57,10^1]	tat nirastam grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bhedasya vāstava tvena pratipādanāt yadi ca viparyasta darśana anusāreṇa māna meya phala sthitiḥ avidyamānā api kriyate tatas keśa ādi bhrāntīnām api kim na sā kriyate viparyasta darśana aviśeṣāt tatas ca pramāṇa apramāṇa vibhāga anupapattiḥ iti nanu ca uktam eva atra pratisamādhānam kim tat iti ucyate vijñapti mātra vādī api upaplava vāsana abhisandhi doṣāt aprabuddhasya api anāśvāsikam vyavahāram utpaśyan ekam apramāṇam ācakṣīta aparam āsaṃsāram aviśliṣṭa anubandha dṛḍha vāsana tvāt iha vyavahāra avisaṃvāda apekṣayā pramāṇam sāṃvyāvahārikasya ca etat pramāṇasya rūpam yuktam 
[57,10^2]	atra api pare vimūḍhāḥ visaṃvādayanti lokam iti cintā mayīm eva prajñām anuśīlayante vibhrama viveka nirmalam anapāyi pāramārthikam pramāṇam abhimukhīkurvanti iti tat ayuktam sarvasya hi loka prasiddha pramāṇasya apāramārthika tve vibhrama viveka nirmalam pāramārthikam kutas niścīyate na pratyakṣeṇa yogi jñānasya asmad ādi pratyakṣa aviṣaya tvāt atha sva saṃvedanam eva ekam pāramārthikam pratyakṣam tathā api na tena pārama arthika itara viveka siddhiḥ tasya aviśiṣṭa sva sattā vedana mātra tvāt 
[57,10^3]	na api anumānena tasya trirūpa liṅga avagama apekṣa tvāt na ca niraṃśasya jñānasya arthasya vā trairūpyam vāstavam asti kalpita trairūpyāt vāstava artha siddhau tu para parikalpita anumānāt api vāstava artha siddhiḥ syāt viśeṣa abhāvāt loka vyavahāra avisaṃvādasya tu pramāṇa pramiti ādi bheda anumāne api sambhavāt api ca akṣaṇika tva ādi arthānām sarva loka avisaṃvādena dahana ādi anumāna vat pratīyamāna tvāt kim iti abhyupagamaḥ na kriyate vicārakaiḥ bādhaka udbhāvanāt iti ced na bādhakasya uttaratra nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt yadi ca loka vyavahāra avisaṃvādena pratīyamānasya api vicārakaiḥ bādhaka pratipādanāt abhyupagamaḥ na kriyate jñāna gata artha ākāraḥ api tarhi na abhyupagantavyaḥ tad bādhakasya tvayā eva ukta tvāt tat uktam anyathā ekasya bhāvasya nānā rūpa avabhāsinaḥ satyam katham syuḥ ākārāḥ tad eka tvasya hānitaḥ iti ātma advaita vādinam prati etat vākyam iti ced na samāna tvāt iti vakṣyāmaḥ vistareṇa api uttaratra jñānasya artha ākāram nirākariṣyāmaḥ iti atas śākyamate api sādhakatamaḥ arthaḥ na upapadyate 
[58,14]	anye tu anyathā varṇayanti bahūnām sādhakānām madhye atiśayena yat sādhakam tat sādhakatamam ucyate atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau iti vacanāt satyam kintu tam eva atiśayam na kasyacid sādhakasya paśyāmaḥ sarva kārakāṇām eka kriyāyām vyāpāra aviśeṣāt iti nanu tamaḥ ariṇā aneka dhā atiśayaḥ vyākhyātaḥ katham iti bhāva abhāvayoḥ tadvat tā pramāṇe sati pramā bhavantī bhavati eva pramātari prameye tu sati bhavati na tu bhavati eva iti satoḥ vā pramātṛ prameyayoḥ pramānutpādaka tvam yat abhāvāt saḥ atiśayaḥ caram abhāvaḥ vā pratipatteḥ ānantaryam vā yat anantaram eva pratipatteḥ janma saḥ atiśayaḥ iti arthaḥ asādhāraṇa kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vā atiśayaḥ pramājanaka saṃyoga anugrāhaka tvam vā acarita artha tā vā pramātṛ prameye pramāṇam kṛtvā caritārthe bhavataḥ pramāṇam tu acarita artham pramām kurvat sādhakatamam ucyate iti arthaḥ yadvān vā pramimīte saḥ atiśayaḥ iti śiṣyasya saṃśaya nivṛtti artham pravṛttena ācāryeṇa avyavasthitān aneka pakṣān pradarśya abhivarddhitaḥ eva saṃśayaḥ kim atra sādhakatamam iti 
[59,11^1]	sarva pakṣeṣu antimasya eva kāraṇasya sādhakatama tvam vivakṣitam iti eke tat ca na evam prameyasya api sukha duḥkha ādeḥ sva upalabdhau carama bhāva darśanāt na hi tatra sambandhaḥ api paścāt bhavati tatra api sukha tva ādi jñānasya carama bhāvaḥ iti ced nirvikalpaka pratyakṣe sāmānya grahaṇa pūrva katva anabhyupagamāt tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ sva gata rūpa ādi utpattau ca avayavinām caram a bhāvaḥ asti teṣām tu adhikaraṇa tvāt na karaṇa tvam yuktam rūpa ādi upalabdhau ca nayana ādeḥ karaṇa tva anabhyupagame tad satva siddhiḥ kriyā tva anumānāt na syāt loke api paraśvādeḥ karaṇa tvam prasiddham na vaḥ tava artha siddhiḥ syāt viśeṣa abhāvāt loka vyavahāra avisaṃvādasya tu pramāṇa tad saṃyogasya eva 
[59,11^2]	tulā sūtra virodhāt ca na caramasya eva karaṇa tvam iti aneka pakṣa upanyāse yat atra yuktam tat eva grāhyam svayam vā anyat abhyūhyam iti ruci kāraḥ tamaḥ areḥ abhiprāyam manyamānaḥ karma kartṛ vilakṣaṇasya sarvasya api kāraṇasya sādhakatama tvam uktavān etat ca yadvān vā pramimīte saḥ atiśayaḥ iti anena uktam katham yāni saha kārīṇi vidyante asya iti yadvān yaiḥ sahakāribhiḥ upetaḥ kartā karmaṇi kriyām niṣpādayati tāni eva sādhakatamāni na karttā karma vā iti arthaḥ svayam vā abhyūhya uktam karma karttṛ vilakṣaṇam sarvam kārakam karaṇam iti 
[60,14^1]	anye tu vailakṣaṇya mātreṇa kārakāṇām atiśaya anupapattim manyamānāḥ sāmagryāḥ eva sādhakatama tvam āhuḥ sā hi niṣpatti anantaram eva kriyām janayati na eka deśa vat kiṃcid apekṣate iti ayam asyāḥ tad eka deśebhyaḥ atiśayaḥ sādhakatama tvena ucyate iti tat api ayuktam kartṛ karaṇa ādi kāraka sākalyam hi sāmagrī katham sā karaṇam eva iti na ca kartṛ ādeḥ ajanaka avasthāyām eva kartṛ ādi rūpa tvam janaka avasthāyām ca karaṇa tvam yuktam kartṛ ādi bhāvasya api kriyā nibandhana tvāt na api janaka avasthāyām eva samudāya apekṣayā karaṇa tvam eka deśa apekṣayā ca kartṛ ādi bhāvaḥ tasya kālpanika tvena śākya abhyupagata vat apāramārthika tva prasaṅgāt atha kartṛ ādibhyaḥ artha antaram sāmagrī tasyāḥ karaṇa tvam iti na kartṛ ādeḥ ajanaka tva prasaṅgāt sāmagrītaḥ eva kārya utpatteḥ iṣṭa tvāt carama kāraṇa pakṣa ukta dūṣaṇa duṣṭa tvāt ca 
[60,14^2]	dharma mātra tvena kāraṇa tvena abhyupagatāyāḥ api sāmagryāḥ karaṇa tvam ayuktam sādhakatama tva virodhāt iti evam tarhi rucikāra matam eva astu na saṃpradāna ādi kāraka abhāva prasaṅgāt tṛṇa ulapa nyāyena karaṇa bhedeṣu saṃpradāna ādi vyavahāraḥ iti ced na pratīti abhāvāt na hi yathā ulapa ādiṣu tṛṇa pratītiḥ dṛṣṭā tathā saṃpradāna ādiṣu api karaṇa pratītiḥ iti samaya mātreṇa tathā vyavahāra abhyupagame kartṛ karmaṇoḥ karaṇa bhedatva abhyupagamaḥ api anivāryaḥ syāt tatas ca vāstavī kāraka vyavasthā kvacid api na syāt na ca kartṛ karmabhyām vailakṣṇya mātreṇa kārakāṇām atiśayavat tvam yuktam tayoḥ api paraspara vailakṣyeṇa sādhakatama tva prasaṅgāt 
[61,16]	kim idānīm tarhi sādhakatama tvam bhavet iti sākṣātkartṛ dhiṣṭhitasya asādhyasya sataḥ kriyā sādhaka tvam na ca etat saṃpradāna ādiṣu asti na hi godāna ādi kriyām kurvatā sākṣāt upādhyāya ādayaḥ adhiṣṭhīyante kintu hastaḥ vā vāc vā manaḥ vā anyat vā kiṃcid iti yatra ca etad nimittam na asti tatra karaṇa vyavahāraḥ bhavan api na mukhyaḥ karma ādiṣu kartṛ vyavahāra vat na hi svatantra tām antareṇa mukhyam kartṛvam yuktam svātantryam punar sva icchayā kriyā sādhaka tvam tat ca cetaneṣu aupacārikam kalpanā samāropitam vā yathā kuḍyam patitum icchati iti 
[61,23]	sukha ādi karmaṇaḥ api sākṣāt puruṣa adhiṣṭhitasya sva upalabdhi kriyā sādhaka tvāt karaṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na asādhyasya iti viśeṣita tvāt trividham api hi karma atra sādhya śabdena uktam nirvartyam ca vikāryam ca prāpyam ca iti na tad lakṣaṇa samāveśam antareṇa kasya api karmaṇaḥ karaṇa tvam prasajyate tad lakṣaṇa samāveśaḥ tu kārakāṇām vastutas api kvacid asti yathā sva ātma pratipatti kriyāyām tasya eva ātmanaḥ kartṛ tva karma tvam adhikaraṇa tvam ca iti tat evam kārakāṇām vyavasthita lakṣaṇa bheda siddheḥ vāstavaḥ eva karma ādi vyavahāraḥ tad ābhāseṣu gauṇaḥ eva yatra punar upacāra nimittam api na asti tatra api tad lakṣaṇa kalpanā adhyāropeṇa vyavahāraḥ upapadyate vāstava abhāve tu kalpanā adhyāropeṇa api na syāt na hi sarvathā api adṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ kalpayitum śakyate viṣāṇa ādeḥ api gavā ādau dṛṣṭasya eva śaśa ādi mastake kalpanā iti tat evam vāstavam eva pramām prati sādhakatamam yat tat bodha svabhāvam abodha svabhāvam ca pramāṇam iti ucyate tatra tad abhidhāyinā sādhana śabdena pramā pra mātṛ premeyāni abhidhīyante iti sthitam 
[62,11]	pramā pra mātṛ prameyāṇām api bhedaḥ na avāstavaḥ tad lakṣaṇānām vāstavebhedāt tathā ca samyak anubhavaḥ pramā pramāśrayaḥ pramātā pramāsam avāyi kāraṇam iti arthaḥ pramā viṣayaḥ prameyam pramāyām yaḥ arthaḥ cakāsti sa pramāyāḥ viṣayaḥ prameyam iti 
[62,15^1]	yadi evam prathama sūtre tarhi pramāṇāt bhinna lakṣaṇa tvāt prameya ādi vat pramātā api pṛthak upadeṣṭavyaḥ iti na pramāṇa uddeśāt eva tad siddheḥ na hi pramātāram antareṇa pramāṇam sambhavati tulya yogakṣema tva jñāpana artha tvāt ca yena eva nyāyena pramāṇasya sattvam viśiṣṭa aviśiṣṭa phala jana katavam ca sādhyate tena eva pramātuḥ api iti atas na asya pṛthak uddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ prameyasya api tarhi pṛthak uddeśaḥ na prāpnoti satyam prameya mātrasya pṛthak uddeśa anabhyupagamāt prameya viśeṣasya uddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ prayojana vaśāt tat ca prayojanam uttaratra viśeṣa lakṣaṇa upavarṇane darśayiṣyāmaḥ pramiti mātrasya api prameya mātra vat pramāṇa uddeśāt eva uddeśaḥ tattva jñāna padena tu tad viśaṣasya uddeśaḥ apavarga hetu tva jñāpana artham iti yadi prameya padena prameya viśeṣasya uddeśaḥ kriyate nanu evam tarhi diś kāla paramāṇu ādīnām saṅgrahaḥ na prāpnoti 
[62,15^2]	tatas ca samastasya jagat kāraṇasya apratipādanāt adhyātma śāstra tvam asya anupapannam iti na eṣa doṣaḥ pramāṇa uddeśa sāmarthya uddiṣṭa prameya mātre sarvasya antar bhāvāt evam ca sati sat rūpam asat rūpam vā na kiṃcid atra anuddiṣṭam asti pramāviṣayatvena sarvasya prameya tvāt iti saṃsaya ādīnām api tarhi pṛthak vacanam anarthakam pramāṇeṣu prameye vā antarbhāvāt iti na antarbhāve api prayojana vaśena pṛthak uddeśa karaṇāt tathā ca saṃśayasya pratipāditam prayojanam nyāya pravṛtti hetu tvam iti pṛthak uddeśa nirdeśābhyām khalu su niścita svarūpāṇām saṃśaya ādīnām pṛthak prayojanavat tvam sukha avabodham bhaviṣyati iti abhiprāyavatā śrīmat sūtra kṛtā sūtra lāghavam anādṛtya daṇḍaka sūtram rucitam iti tatra saṃśayasya eva svarūpam prayojanam tu prāk uktam na tu prayojana ādīnām atas teṣām iti vaktavyam 
[63,6]	atha prayojanasya tāvat kim prayojanam iti na ayam yukataḥ praśnaḥ tad ātmaka tvāt aprayojana ātmakasya upādāne hi prayojana praśnaḥ upapadyate kim anena prayojanam iti prayojana ātmakasya tu prayojana praśna anupapattiḥ na hi bhavati sukhena kim prayojanam iti na abhiprāya aparijñānāt na brūmaḥ prayojanena kim prayojanam iti kim tarhi pramāṇa prameya antarbhūtasya api prayojanasya pṛthak abhidhāne kim prayojanam iti tatra bhāṣya kṛt abravīt tena anena sarve prāṇinaḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvāḥ ca vidyāḥ vyāptāḥ tad āśrayaḥ ca nyāyaḥ pravarttate iti vayam tu etat na sahodara buddhyāmahe prayojana vyāpteḥ anyatra api loke śāstre ca prasiddha tvāt tathā hi sarve śāstra jñāḥ laukikāḥ ca sarva prāṇi karma vidyānām nyāyasya ca prayojanavat tvam sāmānyena avagacchantaḥ tad viśeṣam prati paryanuyogam kurvanti kena prayojanena ayam pumān pravṛttaḥ kim artham idam karma kim artham idam śāstram kim anena anumānena iti tasmāt anyat prayojanam ucyate 
[63,18]	kecid atra paramātma jñānam niḥśreyasa nimittam nirācikīrṣavaḥ parameśvarasya eva prayojana abhāvāt pravṛtti asambhavena abhāvam pratipādayantaḥ sarva prāṇi nigraha anugraha lakṣaṇam prayojanam naiyāyikena uktam na pratipadyante kila na anyadīyam sukham duḥkha abhāvaḥ vā anyasya prayojanam yuktam parinigrahaḥ api vīta rāgasya na prayojanam iti tat samarthana artham sūtrakāraḥ prasiddham eva prayojana svarūpam pṛthak uddiśya anuvadati yam artham adhikṛtya pravarttate tat prayojanam etat uktam bhavati loke api yasmāt yaḥ yam artham sva ātmanaḥ pareṣām vā saṃpādayiṣyāmi nivarttayiṣyāmi vā iti urarīkṛtya pravarttate tat tasya prayojanam siddham tasmāt bhagavān api yam artham adhikṛtya pravattate tat eva asya prayojanam sa hi bhagavān niratiśaya jñāna vairāgya aiśvarya upetaḥ api evaṃsvabhāvaḥ yena sarva saṃsāriṇām karma anurūpa artha anartha saṃpādanam adhikṛtya pravarttate tasmāt tat eva bhagavataḥ prayojanam prayojana lakṣaṇa upapanna tvāt ubhaya abhimata sukha ādi vat iti 
[64,6]	atha dṛṣṭāntasya kim svarūpam prayojanam ca iti bahis vyāpti sthānam dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti eke sādhya dharmi vyatiriktaḥ sādhya sādhan dharmavān tat rahitaḥ ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti eke pratyakaṣa viṣayaḥ arthaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti bhāṣyam yatra laukika prīkṣakāṇām buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti sūtram yatra bahis vyāpti sthāne yatra ca udāharaṇe yatra vā sādhya sādhana dharmavati tat rahite ca iti adhyāhāryam laukika parīkṣakāṇām pratipādya pratipādakānām buddhi sāmyam saṃpratipattiḥ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti sva artha anumāna kāle pratipādya pratipādaka abhāvāt katham tad buddhi sāmya viṣayaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti ced na tatra api paryālocayataḥ tasya eva ubhaya rūpa tvāt śāstra kartṛ vat yogya tā apekṣayā vā samarthanīyam lakṣaṇa antaram vā anena lakṣaṇena asaṅgṛhītasya draṣṭavyam kriyāvat tvena asaṅgṛhītasya iva dravyasya iti 
[64,16]	anye tu varṇayanti laukikāḥ sādhya dharmāḥ parīkṣakāḥ sādhana dharmāḥ teṣām vyāpaka vyāpya bhāva siddhau avipratipattiḥ yatra sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti tasya pṛthak abhidhāne bhāṣya kṛtā prayojanam uktam tad āśrayau anumāna āgamau tasmin sati syātām anumāna āgamau asati ca na syātām tad āśrayā ca nyāya pravṛttiḥ dṛṣṭānta virodhena para pakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ vacanīyaḥ bhavati dṛṣṭānta samādhinā ca sva pakṣaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ bhavati nāstikaḥ ca dṛṣṭāntam abhyupagacchat nāstika tvam jahyāt anabhyupayan kiṃsādhanaḥ param upālabheta nirukte ca dṛṣṭānte śakyam abhidhātum sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam tad viparyayāt vā viparītam iti asmābhiḥ tu prāk eva uktam uddeśa lakṣaṇa abhidhānam anuvāda artham anuvāde ca viparyastānām bhrānti nivṛttaye dṛṣṭānta tad ābhāsayoḥ vidhi pratiṣedhau prayojanam tat aviruddham bhāṣya kāra uktam api pratipattavyam iti 
[65,7^1]	siddhāntasya tarhi svarūpam prayojanam ca vācyam iti svayam abhyupagataḥ arthaḥ siddhāntaḥ artha grahaṇam pūrva pakṣa tvena prauḍhi vādi tvena vā svayam abhyupagatasya api sva siddhāntatva niṣedha artham varttamāna kāle api abhyupagamyamānasya siddhānta tva jñāpana artham ca asti ayam iti abhyanujñāyamānaḥ arthaḥ siddhāntaḥ iti bhāṣyam sāmānya viśeṣavān arthaḥ pramāṇa mūlena abhyupagamena abhyupagamyamānaḥ siddhāntaḥ iti ṭīkākārāḥ te bhāṣyam api etasmin arthe vyācakṣate tatra sāmānya viśeṣavān iti viśeṣaṇam anarthakam vartamāna abhidhānam ca na hi prāc abhyupagataḥ na siddhāntaḥ anavadhāraṇāt abhyupagataḥ api siddhānte iti ced evam tarhi abhyupagama grahaṇam eva astu kim akṣara gauraveṇa pramāṇa mūlena iti kim artham yadi bauddha ādi abhyupagata arthānām asiddhānta tvam evam tarhi teṣām siddhānta virodhaḥ na udbhāvayitavyaḥ siddhānta asambhave hi kutas tad virodhaḥ pramāṇa śabda vat tad ābhāse api siddhānta śabdaḥ pravarttate iti ced na vyavahāra mātra pravṛtteḥ 
[65,7^2]	na hi jānan api kaścid anunmataḥ pramāṇa ābhāsena api virodham udbhāvayati tad udbhāvayituḥ eva adoṣa udbhāvana nigraha sthāna prasaṅgāt tasmāt bauddha ādi abhyupeta arthānām api tad abhiprāya siddha tvena siddhānta tvam abhyupagantavyam tathā ca loke śāstre api ayam vyavahāraḥ asti bauddhānām ayam siddhāntaḥ sāṃkhyānām ayam mīmāṃsakānām ayam iti kim ca sāmānyena eṣām siddhānta tve sati pramāṇa upapanna tva anupapanna tva viśeṣaḥ api syāt iti tantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ siddhāntaḥ iti sūtram saṃsthitiḥ iti siddhānta paryāyaḥ tantra saṃsthitiḥ adhikaraṇa saṃsthitiḥ abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ iti trividhaḥ siddhāntaḥ tantra bhedāt uttara sūtreṇa caturvidhaḥ uktaḥ iti bhāṣya kāra matam ṭīkākārāḥ tu āhuḥ tantram pramāṇam tad adhikaraṇam mūlam yasyāḥ artha viśeṣa abhyupagama saṃsthiteḥ sā tathā uktā tatas ca sāmānya viśeṣavān ityādi lakṣaṇam anena uktam bhavati iti manyante bhāṣyam traividhyā abhidhāyakam eka deśīya matena vyācakṣate 
[66,4^1]	asmad abhiprāye tu abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ iti etat eva lakṣaṇam katham abhyupagama padena karma sādhanena abhyupagataḥ arthaḥ uktaḥ tasya saṃsthitiḥ vyavasthā yaḥ yena arthaḥ abhyupagataḥ sa tasya siddhānte iti arthaḥ sā ca saṃsthitiḥ trividhā bhavati tantra viśeṣitā adhikaraṇa viśeṣitā nirviśeṣitā ca iti atas trividhaḥ siddhāntaḥ tantram anabhyupagamya vivādam kurvatām adhikaraṇa abhyupagama siddhāntābhyām virodhena eva apasiddhāntaḥ bhavati na tantra artha virodhena iti asya arthasya jñāpana artham traividhyā abhidhānam 
[66,4^2]	tantra bheda vivakṣayā tu caturvidhaḥ tad artham sarva tantra pratitantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthiti artha antara bhāvāt iti sūtram artha antara bhāvaḥ asiddhaḥ iti ced na lakṣaṇa bhedena pratīyamāna tvāt tad artham sūtra catuṣṭayam tatra sarva tantra aviruddhaḥ tantre adhikṛtaḥ arthaḥ sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ tat yathā māna nibandhanā meya sthitiḥ kāraṇāt kārya utpattiḥ prasiddha saṃketa vākya śravaṇāt vaktṛ vivakṣita artha avagatiḥ iti na hi etat anabhyupagame kasyacid anunmattasya śāstra praṇayana śravaṇa vyākhyāneṣu vivāde vā pravṛttiḥ upapadyate iti 
[66,17]	samāna tantra prasiddhaḥ paratantra aprasiddhaḥ prati tantra siddhāntaḥ samānam tantram kāpilānām pātañjalam pātañjalānām ca kāpilam iti evam prakārakam udāharaṇam kecid icchanti ṭīkākārāḥ tu na icchanti apramāṇa upapanna tvāt iti manyamānāḥ tad mate tu etat eva udāharaṇam samānam tantram naiyāyikānām vaiśeṣika śāstram vaiśeṣikāṇām nyāya śāstram iti vayam tu anyathā vyācakṣmahe anekeṣām upanibandha kārāṇām vyākhyātṛ śrotṝṇām ca mūla bhūtam ekam tantram sādhāraṇam sāmānam iti ucyate yathā samānam gṛham samānam dhanam iti tasmin samāna tantre yaḥ siddhaḥ arthaḥ paratantre tu kvacid sarvatra vā na siddhaḥ sa prati tantra siddhāntaḥ evam ca sva śāstra asiddhaḥ arthaḥ sadṛśa tantra siddhaḥ api prati tantra siddhāntaḥ na bhavati iti gamyate tatas ca tad virodhe api na apasiddhāntaḥ prasajyate iti 
[67,1]	yat siddhau anya prakaraṇa siddhiḥ saḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ yasya arthasya siddhau sāmarthya ākṣiptāyām tad anyasya prakaraṇasya prakriyate iti prakaraṇam tasya prakṛta arthasya siddhiḥ niravadyā bhavati saḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ yathā kṣiti ādi kāryasya buddhimat kartṛ pūrvakatva siddhaḥ tad kartuḥ sarvajña tva ādi dharma siddhau sāmarthya ākṣiptāyām niravadyā bhavati na hi sarvajña tva ādi dharma rahitaḥ prāṇi karma vipāka anurūpāṇi tanu bhuvana ādi kāryāṇi utpādayitum samarthaḥ tat evam sādhya anuṣaṃgī jñātaḥ arthaḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ iti atha vā sādhyaḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ katham yasya sādhyasya siddhau kriyamāṇāyām tad anyeṣām viśeṣāṇām prakaraṇāt tad sādhanāt eva siddhiḥ bhavati sa sādhyaḥ arthaḥ tān viśeṣān gṛhītvā siddhaḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ iti hetu arthaḥ eva adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ iti ṭīkākāraḥ katham yasya dhūma ādeḥ siddhau satyām tad anyasya agni ādeḥ siddhiḥ sa dhūma ādiḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ iti 
[67,12^1]	aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇam abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ sādhyam eva abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti ṭīkākārāḥ katham aparīkṣitasya anitya tva ādi rūpeṇa avicāritasya śabda ādeḥ dharmi tvena abhyupagamāt tad viśeṣaḥ anitya tva ādi dharmaḥ parīkṣate iti parīkṣaṇam abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ ca iti bhāṣyasya tu yathā śruta artha parīkṣitāt viparītaḥ arthaḥ aparīkṣitaḥ asvaśāstrakaḥ saḥ eva abhyupagama viśiṣṭaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ tena aparīkṣita abhyupagamaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti etat eva lakṣaṇa artham sūtram vibhajanīyam tatra yadi kaścid āha kim artham jānan api asvaśāstrakam artham abhyupagacchati iti tatra uttaram aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇam kartum icchati iti adhyāhāryam kim anyathā tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇam kartum na śaknoti iti kaḥ evam āha 
[67,12^2]	kiṃtu sva buddhi atiśaya khyāpanam ca vīta rāgasya mumukṣoḥ ayuktam iti ced na bauddha ādīnām artha lābha pūjā khyā atyartham evam para vartamāna tvāt teṣām abhyupagama siddhāntena virodham bruvatām apasiddhānta udbhāvanam mumukṣuṇā api kriyate iti etat artham asya nirūpaṇam sva pakṣasya aneka nyāya puṣṭa tva jñāpana artham viduṣām abhyupagama vādena pravṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā yathā vedānām nitya tvam abhyupagamya api āpta prāmāṇyāt eva prāmāṇyam sādhyate na hi avyākhyātāt eva vedāt tad artha pratipattiḥ bhavati vyākhyānam ca aprakṛtam eva samyak artha avabodhanam iti viduṣām ca abhyupagama vādam kurvatām apasiddhānta parihāraḥ prayojanam siddhānta bheda abhijñaḥ hi tad virodham sva vākyeṣu parihartum para vākyeṣu udbhāvayitum śaknoti etat artham sarve siddhānta bhedāḥ nirūpitāḥ iti bhāṣya kāraḥ punar idam prayojanam āha siddhānta bhedeṣu satsu vāda jalpa vitaṇḍāḥ pravartante na atas anyathā iti 
[68,2]	atha avayavānām kim svarūpam prayojanam ca iti sādhanīyasya arthasya yāvati śabda samūhe siddhiḥ parisamāpyate tasya pañca bhāgāḥ pratijña ādayaḥ samūham apekṣya avayavāḥ iti ucyante iti avayava svarūpam uktam bhāṣya kāreṇa tat iṣṭam asmākam teṣām pṛthak abhidhāne prayojanam uktam teṣu pramāṇa samavāyaḥ āgamaḥ pratijñā hetuḥ anumānam pratyakṣam udāharaṇam upamānam upanayaḥ sarveṣām eka artha samavāye sāmarthya pradarśana artham nigamanam iti saḥ ayam paramaḥ nyāyaḥ etena vāda jalpa vitaṇḍāḥ pravartante tad āśrayā ca tattva vyavasthā iti tat asmākam sva matā virodhena iṣṭam sva mate tu pratijña ādi lakṣaṇa anuvāda pūrvakau pratijña ādi tattva tad ābhāsayoḥ viparyastān prati vidhi pratiṣedhau prayojanam iti 
[68,12]	tarkasya tu svarūpam prayojanam ca pūrvam eva nirūpitam tasya lakṣaṇa artham idam sūtram avijñāta tattve arthe kāraṇa upapattitaḥ tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ iti avijñātam tattvam nirṇaya nimittam viśeṣaṇam yasya arthasya saḥ avijñāta tattvaḥ tasmin arthe kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti bādhaka pramāṇa sambhavāt ūhaḥ tarka paryāyaḥ bhavati sa ca tattva jñāna arthaḥ tattva jñāna viṣaya vivecaka tvāt iti pūrva ācāryāḥ vayam punar brūmaḥ kāraṇa upapattiḥ sādhana sambhāvanā yat sādhanam sva sādhyam prati kadācid eva yadi vyabhicarati tad darśanāt anena bhavitavyam iti sādhya viṣayaḥ bhavati ūhaḥ sa ca puruṣa pravṛtti dvāreṇa tattva jñāna arthaḥ api bhavati tathā vāda ādi pravṛtti dvāreṇa pūrva utpanna tattva jñāna pālana arthaḥ jaya parājaya tattva jñānasya utpati arthaḥ ca bhavati yoga artham ca pravartamānasya aprasiddhe antarāya upaśama sādhana viśeṣe citta sthiti sādhana viśeṣe ca ūhaḥ pāramparyeṇa ātma darśana arthaḥ bhavati evam anyatra api pravṛtti dvāreṇa sva viṣaye viṣaya antare vā tattva jñāna artha tvam ūhasya draṣṭavyam iti 
[68,25^1]	vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ iti sūtram vimṛśya saṃśayam kṛtvā puruṣeṇa nirṇayaḥ kriyate kutas pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām pakṣa viṣayam sādhanam pakṣa śabdena uktam pratipakṣa viṣayam dūṣaṇam pratipakṣa śabdena uktam kim upacāre prayojanam viṣaya vibhāga sidhiḥ pakṣa viṣayam eva sādhanam pratipakṣa viṣayam eva dūṣaṇam iti sādhana dūṣaṇābhyām iti ucyamāne hi tayoḥ eka viṣaya tvam api āśaṃkyeta artha avadhāraṇam iti paryāya abhidhānam vimṛśya iti ayuktam vimarṣa abhāve api hi kara tala ādiṣu agni ādiṣu ca akṣajaḥ laiṅgikaḥ ca niścayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti na atīndriya artha nirṇayasya lakṣya tvena abhipreta tvāt kutas 
[68,25^2]	niḥśreyasa artha tvāt śāstrasya niḥśreyasam ca ātma ādi nirṇayāt eva iti atas saḥ eva lakṣayate ātma ādi nirṇayaḥ api keṣāṃcid āgamāt eva sva pakṣa sādhanāt eva vā bhavati iti atas pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām iti ayuktam na vicārakam prati śāstra ārambhāt nyāya śāstra tvāt atra vicārakaḥ adhikriyate tasya ca vipratipatti nirāsa mukhena nirṇayaḥ kartavyaḥ sa ca tathā nirṇayaḥ na sādhana mātrāt ubhaya pakṣa sādhana upapattau viruddha avi abhicāri tva prasaṅgāt na api dūṣaṇa mātrāt sādhana abhāve sādhya siddheḥ ayogāt kim tarhi pratipakṣa dūṣaṇa sahitāt sva pakṣa sādhanāt samarthitāt bhavati iti atas pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām iti uktam nirṇaya mātra lakṣaṇa vivakṣāyām tu artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ iti etāvat eva sūtram draṣṭavyam iti 
[69,16]	nanu ca nirṇayasya pramāṇa phala tvāt tad uddeśāt eva uddeśaḥ siddhaḥ tad viśeṣaḥ api tattva jñāna padena upadiṣṭaḥ tat kim artham pṛthak asya ārambhaḥ na ananya paratvena niḥśreyasa hetu tva jñāpana artha tvāt pramāṇa ādīnām tattvam lakṣaṇam uktam tad niścayāt pramāṇa ādi niścayaḥ pramāṇa ādi niścayāt ātma ādi nirṇayaḥ iti anena krameṇa pramāṇa ādi tattva jñānam niḥśreyasa kāraṇam uktam yadā api pramāṇa ādi niścayaḥ eva paramāṇa ādi tattva jñānam tadā api ātma ādi nirṇaya dvāreṇa eva tat niḥśreyasa kāraṇam bhavati na tu evam ātma ādi nirṇayaḥ anyatra niścayam kurvan niḥśreyasa hetuḥ iti atas asya yuktaḥ pṛthak ārambhaḥ tattva jñāna viśeṣaṇa arthaḥ na aupadeśika vat ātma ādi tattva jñāna mātram vicārakasya niḥśreyasa kāraṇam kim tarhi yat nirṇaya ātmakam tad vipratipakṣa nirākaraṇa sahitāt su vicāritāt sādhanāt utpānnam na vicalati iti bhāṣya kāraḥ tu prayojanam āha tad avasānaḥ vādaḥ tasya pālana artham jalpa vitaṇḍe tau etau tarka nirṇayau lokayātrām vahate iti 
[70,6]	vāda ādīnām svarūpam uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ prayojanam tu vādasya tāvat pṛthak abhidhānam upalakṣaṇa artham upalakṣitena vyavahāraḥ tattva jñāna artham bhavati iti bhāṣyam vāda svarūpam anūdya tattva jñāna arthinaḥ kartavya tvena abhidhīyate lābha ādi artha tā asya pratiṣidhyate iti mad matam tathā ca sūtram tam śiṣya guru sabrahmacāri śiṣṭa śreyaḥ arthibhiḥ anasūyibhiḥ abhyupeyāt iti tatra uttama prajñaiḥ saha saṃśaya uccheda artham avasita abhyanujñāna artham anavasita avabodha artham ca vinītaḥ bhūtvā vādam kuryāt samāna prajñaiḥ madhya sthaiḥ saha nirahaṃkārasya vādam kurvataḥ prajñāparipākaḥ pūrva uktam ca phalam nyūna prajñaiḥ sādhubhiḥ saha para anugrahaḥ phalam pūrva uktam ca anuṣaṃgāt iti jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇa artha tvam uktam tat ca upariṣṭhāt vicāriyiṣyāmaḥ 
[70,17^1]	hetvābhāsa chala ja ati nigraha sthānānām tu sva vākyeṣu parivarjanam para vākyeṣu ca udbhāvanam prayojanam hetvābhāsa ādi lakṣaṇam ca ānūdya tad svarūpa itarayoḥ vipratipadyamānam prati vidhīyate pratiṣidhyate ca iti nigraha sthānebhyaḥ pṛthak upadiṣṭāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ vāde codanīyāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti bhāṣyam na ubhayathā api vyāpteḥ asambhavāt yadi tāvat ye ye nigraha sthānebhyaḥ pṛthak upadiṣṭāḥ te te vāde codanīyāḥ tadā saṃśaya ādayaḥ api vāde codanīyāḥ syuḥ atha ye ye vāde codanīyāḥ te te nigraha sthānebhyaḥ pṛthak upadiṣṭāḥ tadā apasiddhānta ādibhiḥ anekāntaḥ teṣām vāde codanīya tve api pṛthak anupadiṣṭa tvāt iti nigraha sthāna antarbhūtā santaḥ ye tatas pṛthak upadiṣṭāḥ te vāde codanīyāḥ chala ādi vat iti eke pariharanti 
[70,17^2]	na prayojana anabhidhānāt chala jātyoḥ api nigraha sthāna tva abhyupagame nigraha sthānebhyaḥ trayāṇām api pṛthak abhidhāne prayojanam vaktavyam tat ca na uktam vāde codanīya tvam cāpa siddhānta ādi vat apṛthak upadeśe api upapadyate iti atas anarthakam pṛthak abhidhānam prāptam iti viśeṣa lakṣaṇa prapañca dvāreṇa hetvābhāsānām bheda prapañca pratipati artham nigraha sthānebhyaḥ pṛthak upadeśaḥ iti matam me na hi pratijñāhāni a ādīnām apṛthak upadiṣṭānām ittham prapañcaḥ asti hetvābhāsa bheda prapañca bheda pratipattau ca anumātuḥ ati naipuṇyam bhavati na anyathā iti chala jātyoḥ api yadi nigraha sthāna antar bhāvi tvam tadā etat eva pṛthak abhidhāne prayojanam draṣṭavyam iti 
[71,13]	sā iyam ānvīkṣikī nyāya vidyā pramāṇa ādibhiḥ padārthaiḥ prativibhajyamānā pradīpaḥ sarva vidyānām upāyaḥ sarva karmaṇām āśrayaḥ sarva dharmāṇām vidyā uddeśe parīkṣitā iti bhāṣyam tat ca idam vicāryate kim viṣaya bhedāt vidyānām bhedaḥ uta prayojana bhedāt iti yadi viṣaya bhedāt na tarhi catasraḥ eva vidyāḥ caturdaśānām vidyānām bhinna viṣaya tvāt tat uktam aṅgāni vedāḥ catvāraḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya vistaraḥ purāṇam dharma śāstram ca vidyāḥ hi etāḥ caturdaśa iti caturdaśa avadhāraṇam api na yuktam śaiva siddhānta ādīnām vaidya śāstra ādīnām ca bhinna viṣaya tvāt iti 
[72,1^1]	atha prayojana bhedāt bhedaḥ tathā api daṇḍanīti vārttayoḥ api eka prayojana tvāt abhedaḥ tathā upaniṣad ā anvīkṣikyoḥ api abhedaḥ eva iti katham trayī ā ādi bhedena catasraḥ vidyāḥ syuḥ tasmāt mukhya gauṇa puruṣa artha bhedena catasraḥ vidyāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ dharma artha kāma mokṣa śāstrāṇi iti tatra kāma mokṣau sukha duḥkha upagama apagamau uktau tad upāyau dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa bhedena artha dharmau uktau iti nanu evam tarhi trayyānvīkṣikyoḥ apavarga artha tvāt abhedaḥ prāpnoti satyam tathā api vicāraka viṣaya tvena sarva vidyā anugrāhaka tvena ca asyāḥ sarva vidyābhyaḥ prādhānyam avāntara bhedaḥ ca asti 
[72,1^2]	sarva vidyā anugrāhaka tvam ca nyāya śāstra tvāt nyāyena hi sarva vidyānām prāmāṇyam samarthyate pratyakṣa ādi viṣaya tve api nyāya śāstram eva idam kutas pratipattavyam iti ced ucyate nyāya pravṛtti śuddhi aṅga tvena atra saṃśaya ādīnām uddeśa ādibhiḥ pratipādanāt atas eva anya śāstrāṇām anumāna abhidheya tve api na nyāya śāstra tvam na hi anya śāstreṣu ittham saṃśaya ādayaḥ nigraha sthāna antāḥ nirūpitāḥ tat evam nyāya pradhāna tvāt iyam eva nyāya vidyā sarva vidyā anugrāhaka tvāt niḥśreyasa hetoḥ tattva jñānasya ca nimitta tvāt uttamā ca iti 
[72,15]	tat khalu vai tattva jñānam kim ātma lābha anantaram eva niḥśreyasam saṃpādayati iti ucyate na kim tarhi tattva jñānāt duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyā jñānānām uttarottara apāye tad anantara apāyāt apavargaḥ bhavati iti vākya śeṣaḥ atra duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyā jñānānām anādiḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ saṃsāraḥ iti adhyāhāreṇa dvitīyam sūtram draṣṭavyam tattva jñāna anutpāda utpādābhyām hi saṃsāra apavargayoḥ sambhavaḥ iti etat anena sūtreṇa parīkṣyate yena tattva jñānasya apavarga avāpti sāmarthyam avadhārya tad utpattaye khalu ayam mumukṣuḥ ādareṇa pravarteta saṃsārasya anādi tva jñāpana artham mithyājñāna ādīnām viparyayeṇa atra abhidhānam kṛtam 
[72,23^1]	tatra ātma ādau prameye mithyājñānam aneka prakāram vartate satya ātma antaḥkaraṇa ādau na asti iti jñānam anātmani ātmā iti bhinneṣu abhinnam iti aśucau śuciḥ iti sva kṛteṣu duḥkheṣu anyaḥ karttā iti para kṛteṣu aham karttā iti jugupsite abhimatam iti anitye nityam iti hātavye pratipattavyam iti evaṃvidhāt mithyājñānāt anukūleṣu artheṣu rāgaḥ pratikūleṣu dveṣaḥ tābhyām prayuktasya vāc kāya manobhiḥ pravartamānasya dharma adharma saṃcayau bhavataḥ katham divya viṣayeṣu janma antara bhogyeṣu adivya viṣayeṣu vā rāgāt pravarttamānaḥ vihita yāga ādi anuṣṭhāna dvāreṇa dharma saṃcayam karoti dṛṣṭeṣu punar viṣayeṣu rāgāt pravartamānaḥ pratiṣiddha anuṣṭhāna vihita atikrama dvāreṇa adharma saṃcayam karoti 
[72,23^2]	dveṣāt api prāyeṇa vihita anuṣṭhāna sambhavāt adharma saṃcayam eva karoti tau etau darma adharma saṃcayau pravṛtti sādhana tvāt atra pravṛtti śabdena uktau tābhyām deva manuṣya tiryak sthāneṣu śarīra indriya sambandha lakṣaṇam janma bhavati tatas garbha vāsa ādi aneka prakāram duḥkham mithājñānam ca bhavati tatas punar doṣa ādi sambhavaḥ iti evam mithyājñāna ādīnām avicchedena kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ saṃsāraḥ iti ucyate yadā tu tattva jñānāt mithyājñānam apaiti tadā mithyā jñāna apāye doṣāḥ apayanti doṣa apāye pravṛttiḥ apaiti pravṛtti apāye janma apaiti janma apāye duḥkha apāyaḥ atyantam apavargaḥ bhavati 
[73,14^1]	atha kaḥ ayam mithyājñānasya apāyaḥ kim anutpattiḥ kim vā pradhvaṃsaḥ iti anutpattiḥ tāvat na tattva jñānāt bhavati na hi anutpattiḥ anādiḥ satī kenacid kartum śakyate atha pradhvaṃsaḥ sa tattva jñāna anutpāde api bhavati sarva jñānānām āśutara vināśi tvāt na ca nāśe api kāraṇa kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ kaścid upalabhyate tattva jñānāt nivṛtte mithyā jñāne mithyājñāna antaram na anyat utpadyate iti etat api na asti tathā hi raju ādau sarpa ādi jñāne tattva jñānāt nivṛtte api punar kāla antare tatra api raju ādau sarpa ādi jñānam prādurbhavat upalabhyate tathā ca kāraṇa pratibandhaḥ api niranumānaḥ iti mithyājñāna apāye doṣa apāyaḥ iti etat api ayuktam tattva jñānavatām api rāga dveṣāndhībhūta tva darśanāt na te tattva jñānavantaḥ ye rāga ādi abhibhūtāḥ iti ced tat kim idānīm nyāya śāstram api vyākurvatām na tattva jñāna utpattiḥ sambhāvyate 
[73,14^2]	sā tarhi kim sādhanā bhavet rāga ādi upaśamaḥ tu kiṃcid kālam tattva jñāna rahitānām api keṣāṃcid upalabhyate ātyantikaḥ tu na keṣāṃcid api asti mahā yoginām api hari hiraṇyagarbha prabhṛtīnām kvacid viṣaye kadācid rāga ādi abhibhava śravaṇāt atas ca na cintāmayam api tattva jñānam rāga ādi upaśama kāraṇam iti doṣa apāye pravṛtti apāyaḥ iti api ayuktam na hi ayam jīvan eva pāṣāṇa vat avasthātum śaknoti yadi ca dharma parihāra artham vihitam na karoti pratiṣiddhāt ca na nivarttate tadā avaśyam adharmeṇa bhavitavyam vihita atikrama pratiṣiddha ācaraṇayoḥ adharma hetu tvāt tad viparyāt ca dharmaḥ iti katham ubhaya parihāraḥ kartum śakyate tat evam pravṛtti apāya asambhavān na janmanaḥ api apāyaḥ tad asambhavān na ātyantika duḥkha apāya lakṣaṇaḥ apavargaḥ upapadyate iti 
[74,5^1]	atra pratividhīyate mithyājñānasya apāyaḥ tāvat anāgatasya anutpattiḥ utpannasya dhvaṃsaḥ ca iti yat ca uktam anādi tvāt anutpatteḥ katham tattva jñānāt bhāvaḥ iti tat na anabhyupagamāt na brūmaḥ prāk asatī tattva jñānāt anutpattiḥ mithyājñānasya bhavati iti kim tarhi tad anutpatteḥ nirvarttakaḥ yaḥ hetuḥ adharma ādiḥ tasya pratibandhaḥ tattva jñānāt bhavati na ca kāraṇa pratibandhaḥ niranumānaḥ tattva jñāna viṣaye sthāṇu ādau mithyājñāna utpatteḥ anupalambhāt na hi mithyā adhyavasāyaḥ kvacid tattva adhyavasāyam bādhitvā prādurbhavan upalabhyate tattva jñāna mithyā jñānayoḥ iva tad saṃskārayoḥ api bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ anumeyaḥ tathā hi sakṛt utpanna tattva jñāna janitaḥ api saṃskāraḥ tad samāna viṣayam mithyājñāna ja saṃskāra samūham api bādhitvā viśiṣṭa vyavahāra samarthām tattva jñāna ākāra anukāriṇīm eva smṛtim janayati tatas ca tattva jñāna abhyāsāt tad jaḥ saṃskāraḥ pratidinam upacīyate mithyājñāna jaḥ ca apacīyate tāvat yāvat sarvaḥ api mithyājñāna jaḥ saṃskāraḥ prakṣīyate 
[74,5^2]	tatas ca adharmaḥ api sahakāri kāraṇa abhāvāt tattva jñānena tad saṃskāreṇa vā pratibaddha tvāt ca mithyājñānam akurvan eva kutaścid nimittāt kadācid atyantam vinaśyati tad nāśe ca mithyājñānam kāraṇa abhāvāt na kadācid utpadyate tatas ca mithyājñāna anutpattiḥ kadācid api na nivarttate sā tathā pālitā satī tattva jñānena kṛtā iti upacaryate dhvaṃsapakṣe tu yat uktam na vināśe viśeṣaḥ kaścid iti tat na dṛṣṭa tvāt pradīpasya hi pratikṣaṇam vināśe api na tad kāryasya cākṣuṣa vyavahāra añjana sañcaya ādeḥ nirvṛttiḥ bhavati yadā punar udaka ādinā vināśaḥ kriyate tadā sarvasya api pradīpa kāryasya apravṛttiḥ pradīpa abhāva vyavahāraḥ ca bhavati kanda utpāṭa vat vā yathā kanda viṭapasya khanitra ādinā sa mūla utpāṭane kṛte punar tatra na sambhavaḥ tathā tattva jñānena mithyājñānasya sa saṃskārasya vināśe kṛte punar na sambhavaḥ sa mūla ucchinna tvāt tattva jñānasya tu mithyājñāna saṃskāra nivṛttau asti sāmarthyam pratipakṣa jñāna virodhi tvāt saṃskārasya iti 
[75,4^1]	ekatra mithyājñāna nivṛttau api anyatra utpattiḥ anivāryāḥ iti ced na vai sarvam mithyājñānam saṃsāra nimittam yena sarvasya api nivṛttiḥ anviṣyate kim tarhi ātma ādi viṣayam eva tasmin ca ātmā ādau prameye tattvataḥ niścite sthāṇu ādau iva na mithājñānam punar utpadyate iti nanu ca uktam tatra api kāla antare mithyājñānam prādurbhavat upalabdham iti satyam bhraṣṭa viśeṣa anusandhānasya prādurbhavati na punar ātma ādi viṣaye mumukṣoḥ viśeṣa anusandhānam nivarttate tasya hi saṃsāra bhayāt aharniśam bhāvanā sthirīkaraṇe pravṛttiḥ tathā ca bhagavān akṣapādaḥ tattva jñāna paripālana artham tad vidyaiḥ ca saha saṃvādaḥ ityādinā satata abhyāsena bhāvanā sthirīkartavyā iti upadiṣṭavān iti prameya viśeṣasya api ananta vyakti tvāt katham tatra api ekāntena ajñāna nivṛttiḥ iti ced na sāmānya upādānena sarvasya ātma ādeḥ tathā abhāva niścaye sati saṃsāra mūlasya ajñājasya nivṛtteḥ na hi prameya viśeṣe api sarvam mithyājñānam nivarttayitavyam kim tarhi yaḥ doṣa nimitta dvāreṇa saṃsāra mūlam 
[75,4^2]	yadi ātma ādi mithyājñānam saṃsāra nimittam pralaya ādi avasthāyām tarhi tasya asambhavāt apavargaḥ prāpnoti na tad saṃskāra avasthāne tad atyanta uccheda asambhavāt atas eva sarva śarīriṇām api mithyājñāna nimittaḥ saṃsāraḥ kasyacid tu īdṛśam hi mithyājñānam samaste vyaste vā ātma ādi prameye vidyate yad doṣa nimitta dvāreṇa saṃsāram pratanoti tat ca sāmānya upādānena sarvasmin prameye tattvataḥ niścite punar na bhavati yathā ekatra amṛta viṣayoḥ artha anartha hetu tvam viniścitya sarvatra api tad jātīya tva niścayam kurvāṇaḥ na viparyayeṇa pravarttate tathā indriya artha tva sāmānyena sarve viṣayāḥ viṣa vat niścitāḥ punar teṣu na rāga nimittam mithyājñānam bhavati duḥkha hetavaḥ tu sarve sva karma phala dāyaka tvena aśakya parihārāḥ iti niścitāḥ punar teṣu na dveṣa nimittam mithyājñānam bhavati tathā śarīra ādi vyatirikte para lokini sattva nitya tva ādi dharmake niścite punar api vyatireka ādi jñānam moha nimittam na bhavati evam sarvatra prameya viśeṣe mithyājñānasya anartha mūlasya tattva jñānāt apāyaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti 
[76,6^1]	yat punar etat tattva jñānavatām api rāga ādi doṣa sambhavāt na mithyājñāna apāye doṣa apāyaḥ iti tat api ayuktam dṛṣṭa tvāt dṛṣṭaḥ tāvat iha mithyājñāna apāye doṣa apāyaḥ tathā hi mitra ādau śatruḥ iti mithyā adhyavasāyāt utpannaḥ dveṣaḥ tattva jñānāt tad śatru pratyaya nivṛttau apaiti mātrā ādau ca priyatamā iti mithyā adhyavasāyāt utpannaḥ rāgaḥ tattva upalambhāt tad viparyaya nivṛttau nivarttate iti evam bahudhā api udāharaṇam draṣṭavyam iti mithyā adhya vasāya abhāve tu na kvacid rāga ādi sambhavaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ 
[76,6^2]	tathā ca uktam teṣām mohaḥ pāpīyān na amūḍhasya itara utpatteḥ iti nanu ca śāstra artha vidām api keṣāṃcid rāga ādi abhibhavaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ satyam kiṃtu teṣām api ādhyātmika doṣaḥ baliṣṭhaḥ tattva jñānam abhibhūya raṃjanīya kopanīyau mithyā adhyavasāyau janayati tābhyām rāga dveṣau prādurbhavataḥ iti dṛṣṭaḥ ca tattva jñānavataḥ api ādhyātmika doṣa sāmarthyāt mithyā adhyavasāyaḥ tat yathā arka udaya ādi liṅgena avadhārita diś vibhāgasya api kasyacid adharma sāmarthyāt diś mohaḥ bhavati niściti candra eka tvasya api timira ādi doṣa sāmarthyāt aneka candra adhyavasāyaḥ 
[76,6^3]	iti evam rasanā ādi doṣa janitaḥ api udāharttavyaḥ mithyā adhyavasāyaḥ iti yathā ca tatra indriya doṣāt ayam me mithyā adhyavasāyaḥ iti evam vidvān auṣadha viśeṣeṇa indriya ādi doṣa apagamam kurvan mithyā adhyavasāyam nivarttayati tadvat ayam api śāstra artha tattva jñaḥ mumukṣuḥ iṣṭa aniṣṭa viṣayeṣu adṛṣṭa sāmarthyāt imau raṃjanīya kopanīyau mithyā adhyavasāyau me prādurbhavataḥ iti evam pratipadya prasaṃkhyāna paraḥ bhūtvā yoga aṅga anuṣṭhāna abhiyogena adṛṣṭa saṃskāra kṣapaṇa dvāreṇa tau api raṃjanīya kopanīyau mithyā saṃkalpau nivarttayati tathā ca sūtram tad artham yama niyamābhyām ātma saṃskāraḥ yogāt ca adhyātma vidhi upāyaiḥ iti ye punar pramāda ālasya upahatāḥ taiḥ anyaḥ api puruṣa arthaḥ sādhayitum na śakyate kim uta apavargaḥ iti tat evam tattva jñānāt apramādinaḥ prasaṃkhyāna abhiyuktasya mithyājñāna ucchede doṣāḥ api ucchidyante iti tattva jñāna rahitānām tu bāla unmatta ādi vat doṣa bījena moha anvita tvāt kutas rāga ādi ucchedaḥ yathā ca uktam ajñāneṣu yat vairāgyam para adhīneṣu yat sukham abhra chāyā tṛṇa agniḥ ca kṣipram eva vinaśyati iti 
[77,9]	yat api uktam yoginām api rāga ādi abhibhava śravaṇāt na cintāmayam api tattva jñānam rāga adhi upaśama nimittam iti tat api ayuktam cintā āmaya tattva jñāna svarūpa anavabodhāt yasmāt ātma ādau prameye heya ādi rūpeṇa caturdhā bhāvanā sthirībhūtā cintā mayam tattva jñānam ucyate na tu yogi jñāna mātram na hi sarve api yoginaḥ mumukṣavaḥ tattva jñānavantaḥ vā bahūnām api jñāna siddhaye tāvat mātrā upadeśena api yoga abhyāsa pravṛtteḥ tathā jaigīṣavyādi śāstreṣu bahvyaḥ dhāraṇāḥ bhoga artham vyākhyātāḥ sanatkumāraḥ ca yoga aiśvarya atiśayena hari hiraṇyagarbha ādi abhyadhikaḥ api parameśvaram prati vipratipadyamānaḥ bhagavatā akṣapādena parājitaḥ iti śrūyate tasmāt na yogi tvāt eva tattva jñāna vat tvam rāga ādi hīna tvam vā siddhyati iti tasmāt ukta svarūpāt eva tattva jñānāt moha ucchittau doṣa ucchedaḥ iti sthitam 
[77,19^1]	yat punar idam uktam doṣa apāye api pravṛtti apāyaḥ na yujyate iti tat api ayuktam pravṛtti apāya svarūpa anavabodhāt na hi atra kriyā mātra nivṛttiḥ pravṛtti apāyaḥ abhipretaḥ kim tarhi dharma adharmayoḥ anāgatayoḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt anutpattiḥ saṃcitayoḥ ca kārya avasāyāt jñāna agni dāhāt ca prakṣayaḥ iti nanu ca anāgatayoḥ sādhana parihāra aśakya tvāt anutpattiḥ ayuktā iti uktam na doṣa parihārasya ukta tvāt doṣaḥ hi pradhānam sādhanam tad abhāve ca dharma adharmayoḥ itara kāraṇa sadbhāve api anutpattiḥ śāli bīja abhāve tad aṅkurān utpatti vat tathā ca sūtram na pravṛttiḥ pratisaṃdhānāya hīṇa kleśasya iti 
[77,19^2]	pātañjalam api sūtram kleśa mūlaḥ karma āśayaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa janma vedanīyaḥ sati mūle tad vipākaḥ jāti āyuḥ bhogāḥ iti tathā anumānam api atra ucyate avivakṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ pravartamānaḥ api na dharma adharmābhyām sambadhyate doṣa rahita tvāt maheśvara vada iti prakṣīṇa doṣasya eva ca tattva jñānam ati nirmalam dharma adharma mala apagame api samartham na aprakṣīṇa doṣasya yoginaḥ api kaluṣita udaka vat yathā vā samiddhaḥ api agniḥ kārpāsa ādi dāhyam oṣadhī viśeṣeṇa sambaddham na dahati evam jñāna agniḥ api doṣa sambaddham karma dagdhum na śaknoti iti karma dāhya tvam ca sarva yoga śāstreṣu vedānteṣu ca prasiddham tena apramāṇakam api na bhavati iti 
[78,11_78,14]	sva kārya avasāyāt eva karmaṇām nāśaḥ iti eke kila na abhuktam kṣīyate karma kalpa koṭi śataiḥ api iti jñātvā prāpta aiśvaryaḥ khalu yogī sarva sthāneṣu karma anurūpāṇi sa indriyāṇi śarīrāṇi nirmāya yugapad iṣṭa aniṣṭa bhogān upabhuṅktaḥ iti evam tarhi brahmahatyā aśvamedha ādi prāpakābhyām karmabhyām tat kāryam kṛtvā nivartitavyam tatas punar karma saṃcayaḥ iti katham atyanta ucchedaḥ prakṣīṇa kleśa tvam api na prāpnoti yatas rāga ādi hetunā karmaṇā rāga ādikam kṛtvā nivartitavyam iti prāyaścitta ādi virodhaḥ ca prāpnoti atha rāga ādi arthaḥ api adharmaḥ duḥkha mātram eva kṛtvā nivarttate dharmaḥ tu sukha mātram eva kṛtvā iti tantu ādīnām iva saha kāri vaiguṇyāt kārya vaiguṇya upapatteḥ karma vipāka kāla aniyamāt ca iti bhavati eṣā api kalpanā na kaścid doṣaḥ paramātma darśanam ekam aṅgīkṛtya śāstra śravaṇa ādau yoga aṅga anuṣṭhāne ca pravṛttasya santoṣa jakheda je sukha duḥkhe kṛtvā niḥśeṣau eva dharma adharmau praṇaśyate iti āhuḥ ācāryāḥ yoginaḥ yugapad bhoga muktiḥ api āgama balena eva abhyupagamyate kaḥ tarhi jñāna agni karma dāhena aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ sarva āgama siddha tve api yena asau na abhyupagamyate na abhuktam kṣīyate karma ityādiḥ āgamaḥ api yadi ayam tathā api akṛta prāyaścittā tattva vid viṣaya tvena asya arthavat tvam draṣṭavyam iti 
[79,11]	karma dāhaka tve jñānasya yoga ja dharma upacaya virodhaḥ iti ced na akṣīṇa doṣa avasthāyām tad upapatteḥ saṃskāra vat vā pratipakṣasya eva nivṛttiḥ yathā eka viṣaya jñāna abhyāsāt tad saṃkārasya upacayaḥ tad pratipakṣa saṃskārasya prakṣayaḥ ca bhavati evam saṃsāra jihāsoḥ paramātma jñāna abhyāsāt saṃsāra nimittayoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ samādhi pratipakṣa tvāt prakṣayaḥ bhavati samādhi nimittasya dharmasya ca upacayaḥ tāvat yāvat paramātma darśanam bhavati saḥ api dharmaḥ sva kārya avasāyāt nivarttate prahīṇa doṣa tvāt ca na asya anāgatayoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ kadācid api utpattiḥ tatas kāraṇasya atyanta ucchedāt janmanaḥ api atyanta ucchedaḥ tat atyanta ucchedāt ca duḥkhānām api atyanta ucchittiḥ iti upapannaḥ apavargaḥ iti 
[79,20]	atha idānīm tattva jñāna utpatti artham pramāṇa ādi saṃkhyā viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni jijñāsamānam prati pramāṇa saṃkhyā tāvat ucyate trividham iti trividha grahaṇam avadhāraṇa artham sarvāsām pramāṇa vyaktīnām pratyakṣa ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ tribhiḥ eva saṅgṛhīta tvāt tathā ca upamāna ādīnām atra eva antarbhāvam pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ 
[80,5]	pratyakṣam eva ekam pramāṇam iti eke tat ayuktam pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇa itara vibhāga asiddheḥ sukha duḥkha ādi sādhana apratipatteḥ ca tad mūle pravṛtti nivṛttī api na syātām na apratyakṣam pramāṇam asti iti abhyupagamya para pratyāyana artham śāstram praṇayan vākyam ca uccārayan svām eva pravṛttim sva vācā viḍambayati iti aho bhadram pāṇḍityam ātmanaḥ prakaṭivān iti 
[80,11]	anumānam eva ekam pramāṇam iti etat api na yuktam pratyakṣa abhāve anumāna utthāna asambhavāt su dūram api gatvā dharmi liṅga dṛṣṭāntānām anumāna pravṛttim icchata avaśyam pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam abhyupagantavyam etena āgamaḥ eva ekam pramāṇam iti etat api nirastam tatra api pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vā pada vākya ādi a prasiddhau āgama artha pratipatteḥ asambhavāt iti 
[80,17]	pratyakṣa parokṣa bhedena dvividham eva iti ced na tad vyavahāra aprasiddheḥ na hi parokṣeṇa aham jānāmi iti vyavahāraḥ kvacid prasiddhaḥ yathā pratyakṣeṇa aham jānāmi anumānena vā āgamena vā iti niṣprayojana tvāt ca yathā pṛthak pṛthak prāmāṇya pratipatti upāya pratipādanam pratyakṣa ādīnām bhedena abhidhāna prayojanam na evam parokṣa tvena anumāna āgamayoḥ saṅgrahe prayojanam kiṃcid asti yadi punar ayam sva pakṣa rāgeṇa dvaividhya mātra siddhi artham parokṣam sāmānyam abhidhāya tad viśeṣau anumāna āgamau bhinna lakṣaṇau brūyāt bravītu kaḥ asya nivārayitā na tu evam api asmat uktam traividhyam nivarttate trayāṇām parasparataḥ asaṃkīrṇa lakṣaṇa pratipādanāt iti atha pratyakṣam anumānam iti yaḥ arthaḥ saḥ eva arthaḥ pratyakṣam parokṣam iti tathā api na dvividham eva tatas artha antarasya āgamasya api pramāṇa tvāt tasya ca anumāne antarbhāvam niṣetsyāmaḥ tatas na pratyakṣa anumāna bhedena api dvividham tasmāt trividham eva iti 
[81,7]	vibhāga sūtra virodhāt na hi trividham iti ced syāt matiḥ eṣā pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni iti vibhāga sūtram etat vibhāgasya ca nyūna adhika saṃkhyā vyavacchedaḥ phalam anyathā hi lakṣaṇa catuṣṭaya abhidhānāt eva catuṣṭva siddhiḥ iti anarthakaḥ vibhāgaḥ syāt na ca ayam uddeśaḥ parīkṣyamāṇa tvāt na hi pramāṇa ādīnām uddeśaḥ parīkṣitaḥ vibhāgaḥ tu na catuṣṭvam ityādinā parīkṣitaḥ tasmāt catvāri eva pramāṇāni iti 
[81,13]	tat etat sarvam ghrāṇa ādi sūtreṇa vyabhicāri tvāt ayuktam ghrāṇa ādi sūtre hi indriyāṇām vibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ tvac avyatirekāt ityādinā parīkṣitaḥ ca na ca pañca eva iti avadhāraṇam manasaḥ api indriya tva abhyupagamāt parīkṣyamāna tva aviśeṣe api pratyakṣa ādi sūtram eva vibhāga artham ghrāṇa ādi sūtram tu anuvāda artham iti atra kośa pānam eva karttavyam na hi viśeṣa hetuḥ kaścid asti iti tasmāt yathā indriyāṇām nyūna tvam eva āśaṃkya sūtra kṛtā nirākṛtam iti adhika tva abhyupagamaḥ na virudhyate tathā pramāṇānām adhika tvam eva āśaṃkya nirākṛtam iti atas traividhyā abhyupagamaḥ na virudhyate nyāya labhya tvasya ubhayatra api samāna tvāt nyāya labhya tvam ca pramāṇa traividhyasya sūtra avirodhena uttaratra upapādayiṣyāmaḥ iti 
[81,23]	pramāṇam iti eka vacanam kim artham trayāṇām api eka viṣaya tva jñāpana artham yathā parvata ādi pradeśeṣu āpta vacanāt agnim pratipadya pravarttamānaḥ tam eva dhūmam dṛṣṭvā pratipadyate tatas ati pratyāsannaḥ tam eva agnim pratyakṣeṇa pratipadyate tathā āpta upadeśāt ātma svarūpam pratipadya icchā ādi liṅgena api pratipadyate punar samādhi balena pratyakṣeṇa iti saṃplava siddhiḥ 
[82,5^1]	pratyakṣam anumānam āgamaḥ iti vyasta abhidhānam kvacid ekaikaśas api niyata viṣaya tva jñāpana artham yathā agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti ādi āgama arthe asmad ādīnām na pratyakṣam na anumānam iti stanayitnu śabde śrūyamāṇe śabda hetau aśruta āgamasya asmad ādeḥ anumānam eva ekam pravarttate iti pāṇau pratyakṣataḥ upalabhyamāne anumāna āgamayoḥ ākāṅkṣa abhāvāt apravṛttiḥ pratyakṣa upalabdhaḥ eva arthe pramāṇa antara ākāṅkṣā nivarttate na āgama upalabdhe anumāna upalabdhe vā iti apramāṇam iti ced na pratyakṣasya eva nirdeśya anirdeśya aneka viśeṣa viśiṣṭa artha pradarśaka tvena ākāṅkṣā nivṛtti hetutvāt na hi yāvat viśeṣa viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pradarśyate tāvat viśeṣa viśiṣṭaḥ anumāna ādinā api iti 
[82,5^2]	evam tarhi atulya viṣaya tvāt anumāna ādinā pratyakṣasya iti anupapannaḥ saṃplavaḥ iti na etat asti kiyat dharma viśiṣṭa dharmī apekṣayā saṃplava upapatteḥ yaḥ eva hi deśa ādi viśiṣṭaḥ vahniḥ āgamena pratipāditaḥ saḥ eva anumānena pratīyate saḥ eva ca pratyakṣeṇa iti yadi api pratyakṣa upalabdhe api arthe kvacid atīndriya viśeṣa viśiṣṭa tvena upalabdhim icchataḥ anicchataḥ vā pramāṇa antara pravṛttiḥ bhavati tathā api sarvatra na bhavati tatas ca yatra pramāṇa antaram na pravarttate tatra vyavasthā sidhyati anyatra tu saṃplavaḥ iti ekena upalabdhe arthe dvitīyasya vyarthā pravṛttiḥ iti ced na sukha duḥkha viśeṣa janaka tvāt saṃskāra atiśaya janaka tvāt ca na ca sarvatra puruṣa artha āyattā pramāṇānām pravṛttiḥ niṣprayojane api tṛṇa ādau aniṣṭe api ca bandhana ādau pramāṇa pravṛtti upalambhāt iti 
[83,12]	nanu ca sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam eva pratyakṣam sāmānya viṣayam eva anumānam iti anupapannaḥ saṃplavaḥ iti satyam asti ayam bauddhānām manorathaḥ sa tu alīka arthaḥ eva iti upariṣṭāt nivedayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt asti saṃplavaḥ kvacid vyavasthā ca iti sūtra kṛtā api pramāṇānām samastena eka padena abhidhānāt abhinna viṣaya tvam sūcitam bahuvacanena abhidhānāt vyavasthita viṣaya tvam sūcitam iti tad artha pratipādana prakāra pradarśana artham iha anyathā saṃplava vyavasthe sūcitaḥ iti iti śabdaḥ ukta prakāra avadhāraṇa arthaḥ anena eva prakāreṇa trividham iti avadhāryate anyathā hi samyak anubhava sādhana tvā viśeṣeṇa ekavidham eva pratyakṣa ādīnām avāntara bheda vivakṣayā tu saptavidham abhyadhikavidham ca iti tasmāt pratyakṣa ādi bhedena eva trividham iti 
[84,3]	tatra samyak iti samyak pada vat aparokṣa padasya api anubhava padena karmadhārayaḥ pratyakṣam iti kaḥ samāsaḥ yadi akṣam akṣam prati varttate iti avyayībhāvaḥ kriyate tadā pañcamī tṛtīya asaptamī vyatiriktānām vibhaktīnām aam abhāvaḥ eva syāt tatas ca pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam pratyakṣaḥ ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣā nārī ityādi vyavahāraḥ na syāt tena pratigatam akṣam pratyakṣam iti kugati prādayaḥ iti anena tatpuruṣaḥ samāse iṣyate evam api para vat liṅgam dvandva tatpuruṣayoḥ iti anena para vat liṅga tva prāpteḥ pratyakṣaḥ ghaṭaḥ ityādeḥ anupapattiḥ iti na etat asti gati samāse hi para vat liṅga tva pratiṣedhāt abhidheya liṅga tvam iṣṭam tathā ca prāpta āpanna alaṃgati samāseṣu para vat liṅga pratiṣedhaḥ iti vacanam 
[84,13]	katham punar akṣam pratigatam tat janya tvena tad sahakāri tvena tad viṣaya tvena ca iti phalam tāvat akṣajanya tvena akṣam prati gatam phala sādhanam ca tad sahakāri tvena tad arthaḥ tu tad viṣaya tvena iti yadi akṣa sahakāri tvena pratyakṣam sādhanam iṣṭam nanu akṣasya pramāṇa tvam na prāpnoti na hi tat eva tasya sahakārī iti yuktam pramātuḥ ca akṣa sahakāri tvena pratyakṣa tvam prāptam tathā saṃśaya ādeḥ sukha ādeḥ ca akṣajanya tvena pratyakṣa phala tvam prasajyate iti na vyutpatti dvāreṇa śabda artha pratipādana mātra tvāt na tu vyutpattiḥ eva śabdānām niyata artha pravṛtti nimitta tvena abhyupagamyate tathā hi gopaṅkaja ādi śabdānām na vyutpatti vaśāt niyata artha tvam kintu go tva ādi lakṣaṇa vaśāt pratyakṣa pramāṇa phalayoḥ api asti lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ samyak aparokṣa anubhavaḥ pratyakṣa phalam tasya sādhanam pratyakṣam pramāṇam iti 
[85,9]	nanu anumāna āgamayoḥ api pratyakṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ tad phalasya api sukha ādi vat aparokṣa tvāt iti na aparokṣa śabdasya jāti nimitta tvena vivakṣita tvāt sukha ādeḥ ca aparokṣa anubhava viṣaya tvena aparokṣa tvam na tu viṣayeṣu aparokṣa tvam jātiḥ asti sarva puruṣa aparokṣa tva prasaṅgāt jāteḥ sādhāraṇa tvāt na hi nīla tva jāti yuktam kasyacid eva tat nīlam na sarvasya iti yadā tu aparokṣa tva jāti yuktam jñānam eva abhyupagamyate tadā arthasya na sarva puruṣa aparokṣa tvam prasajyate yadīyasya eva aparokṣa jñānasya viṣayaḥ arthaḥ tasya eva aparokṣaḥ iti yathā na sarveṣām sandigdhaḥ arthaḥ kintu yasya eva tasmin arthe sandigdham jñānam bhavati iti tat na sandigdha tva vat aparokṣa tva jātiḥ artheṣu asti iti evam ca anumāna ādi jñānasya parokṣasya api sandigdha jñāna viṣaya tvena sandigdha tva vat aparokṣa jñāna viṣaya tvena aparokṣa tvam na tu aparokṣa tva jāti yogena iti 
[85,20^1]	yaḥ api parokṣa tva aparokṣa tva jāti viśeṣau eva jñāneṣu na abhyupagacchati iti tena api tad vyavahāra nimittam vācyam na ca indriya artha sannikarṣa ja tvam aparokṣa tva vyavahāra nimittam tasya aparokṣa tva asiddhau asiddheḥ asiddhasya ca viśeṣaka tvam ayuktam na ca artha anubhava mātram tasya liṅgam viśiṣṭaḥ ca anubhavaḥ aparokṣa tva jāti abhāvāt na sambhavati sākṣātkāri tvam ca aprokṣa tvasya eva paryāyaḥ iti pratyakṣa laiṅgikā ātma anubhavayoḥ api ātmanaḥ sannikarṣa ja tvā aparokṣa tva ādi jāti abhāve viśeṣa anupapattiḥ nirdeśya anirdeśya viśeṣa viśiṣṭa artha avabhāsi tvam jñāna dharmaḥ aparokṣa tvam na jātiḥ iti ced nanu tam api avabhāsi tva śabda vācyam jñānasya jāti viśeṣāt anyam dharmam na pāśyāmaḥ kim ca nirviśiṣṭa viśeṣaṇa avabhāsi jñānasya aparokṣa tvam na syāt 
[85,20^2]	kāraṇa janya tvena api viśiṣṭa vyavahāra viṣaya tva abhyupagame ghaṭa vṛkṣa ādi vyavahāraḥ api tatas eva syāt na ghaṭa tva vṛkṣa tva ādi jātitaḥ tatas ca pūrṇa manorathaḥ tathāgatāḥ syuḥ iti tasmāt satsu api kāraṇa viśeṣeṣu ghaṭa vṛkṣa ādīnām iva jñāna vyaktīnām anugata vyāvṛtta vyavahāra hetavaḥ avāntara jāti viśeṣāḥ abhyupagantavyāḥ yena asat jāti vādinām api avakāśaḥ na bhavet iti tat evam anubhava tva aparokṣa tva ādi jāti viśeṣaiḥ smaraṇa anumāna ādi jñānebhyaḥ pratyakṣa phalam vyavacchinnam pratyakṣam atīndriyam samāna asamāna jātīyebhyaḥ vyavacchinatti iti anena abhiprāyeṇa sūtra kāraḥ api indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādi viśeṣaṇam phalasya eva uktavān iti 
[86,15]	atra indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti anena anubhava tva aparokṣa tva viśiṣṭam iti abhipretam tad viśiṣṭa tvasya pratyakṣa siddha tvena lakṣaṇa bhāva upapatteḥ phala viśeṣa asiddhau hi indriya artha sannikarṣasya eva asiddha tvāt tad utpādya tvam katham aniścitam lakṣaṇam syāt na ca vyavahita artha anupalabdhiḥ indriya artha sannikarṣā anumāpīkā sā hi tad abhāva anumāpikā yadi syāt atha avyavahitasya eva yā arthasya upalabdhiḥ sā tad sadbhāva anumāpikā iti 
[86,21]	kim idam vyavadhānam dūra deśa avasthānam tadā arka ādeḥ api vyavadhānam syāt atha antarāle ghana ādi a vayavi dravya sadbhāvaḥ tadā kāca abhra sphaṭika ādi antaritasya api vyavadhānam syāt atha yasmin eva antara sthe yasya anupalabdhiḥ tat eva tasya vyavadhānam evam tarhi kuḍyantaritasya agni ādeḥ anumāna āgamābhyām upalabdheḥ avyavahita tvam syāt 
[87,1]	atha akṣaja upalabdhiḥ avyavahita tve liṅgam nanu kim manaḥ akṣam na bhavati kim ca anumāna ādi jñānam manaḥ janitam na bhavati iti kaḥ evam āha kintu artha āsannikṛṣṭena manasā janitam iti anakṣa jam tat ucyate nanu evam api cakrakam duruttaram syāt akṣa artha sannikarṣa ja tvena akṣaja tvam akṣa ja tvena ca avyavahita artha upalabdhi tvam tena ca akṣa artha sannikarṣa ja tvam iti ekasya ādau asiddhau sarva asiddhiḥ iti 
[87,6]	karaṇasya ca sataḥ manasaḥ katham anumeya ādi karmaṇi asambaddhe kriyā janaka tvam janaka tve ca abhyupagama virodhaḥ syāt atha anumeya ādinā manasaḥ saṃyoga ādi lakṣaṇaḥ sannikarṣaḥ na asti iti asannikṛṣṭam manaḥ ucyate na ātma ādi anumeya ādinā saṃyoga ādi upapatteḥ atha ātma ādeḥ indriya artha tvam eva na asti tena tad sambandhaḥ na indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ iti evam tarhi tad viṣayam yogi pratyakṣam indriya artha sannikarṣa jam na syāt atha yoga apekṣayā ātma ādeḥ indriya artha tvam iṣyate kim atra kāraṇam yogi indriyam tatra viśiṣṭam jñānam janayati iti ced kaḥ aparokṣa tva sāmānyāt anyaḥ viśeṣaḥ sākṣātkāri tvam api tasya eva paryāyaḥ sambandha smaraṇa ajanya tvam viśeṣaḥ iti ced na tasya api aniścayāt 
[87,15]	tad anupalambhe tad utpādāt eva tat niścayaḥ iti ced na āśu bhāvi tve api sambandha smaraṇa anupalambhasya sambhavāt praṇidhānena avinābhāva ādi sambandha smaraṇe sati anantaram eva kvacid artha pratyakṣaḥ api bhavati na etāvatā tasya anindriya artha tvam tasmāt yatra eva arthe yasya puṃsaḥ parokṣa tva viśiṣṭa jñānam adṛṣṭa ādi vaśāt bhavati saḥ eva tasya indriya arthaḥ iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ 
[87,21]	yadi api smaraṇa vyavaccheda artham artha ja tvam viśeṣaṇam upādīyate kaiścid tat api na yuktam anartha jasya api atīta ādi artha jñānasya pramāṇa phala tvena iṣṭa tvāt anyathā hi atīta ādi arthasya janakatvā abhāvāt na vijñāna viṣaya tvam iti aprameya tvam eva prāptam janaka tvena āvarttamāna tā eva syāt vidyamānasya eva janakatva sambhavāt tasmāt na janakatvena eva arthasya prameya tvam yogi pratyakṣa viṣaya tvāt na pratyakṣe api ayam niyamaḥ iti 
[88,4]	nanu ca atīta anāgata arthau nāśān utpatti lakṣaṇa avabhāvau eva tayoḥ ca iha śāstre janaka tvam iṣṭam eva atas katham tat jñānasya anartha ja tvam iti na etat asti yat niṣpatti artham hi kāraṇa upādānam kriyate tad anāgatam ucyate na ca ittham prāc abhāvaḥ tasya anādi tvāt tathā yat eva nirvṛttam tat eva atītam ucyate na pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ tasya anivṛtta tvāt 
[88,8]	kim svabhāvaḥ tarhi saḥ atīta ādi arthaḥ iti na bhāvaḥ sattva ādi rahita tvāt na api abhāvaḥ prāc abhāva ādi vilakṣaṇa tvāt atas tṛtīyam prameyam iti eke tat ca na evam ghaṭāghaṭa vat sarva vyāpteḥ yaḥ hi ghaṭaḥ na bhavati sa sarvaḥ api aghaṭaḥ eva tad niṣedhe ca ghaṭaḥ eva syāt na gati antaram evam yaḥ kaścid bhāvaḥ na bhavati sa sarvaḥ api abhāvaḥ eva pratiṣedha dvaye hi bhāvaḥ eva syāt na ca adharma vat abhāvasya jāti viśeṣaḥ lakṣaṇam yena tṛtīyam prameyam syāt idam eva hi abhāvasya lakṣaṇam yat bhāvāt artha antara tvam vidhi pratiṣedha vyatirikta vyavahāra abhāvāt ca na tṛtīyam premeyam asti iti 
[88,16]	atīta ādi arthasya tarhi kim svarūpam bhāva svarūpam eva sattva ādi rahita tvāt ayuktam iti ced na asiddha tvāt tathā hi ghaṭa ādiḥ arthaḥ eva atītaḥ anāgataḥ vartamānaḥ ca ucyate katham tasya sattva ādi rahita tvam sarvadā sattva ādi upeta tvāt nitya tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na āśraya asiddha tvāt ghaṭa ādi dharmī eva na sarvadā asti kutas tasya sattva ādi dharmaḥ iti na hi vinaṣṭaḥ anutpannaḥ vā ghaṭaḥ asti iti śakyam vaktum nanu atīta anāgata rūpeṇa vidyate atha kim ayam ghaṭaḥ naṭa vat aneka rūpa tām dhatte satyam kutas etat tathā upalambhāt 
[89,7]	nanu evam aneka rūpa tām dadhānaḥ katham na asti iti ucyate sattva ādi dharma abhāvāt iti ced saḥ api sattva ādi dharmaḥ prāk paścāt ghaṭa vat aneka rūpa tām dadhānaḥ katham na asti tad ghaṭa sambandha abhāvāt iti ced na atra api ca udyasya samāna tvāt etena varttamāna tva abhāvaḥ abhivyakti abhāvaḥ ca pratyuktaḥ tasmāt asan eva ghaṭaḥ anutpannaḥ naṣṭaḥ ca na kena api rūpeṇa vidyate iti 
[89,13]	avidyamānasya ghaṭasya prāc abhāva ādi viśeṣaka tvam katham iti ced śaśa viṣāṇa vat kalpanā samāropitasya iti eke yathā anyatra viṣāṇam uplabhya tat jātīyam śaśa mastaka utpanna tvena kalpayitvā tad abhāvam upalabhamānaḥ śaśa viṣānasya abhāvaḥ iti pratipadyate na punar śaśa viṣāṇam kvacid asti yadi punar tad viśeṣaṇa tvena gṛhītam syāt tadā sāmānya ādi vat tad abhāvaḥ na syāt atas eva śaśa viṣāṇa vyavahāraḥ mithyā na tad abhāva vyavahāraḥ api candra ādau dvi tva ādi tad abhāva vyavahāra vat abhāva vyavahārasya mithyātve bhāva siddhiḥ eva syāt evam ghaṭa ādeḥ api prāc paścāt abhāva vyavahāraḥ na mithyā bhāva vyavahāraḥ tu mithyā eva bhāve satyabhāva vyavahāra vat tasmāt anyatra dṛṣṭasya paṭa ādeḥ iha kalpanā samāropitasya abhāva viśeṣaka tvam na tu paramārthataḥ iti 
[89,24]	na etat asti śaśa viṣāṇam hi na kvacid deśe kāle vā kena api upalabdham atas tasya atyanta asataḥ kalpanā samāropita tvam yuktam na ghaṭa ādeḥ tasya kadācid upalambhāt tasya eva ca viśeṣaka tva pratīteḥ tathā hi yaḥ asau ghaṭaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasya idānīm nivṛtta tvāt na asti iti pratītiḥ abhāva kāle tu tasya smaryamāṇa tvam syāt na kalpita tvam smṛtiḥ eva kalpanā iti ced kaḥ tvām saṃjñām kurvantam nivārayati loke tu ayathārtha samāropasya kalpanā tvam prasiddham yathā sva ātmani guruḍa ādi kalpanā citra ādau rāja aśva ādi kalpanā iti na ca evam smaraṇena anyathārthaḥ kalpyate tasya yathā dṛṣṭa artha anusandhāna rūpa tvāt iti smṛtiḥ eva tarhi atīta ādi arthasya anubhavaḥ asti iti ced na anubhava abhāve smṛteḥ abhāvāt yaḥ hi yam artham na prāk anubhūtavān tasya katham ādau tatra smṛtiḥ pāṇḍava ādiṣu iva na ca anya artha anubhave anya artha smaraṇam ati prasaṅgāt tasmāt smṛti nimittasya arthasya ādau grahaṇam abhyupagantavyam iti 
[90,10^1]	tad rūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇasya katham atīta anāgata tvam iti ced na kāla vyavadhānāt tad upapatteḥ yathā saḥ eva tathābhūtaḥ sthāṇuḥ deśa vyavadhāna avyavadhānābhyām dūra sthaḥ sannikṛṣṭaḥ ca iti ucyate tathā saḥ eva arthaḥ prāc abhāva kālena vyavadhānāt anāgataḥ pradhvaṃsa abhāva kālena vyavadhānāt atītaḥ tad ubhaya avyavadhānāt varttamānaḥ iti deśa vyavahitasya candra ādeḥ iva kāla vyavahitasya api artha kriyā kāritva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na sambandha abhāvāt candra ādeḥ khalu deśa vyavahitasya api puruṣa akṣa kumuda ādibhiḥ saha sambandhaḥ asti iti yuktam artha kriyā kāritvam 
[90,10^2]	kāla vyavahitasya tu sva rūpeṇa eva avidyamāna tvāt na sambandhaḥ kenacid asti iti atas na artha kriyā kāri tvam vidyamāna tve vā kāla vyavahita tvam virudhyeta na hi prāc abhūtam vinaṣṭam ca vidyamānam iti yuktam avidyamāna tvena ajanaka tve sambandha abhāve ca atasya idam jñānam a iti ayam niyamaḥ kutas iti ced adṛṣṭa ādi sāmagryāḥ tad pratibhāsi tvena niyamitasya eva jñānasya utpatteḥ tad darśanāt ajanakasya api tad jñānena saha viṣaya viṣayi bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ iti vyavahriyate yat ca na jñāne pratibhāti tasya janakasya api na viṣaya tvam yathā indriya ādeḥ 
[91,2_91,6]	nanu ca atīta ādi artham jānāmi iti ajanakasya katham karma kāraka tvam na vaktuḥ vivakṣā mātreṇa akārakeṣu api kāraka vyavahāra darśanāt yathā ghaṭam janayāmi ghaṭaḥ jāyate iti yathā ca atra kāraka tvam eva avidyamānam āropyate na jani kriyā tathā atīta ādi arthasya jñāna kriyā na avāstavi iti nanu evam tarhi kha puṣpabuddhiḥ api na avāstavī iti kha puṣpa siddhiḥ api syāt na etat evam yadi hi khapuṣpam na asti iti eṣā buddhiḥ khapuṣpabuddhiḥ sā tad pratiṣedhikā katham tad vidhāyikā syāt atha khapuṣpam asti iti buddhiḥ sā api bādhyamāna tvena bhrānta tvāt na tad sādhikā atha khapuṣpa śabdāt eva utpannā sā api tad sattva adhyavasāyinī vā sandigdhā vā tad pratiṣedhikā vā iti na anyathā artha buddhiḥ upalabhyate atīta ādi artha buddhiḥ eṣā evam iti ced na tasyāḥ tad artha adhyavasāyi tve api abādhyamāna abhrānta tvāt na hi atītaḥ arthaḥ na āsīt anāgataḥ ca bhaviṣyati iti yadi punar idānīm api asti saḥ arthaḥ iti evam pratītiḥ syāt tadā tasyāḥ iṣṭam eva bhrānta tvam tad rūpa vyabhicārāt 
[91,17]	kiṃca atīta artha jñānasya api asamyaktve tri kāla viṣayam anumānam virudhyeta syāt etat kāraṇa śakti anumānam eva anāgata anumānam nadyā upari vṛṣṭimat deśa sambandhitva anumānam atīta anumānam iti atas na virodhaḥ iti tarhi kāraṇasya kārya utpādana sāmarthyam nadyā upari vṛṣṭimat deśa sambandhi tvam ca yadi idānīm vidyamānam eva anumīyate tadā vartamāna viṣayam eva anumānam syāt katham atīta ādi artha anumānam atha avidyamānam anumīyate tadā katham na ajanakasya prameya tvam kāraṇa śakti ādau anumite sāmarthyāt eva anāgata ādi artha pratītiḥ iti ced sāmarthyāt api prati iti abhyupagame katham na ajanakasya prameya tvam mithyā eva sā pratītiḥ iti ced su samarthitam tri kāla viṣayam anumānam deśa ādi viśeṣāṇām janaka tvāt tad viśeṣaṇa tve anāgata arthānām viṣaya bhāvaḥ iti ced na etat asti deśa ādi viśeṣāṇām eva hi janakatvena viṣaya bhāvaḥ astu na tad viśeṣāṇām tatas anya tvāt anyasya janaka tvena anyasya viṣaya bhāve hi atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt 
[92,9^1]	atha na atīta an āgata arthānām viṣaya bhāvaḥ iṣyate tat jñānasya nirviṣaya tvena apramāṇa phala tva prasaṅgāt api tu tad upasarjanāḥ deśa ādi viśeṣāḥ eva yogi pratyakṣa jñānasya asamat ādi anumāna jñānasya vā ālambanībhavanti iti na etat api upapannam yadi hi atīta artha jñānam nirviṣaya tvena apramāṇa phalam iṣṭam evam tarhi tad viśiṣṭa deśa ādi jñānam api asat viśeṣaṇā avacchedena utpannam bhrāntam eva prasaktam advau candrau a asukhī stambha a ityādi jñāna vat abhrānta tve ca avaśyam viśeṣaṇa tvena atīta ādi arthasya grahaṇam abhyupagantavyam agṛhītasya viśeṣaṇa tva ayogāt tad abhyupagame vājanakasya api viṣaya bhāvaḥ iti siddham 
[92,9^2]	na ca atīta ādi artha jñānam nirviṣaya tvena bhrāntam tad rūpeṇa grahaṇasya avyabhicāri tvāt anyathāgrahaṇam khalu vidyamāne api arthe vyabhicārī abhidhīyate sthāṇau puruṣa jñāna vat yadā tu asantaḥ api arthāḥ apāṇḍava ādayaḥ abhūvann a iti abhaviṣyanti ghaṭa ādaya a iti avyabhicāreṇa eva gṛhyante tadā tat jñānam bādhaka abhāvāt abhrāntam eva asti ayam ghaṭaḥ iti jñāna vat na ca ajanakasya janaka tve sarveṣām sarvajña tva prasaṅgaḥ saṃsāri puruṣa jñānānām dharma ādi sāmagrī viśeṣa niyamitānām niyata artha viṣaya tvena utpādāt yat tu jñānam kāraṇa sāmagryāḥ na niyamitam tat asti eva nityam sarva artha viṣayam bhagavataḥ maheśvarasya iti 
[93,2^1]	api ca smṛteḥ api katham anartha ja tvam artha abhāve api smṛti utpatteḥ iti ced kutas punar asau asan arthaḥ smṛtim na janayati asattvāt eva iti ced atīta ādi artha jñānasya tarhi katham artha ja tvam api ca yathā smṛteḥ praṇidhāna ādi sahitāt saṃskārāt utpadyamānāyāḥ tad artha bhāva abhāva anuvidhāyi tvam na asti tathā sambandha smṛti sahitāt śabda ādi jñānāt utpadyamānasya anubhavasya api na artha anuvidhāyi tvam paśyāmaḥ sannihita asat nihita arthayoḥ tatas pratipatteḥ aviśeṣāt artha abhāve sati utpadyamānam śabda ādi jñānam eva bhrāntam syāt na smṛtiḥ iti ced na anyathā artha avabhāsi tvena eva bhrānta tvāt 
[93,2^2]	tathā ca smṛtiḥ api anyathā artha avabhāsitvena udayam āsādayantī mithyā eva yathā śatru sadṛśa darśane bhavati mithyā smṛtiḥ akim na smarāmi aham yaḥ anena mama apakāraḥ kṛta a iti evam pāṭha vyākhyāna ādiṣu api anyathā smṛtiḥ draṣṭavyā tasmāt tulya yogakṣema tvāt āyātam smṛteḥ api artha ja tvam śabda ādi jñānasya api ca anartha ja tvam iti tatra artha ja tva viśeṣaṇam smṛti vyudāsa artham yuktam iti tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tvena eka artha sambaddhena aparokṣa anubhava tvam eva pratyakṣa phalasya lakṣaṇam sūtrakarttuḥ abhipretam 
[93,17]	lakṣaṇa pratipatteḥ evam api dṛṣṭa tvāt yathā yaḥ ayam śuklaḥ gacchati sa gauḥ iti yasya upari ayam chatrī puruṣaḥ dṛśyate saḥ aśvaḥ iti evamādi abhidhāne api gamana ādi upalakṣitam tad ananyasādhāraṇam go tva ādi eva lakṣaṇa tvena pratipadyante vyavaharttāraḥ tathā atra api cakṣuḥ ādi indriya ghaṭa ādi artha sambandha bhāva abhāva anuvidhānena yat ayam ghaṭaḥ ityādi jñānam utpādyate tad pratyakṣam iti abhihite api tad anya sādhāraṇam sannikarṣa ja tvena upalakṣitam aparokṣa anubhava tvam eva lakṣaṇam vicārakaiḥ pratipattavyam na tu sannikarṣa ja tvam tasya ananya sādhāraṇatva asambhavāt iti uktam 
[94,2]	kim artham tarhi tat eva aparokṣa anubhava tvam na sākṣāt uktam iti pratyakṣa bheda jñāpana artham yat asmad ādi pratyakṣam tad indriya artha sannnikarṣa jam eva iti vakṣyāmaḥ sannikarṣa ādi vipratipatti utthāna jñāpana artham vā vipratipattau hi parīkṣā upapatteḥ tad niścayaḥ bhavati tatas ca kṣaṇa bhaṅga vādinaḥ vijñāna vādinaḥ ca ātmā ādi tattva jñāna viplāvane niravakāśāḥ bhaveyuḥ iti tathā ca te kṣaṇa bhaṅga ādi siddhi artham saṃyoga ādi sambandham nirākṛtya eka sāmagrī adhīna tvam bhinnānām eka kārya utpādane pratibandham āhuḥ grāhya grāhaka bhāvam ca vijñāna vāda siddhi artham iti tatra sarva sannikarṣa abhāve dṛṣṭānta siddhi artham tāvat āhuḥ 
[94,11^1]	na prāpya kāriṇī cakṣuḥ śrotre sa antara grahaṇāt prāpya kāri tve hi cakṣuḥ arthayoḥ śrotra śabdayoḥ ca antarāla grahaṇam na syāt paraśu vṛkṣa vat prāptiḥ ca katham kim cakṣuḥ deśam āgatya sambadhyate arthaḥ uta artha deśam gatvā cakṣuḥ sambadhyate iti prathame pakṣe pratīti virodhaḥ agni darśane cakṣuḥ ādi dāha prasaṅgaḥ ca dvitīye api pakṣe pratīti virodhaḥ na hi śara vat artha saṅgatam cakṣuḥ kenacid upalabhyate sūkṣma tvāt anupalabdhiḥ iti ced na etat asti golakam eva hi cakṣuḥ iti sarva loka pratītam tad upaghāte artha darśana abhāvāt ca sūkṣuma tva abhyupagame api kim tad ākāśa vat amūrta tvena sūkṣmam uta alpa pramāṇa tvena iti prathame pakṣe sarva artha sambaddha tva ādi upagrāhaka tvam syāt amūrtta dravyasya vyāpaka tva abhyupagamāt 
[94,11^2]	atha alpa parimāṇa tvena sūkṣmam tat ayuktam pṛthutara grahaṇāt yāvatā eva pradeśena sambandham dṛṣṭam nakha nikṛntana ādi tāvatī eva pradeśe kriyām kurvat upalabdham tatas ca alpa parimāṇasya cakṣusaḥ parvata ādi grāhaka tvam na upapadyate iti itas ca na prāpya kāri cakṣuḥ śākhā candramasoḥ tulya kāla grahaṇāt gacchataḥ hi cakṣuṣaḥ krama sambandha arhasya krameṇa eva grāhaka tvam yuktam na ca etat asti na api āśu bhāvāt yugapad abhimānaḥ candramasaḥ ati viprakarṣāt avaśyam cira kāla vyavadhānena sambandhaḥ iti śabdasya tarhi santānena āgatasya śrotra sambandhāt upalabdhiḥ astu na diś deśa vyapadeśāt na hi karṇa deśe śabda upalabdhau pūrva apara ādi diś vyapadeśaḥ grāma araṇya ādi ś deśa vyapadeśaḥ vā yujyate iti tad siddham śrotrasya aprāpyakāri tvam tasmāt anena dṛṣṭāntena sarva indriyāṇām prāpya kāri tvam niṣeddhavyam iti 
[94,30]	atra ucyate yat tāvat sāntara grahaṇāt iti tat asiddha tvāt asādhanam cakṣuḥ ādeḥ atīndriya tvāt katham tatas arthasya viśleṣaḥ pratyakṣa grāhyaḥ syāt anumānena tu artha saṃśliṣṭasya eva cakṣuḥ ādeḥ pradīpa ādi dṛṣṭāntāt artha prakāśaka tvam gamyate yat ca uktam prāptiḥ katham ityādi tatra ucyate cakṣuḥ eva raśmi dvāreṇa artha deśam gatvā pradīpa vat sambadhyate tad raśmayaḥ ca anudbhūta rūpa tvāt na dṛśyante anudbhūta rūpāṇām artha prakāśaka tvam ayuktam iti ced na pradīpa ādi prakāśa sahitānām tad upapatteḥ atas eva yeṣām adṛṣṭa sāmarthyāt udbhūta rūpāḥ na ayana raśmayaḥ utpannāḥ teṣām bāhya prakāśa nirapekṣayā eva artham prakāśayanti yathā naktaṃcarāṇām tathā ca keṣāṃcid naktaṃcarāṇām na ayana raśmayaḥ pratyakṣeṇa eva dṛśyante iti 
[95,10]	atha vā āloka avayava sahitebhyaḥ tad avayavebhyaḥ udbhūta rūpāḥ eva na ayana raśmayaḥ utpadyante dṛṣṭau hi tejasām āśutara vināśa utpādau rūpa sparśau ca udbhūta tvānudbhūta tva dharma vikalpa upetau iti udbhūta rūpa tvena utpannānām api raśmīnām anyasmin samāveśāt vivekena agrahaṇam yathā aneka pradīpa raśmīnām eka artha sambaddhānām iti 
[95,15]	pṛthutara grahaṇāt iti etat anaikāntikam na hi yāvat parimāṇaḥ pradīpaḥ tāvat parimāṇam eva artham prakāśayati raśmi dvāreṇa pṛthutarasya api vyāpaka tvāt iti 
[95,18]	yat punar śākhā candramasoḥ tulya kāla grahaṇāt iti tat api asiddha tvāt asādhanam āśu bhāvi tvena yugapad abhimānāt candramasaḥ ati viprakṛṣṭa tvāt iti ced na lāghava atiśayena raśmīnām ati śīghra gati tvāt arka raśmi vat na hi bhānu ḥ aśmayaḥ arthaiḥ saha sambadhyamānāḥ krameṇa upalabhyante iti
