[96,5^1]	yat ca uktam diś deśa vyapadeśāt iti tat na tasya ani athā api sambhavāt tathā hi yadā pūrva diś viśiṣṭa karṇa śaṣkulī avayava avacchinne nabhaḥ deśe śabdam uplabhate tadā pūrvasyām diśi śabdaḥ utpannaḥ iti pratipadyate evam dakṣiṇa ādi diś viśeṣu api draṣṭavyam karṇa śaṣkulī avayavaiḥ avacchinnaḥ hi nabhaḥ deśaḥ śrotram te ca avayavāḥ sarva dikṣu vidyante iti yuktāḥ diś viśeṣa avacchedena śabda upalabdhiḥ iti iyati dūre śabdaḥ utpannaḥ iti pratipattiḥ ca anumānikī katham 
[96,5^2]	yāvataḥ dūrāt pratyakṣa āgama upalabdha kāraṇa vyāpāra bhāvinaḥ śabdasya santānena āgatasya yān viśeṣa anupalabdhavān tāvat dṛṣṭa kāraṇakasya api śabdasya viśeṣa anupalabdha mānaḥ tāvati dūre śabda utpādam pratipadyate yathā kaiścid eva viśeṣaiḥ śaṅkha ādikam vaktṛ viśeṣam ca pratipadyate iti yaḥ tu tathābhūtān viśeṣāt na lakṣayati tasya saṃśayaḥ iti dṛśyate kasya kutas vā ayam śabdaḥ iti tasmin ca diś deśa viśeṣe anumite grāma ādikam sambhāvya tatra śabda utpādam vyapadiśati na tu deśa ādīnām śrotra grāhya tvam iti tasmāt bāhya indriya tvāt rasanā ādi vat cakṣuḥ śrotrayoḥ api prāpya kāri tvam siddham 
[96,19]	prāpti abhāve hi sarva artha upalambhaḥ syāt na hi prāpti abhāve anyā kācid yogyatā asti yena ucyate yogya deśa avasthitasya eva grahaṇam iti 
[96,22]	ayaskānta ādi vat iti ced na dṛṣṭānta mātreṇa sandeha anivṛtteḥ kim ayaskānta ādi vat aprāpya kāri tvam indriyāṇām uta prāpya kāri tvam vāśya ādi vat iti na atra viśeṣa hetuḥ ucyate api ca ayaskānta saṃśliṣṭam vāyu dravyam viśiṣṭam utpannam śarīre prāṇa vat tat ca ayaḥ prāpya iva ākarṣati prāṇaḥ iva toya tūla ādikam tad sparśa anupalambhe api tad kāryeṇa eva tathābhūtasya tasya utpannasya sadbhāvaḥ avagamyate iti mantraḥ api sambaddham eva devatā ātmānam ārādhayati sa ca devatā viśeṣaḥ prāpya eva japituḥ abhipretam artham karoti iti na kasyacid aprāpya kāri tvam 
[97,7]	śabda antaḥkaraṇa ādeḥ atīta ādi arthena aprāptasya api tat jñāna janaka tvāt katham prāpya kāri tvam iti ced na aparijñānāt sahakāriṇam prāpya kāraṇasya kārya janaka tvam prāpya kāri tvam ucyate tat ca śabda antaḥkaraṇa ādeḥ api asti atīta ādi arthasya tu kāraṇa tvam eva na asti iti uktam tena tad aprāpaka tve api na aprāpyaka ārti tvam na ca evam cākṣuṣa ādi arthasya api ajanaka tvam tasya āloka ādi vat anvaya vyatirekābhyām kāraṇa tva siddheḥ prāptasya api añjana ādeḥ anupalabdhiḥ iti etat api na yuktam na hi yat indriyeṇa prāptam tat upalabhyate eva iti niyamyate kim tarhi yat bāhya indriyeṇa upalabhyate tad prāptam eva iti niyamaḥ kim kāraṇam bāhya indriyāṇām bhautika tvena pradīpa vat prāpta artha prakāśaka tvāt indriya tvāt manasaḥ api prasaṅgaḥ iti ced kvacid tathā abhāvāt siddha sādhanam niyama pakṣe tu atīta ādi arthaiḥ uktaḥ virodhaḥ kim ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām bāhya indriyeṇa vidyamānam janakam eva upalabhyate janakānām ca ghaṭa ādi hetūnām iva paraspara sambaddhānām eva eka kārya hetu tvam iti siddhaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tat janita tvam jñānasya iti 
[97,20^1]	atha avyapadeśya padam kim artham ubhaya ja jñāna vyavaccheda artham iti eke tat asambhavāt ayuktam iti apare tathā hi śrotram adhiṣṭhāya manaḥ śabda upalabdhim kṛtvā kriyā vibhāga dvāreṇa gatvā yāvat cakṣuḥ adhitiṣṭhati tāvat śabdaḥ nivarttate eva iti na vyāpriyeta na ca manaḥ anadhiṣṭhitānām bāhya indriyāṇām vyāpāraḥ sambhavati na api yugapad adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam manasaḥ aṇu tvāt vayam punar abhyupagamya api brūmaḥ kim tat ubhaya jam jñānam sākṣātkāri na vā yadi sākṣātkāri tadā tat apohyam na yuktam sākṣātkārī anubhavasya pratyakṣa phala tvena sarvatra prasiddha tvāt 
[97,20^2]	atha na sākṣātkāri tathā api tad viṣayaḥ na indriya arthaḥ iti katham tad indriya artha sannikarṣa jam na hi indriya sambaddha tvāt eva indriya arthaḥ kintu yaḥ eva sākṣātkāri jñāna viṣayaḥ anyathā anumeyasya api kasyacid indriya sambaddha tvāt indriya artha tva prasaṅgaḥ iti tad jñāna nivṛtti artham api viśeṣaṇa antaram karttavyam syāt katham vā śabda bhāva abhāva anuvidhāyinaḥ jñānasya indriya artha sannikarṣa ja tvam gamyate idantaya utpatteḥ iti ced tat na sparśa anumeye agnau apīdantayā jñāna udaya darśanāt 
[97,20^3]	api ca tad ubhaya jam jñānam ubhaya phalam astu pramāṇa antara phalam vā katham śābdam eva iti ucyate sūtra kṛtā eva khalu evam upadiṣṭa tvāt iti ced na khalu vai sūtrakāra niyoga bhayāt padārthāḥ svadharmam hātum arhanti yadi ca avicāritam eva sūtrakāra vacaḥ pramāṇam parīkṣā sūtrāṇām tarhi vaiyarthyam syāt tasmāt ubhaya jasya śābda tve nyāyaḥ vācyaḥ tat avyapadeśāt iti ced na anyathā tad vyapadeśa upapatteḥ asya śabdasya ayam arthaḥ abhidheyaḥ iti ayam sambandhaḥ devadattena ākhyātaḥ iti manyamānaḥ vyapadiśati devadattena ayam samākhyātaḥ iti anyathā hi tad sambandha pratītiḥ kutas syāt dṛṣṭaḥ ca ayam sambandha pratipattau eva vyapadeśaḥ yathā kaścid aprasiddha samayaḥ na eka puruṣa madhye caitram paśyan api ayam ca etaraḥ iti apratipadyamānaḥ pṛcchati kaḥ atra caitraḥ iti tatas kaścid tasya aṅgulī ādi nirdeśa mātram karoti tatas asau aṅguli ādi darśanāt eva samayam pratipadya vyapadiśati anena ayam caitraḥ mama ākhyātaḥ iti na ca sambandha pratipattiḥ indriya artha sannikarṣa jā tasmāt na tad vyavaccheda artham avyapadeśya padam 
[98,23_99,6]	aparaḥ tu āha gauḥ ityādi jñāne saṃjñā viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ pratibhāti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ ca eka jñāna avalambana tvam tena tasya indriya artha sannikarṣa ja tvam na yuktam tathā api abhyupagatam kaiścid atas tad nirākaraṇa artham āha avyapadeśyam iti yadi evam ānumānikasya api kasyacid jñānasya sannikarṣa ja tvam kaiścid abhyupagatam tad nirākaraṇa artham kim viśeṣaṇam sannikarṣa ja tvam eva iti ced gauḥ ityādi jñāna nirākaraṇa artham api tat eva astu kim avyapadeśya padena iti ye api śabdāt vaita nirākaraṇa artham avyapadeśya padam varṇayanti taiḥ api brahmādvaita ādi nirākaraṇa artham viśeṣaṇa antaram kartavyam tulya yogakṣema tvāt iti 
[99,9^1]	kim idānīm anarthakam eva avyapadeśya padam na anarthakam nirṇaya vat viśiṣṭa pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa artha tvāt yat tat nirvikalpakam pratyakṣam tat anena lakṣyate tat dhi sarva yogibhiḥ prārthyate vikalpavataḥ citta sthiteḥ asambhavāt sarva mūlam ca tat tad abhāve anya pramāṇa pravṛtteḥ asambhavāt na hi pratyakṣa abhāve anumāna ādeḥ pravṛttiḥ sambhavati na ca nirvikalpaka apravṛttau sa vikalpakasya pravṛttiḥ tasya saṃjñā smṛti pūrvaka tvāt smṛtiḥ tu tad artha darśanāt udbhūtā gauḥ ayam ityādi jñāna hetuḥ na smṛti mātram tasya sāmarthya an avadhāraṇāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tad sambandhānām svarūpa grahaṇe hi paścāt daṇḍī ityādi jñānam api bhavati tasmāt nirvikalpa pūrvakam eva sa vikalpakam 
[99,9^2]	evam ca yat pratyakṣam tat sarvam sa vikalpakam eva pramāṇa tvāt anumāna vat iti etat vā adhita viṣaya tvāt ayuktam iti na nirvikalpakam pramāṇam vyavahāra animitta tvāt anadhyavasāya vat iti ced na asiddha tvāt tathā hi sarpa kaṇṭaka ādeḥ aparimitasya aniṣṭasya abhāvam nirvikalpaka pratyakṣeṇa eva paśyan nirāśaṃkaḥ pravarttate tathā abhāva ātmakam vā aparimitam artham sakṛt dṛṣṭvā krameṇa smṛti nimittam prāpya smṛtvā smṛtvā anyasya api kathayati idam dṛṣṭam idam na dṛṣṭam iti na ca tat api darśanam sa vikalpakam eva tasya nīlam idam iti ākāreṇa anutpatteḥ iti tat evam pramāṇa tvāt nirvikalpakasya yuktam lakṣaṇam tat āha avyapadeśyam iti devadattaḥ iti jñānam daṇḍī iti jñānam iti evamādi vyapadeśa arham na bhavati iti arthaḥ 
[100,1]	sa vikalpam api pratyakṣam pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ tad arthāḥ iti anena vyakti ākṛti jātayaḥ tu padārthāḥ iti anena ca leśataḥ sūcitam pratyakṣa viṣayasya viśeṣya tva vācya tva pratipādanāt adhigata viṣayasya api pramāṇa tva abhyupagamāt ca iti atha vā vyavasāya ātmaka padena eva sa vikalpakam api avaruddham iti samyak iti vaktavye yat avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam iti akṣara gauravam karoti tena asamyak jñānasya vyabhicārya vyavasāya bhedena dvaividhyam eva na cāturvidhyam iti jñāpayati etat ca prāk eva prapañcitam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam yat tat jñānam eva prasiddham atas na jñānam pṛthak vācyam satyam tathā api kecid ajñāna nivṛtteḥ pramāṇa phala tvam āhuḥ tad āśaṅkā apanodana artham viśeṣya pratipatti artham ca pṛthak jñānam apadiṣṭam iti na doṣaḥ 
[100,12]	tat evam pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam abhidhāya sūtra avirodhena bheda jñāpana artham idam ucyate tat dvividham yogi pratyakṣam ayogi pratyakṣam ca iti caśabdāt sa vikalpa nirvikalpaka bhedena api dvividham iti siddham dvividha grahaṇam caturvidha nirākaraṇa artham mānasa rāga ādi pratyakṣayoḥ asambhavāt 
[101,6]	para mate hi sva viṣaya anantara viṣaya sahakāriṇā indriya jñānena janitam jñānam mānasam pratyakṣam sukha ādīnām sva saṃvedanam sukha ādi grahaṇam spaṣṭa saṃvedana pradarśana artham sarva jñānānām api sva saṃvedanam iti anena gṛhītam tat ca etat ubhayam api pratyakṣam niṣpramāṇaka tvāt na yuktam kṣaṇa bhaṅga niṣedhāt ca mānasam niṣiddham sva saṃvedana niṣedhāt sukha ādeḥ abodha ātmaka tvāt ca rāga ādi saṃvedanam api niṣiddham manasaḥ ca indriya tvāt na indriya pratyakṣāt anya pratyakṣam asti tasmāt etāvat eva yuktam yogi pratyakṣam ayogi pratyakṣam ca iti 
[102,9]	yadi api yogi pratyakṣasya atiprakṛṣṭa tvāt ādau uddeśaḥ tathā api ayogi pratyakṣa siddhau eva tat asmad ādinā a agamyate iti dṛṣṭānta siddhi artham tatra tasmin pratyakṣa samudāye tāvat ādau nirdhārya ayogi pratyakṣam vyākhyāyate prakāśa deśa dharma ādi anugrahāt indriya artha sambandha viśeṣeṇa sthūla artha grāhakam iti prakāśaḥ pradīpa ādi lakṣanaḥ citta samādhāna lakṣaṇaḥ ca deśaḥ purovarti ādi lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ iṣṭa upalabdhau aniṣṭa upalabdhau tu adharmaḥ anyat api atra anuktam nimitttam yena vinā arthaḥ na gṛhyate tat sarvam ādi grahaṇāt avagantavyam tat evam prakāśa ādi lakṣaṇam nimittam anugrahaḥ gṛhyate anena iti kṛtvā tad anugrahāt akṣam sādhakatamam sādhakatama tvam ca akṣasya arthena saha sannikarṣa viśeṣaḥ tena upetam tat indriyam artha gṛhītim sādhayati iti 
[103,4]	nanu ca pradīpena paśyāmi iti pradīpasya api sādhakatama tvam pratīyate na ca atra bādhakam kiṃcid asti tat katham akṣam eva sādhakatamam pradīpaḥ ca nimittam iti satyam kintu prādhānya apekṣayā akṣam pratyakṣam uktam prādhānyam ca tad phalasya tad vyapadeśya tvam yava aṅkura ādi vat pradīpasya api sādhakatama tvam itara nimitta anugrahāt artha sambandhaḥ eva phala utpatteḥ sambandhaḥ eva sādhakatama tvam ucyate tat yathā cakṣuḥ sparśa saṃyogāt anantaram eva ghaṭa ādi dravya jñānam iti yadi api kvacid acaram asya api sambandhasya jñāna hetu tvam asti tathā api bāhulyāt apekṣaya etat uktam parama arthaḥ tu yat eva caramam tat eva indriya ādeḥ sādhakatama tvam iti atva a pratyaya vācyam 
[103,13]	yadi tarhi sambandhaḥ sādhakatama tvam tadā sarva ātmanā artha grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ sarva ātmanā arthasya sambaddha tvāt iti na kāraṇasya niyata viṣaye sāmarthyāt na hi paraśuḥ sambaddha tvāt eva vṛkṣa vat tad dharmān ākāśa ādikam ca api chinatti dhūmaḥ ca agni dharmān aśeṣāt na gamayati bhavataḥ eva pakṣe dharma dharmiṇoḥ abheda abhyupagamāt sarva ātmanā arthena janitasya arpita sva ākārasya jñānasya sarva ātmanā artha niścāyaka tva prasaṅgaḥ saḥ ayam uṣṭralakuṭa nyāyam anutiṣṭhan katham na upahāsa viṣayaḥ syāt iti dharmi dharmāṇām khalu bhede sati yasya eva indriya grahaṇa artha tvam saḥ eva dharmaḥ dharmī vā sambaddhaḥ indriyeṇa gṛhyate yasya tu na indriya grahaṇa arha tvam sa sambaddhaḥ api na gṛhyate tad artham eva uktam sthūla artha grāhakam iti 
[104,6^1]	nanu ca asthūlasya arthasya grāhakam na tu jñāna ākārasya sthaulyam asti iti atas na jñāna ātmakam sthūlam grāhyam iti jñānāt artha antaram sthūlam sutarām na sambhavati tathā hi na tāvat ekaḥ avayavī tathā sati tasya pāṇi ādi kampe sarva kampa prāpteḥ akampane vā cala acalayoḥ pṛthak siddhi prasaṅgāt vastra udaka vat ekasya ca āvaraṇe sarvasya āvaraṇa prasaṅgāt abhedāt na vā kasyacid āvaraṇam iti avikalam dṛśyeta avayavasya āvaraṇam na avayavinaḥ iti abhyupagame api arddha āvaraṇe api anāvṛta tvāt prak iva asya darśana prasaṅgaḥ avayava darśana dvāreṇa avayavi darśanam iti asmin api pakṣe sarvathā avayavinaḥ apratipatti prasaṅgaḥ sarva avayavānām draṣṭum aśakyavāt katipaya avayava darśanāt avayavi darśane yadvat atra avayava darśane api tathābhūtasya eva darśana prasaṅgaḥ rakte ca ekasmin avayave yadi avayavī raktaḥ tadā anya avayava sthaḥ api raktaḥ eva dṛśyeta no ced tadā sarva avayava rāge api avayavi araktaḥ eva upalabhyeta 
[104,6^2]	vṛtti anupapatteḥ ca avayavī na asti tathā hi gavi śṛṅgam iti laukikam śṛṅge gauḥ iti alaukikam tatas yadi avayavini avayavāḥ varttante tadā ekena eva avayavena akhaṇḍasya avayavinaḥ avaruddha tvāt anye avayavāḥ kva vartteran na hi mūrttānām eka deśa avasthānam asti na ca avayava vyatirekeṇa avayavinaḥ pradeśa bhedaḥ asti yena avayavānām eka deśa tvam na prasajyeta eka dravya vṛtti tve ca dravyasya abhyupagame yukti bādhā api syāt atha avayaveṣu avayavī vartate iti pakṣaḥ tatra api ekasmin eva avayave yadi sarva ātmanā varttate tadā anye avayavāḥ tad anāśrayāḥ syuḥ eka āśraya tve ca dravyasya sadā utpattiḥ avināśaḥ ca syāt atha eka deśena ekatra avayave varttate na tasya akhaṇḍasya avayava vyatirikta deśā sambhavāt tad abhyupagame vā teṣu api deśeṣu anyaiḥ deśaiḥ vṛttiḥ iti anavasthā syāt 
[106,3]	itas ca na asti avayavī buddhyā vivecane anupalambhāt na hi ayam tantuḥ ayam tantuḥ iti evam buddhyā pṛthak kriyamāṇeṣu avayaveṣu tad anyaḥ avayavī pratibhāti etena avayava dharmaḥ avayavi iti ayam api pakṣaḥ nirastaḥ tasmāt na asti ekaḥ avayavī yaḥ sthūla pratibhāsa viṣayaḥ syāt na api paramāṇu samūhaḥ eva sthūla pratibhāsa viṣayaḥ tasya paramāṇu vyatiriktasya avayavi nyāyena apāsta tvāt paramāṇūnām ca pratyekam na sthūla tvam asti iti samuditānām api katham syāt na hi pratyekam araktānām samudāya avasthāyām rakta ākāratā upalabhyate marīcīnām udaka ākāra tāvat bhrānta upalambhaḥ syāt 
[106,11_107,1]	atha evam ucyate yadi sthūlam jñānāt artha antaram grāhyam na sambhavati sūkṣmam eva tarhi grāhyam bhaviṣyati iti tat api asat yatas ṣaṭkena yugapad yogāt paramāṇoḥ ṣaṣ aṃśa tā ṣaṇṇām api eka deśa tve piṇḍaḥ syāt aṇu mātrakaḥ iti mūrtasya ca diś pravibhāgena avaśyam daśa aṃśa tayā api bhavitavyam na ca svarūpeṇa anupalabhyamānasya astitvam śakyam abhidhātum kim ca ākāśa vyatibhedāt ākāśa asarva gata tvam vā iti atas na paramāṇuḥ api asti tasmāt na bāhyam grāhyam upapadyate tat uktam na anyaḥ anubhāvyaḥ buddhyā asti tasyāḥ na anubhavaḥ aparaḥ grāhya grāhaka vaidhuryāt svayam sā eva prakāśate 
[107,6_108,1]	sva vyatirikta grāhya grāhaka virahāt tad ubhaya ākārā buddhiḥ svayam eva ātma svarūpa prakāśikā prakāśa vat iti samudāya arthaḥ api ca saha upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tad dhiyoḥ na hi bhinna avabhāsi tve api artha antaram evam rūpam nīlasya anubhavāt tayoḥ saha upalambha niyamāt dvi candra ādi darśana vat na hi anayoḥ eka anupalambhe anya upalambhaḥ asti na ca etat svabhāva bhede yuktam pratibandha kāraṇa abhāvāt 
[108,4_108,6]	atha paścāt artha upalambhasya jñāna antareṇa saṃvedanam tat api ayuktam yasmāt apratyakṣa upalambhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati na hi viṣaya sattayā viṣaya upalambhaḥ kim tarhi tad upalambha sattayā sā ca aprāmāṇikī na sattā nibandhanān tad vyavahārān anuruṇaddhi tad aprasiddhau viṣayasya api aprasiddhiḥ iti sat vyavahāra ucchedaḥ syāt na hi sat api anupalambhyamānam sat iti vyavaharttum śakyate 
[108,10]	atha artha saṃvedanam anyena saṃvedanena saṃvedyate tat api saṃvedanam asiddha sattākam asat kalpam katham anyasya sādhakam syāt tatra api saṃvedana antara anveṣaṇe anavasthā syāt tathā ca na kasyacid arthasya siddhiḥ iti andhamūkam jagat syāt kvacid niṣṭhā abhyupagame ca svayam ātmānam viṣaya ākāram yugapad upalabhate iti tat anye api tathā bhavantu viśeṣa hetu abhāvāt tad siddhaḥ saha upalambhaḥ tasmāt saha upalambhāt abhedaḥ artha tad dhiyoḥ iti evam ca nīla upalambhaḥ iti nīla svabhāva upalambhaḥ iti etāvat uktam bhavati anādi vāsanā vaśāt buddhiḥ eva aneka ākāra utpadyamānā saṃvedyate svapna buddhi vat iti api ca dhiyaḥ nīla ādi rūpa tve bāhyaḥ arthaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ dhiyaḥ anīla ādi rūpa tve bāhyaḥ arthaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ 
[108,20]	yadi ayam nīla ākāraḥ buddheḥ eva dharmaḥ tad ātma bhūtaḥ avabhāsate tatas tad vyatiriktaḥ nīla ādiḥ arthaḥ asti iti na kiṃcid pramāṇam atha na ayam buddheḥ ākāraḥ iṣyate tathā api sā nirākārāni atha ākārā vā buddhiḥ katham nīla ādeḥ sādhikā syāt na hi pratibandham antareṇa artha antarāt artha antarasya siddhiḥ atiprasaṅgāt tad utpatti pratibandhe tu nayana adṛṣṭa ādīnām api viṣaya bhāvaḥ syāt su a ākāra anarpaka tve janakatva viśeṣasya api asiddheḥ katham janakatvā aviśeṣe api karma kāraka tvam sva viṣaya jñāna janaka tvam vā tasya eva ucyate ye api eka sāmagrī adhīna tvam pratibandham āśritya samāna kālayoḥ eva grāhya grāhaka bhāvam icchanti tad mate api nayana adṛṣṭa ādīnām tat eka sāmagrī adhīnānām grāhya tvam prasajyate viśeṣa abhāvāt 
[109,1]	atha artha ākāra tvam viśeṣaḥ tathā api bāhya arthaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ ekaḥ khalu ayam nīla ākāraḥ upalabhyate sa jñāna ātmā eva iṣṭaḥ tad dvitīyaḥ tu ākāraḥ na dṛśyate saḥ adṛśyamānaḥ katham bāhya tvena avatiṣṭheta vyāptyasiddheḥ anumāna gamyaḥ api na sambhavati anye tu evam paṭhanti dhiyaḥ nīla ādi rūpa tve bāhyaḥ arthaḥ kiṃpramāṇakaḥ dhiyaḥ anīla ādi rūpa tve sa tasya anubhavaḥ katham 
[109,7]	atra api ayam tātparya arthaḥ buddheḥ nirākāra tve pratikarma vyavasthā anupapattiḥ sa ākāra tve ca bāhyaḥ arthaḥ apramāṇakaḥ iti atha brūyāt artha ākāraḥ grāhya tvena eva pratīyate bodha ākāraḥ tu grāhaka tvena eva iti katham anayoḥ aikyam eka tve hi vyatyayena api tayoḥ pratibhāsaḥ syāt iti na etat asti anādi upaplava vāsanā sāmarthyāt evam pratīti vyavasthā upapatteḥ tat uktam avedya vedaka ākārāḥ yathā bhrāntaiḥ nirīkṣyate vibhakta lakṣaṇā grāhya grāhaka ākāra viplavā tathā akṛta vyavastheyam keśa ādi jñāna bheda vat yadā tadā na saṃcodya grāhya grāhaka lakṣaṇā iti 
[109,16]	asya arthaḥ sva rūpeṇa avidyamāna vedya vedakā ākārā api buddhiḥ yathā bhrāntaiḥ vyavahartṛbhiḥ nirīkṣyate tathā eva kṛta vyavasthā iyam vyavahriyate taiḥ tu bhrāntaiḥ iyam vibhakta lakṣaṇa grāhya grāhaka ākāra viplavā nirīkṣyate vibhakta lakṣanau iva grāhya grāhaka ākārau eva viplavaḥ yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā kim iva keśa ādi jñāna bheda vat yathā timira ādi upapluta akṣāṇām avidyamānāḥ eva keśa ādayaḥ bodhāt bhinnāḥ iva pratibhānti tadvat nīla ādayaḥ api iti yadā ayam avidyā nibandhanaḥ eva buddheḥ pravibhāgaḥ tadā evam na saṃcodya grāhya grāhaka lakṣaṇā saṃcodye paryanuyojye grāhya grāhaka lakṣaṇe yasyāḥ sā tathā na bhavati na hi avidyā samāropita ākāraḥ paryanuyogam arhati iti tat evam buddhi vyatirikta grāhya grāhaka asambhavāt buddhiḥ eva anādi va āsanā vaśāt aneka ākāra avabhāsate tasmāt ayuktam uktam sthūla artha grāhakam iti 
[109,27^1]	atra pratividhīyate yat tāvat na asti ekaḥ avayavī tasya pāṇi ādi kampe sarva kampa prāpteḥ iti tat ayuktam vyāpteḥ asiddha tvāt na hi yasya pāṇi ādi kampe sarva kampa prāptiḥ tasya abhāvaḥ iti evam vyāptiḥ kvacid gṛhītā na api yasya sattvam tasya na pāṇi ādi kampe sarva kampa prāptiḥ iti evam vyāptiḥ pareṇa dṛṣṭā na ca dṛṣṭānta abhāve sva pakṣa siddhau para pakṣa nirākaraṇe vā kvacid dhetoḥ sāmarthyam dṛṣṭam prasaṅgaḥ api ubhayoḥ vyāpti siddhau ātmānam labhate prabhā pradīpa prasaṅga vat akampane vā cala acalayoḥ pṛthak siddhi prasaṅgaḥ iti api bāhya artha asambhave anupapannam 
[109,27^2]	na hi evam kaścid anunmattaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate na asti ekaḥ vandhyā putraḥ tasya pāṇi ādi kampe sarva kampa prāpteḥ akampane vā cala acalayoḥ pṛthak siddhi prasaṅgaḥ kha puṣpa khara śṛṅga vat iti cala acalayoḥ ekatva virodhāt ekatvam abhyupagacchatauvayavinaḥ cala tvam eva sarva ātmanā abhyupagantavyam cala acala tvam abhyupagacchatā ca eka tvam na abhyupagantavyam iti ayam prasaṅga arthaḥ iti ced na vaiyarthyāt na hi naiyāyikaḥ vaiśeṣikaḥ vā kaścid ekasya avayavinaḥ cala acala tvam abhyupagacchati yam pratyayam prasaṅgaḥ arthavān bhavet 
[110,12]	nanu eka avayava kampane api anya avayavānām akampanāt asti cala acala tvam tena bheda siddhiḥ tatas kim aniṣṭam yadi nāma avayavānām cala acala tvena bhedaḥ tatas artha antarasya avayavinaḥ kim āyātam yadā khalu avayavinaḥ cala tvam utpadyate tadā avayavasya kasyacid acala tve api na tasya acala tvam yadā tu na utpadyate tadā avayavasya cala tve api na avayavinaḥ cala tvam tayoḥ avayava avayavi calanayoḥ bhinna sāmagrī janya tvena yugapad utpatti niyama ayogāt ardha avayava calana kāle tarhi kim avayavinaḥ cala tvam asti vā na vā iti na vidmaḥ tathā pratyayasya ubhayathā api sambhavāt tathā niścale api calatsu āśreyeṣu dṛśyamāneṣu calana pratyayaḥ rūpa ādiṣu iva upapadyate calati api niścala avayava samavāya nimittena calanasya agrahaṇāt niścala pratyayaḥ sambhavati dūra ādi nimittāt agṛhīta calana vat na ca evam sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ saṃśaya nimitta anupalabdhau tad niścaya upapatteḥ anyathā hi cala acala vyavahārasya nirmūla tā eva syāt iti 
[111,6_111,10]	atha vā saṃyoga vat calanasya api pradeśa vṛtti tvam tena ekasya api cala acala pratyaya viṣaya tvam na virudhyate dhāvati puruṣe calanasya apradeśa vṛtti tva upalambhāt ayuktyam iti ced evam tarhi vastra udaka ādi saṃyogasya apradeśa vṛtti tva upalambhāt saṃyogasya api pradeśa vṛtti tvam ayuktam tatra udaka ādinā sarva avayava saṃyogaiḥ saha vastra ādeḥ saṃyoga upalambhāt apradeśa vṛtti abhimānaḥ iti ced samānam atra api sarva avayava calanaiḥ saha avayavinaḥ calana upalambhāt apradeśa vṛtti abhimānaḥ eva iti kuḍya ādinā aṅguli saṃyoge śarīrasya api saṃyogaḥ asti na tu hasta calane api śarīrasya calanam iti atra viśeṣa niścaye pramāṇam na paśyāmaḥ prakriyā mātrāt tu sarva vāda siddhiḥ syāt tasmāt calanasya api pradeśa vṛtti tvāt ekasmin avayavini saṃyoga upalambhānupalambha vat calanasya api upalambha anupalambhau aviruddhau iti etena vṛta anāvṛta tvam prayuktam na vā avayavi upalambhe avayava upalambhaḥ avayava akṣa sannikarṣaḥ vā kāraṇam yena ardha tri bhāga ādi avayava āvaraṇe avayavinaḥ api agrahaṇam kim tarhi tad sannikarṣaḥ aśeṣa sahakāri sahitaḥ sa ca tad upalambha anumeyaḥ tad anupalambhena tu saha kārya samagra tā eva anumīyate 
[111,20]	ardha āvaraṇe api avikalaḥ avayavī kid na dṛśyate iti ced na abhinna ātmanaḥ tasya avikalasya eva dṛṣṭa tvāt tasmin tathā avayave dṛṣṭe avayava ādi viśeṣa aviśeṣa apekṣayā sandehaḥ api aviruddhaḥ tad avayava ādi upalambhānām ca avayavi upalambhasya ca pratiniyata kāraṇa tvāt na sahabhāva niyamaḥ tasmāt avayavānupalambhe api avayavī gṛhyate iti 
[111,24^1]	yat api uktam rakte ca ekasmin ityādi tat api ayuktam na hi avayava rakta ārakta tābhyām avayavinaḥ tathā abhāvaḥ tasya tebhyaḥ artha antara tvāt api tu avayavinaḥ eva rakta dravya saṃyogaḥ rakta tā tad abhāvaḥ ca arakta tā iti saṃyogasya ca avyāpya vṛtti tvena rakta tā rakta tvam api ekasya avayavinaḥ na virudhyate katham ekasya avyāptiḥ iti ced na saṃyogasya eva hi evam dharmaḥ yena yatra yatra avayave sambaddhaḥ avayavī dṛśyate tatra tatra rūpa ādi vat tad upalambha kāraṇā vaiguṇye api saṃyogaḥ na upalabhyate tathā yatra yatra ākāśam asti tatra tatra na karṇa śaṣkulī ākāśa saṃyogena avacchidyate sarva śabdānām tad samavāyena eka śrotra viṣaya prasaṅgāt 
[111,24^2]	atas eva śabdasya api na vyāpya vṛtti tvam kvacid utpannasya api sarva śrotra viṣaya tva prasaṅgāt evam dharmaka tvam saṃyoga śabda ādīnām pradeśa vṛtti tva śabdena api vyavahriyate na punar ākāśa ādeḥ akhaṇḍasya pradeśaḥ asti yadi api avayavinaḥ avayavaḥ pradeśaḥ asti tathā api na tatra avayavi saṃyogaḥ varttate sarvasya api avayavinaḥ saṃyoga an āśraya tva prasaṅgāt paramāṇoḥ tu pradeśa abhāvāt saṃyogaḥ na syāt tatas ca śarīra ādi anutpattau sarvasya agrahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt yathā tvad mate nirvikalpena jñānena tat eva sa vikalpakam jñānam ātma sadṛśam kathaṃcid utpāditam kathaṃcid na iti abhinnasya eva aṃśaḥ parikalpyate tathā saṃyoga ādi ādhārasya api iti aduṣṭam saṃyoga ādeḥ pradeśa vṛtti tvam tasmāt ekasya api rakta ārakta tvam aviruddham iti 
[112,13]	yaḥ tarhi rakta āraktaiḥ eva avayavaiḥ avayavī niṣpāditaḥ tasya kim rūpam iti viśeṣa anārambhāt anirdeśyam eva viśeṣataḥ viruddha viśeṣāṇām kāraṇa rūpāṇām viśeṣa ārambhe tu virodhaḥ na sāmānya ārambhe nīla pīta ādiṣu sarvatra rūpa ātmanaḥ sambhavāt nīla ādi viśeṣa rahitam api rūpam utpannam iti avayavi darśanāt eva avagamyate nīrūpa dravyasya darśana ayogāt anya rūpeṇa anya darśane ca atiprasaṅgāt tasmāt viśeṣataḥ anirdeśyam rūpa mātram eva tata utpannam iti citra pratibhāsaḥ tu tatra citra avayava sambandhāt sphaṭike nīla ādi pratibhāsana vat yadi evam dvi aṇuka rūpam api viruddha viśeṣa rūpa ārambhāt anirdeśyam prāptam tatas ca tad pūrvakasya sarvasya api avayavi rūpasya anirdeśya tvam syāt tatas para rūpa viśeṣasya atīndriya tvāt rūpa viśeṣa nirdeśa ucchedaḥ eva syāt iti 
[113,2^1]	na etat evam sarva ārambhasya adṛṣṭa āyatta tvāt adṛṣṭasya ca puruṣa artha upayogi kārya ārambhaka tvāt tathā ārambhe tu na puruṣa artha upayogaḥ iti na sarvatra tathā ārambhe rūpa viśeṣa upalambha virodhāt ca iti atha vā citram eva tad rūpam utpannam tathā eva ābādhita pratibhāsāt ekam tat citram ca iti virodhāt ayuktam iti ced na ekasya api aneka nīla tva ādi dharma adhikaraṇa tvena citra pratibhāsa viṣaya tva sambhavāt yathā gairika ādi aneka varṇa sambaddham vastram citram iti pratīyate nīla tva ādi jātīnām viruddha tvāt ekatra samavāyaḥ na yuktaḥ iti ced na virodhasya asiddha tvāt anyatra saha adarśanāt tad siddhiḥ iti ced na nīlatva utpala tvayoḥ api virodha prasaṅgāt tayoḥ ekatra darśanāt avirodhaḥ iti ced samānam etat 
[113,2^2]	yuktyā api bhinna jātīya rūpa ārabdhasya avayavi rūpasya aneka jāti adhikaraṇa tvam sambhāvyate avayava rūpāṇām niyamena avayavini samāna jātīya rūpa ārambhaka tva darśanāt iti para mate api aneka vāsanā khacitam jñānam citram iti astu udāharaṇam jāti bhedāḥ eva hi vyāvṛtti bheda śakti bheda śabdābhyām abhilapyante teṣām āśrayebhyaḥ anya tvam ananya tvam vā iti vivāda antaram etat tasmāt aneka jāti adhikaraṇam ekam rūpam vicitram tat ca tathābhūtam api yadā kutaścid nimittāt aneka jāti adarśanāt ekaikena eva jāti viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭam gṛhyate tadā śuklam iti vā raktam iti vā gṛhyate na citram iti yathā dhāraṇi rūpam atha śuklam iti raktam iti vā avayavi rūpam eva gṛhyate avayavi rūpasya tu citram iti grahaṇa kāle eva pratyakṣa tvam iṣyate evam astu na atra nirbandhaḥ asmākam śākya ukta dūṣaṇa parihārasya sarvathā upapatteḥ 
[113,21]	ye tu avayavinam na abhyupagacchanti taiḥ api citra ādi pratibhāsasya viṣayaḥ vaktavyaḥ paramāṇu vilakṣaṇa avayava viṣaya abhyupagame saḥ eva avayavi abhyupagataḥ bhavati paramāṇūnām tu atīndriya tvāt na akṣa viṣaya tvam viṣaya lakṣaṇa rahita tvāt ca su a ākāra jñāna janaka tvam hi viṣaya lakṣaṇam taiḥ iṣṭam na ca paramāṇūnām su a ākāra janaka tvam asti sarvatra sthūla ādi ākārasya eva saṃvedanāt vilakṣaṇa ākāra janakasya api viṣaya bhāve cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api viṣaya tvam syāt 
[114,6^1]	atha nīla ādi ākāra arpaka tvam paramāṇūnām asti tad vaśena eva viṣaya tvam tat ayuktam yatas nīla ādi ākāraḥ sthūla ādi ātmaka tvena eva saṃvedyate na anyaḥ asaṃśliṣṭa paramāṇu ātmakaḥ nīla ādi ākāraḥ pratibhāti kutas ca ayam viśeṣaḥ avadhāryate nīla ādi ākārasya eva bāhya upādāna tvam na sthūla ādi ākārasya iti na hi ākāra vādinā sthūla ādi ākāra vat nīla ādi ākāraḥ api jñāna sthāt ākārāt artha antara bhūtaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tat katham pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām artha viśeṣa tad ākārayoḥ hetu phala bhāvaḥ vyavasthāpyate arthāpattyā tu sthūla ākārasya api bāhya upādāna tva siddhiḥ samāna yogakṣema tvāt iti bahavaḥ sanniviṣṭāḥ paramāṇavaḥ eva sthūla tvena avabhāsantaḥ iti ced na ukta tvāt pratyekam asaṃcita āsthūleṣu paramāṇuṣu tathā ākāram jñānam bhrāntam eva syāt api ca te bahavaḥ paramāṇavaḥ kim ekam eva ākāram arpayanti 
[114,6^2]	uta pratiparamāṇu bhinnam iti yadi ekam eva ākāram jñāne arpayanti tadā pratyakṣasya api sādhāraṇa ākāra grāhaka tvena sāmānya viṣaya tvam prāptam bhrānta tvam ca pratyekam bhinna ākārāṇām eka ākāreṇa grahaṇāt citra pratibhāsaḥ ca na syāt na hi eka ākārasya citra tā nāma atha pratiparamāṇu bhid na ākāram jñānam tat api ayuktam abhinna jñānasya ākāra bhedā sambhavāt ākāra bhede hi jñānasya api bhedaḥ syāt tādātmya viparyayaḥ vā gati antara abhāvāt iti iṣṭaḥ eva ākāra bhede jñāna bhedaḥ iti ced na anubhava virodhāt ekam eva stambha ādi jñānam anubhūyate na pratiparamāṇu bhinnāni apara saṃkhyātāni jñānāni iti ekaika ākāra paryavasita tve ca jñānānām bhinna santāna jñānānām iva paraspara asaṃvidita ākāra tvāt katham bahuṣu api sthūla ādi ākāra tvena pratipattiḥ iṣyate 
[115,1_115,4]	atha na eva bāhyaḥ arthaḥ asti iti sarvatra buddhiḥ eva tad ākāra avabhāsate iti tat api ayuktam buddhiḥ api ekā satī katham citra ākārā bhavet abhinna ātmanaḥ citra tva abhyupagame khalu avayavinā kaḥ aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yena asau sarva loka prasiddhaḥ api nirākriyate atha nābhinna ātmanaḥ citrākāra tā iṣyate kintu pratiniyata ākāram yugapad utpannam anekam vijñānam citram iti ucyate iti tat api na yuktam sva saṃvedana niṣṭha tvena ekasya eva ākārasya anubhavān na jātu jñānam jñāna antara ākāram anubhavati ananubhave ca yugapad aneka ākāra jñāna utpādakasya katham citra tvam bhinna santāna an eka ākāra jñāna vat atha taiḥ eka santāna udbhavaiḥ ekaḥ vikalpaḥ citra ākāra adhyavasāyī janyate iti na spaṣṭa avabhāsinaḥ api citra jñānasya darśanāt na ca vikalpasya spaṣṭa avabhāsi tvam bhavadbhiḥ iṣṭam vikalpaḥ api yadi eka ākāraḥ tadā katham citra ākāra adhyavasāyī bhinna ākāraḥ ced katham abhinnasya bhinna ākāra tā iti vāsanā prapañcaḥ api anena eva nirastaḥ 
[115,12]	atha yugapad utpanna aneka jñānānām eka upādāna janya tvena anyonya saṃvedya tvam iṣyate tena aneka ākāra upalambhe eva citra pratibhāsaḥ iti na etat asti yadi hi jñānam jñāna antara ākāram svīkurvat upalabhyate tatas katham eka ākāram tad ākāra rahitam ca katham tatra asya saṃvedanam tadvat arthasya api syāt atadātma bhūtaḥ ced ākāraḥ saṃvedyate niṣprāmāṇikī eva ākāra kalpanā syāt iti 
[115,18]	astu tarhi citrā dvaitam na ca evam bāhyam tasya vivecyamānasya bhinna ātmanaḥ asambhavāt na ca jñānasya api vivecanam sambhavati na hi jñānena svayam ātmā vivicyate tasya abhinna ātma svarūpasya eva vedanāt na api jñāna antareṇa tasya api sva ātma saṃvedana mātra tvāt atha pūrva jñāna ākārāt apratibhāsamānāt idānīm kevalaḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ anyaḥ iti vivecanam na pūrvasya parokṣa tvena asaṃvedanāt tad apratītau ca tatas aham bhinnam iti katham pratipadyate atha smṛtyā jñāyate na smṛteḥ apramāṇa tvāt anubhava janya tvena pramāṇam eva iti ced na tad janya tve pramāṇa abhāvāt na hi anubhavam aviditvā eva smṛtiḥ aanubhavāt aham utpannā a iti jānāti anubhava vedane tu anubhavaḥ eva syāt na smṛtiḥ iti etena anumāna ādi jñānam nirastam tasya api sva saṃvid niṣṭhatvāt na anya saṃvedane sāmarthyam asti anya vedane hi tad ākāra āpattau tat eva syāt iti tasmāt aśakya vivecana tvāt grāhya grāhaka nīla ādi ākāra citra buddhiḥ ekā eva iti siddham citrā dvaitam pramāṇa tvena ittham svabhāvasya upalambhāt virodhaḥ api na asti iti 
[116,7]	atra ucyate saṃkhyā ekāntā siddhiḥ kāraṇa anupapatti upapattibhyām iti anena eva sūtreṇa sarvasya api advaita vādasya nirasta tvāt anupapattiḥ tathā ca etat uttaratra prapañcayiṣyāmaḥ kintu etāvat iha paryanuyujyate yadi citrā t vaitavādaḥ eva abhipretaḥ bhavataḥ tadā kim artham veda nirākaraṇe mahā prayāsaḥ tatra api hi bodha svabhāvaḥ ekaḥ eva ātmā viśva ākāraḥ iti parama arthaḥ tathā ca sarvam khalu idam brahma iti jñāna ghanaḥ eva ayam puruṣaḥ iti ekam eva idam na dvitīyam iti ca śrutiḥ etasya eva veda arthasya niścaya artham idam śāstram iti evam eva bhavataḥ api vaktum yuktam śārīraka ādi śāstra kāra vat na tu tad aprāmāṇyam vaktum nyāyyam tad abhinna artha tvena tvad śāstrasya api aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt iti syāt etat 
[117,3^1]	citra ākāra tā api pratipattum aśakya tvāt avāstavī eva tathā hi sva saṃviditam jñānam sva saṃvedana ākāra vedanaḥ eva nimagna tvāt na ākāra antara vedanam tad vedane api kaḥ virodhaḥ iti ced svarūpa para rūpā sambhavaḥ eva tat dhi vedanam svarūpeṇa ākāra antaram vetti iti na yuktam svarūpasya sva ātmani vyavasthānāt svarūpe niviṣṭam yat rūpam tat sva abhimukham eva katham param vetti anya abhimukham tat iti ced tena tarhi sva ātmā na pratīyate tatas santāna antara vedana vat na dvaya pratītiḥ yasya tad ā abhimukhya dvayam saḥ ekaḥ eva iti ced dvayam etat iti kaḥ pratipattimān saḥ eva iti ced punar ābhimukhya dvayam sva saṃvedanam ca tṛtīyam prasajyate 
[117,3^2]	tatas traya vedane aparaḥ ātma abhyupagantavyaḥ tasya ābhimukhya trayam sva saṃvedanam ca caturtham prasajyate punar aparaḥ punar aparaḥ iti mahatī anartha paraṃparā syāt tasmāt ekam eva vedanam tatra bheda avabhāse upaplavaḥ eva iti jñānam api svarūpeṇa apratipannam asat eva iti śūnyatā eva avaśiṣyate na hi tad anyā pratipatrā tad rūpa parāvṛttam śakyam pratipattum na ca āvedanāt vyāvṛtta tvānavagama vedanam iti vyavasthāpayitum śakyam iti tat uktam idam vastu bala āyātam yat vadanti vipaścitaḥ yathā yathārthāḥ cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā iti 
[117,19]	yadi svayam eva arthānām etat abhipretam yat vicāryamāṇaḥ nivartate iti tatas kim atra vayam kurmaḥ na ca avicāritam vastu nyāya vādinā pratibhāsa mātreṇa abhyupagantum yuktam svapna ādi arthasya api abhyupagama prasaṅgāt iti katham tarhi para pakṣa vyudāsena pratyakṣa ādi svarūpa pratipādanam uktam atra sāṃvyāvahārikasya ityādi tasmāt iha sarva dharma śūnyam pratibhāsa mātram advaitam na brahmādvaita ādi tulyam iti 
[118,5^1]	tat etat api ayuktam yatas vede api ekam eva idam iti avadhāraṇāt na citra tvam vastutas pariṇāmi tvam vā abhipretam yathā bhavatām sāṃvyāvahārika mātreṇa sa ākāra tva kṣaṇika tva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ uktāḥ tathā vede api nitya tva vyāpaka tva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ iti yathā ca bhavatā anya vyāvṛtti mukhena ca advaitam uktam tathā vede api agandham arasam arūpam ityādinā uktam iti atha na kiṃcid api asti iti śūnyam abhipretam tat ayuktam sva vacana uccāraṇa virodhāt upaplavaḥ eva uccāraṇam iti ced tathā api yena yat ca upaplūyate tat asti eva anyathā hi tamaḥ akāśyam eva idam sarvam syāt iti yadi nāma asti kiṃcid tatas kim nanu veda nirākaraṇam na karttavyam tatra api vidyā vidyayoḥ pratipādanāt atha vede anya nirākaraṇena advaitam pratītam atra punar anyat na vidhīyate na pratiṣidhyate api tu bheda pratibhāsasya mithyātva pratipādanāt eva advaitam iti 
[118,5^2]	tat ayuktam yāvat dhi bhedaḥ na pratiṣidhyate tāvat tad pratibhāsasya katham mithyātva pratipādanam nanu parāmarśāt eva bheda vedanam atathyam tathā hi sva para vedanam yadi bheda vedanam tadā sva saṃvedanam para vedanam ca iti uktam syāt tathā ca sva saṃvedanam sva ātma niṣṭham para vedanam api parasya sva ātma niṣṭham iti na ekam api bheda vedanam atha nīla pīta ādi vedanam bheda vedanam tat api asat yatas nīla vedanam nīla ātma niṣṭham pīta vedanam pīta ātma niṣṭham iti sarvam vedanam sva saṃvedanam eva iti kim atra bheda vedanam atha aneka nīla ādi artha viṣayam ekam vedanam bheda vedanam tathā api tat eva nīla vedanam tat eva pīta vedanam iti abhinna vedanasya eva paryāya abhidhāna mātram syāt na ca abhinna vedanāt bhinna vyavasthā yuktā atiprasaṅgāt tasmāt na bheda praibhāsaḥ samyak iti 
[118,24^1]	tat etat ākāśa carvaṇam iva saugata abhidhānam asambaddham eva pratibhāti tathā hi bheda pratibhāsaḥ tāvat sarveṣām bhavati tasya asatya tā kutas pratīyate kim tatas eva pratibhāsāt uta pratibhāsā antarāt iti tatas eva iti na yuktam tasya bheda viṣaya tvāt na hi bhinnāḥ ete arthāḥ iti pratibhāsaḥ sva ātmanaḥ asatya tām niścinoti tad niścaye hi viparyayāt pravṛttiḥ na syāt atha jñāna antareṇa asatya tvam niścīyate tat api jñāna antaram sva saṃvedana niyatam katham anyasya asatya tvam vetti atha ubhaya viṣayam katham na bheda avagatiḥ ubhaya viṣaya tve api na bheda avagatiḥ iti sva vacana virodhaḥ 
[118,24^2_119,15]	para abhyupagamena abhidhānāt avirodhaḥ iti ced sa para abhyupagamaḥ kim sva abhyupagama abhedena avagataḥ atha bhedena iti yadi abhedena avagataḥ tadā asau sva abhyupagamaḥ eva syāt atha bhedena avagataḥ tad avasthaḥ eva virodhaḥ loka vyavahāra anuvādaḥ eṣaḥ iti ced na sa khalu loka vyavahāraḥ tattva dṛṣṭeḥ artha antaram anartha antaram vā iti yadi na artha antaram tatas tattva dṛṣṭiḥ eva loka vyavahāraḥ tatas tad vyavahārāt eva bheda siddhiḥ atha tattva dṛṣṭeḥ artha antaram loka vyavahāraḥ tatas katham na bhedaḥ upaplavaḥ eṣaḥ iti ced saḥ api tattva darśanāt bhinnaḥ atha abhinnaḥ iti pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ sāṃvṛtaḥ asti bhedaḥ iti api na yuktam saṃvṛtiḥ api tattva dṛṣṭeḥ anyān anyā vā iti anivṛttaḥ prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt advaita vādinām varam maunam jyāyaḥ punar api advaitam vistareṇa nirākariṣyāmaḥ 
[119,19]	sva saṃvedana vādī tāvat anuyujyate vedya vedana bheda adhyavasāyasya mithyātvam kena niścīyate na tāvat tena eva tasya bheda niścaya rūpa tvāt na api jñāna antareṇa jñānasya jñāna antara viṣaya tva anabhyupagamāt abhyupagame vā grāhya grāhaka vaidhuryāt iti ayam hetuḥ asiddhaḥ syāt atha bhrāntyā jñānasya jñāna antara viṣaya tvam na bhrānteḥ apramāṇa tvāt etat ca anumāne pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ 
[119,24^1]	kā ca iyam bhrāntiḥ kim su a ākāra grahaṇa mātram kim vā anyatra su ākāra āropaṇam uta sva ātmani anya ākāra āropaṇam iti na tāvat su a ākāra grahaṇa mātram bhrāntiḥ sarva jñānānām bhrānta tva prasaṅgāt na api anyatra su ākāra āropaṇam bhrāntiḥ tat anyasmin adṛṣṭe su a ākāra āropaṇā sambhavāt na hi sarvathā anupalabdhe arthe kasyacid ākārasya āropaṇam dṛṣṭam atha sva ātmani anya ākāra āropaṇam bhrāntiḥ tatra api kim dṛṣṭa ākāra āropaṇam atha adṛṣṭa ākāra āropaṇam iti dṛṣṭa ākāra āropaṇam tāvat na yuktam mithyā ākārasya adṛṣṭa tvāt 
[119,24^2]	na hi bhavatām mate grāhya grāhaka bheda adhyavasāyasya mithyātvam kvacid adhyakṣeṇa upalabdham yat ākāra āropaṇam jñāna antare syāt atha adṛṣṭa ākāra āropaṇam tat na adṛṣṭa ākāra āropaṇa adarśanāt sarvatra hi bhrāntau dṛṣṭasya eva pīta ādi ākārasya saṃkhā ādau āropaṇam dṛśyate candra ādiṣu api dvi tva ādi dharmasya anyatra dṛṣṭasya eva āropaṇam iti yadi ca adṛṣṭa ākāra āropaṇam bhrāntiḥ tadā sā dvi candra ādi bhrānti vat tad ākāra avisaṃvādinī na syāt tatas ca grāhya grāhaka bheda adhyavasāyasya mithyā tva jñānam apramāṇam eva syāt tad aprāmāṇye ca grāhya grāhaka bheda adhyavasāyaḥ samyak eva iti 
[119,24^3]	bāhya artha bhrāntau api sarvathā anupalabdhau bāhya artha ākāraḥ katham āropyate na hi rāja kośa ratna viśeṣa ākāraḥ atad darśinā kvacid āropitaḥ dṛśyate api ca bhrāntau bāhya artha ākāraḥ kim jñāna antareṇa āropyate atha sā eva tad ākāra iti jñāna antareṇa tāvat na āropyate tad aviṣaya tvāt na hi aviṣaye rasa ādiṣu iva cakṣuṣā kaścid ākāraḥ kenacid āropyate na ca tvad mate jñānam jñāna antarasya viṣayaḥ atha bhrāntiḥ eva tad ākāra iti na abhinna ātmanaḥ bhinna an eka ākāra virodhāt atha avidyamānā eva aneka ākāra tā avabhāti na sarva śūnyata avakāśa prasaṅgāt tatra ca doṣaḥ uktaḥ 
[119,24^4]	asat khyātivādaḥ ca syāt sa ca bhavataḥ sva kṛtānta virodhī atha aneka ākāra tvam jñānasya eva svabhāvaḥ iṣyate na ca ātmīyena eva svarūpeṇa kasyacid virodhaḥ iti nanu evam tarhi kim samasta maryādā atikrameṇa varam bāhya arthasya eva tad rūpam iṣyatām tad abhyupagame hi na loka virodhaḥ na yukti virodhaḥ iti na hi dharma dharmiṇoḥ ekatvam abhyupagacchata ekasya aneka ākāra tva virodhaḥ parihartum śakyate sarva jagat svabhāva abhyupagame api ekasya virodha abhāva prasaṅgāt tasmāt aneka dharma adhikaraṇam ekam eva avayavinaḥ rūpam iti abhyupagame na kaścid virodhaḥ asti 
[121,2^1]	yat ca idam uktam dhiyā vivicyamānasya bāhyasya asambhavāt na tu jñānasya vivecanam sambhavati iti tat aparyālocita abhidhānam sva saṃvedana pakṣe hi jñānam tāvat upalabdhi yogya tvāt kadācid vivecayitum śakyate bāhyam punar atyanta anupalambha svabhāvam katham vivecyate na hi adṛṣṭvā rāja antaḥpura ābharaṇa ādikam vivecayitum śakyate jñānāka ākārasya bāhya tvena abhimatasya dṛśya tvāt vivecana upapattiḥ iti ced kim tad vivecanāt tasya eva abhāvaḥ atha anyasya iti tasya eva iti na yuktam jñānasya nirākāra tva prasaṅgāt tatas ca citra eka tva virodhaḥ na api anyasya abhāvaḥ anya vivecane hi anya abhāva siddhau trailokya abhāvaḥ syāt atha tasya eva jñānāt artha antara tvam niṣidhyate na aprastuta tvāt na atra jñānāt artha antara tva anartha antara tvam vā prastutam kin tu citra ākāra tā katham ekasya iti prastutam 
[121,2^2]	tatra jñānāt artha antara tve citra ākāra tāyāḥ sutarām anupapattiḥ iti uktam atha bāhyasya anekaiḥ puruṣaiḥ vivecanāt anupapattiḥ jñānam punar sva saṃvedana mātra tvāt aneka ākāram ātmānam viditvā nivṛttam kena vivecyate tat ayuktam jñānasya jñāna antara aviṣaya tve hi advaita vādaḥ eva syāt kathaṃcid viṣaya tve vā tathā eva vivecanam api iti katham vivecana anupapattiḥ bāhyasya anekaiḥ puruṣaiḥ vivecanāt anupapattiḥ iti iti etat api vyāhata tvāt ayuktam yasya hi aneka puruṣa jñāna viṣaya tvam tasya kutas asattvam bhrāntitaḥ tasya aneka puruṣa jñāna viṣaya tvam iti ced bhrāntam tarhi vivecanam tatas apramāṇa tvāt na asattva sādhakam bhrāntiḥ api artha sambandhataḥ pramā iti ced tat ayuktam bāhya arthena hi bhrānteḥ sambandha abhāvāt tad sambandhe vā na tasya asattvam iti 
[121,21]	api ca kim avayavi buddhyā avayavī vivecyate atha avayava buddhyā iti na tāvat avayavibuddhyā iti vivecyamānasya avayavinaḥ asattvam sidhyati tasyāḥ tad sattva gṛhīti rūpa tvāt nīla ādi buddhi vat yadi punar tad sattva buddhyā tat asattvam vyavasthāpyate tadā tad asattva buddhyā tat sattvam vyavasthāpyate iti syāt tatas sādhvī vyavasthitiḥ atha tad asattva buddhyā vivecyamānasya tasya asattvam bhavatu evam yatra tad asattva buddhiḥ abhrāntā asti na sarvatra ghaṭa ādi asattva buddhiḥ bhavati tatas na sarvatra asattva siddhiḥ atha avayava buddhyā vivecyamānasya tasya asattvam tat api ayuktam yatas avayava buddhiḥ avayavānām eva sattvam vidhatte na avayavinaḥ sattvam vidhātum pratiṣeddhum vā śaknoti tad aviṣaya tvāt tasyāḥ 
[122,5^1]	atha avayaveṣu upalabhyamāneṣu avayavī na upalabhyate tatas asau na asti eva iti evam tarhi gandha sparśa rūpeṣu upalabhyamāneṣu rasaḥ na upalabhyate puruṣa antara ajñānam ca tatas tayoḥ api abhāvaḥ prāpnoti indriya antareṇa rasasya puruṣa antareṇa tat jñānasya ca upalambhāt na abhāvaḥ iti ced evam tarhi avayavinaḥ api upalambha antareṇa upalambhāt na abhāvaḥ tathā hi bhinna ākāra pratibhāsaḥ avayaveṣu eva bhavati avayavini tu abhinna ākāraḥ pratibhāsaḥ iti abhinna indriya viṣaya tvāt na bhedaḥ iti ced na nīla pīta ādibhiḥ anaikāntāt api ca indriyāṇām eva katham bhedaḥ pratibhāsa bhedāt iti ced saḥ eva anyatra api astu kim indriya bheda upanyāsena atha avayavī yadi asti kim iti avayava vyāvṛttaḥ kasyacid api na pratibhāti 
[122,5^2]	kaḥ evam āha mama eva tāvat pratibhāti bhrāntiḥ eṣā tava iti ced tathā eva abheda pratipattiḥ bhrāntiḥ sarva loka vyavahāra avisaṃvādinī khalu eṣā mama pratītiḥ bahubhiḥ tantubhiḥ ayam ekaḥ paṭaḥ niṣpāditaḥ iti katham bhrāntiḥ syāt tathā utpādaḥ api kṣaṇa bhaṅga niṣedhāt anupapatteḥ tasmāt na vivecanāt abhāvaḥ avayavinaḥ etena tantu apakarṣaṇena paṭa buddhiḥ anupapannā iti nirastam yadi hi tantūnām viśleṣaṇam apakarṣaṇam vivakṣitam tatas saṃyoga vināśāt abhāvaḥ tasya iṣyate eva na ca yasya pradhvaṃsaḥ tasya atyanta asattvam jñānasya api atyanta asattva prasaṅgāt buddhyā apakarṣaṇam tu vivecanena abhinna artha tvāt tad niṣedhena eva niṣiddham iti 
[122,22]	yat api sva saṃvedana mātra siddhi artham su a abhimukhyam parābhimukhyam ca iti ādikam uktam tatra jñānasya sva saṃvedya tvam na asti iti vakṣyāmaḥ tena su a ābhimukhyam na iṣyate parābhimukhyam jñāna dharmaḥ abhyupagamyate eva yasya viṣaya viṣayi bhāva saṃjñā tad avedane api arthasya vedanāt anavasthā api na asti dharma dharmiṇoḥ ca bhedāt na dharma bhede dharmiṇaḥ api bhedaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ yatas ca abhinne api jñāne nīla pīta ādayaḥ aneka arthāḥ kecid avabhānti tasmāt idam api ayuktam na ca abhinna vedanāt bhinna artha vyavasthā yuktā atiprasaṅgāt iti tasmāt ekasya api jñānasya aneka artha vedane kaḥ api na doṣaḥ iti 
[123,8^1]	yat api avayavi nirākaraṇe vṛtti anupapattiḥ iti uktam tatra kim idam svatantra sādhanam atha prasaṅga āpādanam iti svatantra sādhanam tāvat na yuktam na hi bhavatām pakṣe kasyacid api kārtsnyena eka deśena vā kvacid vṛttiḥ asti iti atas vṛtti anupapatteḥ sarvasya api abhāvaḥ prāpnoti na api prasaṅga sādhanam pradīpa prabhāvat vyāpti asambhavāt vyāpti abhyupagame vā pradīpa vat eva na kṛtsna eka deśābhyām avayavi vṛtteḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ vyāpaka abhāva siddhau hi vyāpya abhāva siddhiḥ yuktā na ca atyanta anupalabdhāyāḥ vṛtteḥ vyāpaka tvam śakyam avagantum tat katham vṛtti abhāvāt avayavinaḥ asattvam 
[123,8^2]	kvacid vyāpaka tva avagame api na avayavinaḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ pareṇa vṛtteḥ avayavi vyāpaka tva abhyupagamāt iti ced tat ayuktam evam hi pareṇa mūlaprakṛteḥ aśeṣa kārya vyāpaka tva abhyupagamāt tat nivṛttau sarvasya api bodha ābodha svabhāvasya kāryasya abhāvaḥ syāt na ca paraiḥ avayavinaḥ kṛtsna eka deśābhyām vṛttiḥ abhyupagatāḥ iti atas para abhyupagama virodha udbhāvanam api na upapadyate bhinneṣu avayaveṣu abhinnaḥ avayavī samavāya vṛttya eva vartate iti para abhyupagamaḥ samavāyaḥ asya asti iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[123,21]	vaṃśaḥ api stambheṣu saṃyoga vṛttyā vartate na eka deśena eka deśasya āvṛtti tvāt katham tarhi vaṃśa stambheṣu eka deśena vartate iti pratītiḥ na iyam durghaṭā deśaḥ avayavinaḥ khalu avayavaḥ tena ekena avayavena saha saṃyuktam ca saṃpaśyataḥ tathā pratītiḥ iti na punar eka deśaḥ eva vṛttiḥ vṛtti hetuḥ vā paramāṇu ākāśa ādeḥ saṃyoga abhāva prasaṅgāt tatas sarva kārya anutpādaḥ eva syāt iti 
[124,3]	atha yat ekam tat ekatra eva vartate yathā rūpam iti atas avayavi ādeḥ ekatvam abhyupagacchata aneka vṛtti tvam na abhyupagantavyam iti na tulya pramāṇa siddha tvāt yatas eva pramāṇāt rūpasya eka vṛtti tvam siddham tatas eva avayavi ādeḥ aneka vṛtti tvam siddham kim na iṣyate yathā vā rūpa āśrayasya anekaiḥ gandha rasa ādibhiḥ saha samavāyaḥ tathā avayavi ādeḥ api aneka āśrayaiḥ saha iti kaḥ atra virodhaḥ 
[124,8^1]	nanu ca vṛkṣe śākhā gavi śṛṅgam iti sarveṣām pratītiḥ tat katham avayavānām āśraya tvam iti na anyathā tad pratīteḥ vṛkṣa ādi a vayavini yathā avasthite tad adhas tanava yava sambandha pratibandhāt apatanam śākhā ādi avayavam paśyatām vṛkṣa ādau tad āśraya tva buddhiḥ bhavati avayavānām tu āśraya tvam teṣu satsu eva avayavinaḥ avasthitiḥ asatsu ca abhāvaḥ eva iti etena rūpa ādīnām api dravya āśrita tvam vyākhyātam tad darśanāt nityānām api āśrita tvam kalpyate tathā sāmānyānām nityānām api piṇḍeṣu eva upalambhāt na vyavahāra viṣaya tvam na asatsu piṇḍeṣu iti atas tad āśrita tvam vyavahriyate 
[124,8^2]	tasmāt syāt ādhāraḥ jala ādīnām gamana pratibandhanaḥ agatīnām kim ādhāraiḥ guṇa sāmānya karmaṇām iti etat api aparyālocita artha abhidhānam na hi guru tva pratibandhakaḥ eva ādhāraḥ loke prasiddhaḥ kintu anyathā api yathā darpaṇe mukham śarīre duḥkha ādayaḥ khaṅge dīptiḥ iti tasmāt avayavi ādeḥ tāvat ekasya anekaiḥ saha dravyasya ekasya rūpa ādibhiḥ anekaiḥ iva sambandha viśeṣaḥ yatnena sādhyate tatra ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ yathāsambhavam kalpyatām iti 
[125,8]	atha rūpa ādīnām api dravye samavāyaḥ na iṣyate kim āśrayaḥ tarhi ayam prasaṅgaḥ yat ekam tat ekatra eva vartate iti api ca rūpam rūpa antaram utpādayati kim sarva ātmanātha eka deśena iti yadi rūpa antara utpādane sarva ātmanā rūpam paryavasitam tadā asya jñāna ādi janaka tvam na syāt na hi tasya ātma bhedaḥ asti na api eka deśena nirbhāgasya deśa abhāvāt deśasya eva janakatva prasaṅgāt ca jñānam api kim sarva ātmanā rūpāt utpannam uta eka deśena iti sarva ātmanā ced rūpāt utpannam jñāna antarāt utpannam tarhi na prāpnoti na api eka deśena tasya deśa abhāvāt 
[125,15]	vijñāna mātra vādinaḥ na ayam prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na tatra api ekasya jñānasya aneka jñāna janya tve aneka jñāna janaka tve aneka ākāra vedaka tve ca prasaṅgaḥ na nivarttate tad anabhyupagame ca advaitam eva syāt tatra ca uktam doṣa jālam vakṣyate ca etena adhipati pratyaya samanantara pratyaya bhāvaḥ api anupapannaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tasmāt vṛtti vikalpena avayavinam nirākurvataḥ sva śāstra arthaḥ api nivartate iti ekasya eva jñānasya tādṛś tva bhāvaḥ ced avayavinaḥ api tarhi tathābhūtaḥ svabhāvaḥ samāna yogakṣema tvāt na paryanuyojyaḥ yaḥ ca ubhayoḥ samaḥ doṣaḥ parihāraḥ ca tad samaḥ na ekaḥ paryanuyojyaḥ syāt tādṛś artha vicāraṇe 
[126,6^1]	itas tarhi na avayavī pṛthak asti avayava agrahe tad agrahāt iti yasya agrahe yat na gṛhyate tat na pṛthak asti yathā candra agrahe candra antaram iti na ayam hetuḥ anaikāntika tvāt tathā hi kṛttikā antara agrahaṇe kṛtikā antaram na gṛhyate atha ca bhinnāḥ kṛttikāḥ santi asiddha tvāt ca hetoḥ tathā hi dūrāt tantu ādi avayavānām agrahe api paṭa ādiḥ avayavī gṛhyate na ca tattva ādi rūpeṇa apratibhāsane api tantu ādi grahaṇam kalpayitum śakyam atiprasaṅgāt iti senā vana vat grahaṇam iti ced na atīndriya tvāt aṇūnām 
[126,6^2]	syāt matiḥ eṣā yathā hasti aśva ratha ādīnām vṛkṣāṇām ca dūrāt tad rūpa agrahaṇe api na tatas anyatra senā iti vanam iti ca grahaṇam tathā dūrāt tantu ādi rūpeṇa āgrahe api teṣu eva paṭa ādi buddhiḥ iti paramāṇu vyatiriktāḥ tantu ādayaḥ api avayavi anabhyupagamāt na vidyante katham teṣu api paṭa ādi buddhiḥ paramāṇuṣu eva iti ced na atīndriya tvāt aṇūnām na hi bhrāntiḥ api atīndriyeṣu indriyāt bhavitum arhati na hi cākṣuṣam jñānam rasa ādiṣu bhavati yathā ca paramāṇuṣu atīndriyeṣu indriya jam jñānam na bhrāntam na api abhra antam yuktam tathā tad gateṣu guṇa ādiṣu api iti 
[126,6^3]	avayava abhāvāt śabda sukha ādeḥ api utpattiḥ na bhavati iti tad grahaṇam api na syāt etat eva āha sarva agrahaṇam avayavi asiddheḥ iti keśa samūhe taimirika upalabdhi vat iti ced atha manuṣe yathā timira upahata cakṣuṣaḥ pratyekam na keśāḥ pratibhānti saṃhatāḥ tu pratibhānti eva tathā paramāṇavaḥ api iti yathā ca anupahata cakṣuṣaḥ pratyekam api keśāḥ pratibhānti tatas na sarvathā atīndriyāḥ tathā yoginaḥ paramāṇavaḥ pratyekam pratibhānti tatas te api na sarvathā atīndriyāḥ iti evam tarhi na kiṃcid atīndriyam asti iti prāptam sarveṣām yogi indriya viṣaya tvāt 
[126,6^4]	tatas sarve api arthāḥ paramāṇu vat asmad ādibhiḥ kadācid indriyeṇa upalabhyeran na ca upalabhyante tasmāt atīndriya tvāt adṛṣṭa ādi vat na asmad ādibhiḥ paramāṇavaḥ pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyante keśāḥ tu timira upahata cakṣuṣaḥ api na atīndriyāḥ keśa samūhaḥ ayam iti pratīteḥ na tu evam paramāṇu samūhaḥ ayam iti kasyacid pratītiḥ asti yadi ca sarvatra aṇu saṃghātaḥ eva dṛśyate tadā vṛkṣa saṃghāte vana pratipatti vat anekadhā jāti bheda pratipattiḥ na syāt samudāyinām bhinna ākāra tvāt tad samudāyeṣu anekadhā jāti bheda grahaṇam iti ced paṭa tantu ādīnām tarhi yadi anye samudāyinaḥ tatas siddham paṭa tantu ādīnām anya tvam 
[127,11]	atha yaḥ eva paṭasya samudāyinaḥ te eva tantu ādīnām iti katham tarhi jāti bheda upalabdhiḥ na hi senā samudāye api senā ādi lakṣaṇa upalabdhiḥ asti jāti pradveṣibhiḥ api tad sthāne vyāvṛtti bhedaḥ abhyupagataḥ saḥ api avayavi anabhyupagame na syāt na hi keśa puñjebhyaḥ tad samudāyaḥ vyāvṛttaḥ tantu paṭa vat pratibhāti artha kriyā bheda anurodhāt pratibhāsa bhedaḥ iti ced na tad adarśane api pratibhāsa bheda darśanāt 
[127,17]	yogya tā darśanāt iti ced kā anyā khalu yogyatā jāti bhedam muktvā abhinna āśraya asau yogyatā iti ced na tad avayaveṣu api paṭa ādi pratyaya prasaṅgāt tasyāḥ tatra adarśanāt iti ced atīndriyā tarhi sā yogyatā yena āśraye gṛhyamāṇe api na gṛhyate tatas ca na kadācid api paṭa ādi pratyayaḥ syāt samasta avayavaiḥ tad artha kriyā sādhyate tena samasta upalabdhau eva sā yogyatā upalabhyate iti ced na sarva avayavānām draṣṭum aśakya tvāt tasmāt avayavi sadbhāvāt eva jāti śabda grahaṇam yuktam tena vṛkṣa tva jāti upalabdhau tad āśraya samūhe vana saṃjñā saṃketāt vanam vanam iti pratyayaḥ api upapadyate tad nimitta abhāve hi saṃketaḥ api kartum na pāryate iti vana pratyayasya api abhāvaḥ syāt iti 
[127,26^1]	anye tu na abhinna pratyayaḥ kvacid bhinneṣu artheṣu asti iti manyamānāḥ senā ādi pratyayaḥ api bahu tva saṃkhyā viṣayaḥ iti āhuḥ sattā viṣayaḥ iti apare na tāvat senā ādi buddhau bahu tva saṃkhyā sattā ādikam vā pratibhāti abhinna pratibhāsā ani athā anupapattyā ced kalpyate paṭa ādi pratyayasya tarhi saṃkhyā ādiḥ eva viṣayaḥ astu tasya avayavi viṣaya tve api bādhaka abhāvāt iti ced sādhaka abhāve api katham tat viṣaya tvam avayava pratibhāsa vailakṣaṇyam eva sādhakam iti ced na saṃkhyā ādi viṣaya tve api tad vailakṣaṇya upapatteḥ tasmāt yathā paṭa ādi pratyayasya kriyā guṇa viśiṣṭa pratyaya sāmānādhikaraṇyāt na saṃkhyā ādi viṣaya tvam tathā senā ādi pratyayasya api 
[127,26^2]	tathā ca sūtra kṛtā senā vana ādi vat grahaṇam iti ca udyasya na senādiḥ api abhinna tvāt sainika ādibhyaḥ artha antara tvāt vā iti pratisamādhānam na uktam kintu na ati indriya tvāt aṇūnām iti uktam bhinneṣu abhinna vyavahāraḥ na bhavati iti bruvāṇasya sūtra virodhaḥ api syāt te vibhakti antāḥ padam iti antena na hi avayavāḥ api varṇāḥ ekam padam iti uktam yadi ca puṣpitam chidyate vanam mahatī gacchati senā iti evambhūtasya api pratyayasya guṇa kriyā eka artha samavāya nimitta tvena saṃkhyā ādi viṣaya tvam samarthyate tadā jāti padārtha vādī api śuklaḥ gauḥ gacchati ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇyam pratyāsatti viśeṣam āśritya samarthayitum śaknoti eva 
[127,26^3]	tatas ca vyakti ākṛti jātayaḥ tu padārthāḥ iti apramāṇam eva syat tasmāt guṇa kriyā āśrayaḥ eva senā ādi buddhau pratibhāti abhinna pratibhāsaḥ tu tatra bhrāntaḥ eva dūrāt bhedasya agrahaṇāt grāme vṛkṣāḥ iti pratibhāsa vat paṭa ādi pratyayaḥ api evam iti ced na vicārita tvāt yatra vā rūpa ādimati abhinna pratibhāsaḥ na bhrāntaḥ saḥ eva avayavi iti na ca sarvatra eva bhrānta tvam bheda grahaṇena hi abheda pratibhāsaḥ bādhyate na ca sarvatra abhinnasya agrahaṇe bheda grahaṇam api vāstavam yuktam bhedasya abhinna an eka āśraya tvāt paramāṇa avabheda grahaṇam iti ced na atīndriya tvāt 
[127,26^4]	api ca ete paṭa ādi pratyayāḥ paramāṇu viṣayāḥ mahat pratyayena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt ākāśa ādi pratyaya vat atas yatra api aṇu vyatirikte paṭa ādi pratyayaḥ saḥ avayavi iti paramāṇu dharmaḥ eva asau iti āhuḥ anye sa kim rūpa ādi yuktaḥ tad rahitaḥ vā yadi rūpa ādimān aṇu vyatiriktaḥ tadā na vivādaḥ kaścid kāryasya kāraṇa dharma tva avirodhāt atha rūpa ādi rahitaḥ tadā adhyakṣa virodhaḥ pratyakṣeṇa eva rūpa ādi upetasya paṭa ādeḥ upalambhāt sāṃkhya pakṣe api dharma dharmiṇoḥ abheda abhyupagamāt atīndriya dharmasya pratyakṣa tvam ayuktam pratyakṣa tve hi tat abhinnasya dharmiṇaḥ api pratyakṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ tādātmya viparyayaḥ vā iti 
[129,6]	dvau imau ghaṭau saṃyuktau iti ca pratītiḥ na bahavaḥ paramāṇavaḥ tad dharmaḥ vā iti tad devakula ādi pratyaya vat iti ced atha manyase yathā iṣṭaka ādīnām saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ eva devakulam prākāraḥ ca ucyate atha ca tatra rūpa ādi mantau devakula prākārau saṃyuktau iti evam pratyayaḥ bhavati tathā ghaṭa ādiṣu api iti na devakula ādeḥ api avayavi tva abhyupagamāt tamaḥ ariṇā tu sāṃkhya abhiprāyeṇa devakula ādi pratyayaḥ saṃyoga viṣayaḥ uktaḥ sarvathā bauddha pakṣe dṛṣṭāntaḥ na upapadyate iti jñāpana artham na ca sarva vyākhyātṛ matā virodhena śāstram vyākhyātum śakyate sarva śāstreṣu viruddha abhiprāya vyākhyātṛ bheda sambhavāt anyaḥ anya vyākhyātṝṇām doṣa pratipādanāt tasmāt pramāṇa virodhaḥ eva yatnena pariharttavyaḥ prākāra ādeḥ khalu saṃyoga ātmaka tvena kevalam pūrva ukta pratyayaḥ na sambhavati abhinna pratyayaḥ na syāt iṣṭakā ādi saṃyogānām bahu tvāt iti 
[129,17]	nanu ca samāna jātīyānām eva dravya ārambhaka tvāt katham vijātīyaiḥ kā aṣṭa iṣṭaka ādibhiḥ ārabdhasya devakula ādeḥ avayavi tvam pramāṇa viruddham na bhavati iti na vijātīyānām api śarīra ārambhaka tva darśanāt kathaṃcid teṣām samāna jātīya tve kāṣṭha iṣṭaka ādīnām api pārthiva tva ādi rūpeṇa samāna jātīya tvam astu kim atra aviruddham nanu ca pārthiva ādi rūpa tve api tantu vīraṇa ādīnām kim iti paṭa ārambhaka tvam na asti nanu kevalānām api vīraṇānām samāna jātīyānām kim iti paṭa ādi anārambhaka tvam asāmarthyāt iti ced asāmarthyam eva tarhi vācyam na vijātīya tvam raju ādi ārambhe tu tantu vīraṇa ādīnām api sāmarthyam asti tasmāt samāna jātīyānām vā yatra kārye anvaya vyatirekābhyām sāmarthyam avadhāritam tad kārya ārambhaka tvam abhyanujñeyam na ayam ekānta āgrahaḥ karaṇīyaḥ samāna jātīyānām eva ārambhaka tvam iti 
[129,27]	nanu evam pañcānām api bhūtānām eka kārya ārambhaka tve api avirodhaḥ syāt bhavatu yadi tathābhūtam kāryam upalabhyate tat kāryam eva na paśyāmaḥ iti na abhyanujñāyate nanu śarīram pañca ātmakam asti na tasya pañca nimitta tvena pañca ātmaka tva upacārāt na tu pañca samavāyi tvena tathā hi vyāpaka tvāt asparśa tvāt ca ākāśasya tāvat dravya ārambhaka tvam eva na asti tad samavāyi kāraṇa tve śarīrasya vyāpaka tvam rūpa ādi vihīna tvam ca syāt vāyu janya tve api sparśa eka guṇa tvam tejaḥ janya tve api gandha rasa guru tva yogi tvam na syāt udaka janya tve ca gandhavat tvam na syāt viruddha rūpa ādi grahaṇam ca syāt avayavinaḥ avayava rūpa ādi anuvidhānāt atas na aneka bhūta janya tvam śarīrasya pratyakṣataḥ ca pārthiva avayavānām eva grahaṇāt kleda ūṣma ucchvāsa ādīnām ghaṭa ādiṣu iva saṃyukta samavetānām eva grahaṇāt iti 
[130,10]	evam jhaṣa ādi ārambhe api pārthivānām samavāyi kāraṇa tvam itareṣām tu nimitta tvam iti yadi tu citra rūpa ādi yuktam kāryam dṛśyate tadā tad avayavānām viruddha dharma kāraṇānām api eka kārya ārambhaka tvam iṣyate eva iti prāk uktam tat evam kāṣṭha iṣṭakā ādīnām devakula ādi ārambhe keṣāṃcid samavāyi kāraṇa tvam keṣāṃcid nimitta tvam sarveṣām vā samavāyi kāraṇa tvam yathādarśanam abhyupagantavyam tad siddham devakula ādeḥ api avayavi tvam iti 
[130,15^1]	grāma ādi lakṣaṇaḥ api avayavī tarhi abhyupagantavyaḥ satyam iti eke parasparam asaṃyuktānām gṛha ādīnām grāma ādi ārambhaka tvam ayuktam iti apare saṃyukta saṃyogena ārambhaka tve deśa antara avasthita avayavānām api ārambhaka tva prasaṅgāt tasmāt gṛha ādi samudāyeṣu eva grāma ādi vyavahāraḥ draṣṭavyaḥ pariṣad ādi vyavahāraḥ api etena eva vyākhyātaḥ paramāṇu samudāyeṣu ittham bhūtaḥ api vyavahāra bhedaḥ na sambhavati iti uktam prāk eva tasmāt asti avayavi iti yat api ṣaṭkena ityādi paramāṇu nirākaraṇa artham uktam tat api ayuktam tad kārya upalambhena eva bādhita tvāt na hi upādānakāraṇa abhāve kāryasya sattvam upalabhyate prasādhitam ca avayavinaḥ sattvam tasya upādānena avaśyam bhāvyam yat tasya mūlam upādānam sa paramāṇuḥ asya sāvayava tvam anupapannam sāvayava tve hi mūla tvam eva na syāt atha na asti eva mūla upādānam tathā api mūla abhāvāt sarvasya api abhāvaḥ syāt 
[130,15^2]	atha avayava paramparā sa avadhiḥ na iṣyate tathā api ananta avayatva aviśeṣe truṭi parvata ādeḥ parimāṇa guru tva viśeṣaḥ na syāt tasmāt alpataratamādeḥ asti avadhiḥ tasya kṣaṇika tva niṣedhāt akṛtaka tvam siddham na hi nirupādānasya tulya adhika parimāṇa upādānāt vā kasyacid utpattiḥ asti paramāṇoḥ ṣaṣ aṃśatā iti sva vacana virodhāt ayuktam mātā me vandhyā iti yathā yatas hi aṇutaram na asti sa paramāṇuḥ ucyate tasya kutas ṣaṣ aṃśa tā tad aṃśasya eva aṇutara tvāt aṃśavataḥ khalu upacāreṇa parama aṇu tvam mukhyaḥ tu niraṃśaḥ eva paramāṇuḥ iti ṣaṇṇām eka deśa tve api piṇḍaḥ syāt aṇu mātrakaḥ iti etat api ayuktam yatas avayava parimāṇāt avayavinaḥ parimāṇa atiśayaḥ dṛśyate tatas paramāṇu ārabdhasya api adhika parimāṇa tvam anumīyate tad parimāṇāt ca tad kāryasya adhika parimāṇa tvam iti katham aṇu mātraḥ eva piṇḍaḥ syāt iti 
[131,11_131,17]	yat ca uktam diś vibhāgena daśa aṃśa tā iti tat api ayuktam yatas anyasmin avadhi bhūte anyāni eva dravyāṇi digbhiḥ pravibhajyante yathā prayāgāt uttareṇa sthitaḥ himālayaḥ dakṣiṇena vindhyaḥ ityādi nanu ca avadhi bhūtasya api pravibhāgaḥ dṛśyate yathā asya ayam pūrvaḥ bhāgaḥ ayam paścimaḥ ayam dakṣiṇaḥ ayam ca uttaraḥ iti na tatra api avayava antara avadhi tvena avayava antarāṇām pravibhāga upapatteḥ niravayavaḥ ca paramāṇuḥ atas na tasya pūrva ādi diś vibhāga vikalpaḥ atha dravya antarebhyaḥ avadhi bhūtebhyaḥ sa paramāṇuḥ pūrvaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ paścimaḥ uttaraḥ ca iti vikalpyate tadā na kaścid virodhaḥ upādhi bhedena abhinne api vastuni vyapadeśa bheda darśanāt iti 
[132,2]	ākāśa vyatibhedāt iti api na yuktam nitya niravayavasya aśakya bhedāt atha yadi antar tasya ākāśam na asti tatas asarva gatam ākāśam prāpnoti iti na sarva gata svarūpa aparijñānāt tathā hi yasya abhinna ātmanaḥ sarva mūrtimadbhiḥ sambandhaḥ tat dravyam sarva gatam ucyate asti ca ākāśasya etat rūpam sarvatra śabda utpāda anumitam tasmāt tat api sarva gatam eva paramāṇu madhyena asambandhāt asarva gatam iti ced na tasya śaśa viṣāṇa vat atyanta abhāvāt na hi niraṃśasya ekasya bāhya antara bhāvaḥ asti yat ca asti mūrttam tena sarveṇa saṃyujyate iti katham asarva gatam tasmāt akṛtabuddhi vyāmohana mātram etat api iti evam ca avayavi a ādi sadbhāvāt grāhya grāhaka vaidhuryāt iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ 
[132,11^1]	yat api uktam saha upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ artha tad buddhyoḥ dvi candra ādi darśana vat iti tatra anaikāntika tvam tāvat asya hetoḥ tathā hi kṛttikānām saha upalambha niyamaḥ asti na ca abhedaḥ tad bhedasya sarva avisaṃvādena prasiddha tvāt yathā ca vicārayataḥ kṛttikānām vivekena upalambhaḥ tathā jñāna arthayoḥ api iti viruddhaḥ ca ayam hetuḥ saha śabda arthasya bhede sati eva sambhavāt na hi ekasmin eva saha arthaḥ kaścid asti bhrānti apekṣayā saha arthaḥ asti iti ced atha manuṣe bhrāntyā eva abhinnam api bhedena adhyavasīyate tad apekṣayā saha upalambhaḥ iti ucyate dvi candra upalambha vat vastu sthityā tu ekasya eva upalambhaḥ iti na tatra bhinna ākārasya āropitasya avabhāsanāt tena ca āropita ākāreṇa vastu bhūtasya ākārasya abheda sādhanam na yuktam 
[132,11^2]	na hi pīta ākāreṇa śaṅkha rūpasya abhedaḥ sambhavati tathā hi bhinna ākāra tā tatra vidyamānā vā pratibhāti avidyamānā vā iti ubhayathā api abheda sādhana virodhaḥ paramārthataḥ hi bhinna ākāra tā yayoḥ tayoḥ abhedaḥ kutas apāramārthikī ced bhinna ākāra tā tasyāḥ parama arthena saha abhedaḥ katham bhinna ākāra tvena upalabhyamānayoḥ eva abhedaḥ sādhyate nanu bhinna ākāra tāyāḥ tasyāḥ tuccha rūpa tvāt iti ced tathā api anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ yatas artha antara bhūtā api bhinna ākāra tā bodha ākāreṇa saha eva upalabhyate tad anartha antara tve vā tad ātma bhūtasya bodha ākārasya api tuccha ātmaka tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ekena eva upalambhāt iti ayam api hetu arthaḥ asiddha tvāt ayuktaḥ arthasya aneka puruṣaiḥ upalabhyamāna tvāt iti 
[133,9]	yaḥ api āha saha upalambha niyamāt iti asya ayam arthaḥ ekasya eva upalambhāt iti tena api vaktavyam kim jñānasya eva upalambhāt uta arthasya eva iti yadi jñānasya eva upalambhāt tadā tasya anupalabhyamānena arthena saha katham abhedaḥ trailokyena api abheda prasaṅgāt tad ātmanā eva tasya abheda sādhane vyarthaḥ hetuḥ tatra vivāda abhāvāt etena arthasya eva upalambhāt iti pratyuktam asiddha tvam ca jñānasya arthasya ca upalambhāt iti atha artha upalambha kāle jñānam na upalabhyate jñāna upalambha kāle vā na arthaḥ tena ekasya upalambhaḥ siddhyati tathā api sva siddhānta virodhaḥ para pakṣa abhyupagamaḥ ca prasajyeta 
[133,17^1]	atha jñāna arthayoḥ ekaḥ eva upalambhaḥ tatas eka upalambhāt na bheda vyavasthitiḥ sa tarhi tayoḥ kim bheda grāhī vā na vā yadi na bheda grāhī tad abhedāt katham jñāna arthayoḥ iti ucyate bheda grāhī ced katham tatas na bhedavyasthā iti dvi candra ādi jñāna vat iti ced na tatra āropita ākāreṇa abheda anupapatteḥ iti ukta tvāt kutas ca jñāna arthayoḥ ekaḥ eva upalambhaḥ siddhyati nanu uktam apratyakṣa upalambhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhi ati iti kā iyam artha dṛṣṭeḥ prasiddhiḥ kim utpattiḥ āhosvit upalabdhiḥ kaḥ ca upalambhaḥ api yasya artha pratyakṣa tve sati artha dṛṣṭiḥ na prasiddhyati kim sā eva artha dṛṣṭiḥ uta tad janakam jñānam iti tat yadi sā eva artha dṛṣṭiḥ upalambhaḥ tasya apratyakṣa tve sati utpattiḥ na sambhavati iti tat ayuktam utpāde hi sati paścāt artha dṛṣṭeḥ pratyakṣa tvam yuktam na pūrvam eva na hi pratyakṣeṇa paścāt utpattiḥ iti ayam kramaḥ kvacid upalabhyate 
[133,17^2]	atha artha dṛṣṭi janakam jñānam upalambhaḥ tasya apratyakṣa tve artha dṛṣṭiḥ na utpadyate iti tat ayuktam cakṣuḥ ādi vat apratyakṣasya api utpāda jaka tva sambhavāt tīvra sparśa ādinā suṣupta prabodhe pūrva jñānā saṃvedanāt ca na ca artha dṛṣṭeḥ pratyakṣa upalambha janya tve api artha jñānayoḥ eka upalambha niyamaḥ siddhyati atha artha dṛṣṭeḥ prasiddhiḥ upalabdhiḥ tathā api ayam vākya arthaḥ bhavati aapratyakṣa upalambhasya na artha upalambhaḥ pratyakṣa ha iti na vā tena kiṃcid sādhitam bhavati atha dṛśyate iti dṛṣṭiḥ arthaḥ eva tatas ca apratyakṣa upalambhasya arthaḥ api pratyakṣaḥ na bhavati iti ayam vākya arthaḥ na upalambhāt artha antara tvāt na ca ekasya apratyakṣa tve tad anyasya apratyakṣa tvam nyāyyam atiprasaṅgāt atha upalambhasya apratyakṣa tve sati arthaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti evam pratītiḥ na bhavati etat asmākam api abhimatam anāgṛhītam viśeṣaṇam viśiṣṭa pratītau nimittam iti a na ca sarvatra darśana viśiṣṭaḥ eva arthaḥ gṛhyate śuklaḥ gacchati gauḥ iti na atra gaḥ darśanam anubhūyate api tu guṇa kriyā viśiṣṭaḥ gauḥ eva upalabhyate 
[135,6^1]	nanu atra uktam na hi viṣaya sattayā viṣaya upalambhaḥ kim tarhi tad upalambha sattayā iti tatas kim nanu uktam sā ca aprāmāṇikī na sattā nibandhanān vyavahārān anuruṇaddhi iti kaḥ asya vākyasya arthaḥ kim apratītāyāḥ sattāyāḥ vyavahāra mātram pravarttaka tvam api na asti uta sva viśiṣṭa vyavahāra pravarttaka tvam na asti iti na tāvat ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ apratītāya api cakṣuḥ ādi sattātaḥ rūpa ādau jñāna abhidhānām nayana ādi vyavahārāṇām pravṛtti darśanāt tat apratītau tatas amī vyavahārāḥ pravṛttāḥ iti kutas avagamaḥ iti ced tad vyavahāra darśanāt eva aṅkura duḥkha ādi darśanāt bīja ādi dharma ādi niścaya vat atha apratīta sattvasya tad viśiṣṭa vyavahāra pravarttaka tvam na sambhavati iti na atra vivādaḥ kim tu sarvatra tad viśiṣṭa vyavahārān upalambhāt na avaśyam artha upalambhasya upalambhaḥ iti tad aprasiddhau viṣayasya aprasiddhiḥ iti ced kim atra kāraṇam 
[135,6^2]	na hi tad upalambhaḥ sva viṣayam liṅga vat sādhayati yena tad aprasiddhau viṣayasya api aprasiddhiḥ syāt kim tarhi tad gṛhīta rūpa tayā utpādana mātreṇa tam viṣaya vyavahāra yogyam karoti tad aprasiddhau api viṣayaḥ prasiddhaḥ eva iti ucyate tad upalambhasya api uttara kālam pratyakṣataḥ vā anumānataḥ vā adhigamaḥ iṣyate na ca evam aniṣṭa āpattiḥ sarvasya upalambhasya vedanā anabhyupagamāt yaḥ eva upalambhaḥ saṃvedyate tasya saṃvedanam jñāna antaram ucyate na punar aviditaḥ na asti eva upalambhaḥ sva kāryam vā na karoti iti etāvat tu yuktam yāvat na vedyate tāvat asti iti vyavahartum na śakyate dahana ādi vat iti na ca avidite dahana ādau tad kāryasya dhūma ādeḥ anutpattiḥ apratipattiḥ vā iti tat evam agni ādi vat asaṃviditāt eva upalambhāt tad nimittasya viṣaya smaraṇa abhidhāna nayana ādi lakṣaṇasya kāryasya sambhavāt na tad uparodhena sva saṃvedanam abhyupagantavyam 
[135,26_136,1]	yadi na sva saṃviditam jñānam aprakāśa ātmakam tarhi prāptam svayam aprakāśa ātmakam ca ghaṭa ādi vat anyasya api katham prakāśakam bhavet iti kim idam aprakāśa ātmaka tvam nāma kim bodhājanaka tvam uta aprabha tvam āhosvit abodha svabhāva tvam iti bodhā janaka tvam tāvat ayuktam cakṣuḥ ādeḥ asva saṃviditasya api bodha janaka tvāt atha aprabha tvam tatas tejaḥ vilakṣaṇa tvāt eva aprabha tvam abhāsvara rūpa tvam na sva saṃvidita tvāt iti atha ābodha svabhāva tvam prasajyate na aviditasya api svarūpa atyāgāt na hi yaḥ yasya svabhāvaḥ sa tasya asva saṃvedanāt eva nivarttayate iti 
[136,7]	sva saṃvedana abhāve kaḥ anyaḥ bodhasya svabhāvaḥ iti ced bodha tvam eva bodhasya svabhāvaḥ tat eva sva saṃvedanam iti ced na saṃjñā antara mātreṇa sva ātma avabhāsaka tva asiddheḥ sva ātma avabodhaka tva abhāve katham asau bodha svabhāvaḥ iti ced sva ātma dāhaka tva abhāve api yathā agneḥ dahana svabhāvaḥ sva ātma dīpaka tva ādi abhāve api yathā dātṛ ādikam dātṛ ādi svabhāvam iti 
[136,13]	nanu ca dṛṣṭam mayā iti sarva darśana viśiṣṭasya eva arthasya smaraṇāt katham na anubhava arthayoḥ eka upalambha niyamaḥ iti na etat asti kevalasya api arthasya smṛti darśanāt tathā hi mātaram pitaram śuśrūṣitavān aham santi me pañca bhṛtyāḥ daśa gāvaḥ ca gṛhe asti devadattaḥ iti ādau arthaḥ eva smaryate na anubhavaḥ iti 
[136,17]	nanu anubhavaḥ api atra smaryate yasmāt asau pṛṣṭaḥ san āha mayā eva dṛṣṭaḥ devadattaḥ iti na anyathā api tad upapatteḥ kevalasya api artha smaraṇāt tasya dṛṣṭa tvam anumāya tathā abhidhattaḥ iti yadi punar evam na abhyupagamyate tadā cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api saha upalambha niyamaḥ syāt tathā hi katham tvayā asau jñātaḥ iti evam pṛṣṭaḥ san āha cakṣuṣā eva dṛṣṭaḥ iti bhavatu tathā api saha upalambha niyamaḥ iti ced na pratīti sva śāstra virodhāt na hi tāvat nīla ādi artha grāhiṇi jñāne cakṣuḥ ādi pratītiḥ kasyacid asti na api cakṣuḥ ādi ākāraḥ sva śāstre abhyupagataḥ iti kim vā abhilāpa saṃsargasya api saha upalambha niyama prasaṅgaḥ tad saṃsṛṣṭasya eva smaraṇāt na hi su śikṣitaḥ api kaścid śuddham artham smaraṇena upasthāpayitum śaknoti pṛṣṭaḥ vā anyeṣām kathayitum iti abhilāpa saṃsṛṣṭasya ca anubhave kalpanā apoḍham ityādi virodhaḥ śabdāt vaitavāda prasaṅgaḥ ca tasmāt na smaraṇāt api saha upalambha niyama siddhiḥ 
[137,4]	sva saṃvedana abhāve jñānasya rūpa ādi vat bāhya tvam prasajyate sva ātmīya abhāvaḥ ca santāna antara jñāna vat iti ced kim idam tāvat bāhya tvam yadi sva śarīrāt bahis deśa avasthānam tat ayuktam yatas na rūpa ādeḥ api asva saṃvedana tvāt bāhya tvam kiṃtu sva sāmagrī sāmarthyāt tatra utpanna tvāt jñāna sukha ādeḥ tu śarīra antardeśaḥ eva utpādikā sāmagrī vidyate tatas na bahis utpādaḥ etena bahiṣṭhatvena saṃvedanam bāhya tvam apāstam 
[137,10]	na api jñāna vargāt artha antara tvam bāhya tvam tad jātīyasya tad vargāt artha antara tva ayogāt sukha ādeḥ tu jñāna vargāt artha antara tvam bāhya tvam iṣṭam eva tathā api sva sāmagrī sāmarthyāt śarīra antardeśaḥ eva utpannam vedyate iti bāhyam na ucyate yat vā ātma samavāyi tvāt abāhya tvam tad samavāyi tvam ca sva hetu niyamita tvāt na tu sva saṃvidita tvāt iti 
[137,15_137,21]	yat api anātmīyatva prasaṅgaḥ santāna antara jñāna vat iti uktam tat api anupapannam yatas na sva saṃvedanā su asaṃvedanābhyām ātmīyatvānāmīya tve kim tarhi sva ātma sambandha asambandhābhyām tvad mate tu sarva jñānānām sva saṃvedana tvāt na kiṃcid anātmīyam jñānam syāt atha yadi asya sva saṃvedakam na bhavati tat tasya anātmīyam evam tarhi pūrva uttara jñānam janma antara upārjita adṛṣṭam ca ātmīyam na syāt na hi sarva jñāna anuyāyī sva saṃvedakaḥ santānaḥ api asti yasya sat sarvam svātmīyam syāt atha upakārya upakāraka bhāvena asva saṃviditam api ātmīyam ucyate hanta tarhi na vaktavyam santāna antara jñāna vat asva saṃvidita tvāt anātmīyam iti 
[137,24]	yat api anyat uktam sva ātma prakāśakam jñānam prakāśa tvāt pradīpa vat iti atra api sva ātma prakāśakam iti kaḥ arthaḥ yadi sva saṃvedya tvam eva vivakṣitam tadā sādhya śūnyam nidarśanam na hi bhavat mate api svarūpa ātmakasya pradīpasya sva saṃvedya tvam asti jñāna ātmaka tvam ca pradīpasya ubhayoḥ asiddha tvāt na udāharaṇam yuktam atha asva ātma vedanam prati sajātīyān apekṣyam sva ātma prakāśaka tvam ucyate tadā sparśa ādeḥ api sva ātma prakāśaka tvam syāt na ca sva ātma saṃvedana utpādane sajātīyam sahakāriṇam apekṣate iti etāvatā eva sva saṃvedya tva siddhiḥ prakāśakasya api sajātīya anapekṣa tvam asiddham tad avayava avayavi rūpayoḥ anyonya sahakāri tvāt nayana rūpa apekṣi tvāt ca iti kutas etat prakāśyamānasya tad artha antareṇa prakāśanāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti 
[138,9]	yat punar atra uktam na ca ghaṭaḥ api pradīpena prakāśyate api tu tathābhūtasya eva utpattiḥ iti na kṣaṇa bhaṅgasya nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt tathā utpāde api anyatas tathā utpatteḥ pūrvam ghaṭasya siddham aprakāśa ātmaka tvam tat dṛṣṭāntāt pradīpasya jñānasya ca iti katham asaṃvedyam jñānam na asti iti ucyate nanu ca yathā cakṣuṣi sva avayave rūpe ca sati api ghaṭaḥ pradīpam prakāśakam apekṣate tathā dīpaḥ api syāt atha dīpaḥ na apekṣate ghaṭaḥ api evam syāt evam cakṣuḥ ādi vyatirekeṇa na anyam prakāśakam apekṣeta atha ghaṭasya dvayam prakāśakam pradīpaḥ cakṣuḥ ca pradīpasya tu cakṣuḥ eva iti evam tarhi ekam kasyacid anyasya dvayam eva prakāśakam yathāsambhavataḥ anyasya na ekam api astu kā kṣatiḥ 
[139,1_139,3]	atyantam aśaktasya dvayam aparasya ekam anyasya na ekam api iti vastu svabhāvaḥ eṣaḥ iti kā eva atra kṣatiḥ atha sva ātmani kriyā virodhaḥ iti ucyate tat ayuktam iti āha yadā svarūpam tat tasya tadā kā eva virodhitā sva rūpeṇa virodhe hi sarvam eva pralīyate yat tāvat aekam kasyacid a ityādi tat ayuktam yadi nāma kvacid ekam sahakāri samartham kvacid anekam tathā api ākasmikī kriyā na yuktā tathā hi nityam sattvam asattvam vāhetoḥ anya anapekṣaṇāt apekṣātaḥ hi bhāvānām kādācitka tva sambhavāt 
[139,10_139,17]	na ca samasta sahakāri vikalasya vṛkṣa aśma ādeḥ sva ātma calana ādi kriyāyām sāmarthyam dṛṣṭam sahakāri saṃkhyā vikalpaḥ tu anvaya vyatirekābhyām dṛṣṭaḥ abhyupagamyate yadā svarūpam tat tasya ityādi api ayuktam tathā svarūpasya eva asiddhatvāt na hi dṛṣṭānta hetvoḥ anupapattau sva ātma saṃvedaka tvam siddhyati prakāśaka tvāt iti asya api kaḥ arthaḥ kim bhāsvara rūpa tvāt uta vedya sahakāri tvāt āhosvit bodha svabhāva tvāt iti bhāsvara rūpa tvam bodhasya asiddham vedya sahakāri tvam tu cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ anaikāntikam bodha svabhāva tvam punar asādhāraṇam eva na ca anirūpitāt arthasya hetoḥ gamaka tvam yuktam śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ tu svayam eva śākyaiḥ anumiti sādhaka tvam nirākṛtam iti 
[139,20]	jñāna antara vedya tve api jñānasya kim pramāṇam iti ced yat eva deva āryaiḥ uktam jñānam sva vyatirikta vedana vedyam vedya tvāt rūpa ādi vat iti tadvat bāhya tva abodha tva ādi prasaṅgaḥ iti uktam viśeṣa viruddhasya adūṣaṇa tvena vakṣyamāṇa tvāt anaikāntika tva parihāra artham parameśvarasya jñāna dvayam abhyupagantavyam tad vyatirekeṇa vā sarvajña tvam anitya tve sati iti vā viśeṣaṇam karttavyam iti tat evam sva saṃvedanasya asiddheḥ saha upalambha niyamaḥ api asiddhaḥ iti na jñāna arthayoḥ abheda siddhiḥ 
[139,26_140,1]	tatas ca etat api ayuktam nīla ādi rūpaḥ tasya asau svabhāvaḥ anubhavaḥ ca saḥ nīla ādi anubhavaḥ khyātaḥ svabhāva anubhavaḥ api san api ca ayam saha upalambha niyamaḥ kim anvaya vyatireka upapannaḥ atha tad vikalaḥ iti na tāvat anvaya vyatireka vikalasya gamaka tvam atiprasaṅgāt anvaya vyatireka upapanna tvam ca bheda agrahaṇe katham pratīyate na hi sva ātmani eva kaścid anvaya vyatirekau pratipattum śaknoti na ca bhrāntena eva bheda upalambhena vyatireka ādi vyavasthā yuktā atiprasaṅgāt na ca sarvathā eva bheda apratipattau bhrāntyabhrānti vyavasthā api ghaṭate vāc mātreṇa ca sarva vāda siddhiḥ syāt 
[140,7^1]	atha jñāna arthayoḥ eva bhedaḥ na gṛhyate na tu jñānayoḥ api iti tat ayuktam yatas sva saṃvedana pakṣe jñānayoḥ api bhedaḥ pratyetum na śakyate iti uktam citra vicāra prastāve api ca jñānayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa bhedaḥ tāvat na gṛhyate sva ātma vedana mātra tvāt na hi para apratītau sva parayoḥ bheda pratītiḥ yuktā para pratīti abhyupagame ca na anyaḥ anubhāvyaḥ iti ādeḥ vyāghāta prasaṅgaḥ saha upalambhaḥ ca anaikāntikaḥ syāt na ca atad ākāreṇa jñāna antarasya grahaṇam yuktam nīla ādeḥ api anīla ādi ākāreṇa eva jñānena grahaṇa prasaṅgāt 
[140,7^2]	tad ākāra tve ca tat eva syāt katham jñānayoḥ api grāhya grāhakayoḥ bheda siddhiḥ siddhau vā tadvat artha jñānayoḥ api syāt tasmāt na pratyakṣeṇa jñānayoḥ eva bhedaḥ gṛhyate na api anumānena tasya pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvāt na hi sarvathā pratyakṣeṇa vyāpti agrahaṇe anumānam ātmānam āsādayati tat evam grāhya grāhakayoḥ abheda vādinām sva santāne jñāna antara grahaṇam na asti kutas santāna antara siddhiḥ tatas ca para loka budda ādi vārtā api dūra utsāritā eva iti asamaṃjasam sarvam eva saugatam śāstram iti na hi bheda ādi asiddhau sādhana dūṣaṇa ādi vyavahāraḥ upapadyate 
[140,21]	atha matam grāhakasya grāhyeṇa eva saha abhedaḥ abhyupagamyate na tu adhyavaseyena iti atha grāhya adhyavaseyayoḥ kaḥ bhedaḥ ucyate yaḥ buddhau vastutas pratibhāti ākāraḥ sa grāhyaḥ yaḥ tu āropitaḥ saḥ adhyavaseyaḥ atha vā yat buddhau pratibhāti tat grāhyam yasmin tu apratibhāte api gṛhīta tā abhimānaḥ tat adhyavaseyam tad adhyavasāyāt eva pravṛttiḥ tat uktam sva pratibhāsena arthe artha adhyavasāyena pravarttanā bhrāntiḥ api artha sambandhena tat avyabhicārāt pramāṇam iti tat api ayuktam yathā eva hi bāhya adhyavasāyasya bāhya arthena atyanta adṛṣṭena sambandha agrahaṇāt avyabhicāra asiddheḥ pramāṇa tva anupapattiḥ tathā sva para santāna jñāna bheda adhyavasāyasya api loka vyavahāra avisaṃvāda mātreṇa pramāṇa tve bāhya artha adhyavasāyasya api loka vyavahāra avisaṃvāda mātreṇa tad artha vyavasthāpaka tvam astu samāna yogakṣema tvāt 
[141,3^1]	atha sva jñāna antaram santāna antara jñānam ca tad ātmanā eva dṛṣṭam tena tad utpannasya bhrāntasya api tat adhyavasāyasya pramāṇatavam yuktam bāhyaḥ tu arthaḥ na kena api dṛṣṭaḥ iti katham tat adhyavasāyasya tad utpanna tvam pramāṇa tvam ca śakyam vyavasthāpayitum iti na tad adhyavasāyena tad abhāvān avagamāt yathā eva bāhya adhyavasāyena sva ātma eka grāhiṇā na bāhya arthasya sva saṃvedya tvam asaṃvedya tvam vā avagantum pāryate tathā jñāna antarasya api tat adhyavasāyena iti na hi atra viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti 
[141,3^2]	smṛtiḥ tu adhyavasāyaḥ eva iti na smaraṇam api jñāna antara vyavasthāpakam jñāna antarāt utpannam svarūpam ātmanaḥ gṛhṇat sva saṃvedanam katham na jñāna antaram vyavasthāpakam iti ced bāhya arthāt utpannam ātmanaḥ svarūpam gṛhṇat katham na bāhya artha vyavasthāpakam iti samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ na ca sva saṃvedanam eva enam viśeṣam jānāti jñāna antarāt eva aham utpannam na bāhya arthāt iti tat evam jñāna antara sthāpanena bāhya artha sthāpanasya samāna yogakṣema tvāt na bāhya artha asambhavaḥ na vā anayoḥ api bheda siddhiḥ tatas ca saha upalambha ādikaḥ hetuḥ trairūpya avagamasya mūlam bheda upalambhaḥ tad nirākurvan ātmānam eva hanti iti katham tatas bāhya abhāva siddhiḥ etena dhiyaḥ nīla ādi rūpa tvaḥ ityādi api nirastam 
[141,17]	tathā hi buddheḥ buddhi antarābha tve tad bhedaḥ kiṃpramāṇakaḥ buddhi antarā svarūpa tve sā tasya grāhikā katham yadvat sambandha saṃvādau bāhyeṣu artheṣu durghaṭau buddhi antare api tadvat tau sva saṃvid niṣṭha vādinaḥ loka prasiddhi saṃvādāt buddhi bheda prasādhane bāhya arthasya api saṃsiddhiḥ tatas eva prasajyate yathā bāhyasya saṃsiddhiḥ na sūkṣma īkṣikayā īkṣyate tathā buddhi antarasya api tat tad bhedaḥ api durghaṭaḥ agṛhītāt yathā bāhyāt na buddhiḥ bhedam ātmanaḥ vetti buddhi antarāt tadvat parokṣa tva aviśeṣataḥ buddheḥ vilakṣaṇa ākārasya anyathā anupapattitaḥ buddhi bheda prasiddhiḥ ced bāhyasya api katham na saḥ iti saṅgrahaślokāḥ 
[142,2]	tat evam grāhya grāhakayoḥ bhedam nirākurvāṇena advaitam eva abhyupagantavyam tad anabhyupagame hi avedya vedaka ākārāḥ yathā bhrāntaiḥ ityādeḥ api anupapanna tvam jñāna antara grahaṇena bāhya artha grahaṇasya samāna yogakṣema tvena darśita tvāt advaita abhyupagame api virodhaḥ aparihārya eva iti uktam saḥ ayam gaḍu praveśa akṣi tāraka vinirgama nyāyaḥ śākyānām āpatitaḥ tasmāt ittham virodha parihārāya bāhya arthaḥ atat ākāreṇa eva jñānena vedyatas iti abhyupagantavyam sa ca bāhyaḥ arthaḥ prāyas tāvat yathā vyavasthitena eva ākāreṇa gṛhyate kvacid tu āropitena api ākāreṇa avabhāsate timira ādi sāmarthyāt atas bhrāntyabhrānti vyavasthā api yuktā na tu anya upādhi vinirmukta jñāna saṃvedane sati iti 
[142,12]	aparaḥ tu āha sarve vivādāḥ padībhūtāḥ pratyayāḥ nirālambanāḥ pratyaya tvāt svapna ādi pratyaya vat iti yathā ca svapna avasthāyām bāhya artha asambhave api jñāna ākāra mātra saṃvedanāt eva bāhya artha adhyavasāyaḥ bhrāntyabhrānti vyavasthā ca bhavati tathā jāgrat avasthāyām api bheda avabhāsaḥ api tadvat eva draṣṭavyaḥ evam ca nirālambana tvam eva sādhyate na tu bheda avabhāsaḥ niṣidhyate tatas anumāne bheda vityā virodhaḥ api na asti bheda avabhāsasya ca bhrānta tve api vyavahāra avisaṃvāda apekṣayā pramāṇa tvāt na anvaya ādi asiddhiḥ iti 
[142,19]	saṃdigdha anaikāntikaḥ tāvat ayam hetuḥ pratyaya tvasālambana tvayoḥ virodha asiddheḥ na ca keṣāṃcid pratyayānām yathā adhyavasitam ālambanam na dṛṣṭam iti etāvatā eva vyatireka siddhiḥ tvad darśane api anabhyupagamāt tathā ca uktam na yukta adṛṣṭi mātreṇa vipakṣe avyabhicāritā sambhāvya vyabhicāri tvāt sthālī taṇḍula pāka vat yasya adarśana mātreṇa vyatirekaḥ pradarśyate tasya saṃśaya hetu tvāt śeṣavat tat udāhṛtam 
[143,3^1]	atha anyat anyasya ālambanam na yuktam kaḥ atra virodhaḥ sarvasya ālambana tva prasaṅgaḥ anya tva aviśeṣāt iti ced na anya tve api kāraṇa vat niyama sambhavāt na hi dhūmasya sva ātmā eva kāraṇam sarvam vā anya tva aviśeṣāt iti bodha utpāde api prāk iva aprakāśaḥ arthaḥ katham prakāśa tām yāyāt prakāśa ātma utpāde vā saḥ eva bodhaḥ tasya prakāśa lakṣaṇa tvāt iti ced na akṣaṇika tva siddhau tad viṣaya prakāśa sambandhāt eva tasya prakāśyavāt pradīpa ghaṭa vat kim ca aneka jñātṛ saṃvedyam na jñānam tad viparītaḥ tu bāhyaḥ arthaḥ tathā hi nartakī nartiṣyati iti śrutvā tad darśana utsukāḥ bahavaḥ lokāḥ pravṛttāḥ tām aviśeṣeṇa paśyanti svapne api etat asti iti ced na tatra uttarottara saṃvāda anupapatteḥ
