[143,3^2]	asarvaḥ eva pratyayāḥ nirālambanāa iti bruvāṇasya sva vākya upanyāsa virodhaḥ tathā hi idam vākyam sādhana tvena bhavatā para pratyāyana artham upanyastam na ca bhavataḥ para avabodhaḥ asti avabodhe vā para avabodhasya eva sa ālambana tvāt tena eva anaikāntaḥ para apratipattau ca katham sarva pratyayānām pratyaya tvam gṛhyate na ca agṛhītam pakṣa dharma tvam gamakam tathā dṛṣṭānta asiddha avagamaka tvam tad siddhau vā anaikāntika tvam tathā anumānam api yadi sarva pratyaya viṣayam tadā tasya eva sa ālambana tvam no ced tadā katham sarva pratyayānām nirālambanatva siddhiḥ sarva anumānasya nirālambanasya eva pramāṇa tva abhyupagamāt ayam adoṣaḥ iti ced tat ayuktam nirālambanasya pramāṇa tva ayogāt na hi pāribhāṣikam jñānasya pramāṇa tvam nirālambana tvam ca kim tarhi prameyam paricchidyate yena tat pramāṇam yatra tu na kiṃcid pratibhāti tat nirālambanam ucyate tat katham na anayoḥ virodhaḥ 
[143,22^1]	sva ātma ālambanasya api artha antara ālamba natva abhidhānāt avirodhaḥ iti ced na kim idānīm sva ātma apekṣayā eva tasya anumāna tvam na ca sva ātma eka viṣayeṇa artha antarāṇām sa ālambana tvam vā siddhyati aviṣaya tvāt na hi yaḥ yasya na viṣayaḥ sa tena sādhayitum śakyate tad sādhane hi saḥ eva tasya viṣayaḥ syāt ātma svarūpa vat sādhya lakṣaṇa tvāt viṣayasya maṇi vat aviṣayasya api avisaṃvādāt eva siddhiḥ iti ced na avisaṃvādinaḥ maṇi jñānasya prabhā viṣayatva asiddheḥ siddhau vā saḥ eva visaṃvādaḥ iti katham tasya avisaṃvādi tvam tad uttaram eva maṇi jñānam pramāṇam iti vakṣyāmaḥ pratyaya antara siddhyā ca bāhya siddheḥ samāna yogakṣema tvam prāk eva darśitam tena ca pratyaya antara siddhi vat nīla ādeḥ api abodha ātmaka tva siddhiḥ 
[143,22^2]	kasyacid bāhya artha jñānasya pramāṇa ābhāsa tva darśanāt sarva bāhya artha jñānānām pramāṇa ābhāsa tvam ayuktam svapna avasthā anumāna dṛṣṭāntena sarva anumānānām pramāṇa ābhāsa tva prasaṅgāt tatas kim atra anupapannam nirālambana anumānam eva na anyat kiṃcid nirālambana anumānasya api apramāṇa tve bhavataḥ kārtha siddhiḥ iti ced na kācid abhipreta artha siddhim muktvā syāt etat yathā kadācid rajata pratyaya bādhakasya śuktikā pratyayasya pratyaya antareṇa bādhitasya asattve api na eva svapna indrajāla ādiṣu rajata pratyayasya satyatā upapadyate tadvat nirālambana anumānasya asattve api tat bādhitasya sa ālambana jñānasya satya tā na yuktā iti kim anena vaktum abhipretam yadi pramāṇam antareṇa pramāṇa ābhāsena ca atyanta adṛṣṭānām pratyaya antarāṇām asatya tā eva vyavasthāpyate iti tat ayuktam pramāṇam antareṇa prameya vyavasthā siddheḥ ayogāt 
[144,9]	bāhya artha vyavasthā siddhiḥ api tatas eva syāt tad siddhi nimittasya eva abhrānta pramāṇa tvāt na hi pramāṇa abhra antau asya viṣāṇe staḥ kim tarhi yena eva padārthaḥ tathātvena vyavasthāpyate tat eva abhrāntam pramāṇam tvad mate sva saṃvedana vat na ca rajata jñānasya api asatya tvam bhrāntena śuktikā jñānena vyavasthāpyate kim tarhi tat uttareṇa abhrāntena eva jñānena ubhayoḥ api rajata śuktikā jñānayoḥ asatya tvam vyavasthāpyate 
[144,14]	yat vā śuktikā jñānasya śuktikā viṣaya tvena ev bhrānta tvam mithyātva viśiṣṭa rajata jñāna viṣaya tvena bhrānta tvam eva tatra avisaṃvādi tvāt avisaṃvādinaḥ ca bhrānta tve sva saṃvedanasya api bhrānta tvam syāt tatas ca pāribhāṣikam jñānānām bhrānta tvam uktam syāt atha rajata jñāna ādi dṛṣṭāntena sarva pramāṇa prameyānām avyavasthā eva sādhyate tathā sati sura guru mata anupraveśaḥ tatas ca para loka ādi vicāraḥ tad nimitta pramāṇa vicāraḥ ca anupapanne eva iti 
[144,20^1]	nanu ca avyavasthāpya pratītānām pratyaya antarāṇām sādhayitum na śakyate sva saṃvedana eka niṣṭhaḥ tu bhavān na pratyaya antaram paśyati sva saṃvedana vedyasya ca ātmanaḥ nirālambana tvam bhrānta tvam vā sādhayantam na kaścid tvām nivārayati kintu sarva śabdaḥ anarthakaḥ pratyaya antara avagame vā anaikāntika tvam uktam viruddhaḥ vā ayam hetuḥ tathā hi sarve pratyayāḥ sa ālambanāḥ pratyaya tvāt pratyaya antara ālambana pratyaya vat iti dharmya siddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti ced tat kim idānīm svapna ādi pratyayāḥ puruṣa antara pratyayāḥ ca na pratīyante eva apratītaiḥ ca taiḥ katham vyavahāraḥ iti 
[144,20^2]	kaḥ evam āha na pratīyante iti kintu na ālambanībhavanti iti brūmaḥ pratīyante na ca ālambanībhavanti iti su vyāhṛtam na hi pratīyamānāt anyat eva ālambanam sva saṃvedanasya api nirālambanatva prasaṅgāt yat vastu yasmin anubhave svarūpeṇa pratibhāti tat tasya ālambanam na pratīyamāna mātram smaryamāṇasya api ālambana tva prasaṅgāt iti ced na ālambana viparīta aviparīta sandigdha ādi aneka lakṣaṇa upapanna tvāt yatas jñeyam ālambanam viṣayaḥ arthaḥ pratyaya avabhāsi iti paryāyāḥ yat ca avisaṃvādini jñāne pratibhāti tad svarūpeṇa eva pratibhāti iti katham na pratyaya antarāṇi ālambanībhavanti 
[145,4_145,8]	nanu ca pratyaya antarāṇām sāmānya ākāreṇa pratīteḥ katham svarūpa pratītiḥ na hi teṣām sādhāraṇam svarūpam asti yat ca teṣām asādhāraṇam svarūpam tat parokṣa tvāt na pratibhāti eva atas na ālambanam iti tat ayuktam sādhāraṇa rūpasya api vāstava tvāt tad anumānasya ca iti vakṣyāmaḥ yadi ca pratyaya antara asaṃsargyavāstavam eva rūpam pratibhāti tasya eva nirālambana tvam sādhyate tatas śaśa viṣāṇa taikṣaṇya sādhaka anumāna vat anarthakam eva idam syāt na hi śaśa viṣāṇa vat atyanta anupalabdhaiḥ parama artha asadbhiḥ pratyaya antaraiḥ saha pāraṃparyeṇa api sambandhaḥ avagantum pāryate maṇi dṛṣṭāntaḥ api atra na sādhīyān yatas maṇi svarūpam parama artha sat eva tena eva pramātrā pravṛtti uttara kālam upalabhyate na evam pratyaya antarāṇām svarūpam tad upalambhe vā katham na tad upalambhasya sa ālambana tvam 
[145,15]	yat api uktam loka pratītyā eva jāgrat svapna ādi pratyayānām bheda siddheḥ tad āśrayeṇa tāvat sādhana vyavahāraḥ tatas paścāt yadi parāmṛśatā kiṃcid atra vibhāga kāraṇam upalakṣyate iti abhedam sādhayati tathā sati kaḥ parasya doṣaḥ evam hi doṣe veda prāmāṇya sādhane api doṣaḥ syāt tathā hi yāvat vedasya apramāṇebhyaḥ laukika vākyebhyaḥ na pṛthak grahaṇam tāvat na dharmi svarūpa siddhiḥ tad asiddhau ca na tad prāmāṇyam api siddham iti niṣphalam anumānam syāt na ca svara varṇa ānupūrvī viśeṣāt viśeṣa siddhiḥ tad anyeṣām api para sparataḥ tathā bheda sambhavāt 
[145,22]	atha asti tāvat ayam prabandhaḥ kim ayam vedaḥ uta na iti vicāryamāṇaḥ yadi pramāṇam bhaviṣyati tadā ayam vedaḥ eva atha anyathā na anena prayojanam iti parityajāmaḥ samānam atra api pratyayaḥ tāvat īkṣyate svapna prasiddhiḥ asmāt kim bhinnā na vā iti vikalpane yathā param bhaviṣyataḥ tadā drakṣyāmaḥ iti api yadi paścāt vicāryamāṇam svapna jñānam anyat vā parasparam bhinnam bhavet tadā bhedam grahīṣyāmaḥ atha bheda kāraṇam na kim api asti iti abhedam tat pratipatsyāmahe tatas kaḥ atra virodhaḥ iti tat etat andha vijṛmbhitam veda prāmāṇya vādinaḥ khalu tāvat lokam paśyanti tad pratītim ca jānanti tatas sāmānyena loka prasiddhasya veda ākhyasya dharmiṇaḥ pramāṇa tva ādi viśeṣa parīkṣaṇam yuktam tvam punar sva saṃvedana vyatirekeṇa kiṃcid api na paśyasi pramāṇa ābhāsena ca pakṣa ādi grahaṇe katham alīka aṅgaḥ hetuḥ pramāṇam syāt iti 
[146,7]	nanu ca alaṅkāre prajñā karaguptena eva svayam etat āśaṅkya parihṛtam yat āha pūrvam bheda grāhakam apramāṇam iti ced bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ pakṣa ādi pravibhāgaḥ na bhavet iti ced mā bhūt idānīm kim naḥ vighaṭitam idam eva yat apramāṇa tvam abheda sādhanasya iti evam tarhi veda lakṣaṇa pramāṇa apramāṇa sādhāraṇā sādhāraṇa dharmi pratipattiḥ apramāṇam eva syāt paścāt pramāṇa tva sādhanena nivarttanāt tatas dharmi sādhanasya apramāṇa tvāt tad dvāreṇa prāmāṇya sādhanam api apramāṇam bhavet iti na veda prāmāṇya siddhiḥ tatas sakala sādhya sādhana vyavahāraḥ viśīryeta 
[146,14_146,18]	atha dharmiṇaḥ sādhāraṇasya grahaṇe api na tad grāhakam apramāṇam prāmāṇyasya adhikasya tatra eva sādhanāt iti tat api asat yatas pramāṇa tvam hi tasya eva svarūpam dharmiṇaḥ yadā tasya tad parihāreṇa grahaṇe api katham pramā pramāṇa svarūpam hi veda vacanam tasya tad viparyaya grahaṇe tad viparyaya unmūlane pareṇa kṛte katham apramāṇa tā na bhavet 
[146,21]	atha vyatirikta dharma abhyupagamāt na etat dūṣaṇam na anavasthā prasaṅgāt tathā hi vyatiriktaḥ yadā dharmaḥ tena yogaḥ paraḥ bhavet tena yogaḥ punar tena iti anantaḥ dharma viplavaḥ tat yukta tvam tayoḥ eva svarūpam yadi sammatam pramāṇa tvam tathā prāptam asmākam kā virodhitā bhedena api gṛhītasya samāropasya bhāvataḥ parāmarśāt abhedasya pratipattiḥ kim apramā 
[147,3_147,6]	abheda pratipattuḥ pakṣa ādi vibhāgena sādhanam na pravarttate iti api na aśaṅkanīyam yatas para pratyaya apekṣayā idam anuvāda mātrakam svayam api ca apūrva abhyāsena sādhana prayogaḥ iti anavadyam mama api evam āsīt iti paraḥ pratipādyate iti tat etat īrṣyā śalya vitudyamānam armma ayam viklavam krośati iti paśyāmaḥ tathā hi vedasya tāvat sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇau dharmau yadi vyatiriktau sādhayiṣyāmaḥ tathā sati anavakāśaḥ eva tvad darśanasya 
[147,9]	atha api atad vyāvṛtti nibandhanau tathā api dṛṣṭe dharmiṇi sadṛśa ātmanā niścite sati dharma antara adarśana samāropa vyavaccheda artham anumānam pravarttate iti yuktam yadā tu dharmiṇaḥ eva pratyaya antara lakṣaṇāḥ kadācid api na dṛṣṭi gocarāḥ tadā kim āśrayam anumānam pravartteta na hi su śikṣitaḥ api kaścid ākāśe citra vinyāsam śaktaḥ karttum yadi hi dharmiṇaḥ pratyaya antara lakṣaṇāḥ sva rūpeṇa dṛṣṭāḥ bhavanti tadā tad darśana bala udbhūtena pratyaya tva niścayena nirālambana tva adarśana samāropa vyavaccheda artham anumānam pravarttate iti eṣā api prakriyā sambhāvyeta na ca piśāca vat adṛṣṭeṣu dharmiṣu 
[147,16]	na ca sva saṃvedana vyatirekeṇa bhavataḥ pratyaya antara upalambhaḥ api asti iti uktam yat punar etat bhedena api gṛhītasya ityādi idam vismṛta prakaraṇasya abhidhānam yatas sarva pratyayānām nirālambana tva sādhanam prakrāntam na advaitam sādhanam atha sarva pratyayānām nirālambana tvena aviśeṣaḥ eva abhedaḥ abhipretaḥ na tu advaitam tathā api pratyaya antara agrahaṇe anumāna apravṛttiḥ tad grahaṇe tu anaikāntika tvam hetoḥ iti uktam 
[147,21]	atha anena krameṇa sva saṃvedanasya eva bheda samāropa vyavacchedaḥ sādhyate na prāk eva vicārita tvāt api ca kim yena eva bhedaḥ samāropyate tena eva vyavacchidyate pratyaya antareṇa vā iti tena eva iti na yuktam sa māropaṇa vyavacchedaka ākārayoḥ eka ātma tva virodhāt atha pratyaya antareṇa na pratyaya antarāt bhidā evam tāvat vacaḥ kaḥ anyaḥ bhadantāt vaktum arhati para pratyaya apekṣayā idam anuvāda mātrakam svayam api pūrva abhyāsena ityādi api abheda viruddhāt ayuktam eva iti na ca apratipanna pratyayaḥ pūrvaḥ abhyāsaḥ ca hetu tvena abhidhātum yuktaḥ keśa ādi vat anālambanena eva pratīyate iti ced na keśa ādi jñānasya apramāṇa tvāt atas eva aavedya vedaka ākārāa ityādi śloka dvayam pramāṇīkurvatā śākyena advaitam eva abhyupagantavyam anyathā tad virodhaḥ syāt pratyaya antara vat bāhya artha siddhiḥ api nirālambana pratyayāt eva bhaviṣyati iti dustare vyasane bata ayam bhikṣuḥ patitaḥ iti 
[148,4_148,7^1]	yadi ca sva ātma ālambana tvam nirālambana tvam abhipretam tadā sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ svapna ādi pratyayānām api sva ātma ālambanatva asiddheḥ sva saṃvedane pramāṇa abhāvasya ukta tvāt anya saṃvedanasya ca sādhita tvāt atha na kiṃcid ālambanam asti iti vivakṣitam tadā ghaṭa ādi vat bodhasya api asiddhiḥ tatas sva dṛṣṭi virodhaḥ astam jagat syāt atha bāhya ālambanam eva vivakṣitam tat ayuktam viparīta khyāti samarthanāt smṛteḥ api smarttavya ālambanatva pratipādanāt yathā pratibhāta artha ālambana tvam svapna ādi jñāna vat iti ced evam tarhi bodha avabhāsite api pratyayasya tad ālambana tvam na syāt tatas ca bāhya arthavat bodhasya api asiddhiḥ iti āyātam āndhyam aśeṣasya jagataḥ na hi kasyacid tattvataḥ asiddhau bhrāntī upaplavaḥ api siddhyati paribhāṣā mātra prasaṅgāt atha bāhya tvena pratītasya keśa ādeḥ artha prāpti anupalambhena asattva siddheḥ tad pratibhāsasya nirālambanatva siddhau tad samāna rūpa upalakṣaṇāt sarva pratyayānām nirālambanatva siddhiḥ na punar ātma ālambana tve bādhakam kiṃcid asti iti tat api ayuktam samāna rūpa upalakṣaṇa asiddheḥ sarvatra artha prāptau hi samāna rūpa tvam siddhyati 
[148,7^2]	yadā tu kvacid arthaḥ prāpyate tadā kutas samāna rūpa tvam atha na eva kvacid artha prāptiḥ asti tad pratiṣedhaḥ tarhi katham na hi piśāca ādi vat atyanta adṛṣṭa arthasya pratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ karttum jñānāt asya bhedaḥ pratiṣidhyate na tu arthaḥ eva tasya jñāna ātmaka tvāt iti ced bhedaḥ api atyanta adṛṣṭaḥ katham pratiṣidhyate dṛṣṭaḥ ced na tarhi tasya atyanta asattvam khara viṣāṇa pradhāna ādeḥ katham pratiṣedhaḥ iti ced na tatra api hi dṛṣṭasya eva viṣāṇa jātīyasya khara mastaka udbhūta tvam pratiṣidhyate sukha duḥkha mohānām ca jagat upādāna tvam pratiṣidhyate jagat upādānasya vā paramāṇu nyāyena anumitasya sukha ādi ātmaka tvam eka tvam ca niṣiddhi ate iti evam anyatra api dṛṣṭasya eva deśa kāla sāmarthya ādi pratiṣedhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti sva saṃvedana pakṣe ca bheda darśanam na kvacid asti iti uktam 
[148,28]	pratyakṣeṇa apāsta viṣaya tvāt ca na bheda pratiṣedhaḥ pramāṇam tathā hi jñānam antar mukha ākāra asthira tva ādi rūpeṇa vedyate nīla ādi arthaḥ tu bahiṣṭhatu asthira tva ādiḥ upeṇa iti prāṇa bhṛt mātra vyavahāra virodhāt ca na hi kṣaṇa dhvaṃsi jñāna mātra avagame kaścid iṣṭa aniṣṭa prāpti parihāra artham pravartate iti svapna ādi vat etat sarvam iti ced na utpanna bādhakānām bhavatām api pravṛtti ādi darśanāt 
[149,4_149,16]	nanu ca jñānāt artha antara tve arthasya katham kaścid eva arthaḥ tena dṛṣṭaḥ yadi darśana sambandhāt saḥ api sambandhaḥ yadi artha antaram tadā tad sambandhasya api sambandha antara kalpanā iti anavasthā syāt atha anartha antaram tatas katham jñānāt artha antaram arthaḥ pratyakṣeṇa siddhyati tasmāt saṃvedana antar praviṣṭaḥ san arthaḥ saṃvedyate iti yujyate na tu tat asaṃsparśī tat uktam saṃvedanena bāhya tvam atas arthasya na sidhyati saṃvedanāt bahirbhāve saḥ eva tu na sidhyati yadi saṃvedyate nīlam katham bāhyam tat ucyate na ced saṃvedyate nīlam katham bāhyam tat ucyate anyena vedane tena tena eti eṣān avasthitiḥ anyena vedane ca etat kutas avasitam ātmanā iti tat etat api ayuktam prāk eva hi sarvasya api vedyasya vedanā antara vedya tvam sādhitam dharma dharminoḥ ca artha antara tvam vakṣyāmaḥ 
[149,19]	kim ca niścaya vat na anavasthā yathā tvad darśane vikalpa rūpaḥ niścayaḥ sa ca ātmānam aniścinvan eva artha antaram niścinoti na ca niścaya anavasthā tathā anyasya api jñātasya ajñātasya eva artha antara jñeya vyavasthāpaka tvam aduṣṭam niścayasya ca artha antara vyavasthāpaka tvam tvayā eva abhyupagatam yasmāt uktam keśa jñāne sati pūrva anubhūta smaraṇāt evam bhūta pratibhāsā anantaram prāptiḥ āsīt tad vikalpaḥ grāhya grāhaka ullekhena utpattimān saḥ api svarūpeṇa grāhya grāhaka rūpa rahitaḥ eva apareṇa tathā vyavasthāpyate na tasya api svatas avyavasthāḥ iti vikalpaḥ smṛti rūpa tvāt anālambanaḥ eva iti ced bhavatu tathā api tāvat asya grāhya grāha kakṣaṇika tva ādi ātmaka tvena artha antara vyavasthāpane sāmarthyam iṣṭam eva tadvat sthira tva ādika bāhya artha vyavasthāpane nirālambanam eva sāmarthyam bhavatu iti na asmākam grahaḥ syāt etat vikalpasya smṛti rūpa tvāt yathā anubhūta artha vyavasthāpaka tvena eva prāmāṇya sambhavāt sva vidita jñāna dharma vyavasthāpakasya eva vikalpasya pramāṇa tvam yuktam na tu anubhūta bāhya artha dharma vyavasthāpakasya iti 
[150,1]	kutas etat pratipattavyam na khalu tāvat nirvikalpakena eva ātmanaḥ kṣaṇika tva ādi svabhāvaḥ anubhūyamānaḥ pratīyate niścayaḥ tu bāhye api asti iti katham tasya ananubhūta tvam na ca tvad mate gṛhīta grāhiṇaḥ prāmāṇyam iṣṭam yathā dṛṣṭa ākāra grahaṇāt na pramāṇam iti vacanāt ajñāta artha prakāśaḥ vā iti viśeṣaṇāt ca 
[150,6^1]	api ca svapna ādi jñāneṣu api vicchedena avabhātānām arthānām asattvam katham niścitam yadi visaṃvādāt artha kriyāt anupalabdheḥ vā iti ucyate tat ayuktam yadi hi avisaṃvādena artha kriyayā vā vyāptaḥ arthaḥ kvacid upalabdhaḥ bhavati tadā tad abhāvāt artha abhāvaḥ siddhyati dahana abhāvāt dhūma abhāva vat yadā tu bāhya arthasya apahnavaḥ tadā na tasya kena api saha vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ pratipannaḥ iti katham viparyaya vyāptiḥ syāt syāt matam svapna ādi buddhīnām viṣaya abhāvaḥ sarva loka siddha tvāt na asmābhiḥ sādhyate iti na loka prasiddheḥ pramāṇa tva anabhyupagamāt 
[150,6^2]	abhyupagame vā tatas eva jāgrat buddhīnām pakṣīkṛtānām viṣaya siddhiḥ iti katham sarava pratyayānām nirālambanatva siddhiḥ svayam vā pratipadyamānasya para prasiddhi mātreṇa dṛṣṭānta upādānam ayuktam para artha anumānasya sva dṛṣṭa artha prakāśana lakṣaṇa tvāt tathā ca uktam yathā eva hi svayam tri rūpāt liṅgāt liṅgini jñānam utpannam tathā eva paratra liṅgi jñāna utpipādayiṣayā trirūpa liṅga ākhyānam para artham anumānam kāraṇe kārya upacarāt sva dṛṣṭa artha grahaṇam āgamāt para dṛṣṭam na sādhanam na api anarthataḥ siddhiḥ iti jñāpana artham iti 
[150,6^3]	tasmāt na para prasiddhi mātreṇa svapna ādi jñānānām dṛṣṭānta tvam yuktam saha upalambha ādi sādhanam ca prāk eva nirākṛtam iti na tatas dṛṣṭānta siddhiḥ siddhau vā tatas eva sādhya siddheḥ api upapattiḥ iti vyartham pratyaya tvam api ca yaḥ ayam nīla ādi ākāraḥ svapna ādi jñāneṣu pratibhāti tasya eva asattvam bādhakāt pratipadyante vyavaharttāraḥ tat yat asau jñānāt artha antaram na bhavati tadā jñānasya eva asattvam prāptam na vā nīla ādi ākāram svapna ādi jñānam tatas ca nirākārāḥ sarve pratyayāḥ pratyaya tvāt svapna ādi pratyaya vat iti vākya arthaḥ nirālambana anumānasya prāptaḥ yadā ca evam na vyatiriktaḥ na api avyatiriktaḥ nīla ādi ākāraḥ asti jñānasya tadā sarva vyavahāra ucchedaḥ eva prasajyate iti yadi ca sarve eva pratyayāḥ nirālambanāḥ tadā vyavahartṝṇām kvacid visaṃvādaḥ kvacid tu deśa kāla ādi vyavadhāne api saṃvādaḥ eva iti kutas ayam niyamaḥ vāsanā bhedāt iti ced atha manyase yatra adṛḍha vāsanā nimittam tatra visaṃvādaḥ yatra tu dṛḍha vāsanā nimittam tatra saṃvādaḥ iti na pramāṇa abhāvāt 
[151,5]	api ca varam evam bāhya arthānām eva dṛḍhādṛdha bhedena nimitta tva kalpanam teṣām vyavahāra viṣaya tva upapatteḥ na tu vāsanānām vāsanā dṛḍha tve ca kim nimittam na tāvat paṭuḥ pratyayaḥ apūrva artha viśeṣa anabhyupagamāt akasmāt ca pratyaya viśeṣaḥ jñāna mātrāt na upapayate atha ādara pratyayaḥ abhyāsa pratyayaḥ vā nimittam na vyabhicārāt tathā hi kāma śoka ādi abhibhūtānām kāminī apatya ādi artheṣu ati ādara abhyāsa atiśaya pratīteṣu api punar kadācid tathā artha pratyayasya visaṃvādi tvam dṛśyate kvacid punar atyanta apūrve arthena āścarya kāriṇī api pratyayaḥ saṃvādī eva iti tatra api janma antara udbhava vāsanā asti iti ced na atad viparīta pratyaya abhyāsāt tasyāḥ tirobhāva sambhavāt anyathā hi nairātmya ādi abhyāsāt rāga ādi vāsanānām api tirobhāvaḥ na syāt na ca jñāna vyatirikta artha asambhave niyata vāsanā prabodhakam kāraṇam asti pūrva jñāna vināśe hi sāṃpratam aneka vāsanā ātmakam eva jñānam asti katham tatas eva niyata pratibhāsa udayaḥ uttaratra api vāsanā nimittam vicārayiṣyāmaḥ iti āstām tāvat 
[151,18]	itas ca na jñāna ātmakaḥ eva nīla ādiḥ arthaḥ sva para saṃvedya tvāt na hi jñāna svabhāvasya aneka puruṣa saṃvedya tvam upapadyate katham punar arthasya aneka puruṣa vedya tvam gamyate vacana pravṛtti ādi avisaṃvādi liṅgāt taimirika dvaya vacana ādeḥ tu puruṣa antara visaṃvādi tvāt aliṅga tvam yadi ca para avabodhaḥ pratyetum na śakyate tatas śāstra praṇaya na ādiṣu apravṛttiḥ eva prāptā na hi unmattaḥ api kaścid ātma avabodha artham eva śāstram vyācaṣṭe sādhana ādi upanyāsam ca vāde karoti asādhana aṅga vacana ādi udbhāvanena ca ātmānam eva nigṛhṇati iti 
[151,25]	atha bāhya artha abhāve api para avabodha vyāpāra vyavahāra pratibhāsa liṅga anumeya tvāt adoṣaḥ tathā hi sva gata prayatna vivakṣā nirapekṣayoḥ ceṣṭā vākya pratibhāsayoḥ anya ādhipatyena utpattiḥ anumīyate iti na etat asti sva saṃvedana mātra vādinām sva jñāna antara avagamaḥ api na sambhavati kutas para avabodha avagamaḥ iti prāk eva prapañcitam 
[152,2]	api ca svapna vat sarva pratyayāḥ nirālambanāḥ iti bruvāṇasya katham santāna antara siddhiḥ na hi svapna dṛṣṭāntābhyām gamana vacana pratibhāsābhyām vāstavī puruṣa antara siddhiḥ upapadyate na api svapna vat buddha ākhyāna vāda ādi karaṇe para anugraha jaya parājaya ādikam vā kiṃcid upapadyate dharma apavarga ādi sādhana anuṣṭhānam na prāpnoti na hi svapne kṛtam buddha āśraya ādi karma brahmacarya ādikam vā dharma sādhanam abhakṣya bhakṣaṇa agamya gamana ādikam vā adharma sādhanam yuktam na ca nirviṣaya tva aviśeṣe svapna jāgrat avasthayoḥ viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti 
[152,10]	yena ekatra dharma ādi sādhana vyavasthā na anyatra iti dharma ādi sādhane api bhrāntitaḥ eva pravṛttiḥ iti ced bhavantaḥ tarhi tattva darśinaḥ santaḥ kim artham buddha dharma saṅgha dāna ādi upadeśena upāsaka pratibodhanāya pravarttante pūrva saṃskārāt iti etat api asat uttaram na hi vikala vat pratibuddhaḥ api kaścid amedhya ādi bhakṣaṇe pravarttate tasmāt ime saugatāḥ śūnyatā abhidhānena asāra tām pradarśya buddhāya deyam dharmāya deyam saṅghāya deyam iti eva lokān vipratārya miṣṭha anna pāna ādi upayogam kurvantaḥ pūrva saṃskāra viśeṣe api amedhya bhakṣaṇa ādikam pariharantaḥ cakra bhramaṇa vat asmākam pūrva saṃskārāt eva pravṛttiḥ iti evam bruvāṇāḥ ca dhūrta tām eva ātmanaḥ prakaṭayanti iti 
[152,18]	yathā eva hi cakrasya abhrāntau satyām bhramaṇa saṃskāraḥ na bhavati evam miṣṭha anna ādi bhrānti nivṛttau tad hetuḥ saṃskāraḥ na yujyate na hi jala ādi bhrānti nivṛttau tad saṃskārāt eva tad artha kriyā siddhi artham pravartamānaḥ kaścid upalabhyate api ca nīla ādi artha abhāve katham nīla ādi jñānam na hi nirhetukam kāryam sambhavati nityam sattvam asattvam ca iti ādi bādhakāt 
[152,23]	na ca jñāna mātrāt aviśiṣṭāt eva vilakṣaṇa pratibhāsaḥ sambhavati kārya anumāna virodha prasaṅgāt na hi nīla ādi jñānānām pratyekam avicchedena anādiḥ santānaḥ gṛhyate yena kāraṇa anuvidhānam kāryasya pratīyeta eka artha pratibhāsa pravāhe khalu tad vilakṣaṇa hetu saṃnipātam antareṇa katham tad vilakṣaṇaḥ pratibhāsaḥ prādurbhavati bāhya artha pakṣe tu aduṣṭa sahakāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ jala ādi artha sannipātāt avitatham jala ādi jñānam tad artha anuvidhānena eva bhavati duṣṭa sahakāriṇaḥ tu viparyayaḥ iti yathā nīhāreṣu adṛṣṭa ādi upapluta akṣānām gandharvanagara jñānam mantra ādi upapluta akṣāṇām māyā viprayukta dravya viśeṣe bhojana ādi jñānam svapna ādi jñānam api nimitta antara upanipātāt bāhyaḥ eva arthe bhavati iti prāk eva prapañcitam 
[153,4_153,7]	na ca evam hetu vaicitryam vijñaptimātra pakṣe asti tat kutas pratibhāsa vaicitryam iti vāsanā vaśāt pratibhāsa vaicitryam iti ced jñāna vyatirikta artha anabhyupagame kā vāsanā nanu ca uktam vāsanā iti pūrva jñāna janitām śaktim āmananti vāsanā avidaḥ iti atha kim pūrva jñānena ātma tulya jñāna utpādikā śaktiḥ janyate vilakṣaṇa jñāna utpādikā vā iti pūrvasmin pakṣe nīla jñāna utpādikā nīla jñānāt nīla jñānasya utpattiḥ tatas api nīla jñānasya eva iti nīla jñāna santānaḥ ekasmin santāne aneka ākāra jñāna udayaḥ na syāt uttarasmin pakṣe tu kiyantam api kālam eka ākāra jñāna pravāhaḥ na syāt kāla antare ca tad sadṛśa utpādaka tvam iti api ayuktam kṣaṇika tvena naṣṭasya janakatvā sambhavāt kārpāse rakta tāvat iti etat api uttaratra nirākariṣyāmaḥ 
[153,14]	kim ca upādānāt anyena vāsyamānam dṛṣṭam yathā lākṣā ādinā karpāsa ādikam puṣpa ādinā vastram ca iti na ca jñānasya upādānāt anya kāraṇam iṣṭam santāna antara jñānam tu bāhya arthavat aviditam katham vāsaka tvena kalpyeta yadi ca vāsanā eva nimittam syāt tatas smṛtiḥ eva syāt na spaṣṭa ābhatā na hi kevala vāsanātaḥ spaṣṭa jñāne spaṣṭa ābhatāyām ubhaya prasiddhau dṛṣṭāntaḥ asti viparyaye tu smṛtiḥ eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ kāma ādi abhibhūtānām strī ādi nirbhāsa jñānam sādhya tvāt anudāharaṇam tasya api stambha ādi ālambana tvāt nimīlita akṣasya anutpādāt ca iti 
[153,21]	yat api ucyate svapna upalabdha arthānām yathā jāgrat avasthāyām anupalambhāt asattvam tathā jāgrat upalabdhānām svapna avasthāyām anupalambhāt asattvam iti tat api ayuktam svapna upalabdha arthānām svapna avasthāyām api viplava darśanāt tathā hi prabhūtam udakam pibataḥ api tarṣa upaśamaḥ na bhavati bhojyam bhuñjānasya api kṣut na nivarttate mṛtā chinna śirasaḥ ca jīvantaḥ bruvantaḥ aśvagava ādayaḥ api bruvāṇāḥ dṛśyante tiryak mānuṣa ādīnām ca kṣaṇa mātreṇa jāti viparyayaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva viparyayaḥ ca iti evamādi viplavaḥ drśyate na ca jāgrat upalambhāḥ svapna avasthāyām api asatya tvena eva anusandhīyante 
[154,7_154,12]	nanu svapna upalabdhaḥ śukra visargaḥ na vyabhicarati tatas kim tad kāraṇasya api strī saṃparkasya satya tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na mithyājñāna jāt api rāga atiśayāt retaḥ spandasya sambhavāt sraj vilepana nakha kṣata ādi kārya anupalambhāt ca tasmāt jāgrataḥ svapataḥ vā yat avisaṃvādi jñānam tat satya artham eva yasya tu visaṃvādaḥ bhavati tat asatya artham viparīta ālambanam iti arthaḥ api ca bhāvanā anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvam yasya upalabhyate tad vāsanā nimittam yuktam yathā kāma krodha ādi dhana dhānya ādikam tu bhāvanā atiśayāt api kṛṣi ādi upāya hīnasya na saṃpadyate vinā api bhāvanām iṣṭa aniṣṭā pūrva artha prāptiḥ upalabhyate 
[154,15]	atha vaijātyāt apūrva arthaḥ na eva upalabhyate tat ucyate tadā mokṣa śāstra upalambhaḥ api apūrvaḥ na syāt tatas ca mokṣa upāya vāsanā api saṃsāra nimitta vāsanā vat atāttvika tvāt na mokṣa sādhikā na hi kadācid apūrva vāsana ādhāyakam nimittam upalabhyate yad vaśāt apūrvaḥ apavargaḥ syāt iti tat evam pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ sva śāstra arthena ca viruddha tvāt ayuktam eva uktam sarvam nirālambanam eva jñānam iti tasmāt arthasya sthūla ākāra tā na jñānasya iti yuktam uktam 
[154,22^1]	arthasya api na paramāṇu samūha ātmakasya sthūla tvam kim tu tad utpāditasya avayavi viśeṣasya iti jñāpana artham ghaṭa ādi grahaṇam aādi agrahaṇam tu sarvasya asmad ādi indriya viṣayasya avayavinaḥ saṅgraha artham tasya api rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antara tva jñāpana artham adravya agrahaṇam ādi grahaṇam tad artha antara tvam ca ghaṭa ādeḥ pratyakṣeṇa eva gṛhyate yasmāt indriya vyāpāra bhāva abhāva anuvidhānena ghaṭaḥ ayam ityādi jñānam rūpa ādi pratibhāsa vilakṣaṇam sarveṣām utpadyamānam dṛṣṭam atra kaścid āha avidyamāna abhede api tad akṣā gocara tvataḥ spṛśataḥ api asti sā buddhiḥ dravyam tad spārśanam yadi na ayam ghaṭaḥ iti jñāne varṇa pratyavabhāsanāt asya arthaḥ avidyamānena abhede api aviśeṣe api ghaṭasya katham pratyakṣa tvam iti adhyāhāryam yathā eva avidyamānasya indriya jñāna utpattau asāmarthyam tathā ghaṭasya iti eṣaḥ aviśeṣaḥ tasmāt tad akṣā gocara tvataḥ na hi nayanā viṣayasya sva ātmani cakṣuḥ jñāna utpādane sāmarthyam asti 
[154,22^2]	tad akṣā gocara tvam ca na asiddham yatas spṛśataḥ api asti sā buddhiḥ cakṣuḥ viṣaye spārśana buddhiḥ na yuktā sparśana viṣaye tad cakṣuḥ buddhiḥ na yuktā iti manyate viśeṣakaḥ tu āha dravyam tad spārśanam yadi dhīndriya grāhya tvam ghaṭasya yadi asti tatas siddham rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antara tvam iti abhiprāyaḥ atra uttaram anāyam ghaṭa a ityādi na hi ayam ghaṭaḥ iti jñānam sparśana indriya jam yuktam nīla ādi varṇasya api atra pratyavabhāsanāt tena rūpa sparśa vijñāna anvayaḥ mānasaḥ eva smārttaḥ vikalpaḥ iti tat idam vyāmūḍha bhāṣitam na hi spārśane ghaṭa jñāne rūpa pratibhāsaḥ kasyacid asti kim tu ghaṭa jñāna anantaram ānumānikam rūpa jñānam bhavati na ca etāvatā eva ghaṭa jñānasya sparśana indriya ajanya tvam sparśa jñānasya api atajjanya tva prasaṅgāt 
[155,14]	nanu ca spārśanam jñānam sa vikalpakam na bhavati nirvikalpaka jñāne tu na eva ghaṭaḥ pratibhāti sparśasya eva pratibhāsanāt iti kośa pānam eva atra kartavyam na hi nyāyaḥ kaścid asti bhavataḥ api tulyam iti ced na bhinna ākāra pratibhāsasya bhinna ākāra niścayena vyavasthāpitasya nīla pīta ādi vat artha nibandhana tvāt abhinne api arthe kāminī kuṇapa ādi niścaya bhedāt anekāntaḥ iti ced na tatra api dharma bhedasya vāstava tvāt yaḥ eva dṛṣṭaḥ mayā saḥ eva spṛśyate iti ca pratyayaḥ katham rūpa sparśa vilakṣaṇa vastu agrahaṇe bhavitum arhati 
[155,21^1]	nanu ca darśana yogī dṛṣṭaḥ iti ucyate sa ca katham sparṣṭum śakyate iti atra eke pariharanti darśana sparśana viśiṣṭaḥ ekaḥ arthaḥ manasā eva adhyakṣīkriyate manasaḥ sarva artha tvāt na ca sarvajña tva prasaṅgaḥ cakṣuḥ ādi vaiyarthyam vā yathā dṛṣṭa sahakārī anuvidhānena manasaḥ pravṛti abhyupagamāt anye tu varṇayanti darśana viśiṣṭa artha smṛti sahitena sparśana indriyeṇa saḥ eva dṛṣṭaḥ mayā spṛśyate iti jñānam utpadyate sāmagrī bhedāt ekasmin eva arthe pratyaya vailakṣaṇya upapatteḥ iti na ca idam pratyabhijñānam bhrāntam abādhyamāna tvāt bhrāntam api pratyabhijñānam sādṛśyāt utpadyate yathā pradīpa ādiṣu na ca rūpa sparśayoḥ sādṛśyam manāk api vidyate na ca bhrāntyā api pratyabhijñā rūpa sparśa viṣaya tvena saṃvedyate na hi evam kaścid pratyabhijānāti yat eva aham śauklyam adrākṣam tat etarhi sparśāmi yat ca auṣṇyam asprākṣam tat eva idānīm paśyāmi iti 
[155,21^2]	rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antaram ghaṭa ādi dravyam aneka indriya sambandhi tvena pratisaṃdhīyamāna tvāt ahaṅkāra vat iti anumānam api kutarka abhiniviṣṭa pratibodhana artham ucyate rūpa ādi agrahe api ca dravyam gṛhyate yathā sparśa agrahe api udakam rūpāgrahe api sphaṭika ādikam iti atha agni sambandhāt udaka sparśaḥ eva uṣṇaḥ utpadyate sphaṭika ādi rūpam ca nimitta antara sannidhānāt tad rūpa sadṛśam iti na kṣaṇika tvāt siddhe akṣaṇika tve vā avayavini ca siddhe sati āśutara vināśinaḥ api na niranvayaḥ vināśaḥ kāraṇa guṇa anuvidhānena eva ca kārya guṇa utpattiḥ iti katham tathā utpādaḥ tasmāt rūpa ādibhyaḥ anyat eva sphaṭika ādi dravyam iti sthitam evam ca asya api anavakāśaḥ eva sarve eva ghaṭaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ rūpe dṛṣṭe na jāyate tasmāt kaḥ tattva vid brūyāt ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti api iti evam tāvat dravya viṣayam pratyakṣam vyākhyātam 
[156,15]	idānīm guṇa ādi viṣayam vyākyātum upakramyate saṃyukta samavāyāt ityādinā cakṣuṣā saṃyukte ghaṭa ādi dravye samavetānām sāmānya viśeṣāṇām saṃkhyā parimāṇa pṛthaktva saṃyoga vibhāga paratva aparatva drava tva sneha vega karmaṇām cākṣuṣam jñānam sparśanena saṃyukte ca dravye samavetānām teṣām eva spārśanam jñānam iti acakṣusā eva a saṃyukta samavāyāt iti anuvarttate rūpa jñānasya anya indriya janya tva niṣedha artham cakṣusā eva iti avadhāraṇam yadi api manasaḥ api vyāpāraḥ asti tathā api cakṣuṣaḥ eva prādhānyam sākṣāt artha sambaddha tvāt cākṣuṣam jñānam iti vyapadeśāt ca sparśana anuvṛtti niṣedha artha tvāt vā iti evam uttaratra api draṣṭavyam sparśena eva sparśa jñānam ghrāṇena eva gandha jñānam rasanena eva rasa jñānam manasā eva sukha ādi jñānam sarvatra saṃyukta samavāyāt iti anuvṛttam draṣṭavyam 
[156,25_157,3^1]	nanu ca sukha ādīnām jñāna ātmaka tvāt sva saṃvedya tvam eva jñāna ātmaka tvam tulya hetu ja tvāt tat uktam tat atad rūpiṇaḥ bhāvāḥ tad atad rūpa hetu jāḥ tad sukha ādikam ajñānam vijñāna abhinna hetu jam tat ayuktam jñānasya api hi sva saṃvedya tvam na asti iti hi prāk eva prapañcitam sukha ādeḥ tu jñāna ātmaka tvam eva na asti kutas sva saṃvedya tvam tulya hetu ja tvam ca nābheda sādhanam pāka jaiḥ aneka antika tvāt tvad mate api ghaṭa ādi bhaṅga jaḥ śabdaḥ kapāla khaṇḍa ādi tulya hetu jaḥ na ca tad rūpaḥ iti anaikāntaḥ sarvathā tulya hetu ja tvam ca asiddham sukha ādeḥ abhilāṣā anabhilāṣa ādi pratiniyata nimitta tvāt iti pratyakṣeṇa ānanda tāpa ādi bheda grāhiṇa apāsta viṣaya tvāt ca bheda sādhanam ayuktam saṃśaya viparyaya nirṇaya ādi vat avāntara bhedaḥ ayam iti ced na saṃśaya ādiṣu iva sukha ādiṣu jñānam jñānam iti anuvṛtta pratyaya anupalambhāt 
[157,3^2]	na ca artha viṣaya tvena saṃśaya ādi vat sukha ādayaḥ saṃvedyante tasmāt na jñāna rūpāḥ sukha ādayaḥ iti abodha ātmaka tve tu sukha ādīnām bāhya tvam sādhāraṇa tvam ca prasajyate iti ced na ātma samayāyi tvena tad anupapatteḥ cetanāḥ ca ete sukha ādayaḥ saṃvedya tva arūpāt iti ayam rūpa ādibhiḥ anaikāntika tvāt ahetuḥ pratikarma vyavasthā ca nirākāra tve api sādhitā vijñāna vādaḥ api nirākṛtaḥ iti aparihāryam anaikāntika tvam sva saṃvedanasya ca vistareṇa nirākṛta tvāt na sva saṃvedyāḥ sukha ādayaḥ iti 
[157,17]	eteṣu saṃkhyā ādiṣu samavetānām sāmānyānām sva āśraya grāhakaiḥ indriyaiḥ saṃyukta samaveta samavāyāt grahaṇam iti atra saṃkhyā ādi vacanam ghaṭa tva ādi niṣedha artham sāmānyeṣu samaveta sāmānya anabhyupagamāt ādi grahaṇena sukha ādi paryyantam gṛhyate teṣu samavetānām sattā guṇa tva saṃkhyā ādīnām sukha ādi antānām sāmānyānām sva āśraya grāhakaiḥ iti saṃkhyā ādi karmānteṣu samavetānām cakṣuṣā sparśanena vā saṃyukta samaveta samavāyāt grahaṇam rūpa āśritānām cakṣuṣā eva sparśa āśritānām sparśanena eva gandha āśritānām ghrāṇena eva rasa āśritānām rasanena eva sukha ādi āśritānām manasā eva sattā guṇa tvayoḥ tu sarva guṇa āśrita tvāt sarva indriyaiḥ grahaṇam iti 
[157,25]	nanu ca sattāyāḥ pratyakṣa tvam kadācid bhavati sarvatra sat sat iti pratyakṣa darśanāt guṇa tvasya tu katham pratyakṣa tvam na hi vaiśeṣikaiḥ apratāritānām rūpa ādiṣu anugatam guṇa tvam pratibhāti loke śāstra antareṣu ca anyatra api guṇa vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ katham rūpa ādiṣu eva guṇa tvam yadi ca rūpa ādiṣu eva guṇa tvam syāt tatas rūpe rase vā guṇa saṅka eta grahaṇāt sarvatra guṇa vyavahāraḥ syāt gavā ādi vyavahāra vat na hi sāmānyam sva vyavahāra artham pratyādhāram saṅketam apekṣate 
[158,1]	yat api anumānam kaiścid uktam rūpa ādayaḥ sattā vyatirikta apara sāmānya sambandhinaḥ apara sāmānya sambandhi datvāt utkṣepaṇa ādi vat iti tat api guṇa tvasya pratyakṣa tu a sādhakam na bhavati atha tyaktam pratyakṣa tvam sattvam eva anena sādhyate na karmaṇā anaikāntika tvāt na hi karmasu sattā vyatiriktam karma tvāt param sāmānyam asti karma tvam eva utkṣepaṇa tva ādibhyaḥ param iti ced evam tarhi nīla tva ādibhyaḥ param rūpa tvam eva astu madhura tva ādibhyaḥ param rasa tvam iti evam sarvatra yojyam 
[158,8]	atha rūpa rasa ādiṣu anugatena sattā vyatiriktena prayojanam karma rūpa ādiṣu anugatena api tarhi prayojanam iti karma vargaḥ api pañcaviṃśatitamaḥ guṇa bhedaḥ eva astu na kaṃcid atra viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ kim eṣām guṇa tvam iti ced guṇa lakṣaṇam eva tat ca asparśa tve sāmānyavatve ca sati dravya āśrita tvam sarveṣām asti rūpa ādīnām sarva indriya pratyakṣam tu guṇa tvam pūrva ācāryaiḥ iṣṭam tat ca tathā astu mā bhūt vā iti na atra nirbandhaḥ asmākam prayojana abhāvāt dravya lakṣaṇam ca dravya tvam guṇa āśraya tvam ca bhavatu mā bhūt vā samavāyi kāraṇa tvam tu kena vāryate guṇa lakṣaṇam saṃkhyā ādiṣu na yuktam lakṣya asiddhatvāt iti ced na yaukta pratyaya siddha tvāt tathā hi eka ādi pratyayāḥ viśeṣaṇa grahaṇa apekṣāḥ viśiṣṭa pratyaya tvāt daṇḍī iti pratyaya vat 
[158,18]	evam api sattva ādi vat eka tva ādeḥ katham guṇa tva siddhiḥ na hi sat ādi pratyaya vat eka ādi pratyayaḥ kvacid na bhavati kaḥ vā atra viśeṣaḥ yena sattva ādīnām guṇa ādiṣu api vṛttiḥ sāmānya anādhāra tvam ca iṣyate na ekatva ādīnām eka ādi vyavahāraḥ ca guṇa ādiṣu tad eka artha samavāyāt tadā adhyāropāt vā na tu evam sat ādi vyavahāraḥ iti atha manyase yadi saṃkhyā guṇaḥ na syāt anitya tvam asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam ca na syāt asti ca tat ubhayam tathā ca uktam eka ādi vyavahāra hetuḥ saṃkhyā sā punar eka dravyā ca aneka dravyā ca tatra eka dravyāyāḥ salila ādi paramāṇu rūpa ādīnām iva nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ aneka dravyā tu dvi tva ādikā parārdha antā tasyāḥ khalu ekatvebhyaḥ aneka viṣaya buddhi sahitebhyaḥ niṣpattiḥ apekṣā buddhi vināśāt ca vināśaḥ kadācid āśraya vināśāt ubhaya vināśāt ca iti ca arthaḥ tathā dvi tva bahu tvayoḥ parimāṇam pratyasamavāyi kāraṇa tvam uktam iti yat tāvat eka tvasya nitya anitya tva niṣpattayaḥ iti tat na bheda vat asambhavāt 
[159,7]	yathā na kārya bhinnatāyām kāraṇa bhinna tānām asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam kalpyate bhinna tāyāḥ sattva ādi vat utpatti ādi asambhavāt tathā ekatvasya api tasya abheda paryāya tvāt abheda bhedau ca sva ātma parātma apekṣau rūpa ādiṣu api bhavataḥ iti na tayoḥ guṇa tva ādi kalpanā iti yathā ca ekam abhinnam iti paryāyaḥ tathā anekam bhinnam iti ca paryāyaḥ tatas ca dvi tva ādiḥ api aneka paryāyaḥ tasya utpatti ādi kalpanā na kāryā 
[159,12]	katham tarhi dve trīṇi ityādi pravibhāgaḥ katham ca na syāt aneka tvasya aviśiṣṭa tvāt na apekṣā buddhi viśeṣa vat tad siddheḥ yathā aneka viṣayi tva aviśeṣe api kācid apekṣā buddhiḥ dvi tva utpādikā kācid tritva utpādikā iti na ca apekṣā buddheḥ pūrvavat dvi tva ādi guṇaḥ asti anavasthā prasaṅgāt apekṣā buddhi janitasya ca dvi tva ādeḥ ānarthakya prasaṅgāt yatas eva viśeṣāt apekṣā buddhi viśeṣaḥ tatas eva dvitā ādi vyavahāraḥ astu iti kim antar gaḍunā dvi tva ādi guṇena kalpitena iti evam hi guṇa ādiṣu api dvi tva vyavahāraḥ akaṣṭa kalpanaḥ syāt tathā gaṇita vyavahāraḥ api ṣaḍbhiḥ viṃśatibhiḥ sārdham śatam iti evamādiḥ sugamaḥ syāt tasmāt abhinnam tāvat ekam iti ucyate tad apareṇa abhinnena saha dvaḥ iti te tad apareṇa abhinnena saha trīṇi iti tāni apareṇa abhinnena saha catvāri iti evamādiḥ samayaḥ gaṇita śāstra prasiddhaḥ ca dvi tva ādi vyavahāra hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti 
[159,23]	yat api parimāṇam prati asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam uktam tat api apramāṇakam eva na hi saṃkhyāyāḥ parimāṇa asamavāyikāraṇa tve pramāṇam kiṃcid asti pariśeṣaḥ iti ced na kāraṇa parimāṇasya eva asamavāyi kāraṇa tva sambhavāt rūpa ādi vat paramāṇu parimāṇa janya tve dvi aṇuke api parama aṇu tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ayuktam kārya kāraṇayoḥ tulya parimāṇa tve dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt sarvatra hi kāraṇa parimāṇāt adhikam eva kārya parimāṇam dṛśyate 
[160,3]	atha tantu dvi tantuka ādīnām mahat tvena tulya parimāṇa tvam eva iti paramāṇu dvi aṇukayoḥ api aṇu tvena aviśeṣe api aṇutara viśeṣaḥ kena vāryate paramāṇu saṃkhyā parimāṇasya kāraṇam na bhavati saṃkhyā tvāt paṭa ādi saṃkhyā vat tathā vivāda gocara āpannā saṃkhyā mahatva ārambhikā api na bhavati saṃkhyā tvāt ubhaya abhimata saṃkhyā vat etena hrasva tva dīrgha tva ārambha niṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ sanniveśa viśeṣaḥ ca dīrgha tva mahatvayoḥ kāraṇam pratīyate tasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam nimitta tvam vā kalpyam iti na asmākam āgrahaḥ tulya parimāṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ ārabdhe mahatva atiśaya darśanāt katham saṃkhyā na kāraṇam iti ced na anaikāntāt tulya prayatnaiḥ bahubhiḥ pāṣāṇa utthāpana ādi atiśaya darśane api na tatra saṃkhyāyāḥ kāraṇa tvam tatra api nimitta tva abhyupagamāt iti ced atra api nimitta tvam kena vāryate sāmānya ādīnām api nimitta tvāt iti 
[160,15]	anye tu parimāṇasya api guṇa tvam na icchanti mahat ādi vyāpārasya apekṣā nibandhana tvāt na ca guṇeṣu evam vyavahāraḥ asti na hi rūpa ādiṣu śukla ādi vyavahāraḥ kṛṣṇa ādi apekṣayā iti nanu ca samidikṣu vaṃśa ādiṣu bhāktaḥ hrasva vyavahāraḥ iti uktam na atra mukhya gauṇa vibhāgasya apramāṇaka tvāt na hi yathā siṃham āṇavaka ādiṣu mukhya gauṇa viveka pratipattiḥ sarveṣām asti tathā dvi aṇuke eva aṇutva hrasva tve mukhye anyatra bhāktaḥ iti kasyacid pratipattiḥ asti prakriyā mātrasya ca sarva śāstreṣu sulabha tvāt na tatas eva vivāda nivṛttiḥ iti 
[160,23]	pṛthaktvasya api guṇa tvam ayuktam bhinna tvasya eva pṛthak iti vyavahāra hetu tvāt yadā tāvat ekam vastu itarebhyaḥ bhinnam paśyati tadā ekam pṛthak iti pratipadyate yadā buddhe vastuni itarebhyaḥ vilakṣaṇa eka dharma yogāt bhinne paśyati tadā dve pṛthak iti manyate yadā tu eka deśa tva ādinā dharmeṇa itarebhyaḥ bahūni bhinnāni paśyati tadā etāni etebhyaḥ pṛthak iti pratipadyate yathā rūpa ādayaḥ dravyāt pṛthak iti evam ca bheda pratyāyaka dharma vyatirekeṇa na anyat asti pṛthaktvam tatas ca tad prakriyā gahanam api nistīrṇam bhavati iti 
[161,2^1]	vibhāgaḥ api saṃyoga abhāva lakṣaṇa tvāt na guṇaḥ cira nivṛtte api saṃyoge kvacid anutpanne api vibhakta pratyaya darśanāt tad vyatirikta vibhāga svarūpa anupalambhāt na upacāra kalpanā api sādhvī iti vibhāga abhāve kutas saṃyoga nivṛttiḥ iti ced na karmaṇaḥ eva saṃyoga nivarttaka tvāt karma mātrāt api saṃyoga nivṛtti prasaṅgaḥ iti ced saṃyoga mātra nivṛttiḥ iṣṭā eva karma viśeṣāt tu saṃyoga viśeṣa evṛttiḥ tvad mate api vibhāga viśeṣa utpatti vat iti saṃyoga utpādakasya katham nivarttaka tvam iti ced karma utpādakasya tarhi saṃyogasya karma nivarttaka tvam na prāpnoti anyasya tat nivarttaka tvam iti ced samānam saṃyoga antam karma iti vacanāt 
[161,2^2]	na hi yena eva karmaṇā yaḥ saṃyogaḥ janitaḥ sa tena eva nivarttyate iti guṇānām eva kārya kāraṇa ubhaya virodhi tvam na karmaṇaḥ iti ced na vacana mātrāt vivāda nivṛtteḥ asambhavāt anvaya vyatirekābhyām hi yat yathā dṛśyate tat tathā abhyupagantavyam karmaṇaḥ api ca guṇa tvam eva sāmānyavataḥ sparśānādhāra tve sati dravya āśrita tvāt rūpa ādi vat iti vibhāga ja vibhāgasya śabdam prati asamavāyi kāraṇa tvāt katham na guṇa tvam iti ced na asiddha tvāt vaṃśa pāṭana ādiṣu vāyu saṃyoga viśeṣāt eva śabda viśeṣa utpatteḥ aṅguli mukta tantrī vat vāyu saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ api dravya viśeṣa sāmarthyāt kvacid īdṛśaḥ bhavati ghaṇṭā ādi vat tat na śabda liṅgaḥ api vibhāgaḥ 
[161,18]	yat api uktam vivakṣita avayava kriyā ākāśa ādi deśebhyaḥ vibhāgam na karoti dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga virodhi vibhāga utpādaka tvāt yā punar ākāśa ādi deśa vibhāga kartrī sā saṃyoga viśeṣa nivartaka vibhāga janikā api na bhavati yathā aṅguli kriyā iti evam ca ākāśa ādi deśa vibhāga utpādakaḥ avaśyam vibhāgaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ karmaṇaḥ hi vibhāga utpādane viramya vyāpāra anupalabdheḥ iti na vibhāga utpādaka tvasya asiddha tvāt kriyātaḥ eva saṃyoga nivṛttiḥ iti uktam 
[161,24]	atha ākāśa ādi deśa saṃyogam sā na nivartayati dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga nivartaka tvāt iti vivakṣitam tathā api asādhāraṇaḥ hetuḥ sa pakṣe api ākāśa ādi deśa saṃyoga anivartake rūpa ādau na vartate iti virodha abhāvaḥ ca yathā kācid avayava kriyā kāśa ādi deśa saṃyogam dravya ārambhaka saṃyogam ca yugapad na karoti atha ca viśiṣṭa kriyā karoti tathā ubhaya saṃyoga vināśam api yadi api kācid kriyā kurvatī na dṛṣṭā tathā api viśiṣṭā kariṣyati iti 
[161,30_162,5]	yadi vibhāga ja vibhāgaḥ na asti hasta kuḍya saṃyoga vināśe api tarhi śarīra kuḍya saṃyoga vināśaḥ na prāpnoti na vai hasta kuḍya saṃyoga vyatirekeṇa śarīra kuḍya saṃyogam paśyāmaḥ saḥ adṛśyamānaḥ katham kalpyate hasta kuḍya saṃyoga darśanāt eva kalpyate iti ced hasta karma darśanāt tarhi śarīre api karma kasmāt na kalpyate tulya yogakṣema tvāt api ca hasta kuḍya saṃyoga nāśāt eva śarīra kuḍya saṃyoga nāśaḥ bhaviṣyati na vibhāga ja vibhāgena prayojanam nanu pratibaddhaḥ eva vināśaḥ vināśa hetuḥ iṣṭaḥ na sarvaḥ pratibaddha tvam khalu na upadeśa gamyam kin tu anvaya vyatireka samadhigamyam tat ca atra api asti iti na saṃyoga abhāva vyatiriktaḥ vibhāgaḥ 
[162,9]	na api paratva aparatve saṃyukta saṃyoga alpīyaḥ tu abhūyaḥ tvayoḥ pūrva uttara janmanoḥ ca para apara vyavahāra hetu tvāt viprakṛṣṭam param iti vā anayoḥ bhedam na paśyāmaḥ tathā sannikṛṣṭam aparam iti vā anayoḥ api eka artha tvam tasmāt viprakṛṣṭa saṃnikṛṣṭa buddhibhyām paratva aparatvayoḥ utpattiḥ iti api na yuktam na hi ghaṭa buddhim apekṣya kumbhaḥ utpadyate iti yuktam api ca evam sāmānyeṣu api mahat alpa ādhāra tva buddhi apekṣayoḥ paratva aparatvayoḥ utpattiḥ kalpanīyā syāt aviśeṣāt tasmāt sāmānya ādiṣu iva saṅketa nibandhanaḥ ayam parāpara vyavahāraḥ saṅketa nimittam ca saṃyukta saṃyoga bhūyaḥ tu a ādi cintitam eva iti kim ca paratva aparatvayoḥ guṇa tvam abhyupagacchata anya tvam ca guṇaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ kāla kṛta dikkṛtāni avyavahārasya asamāna tvāt iti 
[162,19]	vegaḥ api na guṇa antaram kriyāṇām śīghra utpāda mātre vega vyavahārāt vegena gacchati iti pratīteḥ kriyātaḥ artha antaram vegaḥ iti ced na vegena gacchati iti śīghram gacchati iti eka artha tvāt tat yathā vegena śāstram jānāti vegena ṣaṣṭhikāḥ pacyante iti santānena āgataḥ śabdaḥ iti atra api na śabda vyatiriktaḥ guṇaḥ santāna ākhyaḥ abhyupagamyate śabda dharmaḥ kāraṇa śabdaḥ vā santānaḥ iti ced evam tarhi karma karma kāraṇa karma vā vegaḥ iti astu karmaṇaḥ karma ārambhaka tve anuparama prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na śabda vat tad uparama upapatteḥ karma karma sādhyam na vidyate iti asya virodhaḥ iti ced na vacana mātra virodhasya avirodhāt 
[162,27]	nanu sarvajña tvāt kāṇāda sūtrāṇām vacana mātra tvam ayuktam asya muṣṭinā vajram dhṛtavataḥ śakraḥ pratyakṣaḥ abhūt iti śrūyate sa tathā ca asya bhagavān maheśvaraḥ pratyakṣaḥ abhūt iti śrūyate satyam jaimineḥ api sarvajña tvāt tad sūtrāṇām api vacana mātra tvam ayuktam tathā ca asya api muṣṭinā vajram dhṛtavataḥ śakraḥ pratyakṣaḥ abhūt iti śrūyate tathā śārīraka sūtra praṇetuḥ api sarvajña tvam atīndriya jñāna dātṛ tvāt tat uktam ṛṣṭiḥ ca atīndriya arājan dūrāt śrūvaṇam eva ca pituḥ prasādāt me prāptam pārāśaryasya dhīmataḥ iti 
[163,7]	tathā kapilasya api sarvajña tvam naisargika jñāna atiśaya prabhāva atiśaya yukta tvāt tathā ca asya dṛṣṭi nipāta mātrāt eva mahā vīrya parākramāṇām sagarāṇām ṣaṣṭi sahasrāṇi bhasmībhūtāni iti śrūyate tathā akṣapādasya api sākṣāt upetya pratyakṣībhūtvā bhagavatā maheśvareṇa nyāya śāstra karaṇe abhyanujñā dattā iti śrūyate evam eteṣām mahā ṛṣīṇām śāstrāṇi sarvajña ukta tvena kim na asmābhiḥ śraddhīyante kintu manda buddhibhiḥ asmābhiḥ aviruddha artha tvena vyākhyātum na śakyante anyaiḥ api yathā vyākhyātāni tathā paraspara viruddha arthāni eva pratīyante viruddha arthānām ca sarveṣām prāmāṇyam vaktum aśakyam katamasya atra pakṣapātam kurmaḥ sarveṣām sarvajña tvāt pūjya tvāt ca tasmāt yathā śruta arthānām eva yeṣām nyāya viruddha tvam pratibhāti teṣām veda vākyānām iva keṣāṃcid vacana mātra tvena aprāmāṇyam uktam iti doṣaḥ nyāya śāstram ca vyākhyātum vayam pravṛttāḥ tena asmākam vaiśeṣika tantreṇa virodhaḥ na doṣāya na ca nyāya sūtram karmaṇaḥ sajātīya ārambhaka tva guṇa tva pratiṣedhakam saṃkhyā ādīnām guṇa tva vidhāyakam ca asti iti 
[163,19^1]	yadi evam saṃkhyā ādi āśritānām sāmānyānām saṃyukta samaveta samavāyāt grahaṇam iti etat virudhyate na vicāraṇa artham anya matena asya upakṣepāt asmākam punar ayam abhiprāyaḥ pradhāne vastuni yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ pradhānam ca vastu niḥśreyasa aṅgam vakṣyamāṇakam yat asiddhau tat na siddhyati tat api yatnatas sādhanīyam yat siddhau ca tasya asiddhiḥ tat ca pratiṣeddhavyam eva iti saṃkhyā ādi pratiṣedhe api na asmākam prayojanam kintu vibhāga je vibhāge dvi tve ca abhiniveśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti upadeśa śravaṇāt atra eva mumukṣubhiḥ āgrahaḥ na kartavyaḥ saṃkhyā ādīnām guṇa tva asiddhau api mumukṣūṇām na kācid kṣatiḥ iti etet jñāpana artham tat pratiṣedhaḥ api darśitaḥ iti tathā atīndriya guru tvam iti atra api āgrahaḥ na kartavyaḥ kara tala ādi upari sthite dravya viśeṣe patana anupalambhe api guru tvasya pratibhāsanāt 
[163,19^2]	rajaḥ prabhṛtīnām api guru tvam kasmāt na gṛhyate iti ced grahaṇa ayogya tvāt yogya ayogya tve ca tad grahaṇa agrahaṇa anumeye rasa ādīnām iva anyathā gandha rasa ādīnām api atīndriya tvam syāt tad āśraya pratyakṣe api kvacid agrahaṇāt iti taijasasya api asti dravya tvam iti atra api āgrahaḥ na karttavyaḥ suvarṇa ādīnām āgamataḥ taijasa tva siddhau api pārthivasya eva drava tvasya rasa ādi vat tatra saṃyukta samavetasya api grahaṇa sambhavāt sarvam tejaḥ drava tva yuktam rūpi tvāt toya vat iti ced na pratyakṣeṇa syandana karma anupalambhena ca bādhita viṣaya tvāt ittham dharmakam tat tejasi drava tvam jātam yat pratyakṣam na bhavati spandana kriyām ca na karoti iti ced gurutva rasau api evaṃdharmakau rūpi tvāt eva kin na tejasaḥ abhyupagamyete tulya doṣa parihāra tvāt iti 
[164,11]	snehaḥ apām eva guṇaḥ iti atra api āgrahaḥ na kartavyaḥ ghṛta ādeḥ api loke vaidyaka ādi śāstre ca snigdha tvena prasiddha tvāt ghṛta ādau anya nimittaḥ aupacārikaḥ vā snigdha pratyayaḥ iti ced viparyayaḥ kasmāt na iṣyate tathā hi toya saṃparke api odana ādau gātra ādau ca snigdha pratyayaḥ na asti ghṛta ādi saṃparke tu snigdha pratyayaḥ sarveṣām api bhavati eva iti mṛjā ādi hetu tvam ca vāyu agni ādi vat dravya viśeṣa sāmarthyāt saṅgraha hetu tvam api sneha rahitasya api kṣīra ja tu ādeḥ darśanāt na sneha nimittam tasmāt na apām viśeṣa guṇaḥ snehaḥ iti 
[164,19^1]	yadi punar kāṭhinya mārdava ādi vat snigdha tā api na guṇaḥ iti kaścid upapādayati tatra api na asmākam grahaḥ prayojana abhāvāt nanu ca kāṭhinya ādeḥ api saṃyoga viśeṣava tvāt katham na guṇa tvam tathā ca uktam avayavānām praśithila saṃyoge mṛdu tvam iti ākhyāyate kāṭhinyam api saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ eva iti tat ayuktam cakṣuṣā saṃyogeṣu gṛhyamāṇeṣu api mārdava ādeḥ apratibhāsanāt kaṭa ādi avayavānām praśithila saṃyoge api mṛdu tva apratīteḥ viśiṣṭa carma ādi avayavānām apraśithila saṃyogi tve api mṛdu tva upalabdheḥ katham tarhi kaṭhinam eva dravyam mardana ādinā kvacid mṛdu tvam āpadyate na ca etat eva dravyam mṛdu bhavati kim tarhi pūrva dravya nivṛttau dravya antaram tad dharmakam utpadyate 
[164,19^2]	saṃyoga viśeṣa mṛdu tva vādinā api pūrva dravya nivṛttiḥ abhyupagantavyā eva dravya dharma tve mṛdu tva ādeḥ ghaṭa tva ādi vat dvi indriya grāhya tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na suvarṇa ādīnām sthāvara jāti viśeṣāṇām ca keṣāṃcid dvi indriya grāhya tva adarśanāt sparśa dharmaḥ vā astu mṛdu tva ādiḥ mṛdu sparśaḥ kaṭhina sparśaḥ iti pratīteḥ atas eva sparśasya pākaja tvam siddhyati ghaṭa ādiṣu rūpa ādi vat vilakṣaṇa sparśa upalambhāt na ca kāṭhinya ādi vyatirekeṇa sparśasya anyat vailakṣaṇyam śakyam vyavasthāpayitum availakṣaṇye api pākaja tvam ayuktam parimāṇa ādeḥ api pāka ja tu aprasaṅgāt kāṭhinya ādeḥ ca agni saṃyoga anuvidhāyi tva darśanāt anyatra api sparśa antara prādurbhāva darśanena adṛṣṭaḥ api agni saṃyogaḥ dravya antara prādurbhāva darśanena eva anumātavyaḥ iti alam prasaṅgena 
[165,11^1]	śabda āśritāni sāmānyāni śabda tvaka tva ādīni teṣām śrotra indriya samavetāḥ ye śabdāḥ teṣu samavāyena grahaṇam iti arthaḥ śrotra indriye samavāyaḥ śabdānām kutas siddhaḥ iti ced ākāśasya eva śrotra tvāt nanu ākāśam eva tāvat asiddham kutas tasya śrotva tvam iti na ākāśasya śabda liṅga tvāt tathā hi kvacid samavetaḥ śabdaḥ guṇa tvāt rūpa ādi vat yatra samavetaḥ tasya ākāśam iti saṃjñā kriyate guṇa tvam kutas iti ced ucyate guṇaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyavat tve sati sāmānya vat anādhāra tvāt rūpa ādi vat iti deśa antara gati pratīteḥ dravyam śabdaḥ iti ced na utpatti santānāt śāyā vat deśa antare pratīteḥ duḥkha viśeṣa hetu tvāt sparśavān chabdaḥ kaṇṭaka ādi vat iti ced na tīvra tva ādi viśeṣa nimitta tvāt duḥkha viśeṣasya tasmāt sparśavān chabdaḥ iti bhrāntiḥ sparśava tve hi śabdasya prativāte parṇa ādi vat āgamanam na syāt kuḍya ādi parataḥ avasthitasya ca śara vāyu ādi vat āgamanam na syāt tṛṇa ādīnām ca śabda jaḥ kampaḥ gṛhyate vegavat dravya viśeṣa sambandhasya kriyā hetu tvāt tasmāt santānavān guṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti 
[165,11^2]	pūrva ācāryaiḥ tu ayam hetuḥ uktaḥ sāmānyavat tve sati anitya tve sati bāhya niyata eka indriya grāhya tvāt iti atra asparśavat tve sati iti api viśeṣaṇam kartavyam anyathā vāyunā anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ syāt sa hi tvac indriyeṇa eva gṛhyate na hi sparśa mātra grahaṇe vāyuḥ ayam iti pratyayaḥ sambhavati cākṣuṣaḥ api prasaktaḥ iti ced na arūpi dravyasya ācākṣuṣa tvāt tṛṇa dhūli vṛkṣa parṇa ādi kriyā ādeḥ tu liṅgasya anupalambhe vāyu pratibhāsā bhāvāt ca iti 
[165,11^3]	tvac indriyeṇa api sparśa grahaṇāt vāyuḥ anumīyate iti ced na uṣṇa ādi sparśena abhibhūtasya vāyu sparśasya agrahaṇe api vāyu pratibhāsa darśanāt sva śarīra ādi kriyā anupalambhe api sa kriya vāyu pratibhāsamānāt ca iti pṛthivyām sparśa bhedasya dṛṣṭa tvāt tad viśeṣaḥ eva vāyuḥ iti eke tat ayuktam jala tejasoḥ api pṛthivī viśeṣa tva prasaṅgāt pratyakṣeṇa bhinna jātīya grahaṇasya atra api samāna tvāt guru tva rahita tvāt ca na pṛthivī viśeṣaḥ tat eva kutas iti ced tat ucyate yāvat eva guru tvam riktāyāḥ bhastrāyāḥ tāvat eva vāyu āpūritāyāḥ api upalabhyate iti alam prasaṅgena tat na tāvat asiddham śabdasya guṇa tvam atas asti kaścid āśrayaḥ asya iti 
[166,7^1]	sa tarhi pṛthivī ādi vilakṣaṇaḥ iti kutas avagamyate na pṛthivī ādi āśrayaḥ śabdaḥ śrotra grāhya tvāt chabda tva ādi vat pṛthivī ādi guṇa tva śrotra grāhya tvayoḥ kaḥ virodhaḥ iti ced ucyate yadi bherī ādi śabdaḥ bherī ādi āśrayaḥ tadā bherī ādau viprakṛṣṭe vyavahite vā tad śabda śravaṇam na syāt na hi indriyeṇa asaṃyukte guṇini tad guṇaḥ grahītum śakyate gandha vat iti ced na gandha vat dravya avayavānām āgatya ghrāṇa indriyeṇa sambaddhānām tad gandha upalabdheḥ prativāte ca gandha agrahaṇāt 
[166,7^2]	na ca evam bheryāḥ avayavānām āgamanam tad avayaveṣu tādṛt śabda anupalabdheḥ prativāte api tad śabda śravaṇāt ca na api indriyāṇām vyāpaka tvam sarva artha grāhaka tva prasaṅgāt vyāpaka tve api indriyāṇām tad adhiṣṭhāna arthayoḥ avaśyam pratyāsattiḥ apekṣaṇīya iti tasmāt na bherī ādi samavetaḥ śabdaḥ vyakti antare śabdaḥ samavetaḥ iti ced na vyakti antaram khalu kim bherī ādideśa stham uta śrotra deśa stham bherī ādi deśa stha tve pūrvavat doṣaḥ śrotra deśa stha tve katham anyatra avasthitam bherī ādikam śrotra sambaddhe dravye śabdam janayet atiprasaṅgāt etena eva manaḥ guṇa tvam nirastam 
[166,20]	vyāpakam tat vyakti antaram iti ced tat eva ākāśam vyāpaka sparśa ādi asambhavāt ātmā iti ced na ātmanaḥ ananta tvāt iti vakṣyāmaḥ tad guṇa tve ca anantaḥ gakāraḥ sakṛt upalabhyeta diś kālaḥ vā śabdasya āśrayaḥ iti ced na saṃjñā bheda mātra tvāt yadi hi diś kālau śabda āśrayāt bhinnau sādhayitum śakṣyāmaḥ tatas tau abhyupagamiṣyāmaḥ no ced tadā na tābhyām prayojanam śabda āśrayaḥ tu ākāśam iti siddham 
[166,27^1]	tathā api tat eva śrotram iti kutas siddhyati pariśeṣāt tathā hi pārthivam tāvat na śrotram indriya tve sati gandha āgrāhaka tvāt rasana ādi vat evam rasa agrāhaka tvāt na āpyam rūpa agrāhaka tvāt na taijasam sparśa agrāhaka tvāt na vāyavīyam iti viparyayeṇa udāharttavyam ghrāṇasya tu pārthiva tvam eva rūpa rasa gandha sparśeṣu madhye gandhasya eva vyañjaka tvāt ubhaya prasiddha pārthiva dravya vat grīṣma varṣa udakena anaikāntaḥ iti ced na tasya rasasya api vyañjaka tvāt tathā api ayam eva rasanam teṣu madhye rasasya eva vyañjaka tvāt danta udaka vat tathā taijasam eva cakṣuḥ teṣu eva madhye rūpasya eva vyañjaka tvāt pradīpa vat tathā vāyavīyam eva sparśanam teṣu eva madhye sparśasya eva vyañjaka tvāt vyajana anila vat bāhya indriya grāhya guṇa samavāyi śrotram bāhya indriya tvāt rasana ādi vat 
[166,27^2]	tadvat sva guṇa āgrāhaka tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na viśeṣa virodhasya adūṣaṇa tvāt svatantram ced sādhanam na śabda upalabdhyā eva bādhi tvāt nirguṇena eva indriyeṇa śabda upalabdhiḥ iti ced na nirguṇasya indriya tve manaḥ vat niyata viṣaya tva abhāva prasaṅgāt bhautikānām eva pradīpa ādīnām niyata viṣaya tva darśanāt diś śrotram iti āgama virodhāt na bhautikam śrotram iti ced na anya artha tvāt āgamasya diś iti devatā kācid ucyate tathā ca jaigīṣavyādi śāstreṣu cetanā daśabhujā ca śrotra adhiṣṭhātrī devatā sā dhyeya tvena divya śrotra artham vyākhyātā tat adhiṣṭhitam śrotram dicśrotram iti upacaryate yathā manaḥ candramāḥ ityādi tasmāt ākāśasya karṇa śaṣkulī avacchinnasya śrotra tvāt tad samavāyāt eva śabda grahaṇam iti yuktam uktam 
[167,19_167,22]	etat iti pūrva uktāḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyukta samavāyaḥ saṃyukta samaveta samavāyaḥ samavāyaḥ samaveta samavāyaḥ ca iti pañca sambandhāḥ taiḥ sambandhaiḥ sambaddhā ye arthā as taiḥ saha abhāvasya samavāyasya ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ sambandhaḥ kutas punar ṣaḍvidha sambandha siddhiḥ asaṃaśabda upādānāt nikarṣa grahaṇāt eva sambandha mātra siddheḥ asaṃaśabdaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt tasmāt sambhavī nikarṣaḥ sambhavī ca ṣaḍvidhaḥ eva iti ācārya adhyayana pādaḥ viśva rūpa prabhṛtayaḥ api evam eva vyācakṣate taiḥ tu ani agrahaṇasya api prayojana antaram vācyam karṣa grahaṇāt eva sambandha mātra siddheḥ aneka artha tvāt ca dhātoḥ iti sambandha artha tvena karṣa śabdasya aprasiddha tvāt iti ced nikarṣa śabdaḥ kva sambandha vācaka tvena prasiddaḥ kin tu nikṛṣṭiḥ nikarṣaḥ iti nikṛṣṭa tā abhidhāyaka tvena eva prasiddhaḥ tasmāt upasarga dvaya sahitasya kṛṣeḥ sambandha vācaka tvam yathā samavābhyām sahitasya iṇaḥ śiṣṭa prayoga darśana anurodhena hi dhātūnām vyasta samasta upasarga sāmarthyāt anya artha tvam sva artha avat yotanam vā abhyupagantavyam yadṛcchā śabdaḥ ced upasarga vicāreṇa tarhi kim kutas tarhi ṣaḍvidha sambandha siddhiḥ prakāśa ādi sahakāri siddhi vat anvaya vyatirekābhyām nyāya siddhasya api sūtrakāra anumata tvāt iti 
[168,10]	tatra saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāvena abhāvasya grahaṇam yathā aghaṭa śūnyam bhū talam a iti atra ghaṭa abhāvaḥ indriya saṃyukta bhū tala viśeṣaṇa tvena pratīyate abhū tale ghaṭaḥ na asti a iti atra viśeṣya tvena iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya aniyata tvāt ubhayathā api udāharaṇam yuktam evam sarvatra udāharaṇīyam anuṣṇaḥ ayam sparśaḥ iti saṃyukta samaveta viśeṣaṇa bhāvena auṣṇya abhāvaḥ gṛhyate toya sparśe na asti auṣṇyam iti saṃyukta samaveta viśeṣya bhāvena iti aśuklam nīlatva sāmānyam nīlatve śauklyam na asti iti saṃyukta samaveta samaveta viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvāt śauklya abhāvaḥ gṛhyate atīvraḥ vīṇā śabdaḥ vīṇā śabde tīvra tvam na asti iti samaveta viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvāt tīvra tva abhāvaḥ bheda śūnyam śabda tvam śabda tve bhedaḥ na asti iti samaveta samaveta viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvāt bheda abhāvaḥ śabda tve gṛhyate 
[168,20]	saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa ādi bhāvena sarva arthānām grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na etat iṣṭa kāryam dṛṣṭvā hi kāraṇa sāmarthyam kalpyate na tu kāraṇa sadbhāvāt avidyamānam api kāryam kalpyate cakṣuḥ saṃyogāt añjana ākāśa ādeḥ api pratyakṣa tva kalpanā prasaṅgāt dṛśya abhāvasya iti viśeṣita tvāt tena yathābhūte deśe yathābhūtaḥ arthaḥ darśana yogyaḥ tathābhūte deśe tathābhūta artha abhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate iti saṃyoga ādi abhāvaḥ api indriya sannikṛṣṭena arthena abhāvasya sannidhi viśeṣaḥ asti eva yaḥ tad darśana hetuḥ tad darśanena eva ca anumeyaḥ sa ca sahakāri viśeṣāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva hetu tvāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ iti ucyate saṃyoga ādi sambandha vailakṣṇya jñāpana artham na tu viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eva sambandhaḥ saṃyoga samavāya ānarthakya prasaṅgāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya sarvatra vidyamāna tvāt iti 
[168,29]	na ca adṛṣṭa viśeṣaḥ eva sambandhaḥ tasya atīndriya tvāt sambandha grahaṇasya api viśiṣṭa pratyaya utpattau anvaya vyatirekābhyām dṛṣṭa sāmarthya tvāt tathā hi daṇḍaḥ asya asti iti daṇḍī iti pratīyate daṇḍa puruṣa sambandha apratītau ca na daṇḍī iti pratītiḥ asti atas eva pratyakṣaḥ samavāyaḥ tad apratyakṣa tve hi śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti evam guṇa viśiṣṭe guṇini pratyayaḥ na syāt samavāyaḥ api viśeṣaṇa tvena tad viśeṣya tvena vā gṛhyate tatas tad sambandha antara grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti anavasthā syāt iti ced na samavāyasya sambandha grahaṇa ākṣepaka tvena apratibhāsanāt na hi pratyakṣāt anayoḥ samavāyaḥ iti idam atra samavetam iti vā samavāyi etat iti vā kasyacid pratītiḥ asti yathā bhū tale ghaṭaḥ na asti iti sarveṣām asti pratītiḥ 
[169,10^1]	atas eva samavāyasya api sambandhaḥ na iṣyate na hi yathā anayoḥ saṃyogaḥ iti saṃyuktam etat iti ca pratyayaḥ saṃyoga saṃyogi sambandha grahaṇa ākṣepakaḥ asti tathā samavāya samavāyi sambandha grahaṇa ākṣepakam kiṃcid asti yauktikena api anayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti jñānena sambandha antaram vyavasthāpyate iti ced na anavasthā prasaṅgāt iṣyate eva anavasthā iti ced evam astu yadi ghaṭayitum śakyate eka sambandha nirācikīrṣayā anantān sambandha anabhyupagacchata ātmanaḥ aniṣṭa parihāra kauśalam khyāpitam bhavati na mayā sambandha ānantyam abhyupagamyate kintu maula sambandha sādhakasya hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam udbhāvyate iti ced na akṣaja pratyayasya hetu tvena ukta tvāt viśiṣṭa pratyayaḥ akṣajaḥ viśeṣaṇa tad sambandha grahaṇam antareṇa na bhavati iti uktam anakṣajaḥ tu pratyayaḥ svarūpa bheda kalpanayā api bhavati yathā dravya ādiṣu satī sattā iti na hi indriyāt evam pratibhāsaḥ bhavati aśruta śāstrāṇām api bhavet tasmāt samavāyasya tu kvacid eva grahaṇam yathā ghaṭe rūpa samavāyaḥ iti etat eka deśīya matena draṣṭavyam 
[169,10^2]	mama eva vā skhalitam etat aparyālocita grantha karaṇāt nanu ca yathā indriyeṇa ghaṭa abhāvaḥ bhū tala viśeṣaṇa tvena viśeṣya tvena vā gṛhyate tathā samavāyaḥ api ghaṭa ādi viśeṣaṇa tvena viśeṣya tvena vā gṛhyate iti uktam kaiścid tatas tasya api sambandhaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ iti na etat asti yatas samavāyasya tu kvacid eva buddhau tathā avabhāsanam yathā ghaṭe rūpa samavāyaḥ iti asat upadeśa viparyāsita buddhau eva samavāyasya tathā avabhāsanam na tu abhāvasya iva sarva vyavahartṛ buddhau iti arthaḥ tasmāt yauktikam eva samavāyasya pratyakṣa tvam asambaddhasya samavāyasya katham grahaṇam iti ced na pratyakṣa yogya ubhaya sambandhi indriya saṃnikarṣāt eva adṛṣṭa ādi sahitāt sambandha grahaṇa upapatteḥ na sambandhasya api sannikarṣa antaram anviṣyate sattāyām sattā antara vat saḥ eva ca samavāya samavāyinoḥ indriya saṃnikṛṣṭayoḥ nirviśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ pratyaya nimitta tvāt saṃyukte viśeṣaṇa bhāva ādīnām anyatamam vyapadeśam api labhate tad sambandha abhyupagame vā anavasthā abhyupagantavyā iti 
[170,8]	ye tu nyāya śāstra artha nirākaraṇa artham mahatā prapañcena samavāyam nirākurvanti tān prati naiyāyikaiḥ api samavāya samarthana artham mahatā prapañcena guṇi guṇa ādīnām tādātmyam nirākarttavyam tad nirākaraṇa nyāyam vā anya apoha dūṣaṇa prastāve anaikānta dūṣaṇa prastāve ca darśayiṣyāmaḥ tatas saṃyoga ādi sambandha siddhiḥ sakala śāstra artha saṃsiddhiḥ ca 
[170,13]	tatra yuta siddhayoḥ saṃśleṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ yuta siddhiḥ tu dravyayoḥ pāraṃparyeṇa api avayava avayavi bhāva rahita tvam evam yuta siddhi abhāvāt na asti vibhūnām saṃyogaḥ iti ayuktam hetoḥ asiddha tvāt pramāṇa siddhaḥ ca vibhūnām saṃyogaḥ tathā hi ākāśena saṃyuktaḥ ātmā śarīra saṃyukta tvāt bhū tala ādi vat ayutasiddayoḥ saṃśleṣaḥ samavāyaḥ iti evam ca na bhū tala ghaṭa abhāva ādi sambandhena aviśeṣaḥ samavāyasya iti 
[170,19]	deśa viprakṛṣṭāḥ satya loka ādayaḥ ati dūra sthāḥ vyavahitāḥ ca nāga bhuvana ādayaḥ kāla viprakṛṣṭāḥ tu atīta anāgatāḥ svabhāva viprakṛṣṭāḥ paramāṇu ākāśa ādayaḥ iti teṣām tri prakārāṇām viprakṛṣṭānām samastānām vyastānām vā grāhakam pratyakṣam yogi pratyakṣam iti ucyate tat ca avasthā dvaye bhavati yukta avasthāyām ayukta avasthāyām ca tatra yukta avasthāyām ātma antaḥkaraṇa saṃyogāt eva dharma ādi sahitāt aśeṣa artha grahaṇam etat ca parama yogi vivakṣayā uktam na tu yogi mātrasya aśeṣa arthasya grahaṇam bhavati ātma antaḥkaraṇa saṃyogāt eva iti avadhāraṇam artha saṃnikarṣa niṣedha artham na tu sahakāri mātra niṣedha artham dharma ādi sahitāt iti ukta tvāt artha saṃnikarṣa niṣedha upapattayaḥ prāk eva uktāḥ iti 
[170,27]	tatra rasana cakṣuḥ tvacām anyatamena artha grahaṇe catuṣṭaya sannikarṣaḥ caturṇām saṃyogaḥ iti arthaḥ ātmā manasā saṃyujyate manaḥ indriyeṇa indriyam arthena iti śrotreṇa artha grahaṇe trayāṇām ātma manaḥ śrotrāṇām saṃnikarṣaḥ manasā artha grahaṇe dvayoḥ ātma manasoḥ saṃnikarṣaḥ iti evam ca ārṣam atra eva antarbhūtam na pramāṇa antaram yogi pratyakṣa lakṣaṇena saṅgṛhīta tvāt deśa ādi viprakṛṣṭeṣu artheṣu samyak aparokṣa anubhavaḥ hi yogi pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam vyāsa ādīnām api evambhūtaḥ eva anubhavaḥ prakṛṣṭāt dharmāt bhavati prakṛṣṭa dharmaḥ tu yoga aṅga anuṣṭhānāt vā bhavatu tapaḥ prakarṣāt vā yajña ādi sādhana prakarṣāt vā iti na tad viśeṣāt eva pramāṇa abheda atiprasaṅgāt iti yogi sadbhāvaḥ tu śruti smṛti purāṇa itihāsa an eka yoga śāstreṣu prasiddhaḥ iti tad apalāpaḥ pāpa atiśayam eva naraka ādi ananta yātana ādi nimittam janayati anumānam api yogi sadbhāva avedakam uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ 
[171,11]	anye tu anyathā yogi pratyakṣam vyācakṣate bhāvanā avalata spaṣṭam bhaya ādau iva bhāsate yat jñānam avisaṃvādi tad pramāṇam akalpakam yoginām api praśruta mayena jñānena arthān gṛhītvā yukti cintā mayena vyavasthāpya bhāvayatām tat niṣpattau yat spaṣṭa avabhāsi jñānam tat pratyakṣam tat ca avisaṃvādi tvāt pramāṇam spaṣṭa ābha tvāt avikalpakam iti bhaya ādau iva iti artha sāmarthyena samudbhava abhāvena api bhāvanā balāt eva spaṣṭam jñānam utpadyate iti atra nidarśana artham tat eva spaṣṭayati kāma śoka bhaya unmāda caura svapna ādi upaplutāḥ abhūtān api paśyanti puratas avasthitān iva tatra kāma ādi upaplutānām abhūta bhāvanātaḥ spaṣṭam api jñānam visaṃvādi tvāt na pramāṇam yoginām tu bhūta bhāvanātaḥ catur ārya satya para loka ādi darśanam avisaṃvādi tvāt pramāṇam tat eva uktam tasmāt bhūtam abhūtam vā yat yat eva abhibhāvyate bhāvanā pariniṣpattau tad sphuṭa akalpa dhī phalam tatra pramāṇam saṃvādi yat prāṃnirṇīta vastu vat tad bhāvanā jam pratyakṣam iṣṭam śeṣāḥ upaplavā iti 
[172,8^1]	atra idam vicāryate sarva jñānānām nirālambana tve sva saṃvedana mātra tve ca yogi itara pratyakṣayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ śuddha aśuddha tvam viśeṣaḥ iti ced atha manyase yogi pratyakṣam vidhūta kalpanā jālam spaṣṭam eva avabhāsate bhavatu nāma evam tathā api catur ārya satya ādi viṣaya tvam na yuktam na hi sva ātma mātra saṃvedanena catur ārya satya ādikam sākṣātkṛtam iti yuktam atiprasaṅgāt tad ākāra tvāt tad viṣaya tvam iti ced tat kim idānīm sautra antika matam abhyupagatam satyam tathā api atīta anāgata viṣaya tvam katham na hi asataḥ kaścid ākāraḥ asti dṛṣṭa śruta anumita ākāraḥ ca yadi bhāvanā avalataḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva pratibhāti tathā sati bhrāntam eva yogi pratyakṣam syāt avidyamānasya vidyamāna ākāra tayā pratibhāsanāt svapna ādi jñāna vat 
[172,8^2]	atha avisaṃvādi tvāt na bhrāntam na anumāna jātasya avisaṃvādi tve api bhrānta tva abhyupagamāt atha bhrāntasya api saṃvādi tve na prāmāṇyam tathā api pratyakṣasya abhrānta tva viśeṣaṇam virudhyate na ca avisaṃvādi tvam api tad mate yuktam yatas prāpya artha pradarśaka tvam pravṛtti viṣaya pradarśaka tvam vā avabhāta arthāt artha kriyā niṣpattiḥ vā bhavatām avisaṃvādi tvam abhipretam na ca etat atīta ādi artha jñānasya sambhavati vartamāna artha jñānasya api kṣaṇika tva pakṣe na upapadyate eva tasmāt saugatānām yogi pratyakṣa upavarṇanam api asaṅgatam eva iti 
[173,10]	tat iti yogi pratyakṣam caśabdāt ayogi pratyakṣam api dvividham iti arthaḥ tatra saṃjñā ādi sambandha ullekhena jñāna utpatti nimittam sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam tat ca atīndriya tvāt tad sākṣāt udāhartum na śakyate tad phalam eva udāhriyate yathā devadattaḥ daṇḍī ityādi devadattaḥ iti jñānam kevala saṃjñā sambandha ullekhena utpadyate daṇḍī iti viśeṣaṇa sambaddha ullekhī iti evam guṇa ādi viśeṣaṇa tva sambandha ullekhī api jñānam udāhartavyam iti 
[173,15]	atha viśeṣya jñānam kim kevala viśeṣya ālambanam āhosvit viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya ālambanam iti kim ca atas kevala viśeṣya ālambana tve daṇḍī iti pratyayaḥ na syāt adaṇḍe puruṣe yathā sataḥ api anavabhāsamānasya asat kalpa tvāt sva jñāna viśiṣṭena daṇḍena janitam puruṣa jñānam katham aviśiṣṭam iti ced tat ayuktam sva jñāna viśiṣṭe hi liṅga ādinā anumeya ādi jñānam janyate na ca tat dhūmīyā ityādi rūpeṇa utpadyamānam upalabhyate kim ca agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ iti jñānam pratyakṣa phalam prasajyate kevala pradeśasya indriya sannikṛṣṭa tvāt iti ubhaya ālambana tve api daṇḍa puruṣau iti syāt tad eka jñāna ālambana tva aviśeṣe guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ api na syāt deva datta ādi pratyayena asamāna adhikaraṇa tva prasaṅgāt ca iti 
[173,24^1]	yathādarśanam iti anye surabhi dravyam ityādi jñānasya viśeṣyam eva ālambanam anumeya ādi jñānasya ubhaya ālambanam iti na viśeṣa abhyupagamasya niṣpramāṇaka tvāt anumeya ādi pratyayasya api parvata ādi pratyayena sāmānādhikaraṇya upalambhāt rāṣṭra sena ādi pratyayasya tad nāyaka pratyayena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt anaikāntaḥ iti ced na tatra api rāṣṭra ādi vyavahāra upacaritasya rāja ādi viṣaya tva anabhyupagamāt daṇḍī iti pratyayaḥ daṇḍa viṣayaḥ na bhavati puruṣa pratyayena samāna adhikaraṇa tvāt deva datta ādi pratyaya vat iti evam sarve pratyayāḥ viśeṣaṇa anālambanāḥ sādhayitavyāḥ iti 
[173,24^2]	bhrāntam sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti ced āyātam tarhi śākya darśanam tatra ca sarva kalpanā jñānānām nirviṣaya tvāt ālambana cintā anupapannā eva iti śākya dṛṣṭi niṣedhe ca yathā daṇḍī iti jñānam abhrāntam tathā saḥ eva daṇḍī bhuṅkte ityādi jñānam api abhra antam eva avayave samudāya upacārāt iti ced tad upacāra jñānam bhrāntam abhra antam vā iti bhrāntam iti na yuktam niṣiddha tvāt abhrāntam ced yadi upacārāt api daṇḍī iti jñānam abhrāntam kevala puruṣa ālambanam siddham tadā mukhyam anyat ubhaya ālambanam asti iti kim atra pramāṇam 
[173,24^3]	na ca tad anyasya mukhyasya siddhau upacāra tva kalpanā nyāyyā atiprasaṅgāt pradhāna apekṣayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti ced atha manyase yat eva daṇḍī iti jñāne pradhānam tat eva devadatta ādi jñāne api iti upapadyate sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti na apratibhāsanāt na hi evam pratītiḥ kasyacid asti yat daṇḍī iti jñāne pradhānam tat devadattaḥ iti jñāne api iti api tu devadattaḥ eva daṇḍī iti daṇḍī eva ca devadattaḥ iti pradhāna nirdeśaḥ eva ayam iti ced kaḥ pratikūlaḥ anukūlam ācarati 
[173,24^4]	yadā daṇḍī iti anena pradhānam eva nirdiśyate pradhānam eva ālambanam iti siddham naḥ samīhitam tathā ca daṇḍaḥ yasya asti saḥ eva daṇḍī iti vyapadiśyate ayathāvyapadeśam ca pratītir a iti yat ca uktam sva jñāna viśiṣṭena liṅga ādinā anumeya ādi jñānam janyate na ca tat dhūmīya ityādi rūpeṇa utpadyate iti tat ayuktam na hi etāvat eva kāraṇam viśiṣṭa jñāna utpattau niyamyate kim tarhi samaya smaraṇa sahakāriṇā viśeṣaṇa tad sambandha jñānena viśiṣṭam jñānam janyate vyākaraṇa prasiddha matu artha ādi samaya bheda anuvidhāna vat smṛti nimittam ca aniyatam praṇidhāna ādi sūtre abhihitam 
[173,24^5]	tena ekasmin arthe anekadhā samaya upayoge yathā yathā saṃskāra pratibodhāt smṛtiḥ bhavati tathā tathā sahakāriṇā indriyeṇa tasmin eva arthe pratyaya viśeṣaḥ janyate na ca saha agni sambandhena pradeśa sthaḥ dhūmaḥ gṛhyate yena tasya agnau dhūmīti jñāna janaka tva prasaṅgaḥ codyate yat api agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ iti jñānam pratyakṣa phalam prasajyate iti uktam tatra yadi indriya artha saṃnikarṣāt agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ iti vijñānam bhavati tadā kim iti pratyakṣa phalam na iṣyate anumāna tvena prasiddheḥ iti ced na upacārataḥ api prasiddhi sambhavāt 
[173,24^6]	anumeya agni viśiṣṭaḥ pradeśaḥ api anumeyaḥ iti ucyate na ca dhūmasya apakṣa dharma tva prasaṅgaḥ sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ hi dharmī pakṣaḥ iti ucyate sa ca anumeyaḥ bhavatu vā mā vā bhūt tad sthaḥ hetu pakṣa vṛttiḥ eva tatrasthasya eva agneḥ anumīyamāna tvāt na vyadhikaraṇa tvam api na mahatī jñāna mālāḥ itaretara āśraya tvam vā prasajyate viśeṣaṇa grahaṇasya viśeṣaṇa antara grahaṇa pūrvakatva niyamān abhyupagamāt atas anumānāt agni tad sambandha viṣayam ekam eva jñānam anirdeśyam utpadyate tatas agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ iti jñānam pratyakṣataḥ api bhavati 
[173,24^7]	ye tu atīndriya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa arthasya pratyakṣa tvam ayuktam iti manyante tad mate sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam na prāpnoti devadatta saṃjñā viśiṣṭaḥ hi puruṣaḥ devadattaḥ iti pratīyate na ca tadā devadatta saṃjñā pratyakṣaḥ saṃjñāyāḥ ca viśeṣaṇa tvam daṇḍa ādi vyavacchedaka tvāt tat yathā brāhmaṇeṣu daṇḍinam āhūya bhojayet iti brāhmaṇa antarebhyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ daṇḍena vyavacchidyate tathā puruṣeṣu devadattam vyāharet iti puruṣa antarebhyaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃjñayā eva vyavacchidyate kāka vat upalakṣaṇa mātra tvāt iti ced na paryāya tvāt 
[173,24^8]	upalakṣaṇam viśeṣaṇam vyavacchedakam iti paryāyāḥ eva devadatta gṛham kākī iti pratīti prasaṅgāt iti ced na ukta tvāt yathāsamayam pratītiḥ iti daṇḍena paribrājakaḥ kākena devadatta gṛham iti na anayoḥ vyavacchedaka tve viśeṣaḥ asti tasmāt sajātīyāt vā vijātīyāt vā avasthā antarāt vā yat vyavacchedakam tat sarvam viśeṣaṇam iti ucyate tasmāt gavā ādi saṃjñā tad sambandhau api smaryamāṇau gauḥ ityādi viśiṣṭam jñānam janayantau viśeṣaṇam eva bhavataḥ go tvam eva tatra viśeṣaṇam iti ced na go tva darśane api aprasiddha samayasya gauḥ ityādi jñāna anutpatteḥ iti ubhaya viśeṣaṇam 
[175,15^1]	atra eke vadanti saṃjñā viśeṣaṇa tve go saṃjñakaḥ ayam go śabda vācyaḥ ayam iti jñānam syāt tat ca anumānikam eva iṣyate go śabda sahakāri balena hi sva viṣaya jñāna janaka tvam go saṃjñaka tvam ucyate tat ca atīndriyam eva iti gauḥ iti jñānam ca go tva viśeṣaṇāt eva utpannam tena pratyakṣam iṣyate tathā hi gauḥ ayam gotvavān ayam iti ekaḥ arthaḥ saṃketaḥ api evam eva pratipādyate pratīyate ca iti tat ayuktam yatas na kaścid go tva yogi tvam saṃketa kāle pratyeti pratipādayati vā tasya saṅketa agrahaṇe api pratyakṣa siddha tvāt agṛhīta saṃketaḥ hi mahiṣa ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttātām śāvaleya ādi piṇḍānām sādṛśyam paśyati eva tasmāt abhidhāna abhidheya sambandhaḥ eva samayam grāhayitvā pratipādyate gauḥ ayam go saṃjñakaḥ ayam go śabda vācyaḥ ayam iti eka artha abhidhāyinā anyatama śabdena pratipatrā api tathā eva pratīyate 
[175,15^2]	tasmāt gauḥ ityādi jñānam pratyakṣa phalam icchatā na viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ eka jñāna ālambana tvam abhyupagantavyam na api atīndriya viśeṣaṇa janitam viśeṣya jñāna pratyakṣa phalam eva iti aneka viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa artha jñānam citram etat ityādi rūpam katham iti ced na idam durghaṭam yatas viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ eva krameṇa grahaṇam abhyupagamyate na tu viśeṣaṇa tad sambandhānām api teṣām ekaika jñāna ālambana tva abhyupagamāt kvacid krama gṛhītānām api eka smaraṇa viṣayīkṛtānām viśeṣaṇa tvam iti krama gṛhītānām tu eka smaraṇa viṣaya tvam yathā tathā vākya vicāre vakṣyāmaḥ tat evam sthitam etat viśeṣya jñānam na ubhaya ālambanam kiṃtu viśeṣya ālambanam eva iti kalpanā jñāna tvāt na akṣa jam śabda ādi saṃyojana jñānam na api artha ālambanam iti ced na vikalpa jñānasya api akṣaja tve artha ālambana tve ca virodha abhāvāt yāḥ ca upapattayaḥ tvayā vyākhyātāḥ tāḥ agratas eva dūṣayiṣyāmaḥ tad siddham sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam 
[176,8]	prathama akṣa sannipāta jam hi jñānam samaya smaraṇa viśeṣaṇa grahaṇa nirapekṣam utpannam tena tat nirvikalpakam yogaḥ samādhiḥ ekāgra tā ucyate tatra sthitasya yoginaḥ nirvikalpakam eva pratyakṣam iti vikalpa tāyām ekāgara tā anupapatteḥ iti 
[176,12]	yat pratyakṣam tat sarvam nirvikalpakam eva iti śākyāḥ tathā ca pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham iti dignāga uktam lakṣaṇam sāmānya lakṣaṇa anuvādena etat draṣṭavyam tena yat avisaṃvādi jñānam kalpanā apoḍham tat pratyakṣam iti uktam bhavati kalpanāyāḥ apoḍham apetam kalpanā apoḍham kalpanā svabhāva rahitam iti arthaḥ atha kā iyam kalpanā nāma jāti ādi yojanā nāma ādi saṃsargaḥ iti arthaḥ tatra devadattaḥ ityādi nāma yojanā gauḥ ityādi jāti yojanā gacchati ityādi kriyā yojanā śuklaḥ ityādi guṇa yojanā daṇḍī ityādi dravya yojanā iti eṣā pañcavidhā kalpanā para prasiddhyā udāhṛtā sva mate tu sarvā eva iyam nāma kalpanā iti tathā ca āha kīrttiḥ abhilāpinī pratītiḥ kalpanā abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsā pratītiḥ kalpanā iti saṃsargaḥ tu abhidhāna abhidheya tva ākārayoḥ ekatra jñāna grāhya ākāra tayā mīlanam nāma ādi na ekatava āpādana pratipattiḥ iti anye yogya grahaṇena avyutpannasya api kalpanā saṅgṛhītā bālaḥ api hi stana ādikam dṛṣṭvā pūrva dṛṣṭena saḥ eva ayam iti eka tvam āpādya saṃtuṣyati tena asya api kalpanā asti iti avagamyate 
[177,1]	yadi nirvikalpakam jñānam pratyakṣam tadā dvi candra ādi jñānam api pratyakṣam prāptam tasya ca avikalpaka tvam akṣaja tvāt tathā svapna jñānam api spaṣṭa tvāt nirvikalpakam gamana prāpti ādi pratibhāsa nimitta tvāt avisaṃvādī api tat atas pratyakṣam prāptam tad vyavaccheda artham dharma kīrttiḥ pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham abhrāntam iti evam lakṣaṇam cakāra anyathā pratibhāsi tvam bhrānta tvam grāhye rūpe viparyasta tvam iti arthaḥ na eva dvi candra ādi bhrāntiḥ indriya jāḥ iti eke kila ekam candram dṛṣṭvā dvit tvena kalpyate jñāna stham keśa ākāram dṛṣṭvā bāhya tvena kalpyate iti evam anyatra api draṣṭvyam atra dūṣaṇam āha dharma kīrttiḥ tat na indriya bhāva abhāva anurodhasya tattva prayojaka tvāt tasya iha api tulya tvāt indriya vikāre ca vikārāt tad nibandhana tvāt ca āśraya sthiteḥ sarpa ādi bhrānti vat manaḥ bhrānteḥ akṣa vikṛtau api nivṛtti prasaṅgāt tathā akṣa vikāra nivṛttau api anivṛtti prasaṅgāt tasmāt indriya jam api etat bhrānteḥ apratyakṣam iti 
[177,12^1]	dignāgasya api abhra anta tvam viśeṣaṇam abhipretam iti darśayati atas eva iti karaṇa vyavacchinnāt vikalpa varggāt pṛthak timira upalakṣitam viplavam pratyakṣa ābhāsam āha bhrānti saṃvṛtti saṃjñānam anumāna anumānikam smārtta abhilāṣikam ca iti pratyakṣa ābham sa taimiram iti atra asya tātparyam āha trividham kalpanā jñānam āśraya upaplava udbhavam avikalpakam ekam ca pratyakṣa ābham caturvidham āśrayaḥ viṣayaḥ tasya upaplavaḥ tad sadṛśa smaraṇam atha vā kāraṇa jñānam āśrayaḥ tasya upaplavaḥ vāsanā viśeṣaḥ tatas trividham kalpanā jñānam bhavati rajju marīcikā ādiṣu sarpa jala ādi jñānam ekam bhrānti śabdena uktam ghaṭa ādi jñānam dvitīyam saṃvṛti saṃjñāna śabdena uktam anumāna jñānam ānumānikam ca liṅgi jñānam etat ubhayam pūrvābhyām eva saṅgṛhītam kiṃtu pūrvayoḥ anakṣaja tu asiddhi artham dṛṣṭa tattvena pṛthak uktam smārta abhilāṣikam ca iti tṛtīyam darśanam eṣu abhāvinaḥ vidhi pratiṣedha vikalpayoḥ idantaya utpadyamānayoḥ smārta śabdeba abhidhānam 
[177,12^2]	pratyabhijñānasya api anakṣaja tu asiddhi artham ābhilāṣikam pṛthak uktam etasmāt vikalpa vargāt pṛthak taimira grahaṇam kalpanā apoḍha tvasya apavāda tva sūcanā artham uktam taimira grahaṇam ca upaghāta ja upalakṣaṇa artham sarvam eva upaghāta jam jñānam bhrāntam iti eva āha dharma kīrttiḥ timira āśu bhra maṇa nauyāna saṃkṣobha ādi anāhita vibhramam avikalpakam jñānam pratyakṣam iti keśa ādi candra ādi buddheḥ tu sphuṭa pratibhāsi tvāt na kalpanā tvam tasmāt uktam na vikalpa anubaddhasya spaṣṭa artha pratibhāsitāḥ iti tathā anyatra api uktam suptasya jāgrataḥ vā api yā eva dhīḥ sphuṭa bhāsinī sā nirvikalpa ubhayathā api anyathā eva vikalpikā iti kalpanā rahita tvam ca pratyakṣasya pratyakṣeṇa eva gamyate iti āha pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣeṇa eva siddhyati pratyātma vedyaḥ sarveṣām vikalpaḥ nāma saṃśrayaḥ saṃhṛtya sarvatas cintām stimitena antarātmanā sthitaḥ api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate sākṣa jā matiḥ punar vikalpayat kiṃcid āsīt me kalpanā īdṛśī iti vetti na pūrva ukta avasthāyām indriyāt gatau 
[178,16^1]	kalpanā jñānam api atatha artha avabhāsi tvāt bhrāntam eva tathā api vipratipatti nivṛti artham pṛthak uktam yatas sa vikalpakam api gauḥ ityādi jñānam akṣaja tvāt bhrānta tvāt ca adhyakṣam pramāṇam iti pareṣām abhiniveśaḥ at pratiṣedha artham kalpanā apoḍham iti uktam na hi nāma saṃsarga pratibhāsi tvam indriya jñāne sambhavati arthasya sāmarthyena samudbhavāt artha sāmarthyena utpadyamānam tad rūpam eva anukuryāt na hi arthe śabdāḥ santi tad ātmānaḥ vā yena tasmin pratibhāsamāne pratibhāseran 
[178,16^2_179,7]	na ca ayam artha asaṃsparśā saṃvedana dharmāḥ artheṣu tad niyojanāt tatas arthānām apratīti prasaṅgāt tasmāt ayam upanipatya vijñānam janayan arthaḥ sva ātma anurūpam eva janayitum yuktaḥ na artha antara ākāram na hi nīlam śukla ākāram rasa ādi ākāram vā jñānam janayati na api tat balena udīyamānam vijñānam artha antaram anusarttum yuktam rasa ādi jñāna vat sataḥ api tad ātmanaḥ indriya antara jñāna utpattau asāmarthyāt atiprasaṅgāt ca vikalpakam tu manaḥ vijñānam artha sannidhāna anapekṣam vikalpa vāsanā utthāpitam aniyata indriya artha grāhi kutaścid anubhava sambandhāt saha pṛthak vā gṛhṇīyāt api ca artha upayoge api punar smārttam śabda anuyojanam akṣadhīrya di apekṣeta saḥ arthaḥ vyavahitaḥ bhavet 
[179,10]	na hi saṃketa kāla bhāvinam abhilāpa sāmānyam asmarataḥ tad yojanā sambhavati śabda antara vat na ca artha abhipāta kṛta asatya antare vikāre śabda viśeṣe smṛtiḥ yuktā tasya atad kṛta tve tad nāma agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt tad smṛtyā vyavadhānāt na artha upayogaḥ anantara vyāpāra phalaḥ syāt tatas ca yaḥ prāk ajanakaḥ buddheḥ upayoga aviśeṣataḥ sa paścāt api syāt ātma abhedena sāma arthya aviśeṣāt na ekasya ekatra kriyā akriye sambhavataḥ tena syāt artha apāye api netra dhīḥ arthasya sākṣāt buddhau anupayogāt smṛti prabodhe ca upayukta tvāt na asya anupakāriṇaḥ buddhiḥ bhāvam apekṣeta artha abhipāta kṛte ca buddhi janmani abhilāpa smṛti antara abhāvāt mā mūn nāma vikalpasya akṣaja tvam jāti ādi vikalpasya tu bhaviṣyati iti āśaṃkā niṣedha artham āha viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyam ca sambandham laukikīm sthitim gṛhītvā saṅkalayya etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā 
[179,21]	kiṃcid kenacid viśiṣṭam gṛhyamāṇam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tad sambandha loka vyavasthā pratītau tad saṃkalanena gṛhyate daṇḍa ādi vat na anyathā artha sambandha abhidhāna vyavasthā parijñāne abhāvāt jāti guṇa kriyāvatām etat na sambhavati eva rūpa viveka sambandhayoḥ apratibhāsanena ghaṭanā yogāt kṣīra udaka vat atadvedini yatra api viveka pratipattiḥ asti tasya api grahaṇam saṃketa smaraṇa upāyam dṛṣṭa saṃkalana ātmakam pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnye tat cākṣuṣe katham 
[180,3_180,9]	na hi idam iyataḥ vyāpārāt kartum samartham saṃnihita viṣaya balena utpanne avicāraka tvāt vicāraka tve ca indriya manaḥ jñānayoḥ abheda prasaṅgāt abhede ca atīta anāgata vastu prabheda grahaṇa agrahaṇa ūhānūha artha bhāva apekṣā anapekṣā ādi prasaṅgaḥ manaḥ vijñāna abhisaṃskṛtam indriya jñānam pratyeti iti ced na yathā uktā grāhiṇaḥ tathā pravṛtti ayogāt aviṣaye apravṛtteḥ jāti ādi sambandha atīta śabda vyavahāra ādīnām indriya jñāna aviṣaya tvāt tasmāt na indriya jñānam artha saṃyojanām kalpanām āviśati vikalpa utthāpitā sā ca na vartteta icchayā matiḥ na artha saṃnidhim īkṣeta api ca iyam viśeṣaṇa ādi vikalpa utthāpitā satī pravṛttā api samagra sāmagrīkasya punar icchayā nivarteta tad anya vikalpavat 
[180,12]	śakyante hi kalpanāḥ prasaṃkhyānena nivārayitum na indriya buddhyaḥ sāmagrī sākalye vinivartya go buddhim aśvam api kalpayataḥ go darśanāt na api iyam artha sannidhim īkṣeta na hi gavā ādi vikalpaḥ artha sannidhau eva bhavati iti tasmāt avikalpakam eva jñānam pratyakṣam tatra bāhya artha pakṣe artha ākāraḥ pramāṇām tad artha adhigamaḥ phalam vijñaptimātra tāyām sva saṃvittiḥ phalam grāhaka ākāraḥ pramāṇam tad vaśena sva saṃvedana vyavasthāpanāt atra ātma viṣaye māne yathā rāga ādi vedanam sa vyāpāra pratīta tvāt pramāṇam phalam eva sat iti etad pakṣa dvaye api samānam iti
