[180,22]	atra ucyate pramāṇa phala vicārasya śākya ādi mata vyudāsena prāk eva kṛta tvāt na iha sa punar kriyate kin tu atra gauḥ ityādi jñānasya akṣaja tvam eva sādhyate yat tāvat artha sāmarthyena utpadyamānam tad rūpam eva anukuryāt iti tat na jñāne artha ākārasya prāk eva nirasta tvāt yat api na hi arthe śabdāḥ santi ityādi tat api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ eka jñāna ālambanatva pratiṣedhena eva nirastam na ca ayam gauḥ iti jñāne śabdaḥ pratibhāti kim tarhi sāsna ādimān arthaḥ śuklaḥ ayam pīnaḥ viṣāṇī gacchati ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇya pratīteḥ mahiṣa ādiṣu ca ayam gauḥ ityādi saṃvādi prati iti anutpatteḥ sa vikalpaka tvāt ayam mithyā pratyayaḥ tad anya sa vikalpa vat iti ayuktam nirvikalpaka tvāt tad anya nirvikalpa vat iti asya api prasaṅgāt tulya ākṣepa parihāra tvāt 
[181,4_181,7^1]	yat ca atra uktam manasaḥ yugapad vṛtteḥ sa vikalpa avikalpayoḥ vimūḍhaḥ laghu vṛtteḥ vā tayoḥ aikyam vyavasyati tatra idam vicāryate kim tau eva yugapad utpannau krama utpannau vā sa vikalpa avikalpau eka tvena adhyavasyati atha tayoḥ viṣayau iti kim ca atas pratyaya mātra adhyavasāye viṣaya unmukhā pravṛttiḥ tad prāptiḥ ca na syāt avisaṃvādi pratyayasya ca bhrānta tva ayogāt na bhrāntitaḥ api pravṛtti prāptī atha sa vikalpa avikalpa arthayoḥ aikyam vyavasyati yathā uktam dṛśya vikalpyau arthau ekīkṛtya tat adhyavasāyena pravartanāt iti tat ayuktam mahiṣa ādi piṇḍeṣu api gauḥ iti adhyavasāyena pravṛttau hi avisaṃvāda prasaṅgāt gakāra ādi varṇaiḥ sambandha abhāvasya ubhayatra aviśeṣāt tad eka tva adhyavasāyasya api ubhayatra aviśeṣāt iti 
[181,7^2]	tat api paṇḍitam anyena uktam idam iti puras varttini arthe yat vijñānam tat sva viṣaya anantara viṣaya sahakāriṇā akṣa jñānena janitam mānasam pratyakṣam iṣyate iti tat aparyālocita abhidhānam yat eva hi gauḥ iti jñānam gakāra ādi varṇa viṣaya tvāt sa vikalpakam bhavatā iṣṭam tathā idam iti apīkāra ādi varṇa viṣaya tvāt sa vikalpakam eva śabda saṃsarga pratibhāsa tva aviśeṣāt idam iti puras vartti spaṣṭa ākāra tvāt na gauḥ iti jñānam iti ced divyam atra grāhyam nyāya abhāvāt kvacid artha abhāve api gauḥ iti utpatteḥ na tat artha apekṣā iti ced idam iti api jñānam kvacid artha abhāve bhavati eva artha abhāve bhavat bhrāntam anyatra samyak eva iti etat ubhayatra api samānam ikāra ādi śabda saṃsarga apratibhā āsi idam iti jñānam nirvikalpam iti ced tat idam vyāhatam 
[182,1_182,4]	api ca gakāra ādi śabda saṃsarga apratibhā asi gauḥ ityādi jñānam nirvikalpakam mānasam pratyakṣam iti etat api bhavatā abhyupagantavyam tulya nyāya tvāt tatas ca gauḥ ityādi jñānasya kalpanā tvena apratyakṣa tva abhyupagamaḥ anupapannaḥ eva iti yat api uktam idam iti eva kṛtvā pravarttate tena pravartaka tvāt pramāṇam iti tat api ayuktam yatas na idam iti eva kṛtvā pravarttate kim tu abhīṣṭa niścayāt eva jāta mātrasya api pravṛttiḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt etat eva uttaram yuktam na mānasam pratyakṣam indriya pratyakṣāt artha antaram artha antaram āgama ukta tvena eva uktam na tu atra pramāṇam kiṃcid asti iti 
[182,9_182,13^1]	yat api uktam sataḥ api tad ātmanaḥ indriya antara jñāna utpattau asāmarthyāt iti tad anabhyupagamena eva parihṛtam na hi cakṣuḥ ādi jñāna viṣaya tvam śabdasya abhyupagamyate kim tu saṃketa anubhava sahakāriṇā tad smṛti sahakāriṇā vā cakṣuḥ ādiṇā svasmin eva viṣaye gauḥ ityādi jñānam utpādyate yat api uktam artha upayoge api ityādi tatra yadi smṛti apekṣi tve arthasya kṣaṇika tvena vyavadhānam ucyate tat na kṣaṇika tva asiddhatvāt kṣaṇika vādinā api sahakāri vailakṣaṇyāt eka santānasya vilakṣaṇa kārya utpādaka tvam abhyupagatam eva tatas ca yathā eka eva agni santānaḥ kasyacid ekasya mṛd santānasya aśma santānasya vā sahakāri bheda anurodhena rūpa ādi ākāra viśeṣam prati vyavahita tvena akāraṇa tvam iṣyate tathā artha santānasya indriya santānasya ca nirvikalpakam jñānam janayitvā paścāt labdha sahakāri viśeṣasya gauḥ ityādi a ākāra janaka tvam bhaviṣyati iti katham vyavadhānam 
[182,13^2]	etena yaḥ prāc ajanakaḥ buddheḥ ityādi api nirastam na hi yasya ākārasya pragajanakaḥ vahniḥ tasya ākārasya paścāt api ajanakaḥ eva iti yuktam upayoga aviśeṣataḥ iti asiddham sahakāri viśeṣa prāpteḥ eva upayoga viśeṣa tvāt iti na ekasya ekatra kriyā kriye sambhavataḥ iti etat api akṣaṇika tva prastāve vicārayiṣyāmaḥ kim ca tad santānasya akṛta kāryasya api tad kārya kartṛ tvam pradarśitam eva iti evam ca arthasya sākṣāt buddhau anupayogāt iti asiddham smṛti prabodhe ca upayukta tvāt iti anena kim ucyate na tāvat arthasya smṛti janmani upayogaḥ smṛteḥ anartha ja tvā abhyupagamāt 
[182,27]	atha tad janaka anubhava janmani upayogaḥ tatas kim atra upayuktasya anyatra anupayogaḥ iti ced na vahneḥ krameṇa aṅgāra bhasma ādi bhāveṣu upayoga darśanāt tathā mānasa pratyakṣe prāk api upayuktasya arthasya paścāt upayoga darśanāt bhavati mānase arthasya paścāt upayogaḥ kim tu tat akṣa jam na bhavati iti ced akṣa ja tve tarhi vivādaḥ na artha ja tve yathā ca arthasya prāk artha akṣa buddhau eva sāmarthyam tad sahakāriṇaḥ paścāt mānasa pratyakṣe api sāmarthyam iṣṭam tathā indriya arthayoḥ prāc avikalpa buddhau eva sāmarthyam paścāt āsādita sahakāri viśeṣayoḥ sa vikalpaka buddhau api sāmarthyam kim na iṣyate kaḥ atra virodhaḥ tad ākāra prasaṅgaḥ iti ced atha manyase yadi indriya arthābhyām paścāt api jñānam janyate tadā tat api jñānam prāc udita jñānena tulya ākāram prasajyate iti na etat asti vilakṣaṇa sahakārī upakṛta eka kāraṇa janyānām api eka ākāra tva darśanāt anyathā cakṣuḥ prakāśābhyām janitānām sarva jñānānām eka ākāra tā eva syāt kathaṃcid eka ākāra tve sa vikalpa avikalpayoḥ api eka ākāra tvam asti eva 
[183,10]	yat api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyam ityādi abhidhāya idam uktam jāti guṇa kriyāvatām etat na sambhavati eva rūpa viveka sambandhayoḥ apratibhāsanena ghaṭanā yogāt iti tat api ayuktam apratibhāsana tvasya asiddha tvāt tathā hi agṛhīta samayaḥ api mahiṣa ādi piṇḍebhyaḥ vyāvṛttān śāvaleya ādi pīṇḍān eka ākārān ca vivikta go tva svarūpa tad sambandha upalambhena eva pratipadyate vyāvṛttebhyaḥ anyā na eva vyāvṛttiḥ iti ced na apohasya nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt tad niṣedhe siddhyati eva jāti guṇa kriyāṇām tad sambandhasya ca āśrayāt artha antara tvam 
[183,17]	kṣīra udaka vat atadvedini iti api asiddham yena api hi kṣīrodake pṛthak ādhāre na dṛṣṭe tasya api prabhūtena udakena miśritam kṣīram kṣīrodakam etat iti pratipattiḥ bhavati eva su alpena api udakena miśritam kṣīram tad jñasya pratibhāti eva yaḥ tu svabhāvaḥ vā padārthānām eṣaḥ yena kecid āsadbhāvam saṃsṛṣṭāḥ kecid paścāt kiyantam kālam kecid saṃsṛṣṭāḥ api padārthāḥ sarveṣām eva draṣṭṝṇām vivekena pratibhānti kecid tad jñānām eva kecid tu asaṃsṛṣṭa avasthāyām eva asmad ādīnām vivekena pratibhānti saṃsṛṣṭa avasthāyām tu avivekena eva iti 
[183,24]	yat api saṃkalana jñānam iti uktam tatra yadi tāvat aneka artha smaraṇa mātram eva saṃkalana jñānam abhipretam tat na yuktam daṇḍī iti jñānasya anubhava ākāra tvena saṃvedyamāna tvāt smaraṇam api daṇḍī iti anubhavam sūcayati na hi puruṣa daṇḍa gava ādīnām sva rūpa mātra grahaṇe daṇḍī dṛṣṭaḥ gomān dṛṣṭaḥ ityādi a ākārā smṛtiḥ bhavitum arhati 
[183,29]	atha bhrānti jñānam eva saṃkalana jñānam abhipretam tat api ayuktam nīla ādi pratibhāsa vat asya api sarvadā sarveṣām avisaṃvādena utpatteḥ kim ca bhrānti nimitta abhāvāt na tāvat indriya doṣāt vāta ādi vaiṣamyāt vā bhrāntiḥ sarva vyavahartṝṇām saṃnikṛṣṭānām api aniyata deśa kālā viśeṣaṇa utpatteḥ vāsanā api anena eva pratyuktā sādṛśya ādi nimittam api atra na sambhavati eva iti 
[184,3_184,6]	atha viśeṣaṇa ādi grahaṇa pūrvaka tvena saṃkalana ajñānam tat iṣyate eva dṛṣṭa sāmarthyasya kāraṇa tva abhyupagamāt viśeṣaṇa ādi grahaṇasya iva akṣasya api sāmarthya avadhāraṇā viśeṣāt nānakṣa jam daṇḍī ityādi jñānam na hi yatra ekasya sāmarthyam tatra anyasya na asti eva iti yat api asaṃketa smaraṇa a ityādi tat api ayuktam eva saṃketa smaraṇa upāya tva cākṣuṣa tvayoḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt saṃnihita viṣaya tvam api asti eva ayam daṇḍī ityādi jñānasya pratyabhijñānasya api ca 
[184,9]	nanu ca saḥ iti anena asaṃnihitaḥ pūrva dṛṣṭaḥ parāmṛśyate na tasya anena abhinnasya saṃnihita tva anupapatteḥ tad abhinna tvam kena gṛhate iti ced cakṣuṣā eva pūrva darśana viśiṣṭa tvam iti smṛti sahitena cakṣuṣā gṛhyate tad viṣayam pratyabhijñā jñānam utpādyate iti arthaḥ tasmin ca pratyabhijñā jñānena sakāra ādayaḥ varṇāḥ pratibhānti na pūrva darśanam ca avabhāti kim tu saḥ eva arthaḥ sa ca yādṛśaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tādṛśasya eva para pratyākhyāna artham tat abhidhāyakam saḥ eva ayam iti śabdam smṛtya uccārayati evam daṇḍī ityādi jñāne api draṣṭavyam 
[184,16_184,19]	yadi punar abhilāpa ādi saṃsarga śiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ kadācid api na gṛhyate tadā para pratipādana artham niyatasya eva śabdasya uccāraṇam na syāt bhrāntitaḥ ca yasya kasyacid uccāraṇam syāt sarva vyavahartṛ saṃvāda abhāva prasaṅgāt ca yat api pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnya tvam avicāraka tvam indriya jñānasya uktam tatra avicāra katavam kim ucyate yadā smṛti rūpa tvam tena hetunā akṣa jñānasya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa artha viṣaya tvam niṣidhyate tadā smṛtiḥ eva tathā artha viṣaya abhyupeyā tatas ca nirviṣaya tva abhyupagama virodhaḥ na ca anubhava viṣayāt anyaḥ viṣayaḥ smṛteḥ śakyaḥ vyavasthāpayitum sarvatra dṛṣṭa artha viṣaya tvena smṛteḥ saṃvedanāt 
[184,24_184,28]	atha smṛtiḥ api na viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa artha viṣayā na tad vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt yadā tad viśiṣṭa arthaḥ smṛtyā anubhavena ca na eva viṣayīkriyate tadā katham apratipannaḥ asau vyavahartum śakyate bhrāntitaḥ iti ced na bhrānteḥ pratiṣiddha tvāt atha parāmarśa janya tvam avicāraka tvam hetuḥ tathā api asiddha tvāt ayuktaḥ parāmarśaḥ hi smṛtiḥ syāt ānumānikam vā jñānam saṃśaya ādi rūpam vā sarvasya api viśiṣṭa anubhava utpattau indriya sahakāri tvam prasādhitam eva iti 
[185,1]	yat api uktam vicāraka tve ca indriya manaḥ jñānayoḥ abheda prasaṅgāt ityādi tat api ayuktam nirvikalpaka tva ādyaviśeṣa vat asambhavāt yathā tvad mate caturvidhānām pratyakṣāṇām nirvikalpaka tva abhra anta tva aviśeṣe api avāntara dharma bhedaḥ asti viṣaya bhedaḥ kāraṇa bhedaḥ ca asti tathā vicāraka tva aviśeṣe api indriya manaḥ jñānayoḥ nābhedaḥ eva na api atīta anāgata vastu bheda grahaṇa ādi prasaṅgaḥ iti 
[185,6_185,15]	yat api uktam jāti ādi sambandha atīta śabda vyavahāra ādīnām indriya jñāna aviṣaya tvāt iti tat api asāram jāti ādi sambandhasya indriya viṣaya tvena āsādhita tvāt viśiṣṭa jñānasya ca kevala viśeṣya ālambana tvena prasādhita tvāt na atīta śabda ādi viṣaya tva prasaṅgaḥ yat api vikalpa utthāpitā sā ca ityādi tat api asat kāma ādi upetasya purovasthite kāminī ādi arthe tad vikalpasya icchātaḥ api anivṛtti darśanāt atha prasaṃkhyāna abhyāsāt kāminī ādi vikalpaḥ api nivarttate evam tarhi citta vṛtti nirodha abhyāsāt indriya buddhayaḥ api nivartante iti āhuḥ patañjali prabhṛtayaḥ kim ca supta vyāsakta manasām ca indriya saṃnikṛṣṭa arthasya api apratibhāsanāt na manaḥ nirapekṣasya indriyasya api vyāpāraḥ sambhavati yat ca uktam sāmagrī sākalye vinivarttya go buddhim aśvam api kalpayataḥ go darśanāt iti tat asambaddham eva pralapitam tathā hi ayam gauḥ iti jñānam saṃketa smṛti indriyayoḥ anyatara abhāve api na upapadyate iti evam pareṇa ukte sāmagrī sākalye vinivartya ityādi kva upayujyate 
[185,19]	yat api uktam na artha saṃnidhim īkṣeta na hi gavā ādi vikalpaḥ artha saṃnidhau eva bhavati iti tat api asamīkṣita abhidhānam viśiṣṭa vikalpasya artha saṃnidhim antareṇa utpatteḥ adarśanāt śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ ca bhavatā eva anumiti sādhana tvasya nirākṛta tvāt kim ca keśa ādi jñāna vat akṣaja tu asāmyāt sarva akṣaja jñānānām artha saṃnidhi nirapekṣāṇām eva udaya prasaṅgāt tatas ca na kasyacid artha sāmarthyena udbhavaḥ iti artha sāmarthyāt bhava tvam asiddham syāt yathā vā bhāvanā jatva aviśeṣe api yogi jñānam eva avisaṃvādi tvāt abhrāntam pratyakṣam iṣyate na tu svapna ādi upaplava jñānam tathā sa vikalpaka tve api ayam gauḥ ityādi jñānam eva avisaṃvādi tvāt artha sākṣāt karaṇa pravṛtta tvāt ca pratyakṣam iti 
[185,28_186,6]	yat api uktam saṃketa balena artheṣu śabdaḥ pravartate saṃketaḥ tu na vyaktau śakyate karttum grahītum ca na api sāmānye yasmāt ekatra dṛṣṭaḥ bhedaḥ hi kvacid na anyatra dṛśyate na tasmāt bhinnam asti anyat sāmānyam buddhi abhedataḥ tat api asat yasmāt vyaktau sāmānye ca saṃketasya karaṇam grahaṇam yathā sambhavati tathā upariṣṭāt vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ tat siddham sa vikalpakam api pratyakṣam saṃśaya ādeḥ api vipratipatti viṣayasya anena eva nyāyena akṣaja tvam artha viṣaya tvam ca sādhayitavyam iti 
[186,8]	nirvikalpaka adhigata viṣaya tvāt sa vikalpakasya apramāṇa tvam iti ced na anyathā tad adhigamāt yogi jñānasya ca dṛṣṭa śruta ādi viṣayasya apramāṇa tva prasaṅgāt saṃplavasya ca prāk eva sādhita tvāt adhigata viṣaya tve api na sa vikalpakam apramāṇam na ca adhigata viṣaya tvena smṛtiḥ eva smaraṇviṣaya tva aviśeṣāt pratyakṣa ādīnām api abheda prasaṅgaḥ iti alam ati prasaṃgena iti iti śrīmat ācārya bhāsarvajña viracite nyāya bhūṣaṇe saṅgraha vārtike prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ 
[189,4_189,17]	atha idānīm anumāna svarūpam vicāryate tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam ca iti sūtram atra tad pūrvakam anumānam iti etāvat eva lakṣaṇa artham pariśiṣṭam tu vibhāga artham iti eke tad apavyākhyānam tat iti anena yadi pratyakṣam eva parāmṛśyate tadā ativyāpti avyāpti doṣau bhavataḥ pratyakṣa pūrvake saṃskāre saṃśaya ādi jñāne ca ati vyāptiḥ anumāna ādi pūrvaka anumāne ca avyāptiḥ iti tena avyāpti parihāra artham vibhāga sūtra prakrāntāni sarva pramāṇāni parāmṛśyante vigraha viśeṣa āśrayaṇāt ati vyāpti parihāraḥ api siddhaḥ te ca tāni ca iti vigrahaḥ svarūpāṇām eka śeṣāt tāni iti bhavati tāni pūrvam yasya tat idam tat pūrvakam tatra te iti anena avina abhāva sambandha darśanam liṅga darśanam ca abhisambadhyate tāni iti anena sarva pramāṇa phalāni etat uktam bhavati pratyakṣa ādi anyatama pramāṇa janitam avinā abhau a sambandha darśanam liṅga darśanam ca pūrvam yasya tat tathā uktam anumitiḥ anumānam phala lakṣaṇe hi siddhe tad sādhana lakṣaṇam siddhyati eva atha vā tad pūrvakam yatas karma kartṛ vailakṣaṇyāt bhavati tad anumānam iti tad śabdena api yadā pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇāni eva parāmṛśyante tadā ekasya pūrvaka śabdasya lupta nirdeśaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tad pūrvaka pūrvakam jā tyādi vyākhyeyam 
[190,4_190,9]	trividha grahaṇam niyama artham deśa kāla jāti avasthā ādi bhedāt anantam api anumānam trividham eva iti prakāra antareṇa traividhyā aśaṃkāni vṛtti artham pūrvavat ādi grahaṇam pūrvavat iti kāraṇa anumānam katham pūrva śabdena kāraṇa ākhyam iha liṅgam uktam tat vidyate yasya ālambanībhūtam liṅgi jñāna sādhanasya jñānasya tat pūrvavat phala vivakṣayā tu pūrvam vidyate janakam yasya liṅgi jñānasya tat pūrvavat śeṣavat iti atra api eṣā eva vyutpattiḥ śeṣavat iti kārya anumānam kārya kāraṇayoḥ kāraṇam vyākhyātam atas kāryam śiṣyate iti śeṣaḥ 
[190,11]	sāmānyatodṛṣṭam nāma yat akārya kāraṇa tve api avinābhūtam artha antarasya gamakam yathā gandha viśeṣaḥ rasa ādi viśeṣasya iti caśabdaḥ samāna nyāya tvam sūcayati etat uktam bhavati śākyaiḥ artha antarasya kāryam eva gamakam iṣyate na kāraṇam na api akārya kāraṇam iti tatra kāryasya gamaka tve yaḥ nyāyaḥ taiḥ avyabhicāra lakṣaṇaḥ apadiṣṭaḥ saḥ itaratra api asti iti caśabdena sūcyate tathā ca uttaratra prapañcayiṣyāmaḥ 
[190,16]	atha vā pūrvavat iti kevala anvayi anumānam śeṣavat iti kevala vyatireki sāmānyatodṛṣṭam iti anvayavyatireki iti katham pūrva śabdena anvayaḥ vyapadiśyate prāk adhyavasīyamāna tvāt na hi yāvat na agni bhāve dhūma bhāvaḥ adhyavasīyate tāvat agni abhāve dhūma abhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ api adhyavasātum śakyate vidhi adhyavasāya pūrvaka tvāt niṣedha avyavasāyasya pūrvam eva vidyate anvayaḥ eva asti yasya anumānasya tat pūrvavat śeṣaḥ vyatirekaḥ saḥ eva asti yasya tat śeṣavat bādhaka upalakṣitasya kevala vyatirekasya gamakam na vyatireka mātrasya iti pradarśana artham śeṣavat iti uktam na vyatireka vat iti anvaya vyatirekayoḥ sādhana aṅgayoḥ sāmānyena yat anumānam dṛṣṭam tat sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam etat uktam bhavati yathā anvayena etat anumānam upakṛtam tathā vyatirekeṇa api iti caśabdaḥ anvaya vyatireki vat itarayoḥ api gamaka tvam asti iti sūcayati 
[190,26_191,1]	śākyāḥ khalu kevala anvayinaḥ kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ ca gamaka tvam na asti iti āhuḥ tad niṣedhaḥ api sūcitaḥ tat ca upariṣṭāt varṇayiṣyāmaḥ atra tad pūrvakam iti etāvat eva anumāna lakṣaṇam iti na budhyāmahe saṃskāra saṃśaya ādeḥ api pratyakṣa ādi phala pūrvaka tvāt atha tad pūrvakam avyabhicāra ādi viśiṣṭa jñānam iti adhyāhriyate tathā api pratyakṣa āgama jñānābhyām vyabhicāraḥ tad nivṛtti artham api adhyāhāra antaram yadi āśrīyate tadā tad pūrvaka grahaṇam vyartham syāt adhyāhāraiḥ eva lakṣaṇa siddheḥ iti 
[191,6]	nanu ca te iti vigraha āśrayaṇāt eva sarva vyabhicāra nivṛttiḥ siddhā na hi avinā abhāva dṛṣṭa anukāri smṛti sahitena liṅga jñānena saṃśaya ādi jñānam pratyakṣa āgama jñānam vā janyate iti na aprakrānta tvāt na hi prāk kvacid avinā abhāva darśana liṅga darśane prakrānte yena tayoḥ eva ate a iti anena parāmarśaḥ syāt aprakrāntasya api icchā mātreṇa parāmarśa abhyupagame viśiṣṭa liṅgi jñānasya eva parāmarśaḥ syāt tatas ca pūrvaka grahaṇam anarthakam syāt tat iti etāvatā eva adhyāhāra sahitena anumāna lakṣaṇa siddheḥ iti 
[191,13_191,14]	anye tu tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam iti etāvat lakṣaṇa vākyam varṇayanti asya arthaḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa pūrvakam kevala anvaya ādi liṅga traya ālambanam jñānam anumānam iti na etat api yuktam jñānasya eva pramāṇa tva anabhyupagamāt sarvam hi anumiti sādhanam jñānam ajñānam ca anumānam iṣyate kim ca saṃśaya ādi jñānam janayat api tad pūrvakam trividham liṅga ālambanam jñānam anumānam syāt adhyāhāraiḥ avyāpti ati vyāpti nivṛttau tatas eva lakṣaṇa siddheḥ anarthakam sūtram syāt iti 
[191,20_191,24]	apare tu pūrvavat ādi padāni lakṣaṇa artha tvena varṇayanti kila pūrvam upādānāt pakṣaḥ pūrva śabdena ucyate saḥ asti eva yasya tat pūrvavat pakṣa vyāpakam liṅgam ucyate śeṣaḥ iti sapakṣaḥ uktāt pakṣāt śiṣyamāṇa tvāt atas śeṣavat iti sa pakṣa vat iti uktam bhavati sāmānyatodṛṣṭam vipakṣe iti adhyāhāryam vipakṣe samānyena adṛṣṭam vipakṣa śabda abhidheye sarvatra adṛṣṭam iti arthaḥ caśabdaḥ asat pratipakṣa tva ābādhita viṣaya tve samuccinoti evam ca pañca rūpa liṅgam uktam bhavati kevala vyatireki kevalān vayinoḥ lakṣaṇam śeṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭa padayoḥ anyatara lopena vyākhyeyam iti 
[192,2]	bhavatu evam kaṣṭa kalpanayā trividham liṅga lakṣaṇam tathā api anumāna lakṣaṇam prastutam anabhidhāya aprastutam liṅga lakṣaṇam eva abhidadhataḥ aprastuta abhidhāyi tvam syāt na hi liṅgam eva anumānam sarva karaṇa grāmasya anumiti sādhakasya anumāna tvāt saṃśaya ādi janakasya ca liṅgasya ananumāna tvāt atīta anāgata liṅga jñānāt api anumiti sambhavāt akāraṇam api liṅgam anumiteḥ tat katham liṅga lakṣaṇāt eva anumāna lakṣaṇam siddhyati iti tasmāt trividham iti asya pūrvavat ādi padānām ca prāk uktam eva vyākhyānam jyāyaḥ tad pūrvaka grahaṇam ca svakīya anumāna bhūṣaṇa artham parakīya anumāna dūṣaṇa artham ca uktam 
[192,11_192,16]	katham iti yat tāvat sāṃkhyaiḥ guṇa puruṣa viṣayam anumānam uktam tat na yuktam pratyakṣa pūrvakam hi anumānam taiḥ api abhyupagatam na ca tad mate pratyakṣam pramāṇam upapadyate keśoṇḍuka ādi jñāna vat alīkā artha viṣaya tvena bhrānta tvāt tathā ca taiḥ uktam guṇānām paramam rūpam na dṛṣṭi patham ṛcchati yat tu dṛṣṭi patham prāptam tat māyā iva su tucchakam iti evam ca māyā dhūma ādi darśana pūrvaka anumāna vat alīka vikāra darśana pūrvakam pradhāna ādi anumānam apramāṇam eva 
[192,19]	advaita vādinām api advaita viṣayau anumāna āgamau anvaya ādi grāhakasya pratyakṣasya apramāṇa tvena ayuktau pramāṇa tve api tena eva bādhitau iti na ca tābhyām pratyakṣam bādhyate yatas tad pūrvakam tayoḥ sattvam iti evam yojyam 
[193,2]	ye api pratyakṣam eva ekam pramāṇam iti āhuḥ taiḥ api sva artham para artham ca hita ahita prāpti parihāra anuṣṭhānam abhyupagacchadbhiḥ tad hetu sādhana sāmarthya niścayaḥ na pratyakṣāt sambhavati iti atas tad pūrvakam anumānam avaśyam abhyupagantavyam atas avinā abhāva sambandhasya grahītum aśakya tvāt ityādi anupapannam iti 
[193,7]	śākyānām api tad pūrvakam anumānam na prāpnoti iti yojyam sādṛśya jñānasya pratyakṣataḥ asambhavāt tad asambhave trairūpya asambhavāt katham anumānam pravartate trairūpyāt liṅgataḥ artha dṛś anumānam iti eva hi tad lakṣaṇam āhuḥ trairūpyasya ca atyanta vilakṣaṇa vastu mātra grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣāt niścayaḥ na sambhavati iti katham aniścitāt tatas asat kalpāt artha dṛś anumānam bhrāntitaḥ trairūpya grahaṇam iti etat api andha ceṣṭitam mithyā anumāna prasaṅgāt na hi loke bhrāntitaḥ trirūpa dhūma avadhāraṇāt artha kriyā samartha dahana anumānam dṛṣṭam 
[193,14_193,18]	atha anumānena eva trairūpyam gṛhyate na etat asti trairūpya grāhaka anumānasya api trairūpya grahaṇa apekṣita tvāt tatra api anumāna antara abhyupagame trairūpya grāhaka anumāna anavasthānāt abhimata anumeya apratipattiḥ eva syāt ayam eva hi sūtrakāra abhiprāyaḥ anyaiḥ api prakaṭitaḥ tat uktam liṅga liṅgī anumānānām ānantyāt eka liṅgini gatiḥ yuga sahasreṣu bahuṣu api na jāyata iti 
[193,20_194,2]	etat ca dūṣaṇam asmākam saṃplavam sambandha sādṛśya ādeḥ pratyakṣa viṣaya tvam ca abhyupagacchatā bhūṣaṇam eva iti āha tad pūrvakam anumānam iti nanu bhavataḥ api anumāna āgama pūrvaka anumāna abhyupagamāt katham na tat dūṣaṇam na tasya api pāramparyeṇa pratyakṣa pūrvaka tva abhyupagamāt vyavahita kāraṇe api tad pūrvaka tva vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate yathā vṛṣṭi pūrvikā sasya sampattiḥ iti 
[194,6]	anye tu pratyakṣasya api anumāne antarbhāvam icchanti tad niṣedha ka hetu sūcana artham ca uktam tad pūrvakam anumānam iti tathā ca parīkṣāyām pratyakṣam anumānam eka deśa grahaṇāt upalabdheḥ iti pūrva pakṣam kṛtvā na pratyakṣeṇa yāvat tāvat api upalambhāt na anumāna prasaṅgaḥ tad pūrvaka tvāt iti pratisamādhānam uktam iti tasmāt anya artham tad pūrvaka grahaṇam apti iti 
[194,12]	yadi tad pūrvaka grahaṇam api na lakṣaṇa artham kim idānīm tarhi anumāna lakṣaṇa artham sūtram anumāna padam eva sa vyutpattikam lakṣaṇa artham yathā pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni iti atra pramāṇa padam eva vyutpatti savyapekṣam lakṣaṇa artha tvena sarva vyākhyātṛbhiḥ iṣṭam pramīyate anena iti pramāsādhanam pramāṇam iti uktam bhavati tathanumīyate anena iti anumitiḥ kriyate yena tad anumānam iti labhyate 
[194,19]	kā punar iyam anumitiḥ samyak avinā bhāvena parokṣa anubhavaḥ avinā abhāvena iti vyāpti smaraṇena iti uktam bhavati viṣaya śabdena viṣayiṇaḥ abhidhānāt yathā saurāṣṭra deśaḥ bhagnaḥ iti avinā abhāvena iti sādhakatama arthe tṛtīyā yadi api antaḥkaraṇa ādeḥ api anumiti sādhana tvam asti tathā api yava aṅkura vat asādhāraṇa nirdeśaḥ ayam atas eva avinābhāvasya eva smaraṇasya eva vā anumāna tvam na uktam kin tu tena asādhāraṇa bhūtena yaḥ parokṣa anubhavaḥ janyate tasya sādhanam karaṇam sarvam eva anumānam iṣyate iti etat artham samyak avinā abhāva janyam iti evam lakṣaṇam kṛtam avinā abhauva smṛtimataḥ api kasyacid kutaścid nimittāt viparyayaḥ saṃśayaḥ vā bhavati yathā laukāyitakasya tad nivṛtti artham samyak iti uktam 
[195,6_195,9]	atha vā anumeya jñānam bhrāntam eva iti āhuḥ śākyāḥ tat uktam bhrāntiḥ api artha sambandhāt iti tasya niṣedha artham samyak grahaṇam na khalu bhrānteḥ pramāṇa tvam yuktam bhrānti tvāt keśa ādi bhrānti vat iti nanu evam sati jñāna tvāt dvi candra ādi jñāna vat sarva jñānānām apramāṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ sa tu aniṣṭaḥ tasmāt yathā jñāna tva aviśeṣe api na sarvam pramāṇam kin tu avisaṃvādi eva jñānam tathā bhrāntiḥ api āvisaṃvādinī pramāṇam iti na viruddha tvāt yadi bhrāntiḥ katham avisaṃvādinī vyabhicāra abhāvaḥ hi avisaṃvāda arthaḥ saṃvādaḥ ced asti liṅgi jñānasya tatas asya avyabhicāri tvāt abhrānta tvam eva katham bhrānta tvam nanu ca ātasmin tad grahaḥ bhrāntiḥ iti ucyate tad rūpam ca liṅgi jñānasya api asti sva pratibhāse anarthe artha adhyavasāyena pravartanāt bhrāntasya api avyavasita artha avyabhicārāt avisaṃvādi tvam asti tena asya pramāṇa tvam iṣṭam pāramparyeṇa vastu pratibandhāt asya eva yathā adhya vasita artha avañcaka tvam na liṅga ābhāsa ja bhrā anteḥ api iti 
[195,18_196,5]	tat uktam liṅga liṅgi dhiyoḥ eva pāramparyyeṇa vastuni pratibandhāt tad ābhāsa śūnyayoḥ api avañcanam tayoḥ tad rūpa śūnyayoḥ tad rūpa adhyavasāyataḥ tad rūpā vañcaka tve api kṛtā bhrānti vyavasthitiḥ maṇi pradīpa prabhayoḥ maṇi buddhyā abhidhāvatoḥ mithyājñāna aviśeṣe api viśeṣaḥ artha kriyām prati yathā tathā yathārtha tve api anumāna tad ābhayoḥ artha kriyā anurodhena pramāṇa tvam vyavasthitam iti yat tāvat atasmin tad grahaḥ bhrāntiḥ iti satyam bhavati evam bhrāntiḥ na tu anumeya agni jñānasya eva tad rūpam asti yat tu atra bhrānti tve sādhanam uktam sva pratibhāse anarthe artha adhyavasāyena pravartanāt iti tat na asiddha tvāt agnau eva agni adhyavasāyaḥ na tu sva pratibhāse anarthaḥ iti 
[196,9]	nanu anumeya agni jñāne sāmānya ākāraḥ pratibhāsate na ca saḥ eva agniḥ tasya pratyakṣeṇa anyathā grahaṇāt viśiṣṭa ākārasya eva ca artha kriyā kāri tvāt parama artha sattvam tad artham eva artha kriyā arthinaḥ pravartante tena anartha avabhāsane api artha adhyavasāyena pravṛttiḥ iti tat api asat na khalu sāmānya ākāra mātram pratibhāti anumeya jñāne kim tarhi sāmānya viśiṣṭaḥ agni ādiḥ arthaḥ eva tathā ca aayam mayā anumānena avagata a iti uttaratra api avyabhicāriṇī pratipattiḥ eka viṣaya tvāt eka ākāra pratipatti prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na karaṇa bhedāt eva pratibhāsa vilakṣaṇa upapatteḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[196,16]	niruddhe api anumeye anumeya pratibhāsasya anirodhāt na vastu viṣaya tvam iti ced na yogi jñānasya vastu nirodhe api utpadyamānasya tad grāhi tvā bhrānta tva abhyupagamāt na bhrāntam anumeya jñānam avisaṃvādi tvāt pratyakṣa jñāna vat iti sva saṃvedanāt anyat pratyakṣam api bhrāntam eva iti ced na loka vyavahāra virodhāt sva śāstra virodhāt ca kim ca sva saṃvedana vat sarva pramāṇa jñānānām abhrānta tvam na vā sva saṃvedanasya api abhrānta tvam viśeṣa abhāvāt iti tat api uktam liṅga liṅgi dhiyoḥ ityādi 
[196,24_197,3]	tatra idam vaktavyam kim liṅga liṅginoḥ eva pratibandhaḥ tad artha avañcaka tve hetuḥ āho svid tābhyām saha tad dhiyoḥ iti prācye vikalpe vivādaḥ na asti avinā abhau a sambandha abhyupagamāt sa kim tādātmya tad utpattibhyām niyataḥ atha anyathāpi iti etat uttaratra vicārayiṣyāmaḥ pāramparyeṇa api na vaktavyam sākṣāt eva liṅga liṅginoḥ anvina abhāva sambandha abhyupagamāt atha tābhyām tat hiyoḥ pāramparyeṇa pratibandhāt tad arha ābandhaka tvam mṛtyu nāśa ādi anāgata arthena saha tat hiyaḥ pratibandha abhāve api tad artha avañcaka tvāt iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[197,7]	yat api uktam tayoḥ tad rūpa śūnyayoḥ ityādi tat ayuktam pratyakṣa jñānānām api nīla ādi artha ākāra śūnyānām tad artha adhyavasāyena pravartakānām bhrānta tva prasaṅgāt na hi kasyacid api jñānasya artha rūpatā asti iti prāk eva prapañcitam tat na adhyavasita artha avyabhicāriṇaḥ vijñānasya artha ākāra śūnya tve api bhrānta tvam iti bhrānta tve hi kadācid kasyacid avaśyam visaṃvādaḥ syāt iti 
[197,12]	yat ca atra uktam maṇi pradīpa prabhayoḥ ityādi tat api asādhīyaḥ tathā hi pravṛtti uttara kālam maṇi prabhāyām maṇi jñānam utpannam na maṇau iti eva tasya anyasya vā vicārakasya bādhā bhavati vā na vā yadi na bhavati katham prabhā viṣaya tvam tasya vyavasthāpyate maṇi viṣayam eva tat tat avyabhicāri maṇi jñāna tvāt karastha maṇi jñāna vat iti atha bādhā bhavati tathā sati tat maṇi jñānam pramāṇam eva na bhavati bādhita artha tvāt keśa ādi bhrānti vat pravartaka tvam ca smṛti saṃśaya viparyayāṇām api asti na ca pramāṇa tvam iti 
[197,19]	yat ca uktam artha kriyā anurodhena vyavasthitam iti tat api asāram yatas smṛti saṃśaya viparyayāṇām pravṛttim janayatām kvacid abhimata artha prāpaka tvam asti na ca pramāṇa tvam iti anaikāntaḥ atha teṣām tad deśa ākāra ādi vyabhicārāt artha prāpaka tvam na asti tena apramāṇa tvam iti na tarhi maṇi jñānam udāharaṇīyam na hi kuñcikā vivara niḥsṛtāyām prabhāyām utpannam maṇi jñānam tad deśa stham maṇim prāpayati na ca apramāṇa jñānena udāhṛtena api vivāda viṣayasya jñānasya pramāṇa tvam siddhyati atiprasaṅgāt artha mithyā jñāna aviśeṣe api viśeṣaḥ tāvat asti iti etāvat artham udāharaṇam 
[197,27]	tatas kim viśeṣa mātrasya siddha tvāt atha yathā mithyātva aviśeṣe api ayam viśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ tadvat ayathārtha tva aviśeṣe api pramāṇa tva apramāṇa tva viśeṣaḥ api syāt iti na dṛṣṭānta mātrāt artha siddhi asambhavāt atha api syāt tat etat api syāt yathā samyaktvā aviśeṣe api mumūrṣā arthā mumūrṣā artha santāna utpanna jñānayoḥ ekasya abhimata dāha ādi artha kriyā kṣamā artha prāpaka tvam na asti aparasya asti iti ayam viśeṣaḥ tadvat yathārtha tva aviśeṣe api kiṃcid pramāṇam kiṃcid apramāṇam iti eṣaḥ api viśeṣaḥ tvayā abhyupagantavyaḥ iti 
[198,5]	yathā artha jñānasya kasyacid api visaṃvāda abhāvāt apramāṇa tva abhyupagamaḥ na yuktaḥ iti ced nanu evam ayathārtha jñānasya kasyacid api saṃvāda abhāvāt pramāṇa tvam na abhyupagantavyam saṃvādi jñānasya api ayathārtha tva virodhāt ayathārtha tva avagamasya eva visaṃvāda rūpa tvāt apramāṇa jñānāt artha prāptiḥ katham iti ced nanu apramāṇāt api arthi tvena pravartamānaḥ yadi asti tatra arthaḥ tadā tam avaśyam prāpnoti iti uktam tat na artha kriyā anurodhena eva pramāṇa tvam vyavasthāpyate tadā mumūrṣā artha jñānasya aśakya prāpti artha jñānasya ca anarthi puruṣa jñānam syāt api ca sārtha kriyā pramāṇena anavagatā satī svayam asat kalpā na pūrva jñānasya api pramāṇa tva vyavasthāpikā pramāṇena ced avagatā na tu evam sati tasya api artha kriyā jñānasya anyena artha kriyā jñānena pramāṇa tvam vyavasthāpayitavyam tasya api anena iti anavasthā iti atra āha 
[198,15_198,17]	uttara artha kriyā bhāvāt pūrvasya yadi mānatā tadā eva artha kriyā bhāvāt uttarasya katham na sā yasya artha kriyā uparodhena pūrvasya api mānatā vyavatiṣṭhate tasya tadā eva artha kriyā bhavantī sutarām mānatām vyavasthāpayati artha kriyā sthitiḥ avisaṃvādanam iti sāmānyena abhidhānāt iti tat ayuktam yasmāt na artha kriyā mātram pramāṇa tva sādhakam svapna indrajāla ādi jñāneṣu api sambhavāt kin tu artha kriyā sthitiḥ avisaṃvādanam iti tvayā uktam artha kriyāyāḥ ca sthitiḥ avicalanam vyavasthā vā iti tvayā eva vyākhyānam kṛtam tatas ca avicalita tvam artha kriyāyāḥ na artha kriyā upalambha mātrāt eva siddhyati svapna ādiṣu api artha kriyā upalambha mātrasya bhāvāt 
[199,5]	artha kriyā svarūpam eva avicalita tvam tatas tad vedane tad svarūpam katham na viditam iti ced evam tarhi pūrva artha jñānasya api sva rūpam eva avisaṃvādi tvam tat ca tad vedanāt eva viditam iti anarthakam tat parīkṣaṇam vidite api tad svarūpe khalu visaṃvādi jñāna sādṛśyāt bhramaḥ sandehaḥ vā jāyate tad nivṛtti artham parīkṣaṇam iti ced avicalita svarūpa vedane api tarhi vicalita svarūpa vedane api tarhi vicalita artha kriyā jñāna sādṛśyāt bhramaḥ sandehaḥ vā bhavati eva iti atas tad nivṛttaye api parīkṣaṇam kartavyam iti 
[199,13^1]	na kartavyam kasmāt yasmāt āha prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa śāstram moha nivartanam iti na khalu su śikṣitaḥ api kaścid prāmāṇena prāmāṇyam sādhayitum śaktaḥ tathā hi pratyakṣam tāvat sva rūpa mātra vedanāt na ātmanaḥ prāmāṇyam vetti na hi jñāna svarūpa mātra vedane pramāṇam idam iti bhavati svatas hi svarūpasya eva gatiḥ na para rūpasya sākṣāt gatiḥ hi pratyakṣam sākṣātkaraṇam ca svarūpasya na para rūpasya prāpti kāla viśeṣaṇasya pramāṇatā ca prāpya padārtha avi abhicāritā na ca prāpya padārtha agrahaṇe tad sambandha grahaṇam na ca tathā anavasīyamānam pramāṇam iti avasitam bhavati purovarti rūpā saṅgitā ca sarva jñānānām aviśiṣṭā 
[199,13^2]	na tayā bhāvi rūpa sambandha parigrahaḥ na api bhāvinā artha kriyā jñānena pūrvarūpa sambandha parigrahaḥ tatas svarūpa saṃvedana ātma tvāt na pratyekam sambandha parigrahaḥ na api samudāya sambhavaḥ krameṇa sādhana artha kriyā jñānayoḥ bhāvāt tad uttara kāla bhāvi tu smaraṇam yathā anubhavam pravartamānam asambaddham eva dvayam vikalpayati yathā anubhava parityāgāt tu tad upaplutam eva iti na tatas sambandha pratipattiḥ tatas tad sambandha agrahaṇāt paścāt api dṛṣṭa sādharmyāt katham pratipattiḥ anumānāt iti na prāmāṇya pratipatti upāyaḥ iti svarūpasya eva svatas gatiḥ na prāmāṇyasya atha prāmāṇyam svarūpam eva bhāva pratyaya vācyasya tatas avyatirekāt tat ayuktam 
[200,6_200,8]	jñāna svarūpam prāmāṇyam prāpya rūpa samanvayi sva rūpa mātra grahaṇe tat agrāhyam iti īritam na hi jñāna svarūpam eva prāmāṇyam prāpya svarūpa sambandhena tattva vyavasthāpanāt tasya ca agrahaṇam iti pratipāditam eva tatas apravṛtti nivṛttikam sva svarūpa saṃvedana mātram eva na bheda vāda avatāraḥ tasmāt na prekṣāvadbhiḥ kvacid parivartitavyam nivartitavyam vā kutaścid 
[200,12]	katham tarhi prāmāṇyam aprāmaṇataḥ nivṛttam vyavasthāpyate prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa sāṃvyavahārikam etat iti pratipāditam saṃvyavahāraḥ ca vicāryamāṇaḥ viśīryate eva tatra yadi etāvatā paritoṣaḥ tadā na kiṃcid kartavyam iti muktiḥ eva saṃsārāt tasya ca atyantam asadbhāvāt atha vyavahāra prasiddhaḥ saṃsāraḥ tathā sati pramāṇa itara vibhāgaḥ api asti eva iti na pramāṇa tva pratipādanāya yatnaḥ āstheyaḥ 
[200,17]	kim ca sāṃvyavahārikam prāmāṇyam pratipādayatā paramārthataḥ ekam eva sva saṃvedanam pratyakṣam iti uktam bhavati tasmāt vyavahāra mātra prasiddha anumāna āśrayeṇa prasiddham sambandham āśritya tat etat artha kriyā sādhanam iti darśanena sparśa ādi sādhanasya pratipattau pravartate paścāt abhyāsa anumānam antareṇa api pratibhāsa mātrāt eva pravṛttiḥ iti pratyakṣam api pravartaka tvāt pramāṇam tatra ucyate prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa iti nanu darśanena rūpam eva upalabhyate na spṛśyam tathā vartamānam eva na bhāvi prāpyam tathā sva dṛśyam eva na para dṛśyam api tat katham anya darśane anya prāptyā pramāṇam uktam atra svarūpasya svatas gatiḥ iti 
[200,25_201,1]	kim ca vyavahārate eka tvāt pramāṇa tva vyavasthitiḥ deśa ādi abhedāt ekatvam dravyasya vyapadiśyate uktam etat prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa iti tatas vyavahāra prasiddham avayavinaḥ ekatvam samāśritya yat eva dṛṣṭam tat eva prāptam iti vyavasāyāt pramāṇa tā vyavahāraḥ sa ca eka tva adhyavasāyaḥ deśa kāla ādi abhedāt tad abhedaḥ api tad samartha sāmagrī jananāt evam bhāvi bhūtayoḥ api tat eka santāna patita tvena samāna artha kriyātas ca eka tva abhimānaḥ tatas pravṛttiḥ tatas artha kriyā siddhau pramāṇa tva vyavasthitiḥ tasmāt vyavahāreṇa eva pramāṇa tva vyavasthitiḥ iti 
[201,7]	yadi tarhi vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyam pramāṇa lakṣaṇa śāstram kim artham śāstra nirdiṣṭam api na vacana mātrāt tathā bhavati api tu vyavahāra avisaṃvādāt eva sa ced asti vyartham śāstram iti āha śāstram moha nivartanam yadi vyavahārataḥ pramāṇa svarūpam avagamyate kasmāt paraspara virodhīni lakṣaṇa śāstrāṇi tatas vyavahāre api vimatiḥ eva vyavahāriṇām tathā hi 
[201,12_201,23]	na sarvaḥ vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyam avagacchati pramāṇa lakṣaṇam tena paraspara virodha vat pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇena para lokaḥ na gamyate āgamāt aparaḥ prāha iti atas na vyavahārataḥ tasmāt vyavahāra parāmarśāt śāstram moha nivarttanam pūrva aparasya asmaraṇam śāstreṇa anena vāryate atas eva śāstreṇa eva sarvajña uktena mohaḥ nivarttyate na anyena iti anena prakāreṇa sarvajña vacanam eva pramāṇam iti paramārthataḥ sarvajña jñānam eva pramāṇam na aparam iti parama arthaḥ anyasya na pramāṇa tvam prameya avyāpti sambhavāt avyāpinā na kārya ādi sambandhasya parigrahaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi atīta anāgata vartamāna kāla deśa vyāpi sāhacarya rūpaḥ na khalu asarvajña jñānasya viṣayaḥ vartamāna sannihita deśa grahaṇāt pratyakṣasya anumānasya ca anavatārāt iti 
[202,2]	atra ucyate yat tāvat prāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa iti sa khalu vyavahāraḥ pramāṇam apramāṇam vā yadi na pramāṇam katham tena prāmāṇyam vyavasthāpyate na hi apramāṇāt kasyacid vyavasthitiḥ atiprasaṅgāt tathā ca sarva śāstrāṇām prāmāṇya vyavasthitiḥ sthira ādi padārthānām vyavasthitiḥ ca prasajyate vyavahāra mātrasya sarvatra sambhavāt 
[202,7_202,10]	atha pramāṇa bhūtena vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyam vyavasthāpyate tat ayuktam pramāṇa dvaya vyatirekeṇa pramāṇa antarasya tvayā anabhyupagamāt tad antarbhāve api vyavahārasya tad dūṣaṇena eva dūṣita tvāt na tatas prāmāṇya vyavasthitiḥ atha avicāritāt eva vyavahārāt prāmāṇya vyavasthitiḥ tathā api avicārita vyavahāra mātrasya sarvatra aviśeṣāt atiprasaṅgaḥ iti uktam atha sarva avisaṃvādī yaḥ vyavahāraḥ tatas pramāṇa siddhiḥ iti na sarva avisaṃvādi vyavahāra asambhavāt vipratipatteḥ ca sarvatra sambhavāt 
[202,14^1]	atha aśruta śāstrāṇām api yatra prāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ tat pramāṇam eva iti veda ādayaḥ tarhi pramāṇam eva teṣu prāmāṇya vyavahārasya sarva loka prasiddha tvāt atha dṛṣṭa artha jñānānām eva vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyam na veda ādi artha jñānānām iti tat kim idānīm yūyam lokāyata śaraṇam gatāḥ tathā ca tad dūṣaṇam api abhidhāsyāmaḥ buddha ādi jñānānām prāmāṇyam ca na syāt atha iha loka prasiddha sukha duḥkha sādhana āpti parivarjana nimittānām jñānānām yena nimittena prāmāṇyam vyavahartṛbhiḥ vyavahriyate tad nimittam anyatra api yatra upalabhyate tat api pramāṇam eva iti evam tarhi yatra eva āsan digdha tva abhra anta tvam upalabhyate tatra eva vyavahartṛbhiḥ prāmāṇyam vyavahriyate tad viparyaya upalambhe tu aprāmāṇya vyavahāra darśanāt 
[202,14^2]	tasmāt anyatra api asandigdha abhra anta tva upalambhāt eva prāmāṇyam vyavasitavyam na tu artha kriyā anurodhāt na api prāpya artha sambandhāt pravartakāt vā mumūrṣā artha upekṣaṇīya artha jñāneṣu pramāṇeṣu api artha kriyā ādīnām asambhavāt smṛti sandeha viparyaya jñāneṣu api bhāvāt iti uktam asandigdha abhra anta tvam ca pramāṇena yathā avagamyate tathā prāk eva uktam pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇa vicāre 
[203,1]	yat uktam darśanena sparśa ādi sādhanasya pratipattau pravartante paścāt abhyāsāt anumānam antareṇa api pratibhāsa mātrāt eva pravṛttiḥ iti pratyakṣam api pravartaka tvāt pramāṇam tatra ucyate aprāmāṇyam vyavahāreṇa a iti tat ayuktam atyanta abhyāsāt api na anya dṛṣṭā vā anyatra pravṛttiḥ sambhavati na hi agni darśane toya arthī toya abhimukham pravartamānaḥ kvacid upalabhyate tasmāt atyanta abhyāsāt āśu bhāvi tvena utpannayoḥ sambandha smṛti anumāna jñānayoḥ pratyakṣa pūrvakayoḥ tad viveka tā vyavahāraḥ iti tat api asat avayavi ekatva apratipattau ayam mithyā abhimānaḥ śākyasya pratyakṣa jñānāt eva pravṛttaḥ iti yadi ca rūpa darśanāt eva adṛṣṭe api sparśa ādi sādhane pravṛttiḥ sambhavati tatas dhūma ādi darśanāt eva agni ādiṣu api pravṛttiḥ iti bruvāṇaḥ cārvākaḥ kena vāryate 
[203,12]	yat api uktam vyavahāra prasiddham avayavinaḥ ekatvam samāśritya tat eva dṛṣṭam tat eva prāptam iti vyavasāya apramāṇa tā vyavahāraḥ iti tat api asat avayavi eka tva abhyupagame tad pratiṣedha virodhaḥ tad anabhyupagame ca tad āśrayeṇa prasiddhasya prāmāṇya vyavahārasya api anabhyupagamaḥ prāptaḥ na hi svastha ātmā kaścid svapna indrajāla ādi artham mithyā tvena pratipadyamānaḥ tad jñānānām tad āśrayeṇa prāmāṇyam pratipadyate saṃvyavahāra mātreṇa prāmāṇya abhyupagamaḥ na paramārthataḥ iti ced tat kim idānīm pāramārthikam pramāṇam eva na asti tathā ca apāram ārthikena pramāṇena siddhasya avayavi ādeḥ iva kṣaṇika tva ādeḥ api pāramārthika tvam na syāt tatas ca tad grahaḥ anarthakaḥ eva 
[203,20_203,28]	atha asti kiṃcid pāramārthikam pramāṇam tasya kutas siddhiḥ na tāvat saṃvyavahāreṇa eva tatas siddhasya pāramārthika tva virodhāt sarva pramāṇānām pāramārthika tva prasaṅgaḥ vā na hi saṃvyavahārāt eva asya pāramārthikam prāmāṇyam asya sāṃvyavahārikam iti ayam viśeṣaḥ siddhyati na api anyaḥ upāyaḥ prāmāṇya pratipattau asti prāk tvayā eva niṣiddha tvāt yadi ca saṃvyavahāraḥ sarve eva vāstavaḥ tatas tad siddhasya sarva pramāṇasya api avāstava tvam tad avāstava tve ca tad sādhitasya para loka ādeḥ api avāstatava tvam syāt svapna vyavahāra siddha pramāṇa prasādhita artha vat para lokāt yavāstava tve tu anarthakam eva śāstram iti tasmāt saṃvyavahāraḥ ca vicāryamāṇaḥ viśīryate iti etat api mithyā vicāra ābhāsasya eva vicāra tva āropaṇāt vicāraḥ hi pramāṇam ucyate na ca mūla ghātinaḥ pramāṇa tvam yuktam iti 
[204,4_204,7]	yat api udīritam pramāṇa tā ca prāpya artha avi abhicāritāḥ ityādi tat ayuktam yasmāt asthāyi pradīpa ādi artha jñāne pravṛttaḥ tad artha aprāptau api tad cihna darśanena tat jñānasya prāmāṇyam eva vyavaharati sarvaḥ api buddhimān iti nanu ca yadi asau arthaḥ na prāpyate artha kriyām ca na karoti tadā prekṣāvataḥ artha kriyā arthinaḥ pravṛttiḥ eva na syāt abhimata arthasya aniścita tvāt sandehena pravṛttau tu na tasya prāmāṇyam sandehasya apramāṇa tvāt atha evam ucyate 
[204,10_204,14]	upeye nāma sandehaḥ tāvatā na pramāṇa tā niścita tvāt upāyasya pramāsau kid na tāvatā na kha lūpeya sandeha parijihīrṣā sarvatra upāya niścaya mātreṇa pravṛtteḥ tatas upāya niścaye sati kṛṣīvala ādi vat prāmāṇikāḥ pravartantām tat asat yatas upeya arthitayā sarvaḥ pravartana nivartane karoti puruṣaḥ tasya sandehaḥ ced katham pramā 
[204,16_204,19]	yad artham iṣyate pramāṇam tatra upeye sandehāt pramāṇam iti kā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ nanu pramāṇena arthaḥ jñāpayitavyaḥ na tu artha kriyā kartavyā artha kriyā hi kutaścid sāmagrī viśeṣāt paścāt bhavantī katham jñāpayitum śakyā tat api asat yad arthaḥ eṣa prārambhaḥ tad aniṣpattiḥ eva ced asiddha sādhya sambandhaḥ katham sādhakaḥ ucyatām 
[204,21_205,8]	amutas pramāṇāt abhimata artha siddhim āsādayeyam iti pramāṇa tā anveṣaṇa paraḥ prekṣāvān na anyathā vyasanam eva tu anyathā bhavet arthaḥ ca prakāśitaḥ yadi na artha kriyā kārī kutas tasya anarthāt taimirika upalabdha keśa ādeḥ viśeṣaḥ atha kadācid tatra artha kriyā bhavati na timira ādau evam tarhi tad arthī katham pravartate na khalu sandehāt pravartamānaḥ pramāṇāt pravṛttaḥ bhavati pramāṇam hi niścāyakam na sandeha kṛt artha kriyā kāriṇi niścayaḥ ced artha kriyā niścaye katham tathā niścayaḥ atha tena pramāṇena artha kriyā sādhanam vastu darśitam artha kriyā tu yadi kutaścid vaikalyāt na bhavati na pramāṇasya asau doṣaḥ tat api ayuktam ajñāpaka tvam mānasya na doṣaḥ yadi bhaṇyate na tasya asti aparaḥ doṣaḥ iti sarvam pramā bhavet pramīyate yena paricchidyate samīhitaḥ arthaḥ tat pramāṇam na ca ājñāpakasya pariccheda śaktiḥ iti apramāṇam eva iti 
[205,13]	tat etat anupapannam yat tāvat prekṣāvataḥ pravṛttiḥ na syāt iti tat na prekṣāvataḥ api artha saṃśaya artha ūhābhyām api pravṛtti sambhavāt iti uktam purastāt tatas pravṛttau na tasya prāmāṇyam iti ayuktam vyadhikaraṇa tvāt yadi nāma artha kriyā saṃdeha jñānasya prāmāṇyam na asti pūrvasya artha svarūpa niścaya jñānasya apramāṇa tve kim āyātam etena upeya arthitayā ityādi api nirastam na hi anayoḥ tādātmyam yena upeya sandehe pūrva artha niścayasya api aprāmāṇyam iti 
[205,19_205,21]	yat api uktam yat arthaḥ eṣa prārambhaḥ ityādi tat ca na yogyatā mātra paricchedāt eva artha kriyā arthinām tad sādhaneṣu pravṛtti darśanāt tantu ādiṣu iva paṭa ādi arthinām iti arthaḥ ca prakāśitaḥ yadi na artha kriyā kārī kutas tasya anarthāt taimirika upalabdha keśa ādeḥ viśeṣaḥ iti api ayuktam taimirika upalabdha arthasya bādhaka pratyayena asatya tva avadhāraṇāt asya tu artha kriyā anutpattau api viśeṣa antara darśanena tathā ātva bheda avadhāryate iti katham aviśeṣaḥ 
[206,3_206,8]	yat punar etat artha kriyā anupalambhe katham tad sādhana niścayaḥ iti na prāk eva niścita tvāt evaṃbhūteṣu eva satsu evaṃvidham kāryam bhavati na asatsu iti evam prāk vyāpti niścaye sati tathāvidha kārya arthī tathāvidha tvena avadhāriteṣu hetuṣu pravartate prekṣāvān api ādau katham iti ced na ādeḥ abhavāt anādiḥ ayam saṃsāraḥ iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ nanu ca na avaśyam hetavaḥ phalavantaḥ bhavanti antarāle pratibandha vaikalya darśanāt tat katham tathāvidheṣu hetuṣu tad phala arthinaḥ prekṣāvataḥ pravṛttiḥ iti na phala saṃbhāvanā ataḥ api pravṛtti sambhavāt jīvita arthinaḥ prekṣāvataḥ api bhojana ādi pravṛtti vat 
[206,12]	na hi prekṣāvān api phala avāptim niścitya eva pravartitum śaktaḥ śarīra avasthiti ādya niścayena phala prāpti vyabhicāra aśaṃkāsambhavāt apravartamānasya ca sarva puruṣa artha hāniḥ anarthaḥ ca syat iti atas prekṣāvataḥ aprekṣāvat tā eva bhavet iti tasmāt sādhana yogya tām niścitya tad pratibandha vaikalye ca apaśyan eva phala prāptim saṃbhāvya pravartate prekṣāvān na tad niścayāt eva iti 
[206,17]	yat api ajñāpaka tvam mānasya na doṣaḥ yadi ityādi tat api acāru sva viṣaya jñāpaka tvāt sarva jñānānām hi sva viṣa yajñāpaka tvena eva prāmāṇyam tatra viṣaya antarājñāpaka tvena aprāmāṇyam ayuktam na hi rūpa jñānam sparśam ajñāpayat apramāṇam yuktam evam hi sarva jñānānām aprāmāṇyam syāt viṣaya antara ājñāpakatva aviśeṣāt viṣaya antaram ca sādhana jñānasya tad phalam tad ajñāpane katham tasya aprāmāṇyam phala aniścaye tad sādhana tva niścayaḥ katham iti ced na prāk eva niścita tvāt ityādinā ukta tvāt tasmāt phala avāpti aniścaye api pravṛttasya apravṛttasya vā sādhana svarūpa jñānam viśeṣa darśana vyavasthāpita prāmāṇyam na aprāmāṇam iti atas ca yat uktam prāpya rūpa sambandhena eva prāmāṇya vyavasthāpanam iti etat apramāṇakam eva tathā hi rājya patnya alaṅkāra ādayaḥ arthāḥ nakṣatra ādayaḥ ca na eva prāptum śakyante na api prekṣāvantaḥ tatra pravartante 
[206,28]	atha ca tat jñānasya prāmāṇyam viśeṣa upalambhena artha kriyā niṣpattyā eva vyavasthāpyamānam dṛṣṭam tad apalāpe ca artha prāptyā api prāmāṇya vyavasthitiḥ na syāt vyavahārasya ubhayatra aviśeṣāt iti tathā upekṣaṇīya artha jñānasya api na aprāmāṇyam yadi nāma prayojana abhāvāt na vicāritam kim etāvatā tat na asti eva vivāda nivṛtti artham vā jijñāsubhiḥ kaiścid upekṣaṇīya artha jñānasya viśeṣa upalabdhitaḥ prāmāṇyam vyavasthāpyamānam dṛṣṭam eva iti 
[207,6^1]	nanu artha kriyā arthī sarvaḥ api pramāṇa anveṣaṇe pravartate na vyasanena tat katham upekṣaṇīya artha jñānam api pramāṇam iti na etat yuktam na hi puruṣa arthi tvam apekṣya cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ pramāṇa jñānam janayanti kim tarhi samagri sākalye sati anicchataḥ api puruṣasya anarthaka tṛṇa kīṭa ādi viṣayam api pramāṇa jñānam utpadyate artha adhigama mātre hi pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ na pravṛtti ādiṣu teṣām abhilāṣa ādi sādhya tvāt abhilāṣa ādi api anumānam iti ayuktam tasya liṅga darśana ādi abhāve api bhāvāt pramāṇa vicāre tu prekṣāvatām arthi tvena eva pravṛttiḥ na vyasanena iti yuktam etat tathā api pramāṇa lakṣaṇasya avyāpti doṣa nivṛtti artham upekṣaṇīya artha jñanam api prekṣāvadbhiḥ sāmānyatas parīkṣitavyam ati vyāpti doṣa parihāra artham tad ābhāsa parīkṣaṇa vat mumukṣoḥ śiṃśapā ādi anumāna parīkṣaṇa vat ca iti 
[207,6^2]	yat na upadīyate tat sarvam heyam iti atas na upekṣaṇīyam vastu asti iti ced tat ayuktam lakṣaṇa bhedena vastu trayasya pratīyamāna tvāt tathā hi puruṣa artha buddhyā tad sādhana buddhyā vā yat svīkriyate tat upādeyam yat tu anartha buddhyā tad sādhana buddhyā vā yatnatas parihartum iṣyate tat dheyam tatra tu puruṣa artha anartha buddhiḥ tad sādhana buddhiḥ ca na bhavati tat upekṣaṇīyam iti tasmāt upekṣaṇīyā ratha jñānasya api pramāṇa tvāt na pravartaka tva ādi prāmāṇya vyavahāre nimittam 
[207,22]	yat punar etat paramārthataḥ sva saṃvedanam eva ekam pratyakṣam iti tat ati durmati vispanditam sva saṃvedanasya prāk eva vistareṇa nirākṛta tvāt sva saṃvedanam eva ekam pratyakṣam iti bruvāṇasya sarvajña jñānam pramāṇam eva ityādi virodhaḥ ca na hi vartamāna ātmā eka jñāna mātra vedane sarvajña tvam yuktam abhrāntam ca pratyakṣam iṣyate tat yadi sarva artha viṣayam pratyakṣam sarvajñasya asti tadā sarvam ālambane bhramaḥ iti etat api pramatta vākyam sarvajña asyā api sarva artha viṣayam jñānam bhrāntam eva abhyupagamyate tatas na asti virodhaḥ iti ced śobhanam evam sarvajñasya sarvajña tvam varṇitam tad mūla tvena śāstrasya api prāmāṇyam śraddheyam tat ayam sva pakṣa rāga abhiniviṣṭaḥ sva tīrthaṅkarasya api buddha ādeḥ moham prakaṭayan anavadheya vacaḥ tvāt upekṣaṇīyaḥ eva iti 
[208,2]	vyavahāriṇām api vyavahāraḥ kaścid mithyā arthaḥ kaścid tattva arthaḥ iti katham aparīkṣitena vyavahāreṇa prāmāṇyam vyavasthāpyate tad parīkṣā tu ubhaya vyavahārayoḥ tattva itara viveka paryālocana abhyāsaḥ tatas dharma ādi tattva itara viveka parijñāna abhyāsa artha tvāt ca pramāṇa vicārasya iti yat ca uktam āstram moha nivartanam iti tat satyam yat abhrānta jñāna mūlam śāstram tat moham nivartayati eva tvadīyam tu śāstram bhrānta jñāna mūlam tat abhyasyamānam haviḥ iva hutabhujam varddhayati eva moham iti yat api uktam prāmāṇya pratipatti upāyā sambhavāt iti tat api ayuktam tad upāyasya prāk eva darśita tvāt uttaratra api bhinna kālayoḥ api avinā abhāva asambandha grahaṇa upāyam abhidhāsyāmaḥ api ca prāmāṇya pratipatti vat bhrānta tva pratipattau api anya upāya abhāvāt vyavahāraḥ eva anusartavyaḥ 
[208,13]	tathā hi sva rūpa mātra avagatam eva pratyakṣam vyāpriyate na tatas bhrānta tva avagatiḥ na hi sva rūpa mātra saṃvittau idam bhrāntam iti bhavati bhrānta tā ca grāhye viparyasta tā na ca sā grāhya vaiparītya anavagame avagantum śakyate na ca tat eva jñānam sva grāhya viparyasta tā avagam a ātmatayā udeti tad apratibhāsanāt pratibhāsane hi viparyastasya puṃsaḥ avagata artha prāpti abhimānena pravṛttiḥ na syāt na api pravṛtti uttara jñānena bhrānta tā avagamyate tadā bhrānta jñānasya atīta tvāt anyatra pravartaka tvam eva bhrānta tvam iti etat api kena vedyate na hi tat eva jñānam agrāhyāt anyatra aham pravṛttam pravartakam vā a iti evam ātmanam vā iti na api eka ātma svarūpa grāhi jñānam kenacid ātmanaḥ sambandham vetti na ca eka rūpa saṃvittau eva sambandha saṃvittiḥ tathā hi 
[208,22_208,24]	dviṣṭha sambandha saṃvittiḥ na eka rūpa pravedanāt dvaya svarūpa grahaṇe sati sambandha vedanam na ca tvad mate sva rūpa dvaya grāhi vijñānam kiṃcid asti api ca uttareṇa eva jñānena bhrānta tvam vyavasthāpyate tat ca uttara jñānam grāhya vaiparīti agrāhi vā syāt grāhya ākārāt vilakṣaṇa ākāra adhyavaseya vedakam vā anyatra pravṛtti vedakam vā tatas ca bhrānti uttara jñānayoḥ sva svarūpa saṃvedana ātma tvāt na pratyekam sambandha parigrahaḥ na api samudāyaḥ tayoḥ kāla vyavadhānāt uttara kāla bhāvi tu smaraṇam pravartamānam asambaddham eva dvayam vikalpayati yathā anubhava parityāgāt tu tad upaplutam eva iti na tatas sambandha pratipattiḥ tatas tad sambandha agrahaṇāt paścāt api dṛṣṭi asādharmyāt katham pratipattiḥ anumānāt iti 
[209,6]	na bhrānta tva pratipatti upāyaḥ asti vyavahārāt ca tad pratipattau anumāna jñānam bhrāntam pratipattavyam na hi samyak anumāna jñāne bhrānta tva vyavahāraḥ asti kvacid avisaṃvādini jñāne bhrānta tva vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti evam ca sva pratibhāse anarthe artha adhyavasāyena pravartanāt iti etat vyavahāreṇa eva bādhita tvāt asādhanam tad abhyupagame tu prāmāṇyam api na syāt pūrva uktān nyāyāt api ca aprāpye adhigata prāpya adhyavasāyena pravartanāt pratyakṣam api bhrāntam syāt sāṃvyavahārikam ca abhra anta tvam ubhayoḥ api samānam iti katham anumānam eva bhrāntam tad siddham etat samyak grahaṇam anumāna jñānasya abhrānta tva jñāpana artham iti 
[209,15]	nanu ca yasya anubhavasya avinā abhā a smṛtiḥ asādhāraṇam kāraṇam sa parokṣa ākāraḥ eva bhavati tat kim artham parokṣa grahaṇam na vipratipatti nirākaraṇa artha tvāt go tva ādi vat artha āśritam parokṣa tvam na jñāna āśritam iti kecid tat ayuktam sarva pratipattṝṇām nīla ādi vat aviśeṣeṇa grahaṇa prasaṅgāt saḥ eva kasyacid parokṣaḥ kasyacid aparokṣaḥ iti na syāt na hi nīla ādi api kaiścid nīla ādi rūpeṇa vedyate kaiścid anīla ādi rūpeṇa iti parāpara vyavahāra vat iti ced na tasya anya nimitta tvāt na khalu parāpara vyavahāraḥ sāmānya nibandhanaḥ kim tarhi saṃyukta saṃyoga bahu alpa buddhi nibandhanaḥ iti uktam bahu alpa bhāvaḥ api apekṣā nibandhanaḥ kuḍyāt apara stambhāt paraḥ ityādi darśanāt iti na ca evam parokṣa aparokṣa vyavahāraḥ artheṣu guṇa ādi nibandhanaḥ sāmānya ādiṣu bhrānta tva pratipatti upāyaḥ na syāt 
[209,25^1]	avyavahārāt ca tad pratipattau na anumāna jñānam bhrāntam pratipattavyam na hi samyak anumāna jñāne bhrānta tva vyavasthā api parokṣa aparokṣa vyavahāra darśanāt na api bāhya artha apekṣaḥ niyamena jñātṛ apekṣa tvāt mama aparokṣaḥ tava parokṣaḥ iti evam pratīteḥ akṣāt paraḥ parokṣaḥ tad anyaḥ tu aparokṣaḥ iti ced na ātma ādi anumeyasya manaḥ akṣa viṣaya tve api parokṣa tvāt iti uktam prāk eva prapañcena tasmāt anubhūta tva smṛta tva dṛṣṭa tva ādi vat anadhyavasita tva ādi vat ca jñāna viśeṣa ālambanam eva parokṣam aparokṣam ca iti 
[209,25^2]	jñāna vyaktiṣu ca sandeha tva smṛti tva ādi vat parokṣa tva aparokṣa tva jāti viśeṣa abhyupagame api adoṣaḥ pratyaya aviśeṣaḥ api jāti jāti mat yogāt api dṛṣṭaḥ tat yathā uṣṇa tva jāti yogāt uṣṇa sparśaḥ tad sambandhāt uṣṇaḥ agniḥ uṣṇaḥ pāṣāṇaḥ iti evam parokṣa tva jāti yogāt parokṣaḥ anubhavaḥ tad sambandhāt parokṣaḥ arthaḥ iti arthavat parokṣa anubhave api aparokṣa anubhava viṣaya tvena aparokṣa vyavahāraḥ api aparokṣa anubhave api parokṣa anubhava viṣaya tvena parokṣa vyavahāraḥ api iti sarvam sustham tat etat vicāritam api prameyasya vaiṣamyam dṛṣṭvā punar vicāritam sukha sambodhana artham iti 
[210,11]	atha vā pratyakṣa adhigata artha gantṛ tve anumānasya vaiyarthyam pratyakṣān adhigata artha gantṛ tve anumānasya gauṇa tva ādi doṣebhyaḥ prāmāṇyam eva na sambhavati iti āhuḥ kecid tad vyudāsā artham parokṣa grahaṇam avinā abhāva bala udbhūtaḥ parokṣa anubhavaḥ samyak eva upalabhyate tad sādhanasya anumānasya aprāmāṇyam vaktum aśakyam sarva loka vyavahāra virodhāt iti arthaḥ 
[210,17_210,19]	katham punar taiḥ sarva loka prasiddhasya anumānasya apahnavaḥ kriyate tat ucyate pramāṇasya agauṇa tvāt anumānāt artha durlabhaḥ iti pramāṇasya agauṇa tvāt iti viparyaya hetuḥ etat uktam bhavati pramāṇasya anupacarita viṣaya tvena prāmāṇya prasiddham yathā pratyakṣasya na ca anumānasya agauṇa viṣaya tvam śakyam vaktum tathā hi na dharmī eva sādhyaḥ tasya siddha tvāt dharmaḥ api anyatra siddhaḥ eva na tad samudāyaḥ sādhyaḥ tatra ca na hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam na api tena anvayaḥ pratipattum śakyate tasmāt anvaya pratipatti artham dharmaḥ eva sādhya tvena upacaritavyaḥ pakṣa dharma tva grahaṇa artham dharmī eva pakṣaḥ iti tathā ca anumāna vādibhiḥ uktam pakṣaḥ dharmī avayave samudāya upacārāt iti evam ca sati upacarita pakṣa dharma tva anvaya upakṛtāt anumānāt artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ iti tatra upacarita pakṣa vṛtteḥ abodhaka tvam dṛṣṭam yathā dāha ādi samarthaḥ ayam baṭuḥ agni tvāt iti tathā upacarita anvayasya api asādhaka tvam yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt sukha ādi vat śrāvaṇa śabda bhavita tvena sukha ādeḥ śrāvaṇa tva upacārāt anvaya siddhiḥ iti 
[211,5]	api ca sādhikriyām apekṣya sādhyam ucyate sā ced niṣpannā vyartham pakṣa dharma tva ādi grahaṇam tad arthasya prasiddha tvāt na ced niṣpannā kim apekṣya pakṣa ādi vyavasthā bhāvini bhūta vat upacāra āśrayaṇe saḥ eva anumānasya gauṇa tva doṣaḥ mukhya anumāna abhāvāt gauṇam api ayuktam iti 
[211,10]	sādhya vikalpa anupapatteḥ ca anumāna anupapattiḥ tathā hi dharmiṇaḥ siddha tvāt na sādhya tvam dharmaḥ ced sādhyaḥ sa kim sāmānya lakṣaṇaḥ atha viśeṣa lakṣaṇaḥ iti kim ca atas sāmānye siddha sādhya tā viśeṣe anugama abhāvaḥ iti sāmānyasya agni matvā anitya tva ādi lakṣaṇasya kvacid siddha tvāt vyartham tad sādhanam deśa ādi viśiṣṭasya ananvayāt eva asiddhiḥ na hi parvata sthena agninā śabda gatena ca anitya tvena anvayaḥ kvacid asti iti 
[211,17]	itas ca avinā abhāva sambandhasya grahītum aśakya tvāt anumānam apramāṇam na hi pratyakṣeṇa dhūma agni vyaktayaḥ anantāḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva āpannāḥ grahītum śakyante sāmānya mātrayoḥ avinā abhāva grahaṇe tayoḥ eva gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ syāt anyathā ati prasaṅgāt sāmānya mātra viṣayam ca vyartham anumānam bhavet tanmātrasya siddha tvāt apuruṣa artha tvāt ca iti tadvatām api ānantyāt eva agrahaṇam na ca aidakeśa grahaṇe vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva pratipattiḥ sahasraśas api sa vatsa go grahaṇe vyabhicāra darśanāt tat na pratyakṣeṇa vyāpti grahaṇam na api anumānena eva anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti 
[211,25]	kim ca viruddha anumāna virodhayoḥ sarvatra sambhavāt na anumānam pramāṇam tatra viruddha prakāraḥ tāvat ucyate dūṣaṇa vādi prativādi abhimata prakṛta sādhana sādhya dharma adhika raṇa tva abhāvaḥ tathā sādhana dūṣaṇa vādi anyatara upātta sādhana sādhya dharma adhika raṇa tva abhāvaḥ tathā sādhana vādi prativādi indriya viṣaya āpannava ādi abhimata sādhana sādhya dharma adhika raṇa tva abhāvaḥ tathā atīta anāgata kāla vyatirikta kāla sambandhi vādi abhimata sādhana sādhya dharma adhika raṇa tva abhāvaḥ iti ete sarvagāḥ pratisādhana vṛttayaḥ api sarvatra sambhavanti yathā etat deśa kāla saṃlagna agni mattva abhāvaḥ śabdasya ākāśa viśeṣa guṇa tva abhāva aśrotra grāhya tva abhāvaḥ sukha ādīnām ātma āśrita tva abhāvaḥ sarva gata āśraya āśrita tva abhāvaḥ kṣiti ādeḥ sarvajña kartṛ pūrvakatva abhāvaḥ śarīra ādi vinirmukta kartṛ pūrvaka tva abhāvaḥ iti evam sarva anumāneṣu viruddha prakāraḥ draṣṭavyaḥ 
[212,10]	atha anumāna virodhaḥ pradarśyate na prakṛta vādi abhimata sādhana sādhya dharma ādhāraḥ dharmī dharma dharmiṇoḥ anyatara tvāt sādhya śabda artha avayava tvāt vā sādhya dharma vat na vā prakṛte dharmī viṣayaḥ prakṛta sādhya dharmaḥ pūrva ukta hetu dvayāt dharmi vat na prakṛta sādhya dharma adhikaraṇa dharmi dharmayoḥ anyataraḥ sādhya dharma dharmitvāt ghaṭa ādi vat na prakṛta sādhya dharmavān ayam pakṣaḥ pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ anyatra tvāt vipakṣa vat pakṣa khara śṛṅgayoḥ anyatra tvāt vā kharaśṛṅga vat vādi prativādi vipratipatti anāskandita agni vyatirikta agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ na bhavati pradeśa tvāt sattva jñeya tva ādibhyaḥ ca tad anya pradeśa vat na prakṛta agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ kharaśṛṅgasya ādhūma tvāt khara śṛṅga vat atīta anāgata kāla vyatirikta kāla viśiṣṭa asmad prativādi prayukta sādhana bhāva āpanna dhūma sādhya siddhi samāna kāla ghaṭaḥ na ghaṭaḥ khapuṣpā patra tvāt padma patra vat iti evam sarva anumāneṣu anumāna virodhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti 
[212,22]	tathā viruddha avyabhicāri dūṣaṇa tvena anumānasya apramāṇa tā vaktavyaḥ kaḥ punar ayam viruddha avyabhicārī viruddha avyabhicārya numāna virodhayoḥ saṃjñā mātreṇa bhedaḥ iti eke tat ayuktam pṛthak abhidhāna ānarthakya prasaṅgāt tasmāt anumānam bādhaka tvena uktam yadā bādhya bādhaka buddhim janayati tadā anumāna virodhaḥ ucyate yadā punar tulya lakṣaṇa tvena upalabhyamānam saṃśayam janayati tadā viruddha avyabhicārī evam ca kārya bhedāt bhedaḥ iti 
[213,2]	atha kadācid evam brūyāt parihāra vidhānāt sādhanam sādhana ātmanā vyavatiṣṭhate iti atra api parihāra mārgaḥ pradarśyate tatra viruddhe tāvat anumāna virodhaḥ parihāra tvena ucyate na para upanyasta viruddha sādhana sādhya dharma adhikaraṇaḥ dharmī dharma dharmi vyatirikta aśeṣa bhāva vinirmukta tvāt sādhya dharma vat na prakṛta dharmi viṣaya vivāda rūḍha viśeṣa abhāva sādhakaḥ ayam hetu dharma dharmiṇoḥ anyatratvāt dharmi vat 
[213,7^1]	artha antara bhūta vivāda ārūḍha dharmi viśeṣa abhāva sādhaka hetu samāna kāla sattva ghaṭaḥ na ghaṭaḥ śaśaśṛṅga aśṛṅga tvāt bandhyā putra vat artha antara bhūta vivāda ārūḍha dharmi viśeṣa abhāva sādhana upanyāsa kāla avacchinna sādhana dūṣaṇa vādi anyatara vādi samāna kāla sattva ghaṭaḥ na ghaṭaḥ sat asatoḥ anyatara tvāt paṭa vat a r t h ā n t a r a b h ū t a s a r v a j ñ a b u d d h i v i j ñ ā t a j ñ e y a s a r v a b hāva antarbhūta prakṛta dharmi viṣaya vivāda ārūḍha viśeṣa abhāva sādhana upanyāsa kāla viśiṣṭa sādhana dūṣaṇa vādi anyatara vādi samāna kāla satva ghaṭaḥ na ghaṭaḥ saditara anutpādaka tvāt paṭa vat iti evam viruddhe anumāna virodhi anumāna virodhe viruddha avyabhicārī viruddha avyabhicāriṇi ca viruddha parihāra tvena vaktavyaḥ iti 
[213,7^2]	tat ayuktam yatas pramāṇena parihāre tatra api trayam iti anavasthā parihāra anumāne api viruddha ādi dūṣaṇa trayam tatra api anumānena parihāre kriyamāṇe punar dūṣaṇa trayam iti anavasthā iti athavā pramāṇena iti viruddha ādi trayeṇa pramāṇa bhūtena parihāra anumāna prāmāṇyasya nirākaraṇe kriyamāṇe laukāyatikaiḥ anumānam eva abhyupagatam bhavati viruddha ādi trayasya api anumāna ātmaka tvāt iti codye tatra api trayam iti anavasthā iti viruddha ādi traye api anumāna tva nirākaraṇa artham anyat viruddha ādi dūṣaṇa trayam vaktavyam tatra api anyat iti anavasthā abhyupagamāt katham anumāna abhyupagamaḥ tasmāt anumānasya apramāṇa tvāt parokṣa artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ iti 
[213,24]	atra pratividhīyate yat tāvat tad upacarita pakṣa dharma tā anvaya upakṛtāt anumānāt artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ iti tat na anabhyupagamāt na eva hi pakṣa dharma tva anvayau hetoḥ aupacārikau abhyupagamyete tat avyatirikta mukhya pakṣa dharma tva ādeḥ asambhavāt na hi mukhyā sambhave kvacid upacāraḥ pravartate tasmāt vakṣyamāṇa pakṣa ādi lakṣaṇa yogāt pakṣa ādi vyavasthā nā mukhya iti 
[214,1]	nanu agṛhītasya viśeṣaṇa tva ayogāt katham sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī pakṣaḥ sa hi sādhya dharmaḥ agṛhītaḥ ced pakṣam viśinaṣṭi tatas pakṣa dharma tva ādi grahaṇam vyartham syāt tad antareṇa prāk eva sādhya pratīteḥ siddha tvāt apratītena ca sādhya dharmeṇa katham dharmī viśiṣyate tat aviśiṣṭaḥ ca kevalaḥ dharmī na pakṣaḥ 
[214,5^1]	atha yatra dharmiṇi jijñāsitaḥ dharmaḥ pratipipādayiṣitaḥ vā sa sādhya dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ ucyate tarhi jijñāsā ādi abhāve anya artham paryaṭataḥ dhūma ādi darśanāt agni ādi pratipattiḥ bhavati yadā tadā katham pakṣaḥ iti na abhiprāya aparijñānāt na brūmaḥ yadā eva sādhya dharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī tadā eva asau pakṣaḥ kim tarhi prāk api etat uktam bhavati yat tu sādhyena dharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī bhaviṣyati sa tasya hetoḥ prāk api pakṣaḥ iti bhaviṣyataḥ tad viśiṣṭa tvasya apratipattau katham pakṣatva pratipattiḥ iti ced na yogyatā mātra pratītau eva tad vyavahāra siddheḥ yathā paṭa ādi kārya arthinaḥ tantu ādi vastūni yogya tā mātra pratītau eva tad kāraṇa tvena vyavaharanti 
[214,5^2]	na hi kāryā pratītau tad kāraṇa tva pratītiḥ sambhavati tad asambhave ca na tad kāraṇa pratītiḥ tatas na tad kārya arthinām tad upādāna ādi vyavahāraḥ iti apravṛtti nivṛttikam jagat syāt gauṇa kāraṇeṣu pravṛttau ca pāka ādi arthinām vaṭu ādiṣu api pravṛttiḥ syāt tasmāt yathā yogyatā mātra pratītyā eva tantu ādi vastūni paṭa ādi kāraṇa tvena vyavahriyante na ca agni vaṭva ādi gauṇaḥ vyavahāraḥ sahakāri sampattau ca tatas abhipreta kārya siddhiḥ api bhavati tathā sādhya dharma viśiṣṭa tva yogya tā mātra pratītyā eva kevalaḥ api dharmī pakṣatvena vyavahriyate na ca tatrasthasya hetoḥ agni tvasya vaṭau iva gauṇapakṣa dharma tvam 
[214,21]	nanu ca yathā tantu ādibhyaḥ paṭa ādi kārya utpattiḥ upalabdhā tatas anārabdha kāryeṣu api tantu ādiṣu tad kāraṇa tva vyavahāra nimittam tad jātīya tvam eva yogyatā ākhyam asti na tu evam kevala dharmiṇi pakṣatu avyavahāra yogyatā ākhyam kiṃcid nimittam paśyāmaḥ iti na atra api sādhyatat niṣedha anupalambhasya yogyatā ākhya nimitta tvāt yatra hi dharmiṇi sādhya dharmaḥ tad niṣedhaḥ ca na upalabdhaḥ saḥ eva anāsāditena dharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ bhavati iti atas sādhya tad niṣedha anupalambhaḥ atra yogi atā ucyate iti 
[214,27]	athavā liṅga sambandhaḥ eva yogyatā tathā hi yatra dharmiṇi hi anādya vinābhūta dhūma ādi sambandhaḥ upalabdhaḥ saḥ eva dhūma ādi sādhitena dahana ādinā viśeṣitaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tatas anupalabdha dahana ādi viśiṣṭa tve api dharmiṇi tad avinābhūta dhūma ādi sambandha darśanāt pakṣa tva vyavahāraḥ tasya na gauṇa tvam tad nimittasya yogyatā ākhyasya agauṇa tvāt tantu ādiṣu paṭa ādi janaka tva vyavahāra vat 
[215,1]	atha tantu ādiṣu api janaka avasthātaḥ prāc ajanaka tva vyavahāraḥ gauṇaḥ eva iṣyate na loke baṭu māṇavaka ādi vat gauṇa tva apratīteḥ bhavatu vā tantu ādiṣu paṭa ādi kāraṇa tva vat dharmiṇaḥ pakṣa tvam gauṇam kid naḥ chinnam nanu tad mūla anumānasya gauṇa tvena aprāmāṇyam prasaktam iti uktam na etat asthi nimittasya gauṇa tve api tad phalasya paṭa ādi vat agauṇa tvāt yathā paṭa janana artham ye tantavaḥ krītāḥ teṣām paṭa janaka tvam gauṇam tvayā abhihitam na ca sahakāri viśeṣa upetaiḥ taiḥ eva janitasya api paṭasya gauṇam paṭa tvam tathā dharmiṇaḥ pakṣa tve gauṇe api sahakāri viśeṣa upeta tad pakṣa ghaṭita anumānasya na gauṇa tvam iti na ca atiprasaṅgaḥ prāk ukta yogya tā āśrayaṇa āditaḥ vyavasthā upapatteḥ tasmāt gauṇa tvāt anumānāt artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ iti etat ayuktam eva uktam iti 
[215,12]	yat ca uktam sādhikriyām apekṣya sādhyam ucyate iti tat na arhati arthe kṛtyā abhidhānāt tena sādhanam arhati yat tat sādhyam ucyate sādhana arha tvam ca siddhi yogya tā sā ca prāk api asti tena sādhi kriyātas prāk api sādhya tvam na ayuktam na ca sādhya pakṣa śabdayoḥ paryāya tvam eva abhyupagamyate asmābhiḥ śākyaiḥ iva na api samudāyaḥ sādhyaḥ kim tarhi dharma viśiṣṭaḥ vā dharmī yathā agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ vā dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ yathā agniḥ atra dhūmāt iti ubhayatra api pradeśa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ dharmī eva pakṣaḥ abhyupagamyate tatrasthasya ca hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam mukhyam eva na aupacārikam 
[215,21_216,1]	anvayasya api na gauṇa tvam mukhya anvaya lakṣaṇa upeta tvāt tathā hi sādhya sāmānyena sādhana sāmānyasya vyāptiḥ anvayaḥ iti anvaya lakṣaṇam tatra yadā dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ tadā sādhyasya sāmānyam agni mat tva ādi lakṣaṇam yadā api dharmi sthaḥ dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ tadā sādhyam eva avivakṣita viśeṣam sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇoḥ sādhāraṇa tvāt sāmānyam ucyate sādhanam api sāmānyam dhūmavat tva ādi lakṣaṇam tasya sādhana sāmānyasya tena sādhya sāmānyena vyāptiḥ vyāpta tā anvayaḥ sa katham gauṇaḥ iti tasmāt upacarita pakṣa dharma tva anvaya upakṛtāt anumānāt artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ iti etat api ayuktam kim ca yadi ukta lakṣaṇau pakṣa dharma tva anvayau na mukhyau tadā anyau mukhyau vaktavyau na hi mukhya upalambhā sambhave kvacid tad upacāraḥ pravartate mukhyau ced anyatrapakṣa dharma tva anvayau tathā api tatas eva anumāna prāmāṇyasya siddheḥ na atyanta abhāvaḥ iti 
[216,4]	yat api uktam dharmiṇaḥ siddha tvāt sādhana vaiphalyam iti tat na sādhya dharma viśiṣṭasya asiddha tvāt tad sādhya tve api anugama abhāvaḥ na asti sādhya sāmānyena anugamasya ukta tvāt na hi sādhya viśeṣeṇa anvayaḥ kaiścid abhyupagamyate loke vā pratīyate kim tarhi yaḥ yaḥ kaścid dhūmavān kṛtakaḥ ca sa saḥ agnimān anityaḥ ca iti loke pratīyate dharma sādhya tve api yat uktam sāmānye siddha sādhya tā viśeṣe anugama abhāvaḥ iti tatra sāmānyam eva sādhyam na ca siddha sādhanam vivakṣite dharmiṇī asiddhasya sāmānyasya sādhya tva abhyupagamāt tena ca anupagamaḥ asti eva tathā hi yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti evam loke api anvayaḥ prasiddhaḥ tāvat mātreṇa ca anumāna pravṛtti darśanāt tatra pradeśa viśeṣeṇa tad sambandha viśeṣeṇa vā anvayaḥ akāraṇam 
[216,15]	yat api avinā abhā a sambandhasya grahītum aśakya tvāt iti ādi uktam tat api ayuktam yatas asti tāvat iyam laukika parīkṣakāṇām api pratītiḥ abhrāntā niścaya ātmikā yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ agni abhāve kvacid na dhūmaḥ iti tasyāḥ khalu nirūpyamāṇam yadi kāraṇa tvena akṣa liṅga ādīnām anyatamam niścetum śakyate tadā atibhadrakam no ced tathā api niścitasya vastunaḥ tad kāraṇā niścayāt eva na apahnutiḥ yukta atiprasaṅgāt 
[216,21]	atra kecid āhuḥ anumānena eva avinā bhāvaḥ na gṛhyate anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti atra aviva ādaḥ eva na api pratyakṣa mātreṇa kin tu bhūyas darśana gamyā hi vyāptiḥ iti bhūyas darśanam iti kaḥ arthaḥ bahūni darśanāni iti arthaḥ tāni kim prati artha niyatāni āho svid aśeṣa agni dhūma viṣayāṇi iti yadi prati artha niyatāni tadā kalpa sahasreṇa api na aśeṣa vyakti viṣayam darśanam utpādayitum śakyate deśa kāla ādi bhedena vyaktīnām ānantyāt na ca aśeṣa vyakti sambandha agrahaṇe vyabhicāra śaṃkā nivartate na hi sahasraśas api pārthivasya loha chedya tva darśanāt avyabhicāra siddhi atha pratyekam aśeṣa agni dhūma viṣayāṇi darśanāni tadā ekena eva vyāpti siddheḥ śeṣa darśana ānarthakyam kim ca krama utpannānām darśanānām anavasthāyi tvāt na sāhitya kāri tvam yugapad utpādaḥ tu na sambhavati apratibhāsanāt iti 
[217,4_217,8]	anye tu pariśeṣa balena mānasam pratyakṣam vyāpti grāhakam varṇayanti tat api ayuktam sarva darśi tva prasaṅgāt sa masta sapakṣa vipakṣa darśane hi yat yat kṛtakam tat sarvam anityam nityam tu sarvam akṛtakam iti evam rūpā vyāpti pratyakṣā bhavati na anyathā tathā ca sarva anumātuḥ sarva darśi tva prasaṅgaḥ sarvasmin tu pratyakṣeṇa dṛṣṭe kim anumānena vaiyarthyāt vyāpti grahaṇa kālaḥ eva sarva darśī bhavati na anyadā tena uttara kālam anumānam sārthakam eva iti ced na pāda prasāraṇa mātra tvāt yadi ca vyāpti grahaṇa kāle api asau sarva darśī tadā kim iti vyutthita yogi vat svarga ādiṣu avasthitāḥ evambhūtāḥ arthāḥ mayā dṛṣṭāḥ iti vyāptim iva na anusandhatte atīndriya vyavahāra vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ abhāva prasaṅgaḥ ca na hi mānasa pratyakṣa viṣaye api atīndriya vyavahāraḥ vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca asti sukha ādiṣu adarśanāt iti 
[217,16]	apare tu āhuḥ katipaya sambandhi sambandha pratītau agṛhīta sambandhayoḥ api tad jātīya tva sāmarthyāt gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ bhavati iti tat api ayuktam pārthiva loha chedya jātīya tva vyabhicāreṇa ukta uttara tvāt atajjātīyaiḥ agṛhīta sambandha tva aviśeṣām ca iti sāmānya mātrayoḥ sambandha grahaṇe api vyakti viṣaye pratipatti pravṛttī na syātām sāmānyāt artha antara tvāt vyaktīnām na ca anya sambandha grahaṇe tatas artha antare anumitiḥ yukta atiprasaṅgāt na api sāmānya mātreṇa dāha ādi arthaḥ sādhyate yatas tad viṣayam eva anumānam kṛtārtham syāt 
[217,23^1]	nanu nirviśeṣam na sāmānyam bhavet śaśa viṣāṇa vat atas sāmānye anumite arthāpattyā viśeṣa adhigamaḥ tatas pravṛttiḥ tatas artha prāptau dāha ādi kārya siddhiḥ tat katham sāmānya viṣayam anumānam nirarthakam eva iti na etat sādhu tathā hi kim dṛṣṭa tad sambandhaḥ tad anyathā anupapattyā viśeṣaḥ avagamyate tad viparītaḥ vā prācīne pakṣe pūrva dṛṣṭa agni ādi viśeṣa viṣaya eva tatas pratipattiḥ pravṛttiḥ ca syāt tatas anumāna artha āpattyā smṛtyā saha aviśeṣāt aprāmāṇyam eva syāt adṛṣṭa tad sambandhasya api avagame api agnitva ani atha anupapattyā gardabha ādi viśeṣa avagamaḥ api syāt nanu ca agni bhāvaḥ agni tvam ucyate na gardabha ādi bhāvaḥ tatas tad anyathā anupapattyā katham gardabha ādi avagamaḥ iti agni bhāvaḥ agni tvam na gardabha ādi bhāvaḥ iti etat eva kutas niścitam 
[217,23^2]	loka prasiddhitaḥ iti ced sā eva prasiddhiḥ katam apramāṇa mūlā iti vicārayitum prārabdhā loke ca kṛṣṇa ākāśa ādi prasiddhi vat mithyā prasiddhiḥ api dṛṣṭā atha agni viśeṣeṣu eva agni tvam dṛṣṭam na gardabha ādi viśeṣeṣu iti na samasta agni gardabha ādi viśeṣa agrahaṇe katham agni viśeṣeṣu eva iti avadhāraṇa siddhiḥ kim ca agnitva ani atha anupapattyā kvāpi agni viśeṣaḥ siddhyatu vivakṣita pradeśe kutas siddhyati na hi tad asambhave agni tvam na upapadyate tad pradeśa upalakṣitam agni tvam anyathā na upapadyate iti ced tad sambandha aprasiddhau kutas ayam niyamaḥ siddhaḥ kim ca tad pradeśa upalakṣita agni tva sādhane ayam aparaḥ anarthaḥ prāptaḥ tathāvidhena sambandha agrahaṇe api tathāvidha agni tva siddhau hi sarvatra api agni tva siddhiḥ syāt iti 
[218,16^1]	tat kim idānīm sura guru matam eva anusarttavyam na anusarttavyam kasmāt tad mate api pūrvam uttaratra ca bādhaka bhūyastva pratipādanāt kutas tarhi vyāpti grahaṇam kim ākasmikam eva na pratyakṣataḥ api tadvatām vyapti grahaṇāt tathā hi yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ tat rahite na asti dhūmaḥ iti ayam avinā abhāvaḥ ucyate sa ca visphāritena sa agni anagni deśa sambaddhena cakṣuṣā prathamam api gṛhyate yadi para madhyama alpa medhasām saṃskāra pāṭava artham bhūyas darśanam mṛgyate nāmagrantha abhyāsa vat nanu ca dhūma dahanayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ avinābhāvaḥ ucyate sa ca samasta dhūma agni vyakti niṣṭhaḥ tatas sarva tad vyakti agrahe katham gṛhyate iti 
[218,16^2]	yaḥ sarva vyakti niṣṭhaḥ sa kim eka dvi tri ādi vyakti niṣṭhaḥ na bhavati yena tad grahe api na gṛhyate tathā hi sāmānya samavāyayoḥ ananta vyakti niṣṭha tve api eka dvi tri ādi vyakti grahaṇa kāle eva grahaṇam dṛṣṭam avayavinaḥ ca na sarva āśraya grahaṇāt eva grahaṇam iti prāk eva sādhitam saṃyogasya api eka āśraya grahaṇāt grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti api acodyam vicitra śaktayaḥ dvipadārthāḥ tatra yaḥ yathā grahaṇa yogyaḥ sa tathā gṛhyate tad yogya tā ca pratiniyata hetu anvaya vyaktiḥ eka anuvidhāyi grahaṇāt eva avagamyate cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ pratiniyata rūpa ādi grahaṇa vat 
[219,2]	avinābhāvaḥ tu yadi dṛśyaḥ sambandhaḥ tadā samavāya vat sambandhi dvaya grahaṇa kāle api gṛhītaḥ atha vyāpaka tvam vyāpya tvam ca agni dhūma vargayoḥ pratiniyataḥ dharmaḥ tathā api agni tva dhūma tva ādi vat eka dvi tri ādi vyakti grahaṇa kāle eva gṛhītaḥ na sarva grahaṇam ākṣipati atha agnitva dhūma tvayoḥ anyonya ādhāra grahaṇa nirapekṣam yathā grahaṇam na tathā vyāpaka tva vyāpya tvayoḥ iti asamaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ evam api paratva aparatva madhya tva ādi vat dvi tri ādi dharmi grahaṇāt eva grahaṇam adṛśya tve tu sarva dharmi grahaṇe api na tasya grahaṇam pratyakṣataḥ tad abhāvāt anavasthā prasaṅgāt ca anumānataḥ api na grahaṇam iti abhāvaḥ eva avinābhāvasya prāptaḥ tatas anumānasya api atyanta abhāvaḥ tad abhyupagame ca doṣān vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt sarva vyakti agrahe api gṛhītaḥ eva agni dhūmayoḥ avinābhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa iti 
[219,12^1]	yadi evam yayoḥ avinā abhāvaḥ gṛhītaḥ tayoḥ eva gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ astu na apūrva agni dhūmayoḥ tayoḥ adṛṣṭa sambandha tvāt adṛṣṭa sambandhayoḥ api gamya gamaka bhāve hi atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt iti na agni dhūma vargayoḥ sambandhasya dṛṣṭa tvāt sa ced kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ tadā na agni dhūmayoḥ sambandhaḥ kvacid adṛṣṭaḥ asti yadi nāma dharmiṇām kaścid na dṛṣṭaḥ tadā tad dharmasya dṛṣṭa tve kim āyātam na hi dharma dharmiṇoḥ abhedaḥ asti na api dhūma agni vyaktīnām pratyekam vyāpya vyāpaka dharma bhedaḥ asti tasya agni tva ādi vat samavāya vat vā tad lakṣaṇa tva aviśeṣāt viśeṣa lakṣaṇa abhāvāt ca eka tvam eva na ca abhinna ātmā eva dṛṣṭaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ ca iti upapadyate na tu evam samavāyaḥ api ekasya dṛṣṭaḥ sarvasya api dṛṣṭaḥ eva abhedāta tatas ca atyanta adṛṣṭa artha upalambhe api tad samavāyinaḥ sarvasya anumānam prasajyate iti na sambandhasya api vicitra śakti tvāt anyā khalu samavāyasya śaktiḥ anyā saṃyogasya anyā ca sambandha antarasya dharma antarasya vā 
[219,12^2]	tatra viṣamadhu ādīnām iva itara śakti sāmya āpādanam kiṃcid sādharmyāt ayuktam vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvasya tu ittham sāmarthyam yat ekatra api ayam gṛhītaḥ anyatra smaryamāṇaḥ tadvatoḥ apūrvayoḥ api gamya gamaka bhāve nimittam bhavati vastutas tad dharma tve api tad dharma tvena adṛṣṭasya avinābhāvasya katham smṛtiḥ adṛṣṭa dhūma darśanāt apratibaddha artha darśanasya smṛti hetu tve ati prasaṅgāt iti ced na tena saha eka dharmi dharma tvena dṛṣṭasya dhūma sāmānyasya smṛti hetu tvāt sarva vyāpya vyāpaka āgrahe katham sarva upasaṃhāreṇa pratītiḥ iti ced na anumānataḥ tad sambhavāt katham ye dhūma viśeṣāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ atha vā deśa antara stha tvena bhūta tvena anāgata tvena sambhāvyante sarve agni vyāptā dhūma tvāt upalabdha dhūma vat dhūmavantaḥ pradeśāḥ vā agnimantaḥ sādhyante dhūmavat tvāt tathā upalabdha pradeśa vat tatas yat yat ittham tat sarvam tathā eva iti evam sarva upasaṃhāreṇa smṛtiḥ api bhavati evam sati pariśeṣāt mānasam pratyakṣam vyāpti grāhakam na vaktavyam pariśeṣasya asiddha tvāt 
[220,5]	yadi punar pūrva nītyā vinābhāva grahaṇam samarthayitum na śakyate tadā aviśiṣṭa prati iti anyathā anupapattyā mānasam eva pratyakṣam samarthanīyam yadi tarhi sarvaḥ api prāṇī yogī bhūtvā vyāptim gṛhṇāti tadā agni ādiṣu cakṣuḥ ādi kvāpi na vyāpṛtam yasya tasya api yatra yatra dhūmaḥ tatra tatra sarvatra agniḥ iti pratītiḥ syāt iti na manasaḥ sarva artha tve api aniyata sahakāri tvāt yathā smartavya artha smaraṇe manasaḥ kvacid saṃskāra viśeṣaḥ eva sahakārī tad apakṛṣṭa saṃskāra sahitasya tu saṃskāra tāratamya anuvidhāyi praṇidhāna ādi sahakāri vailakṣaṇyam api upalabhyate evam pratyakṣa jñāna utpādane kvacid dharma viśeṣaḥ eva sahakārī tad apakṛṣṭa apakṛṣṭatara ādi dharma sahitasya tad dharma viśeṣa anuvidhānana samādhāna indriya jñāna deśa ādi viśeṣaḥ api sahakārī iti atas cakṣuḥ ādi janita agni viśiṣṭa dhūma jñāna sahitasya manasaḥ sarva upasaṃhāreṇa vyāpti grāhaka tvam tat na cakṣuḥ ādi vyāpāra vaiphalyam 
[220,17]	na api sarva darśi tva prasaṅgaḥ sāmānya ākāreṇa eva grahaṇāt na khalu yogi vat asya aśeṣa dhūma vyakti viṣayam kara tala āmalaka vat anyonya asādhāraṇa ākāratayā api grahaṇam kim tarhi dhūma agni ādi sāmānya ākāreṇa eva yathā dūra sthasya aṭavī vṛkṣeṣu vṛkṣa sāmāni ākāreṇa eva grahaṇam na dhava ādi viśeṣa ākāreṇa api iti yatra yatra iti ca deśānām api dhūma ādi adhikaraṇa ākāreṇa sāmānyena eva grahaṇam na tu magadha parvata ādi viśeṣa ākāreṇa api tad rūpa apratibhāsanāt na hi pratyakṣa jñānasya viṣaya niyamaḥ anumāna sādhyaḥ kim tarhi yatra jñāne yaḥ arthaḥ yathā pratibhāti sa tathā tasya viṣayaḥ tathā hi cākṣuṣe api puruṣa ādi jñāne kvacid kenacid viśeṣeṇa samastena vyastena vā viśiṣṭaḥ saḥ arthaḥ pratibhāti na sarvatra aviśeṣeṇa iti tasmāt dṛṣṭa ādi sahakāri viśeṣa niyamitasya manasaḥ vyāpti grāhaka tvān na sarvathā sarva artha grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ atas eva na anumāna vaiyarthyam yathā grahaṇam smaraṇam bhavati tena svarga ādiṣu avasthitāḥ evaṃbhūtāḥ arthāḥ mayā dṛṣṭā iti anusmaraṇam na bhavati tad rūpeṇa agrahaṇāt 
[221,7]	atīndriya vyavahāra vipratipattyoḥ abhāvaḥ api na prāpnoti viśeṣa ākāreṇa grahaṇa anabhyupagamāt na hi yat kiṃcid kṛtakam tat sarvam anityam iti asmin vijñāne dharma adharma ādi ākāreṇa api sarvam anityam pratibhāti na api yatra kvacid dhūmaḥ tatra sarvatra agniḥ iti atra ca jñāne tārṇa pāraṇa parvata adhikaraṇa tva ādi ākāreṇa sarvaḥ agniḥ pratibhāti kin tu sāmānya ākāreṇa eva atas tad dṛṣṭa ākāra apekṣayā atīndriya vyavahāraḥ vipratipattiḥ ca bhavati iti 
[221,14^1]	nanu evam tarhi sāmānya ākāreṇa eva anumānam syāt yat kṛtakam tat anityam yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti tatas ca siddha sādhanam parvate agniḥ śabdaḥ ca anitya iti anumānam na syāt tena ākāreṇa avinābhāvasya agṛhīta tvāt anyathā heṣita ādi ta arṇa ādi ākāreṇa api anumānam syāt na ca etat asti na hi bhavati yasmāt kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ tasmāt ayam heṣitaḥ kekāyitaḥ ca iti yasmāt atra dhūmaḥ tasmāt atra tārṇaḥ agniḥ pārṇaḥ ca iti na etat asti cakṣuṣā ādeḥ iva niyata viśeṣa siddhau sādhanasya sāmarthya avadhāraṇāt na hi striyām vyāpṛtam cakṣuḥ sarva tad viśeṣam gṛhṇāti na ca akiṃcid iti upapadyate yatra tasya sāmarthyam tasya eva grahaṇāt 
[221,14^2]	liṅgasya hi sādhya dharmi sambandha viśeṣa siddhau asti sāmarthyam tena tam eva sādhayati na tārṇa ādi viśeṣam tatra sāmarthya abhāvāt kim tat sāmarthyam iti ced vyāpti grahaṇa upakṛtam pakṣa dharma tva grahaṇam tatas sādhya dharmi sambandha viśeṣa siddheḥ tathā hi gṛhīta avinābhāvaḥ dhūmaḥ pradeśe yatra eva upalabhyate tatra eva agni buddhim janayati yadi punar sādhya dharmiṇi dhūma sadbhāve api tad sambandhi agniḥ na bhavet tadā yatra yatra dhūmaḥ tatra tatra agniḥ iti mithyā eva iyam pratītiḥ syāt dhūma sadbhāvaḥ vā na tatra vāstavaḥ syāt na ca evam tārṇa ādi viśeṣa asambhave api vyāpti pakṣa dharma tva grahaṇayoḥ anyatrasya api virodhaḥ asti yena tad siddhiḥ api syāt 
[221,30^1]	bhavatu vyāpti grahaṇam pakṣa dharma tva grahaṇam vā mithyā kim naḥ chinnam iti ced na satya jñānena tulya nyāya tvāt asya api satya tva siddheḥ yaḥ eva hi tava abhipretasya jñānasya satya tve deśa antara ādhāra avādhya tva ādi lakṣaṇaḥ loka prasiddhi lakṣaṇaḥ vā nyāyaḥ sa khalu mama pakṣe api dharma tva vyāpti jñānasya api satya tve samānaḥ iti katham asya mithyātvam kasya api na satya tvam asti iti abhyupagacchataḥ sva vacana virodhaḥ api syāt yatas asya eva vākyasya satya tve katham kasya api na satya tvam asti asya api asatya tve katham sarvasya asatya tvam pratipādayati tat na pakṣa dharma tva vyāpti grahaṇasya api asatya tvam tat satya tve ca avaśyam pakṣa sambandha avacchinnasya agneḥ siddhiḥ abhyupagantavyā vahiḥ vyāpti antar vyāpti prasādāt ubhaya siddhiḥ iti pūrva ācāryāḥ yatas pakṣāt vahiḥ deśe mahānasa ādau agni mātreṇa dhūmasya vyāptiḥ pratipannā tatas dhūmāt agniḥ sāmānyena siddhyati 
[221,30^2]	yatas tu pakṣa antardeśe dhūmaḥ upalabhyate tatas tad sambaddha agni viśeṣaḥ eva siddhyati na tārṇa ādiḥ tad siddhau pratibandha anupalabdheḥ tārṇa ādi viśeṣāvinābhūtam tu dhūma viśeṣam yaḥ vivecayitum śaktaḥ tasya tad vidaḥ tārṇa ādi viśeṣa anumānam api bhavati etena śabda viśeṣa anumānam vyākhyātam yadā tu śabde kṛtaka tva mātram upalabhyate tadā tatas sāmānyena kāraṇa mātram anitya tva mātram ca anumīyate tasya śabda sambandha viśeṣa siddheḥ api pakṣa dharma tva balāt agni vat draṣṭavyā iti evam aneṣu atha anumāna antareṣu nyāyaḥ tulyaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tasmāt avinā abhau a sambandhasya grahītum śakya tvāt anumānam pramāṇam iti uktam etena etat api nirākṛtam yat āha na eva asmābhiḥ sarvathā pramāṇa tvam anumānasya pratiṣidhyate ye tu laukikam panthānam utsṛjya tri lakṣaṇam catur lakṣaṇam vā liṅgam anumeya prati iti artham varṇayanti tad nirākaraṇam kriyate iti 
[222,22^1]	syāt etat evam yadi laukikānām aprasiddha anvaya vyatireka anādhāra liṅga darśanāt anumānam bhavati yāvatā te api gṛhīta avinābhā viliṅgam yatra paśyanti tatra eva tad vyāpakam anuminvanti na hi laukikāḥ grāme dhūmam dṛṣṭvā aṭavyām agnim pratipadyante na api apūrva śabda aṅkura ādi kārya grahaṇāt tākāraṇam anuminvanti tat katham vayam laukikam panthānam tyaktavantaḥ nanu ca laukikāḥ dhūmam dṛṣṭvā atha agnim pratipadyante na tu yūyam iva pakṣa dharma tva ādi vyavahāram kurvanti 
[222,22^2]	tasmāt asādhavaḥ yūyam iti na etat asti yadi nāma vyavahāra lāghava artham sattā ādīnām pratyaya saṃjñā vat parvata mahānasa ādīnām pakṣa sa pakṣa ādi saṃjñāḥ kṛtāḥ katham asmākam etāvatā eva asādhu tvam na hi saṃjñā antareṇa vyavahāra arthānyathātvam bhavati na ca loke pakṣa ādi saṃjñā na prasiddhā iti etāvatā eva tad artha abhāvaḥ siddhyati atiprasaṅgāt tad arthaḥ tu loke api siddhaḥ iti uktam prasiddhasya api anumāna lakṣaṇasya abhidhānam anuvāda artham anuvāde ca ātmā ādi tad viparyaya anumānayoḥ vidhi pratiṣedhau prayojanam iti uktam evam ca atyanta adṛṣṭa artha anumānasya api nirākaraṇam na yuktam dhūma ādi anumānena samāna yogakṣema tvāt
