[223,7]	tathā ca sati viśeṣa viruddha ādeḥ api niravakāśa tvāt adūṣaṇa tvam tathā hi yadi viśeṣa viruddha ādi dūṣaṇam dhūma ādi anumānasya na iṣyate tadā asya sarvatraga tvam virudhyate pratipāditam ca sarvatraga tvam na ca asti viśeṣaḥ yena dhūma ādi anumānam na nivartayati anumāna antaram ca sarvam eva nivartayati 
[223,12]	atha dhūma ādi anumānasya api tad dūṣaṇam eva iṣyate tadā sarva loka vyavahāra virodhaḥ sva vacana pravṛtti virodhaḥ ca yadi anumānam na pramāṇam tadā artha viśeṣa pratyāyana artham vacana viśeṣa uccāraṇam na syāt anumānam apramāṇam avinā abhau asambandhasya grahītum aśakya tvāt ityādi vākyam yāvat uccārayasi tāvat anumānam apramāṇam pramāṇam vā samyak artha avabodha sādhānāt ityādi vākyam kasmāt na uccārayasi kasmāt anumānam apramāṇam yatas pūrva uktasya api vākyasya para avabodha utpādane sāmarthya an avadhāraṇāt tathā sukha artham kṣīraguḍa ādikam yāvat āsvādayasi tāvat agni viṣa ādikam kasmāt na āsvādayasi tathā kūpa kaṇṭaka ādi varjana su mārga pāda viharaṇa ādiṣu api anuyogaḥ kāryaḥ na hi amutas sādhanāt sukham me bhaviṣyati amutas sādhanāt anarthaḥ iti anumānam vinā anyaḥ pratipatti upāyaḥ asti api ca anumīyatenena iti anumeyaḥ arthaḥ samyak paricchidyate yena tat anumānam uktam tatas ca anumānam ca apramāṇam ca iti vyāghātāt ayuktam 
[223,23^1]	para abhiprāyeṇa ananumānam api anumānam uktam atas na virodhaḥ iti ced anumānam vinā katham para abhiprāyam jñātavān asi na ca tvad mate kiṃcid api anumānam asti yat sādharmyāt ananumāne api anumāna śabdaḥ pravartate pratyakṣa ābhāseṣu pratyakṣa śabda vat api ca anumānam apramāṇam kena pratipādayati na hi pratyakṣeṇa anumānasya aprāmāṇyam pratipattum param ca pratipipādayiṣitum kaścid śaknoti anumānasya ca aviśeṣeṇa prāmāṇyam tvayā nirākṛtam śabda ādeḥ tu sutarām prāmāṇyam na iṣṭam satya anṛta saṃdehaiḥ ityādi dūṣaṇāt tasmāt anumāna pramāṇam unmatta vākya vat apramāṇakam eva iti yat punar atra uktam para prasiddhena sva prāmāṇyam anabhyupagamya aprāmāṇyam pratipādyate 
[223,23^2]	na ca ubhaya siddham eva pramāṇam yasmāt vacana ātmakam anumānam vaktuḥ na pramāṇam atha ca vaktā tena param pratipādayati para pratipādana artha tvāt ca prayāsasya tau asya ubhaya prasiddhena prayojanam idam ca atra sampradhāryam svatā uprasiddhaḥ hetuḥ dṛṣṭantaḥ vā yasya prasiddhaḥ tam pratyupādīyamānaḥ param pratyāyayati uta na iti na ca śakyam vaktum pratyāyayati iti tasmāt ubhaya prasiddhiḥ akāraṇam iti tat etat ayuktam yatas anumānasya apramāṇa tve para prasiddhiḥ eva kutas tvayā niścitā na hi śarīram iva buddhiḥ pratyakṣataḥ śarīra svrūpa niścaye api buddhi svarūpe sandeha darśanāt evam hetoḥ dṛṣṭāntasya ca para prasiddha tvam tena ca pratītiḥ bhavati eva iti tat etat sarvam jāti andha śukla valāka ādi nidarśana vat anupapannam eva iti 
[224,10]	tad vacanāt para prasiddhiḥ avagamyate iti ced tat kim idānīm para vacanam eva pramāṇa tvena tvayā aṅgīkṛtam na evam iti ced para prasiddhaḥ tad vacanāt avagamyate na ca tad pramāṇam iti aho mohasya māhātmyam yena evaṃvidham satsu madhye vyāhatam vākyam uccāryate na hi pramāṇasya viṣāṇe staḥ kin tu yena arthaḥ avagamyate tat eva pramāṇam iti vaktuḥ abhiprāya mātra sūcaka tve tu anumāna tvam eva vacanasya prāptam na ca svayaṃpratipannena hetunā dṛṣṭāntena vā para pratyāyanam yuktam na hi apratipannaḥ pratipādayitā kaścid upapadyate na hi bāla gopāla ādīnām śāstra artha pratipādane adhikāraḥ asti jāti andha ādayaḥ hi na rūpa ādi guṇa doṣa vicāre adhikriyante tasmāt para pratipādana artha tvāt ca prayāsasya ityādi api ayuktam 
[224,19^1]	yat ca uktam vacana ātmakam anumāna vaktuḥ na pramāṇam iti tat api acāru yadi hi vaktuḥ tena pramitiḥ na janitā tadā asau janitā tadā asau vaktā katham anavadhārita sāmarthyam vacanam liṅgam vā para pratipādanāya upadiśati yat kiṃcid vā upadiśet anavagata śakti tva aviśeṣāt na ca asmābhiḥ niyamaḥ kriyate yā eva vyaktiḥ ubhayoḥ pramitim janayati sā eva para pratyāyanāya upadeṣṭavyaḥ yatas pradīpena kaścid artha viśeṣam dṛṣṭvā tad nirvāṇe api anyasya upadiśati tvam api pradīpam jvalayitvā tam artham paśya iti andhaḥ api pūrya dṛṣṭa sāmarthyam eva upadiśati jāti andha vat iti ced syāt matam yathā jāti andhaḥ pradīpam kadācid na dṛṣṭavān na api tena prakāśitam rūpa antaram tathā api asau cakṣuṣmantam pratyupadiśati pradīpena rūpam paśya iti tadvat vayam api hetu ādi svarūpam tad sādhya anumeya svarūpam na jānīmaḥ tathā api mahā anubhāvena para anugrahaḥ avaśyam kartavyaḥ iti ajñātaiḥ eva hetu ādibhiḥ tad vidam pratipādavāmaḥ 
[224,19^2]	svayam amuktasya yathā niḍa ādibhyaḥ param mocayataḥ mahā anubhāva tā eva na upālambhaḥ tadvat asmākam svayam avyutpannānām iva param vyutpādayatām mahā anubhāva tā eva sambhavati na tu upālambhaḥ iti svayam avyutpannaḥ param mahā anubhāva tayā vyutpādayati iti kena etat śraddhīyate na hi jāta mātrasya eva upādhyāya tvam yuktam jāti andhaḥ tu na tāvat pradīpa ādi upadeśena cakṣuṣmantam vyutpādayan upalabhyate etāvat tu yadi sambhāvyate sva pratibhā sāmarthyāt āpta vacanebhyaḥ pradīpasya cakṣuḥ sahitasya rūpa ādi prakāśaka tvam jāti andhena yadi avagatam tadā asau tathā upadiśati api tvam punar kathaṃcid api na hetu ādeḥ sādhana bhūtasya dūṣaṇa bhūtasya vā para artha pratipādana sāmarthyam pratipannaḥ asi tat katham jāta mātra vat avyutpannaḥ param pratipādayasi apratipanna sāmarthyena hetu ādinā para pratipādane ca buddhi ādi liṅgaiḥ ātma ādi astitvam tad jñānāt apavargam ca kasmāt na pratipādayasi yena mahā anubhāvatā api tava jyāyasī bhavet iti 
[225,12^1]	na vayam kiṃcid pratipattāraḥ pratipādayāmaḥ vā kim tarhi pareṣām paryanuyogam eva kurmaḥ sūtrāṇām api paryanuyoga artha tvāt iti ced yat kiṃcid etat iti yadi hi vyartham eva paryanuyogam karoṣi tadā unmatta vat upekṣīṇīyaḥ asi atha paryanuyogena ayam mad abhiprāyam jñātvā yat uttaram dāsyati tena vayam asya abhiprāyam jñātvā guṇa doṣa tvena parīkṣiṣyāmahe iti etat artham paryanuyogam karoṣi tadā katham para abhiprāya pratipatti sādhanam anumānam pramāṇam na abhyupagacchasi na ca vādi prativādinoḥ paryanuyoga mātreṇa tad uttara mātreṇa vā kaścid arthaḥ siddhyati jaya parājayau vā bhavataḥ kim tarhi sva para pakṣayoḥ sādhana dūṣaṇa abhidhānena pratyakṣeṇa eva sva pakṣaḥ sādhayitum pratipakṣaḥ dūṣayitum na śakyate sarvatra aniścaye ca tat saṃbhāvanā api na syāt atas na saṃbhāvanayā api sādhana dūṣaṇa upanyāsaḥ atyanta sandigdhasya iti api ca ete viruddha ādi hetavaḥ kim anumāne prāmāṇya saṃdeha utpādanāya upanyastāḥ āho svid apramāṇya niścaya utpādanāya iti yadi saṃdeha utpādanāya kim ātmanaḥ atha pareṣām iti 
[225,12^2]	yadi ātmanaḥ tadā vyartha aviruddha ādayaḥ taiḥ vinā api anumāne saṃdehaḥ tava asti eva pareṣām tu viruddha ādibhyaḥ saṃdehaḥ bhaviṣyati iti anumāna aprāmāṇye kutas tvayā avagatam atha amutas pareṣām saṃdehaḥ bhaviṣyati kadācid navā iti evam saṃdehena eva viruddha ādayaḥ upanyasyante tathā api vyarthaḥ tad upanyāsaḥ tad anupanyāse api tad artha sambhavāt vyartha tve api saṃdehaḥ iti ced saḥ ayam saṃdeha graha gṛhītaḥ saṃdeha kāraṇe api sāmānya dharma darśana ādau yadi niścayam na abhyupagacchati tatas acikitsya tvāt upekṣaṇīyaḥ eva iti 
[225,12^3]	atha viruddha ādayaḥ anumāna aprāmāṇye niścaya utpādanāya upadiśyante tathā sati niścaya utpādaka tvena prāmāṇyam eva ananumāna vaidharmyāt anumāna tvam ca iti katham sarva anumāna aprāmāṇyam parasya api pratipattim kurvat ananumānam pramāṇam eva parakīya indriya vat yat api uktam tatra api trayam iti anavasthā iti tat api abhipreta artha asiddhi prasaṅgāt ayuktam viruddha ādi trayāt anumānasya aprāmāṇya siddhiḥ abhipretā tat ca viruddha ādi trayam anavasthayā dūṣitam iti asādhakam eva anavasthayā dūṣitasya api sva sādhya sādhaka tve mūla anumānasya api sva sādhya sādhaka tvam syāt 
[226,8^1]	atha matam yathā mayā upanyastam viruddha ādi trayam anavasthayā dūṣitam sva sādhyam na sādhayati evam tvayā upanyastam ātma ādi anumānam viruddha ādi anavasthayā dūṣitam iti asādhakam eva ātma ādeḥ iti na etat evam yatas tvayā upanyastasya viruddha ādeḥ tvad abhyupagamāt eva duṣṭa tvam siddham mayā tu sa doṣaḥ na abhyupagataḥ kutas ātma ādi anumānasya duṣṭa tvam na hi yathā aham rāja adhikṣepam kṛtvā jihvā ācchedana ādi duḥkham anubhavāmi tathā tvam anubhava iti abhidhāna mātrāt anabhyupagata rāja adhikṣepaḥ api tat duḥkham anubhavati mūla anumāna bādhita tvāt ca viruddha ādeḥ adūṣaṇa tvam 
[226,8^2]	yathā pūrva utpannam api candra eka tva agacchat vṛkṣa ādi jñānam sarva loka saṃvāda pravṛtti sāmarthyam niścita prāmāṇyam dvi candra ādi jñānasya akṣajatvā aviśeṣe api bādhakam eva na tu dvi candra ādi jñānena uttara kāla bhāvinā api candra eka tva ādi jñānam bādhyate tathā dhūma ādi anumāna jñānam sarva loka saṃvāda pravṛtti sāmarthyam niścita prāmāṇyam viruddha ādi jñānasya bādhakam eva abhyupagantavyam anyathā akṣaja jñānām api bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ na vyavatiṣṭheta tatas ca pratyakṣam api pramāṇam na siddhet tathā ca tattva upaplavaḥ eva syāt tatra dūṣaṇam bahudhā prāk uktam iti tasmāt dhūma ādi anumāna jñānena niścita prāmāṇyena bādhitasya viruddha ādeḥ dūṣaṇa ābhā sa tvam eva draṣṭavyam evam ātma ādi anumāne api viruddha ādeḥ tulya prakāra tvāt adūṣaṇa tvam eva avinā abhauva bala hīna tvāt ca na viruddha ādi hetavaḥ mūla hetum bādhante mūla hetuḥ tu avinā abhāva bala upeta tvāt dhi viruddha ādi hetūn bādhate eva iti 
[226,26]	kaḥ punar ayam avinā abhāvaḥ iti ucyate svabhāvataḥ sādhyena sādhanasya vyāptiḥ avinābhāvaḥ yaḥ ayam sādhya sādhanayoḥ svabhāvena avasthitaḥ niyamaḥ sādhyasya vyāpaka tvam sādhanasya vyāpya tvam iti saḥ avinā abhāvaḥ iti na ca yathā dhūmasya agninā avyāpya tvam svabhāvataḥ eva niyatam tathā dūṣaṇa vādi prativādi abhimata sādhana sādhya dharma adhikaraṇa tva abhāvena api vyāpya tvam dhūmasya svabhāvena niyatam asti tasya dūṣaṇa vādi prativādi anavasthita tvena anavasthi tvāt na hi sādhana vādi tvam dūṣaṇa vādi tvam ca puruṣe vyavasthitam asti na api tad ukta prakṛta sādhana sādhya tvam tad vikalam ca svabhāvena vyavasthitam artheṣu asti anyathā prakṛta sādhana sādhya tva abhāva vat prakṛta dūṣaṇa vādī ukta pratiṣedha pratiṣedhya tva abhāvaḥ api abhyupagantavyaḥ tulya nyāya tvāt tatas kim prakṛta sādhana sādhya tva pratiṣedhaḥ vā bhavet uta tad abhāvaḥ iti ekasya api asambhave svabhāva vyavasthita tva virodhaḥ paraspara parihāra sthiti virodhāt na ubhayoḥ siddhiḥ iti 
[227,7^1]	etena dharma dharmiṇoḥ anyatara tvāt iti evamādīnām avinābhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ kalpanā mātreṇa eṣām api vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvāt na tu agni dhūma vat svabhāvataḥ asti vyāptiḥ svabhāva vyāptau hi dhūmāt agni vat niyata dharma siddhiḥ eva syāt na upaplavaḥ anyatara tva ādibhyaḥ tu upaplavaḥ dṛśyate tathā hi nityaḥ śabdaḥ pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyatara tvāt sa pakṣa vat anitya tve api ayam samānaḥ tathā ākāśa śabdayoḥ anyatara tvāt ākāśa vat ghaṭa śabdayoḥ anyatara tvāt ghaṭa vat iti nitya anitya tva upaplavaḥ tathā nitya vādī upanyasta sādhana sādhya dharma ādhāraḥ śabdaḥ na bhavati sādhya dharma śabdayoḥ anyatara tvāt sādhya dharma vat anitya vādī ukta sādhana sādhya dharma ādhāraḥ śabdaḥ na bhavati hetu dṛṣṭāntau pūrvavat iti dūṣaṇa upaplavaḥ 
[227,7^2]	tathā na prakṛta sādhya dharma adhikaraṇa dharmi dharmayoḥ anyataraḥ sādhya dharmaḥ dharmi tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti etat pratiṣedha pratiṣiddha sādhya dharmi dharmayoḥ anyataraḥ na sādhya dharmaḥ dharmi tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat tathā na prakṛta sādhya dharmavān ayam pakṣaḥ pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ anyatara tvāt vipakṣa vat pakṣa khara śṛṅgayoḥ anyatara tvāt ca kharaśṛṅga vat tathā vādi prativādi vipratipatti anāskandita agni vyatirikta agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ na bhavati pradeśa tvāt sattva jñeya tva ādibhyaḥ ca tad anya pradeśa vat iti etat pratiṣedha pratiṣiddha agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ na bhavati pradeśa tva ādi hetubhyaḥ tad anya pradeśa vat 
[227,7^3]	atha vā vādi prativādi vipratipatti anāskandita agni vyatirikta agni pratiṣedhavān ayam pradeśaḥ na bhavati pūrva ukta hetubhyaḥ tad anya pradeśa vat tathā na prakṛta anumāna viṣaya agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ khara śṛṅga aśṛṅga tvāt khara śṛṅga vat iti etat pratiṣedha pratiṣiddha agnimān na ayam pradeśaḥ kha śṛṅga aśṛṅga tvāt kharaśṛṅga vat atha vā na prakṛta pratyanumāna pratiṣiddha agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ pūrva ukta hetu dṛṣṭāntābhyām tathā atīta anāgata kāla vyatirikta kāla viśiṣṭa asmad prativādi prayukta sādhana bhāva āpanna dhūma sādhya siddhi samāna kāla ghaṭaḥ na ghaṭaḥ kha puṣpa padma patra tvāt padma patra vat iti etat pratyanumāna ātma lābha samāna kāla ghaṭaḥ na ghaṭaḥ tau eva hetu dṛṣṭāntau 
[227,7^4]	athavā atīta anāgata kāla vyatirikta kāla viśiṣṭa vivakṣita vādi prayukta sādhana bhāva āpanna dhūma sādhya siddhi viparyaya samāna kāla ghaṭaḥ na ghaṭaḥ kha puṣpa padma patra tvāt padma patra vat iti tat evam avyavasthita sādhya tvāt anyatara tva ādīnām na sādhyena avinā abhāvaḥ asti na hi sādhyāvinābhūtasya dhūma ādeḥ avyavasthita sādhya tvam dṛṣṭam laukika parīkṣakāṇām api dhūma ādi darśanāt agni ādi niścaya pravṛtti prāpti artha kriyā niṣpatti vyavasthā darśanāt iti 
[228,5^1]	etena sa dvitīya prayogaḥ api nirastaḥ yathā āhuḥ cārvākāḥ abhivyakta caitanya śarīra lakṣaṇa puruṣa ghaṭayoḥ anyatarasa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ anutpanna tvāt kuḍya vat iti caitanya viśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ eva puruṣaḥ na anyaḥ para lokī iti prayoga arthaḥ atra api na ukta lakṣaṇaḥ avinā abhāvaḥ asti avyavasthita sādhya tvāt tathā hi nitya tva ādi dharmaka puruṣa ghaṭa anyatarasa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ anutpanna tvāt kuḍya vat tathā vijñapti mātra para loki puruṣa ghaṭa anyatarasa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ tatas eva hetoḥ iti evam yat kiṃcid sādhayitum iṣyate tat sarvam anena sādhyate iti vyavasthita sādhya abhāvaḥ na ca ayam pramāṇasya dharmaḥ kim tu vyavasthita sādhya sādhana tvam ghaṭena eva ca sa dvitīya tvam kuḍyasya dṛṣṭam tad dṛṣṭāntena katham ghaṭasya abhipreta puruṣa sa dvitīya tvam siddhyati 
[228,5^2]	atiprasaṅgāt tad upagama ādayaḥ api anena eva pratyuktāḥ tad upagamasya api tad icchā mātreṇa pravṛtteḥ artha viśeṣeṇa svabhāva vyāpti asambhavāt asarvajña abhyupagamasya ayathārthasya api sambhavāt sarvajña tvam ca durjñānam yasya api sarvajña tvam sambhāvyate tena abhyupagataḥ arthaḥ āgama arthaḥ eva na anumeyaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ sarvajña ukta tvena tad vacanasya prāmāṇya mātra anumānam iṣyate eva tasmāt na nava dravya vyatirekeṇa dravya antaram asti kaṇā ādena apratipādita tvāt pañcaviṃśati tattva vyatirekeṇa tattva antaram na asti kapilena apratipādita tvāt pañca skandha vyatirekeṇa skandha antaram na asti buddhena apratipādita tvāt kha puṣpa vat iti evamādeḥ avinābhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ tasmāt yuktam uktam svabhāvataḥ sādhyena sādhanasya vyāptiḥ avinā abhāvaḥ iti 
[228,24]	sa dvividhaḥ anvaya vyatireka bhedāt vidhi pratiṣedha pratīti bhedāt iti arthaḥ vidhi mukhena pratīyamānā vyāptiḥ anvayaḥ pratiṣedha mukhena pratīyamānā vyāptiḥ vyatirekaḥ ucyate nanu ca pradeśa viśeṣa sthaḥ agniḥ sādhyaḥ tena ca apratītena sādhanasya vyāptiḥ katam pratipattum śakyate sādhya pratītau ca vyartham vyāpti grahaṇam iti etat parihāra artham āha sādhya sāmānyena sādhana sāmānyasya vyāptiḥ anvayaḥ pratīyate iti vākya śeṣaḥ etat uktam bhavati sakala agni dhūma vyakti anugataḥ ekaḥ eva anvayaḥ saḥ ekatra gṛhītaḥ anyatra api gṛhītaḥ eva dhūma tva ādi vat tat etat anvaya lakṣaṇam pūrva prasaṅgena vyākhyātam iti tathā sādhana sāmānya abhāvena sādhya sāmānya abhāvasya vyāptiḥ vyatirekaḥ pratīyate iti śeṣaḥ sādhanam eva avivakṣita viśeṣam sāmānyam ucyate tasya abhāvaḥ dhūma mātra abhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ 
[229,6^1]	sādhyam ca dvividham dharma viśiṣṭaḥ vā dharmī dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ vā dharmaḥ iti dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ dharmaḥ iti na yuktam viśeṣaṇasya dharma tvāt viśeṣyasya ca dharmi tvāt iti ced na sādhana dharma āśraya tvena dharmi tvasya vivakṣitvāt para āśraya tva mātreṇa ca dharma tvam vivakṣitam bhūta bhāvi lakṣaṇa apekṣayā vā viśeṣyayoḥ dharmi dharma vyavahāraḥ kṛtaḥ iti adoṣaḥ yadā dharmī sādhyaḥ tadā sādhyasya sāmānyam agni mātram agnimat tvam vā yadā tu dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ tadā sādhyam eva avivakṣita viśeṣam sāmānyam tad abhāvasya sādhana sāmānya abhāvena vyāptiḥ vyatirekaḥ 
[229,6^2]	atha vā sādhanasya sāmānyam dhūma tvam tad abhāvena sādhyasya sāmānyam agni tvam tad abhāvasya vyāptiḥ yatra agni abhāvāt agnitva anupalambhaḥ tatra dhūma abhāvāt dhūma tva anupalambhaḥ iti vyatirekaḥ kṛtaka tva ādeḥ tu sāmānya abhāvāt pūrvakam eva vyākhyānam atha vā sādhanasya sāmānyam astitva mātram tat ca kṛtaka tva ādeḥ api asti tena kṛtaka tvādyastitva abhāvena anitya tvāt yastitva abhāvasya vyāptiḥ vyatirekaḥ iti uktam bhavati tatra sādhana sāmānyam vyāpyam sādhya sāmānyam vyāpakam iti ayam vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ anvayaḥ sādhya sāmānya abhāvaḥ vyāpyaḥ sādhana sāmānya abhāvaḥ vyāpakaḥ iti ayam vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ vyatirekaḥ iti udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ tathā vaidharmyāt iti sūtrābhyām vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvasya dvaividhyam siddham 
[229,23]	sādhanam liṅgam tat dvividham dṛṣṭam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ca caśabdaḥ sva artha para artha bhedena ca dvividham iti sūcayati dvividha grahaṇam ukta prakāra niyama artham ukta prakareṇa eva dvividham niyamyate na punar pūrvavat ādi prakāreṇa iti sūtre tu dṛṣṭa ādi prakāreṇa dvaividhyam caśabda sūcitam draṣṭavyam kārya svabhāva bhedena dvaividhyam anupalabdheḥ tu pratibandha antara abhāvāt atra eva antarbhāvaḥ iti kecid tad pratiṣedha artham dṛṣṭam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ca iti uktam tādātmya pratibandhasya asambhavāt tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ tatra pratyakṣa yogya artha anumāpakam dṛṣṭam yathā dhūmaḥ agneḥ iti svabhāva viprakṛṣṭa artha anumāpakam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam yathā rūpa ādi jñānam cakṣuḥ ādeḥ iti 
[230,2]	pratyakṣa yogya tā ca pūrva dṛṣṭa tvena eva avagamyate yasmāt yaḥ arthaḥ pūrvam pratyakṣeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ eva deśa antaritaḥ kāla antaritaḥ vā anumīyate atas tad anumānam dṛṣṭa artha viṣaya tvena dṛṣṭam uktam vyakti bhede api eka sāmānya avaṣṭambhāt saḥ eva dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ eva anumīyate iti uktam kvacid tu sā eva vyaktiḥ śabda ādi kārya viśeṣeṇa anyena vā ananya sādhāraṇa liṅga viśeṣeṇa anumīyate tat yathā śabda viśeṣeṇa bhrātṛ ā ādi anumānam citra ādi viśeṣeṇa dṛṣṭa citrakāra ādi anumānam hasti aśva ratha chatra ādi viśeṣeṇa dṛṣṭa rāja ādi anumānam nakṣatra ādi viśeṣeṇa nakṣatra ādi viśeṣa anumānam iti 
[230,10]	sāmānyatodṛṣṭa anumāne tu na vyakti eka tvam na api jāti ekatvam vā asya ādīnām cakṣuḥ ādīnām ca vilakṣaṇa jāti tvāt tathārūpa upalabdhi ādīnām chidādīnām ca na eka jāti tvam tathā api kriyā mātrasya karaṇa mātreṇa avyabhicāra upalambhāt anumāna pravṛttiḥ adhikaraṇa siddhānta balāt viśeṣa siddhau cakṣuḥ ādi vyavahāraḥ api atas sāmānya mātreṇa darśanāt anumānam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ucyate yadi api sarva anumāneṣu api sāmānya mātreṇa anvaya darśanam tathā api agni ādi anumeyam yena sāmānyena vyavahriyate vyavahāribhiḥ tat eva agni tva ādi sāmānyam anyatra dṛṣṭam atas tad anumānam dṛṣṭam ucyate 
[230,18_230,22]	nanu ca agni tva ādi sāmānyam pratyakṣa grāhyam na yuktam vastu svarūpa grāhakam hi pratyakṣam vastu ca vyāvṛtta ākāram eva na anugata ākāram tathā hi vyaktayaḥ na anuyanti anyat anuyāyi na bhāsate jñānāt avyatiriktam ced katham artha antaram vrajet na tāvat vyaktayaḥ parasparam anvāviśanti tat ekībhāva prasaṅgāt eka vyakti tve ca kha tva vat na sāmānyam syāt na api tābhyaḥ artha antaram sāmānyam asti bhūtakaṇṭheṣu guṇavat apratibhāsanāt na ca artha antarāt artha antareṣu abhinna abhidhāna pratyaya pravṛttiḥ yukta atiprasaṅgāt sati api sambandhe saṃkhyā avayavi ādibhyaḥ tad āśrayeṣu na abhidhāna pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ dṛṣṭānte tasmāt anādi vāsanā nirmitaḥ ayam vikalpa buddheḥ anugata ākāra pratibhāsaḥ na sāmānya nibandhanaḥ saḥ eva tarhi buddhi pratibhāsaḥ sāmānyam tasya jñāna ātmaka tvena vastu tvam ced na etat api yuktam jñānāt vyatiriktam hi katham artha antaram vrajet 
[231,1]	jñānasya rūpam katham arthānām sāmānyam tasya teṣu abhavāt atha vā jñānāt avyatiriktam ekasmāt katham anyasya vyakti antara bhāvinaḥ jñānasya rūpam syāt tatas ca jñāna antaram vyakti antaram vā avyāpnu vat katham sāmānyam tasmāt mithyā vikalpaḥ ayam artheṣu eka ātma tā grahaḥ na hi artha avyatiriktena avyatiriktena vā kenacid ātmanā samānāḥ tathā eṣām grahaṇam mithyā vikalpaḥ eva iti 
[231,6]	itas ca na asti sāmānyam deśa kāla avasthā viśeṣa viniyata eka saṃsarga vyavacchinna svabhāva antara virahāt aneka vṛtteḥ ekasya na deśa ādi viśeṣavatā anyena yogaḥ iti asya arthaḥ deśaḥ ca kālaḥ ca avasthā ca tāḥ eva viśeṣāḥ viśiṣyate anyatas iti viśeṣaḥ teṣu viniyataḥ ca asau ekaḥ ca tena saṃsargaḥ tena vyavacchinnam ca tad svabhāva antaram ca tasya virahāt iti hetuḥ aneka vṛtteḥ ityādi pratijñā prayogaḥ tu yaḥ citrakūṭa deśe vartamāna kāle yauvana avasthāyām ca viniyataḥ piṇḍaḥ tad saṃsarga vyavacchinnam go tvam na deśa antara kāla antara avasthā antara viśiṣṭena piṇḍena saṃyujyate tad svabhāva vyatirikta svabhāva rahita tvāt piṇḍa svarūpa vat iti 
[231,15^1]	atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam vyaktayaḥ na anuyanti ityādi tatra avivādaḥ eva na vyaktiḥ vyakti antara ātmikā bhavati na api vyakti antara saṃśleṣṭā iti buddhi sāmānya nirākaraṇe api avivādaḥ eva yat tu uktam anyat anuyāyi na bhāsate iti tat asiddham sādṛśyasya pratibhāsanāt bhūta kaṇṭheṣu guṇavat apratibhāsanāt iti ayuktam sva rūpeṇa eva sarva arthānām pratibhāsanāt anya rūpeṇa apratibhāsanāt abhāve hi nīla ādīnām api anyonya svarūpeṇa apratibhāsanāt abhāvaḥ syāt kim ca ca bhūtakaṇṭha gatānām api guṇavat apratibhāsanāt abhāvaḥ syāt aneka sambandhi tvena iṣṭasya guṇavat apratibhāsanāt abhāvaḥ sādhyate iti ced na citra ādi jñānasya aneka nīla ādi sambandhi tvena iṣṭasya guṇavat apratibhāsane api abhāva asiddheḥ 
[231,15^2]	kāraṇasya vā aneka kārya sambandhi tvena iṣṭasya guṇavat apratibhāsanāt abhāvasya siddhiḥ syāt iti sambandha vailakṣaṇyāt na tadvat apratibhāsane api abhāvaḥ iti ced sambandha vailakṣaṇyam atra api asti eva bhūtakaṇṭheṣu guṇaḥ saṃyogaḥ sāmānyasya tu sva ādhāreṣu samavāyaḥ iti kārya dravya saṃkhyā ādeḥ tulya sambandha tvāt eka ākāra pratyaya hetutva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na padārtha śakti bhedāt yathā kāryatvāt aviśeṣe api rūpa ādīnām pārthiva tva aviśeṣe api viṣamadhu ādīnām ca vilakṣaṇa kārya darśanena śakti bhedaḥ avagataḥ tathā kārya dravya saṃkhyā ādeḥ sāmānyasya ca aneka vṛtti tva aviśeṣe api pratyaya ādi vilakṣaṇa kārya darśanena śakti bhedaḥ eva anumātum yuktaḥ na tu abhāva avagamaḥ tulya kārya kartṛ tva prasaṅgaḥ vā kartum yuktaḥ iti 
[232,1^1]	yat api deśa kāla ityādi tatra tāvat pratijñāyām hetau ca deśa ādi grahaṇam anarthakam yadi hi deśa ādi viśeṣa rahitena anyena yogaḥ kasyacid siddhaḥ tadā deśa ādi viśeṣavatā iti viśeṣaṇam sārthakam bhavet tathā eka saṃsarga vyavacchinna svabhāva antara virahāt iti ukteḥ kaḥ ati prasaṅgaḥ yat nivṛttaye deśa ādi viśeṣaṇam upāttam pratijñāpadayoḥ ca vyāghātaḥ aneka vṛtteḥ ekasya dhārmitvam anyena yogaḥ na asti iti sādhyam tat idam jananī bandhyā ityādi vat virodhāt yuktam na hi aneka vṛtti tvam ekasya āśraya antareṇa yoga abhāve yujyate sāmānya rūpa tā api āśraya antareṇa asambandhe anupapannā tat na sāmānyasya api dharmi tvam atha para abhiprāyeṇa aneka vṛtti tvam sāmānya rūpa tā vā dharmiṇaḥ abhyupagamyate na tu punar svayam anekatra vartamānam sāmānyam abhyupagamya tasya āśraya antareṇa yogaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti 
[232,1^2]	sva abhiprāyeṇa tarhi dharmiṇaḥ kim svarūpam iṣyate yadi apoha lakṣaṇam viśeṣa lakṣaṇam vā buddhi lakṣaṇam vā tadā tasya vyakti antareṇa yoga abhāva sādhane siddha sādhya tā na vā apoha ādi lakṣaṇasya eka vyaktyā api saṃsargaḥ asti tatas ca asiddhaḥ hetuḥ syāt yasmāt eka saṃsarga vyavacchinna svabhāva antara virahāt iti asya arthaḥ eka saṃsarga vyavacchinna svabhāva tvāt iti nanu ca prasaṅga sādhanam idam uktam tena āśraya asiddha tva ādi doṣaḥ na asti kim idam prasaṅga sādhanam anumānam ananumānam vā yadi anumānam katham tad pakṣa dharma tva ādi vihīnam ātmānam labheta na ced anumānam katham tatas sādhya siddhiḥ pratyakṣa anumāna vyatiriktasya tvayā pramāṇa tva anabhyupagamāt 
[232,19_232,26]	para upagama siddhim dharmiṇam hetum ca āśritya prasaṅga sādhanam ucyate iti ced sa para upagamaḥ sa pramāṇakaḥ vā na vā yadi sa pramāṇakaḥ tadā tad siddhaḥ arthaḥ tvayā abhyupagantavyaḥ pramāṇasya apakṣa pāti tvāt apramāṇakaḥ ced para abhyupagamaḥ tatas asiddhaḥ eva dharmaḥ hetuḥ ca iti apramāṇam eva tad āśraya prasaṅgaḥ nanu ca ādau sa pramāṇaka tvam na avagamyate na api parīkṣā kāle kasyacid abhyupagamaḥ kim tu parīkṣitasya abhyupagamaḥ tatas para abhyupagamaḥ tāvat parīkṣyate sa pramāṇakaḥ apramāṇakaḥ vā iti yadi sa pramāṇakam tadā asmākam api asau abhyupagamaḥ atha apramāṇakaḥ tadā paraḥ eva upalabhyate yāvān arthaḥ yukti sāmarthyāt āpatati sa sarvaḥ tvayā abhyupagantavyaḥ prabhā abhyupagame pradīpa abhyupagama vat na ca kaścid pradīpa anabhyupagame prabhām abhyupagacchati 
[232,30]	asati hetau maulasya hetoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva sādhana prakāraḥ eṣaḥ yathā evam idam api syāt na ca ubhayam iti dharmayoḥ sambandha upadarśanāt maulaḥ hetuḥ upalabhya tvena abhimatasya vivekataḥ anupalabdhiḥ prasaṅga viparyayaḥ vā vyāpi tvān na eka vyakti niścaya tayā upalambhaḥ syāt iti prasaṅga arthaḥ maulasya hetoḥ vyāpti sādhakaḥ yadi evam eka vyakti niṣṭha tvam iṣyate tadā na deśa ādi viśeṣavatā anyena yogaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ atha anyena yogaḥ tadā tasya eva eka vyakti viṣṭha tvam na abhyupagantavyam na ca eka vyakti niṣṭha tvam deśa ādi viśeṣavatā anyena yogaḥ ca iti ubhayam sambhavati virodhāt mā bhūt eka vyakti niṣṭha tvam tasya aśeṣa vyakti vyapi tvāt iti ced na etat asti yatas sādhāraṇa tve tasya syāt vyāpita ā itti rakṣataḥ na hi tad rūpam anyena rūpeṇa grāhyam abhramam 
[233,10]	yadi vyāpi sāmānyam vyāpitayā eva adhyakṣeṇa gṛhyeta na khalu viparīta grahaṇam pramāṇam vyāpitā ced pratīyate tatas sakala vyakti pratītiḥ eva bhavet vyāpya apratītau vyāpaka tāyāḥ pratyetum aśakya tvāt na ca tathā svarūpam sāmānyam pratīyate tasmāt na asti iti yadi ayam sthitaḥ pakṣaḥ syāt bhavet dharmya siddhi doṣaḥ paraspara virodha prakaṭana param eva etat na vayam evambhūtam artham pratipattum kṣamāḥ evaṃbhūtasya aparasya adarśanāt anumānam ca na dṛṣṭāntam vinā avatarati 
[233,17]	atha mūrtasya ekasya vyāpitā na sambhavati sāmānyam tu amūrtam tena tatra vyāpita eka tvayoḥ na virodhaḥ iti tat na antya viśeṣa karma ādīnām vyāpi tva prasaṅgāt sāmānyasya api vā na vyāpi tvam viśeṣa abhāvāt sāmānya itara bhāvaḥ eva vyāpti ta itara tve nibandhanam bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced nanu ca pramāṇa abhāvaḥ eva doṣaḥ pratyakṣam eva pramāṇam iti ced pratyakṣeṇa vyāpitayeta rathāḥ vā gṛhyeta 
[233,22_233,24]	vyāpita agrahaṇam ced na pratyakṣasyeyatī gatiḥ yad aśeṣa vyakti vyāpi sāmānye asya pravartanam atha vyaktayaḥ sarvāḥ na gṛhyante tathā tarhi sāmānyam eka vyakti samanvitam gṛhyamāṇam katham vyāpitayā gṛhītam eka vyakti viśeṣaṇa tve ca viśeṣa vat sāmānyam bhavet paryāya antareṇa vyakti antara viśiṣṭa tā adhigame api daṇḍa ādi vat ekatva siddhiḥ kutas pratyabhijñānāt ced na tasya apramāṇa tvāt tasmāt ukta lakṣaṇam sāmānyam apratīteḥ eva na asti iti 
[234,1]	katham tarhi sāmānyasya avyāpi tvam sādhyate dharmi tvena sāmānyasya siddhau hi tatra dharmasya kasyacid sādhanam syāt na anyathā uktam atra prasaṅga sādhanam etat na tu ayam maulaḥ hetuḥ yadi tvayā sāmānyam vyāpi abhyupagamyate tadā pramāṇena tat tathā pratipattavyam pramāṇa nibandhanaka tvāt abhyupagamasya deśa ādi avacchinna eka vyakti saṃsarga avacchinna svabhāva antara virahita tayā ca pratīyamānam katham vyāpi tat iti abhyupagantum yuktam pratyekṣeṇa ca aneka vastu grahaṇe api na tatas tad vyāpitayā anyathā vā pratīyate iti na apratīyamāna abhyupagamaḥ yuktaḥ tat na sāmānyam asti iti 
[234,10_234,16]	tat etat sarvam ayuktam yat tāvat sa pramāṇaka tvam apramāṇaka tvam vā ādau na avagamyate na api parīkṣā kāle kasyacid abhyupagamaḥ iti tat na sādhya siddheḥ ādau eva dhārmihetu ādi svarūpam pramāṇataḥ avagantavyam anyathā tad balena sādhya siddhiḥ katham syāt na hi para upagamāt eva dharmi hetu ādeḥ siddhi aṅga tvam khara viṣāṇa ādīnām api kaiścid abhyupagamāt siddhi aṅga tva prasaṅgaḥ parīkṣitasya abhyupagamaḥ iti atra aviva ādaḥ na kevalam abhyupagamaḥ hetu ādi bhāvaḥ api aparīkṣitasya na yuktaḥ asiddha tva ādi doṣa prasaṅgāt yat prabhā pradīpa vat iti uktam tat na kasmāt tayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvasya pramāṇataḥ anyatra prasiddhau prasaṅga ātma lābhāt nanu atra vyāpya vyāpala bhāvaḥ kvacid prasiddhaḥ sāmānya ādeḥ atyanta asattva abhyupagamāt kvacid sattve vā pradīpa ādi vat prasaṅga balāt na atyanta asattvam siddhyati 
[234,21]	yat api uktam asati hetau maulasya hetoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva sādhana prakāraḥ eṣaḥ iti tat api ayuktam pramāṇa dvaya niyama vādinaḥ hi kaḥ anyaḥ prakāraḥ asti yatas vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva siddhiḥ syāt anumānam ced prakāraḥ katham asati hetau syāt pratyakṣam ced prakāraḥ katham tad svarūpam deśa kāla ityādi vākyena prabhā abhyupagamaḥ ityādinā vā ucyeta kaḥ ca ayam maulaḥ hetuḥ yadi anupalabdhiḥ sā yadi adṛśyasya tadā katham abhāvam sādhayati piśāca ādeḥ iva atha iyam dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ tadā ghaṭa ādi vat na atyanta abhāvaḥ sāmānyasya kvacid upalabdha tvāt anyathā katham dṛśya tvam para upagama mātreṇa dṛśya tve buddha ādeḥ api kenacid dṛśya tva abhyupagame sati anupalabdheḥ abhāvaḥ syāt asiddha tvam ca anupalabdheḥ pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ 
[235,2]	atha prasaṅga viparyayaḥ maulaḥ hetuḥ prasaṅga viparyayaḥ kīdṛśaḥ hetuḥ yadi eka niṣṭha tvāt iti tad ā ubhayoḥ asiddhiḥ atha ekatvāt iti hetuḥ yat ekam tat asat eva iti kva vyāptiḥ prasiddhā ekatvena vyāpaka tvam vā sādhyate iti ced na tarhi sāmānya dharmiṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ dharma pratiṣedhāt yathā rūpa ādeḥ nitya tva ādi dharma niṣedhāt iti aneka āśraya tva pratiṣedhe katham sāmānyam asti iti ced kim āśrayaḥ tarhi eka tvāt iti hetuḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ hetuḥ tridhā eva saḥ iti bruvatā tvayā api anāśrayaḥ hetuḥ ahetuḥ eva iṣṭaḥ tasmāt na maulaḥ api hetuḥ sambhavati yaḥ api eka vyakti niṣṭha tva vyāpi tvayoḥ virodhaḥ uktaḥ saḥ anabhyupagamena eva parihṛtaḥ sāmānyasya aneka vyakti stha tva abhyupagamāt iti 
[235,11^1]	yat ca uktam sādhāraṇa tvena tasya syāt ityādi tat na vyāpi tva dharmasya agrahaṇāt vyāpi tva dharma grahaṇe tad viśiṣṭa pratītiḥ bhavati na tad sattā mātrāt aham iti ātma svarūpa grahaṇe api vyāpi tvā agrahaṇāt bhrāntiḥ api na bhavati avyāpi tvena api agrahaṇāt vyāpi tvā avyāpi tvā ākārau muktvā katham grahaṇam iti ced yathā ātmanaḥ aham sukhī ityādi ākāreṇa grahaṇam tathā sāmānyasya sādṛśya anugata ādi ākāreṇa iti sādhya tvāt anudāharaṇam iti ced na anyatra ātma pratyakṣa tva prasādhanāt api ca loṣṭha ādi vastu guru svabhāvam api guru idam iti na gṛhyate tadā kim loṣṭha ādi rūpeṇa api tad grahaṇam bhrāntam syāt viparīta grahaṇam hi bhrāntam ucyate tena vyāpi idam iti sāmānya grahaṇam yadi syāt tadā bhavet bhrāntam yadā tu anayoḥ sādṛśyam tat anena sadṛśam tena sadṛśam idam iti vā śeṣa tvena vā tad grahaṇam bhavati tadā katham bhrāntam 
[235,11^2]	yadi api avyāptita ākāreṇa grahaṇam tathā api na sāmānyasya siddhiḥ sarvathā tat jñānasya bhrānta tā anupapatteḥ yathā dvi candra ādi jñānam dvi tva ādi aṃśaḥ eva bhrāntam na candra ādi aṃśe api tatas candra ādi aṃśasya api na asiddhiḥ vikalpa jñānam ca vikalpa aṃśaḥ eva bhrāntam tvayā iṣṭam na tu bodha aṃśe api bodha aṃśa siddhiḥ ca tatas eva iṣṭā tathā sāmānya jñāna vyāpita aṃśaḥ eva bhrāntam astu na tu vyakti viśeṣaṇa tva ādi aṃśe api iti api ca vyāpi tvam eva sāmānyasya gṛhyate nirvikalpaka bodhena anyathā katham tad dvāreṇa saṃketa avina abhāva sambandhau tadvatsu gṛhyete vyaktīnām ānantyāt anyatra tad grahaṇe anyatra śabda liṅgābhyām pratipatti ayogāt bhrānta tve ca saṃvāda niyama ayogāt tasmāt sāmānya vyāpi tva grahaṇāt eva vyakti ānantye api saṃketā vinābhāva grahaṇam yuktam iti 
[236,1_236,4^1]	yat ca uktam vyāpya apratītaḥ vyāpi tvasya pratyetum aśakya tvāt sakala vyakti grahaṇa prāk iti tat na pratyakṣataḥ sakala vyakti viśiṣṭa vyāpi tva grahaṇa anabhyupagamāt anumānāt ca sakala vyāpya viśiṣṭa vyāpi tva grahaṇam api iṣyate pratyakṣataḥ tu eka vyāpya grahaṇe api vyāpaka tva grahaṇam tvayā api akāmena abhyupagantavyam anyathā agneḥ dhūma vyāpaka tva pratītiḥ api na syāt na ca puras avasthita kārya kāraṇa vyakti mātra apekṣayā vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva vyavasthā deśa kāla antaritayoḥ tad bhāva avyavasthitau anumāna pravṛttiḥ na syāt anumānāt tad bhāva vyavasti tau anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ syāt itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ vā tasmāt aśeṣa dhūma agni vyakti agrahaṇe api tad vyāpī sāmānyayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva āpannayoḥ grahaṇāt eva tadvatām vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva vyavasthā iti yuktam 
[236,4^2]	yadi punar sāmānya mātra anvitānām eva śeṣa vyaktīnām mānasa pratyakṣa agrahaṇam iṣyate tathā astu puras avasthita vyakteḥ tu aneka viśeṣaṇa upakṛtam cākṣuṣam grahaṇam tena tadvat pratibhāsanam sarva vyaktīnām na bhavati dharma dharmiṇoḥ ca anya tvam vakṣyāmaḥ tena vyakti grahaṇe api na avaśyam tad viśeṣaṇa grahaṇam atas eva dṛṣṭa jātīyam vyakti antaram sthāvara jaṅgama ādi lakṣaṇam dṛṣṭvā prāk eva jñātam mayā idam evam jātīyakam evam saṃjñakam ca iti niścinoti tad viśeṣa apekṣa tve dṛṣṭa tvam manyate yathāpūrve ayam strī na dṛṣṭaḥ ayam mayā pumān iti kim bahunā uktena aśeṣa vyakti grahaṇam bhavatu vā mā bhūt sāmānyam tu eka vyakti grahaṇa kāle api gṛhītam eva anyathā vyakti antare katham evaṃjātiyam eva idam iti pratītiḥ syāt bhrānta tvam ca niṣetsyāmaḥ 
[236,20^1]	vyāpi tvam ca sāmānyasya yadi prāk eva na gṛhītam tadā aneka vyakti viśeṣa sāmānya grahaṇa upakṛtena manasā paścāt gṛhyate iti kaḥ eva ubhayoḥ virodhaḥ nanu vyāpitvā eka tvayoḥ paraspara parihāra sthiti lakṣaṇaḥ atra virodhaḥ prakaṭitaḥ eva iti na ākāśa ādau iva ekatva vyāpi tvayoḥ avirodhāt sādhya vat udāharaṇam iti ced na ātma siddhau vistarataḥ tad prasādhanāt api ca sarvajña jñānasya ekasya api aneka jñeya prakāra vyāpaka tvam kāraṇasya ca kasyacid anekāsu akārya vyāpaka tvam tvayā api abhyupagatam yathā ca ekasya jñāna ādi kāryasya aneka rūpa āloka āditya aśva tva ādi lakṣaṇasya anantasya darśane api tathābhūtasya api darśanāt iti ati sāhasam akāraṇa sambandhi tve virodhaḥ na asti tadvat ekasya sāmānyasya aneka āśraya sambandhe api avirodhaḥ iti evam ca sati yat uktam na vayam evambhūtam artham ityādi tat anena eva pratyuktam 
[236,20^2]	na hi sarvajña jñāna ādeḥ api aneka jñeya ādi vyāpaka tve tathābhūtāni adarśanam asti prativādinaḥ sarvatra vivādāt sāmānyasya tu go tva aśva tva ādi lakṣaṇasya anantasya darśane api tathā bhūtasya api rasya adarśanāt iti ati sāhasam atha sāmānya vyatirekeṇa aparasya tathābhūtasya darśanāt iti sāmānya pratipattum na śakyate evam tarhi khara uṣṭra ādi vyatirekeṇa tathābhūtasya darśanāt iti khara uṣṭrāt artham api bhavantaḥ pratipattum na kṣamā iti atha sāmānyam na eva dṛśyate tadā tasya eva darśanāt iti vaktavyam evambhūtasya aparasya iti anarthakam pratipāditam ca sāmānya darśanam tat vyāpi tva grahaṇam ca yat amūrtam tat vyāpya iva iti ayam niyamaḥ na abhyupagamyate tatas na anta viśeṣa ādīnām vyāpi tva prasaṅgaḥ vicitra śaktayaḥ hi padārthāḥ tena amūrta tva ādi aviśeṣe api sāmānyasya eva ananta vyakti vyāpana śaktiḥ na anya viśeṣa ādeḥ mūrta tva aviśeṣe api agniḥ dahati na jalam iti atra kaḥ paryanuyogaḥ 
[237,12]	atha sāmānya svarūpam eva asiddham tat na pratyakṣa siddha tvāt pratyakṣeṇa tasya vyāpitayā anyathā vā grahaṇam bhavatu na doṣaḥ yat ca uktam na pratyakṣasyeyatī gatiḥ ityādi tat na mānasa pratyakṣasya aśeṣa vyakti vyāpi sāmānya grāhaka tve api aviśeṣāt eka vyakti samanvita grahaṇe tu yat uktam katham vyāpitayā gṛhītam viśeṣa vat asāmānyam ca bhavet iti tat na eka vyakti samanvita grahaṇe api tadā eva paścāt vā vyāpi tva grahaṇasya ukta tvāt guru tva grahaṇe api hi yathā pāṣāṇaḥ pavana vat aguru svarūpa svabhāvaḥ na bhavati evam vyāpitvā agrahaṇe api na sāmānyam viśeṣa vat asāmānyam iti 
[237,21]	pratyabhijñānasya ca ananya nimittasya pramāṇa tvam sādhayiṣyām astena krameṇa api vyakti antara viśiṣṭa tva grahaṇe sāmānyasya eka tvam sidhyati eva na daṇḍa ādeśa bhedasya pratyakṣa tvāt tad pratyabhijñānasya sāmānya nimitta tvāt na tu sāmānye sāmānyam asti tasmāt sāmānya ekatva nibandhanam eva tad ādhāreṣu api pratyabhijñānam 
[237,26^1]	yat api uktam prasaṅga sādhanam idam yadi tvayā sāmānyam vyāpyam abhyupagamyate tadā pramāṇena tat tathā abhyupagantavyam pramāṇa nibandhana tvāt abhyupagamasya na apratīyamāna abhyupagamaḥ yuktaḥ iti tat api asat kaḥ hi apratīyamāna abhyupagamam karoti yam prati sārthakam idam syāt yadi ca sāmānyam vyāpitayā na pratīyate kim āśritya anumāna śabdau pravartate na hi vyakti svarūpam eva vyakti antare anvayi bhavati anvaya abhāvam ca sarvaḥ hetuḥ asādhāraṇaḥ syāt śabdaḥ api asaṃketitaḥ katham hetu ādi sūcakaḥ api syāt na hi kṛta saṃketaḥ api ḍittha śabdaḥ artha antaram ḍavittham sūcayati 
[237,26^2]	ḍitthaḍavittha ādiṣu iva dhūma bhedeṣu api na kiṃcid ekam anugatam nimittam asti yena eka śabda anugamaḥ tad anya vyāvṛtti dvāreṇa anumāna śabdayoḥ pravṛttiḥ iti ced sā tad anya vyāvṛttiḥ vyaktibhyaḥ anyā syāt ananyā vā iti yadi anyā sarva vyaktiṣu avasthitā ekā ca tadā tat eva sāmānyam nāmni vipratipattiḥ na arthe asaṃsṛṣṭā an ekā ca satī katham keṣucid eva bhedeṣu abhinna abhidhāna pratyaya nimittam atha na anyā tatas vyāvṛtti ā eka tve vyaktīnām api ekatva prasaṅgaḥ vyakti ananta tve vā vyāvṛtteḥ api ānanya prasaṅgaḥ tat ānantye vā anugata eka nimitta abhāvāt na saṃketa anvaya ādi grahaṇam iti 
[238,13_238,15]	yat punar atra uktam nivṛtteḥ niḥsvabhāva tvāt na sthāna āsthāna kalpanā vastuni eṣa na vikalpaḥ syāt vidheḥ vastu anurodhata iti tat api asat yadi hi niḥsvabhāvāḥ vyāvṛttiḥ tadā katham tad āśrayeṇa saṃketa anvaya ādi grahaṇam sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ vā na hi kharaśṛṅga ādi āśrayeṇa keṣucid bhedeṣu saṃketaḥ kartum anvayaḥ vā adhigantum śakyate kṛtaka tva anitya tva ādīnām ca vyāvṛtti rūpa tvāt niḥsvabhāva tvam prāptam tatas ca khara śṛṅga kha puṣpa ādīnām iva ca sādhya sādhana bhāva vyavasthā 
[238,21]	etena jñāna arthayoḥ antarāla stham sāmānyam pratyuktam samānānām bhāvaḥ hi sāmānyam ucyate tat katham antarāla stham syāt sarvatas sambaddham pratiniyata dharmi dharma tvena vyapadiśyeta bhrāntitaḥ tad dharma vyapadeśe kṛtaka tva akṛtaka tvayoḥ pakṣa dharma tva asiddhatva vyavasthā na syāt yathā eva hi bhavatām śabdeṣu kṛtaka tva bhrānti dārḍhyam tathā mīmāṃsakānām akṛtaka tva bhrānti dārḍhyam iti kasya atra vāstavam pakṣa dharma tvam asiddham vā syāt iti 
[238,28]	astu tarhi śabdāt anartha antaram eva kṛtaka tvam anitya tvam ca tayoḥ tādātmyāt avyabhicāraḥ tat uktam svabhāva pratibandhe hi sati arthaḥ arthan na vyabhicarati iti na ukta uttara tvāt dharma dharmiṇoḥ abhede na tvayā lakṣaṇaḥ doṣaḥ prāk eva uktaḥ kṛtaka tva ādi śabdānām paryāya tvam ca syāt tatas ca niḥśabdaḥ abhilāpāt iti yādṛś idam vākyam syāt tādṛś idam api syāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti na eṣa doṣaḥ yatas 
[239,4]	sarve bhāvāḥ svabhāvena sva svabhāva vyavasthiteḥ svabhāva para bhāvābhyām yasmāt vyāvṛtti bhāginaḥ tasmāt yatas yatas arthānām vyāvṛttiḥ tad nibandhanā jāti bhedāḥ vikalpante tad viśeṣa avagāhinaḥ tasmāt yaḥ yena dharmeṇa viśeṣaḥ saṃpratīyate sa na śakyaḥ tatas anyena tena bhinnā vyavasthitiḥ 
[239,10]	sarve eva bhāvāḥ sva rūpa sthitayaḥ na te pareṇa ātmānam miśrayanti tat ekībhāva prasaṅgāt na ca sāmānya nibandhanam bhāvānām amiśraṇam tasya anupalabdhitaḥ abhāvāt bhāve vā tasya api sva ātmani vyavasthānāt amiśraṇam anyena tatra api sāmānya kalpane anavasthā syāt tasmāt ime svabhāvāḥ sajātīyāt abhimatāt anyasmāt ca vyatiriktāḥ svabhāvena eka rūpa tvāt yatas yatas bhinnāḥ tad bheda pratyayena upakṛta sanniveśaiḥ śabdaiḥ tatas tatas bhedam upādāya svabhāva abhede api aneka dharmāṇaḥ pratīyante te ca śabdāḥ sarva bhedanākṣe api ekameda codanāt tad sva lakṣaṇa niṣṭhāḥ eva bhavanti tat ekasmāt api tasya bhedaḥ asti iti tasmāt ekasya bhāvasya yāvanti para rūpāṇi tāvatyaḥ tad apekṣayā vyāvṛttayaḥ yāvatyaḥ ca vyāvṛttayaḥ tāvatyaḥ ca śrutayaḥ atad kārya kāraṇa parihāreṇa vyavahāra arthāḥ tasmāt svabhāva abhede api yena dharmeṇa nāmnā yaḥ viśeṣaḥ bhedaḥ pratīyate na sa śakyaḥ tatas anyena pratyāyayitum iti na eka arthāḥ sarve śabdāḥ na api ananvaya ādi doṣaḥ asti na hi ekā eva agni vyaktiḥ adāha ādi kāribhyaḥ vyāvṛttā iti 
[239,24]	atra ucyate bhavantu nāma āmiśra ātmānaḥ arthāḥ tathā api yatas yatas bhinnāḥ tad bheda pratyāyanāya ityādi na yuktam bhedaḥ hi vastunaḥ sva rūpam eva syāt rūpa antaram vā yadi vastu svarūpam eva tadā tad nimittāḥ śabdāḥ katham na eka arthāḥ katham ca tasya aneka dharma tvam na hi para rūpa nānā tve api tasya ātma bhedaḥ asti upacārāt iti ced na upacāra nimitta abhāvāt sādhya sādhana bhāva aupacārika tva prasaṅgāt ca aupacārika dharma mūla tvāt siṃha tva ādi vat bhedaḥ kalpate na arthaḥ api iti ced kimarthāt anyaḥ api bhedaḥ asti yena evam ucyate yadi ca dharma bhedaḥ tatvataḥ na asti tadā śabda abhilāpa tva ādīnām iva anitya tva kṛtaka tva ādīnām sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ na syāt kalpita bheda tva aviśeṣāt tad nimittānām śrutīnām ca paryāyatayā eva syāt śabda abhilāpa ādi śruti vat 
[240,6^1]	atha abhinnāḥ eva dharmāḥ iṣyante tat uktam ekasya eva bhāvasya yāvanti para rūpāṇi tāvatyaḥ tad apekṣayā vyāvṛttayaḥ iti na sambandha abhāvāt na hi bhāvasya tad anya vyāvṛttibhiḥ saha sambandhaḥ kaścid asti saṃyoga ādeḥ svayam anabhyupagamāt tad utpattiḥ api na asti vyāvṛttīnām atad kārya kāraṇa tvāt tādātmyam ced iṣyate vyāvṛttīnām tarhi nānātve vyāvṛttasya api nānā tva prasaṅgaḥ tad eka tve vā tāsām api ekatvam iti durnivāraḥ prasaṅgaḥ tatas ca ekasya aneka dharma tva avirodhaḥ tathā yaḥ yena dharmeṇa viśeṣaḥ sampratīyate na sa śakyaḥ tatas anyena iti asya api virodhaḥ yā ca iyam anagni vyāvṛttiḥ agni śabda pravṛtti hetuḥ iṣyate sā kim sarva agni vyaktiṣu abhinnā ekā 
[240,6^2]	atha prativyakti bhidyate iti abhinna tve tat eva sāmānyam tasya abhinna ātmanaḥ anekatra anuvṛtti vidhāyaka pratyaya abhidhāne hetu tva lakṣaṇa tvāt prativyakti bhede tu prativyakti viśeṣa vat na tad anugama sta bhāvāt na saṃketa ādi grahaṇam iti apravṛttiḥ eva śabda anumānayoḥ syāt yadi vā anekatrān anuyāyi tve api śabda anumāna pravṛtti hetu tvam iṣyate tathā sati sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvam eva śabda anumānayoḥ abhyupagantavyam tayoḥ vidhi mukhena pravṛtti darśanāt aśakya samaya tva ādi doṣaḥ ca apohe api samānaḥ tathā api vastu ātmaka tve atyanta vyāvṛtta tvāt tad anātmaka tve ca pratipatti aviṣaya tvāt iti 
[240,22_240,24]	nanu ca vastu viṣaya tve anumāna ādeḥ ānarthakyam eva syāt pratyakṣeṇa eva sarva ākāreṇa vastunaḥ paricchinna tvāt tathā hi ekasya artha svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam kaḥ anyaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ bhāgaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate no ced bhrānti nimittena saṃyojyeta guṇa antaram śuktau vā rajata ākāraḥ rūpa sādharmya darśanāt 
[240,28]	yathā śuktau rajata ākāra samāropaḥ tathā yadi akṣaṇika tva ādi ākāraḥ sadṛśa apara apara utpāda darśana ādi nimittena āropitaḥ na syāt tadā pramāṇa antara vṛttiḥ anavakāśā bhavet yāvatā yāvantaḥ asya para bhāvāḥ tāvantaḥ eva yathāsvaṃnimitta bhāvinaḥ samāropāḥ iti tad vyavacchedakāni bhavanti pramāṇa antarāṇi sārthakāni śuktau rajata samāra upa vyavacchedaka pramāṇa vat na ca pramāṇa antarāṇām apratyāyaka tvam sva aṃśa pratyāyane vṛttiḥ tasya dṛṣṭa tvāt anaṃśasya ca eka deśena darśana ayogāt 
[241,5_241,14]	tasmāt dṛṣṭasya bhāvasya dṛṣṭaḥ eva akhilaḥ guṇaḥ bhrānteḥ niścīyate na iti sādhanam saṃpravartate na kevalam pratyakṣa dṛṣṭe pramāṇa antara abhāva siddhiḥ anumānena api vastu niścaye saḥ eva doṣaḥ iti āha vastu grahe tu mānāt ca dharmasya ekasya niścaye sarva dharma grahaḥ apohe na ayam doṣaḥ prasajyate na hi tasmin niścite tad ātmanām aniścayaḥ yuktaḥ yadā punar ananumānena samāropa vyavacchedaḥ kriyate tadā aneka vyavacchedāt anya vyavacchedaḥ iti tad artham anyat pravartate tasmāt apoha viṣayam iti liṅgam prakīrtitam anyathā dharmiṇaḥ siddhau asiddham kim atas param iti 
[241,17]	tat etat ayuktam yat tāvat vastu viṣya tve anumāna ādeḥ ānarthakyam eva syāt iti tat na dharma dharmiṇoḥ abheda anabhyupagamāt yaḥ hi dharma dharmiṇoḥ abhedam abhyupaiti tam prati bhavati eṣa doṣaḥ asmākam tu bhinnāḥ bahavaḥ dharmāḥ ekasya api dharmiṇaḥ tatra ekena dharmeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ api dharmī dharma antara viśiṣṭaḥ na pratītaḥ iti tad artham pramāṇa antaram pravartate nanu tad viśiṣṭaḥ api saḥ eva satyam tathā api dharma antara agrahaṇe tad avacchedena tatra pratītiḥ na bhūta iti tad viśiṣṭaḥ apratītaḥ iti ucyate yathā ekaḥ eva giriḥ dhūma viśiṣṭaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ agni viśiṣṭaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ iti na hi giri darśanāt eva tad avayava antaritaḥ api agniḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti śakyam vaktum tad grahaṇe ca agnimān ayam atra agniḥ iti vā pratītiḥ tasmāt ekasya artha svabhāvasya ityādi ayuktam eva 
[241,27^1]	yat api uktam sa māra upa vyavacchedakāni bhavanti pramāṇa antarāṇi sārthakāni syuḥ iti tat api ayuktam yatas akasmāt dhūmāt agni anumānam bhavat na samāropa vyavaccheda kṛt na hi tatra anagni samāropaḥ sambhāvyate nanu atra api uktam dharmi pratipattau abhedāt sarva dharma pratipattiḥ bhede vā asambaddhasya tatra pratipattiḥ iti tasmāt tatra api tad darśinaḥ tad svabhāva aniścayaḥ kutas api viparyāsāt sa ca tam pradeśam tad viviktena rūpeṇa niścinvan agni mat tva bhāvanā vimukhayā buddhyā katham aviparyastaḥ nāma tad ākāra samāropa saṃśaya rahitaḥ ca tat pratipatte liṅgam anusaret iti 
[241,27^2]	tat etat api apramāṇakam eva uktam na hi dahana pradeśayoḥ agni dhūmayoḥ vā dharma dharmi bhāve api abhedaḥ sakṛt dṛṣṭa tvam vā śakyate vaktum na api bhinna tvāt tatra agneḥ apratipattiḥ eva iti sa lajjaḥ vaktum arhati sa ca tam pradeśam tad viviktena ityādi api apratītikam eva uktam na hi viparyayaḥ saṃśayaḥ vā apratīyamānaḥ api asti iti vaktum śakyate na ca tad apratītau kvacid dhūma darśana anantaram eva agni anumānam bhavat na dṛśyate na api viparyayasya saṃśayasya ca anumānam prati sambandha smṛti vat kāraṇa tvam niścitam yena tasya vivekataḥ ananubhave api astitva siddhiḥ syāt 
[241,27^3]	dharmiṇaḥ tad vivikta tva niścayaḥ eva viparyayaḥ iti ced na anyathā niścayasya viparyaya tvāt yadi hi na agnimān ayam iti niścayaḥ bhavati tadā syāt viparyayaḥ yadā tu dhūmaḥ ayam dhūmavān ayam iti vā niścayaḥ tadā katham viparyayaḥ samāropa saṃśaya rahitaḥ ca kim iti liṅgam na anusaret prayojana abhāvāt iti ced na agni pratīteḥ eva prayojana tvāt dharmi siddhau eva tad siddheḥ iti ced na vyavadhāna avyavadhānataḥ atulya yogakṣema tvāt rūpa rasānām ca eka indriya aviṣayāṇām api gamya gamaka bhāva upalabdheḥ abhyāsa atiśayāt anicchataḥ api anumāna pravṛtteḥ na samāropa abhāve anumāna apravṛttiḥ 
[241,27^4]	asandigdhe api yogyatayā anumāna pravṛtteḥ ukta tvāt avirodhaḥ sandigdhe api anumānasya na bhrānti nivṛttiḥ phalam bhrānteḥ tatra abhāvāt sandehasya ca abhrānti tvāt sandigdhe vikalpena eka dharma samāropaḥ asti tad vyavacchedaḥ anumāna phalam iti ced astu nāma evam tathā api vastu viṣayam eva anumānam eṣṭavyam anyathā tatas saṃśaya ucchedaḥ na syāt na hi anyatra niścaye anyatra saṃśayaḥ nivartate atiprasaṅgāt viparyaya nivartakasya api atas eva vastu viṣaya tvam siddham pratyakṣa vat yathā pratyakṣam vastuni eva pravartamānam saṃśayam viparyayam ca nivartayati tathā anumānam api iti 
[242,27_243,4]	nanu ca pratyakṣāt na saṃśaya ādi nivṛttiḥ sarva ākāra dṛṣṭe api arthe saṃśaya ādi darśanāt kim tu niścayāt tad nivṛttiḥ sa ca sarvaḥ api apoha viṣayaḥ eva iti āha kvacid dṛṣṭe api yat jñānam sāmānya artham vikalpakam asamāropitāni āṃśe tad mātra apoha gocaram yatra hi rajata sthira ādi samāropaḥ tatra aṃśe niścayaḥ na bhavati śakti ādi aṃśe tu samāropa abhāvāt bhavati tena samāropita viveke niścayasya pravṛttiḥ iti gamyate tad vivekaḥ eva ca anya apohaḥ tasmāt yāvantaḥ aṃśa samāropāḥ tad nirāse viniścayāḥ tāvantaḥ eva śabdāḥ ca tena te bhinna gocarāḥ anyathā ekena śabdena vyāpye ekatra vastuni buddhvā ca ananya viṣayaḥ iti paryāyatā bhavet iti 
[243,9]	tat etat api ayuktam sa vikalpaka pratyakṣasya prāk eva sādhita tvāt api ca evam pratyakṣam api apoha viṣayam prāptam tasya api asamāropa viṣaya abhāvāt na hi pratyakṣam api timira ādi nimitta āropita dvi tva ādi ākāre yathārtha avabhāsakam bhavati yadi bhavet tadā bhrānti avakāśaḥ na syāt samyak mithyā darśanayoḥ virodhāt 
[243,13]	atha yathāvat dṛṣṭe api tattve dvi tva ādi ākāra āropaḥ paścāt bhāvī tathā darśana pṛṣṭha bhāvi tvāt indriya jeyam bhrāntiḥ na yatas ca abhrānta grahaṇam anarthakam syāt tasmāt akṣaja jñānasya api āropaviveke pravṛttiḥ iti apoha viṣaya tvam prāptam atha pratyakṣasya sāmarthyāt anya vyavacchedaka tve api vastu viṣaya tvam asti na tu niścayasya kasmāt sarva ākāra grāhaka tva prasaṅgāt iti na vakṣyamāṇa uttara tvāt kim ca pratyakṣeṇa api yadi sarva ākāreṇa gṛhītaḥ arthaḥ tadā rajata ādi bhrāntiḥ api katham syāt tattva jñāna viṣaye bhrānteḥ anavakāśāt ati prasaṅgāt vā 
[243,21^1]	nanu uktam atra na hi sarvatas bhinnaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ api bhāvaḥ tathā eva pratyabhijñāyate kvacid bhede vyavadhāna sambhavāt yathā śukti tve yatra tu pratipattuḥ bhrānti nimittam na asti tatra eva asya tad darśana aviśeṣe api smārtaḥ niścayaḥ bhavati samāropa niścayayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvāt iti tat ayuktam tādātmya virodhāt kvacid vyavadhānam kvacid na iti bruvataḥ tādātmya abhyupagamaḥ virudhyate kuḍya ādi āvṛta an āvṛtayoḥ iva atha smṛta tva asmṛta tve vyavadhāna avyavadhāne vivakṣite tatas api tādātmya virodhaḥ smṛta asmṛtayoḥ bhedāt dṛṣṭā itara vat anyathā dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa tvena api bhedaḥ syāt 
[243,21^2]	atha bhrānti nimitta sadbhāva asadbhāvau vyavadhāna avyavadhāne tathā api tādātmya virodhaḥ tad viṣayayoḥ candra bhuvoḥ iva bhedāt bhrānti niścayayoḥ vāstava dharma viṣaya tva anabhyupagamāt adoṣaḥ iti ced evam tarhi dṛṣṭaḥ bhavaḥ kathaṃcid api na pratyabhijñāyate iti vācyam kvacid ityādi viśeṣa abhidhānam anarthakam pāramparyeṇa api tad viṣaya tva abhidhāne tad avasthaḥ virodhaḥ vyavadhāna pāramparyeṇa api gaṅgā maru jala niścayayoḥ bhinna viṣaya tva upalambhāt abhinna viṣaya tve dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt na hi tasya eva jñātuḥ tatra eva arthe tadā eva bhrāntiḥ abhrāntiḥ ca iti atra ubhaya prasiddhaḥ asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ śukti tva ādi dharmāṇām api paraiḥ bhinna tva abhyupagamāt adṛṣṭānta tvam śukteḥ 
[244,10^1]	api ca avastu viṣaya tve niścayasya bādhaka tvam api na prāpnoti na hi dvi candra ādi jñānam catur candra ādi bhrānteḥ bādhakam iti yuktam svapna vat iti ced na tatra bādhya bādhaka bhāvasya āvāstava tvāt tadvat abhyupagame ca prāmāṇyam vastu viṣayam dvayoḥ iti anupapannam syāt apuruṣa artham ca sarvam niścaya jñānam svapna vat syāt tasmāt vastu bala pravṛttam pramāṇa jñānam tad ābhāsasya bādhakam iti yuktam ittham etat iti ced katham na vastu viṣayam niścaya jñānam sākṣāt atad viṣaya tvāt iti ced bhramasya api vastu darśana pūrvaka tvāt tad aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ śuktikā ādi niścayaḥ yathā dṛṣṭa ākāraḥ anusandhātā na rajata ādi pratyayaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ iti ced tad aviṣayaḥ katham tasya anusandhātā iti ucyate 
[244,10^2]	tad viṣaya tve ca sarva ākāra anusandhātṛ tva prasaṅgaḥ niraṃśa tvāt tasyāḥ tatra pravartaka tvāt tad viṣaya tva upacāraḥ iti ced na pravṛtti viṣayasya api niraṃśa tvāt katham kvacid eva aṃśe niścayaḥ ucyate anekatas vyāvṛtta tvāt aneka aṃśaḥ arthaḥ kalpyate iti ced kalpyatām nāma tathā api dṛṣṭa vat niraṃśaḥ eva asau niścīyate anyathā dṛṣṭa anukāraḥ niścayaḥ na syāt tad darśanam vā ayathāvat abhyupagantavyam yathā ca darśane arthaḥ su a ākāram na aṃśena arpayati niraṃśa tvāt tasya tathā niścayasya api eka aṃśena artha ākāra tvam darśana ākāra tvam vā na yuktam niraṃśa tvāt nirākāra tve ca pratikarma vyavasthā anupapatteḥ darśanasya api vānākāra kalpanā na ca bhinna viṣayayoḥ vā bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ kvacid prasiddhaḥ samāna viṣaye tu bhūpāla ādi vat laukika parīkṣakāṇām siddhaḥ iti 
[245,2]	nanu samāna viṣaya tve api jñānayoḥ katham bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ smṛti anubhavayoḥ tad bhāva prasaṅgāt saṃplava virodhāt ca viruddhayoḥ tad bhāvaḥ iti ced sarva jñāna antareṇa virodhāt tad bhāva prasaṅgaḥ viṣaya apahāraḥ tu bhūpāla ādeḥ eva sambhavati na jñānayoḥ na hi jñānasya viṣayaḥ jñāna antareṇa apahartum śakyate sva viṣaya upadarśana mātra tvāt atas eva na jñānasya tad arthasya vā abhāva grāhakam jñānam bādhakam atiprasaṅgāt iti 
[245,8]	atra ucyate yatra arthe yat jñānam atad dharma adhyāropeṇa pravṛttam tam artham tāttvika dharmeṇa jñāna antaram gṛhṇat tasya atad dharmāropaka tvam niścinoti ayam eva ca bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ tathā ca śuktikā iyam na rajatam iti vastu tattvam gṛhṇat eva bādhakam bhavati na ca asya vastu viṣaya tve virodhaḥ kaścid asti yena vastu grahaṇa antantara bhāvi tvāt tad viṣaya tva abhimānaḥ kalpyate kim ca aneka samāropa nirāse api na vidhi mukhena dharma bhedaḥ pratibhāti yathā na ayam kharaḥ na aśvaḥ na mahiṣaḥ na gavayaḥ kim tu gauḥ iti tasmāt yāvat na vidhi mukhena niścayāḥ saṃvādinaḥ tāvantaḥ artha antara dharmāḥ daṇḍa kuṇḍala ādi vat abhyupagantavyāḥ atas ca na sarva dharma graha ādi doṣaḥ tādātmya vādinaḥ tu bhavati ayam doṣaḥ iti 
[245,18_245,21]	nanu ca bhinna dharma pakṣe api sa doṣaḥ pratipāditaḥ eva tathā ca āha yaḥ api manyate bhinnāḥ eva upādhayaḥ parasparam āśrayāt ca tad nibandhanāḥ śrutayaḥ tad ādhāreṣu vartante tatra eva vā tadā ayam aprasaṅgaḥ iti tasya api nānā upādhi upakāra aṅga śakti abhinna ātmanaḥ grahe sarva ātmanā upakāryasya kaḥ bhedaḥ syāt aniścitaḥ 
[245,23]	yadi api upādhayaḥ bhinnāḥ eva śabda jñāna antarāṇām nimittam arthe eva upalīyate tasya nānā upādhīnām upakāra āśraya śakti svabhāvasya sva ātmani abheda abhāva vat sarva ātmanā grahaṇe kaḥ eva upādhi bhedaḥ aniścitaḥ syāt sarva upādhi upakāraka tvena grahaṇāt na hi upakāraka tvam anyat eva tasya rūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇasya agṛhītam atas yadi vā asya svabhāvena grahaṇam tat eva upakāraka tvena api iti tayoḥ ātmani sambandhāt eka jñāne dvaya grahaḥ ātma bhūtasya upādhi tadvataḥ arūpa kārya upakāraka bhāvasya grahaṇāt eka jñāne dvayoḥ api grahaṇam iti eka upādhi viśiṣṭe api tasmin gṛhyamāṇe sarva upādhīnām grahaṇam tad grahaṇa antarīyaka tvāt upādhi sat grahaṇasya anyathā tathā api na gṛhyeta na hi anyaḥ eva anya upakārakaḥ yaḥ na gṛhītaḥ syāt na ca api upakārake tathā gṛhīte upakārya agrahaṇam tasya api agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt sva svāmi tva vat tasmāt artha antara upādhi vāde api samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ 
[246,7_246,11]	atha api syāt bhinnāḥ eva śaktayaḥ śaktimataḥ yā abhirūpādhīn upakaroti tatas na ayam prasaṅgaḥ iti dharma upakāra śaktīnām bhede tāḥ tasya kim yadi na upakāraḥ tatas tāsām tathā syāt anavasthitiḥ yadi pratyupādhi upakāraka tvāni tasya na sva ātma bhūtāni na api tatas upakāram anubhavanti kim tasya iti tāḥ ucyante upakāre vā sva ātma bhūtābhiḥ ayam ekaḥ śaktibhiḥ śaktīḥ upakurvan na eka upādhinā api gṛhyamāṇaḥ sarva ātmanā gṛhyate eva tathā hi eka upādhi grahaṇe tad upakāriṇyāḥ śakteḥ grahaṇam tad grahaṇe tad upakārī bhāvaḥ sva ātma bhūta sakala śakti upakāraḥ gṛhītaḥ sarvāḥ śaktīḥ grāhayati tān ca upādhīn iti tad avasthaḥ prasaṅgaḥ 
[246,17]	atha tāḥ api śakti upakāriṇyaḥ śaktayaḥ bhinnāḥ eva bhāvāt evam upādhīnām tad śaktīnām ca para aparāsu eva śaktiṣu aparyavasānena ghaṭanā yogāt saḥ ekaḥ tābhiḥ kadācid api agṛhītaḥ tad upakāra ātmā tadvat tvena na gṛhyeta yadi punar kevalān eva upādhīn śabda jñānāt upakṣipyeyuḥ tadā tasya asamāveśāt na bhavati tad pratipatti mukhena sarva pratipattiḥ tadā api tasya śabdaiḥ anākṣepāt na syāt tatra pravṛttiḥ iti vyarthaḥ śabda prayogaḥ syāt 
[246,23^1]	atha kriyā āśrayaḥ hi sarvaḥ vidhi pratiṣedhābhyām vyavahāraḥ upādhayaḥ ca tatra asamarthāḥ samarthaḥ ca na ca udyate iti kim śabda yogaiḥ tatas ca upādhayaḥ na upādhayaḥ syuḥ kvacid pravṛttau hi kasyacid pradhānasya abhāvāt tad apekṣayā tathā ucyante tasya śabdaiḥ anākṣepāt na te kasyacid aṅga bhūtāḥ iti lakṣita lakṣaṇāt adoṣaḥ iti ced samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ sa tāvadbhiḥ upādhibhiḥ na antarīyaka tayā upalakṣyamāṇaḥ ekena api upalakṣaṇena sarva ātmanā upalakṣitaḥ iti tad avasthaḥ prasaṅgaḥ kaḥ hi atra viśeṣaḥ śabdāḥ ca enam upalakṣayeyuḥ tad lakṣitāḥ ca upādhayaḥ sa tāvat tadānīm niścīyate sarva upadṛśye sūrya ādau gṛhyamāṇe api na sarvatra draṣṭṛ darśana grahaṇam asti anena etat api nirākṛtam na hi anyaḥ eva anya upakārakaḥ yaḥ na gṛhītaḥ syāt na ca api upakārake tathā gṛhīte upakārya agrahaṇam tasya api agrahaṇa pasaṅgāt sva svāmi tva vat iti evam hi sūrya grahaṇe tad upakāryasya trailokyasya api grahaṇam syāt 
[246,23^2]	na hi upakāraka tvena gṛhītāt anyaḥ eva trailokya upakārakaḥ bhānuḥ yaḥ na gṛhītaḥ syāt upakāraka grahaṇe ca upakārya agrahaṇam na asti sva svāmi tva vat iti evaṃvādinaḥ sūrya upakārya trailokya grahaṇam durnivāram syāt yat punar idam uktam tad upakārībhāvaḥ sva ātma bhūta sakala śakti upakārī gṛhītaḥ sarvāḥ śaktīḥ grāhayati tān ca upādhīn iti anena kila pāramparya upakāryāṇām api tad graha āgrahaḥ coditaḥ iti evam khalu vai sutarām sakala jagat grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ katham bhūdhana arka ādīnām anyatamaḥ arthaḥ sva upakāraka tvena gṛhyamāṇaḥ anya upakāraka tvena api gṛhyate eva sva ātma bhūtam hi tasya anya upakāraka tvam tathā gṛhītaḥ ca sarvāṇi upakāryāṇi grāhayati tāni ca anyāni sva sva upakāryāṇi tāni api anyāni iti tathā upakāra kopa kārya tvam api vastunaḥ sva ātma bhūtam eva tena vastu grahaṇe tasya api grahaṇam tathā gṛhītaḥ ca bhūdhana ādiḥ arthaḥ sva upakārakāṇi ca sarvāṇi grāhayati tāni vā anyāni sva sva upakāraka antarāṇi tāni vā anyāni iti sakala jagat grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ 
[247,15]	kim ca rūpasya yat rūpa ātma tayā grahaṇam tat eva rasa ādi upakāraka tvena tad ātma bhūta tvāt tasya tathā gṛhītam ca rūpam rasa ādīn api grāhayati iti rasa ādīnām ca cakṣuḥ grāhya tva prasaṅgaḥ tatas ca indriyāṇām niyata viṣaya tva virodhaḥ tat evam ebhiḥ prasaṅgaiḥ bhadantaḥ eva upahūyate na vayam tena eva prasaṅgasya abhyupaga tvāt asmākam yat eva viśeṣaṇam gṛhītam tad avacchedena eva viśeṣya grahaṇam iti abhyupagamaḥ na tu ekena api avacchinnam gṛhyamāṇam sarvaiḥ eva avacchinnam gṛhyate iti tathā pratīti abhāvāt yathā uktam yat eva asya svabhāvena grahaṇam tat eva upakāraka tvena api iti tat na sva upakāraka tva dharmasya tatas anya tvāt bhavatu vā upakāraka tva grahaṇam tathā api tatas artha antarāṇām upādhīnām grahaṇe kim āyātam tad agrahaṇe tad upakāraka tvam katham gṛhyate iti ced nanu tad anya agrahaṇe tad anya kārakaḥ iti na kiṃcid etat iti 
[247,26]	atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam nānā upādhi upakāra nimitta śakti abhinna ātmanaḥ arthasya sarva ātmanā grāhakaḥ upakāryasya bhedaḥ upādheḥ bhedaḥ syāt aniścayena na etat yuktam bhede sati eka grahe tad apara graha niyama ayogāt atas eva bheda niścayaḥ tad eka grahe hi abheda āśaṅkā api syāt āśraya grahaṇe api na āśrayiṇām niyamena grahaṇam bhū bhūdhara ādi grahaṇe api tad āśritānām sarveṣām agrahaṇāt atha teṣām eka deśa grahaṇam iti evam api yāvat parimāṇe asau eka deśaḥ gṛhītaḥ tāvat pradeśa sthānām sarveṣām na grahaṇam iti anaikāntaḥ tathā śarīra grahaṇe api na tad āśritānām ābharaṇa ādīnām grahaṇam iti atha sarva ātmanā tad grahaṇam na asti na tu anyat api ekam gṛhyamāṇam eka ātmanā eva gṛhyate na sarva ātmanā eka ātmanaḥ sarva ātma tva anupapatteḥ atha sāmānya āśraya sarva svadharma āśraya tvena sārvātmya iti ucyate tathā api asau sarva dharma agrahaṇe sarva dharma ādhāraḥ ayam iti evam na gṛhītaḥ vastu sthityā tu tathā abhidhāne śarīra ādikam api sarva svadharma āśraya tvāt sarva ātmanā eva gṛhītam 
[248,6^1]	atha akhaṇḍa ātmanā sarva ātmanā iti arthaḥ śarīra sva pradeśa ādeḥ api akhaṇḍa ātmanā eva grahaṇam na ca tad āśritānām sarveṣām grahaṇam iti sādhitam ca śarīra ādeḥ avayavi tvam tena akhaṇḍa ātma tvam na asiddham iti api ca agni dhūmayoḥ eka āśraya tvam tvayā api abhyupagantavyam anyathā vyadhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ syāt na ca dhūma āśraya grahaṇāt eva agni gṛhītaḥ tad ākāra apratibhāsane api tad grahaṇa kalpanāyām trailokya grahaṇa kalpanā api syāt kim ca nartakī grahaṇe sarva draṣṭṛ jñānānām grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ tad sambandhi tvāt sva jñāna vat tad abhyupagame ca tasyāḥ na anubhavaḥ aparaḥ iti asya virodhaḥ pratibhāsa virodhaḥ ca na hi parakīyāni darśanāni kasyacid aparokṣāṇi pratibhānti yathā ca tad upakāra śakti abhinna ātmanaḥ nartakyāḥ sarva ātmanā grahaṇe api na tad upakāryāṇām sarva jñānānām grahaṇam bhavati tathā upādhimat grahaṇe api na sarva upādhīnām grahaṇam iti tad grahaṇana antarīyaka tvāt upādhi sat grahaṇasya anyathā tathā api na gṛhyeta iti apramāṇakam eva uktam 
[248,6^2]	na sarva upādhi grahaṇāt eva upādhimān gṛhyamāṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sarva agrahaṇe ca eka upādhinā api agrahaṇam iti tathā hi sva darśana upādhi viśiṣṭe vyāvṛtta tvam katham gṛhyate tad anya grahaṇa abhyupagame ca eka artha grahaṇe sarva artha grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ sarveṣām tatas anya tvāt tatas ca pratyakṣa antarasya api apravṛttiḥ syāt devadatta agrahaṇe ayam sa devadattaḥ iti evam niścayaḥ mā bhūt vyāvṛtta tvam tu tad agrahaṇe api svarūpataḥ gṛhyate iti ced yadi evam upādhi antara agrahaṇe tad upakārakaḥ ayam iti evam niścayaḥ mā bhūt tad upakāraka tvam tu tad agrahaṇe api svarūpataḥ gṛhyate iti na kiṃcid etat sarva upādhīnām ekatra avasthitānām ekadā eva grahaṇam kasmāt na bhavati iti ced tathā āgrāhaka adṛṣṭa ādi sāmagrī vaikalyāt nirvikalpakena tu keṣāñcid bhavati api tathā grahaṇam sa vikalpakam tu krama bhāvi saṃjñā smaraṇa ādi sahakārī apekṣate tena krameṇa eva tat bhavati tasmāt na artha antara upādhi vāde sakala grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ gauḥ iti ādi śabdaḥ ca na kevala upādhi viṣayaḥ abhyupagamyate tatas ca tad pakṣa uktam dūṣaṇam anabhyupagamena eva parihṛtam 
[248,30]	anartha antara upādhi vāde aparihārya eva sakala upādhi grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ eka deśa grahaṇa abhedayoḥ virodhāt iṣṭaḥ eva sarva apoha grahaḥ tathā niścayaḥ tu bhrāntyā na bhavati iti ced na atra api samāna prasaṅga tvāt eka apoha niścaye tat abhinnānām sarva apohānām niścayaḥ prasajyate na hi niścayam pratyapohaḥ khaṇḍaśas bhūtvā tādātmyam jahāti atha vastunaḥ tādātmyam iṣṭam na tu apohānām na vyāvṛtti apohayoḥ anartha antara tvāt vyāvṛttiḥ ca vyāvṛttāt vastunaḥ na anyā tat katham na vastu tva ātmaka tvam apohānām yadi ca vastu viṣayaḥ na niścayaḥ tatas aniścitam eva vastu syāt aniścitam katham vyavahartum śakyate pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītam iti ced nanu kim sandigdham mugdha ātmakam pratyakṣam na eva iti ced tatas katham na niścāyakam pratyakṣam 
[249,10]	yat ca uktam na pratyakṣam kasyacid niścāyakam tat yat api gṛhṇāti na tad niścayena kim tarhi tad pratibhāsena iti tat na aniścaya pratibhāsasya sandeha ākāra tvāt na hi tṛtīyam pratibhāsam paśyāmaḥ viparīta niścayaḥ tu viparyaḥ tarka an adhyavasāyayoḥ sandeha antar bhāvāt smṛtiḥ tu anubhava ākāra anukāriṇī nirvikalpaka jñānasya api dvaividhyam saṃśaya lakṣaṇe samarthitam 
[249,15]	smṛti śabda anumāna jñānam ca niścayaḥ abhipretaḥ saḥ apoha viṣayaḥ eva na vastu viṣayaḥ iti ced na tasya api hi vastu viṣaya tvam sādhitam sādhayiṣyate ca yadi ca smārta niścayaḥ na vastu viṣayaḥ tadā katham gṛhīta grāhī tvena apramāṇam ucyate na hi artha antara viṣayam nirviṣayam vā jñānam gṛhīta grāhī iti yuktam pramāṇa antaram ca prāptam na hi tasya aprāmāṇyam pratyakṣe antarbhāvaḥ vā saṃvādi tve sati apoha viṣaya tvāt anumāna vat na api anumānam trirūpa liṅga ajanya tvāt pratyakṣa vat 
[249,21_249,25]	nanu ca pratyakṣa gṛhīte bhede bhavantī smṛtiḥ katham pramāṇa antaram sarva ākāra niścayaḥ tu saha kāri vaikalyāt na bhavati tat uktam pratyakṣeṇa gṛhīte api viśeṣe aṃśa vivarjite yad viśeṣa avasāyaḥ asti pratyayaḥ sa pratīyate yadi api aṃśa rahitaḥ sarvatas bhinna svabhāvaḥ anubhūtaḥ tathā asti na sarva bhedeṣu tāvat niścayaḥ bhavati kāraṇa antara apekṣa tvāt anubhavaḥ hi yathā vikalpa abhyāsaḥ iti niścaya pratyayam janayati yathā rūpa darśana aviśeṣe api kuṇapa kāminī bhakṣya vikalpāḥ tatra buddhi pāṭava tadvāsana abhyāsaḥ prakaraṇam iti evamādayaḥ anubhava abheda niścaya utpatti sahakāriṇaḥ teṣām eva ca pratyāsatti tāratamya ādi bhedāt paurvāparyam yathā janaka adhyāpaka tva aviśeṣe pitaram āyāntam dṛṣṭvā api iti 
[250,4]	tat etat api anupapannam na hi ayam bhāvaḥ pratyakṣāt eva vibheti yena tasya eva niraṃśaḥ bhūtvā ātmānam samarpayati kutas ca tena mantra auṣadham indrajālam śikṣitam yat ayam niraṃśaḥ api niścayam pratyaneka aṃśaḥ bhūtvā ekam eva aṃśam ātmanaḥ darśayati iti sahakāri bhedaḥ api na niraṃśam vastu khaṇḍaśas kartum śaknoti tatas niścaya bhedaḥ ced bhede api vastu bhedāt tathā eva niścīyata aneka puruṣaiḥ sūrya vat anyathā darśana bhedāt api aneka aṃśa kalpanā syāt tattvataḥ dharma bhede hi sahakāri bheda upavarṇanam yuktam bhinnānām atulya yogakṣema tvāt daṇḍa kuṇḍala ādi vat kuṇapa ādi vikalpa dṛṣṭāntaḥ api ayuktaḥ kuṇapa tva ādi dharmāṇām api bhinna tvāt anyathā atra buddhi pāṭava tadvāsanābhyāsa ādi niścāyakam asti anyatra na asti itii api tasmāt ekatra darśana adarśana vat 
[250,14^1]	atha niścaya viṣayāṇām apohānām tādātmyam na iṣyate tatas na sarva graha prasaṅgaḥ sa tarhi niścayaḥ kim apoha dvāreṇa vastuni api pravartate atha apoha mātre iti vastuni api pravṛttau prāptaḥ sarva apoha grahaḥ kasmāt anupakārake tad dvāreṇa tatra pravṛttau atiprasaṅgaḥ tad upakāraka tve ca yadi apoha upakāraka tvam vastunaḥ tat eva sarva apoha upakāraka tvam iti ākāra apoha upakāraka tvena api niścitam vastu sarva apoha upakāraka tvena eva niścitam syāt na ca sarva apoha aniścaye sarva apoha upakāraka tvam niścetum śakyate sva svāmi tva vat iti atas sarva apoha grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ kevala apoha viṣaya tve śabdānām ca bhavati tad pratipatti mukhena sarva pratipattiḥ tadā api vastunaḥ śabdaiḥ anākṣepāt na syāt tatra pravṛttiḥ iti vyarthaḥ śabda prayogaḥ syāt 
[250,14^2]	artha kriyā āśrayaḥ hi sarvaḥ vidhi pratiṣedhābhyām vyavahāraḥ apohaḥ ca tatra asamarthaḥ samarthaḥ ca na ca udyate iti kim śabda prayogaiḥ tatas ca apohānām apohāḥ syuḥ apohyamānasya hi kasyacid aṅga bhāvāt tathā ucyante tasya śabdaiḥ ākṣepāt na te kasyacid aṅga bhūtāḥ iti katham apohāḥ etena buddhi ākāraḥ antarāla vartī vā apoha śabda arthaḥ pratyuktaḥ lakṣita lakṣaṇāt iti ced samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ sa tāvadbhiḥ apohaiḥ na antarīyaka tayā upalakṣaṇaḥ ekena api upalakṣaṇena sarva ātmanā upalakṣitaḥ iti tad avasthaḥ prasaṅgaḥ kaḥ hi atra viśeṣaḥ śabdāḥ vā enam upalakṣayeyuḥ tad lakṣitāḥ vā apohaḥ sa tāvat tadānīm niścīyate sarva upakārakaḥ iti sarva grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ 
[250,31_251,5]	nanu ca tava apoha upakārakaḥ bhāvaḥ tatas artha antara apoha asambhavāt tathā api nivartamānasya apoha antara kalpanaya anavasthā prasaṅgāt tasmāt yā eva vyāvṛttiḥ saḥ eva vyāvṛttaḥ tena anya apoha viṣaye tadvat pakṣa upavarṇanam pratyākhyātam pṛthaktve hi syāt doṣaḥ jāti tadvatoḥ yat āhuḥ anya apohe api śabda arthe tad viśiṣṭasya abhidhānāt tadvat pakṣa uditaḥ sarva prasaṅgaḥ samānaḥ iti tat api pratyākhyātam tatra hi artha antaram upādāya anyatra pravartamānaḥ śabdaḥ asvātantrya ādi doṣaiḥ upahūyate na ca artha antaram anyathā vyāvṛttiḥ iti 
[251,9]	saḥ ayam ujvala kaṭanyāyaḥ anusṛtaḥ tathā hi daṇḍam upādāya daṇḍī iti śabdaḥ puṃsi pravartamānaḥ na kuṇḍala ādi abhidhāyakaḥ tena kuṇḍalī ityādi śabdaḥ api tatra sārthakaḥ syāt niraṃśasya tu kim aniścitam asti yad artham śabda antaram pravarteta punar ukta tā vā syāt śabda pratipatti bhedaḥ saṃketa bhedāt na tu vācya bhedāt asti iti ced nanu vācya bheda abhāvāt saṃketa bhedaḥ api ayuktaḥ paryāyaḥ vā syāt ghaṭa kumbha ādi vat daṇḍa ādi vat nimitta bhedasya api abhāvāt nimitta bheda abhyupagame ca na dharma dharmiṇoḥ abhedaḥ kim ca gavām bhāvaḥ go tvam iti ṣaṣṭhī vacana bheda tad hitprayogaḥ na syāt prakṛti artha atirikta artha asambhavāt 
[251,18_252,3]	nanu atra uktam dvayoḥ eka abhidhāne api vibhaktiḥ vyatirekiṇī bhinnam artham iva anveti vācya leśa viśeṣataḥ na hi vastu āyattā śabda pravṛttiḥ kim tarhi vaktri chā āyattā tena bhedam adhyāropya saṃketitā vibhaktiḥ yathā saṃketam pratīti hetuḥ bhavati yathā eka vacana arthe bahuvacanam yūyam vayam guravaḥ iti gaurava ādi khyāpana artham na ca atra saṃketa bhedasya prayojanam asti tathā hi bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepau tayoḥ dvayoḥ saṃketa bhedasya phala jñātṛ vāñcha anurodhinaḥ 
[252,5]	yadā saṃjñātā vyavaccheda antara anapekṣaḥ artha viśeṣe aśva vyavaccheda mātram jijñāsamānam jijñāpayiṣyati tadā tathā artha kṛta saṃketam śabdam anaśva tvam asya asti iti prayuṅkte yadā tu vyavaccheda antara pratikṣepeṇa tad jñāpayitum icchati tadā anaśvaḥ ayam iti atas eva pūrvatra pratikṣipta bheda antara tvāt śabda vṛtteḥ na sāmānādhikaraṇyam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ vā go tvam asya śuklam iti apratikṣipta bheda antare tu bhavati gauḥ śuklaḥ iti 
[252,11_252,15]	bhedaḥ ayam eva sarvatra dravya bhāva abhidhāyinoḥ śabdayoḥ na āptayoḥ vācye viśeṣaḥ tena kaḥ cana jijñāpayiṣuḥ artha antaram tat hitena kṛtā api vā anyā na vā yadi brūyāt bhedaḥ na asti tatas paraḥ api ca yeṣām vastu vaśāḥ vācaḥ na vivakṣā para āśrayāḥ ṣaṣṭhī vacana bheda ādi codyam tān prati yuktimān 
[252,17_252,19]	yadi nāma ete śabdāḥ puruṣaiḥ kvacid praṇinīṣitāḥ api na śakyate praṇetuḥ vastu pratibandhāt dhūma ādi vat tadā ayam upālambhaḥ syāt katham ṣaṣṭhī ādayaḥ iti yadā punar yat yathā vācaka tvena vaktṛbhiḥ viniyamyate anapekṣita bāhya artham tat tathā vācakam vacaḥ yaḥ ca ayam sarvatra vastu kṛtam eva śabda pravṛtti bhedam icchati tasya dārāḥ ṣaṇṇagarīti ādau bheda abheda vyavasthiteḥ khasya svabhāvaḥ kha tvam vā iti atra vā kim nibandhanam iti 
[252,26^1]	atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam vācya leśa viśeṣate iti tat ayuktam niraṃśasya hi leśataḥ api kutas vācya viśeṣaḥ na hi kenacid aṃśena dharma bheda upīṣyate anekānta pakṣa anabhyupagamāt atha bheda adhyāropeṇa saṃketāt tathā ucyate mithyā eva tarhi tathā pratītiḥ syāt evam astu iti ced evam tarhi vastunaḥ śabda tva kṛtaka tvayoḥ paryāyatā syāt tayoḥ śabdāt abhinna tvāt tatas ca śabda tva vat kṛtaka tvasya api ghaṭa ādiṣu na anvayaḥ syāt yat api uktam bheda antara pratikṣepa apratikṣepau iti tatra yathā tad anya bheda vyatirekeṇa api go tva ādi dharmaḥ asti tathā uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ api ca bheda antarāṇi api yadi bhidyamānān na artha antarāṇi tadā katham atad prakṣepaḥ na hi su śikṣitena api paṭaḥ tadā ātmānam tyaktvā grahītum śakyate paryāyatā ca tad avasthā eva atha artha antarāṇi tatra yadi taiḥ viśiṣṭam vastu abhidhīyate tadā vāntāśi tvam bhavataḥ prāptam prāk tyaktasya tadvat pakṣasya idānīm svīkaraṇāt 
[252,26^2]	kaḥ hi atra viśeṣaḥ sāmānya ādimat vastu abhidhīyatām apohaiḥ viśiṣṭam vā iti atha kevalāni eva bheda antarāṇi abhidhīyante tadā api artha kriyā yogyasya anabhidhānāt vyarthaḥ śabda prayogaḥ iti uktam kim ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ ca na syāt ghaṭa paṭa ādi śabda vat tad eka artha sambandha abhāvāt pāramparyeṇa eka vastu sambandhaḥ asti iti ced ghaṭa śarāva ādi śabdānām api sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi prasaṅgaḥ pāramparyeṇa eka kulāla sambandhi tvāt tebhyaḥ tatra adhyavasāya abhāvāt iti ced kim iti adhyavasāyaḥ na bhavati teṣām tatra saṃketa āvṛtteḥ iti ced evam tarhi yatra eva saṃketitāḥ tatra eva avisaṃvādi niścayam kurvantaḥ sākṣāt eva tad viṣayāḥ kim ucyate pāramparyeṇa iti na ca pāramparyeṇa api bhinna viśeṣaṇa sambandha abhāve vastu mātra sambandhe api sāmānādhikaraṇyāt upapattau ubhaya prasiddhaḥ asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhinna viśeṣaṇa sambandhe tu daṇḍya ādi śabdānām tathā ābāvaḥ sarva loka prasiddhaḥ iti asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ 
[253,20]	yat api jijñāpayiṣuḥ ityādi tat api ayuktam para abhiprāya aparijñānāt na brūmaḥ kṛttaddhita ādi śabdāḥ kvacid api eka artha abhidhāyinaḥ bhavanti iti kim tarhi teṣām eka artha abhidhāyi tve paryāyatā eva syāt bheda bhinna tva ādi śabdānām iva tathā ca śabda antara uccāraṇa vaiyarthyam guṇa pradhāna tva abhāvaḥ śukla tva ādinā iva go tvena api anvaya abhāvaḥ ca syāt dharma bheda abhyupagame ca katham na vākye asti viśeṣaḥ kaḥ cana 
[253,25]	etena yeṣām vastu vaśāḥ vācaḥ ityādi api nirastam na hi sarvāḥ vācaḥ asmābhiḥ api vastu pratibaddhāḥ iṣyante kim tarhi pramāṇa bhūtāḥ indriya buddhayaḥ iva atas eva ubhayathā darśanāt vicāryate dārāḥ ṣaṇṇagarīti ādiḥ api anukta upālambhaḥ na hi bahuṣu abahuvacanam ityādi niyamaḥ abhyupagamyate yathāsamayam śabda pravṛtteḥ abhyupagamāt tathā ca sūtram sāmayika tvāt śabdāt artha saṃpratyayasya iti na ca gavām iti eka arthe bahuvacanam sammatam na api abhede ṣaṣṭhī śābaleya ādīnām bahūnām eka dharma tve go tvasya pratīteḥ na api bahuṣu go tvam iti eva vacanam bahu tve tasya abhāva prasaṅgāt atas eva na rākṣasa ādi vat idam sva arthe tad hita vidhānam vyavahāra abhāvāt ca yathā rakṣaḥ rākṣasaḥ iti rāvaṇa ādi samāna adhikaraṇa tvena vyavahāraḥ asti na tathā go tvam ayam piṇḍaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ asti 
[254,8]	yat punar atra uktam na ca sāmānyam nāma kiṃcid asti śabda āśrayā tu buddhiḥ anādi vāsanā ādi sāmarthyāt asaṃsṛṣṭān api dharmān sṛjantī jāyate tasyāḥ pratibhāsa vaśena sāmānyam sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca vyavasthāpyate iti dignāgaḥ api āha sarve eva ayam anumāna anumeya vyavahāraḥ buddhi ārūḍhena dharma dharmi nyāyena iti tat etat ayuktam svapna ādi vat mithyā anumāna prasaṅgāt artha anvaya abhāva aviśeṣāt vastu darśana pūrvakatva viśeṣe api vā aṣpa ādeḥ api dhūma tvena avyavasitasya agni anumāpaka tva prasaṅgāt pūrva dṛṣṭa dhūma sādṛśya abhāvaḥ ca dhūma antare api samānaḥ sāmānyasya abhyupagamaḥ vā sādṛśyasya eva sāmānya śabdena abhidhānāt tat atyantā sattve vā atra sādṛśya buddhiḥ saṃvādikā na atra iti ayam viśeṣaḥ kutas syāt 
[254,18_254,21]	saṃvṛtya saṃvṛtti kṛtaḥ asti viśeṣaḥ iti ced syāt matam yatra saṃvṛtti sat sāmānyam tatra saṃvādī vyavahāraḥ bhavati na anyatra vikalpa mātra āropitam hi saṃvṛti api asat iti saṃvṛteḥ tad sāmānyasya ca svarūpam darśayati para rūpam svarūpeṇa yayā saṃvriyate dhiyā eka artha pratibhāsinyāḥ bhāvān āśritya bhedinaḥ yayā saṃvṛta nānātvāḥ saṃvṛtyā bhedinaḥ svayam abhedinaḥ iva ābhānti bhāvāḥ rūpeṇa kenacid tasyāḥ abhiprāya vaśāt sāmānyam sat prakīrtitam tat asat parama arthena yathāsaṃkalpitam tayā 
[254,27]	buddhiḥ khalu tad anya vyatirekiṇaḥ padārthān āśritya utpadyamānā vikalpikā sva vāsanā prakṛtim anuvidadhatī abhinna svabhāvam ago vyāvṛtti ādi rūpam kāraṇam bhinnam eṣām rūpam tirodhāya pratibhāsam abhinnam ātmīyam adhyavasya tān saṃsṛjantī darśayati sā ca iyam saṃvṛtiḥ saṃvriyate anayā svarūpeṇa para rūpam iti te ca tayā saṃvṛti bhedāḥ svayam bhedinaḥ api abhedinaḥ iva kenacid rūpeṇa pratibhānti tat eṣām buddhi pratibhāsam anurundhānaiḥ buddhi parivartinām eva bhāvānām ākāra viśeṣa parigrahāt bahis iva parisphuratām sāmānyam iti ucyate katham idānīm anya apohaḥ sāmānyam saḥ eva khalu anya apohaḥ tam eva gṛhṇantī sā prakṛti vibhramāt vikalpānām vastu grāhiṇī ca pratibhāti sā hi tad anya vivekiṣu eva bhāveṣu bhavantī viveka viṣaya iti gamyate 
[255,9]	nanu bāhyāḥ avivekinaḥ na ca teṣu viklpa vṛttiḥ iti katham teṣu bhavati vyākhyātāraḥ khalu evam vivecayanti na vyavahartāraḥ te tu sva ālambanam eva artha kriyā yogyam manyamānāḥ dṛśya vikalpau arthau ekīkṛtya vartante tad abhiprāya vaśāt evam ucyate tad kāritayā tat kāribhyaḥ bhinnāḥ tathā śabdena pratipādayanti iti pratibhāsa bheda ādibhyaḥ tu tattva cintakāḥ nābhedam anumanyante yadi pratipatti abhiprāyaḥ anuvidhīyate anya apohaḥ api sāmānyam mā bhūt na hi evam pratipattiḥ iti na ca kevalam evam iti pratipattiḥ vyatirikta avyatirikta eka nitya vyāpita ādi ākāraḥ api na eva pratipattiḥ kevalam abhinna ākārā buddhiḥ utpadyate tasyāḥ kaḥ āśrayaḥ iti anya apohaḥ ucyate tasya vastuṣu bhāvāt avirodhāt vyavahārasya ca śabda āśrayasya tathā darśanāt na punar kiṃcid sāmānyam nāma asti yathā iyam buddhiḥ pratibhāti iti 
[255,20]	tat etat ayuktam buddheḥ artha ākārasya prāk prapañcena pratiṣiddha tvāt sa vikalpasya pratyakṣasya sādhi tvāt tena śābaleya ādiṣu sādṛśya buddheḥ bhrānta tvam ayuktam bhrānti nimitta abhāvāt ca na tāvat indriya doṣāt iyam bhrāntiḥ sarvadā sarva puruṣa bhāsi tvāt nīla ādi dṛṣṭi vat na api sādṛśya nimittā sādṛśya antara abhāvāt na api nīla sphaṭika ādi vat anya saṃsarga nimittā sāmānya asambhave tad anya saṃsarga asambhavāt na api nīla ākāśa ādi vat dūrāt dṛṣṭi kṣobha nimittā sannihiteṣu api śābaleya ādiṣu tad sāmānyasya pratibhāsanāt na auyāna ādeḥ ca atra sambhavaḥ eva na asti na api vāsanā atra nimittam tasyāḥ svāpa ādi saka kāri rahitāyāḥ idan tayā bhrānti utpattau sāmarthya anupalabdheḥ kāma ādi abhibhūtasya strī ādi bhrānti vat iti ced tadvat eva tarhi sarvatra aviśeṣeṇa na syāt kasyacid eva syāt na hi strī ādi bhrāntiḥ sarveṣām aviśeṣeṇa artha viśeṣeṣu eva bhavati na ca tādṛś artha darśanā sambhave kevala upadeśa mātra ādi dantayā bhrānti utpatti samarthā vāsanā sambhavati na ca tad artha adarśane vāsanā eva idan tayā utpannā buddhiḥ avisaṃvādinī sambhavati 
[256,3]	yat ca uktam tad anya vyatirekiṇaḥ padārthān āśritya utpadyamāna ityādi tatra te tad anya vyatirekiṇaḥ arthāḥ kim parasparataḥ asamānāḥ samānā vā iti yadi asamānāḥ tadā tad āśrayā tat eka jātīya buddhiḥ dhūmavātī ādi āśraya saṃvādinī na syāt atha samānāḥ tadā teṣām sāmānyam eṣṭavyam anyathā katham samānāḥ svabhāvena hi visadṛśa ātmānaḥ arthāḥ tvayā iṣṭāḥ visadṛśeṣu ca sadṛśa tva buddhiḥ katham saṃvādinī śaṃkha pīta ādi buddhi vat eka sambandhāt tu visadṛśeṣu api anugata buddhiḥ avyabhicāriṇī dṛśyate yathā eka rāja svīkṛteṣu rāja puruṣaḥ rāja puruṣaḥ iti nīla ādiṣu eka dṛṣṭi sambandhāt ca dṛṣṭam dṛṣṭam iti yatra api dṛṣṭi bhedaḥ tatra api adṛṣṭi tvam nimittam iti viṣaya gata a ayavini nimitta abhāve tu tathāvidha buddhi utpādaḥ eva na sambhavati kutas tayā para rūpāṇi sva rūpeṇa saṃvriyate iti amutas saṃvṛti sat sāmānyam api na siddhyet yadi hi samāna artha darśanam vāsanā prakṛtiḥ syāt tatas tām anuvidadhatī vikalpa buddhiḥ smṛtiḥ bhavet anyathā ati prasaṅgaḥ syāt na ca sāmānya abhāve samānāḥ iti 
[256,16_256,20]	tad anya vyāvṛttiḥ eva sāmānyam iti ced na tasyāḥ prativyakti asādhāraṇa tvena ananvayāt sādhāraṇa tve ca jātyā viśeṣaḥ yathā eka jātya anvayiṣu artheṣu saṃketaḥ api gṛhyate tathā eka vyāvṛttyā anvayiṣu api kaḥ hi atra viśeṣaḥ tadvat pakṣa ukta doṣaḥ tava api anuṣajyate nanu astu nāma tadvat doṣaḥ jātiḥ anyā mā bhūt jātim api hi abhyupagacchata avaśyam bhāvānām bhedaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ tad viśiṣṭeṣu artheṣu śabda ādeḥ pravṛttiḥ astu sarvathā doṣa parihārasya kartum aśakya tvāt aniṣṭa parihāra arthaḥ hi śabda prayogaḥ tena asau vyavaccheda phalaḥ tathā hi ānaya iti abhidhāne dravya antare api ānayana yogye śaṃkā syāt tat vyavaccheda artham dhṛta grahaṇam dhṛta grahaṇam anyathā vyartham syāt evam kriyā antara vyavaccheda artham ānayana grahaṇam puruṣa antara vyavaccheda artham deva datta grahaṇam evam sarvatra vyavacchedaḥ śabda arthaḥ 
[256,27_256,30^1]	atha jātimat abhidhāne api vyavacchedaḥ na vicāryate tatra uktam vyavacchedaḥ asti ced asya na tu etāvat prayojanam śabdānām iti kin tatra sāmānyena apareṇa vā atra ucyate yadi avṛkṣa vyāvṛttaḥ vṛkṣaḥ ucyate tad vyāvṛttaḥ ca āvṛkṣaḥ iti saḥ ayam itaretara āśrayaḥ durnivāraḥ tathā hi avṛkṣa varga apratipattau na tad vyavacchedena vṛkṣa varga pratipattiḥ tad apratipattau ca na tad vyavacchedena avṛkṣa varga pratītiḥ tatas tatra na saṃketaḥ api iti avyavahāraḥ eva syāt tulyam bhavataḥ api iti ced na tulyam na hi vastu sat sāmānya vādinā kasyacid vyavacchedena kiṃcid vidhīyate kim tarhi vastu ekam puras avasthitam saṃdarśya vṛkṣaḥ ayam iti saṃketaḥ kriyate 
[256,30^2]	saṃketa kāle tatas tam artham jāti samanvitam jñātvā tad vyavahāram api pratipadyate iti nanu atra api vṛkṣaḥ ayam api ayam eva iti saṃketa anupapattiḥ na ubhayathā api sambhavāt viśeṣa an apekṣayā ayam api anyaḥ api evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti jāti apekṣayā tu ayam eva vṛkṣaḥ iti vyutpāditaḥ yatra eva vṛkṣa tvam na paśyati tam eva avṛkṣam svayam api pratipadyate dṛṣṭa viparītasya su jñāna tvāt na evam vyavaccheda vādinaḥ sambhavati samuccaya pakṣe na vyavaccheda siddhiḥ avadhāraṇa pakṣe tu dṛṣṭasya kvacid ananvayāt vyakti antare api na syāt vṛkṣa pratītiḥ 
[257,13_257,17]	nanu ca jñāna ādi eka artha kriyā kāriṇaḥ atad kāribhyaḥ vyavacchinnāḥ sarve tena ekatra api tad vyavacchedam upādāya saṃketaḥ kriyate tatas vyavahāra kāle api atatkāri vyavaccheda pratītiḥ iti kim atra asamañjasam katham asati sāmānye bhinnānām abhinnam kāryam sambhavati prakṛtiḥ eṣā bhāvānām yatas eka pratyavamarśa artha jñāna ādi eka artha sādhane bhede api niyatāḥ kecid svabhāvena indriya ādi vat jvara ādi śamane kāścid saha pratyekam eva vā yathā ca oṣadhayaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ nānātve api na ca aparāḥ 
[257,21^1]	atra ucyate yat tāvat eka artha kriyā kāri tvam tat atad pravibhāga nimittam iti tat na vāha dāha ādi artha kriyā anupalambhe api gavāgni ādi pratyaya darśanāt na ca tad akaraṇe api tad kāri tvam yuktam atiprasaṅgāt yogya tā eva tad kāri tvam iti ced kā iyam yogya tā na tāvat sva rūpam eva tasya ananvayāt tatana nvaye ca tatas vyāvṛttasya vyakti antarasya api atadbhāva prasaṅgaḥ kim ca adṛṣṭa pūrvasya api sva rūpa darśanāt tad kāritva niścayaḥ syāt atha yogyatā tasya dharmaḥ sa yadi anartha antaram tatas tad svarūpam eva tatra ca uktam dūṣaṇam atha artha antaram tatas tat eva sāmānyam na asti vivādaḥ 
[257,21^2]	etena śakteḥ tad kāri tvam iti pratyuktam abhede api niyatāḥ kecid a ityādi tat na eka sāmagrī antar patitānām indriya āloka ādīnām eka kārya kartṛ tvam yuktam na tu vyaktīnām deśa kāla vyavahitānām eka sāmagrī antaḥpāti tvan asti eka sāmagrī antaḥpāti tvam ca pratiniyata jāti upakṛtānām eva sambandha viśeṣaḥ kasmāt asambaddhānām anya jātīya sambaddhānām ca tad kārya kāri tva adarśanāt na hi asambaddhena rūpeṇa saha sambaddhena ca sparśa ādinā cakṣuḥ janayati jñānam etena oṣadhīnām eka kārya tvam vyākyātam tatra api guḍūcī tva ādi sāmānya anvayāt eka kārya anvayaḥ kṣīra dadhi ādīnām tu tad abhāvāt na tad kārya kāri tvam
