[258,9^1]	nanu atra uktam yadi hi sāmānyāt jvara ādi śamanam kāryam syāt tasya aviśeṣāt vyaktīnām kṣetra ādi bhede api cira śīghra praśamana ādi viśeṣaḥ guṇa tāratamyam ca na syāt iti uktam idam ayuktam na hi yatra ekam sāmānyam asti tatra anyaḥ sāmānya viśeṣaḥ saha kāri antara viśeṣaḥ vā na asti yena tad kārya vaiṣamyam na syāt na ca sāmānyam eva tad kārya kāraṇam iṣṭam kim tarhi tad anvita vyaktayaḥ tāḥ tu avāntara sāmānya viśeṣa upetāḥ avāntara viśeṣa upetāni tādṛśāni kāryāṇi kurvanti saha kārī antara viśeṣa upetāḥ tu anyādṛśāni api kāryāṇi iti tathā ca evaṃjātīya sahakārī upetāt evaṃjātīyāt kāraṇāt evaṃjātīyam kāryam bhavati iti anumānam api upapadyate sāmānya abhāve tu sāmagrī antara sahakāriṇām api atyanta bhinna tvāt kutas anvayaḥ tad abhāve kutas anumānam iti apravṛttiḥ eva syāt kārya viśeṣa arthinām kāraṇa viśeṣeṣu 
[258,9^2]	tad kāri tvam tu yadi sādhāraṇam tatas asādhāraṇebhyaḥ anya tvāt tat eva sāmānyam iti uktam na ca tad kārya adarśane api tad kāritva niścayaḥ asti na hi ekatra kulāla ādi niścaye api anyatra adṛṣṭa tad kāryeṣu kulāla kuvinda ādiṣu tat niścayaḥ kabhavati yathā ekatra vyutpannasya anyatra adṛṣṭa tad kāryeṣu api viṣa agni ādiṣu svarūpa āvalo pranāt eva tat niścayaḥ iti yadi ca tad kāriṣu atad kāribhyaḥ vyavacchedena śabdaḥ api vartate tad ānayana āloka ādiṣu eka kārya kāriṣu atad kāribhyaḥ vyāvṛtteḥ ekaḥ śabdaḥ pravarteta śābaleya ādi bheda vat bhinna jātīya vyavahāraḥ ca na syāt kārya antara bhedāt bheda vyavahāraḥ iti ced na kārya antara bhedasya prativyakti sambhavāt sāmānya vyavahāra ucchedaḥ syāt na ca kiṃcid kāryam kevalena cakṣuṣā janyate yena tatra eva satad kāribhyaḥ vyāvṛtteḥ cakṣuḥ śabdaḥ pravartitaḥ sarvatra jātīya vijātīya kārakam ūhāt kārya utpatteḥ upalambhāt tasmāt sāmagryām eva śabdaḥ pravartitaḥ 
[258,30^1]	atha viśeṣam pratyekasya eva kāraṇa tvam atha aneka kāraṇa janyasya api ghaṭasya mṛd piṇḍāt eva mṛd svabhāva tā tad kulālāt eva sanniveśa viśeṣaḥ iti ghaṭa ātmaka tve tad viśeṣasya katham na aneka kāraṇa janya tvam ghaṭasya api vā aneka kāraṇa janya tvam na syāt bhede tu tādātmya abhyupagama hāniḥ kim ca kulāla kṛtā eva mṛd svabhāva tā tad sanniveśaḥ tu mṛd kṛtaḥ kasmāt na iṣyate tad anvaya vyatireka abhāvāt iti ced katham abhāvaḥ kulāla abhāve api valmīka ādau mṛd svabhāva tā upalabdheḥ iti ced sarvasya api ghaṭa kāraṇasya abhāve tad upalabdheḥ mṛd piṇḍaḥ api tad hetuḥ na syāt 
[258,30^2]	anyā tatra mṛd asti hetuḥ iti ced anya sadbhāve api katham tatas anyasya mṛd piṇḍasya hetu tvam atiprasaṅgāt mṛtvam tatra api asti iti ced saḥ ayam ghoṭa ārūḍhasya vismṛtaḥ ghoṭaḥ iti vṛttāntaḥ ghaṭa śarāva ādīnām anyonya vyāvṛtta svabhāva tvāt tad dhātūnām mṛdām katham eka kārya kāri tvam atad kāri vyāvṛtta tvam vā sāmānyam syāt sāmānya vādinām tu mṛd jātīye hetau sati eva mṛd jātīyasya utpādaḥ tad abhāve ghaṭavalmīka ādīnām api mṛd jātīya tvam na syāt iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām viśeṣataḥ api kārya kāraṇa bhāva vyavasthāpanam yuktam sāmānya abhāve tu atyantam vilakṣaṇeṣu eka ākāra pratīti pratyabhijñā api na syāt 
[259,15_259,19]	yat punar atra uktam jñāna ādi artha kriyām tān tān dṛṣṭvā bhedena kurvataḥ arthān tad anya viśleṣa viṣayaiḥ dhvanibhiḥ saha saṃyojya pratyabhijñānam kuryāt eva anya darśane iti tat ati durmati vispanditam na hi artha kriyām dṛṣṭvā eva tat eka ākāra pratyayaḥ bhavati gavāgnipanasa ādiṣu tad artha kriyā anupalambhe api eka ākāratā upalannāt iti uktam na ca nāma saṃyojanena eva pratyabhijñā bhavati aprasiddha samayasya api hi sajātīyeṣu ekatra avasthiteṣu api jaṅgameṣu vā amīṣām eva eka ākāra tā yaḥ asya ākāraḥ saḥ eva asya ākāraḥ iti ca pratyabhijñā bhavati 
[259,24^1]	nanu ca ekām jñāna ādikām artha kriyām paśyataḥ vāsanā prabodha udaye mithyā pratyayaḥ bhavati anyathā tu bheda saṃsargavatī buddhiḥ na syāt yathā daṇḍiṣu na hi tatra eka daṇḍa yoge api anyatra saḥ eva ayam iti bhavati kim tarhi tat iha iti na ca evam pratyabhijñānam kim tarhi tat eva idam iti na asiddha tvāt na eva hi vyakti antare tat eva idam iti pratyabhijñā bhavati kim tarhi saḥ eva asya api ākāraḥ tat eva asya api vā rūpam tad jātīyam eva idam iti vā na ca atra bādhā asti tat na iyam bhrāntiḥ yadi tu bhinneṣu abhinna ātma vyavasāyinī pratyabhijñā syāt tadā bhavet mithyā yathā dīpa ādiṣu 
[259,24^2]	yāvatā yathā eva daṇḍaḥ tad adhikaraṇa tvena saḥ asya iti evam vā tad viśeṣaṇa tvena vā pratibhāti tathā sāmānyam api ākāra rūpa sādṛśya ādi śabda abhilapyam tad adhikaraṇa tvena tat asya iti evam vā tad viśeṣaṇa tvena vā pratibhāti iti jala marīcikā ādiṣu iva āsāmānyeṣu eka ākārā iyam buddhiḥ iti ced na tatra api sāmānya mātrasya nimitta tvāt katham tarhi bhrāntiḥ tad sāmānyena saha dṛṣṭasya udaka tva ādeḥ adharma ādi upakṛtayā smṛtyā adhyāropaṇāt nanu saḥ eva ākāraḥ tat na sāmāṇyam yena bhrāntiḥ na syāt na api sarvatra tadvat āropitaḥ eva sāmānya ākāraḥ pratibhāti tadvat bādhaka abhāvāt atyanta anupalabdhasya kharaśṛṅga ādi vat āropāsambhavāt tad sahita sāmānya agrahaṇe ca tad āropaḥ na syāt marīciṣu gardabha ākāra vat tatas ca anicchatā api sāmānyam svīkāryam 
[259,24^3]	nanu vyaktīnām eka artha janana śaktiḥ eṣṭavyā tāsām anyebhyaḥ bhidyamānāḥ tādṛśam pratyayam janayantu kim tatra sāmānyena iti ced na etat asti yasmāt sāmānyam eva yogyatā ākhyā śaktiḥ tathā hi tantu ādayaḥ tad sāmānya darśane sati ete paṭa ādi janana yogyāḥ iti niścitāḥ tad arthibhiḥ upādīyante carama śakti grahaṇe tu tadā kāryasya siddha tvāt tad arthinām tatra pravṛttiḥ na syāt na ca svarūpam eva śaktiḥ adṛṣṭa kāryeṣu svarūpa grahaṇe api tad sāmarthya niścaya abhāvāt bhrānteḥ aniścayaḥ iti ced bhrāntiḥ kutas nivartate tad kārya darśanāt iti ced pravṛtti viṣayeṣu katham na hi tat eva vyakti antareṣu api svarūpam yena ekatra api tat niścaye anyatra api tat niścitam syāt sāmānya vat 
[259,24^4]	anya kārya grahaṇe ca anya śakti niścaye ati prasaṅgaḥ syāt abhinna ākāra jñāna grahaṇe sarvatra tad śakti niścayaḥ iti ced nanu etat eva uditam bhinneṣu abhinna ākāram jñānam katham avisaṃvādi syāt vastu sāma arthyāt iti ced utsannā tarhi padārthānām bhinna ākāra vyavasthā śukleṣu eva nīla pīta ādi ākāram jñānam vastu sāmarthyāt avisaṃvādi bhaviṣyati iti pāda prasārikā upapatteḥ kim ca buddhīnām api prati artha bhidyamānānām eka tvam ayuktam jātitaḥ api eka tvam na sambhavati tatra api jāteḥ anabhyupagamāt evam anyāsāmartha kriyāṇām anyonya vyāvṛtta ākāra tvāt katham kutas tad hetūnām eka artha kriyā kāri tvam abheda vyavahāra nimittam syāt iti yat api āha 
[260,26_260,28]	eka pratyavamarśasya hetu tvāt dhīḥ abhedinī ekadhī hetu bhāvena vyaktīnām api abhinnatā iti tat api asāram yatas pratyavamarśasya api katham eka tvam kim vyaktitaḥ atha jātitaḥ iti vyaktitaḥ tāvat ayuktam krama bhāvi aneka vyakti darśanāt prati puruṣam tad anya tvāt atīta anāgata ādīnām dhiyām tat eka janakatvā sambhavāt ca na api jātya eka tvam jāteḥ anabhyupagamāt tatra api eka pratyavamarśa hetu tva kalpane anavasthā syāt tatas ca nimitta eka tva pratipattau eva upakṣīṇa śakti tvāt mūlavyaktiṣu abheda buddhiḥ na syāt tasmāt jāti ekatva grahaṇa nibandhanaḥ eva vyaktiṣu abheda vyavahāraḥ iti yat ca idam uktam 
[261,3_261,5]	tulye bhede yayā jātiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati kvacid na anyatra sā eva astu śabda jñāna nibandhanam iti idam api kucodyam na hi evam bhavati yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍa sūtra ādikam prasarpati kvacid na anyatra sā eva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣa sphaṭika ādiṣu daṇḍi sūtrī ityādi vyavahāra nibandhanam astu kim daṇḍa sūtra ādinā iti hetu sāmagrī niyamāt ca niyata jātimat kāryam bhavati na ca sā eva sāmagrī sthira aśeṣa vyakti anugatāḥ gauḥ ityādi niścaya śabdeṣu nimittam bhavitum arhati viśiṣṭa vyavahārasya ca viśeṣaṇa grahaṇa apekṣi tvāt nanu ca vyaktayaḥ kim viśiṣṭa jñāna hetavaḥ bhavanti vā na vā yadi bhavanti kim sāmānyena no ced tadā tad jñānāt tatra pravṛttiḥ na syāt 
[261,12_261,14]	eka vastu sahāyāḥ ced vyaktayaḥ jñāna kāraṇam tat ekam vastu kin tāsām nānātvam samapohati atha na bhedaḥ janana virodhī kim tarhi kaivalyam tena eva sahitāḥ janayati eva katham tarhi vyaktīnām sāmarthya gatiḥ pratyekam tāsām abhāve api tad sadbhāvāt sāmānye sati eva bhāvāt iti na anaikāntika tvāt nīla ādīnām anyatama apāye api cakṣuḥ jñānam janayati na tu netra apāye api nīla ādayaḥ tathā api teṣām na asāmarthyam iti 
[261,18_261,21]	yat api uktam tāsām anyatama apekṣyam tat ced śaktam na kevalam tat ekam upakuryuḥ tāḥ katham ekām dhiyam ca na yadi bhinnāḥ api abhinnam sāmānyam upakurvanti tathā eva śakti jñānam eva upakurvantu kim tatra antar gaḍunā sāmānyena iti tat api ayuktam na hi evam bhavati yayā śaktyāḥ nīla ādayaḥ cakṣuḥ upakurvanti tayā jñāna viśeṣam eva kurvantu kim cakṣuṣā tathā daṇḍa upakāraka śaktyā daṇḍī iti jñānam eva karotu puruṣaḥ kim daṇḍena evam hi sarva saha kāryākṣepaḥ syāt iti 
[261,27_261,30]	nanu ca sahakāri sāmarthyāt api katham vastuṣu śabdaḥ pravartate yatas śabdāḥ saṃketitam prāhuḥ vyavahārāya sa smṛtaḥ tadā sva lakṣaṇam na asti saṃketaḥ tena tatra na yatra hi sva lakṣaṇe vyavahārāya saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ tat sva lakṣaṇam tadā vyavahāra kāle na asti tasya deśa kāla vyakti bhedān āskandita tvāt tasmāt na tatra samayaḥ na api sāmānye niṣphala tvāt yaḥ hi vāha dāha ādi artha kriyā samarthaḥ arthaḥ sa na śabdena codyate iti kim śabda prayogaiḥ sāmānye abhidhānāt eva pravṛttiḥ vyaktiṣu tad sambandhāt iti ced na sati api sambandhe daṇḍam chindhi iti ukte daṇḍiṣu pravṛtti adarśanāt na api sambhavāt vyaktau pravṛttiḥ evam hi asambaddha pralāpi tvam syāt tatas anyatra pravṛttiḥ valī vardda doha codana ādi vat nirādhārasya sāmānyasya asambhavāt tat ca udanātaḥ vyakti codanā iti ced na vyakti apāye kevalasya api anavasthānāt kim ca kṣīra udaka ādi pāna codanātas tad ādhāra pāna codanā prasaṅgaḥ kim ca kriyā guṇa ādi śabdaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ ca na syāt iti 
[262,10]	atra ucyate asmābhiḥ api ayam doṣaḥ teṣām udbhāvanīyaḥ ye gauḥ ityādi śabdā jāti vācakāḥ eva iti āhuḥ vayan tu go tva ādi śabdāḥ jāti vācakāḥ gavā ādi śabdāḥ tu jāti viśiṣṭa vyakti vācakāḥ eva iti tatra eva ca saṃketaḥ kriyate vyaktiṣu śabda pravṛttau jāteḥ ānarthakyam iti ced na kevala vyaktiṣu anantāsu saṃketasya kartum aśakya tvāt jāti viśiṣṭeṣu api anivṛttam ānantyam iti ced na tatra ānantyasya aprayojaka tvāt yatra idam go tvam sa sarvaḥ api gauḥ iti evam saṃketa grahaṇe deśa kāla ākāra antarite api yatra yatra go tvam paśyati tat sarvam gauḥ iti pratipadyate sāmānya abhāve tu yudhiṣṭhira ādi śabda vat ekatra kṛta saṃketaḥ artha antare na pratyaya hetuḥ iti tam na kuryāt na hi asāmānya vādinām sarva vyaktiṣu abhinnam nimittam asti 
[262,20]	yadi evam saṃketaḥ vidhīyate pācaka ādiṣu kim abhinnam nimittam iti ced pacana tva ādi viśiṣṭam karma evaṃjātīyasya karmaṇaḥ yaḥ kartā sa sarvaḥ pācakaḥ iti evam saṃketaḥ kriyate tatas ca yat uktam karma āśritā jātiḥ katham artha antare pratyaya hetuḥ iti tat nirastam pāramparyeṇa hetu tvāt jātitaḥ karmasu anvayaḥ tad anvayāt tad kartṛṣu anvayaḥ iti atītam karma smṛtam śabdāt avagatam vā viśeṣaṇam anāgatam api anumānena vā adhigatam tad anavagamena sandehaḥ kim ayam pācakaḥ na vā iti asataḥ katham nimitta tvam iti ced na tad viṣayasya jñānasya nimitta tvāt jñānam eva astu sarvatra iti ced na viśeṣaṇa jñānasya nirviṣayasya hetu tve tad viśeṣya jñānasya mithyātva prasaṅgaḥ viṣāṇī puruṣaḥ ityādi jñāna vat atīta anāgata viśeṣaṇa jñānena ca tad rūpa viśeṣaṇa avacchedena eva viśeṣya jñānam utpāditam saṃvādikam bhavati apākṣīt ayam pācakaḥ pakṣyati ayam pācakaḥ iti anyathā avagatau ca bhrāntiḥ eva syāt iti 
[263,2]	sāmānya viśeṣa ādi śabda pravṛttau tarhi kim nimittam tatra api asti ekam lakṣaṇam sāmānyasya eka ātmanaḥ ananta bhedeṣu sva avacchedena anvayi jñāna hetu tvam nitya abheda ātmanaḥ anekatra samaveta tvam vā viśeṣaṇa tvena vyāvṛtta pratyaya hetu tvam viśeṣāṇām lakṣaṇam sāmānya viśeṣa rahita tvena tad avaccheda udayi jñāna viṣaya tvena vā sādhyate sāmānya ādhāra tvam sthāṇu ādi vat iti na ca tatra avayava ādi viśeṣaḥ asti niravayava tvāt tulya dharma tvāt tulya dharmaṇaḥ antya viśeṣa tve siddhe tad dṛṣṭānta upakṛta anitya dravya tvāt atulya dharmaṇaḥ api nitya dravya tvasya antya viśeṣavatva siddhiḥ 
[263,10]	yadi punar śabda buddhi ādīnām iva antya viśeṣa abhāve api tulya dharmaṇām api anyena kenacid viśeṣeṇa viśeṣa tvam kaścid upapādayet tatas na asmākam antya viśeṣaiḥ kiṃcid prayojanam tatra eva ca antya viśeṣa saṃjñām kariṣyāmaḥ ye nitya dravyeṣu asādhāraṇa viśeṣāḥ te antya viśeṣāḥ iti arthaḥ sthitam etat sāmānya lakṣaṇa nimittaḥ sāmānyeṣu śabdaḥ pravartate viśeṣeṣu tad lakṣaṇa nimittaḥ iti evam padārtha varga ādi śabdāḥ prāc abhāva ādi śabdāḥ ca pratiniyata lakṣaṇa nimittāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ iti 
[263,17]	nanu tad sāmānya ādi lakṣaṇam yadi anekatra anvayi tatas tat api sāmānyam eva syāt tatas ca sāmānya ādiṣu sāmānya abhāva abhyupagamaḥ virudhyate atha ananvayi tadā tatas katham bhinneṣu abhinna śabda pravṛttiḥ syāt iti atra kecid āhuḥ sarvatra bhinneṣu abhinna śabda pravṛtti nimittam sāmānyam eva tat ca kvacid vidhīyamānam kvacid pratiṣidhyamānam kvacid sākṣāt kvacid pāramparyeṇa iti sāmānya ādiṣu pāramparyeṇa eva iti atas na abhyupagama virodhaḥ 
[264,2^1]	atha vā sāmānya ādiṣu sāmānya pratirūpakaḥ kaścid dharmaḥ asti yatas sāmānya ādi śabda pratyayau bhinneṣu api anugatau bhavataḥ śabda pratyaya anugama hetoḥ katham na sāmānya bhāvaḥ iti ced na niṣkriya ādi śabda pratyaya anugama hetu nānā ekāntāt kutas tarhi sāmānyatat pratirūpaka viveka avagamaḥ pratyaya anugama vailakṣaṇyāt yaḥ hi avyutpannasya api pratyaya anugamaḥ sāmānya nibandhanaḥ tad vilakṣaṇaḥ tu dharma mātra nibandhanaḥ na hi pratyakṣeṣu api go tva ādiṣu abhāva bhedeṣu ca nīla ādiṣu iva aprasiddha samayasya api eka ākāra tā avagamaḥ bhavati 
[264,2^2]	kim ca sāmānyavatsu saṃśayaḥ prāpnoti tad nivṛtti artham teṣu viśeṣaḥ eṣṭavyaḥ teṣu api viśeṣeṣu sāmānyam tatas saṃśayaḥ tad nivṛtti artham tatra api viśeṣaḥ punar teṣu api sāmānyam iti anavasthā syāt iti tasmāt na sāmānya ādiṣu sāmānyam asti yadi punar śabda pratyaya anugama hetoḥ sarvasya api dharmasya sāmānya saṃjñā kriyate tadā sāmānya ādiṣu api sāmānyam bhavatu kaḥ virodhaḥ viśiṣṭam tu sāmānyam tatra na asti iti uktam dharmāḥ ca ekatra api dharmiṇi bahavaḥ santi tena śabdāḥ api tad nimittāḥ tāvantaḥ eva tatra pravartante tat katham sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi anupapattiḥ 
[264,16]	nanu ca bhinna pravṛtti nimittayoḥ ekatra vṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ucyate na vastutas tat sambhavati tathā saṃketa abhāvāt na hi nīla śabda arthe utpala śabdaḥ saṃketitaḥ utpala śabda arthe ca nīla śabdaḥ iti saṃketa anapekṣaḥ ca na śabdaḥ artha vācakaḥ iti atiprasaṅgāt kim ca nīla śabdāt eva tad artha pratītau utpala śabda ānarthakyam syāt apratītau ca aneka artha tvam na hi yaḥ yasmāt na pratīyate sa tasya arthaḥ iti yuktam tasmāt vikalpa pariniṣṭhitaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ pratibhāti bāhyaḥ iva ekaḥ iva anartha kriyā kārī artha kriyā kārī vā tatra ayam sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi vyavahāraḥ tatra eva ca dharma dharmi vyavahāraḥ api parasparam tattva anya tvābhyām avācyaḥ pratanyate sa ca mithyā arthaḥ eva vyavahāraḥ tena asamānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti 
[264,26]	atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam tathā saṃketa abhāvāt nīla ādi śabdānām na eka artha tvam iti tat na tadvati saṃketa kāraṇāt tatas ca utpalatva viśiṣṭam artham utpala śabdaḥ abhidhatte nīla guṇa viśiṣṭam ca nīla śabdaḥ iti tatas ca yatra ubhaya viśeṣaṇa yogaḥ tatra ubhau api śabdau pravartete na ca anyatara ānarthakyam bhinna dharma avacchedena artham abhidadhatoḥ atulya artha tvāt dharmī apekṣayā tu sāmānādhikaraṇyam nanu evam utpala śabdaḥ rakta utpala ādikam api abhidhatte nīla śabdaḥ tu kāka ādikam api iti katham dvayoḥ eka artha tvam na eṣa doṣaḥ sāmānyena kṛta saṃketaḥ api śabdaḥ prakaraṇa ādibhiḥ pratiniyataḥ eva arthe vyavasthāpyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ atas eva viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhāvaḥ api upapadyate nīla śabdaḥ hi aneka viśeṣa dharma upete arthe sāmānyena dṛṣṭaḥ tathā eva artham pratipādayan viśeṣa aka aṃkṣām janayati tatas tad viśeṣa pratīti artham utpala śabdaḥ prayujyate tathā utpala śabda artha viśeṣa prati iti artham nīla śabdaḥ iti 
[265,11^1]	yat ca uktam vikalpa pariniṣṭhitaḥ śabda arthaḥ tatra eva ayathārthaḥ sāmāna adhikaraṇya vyavahāraḥ iti tat ayuktam na hi sva ātma eka sambandhe vikalpa pariniṣṭhate vādinoḥ vipratipatti sādhana dūṣāṇa upanyāsa saṃpratipatti pravṛtti ādikam sambhavati bhrāntitaḥ tathā abhāve svapna ādibhiḥ aviśeṣaḥ tatas ca vivekinām śāstra praṇayanam api anarthakam syāt tad pratibaddha janmanām vikalpānām atad prabhā asi tve api vastuni avisaṃvādaḥ prabhāyām iva maṇi bhrānteḥ iti ced na asiddha tvāt na hi artha prāpti mātrāt eva avisaṃvādaḥ kim tarhi yad deśa kāla ākāra tayā arthaḥ pratibhātaḥ tathā eva yadi asau prāpyeta anyathā marīci ādi jñānasya api kathaṃcid udaka prāpteḥ avisaṃvādaḥ syāt kim ca tad pratibaddha janmanām iti kaḥ ayam pratibandhaḥ tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ tāvat vikalpa sāmarthyena vāstavena āropitena vā saha na sambhavati 
[265,11^2]	su a ākāreṇa ca tādātmyam sarva jñānānām samānam tad utpattiḥ ced vikalpa pratibhāsinaḥ sāmānya ākārasya sattva anabhyupagamāt katham tatas pāramparyeṇa api utpattiḥ prāpyāt utpattiḥ tu kṣaṇika vādinām na kasyacid sambhavati kim ca rajata ādi buddheḥ prāpaṇīya śuktikā ādi arthāt utpatteḥ avisaṃvādi tva prasaṅgaḥ atha yathāvyavasita arthāt utpattiḥ avisaṃvādi tve nimittam tatra maṇi jñāne kim sāmānya ākāraḥ vyavasīyate atha sva lakṣaṇa ākāraḥ iti sāmānya ākāraḥ ced katham tatas utpattiḥ tasya avastu tvena ajanaka tva abhyupagamāt atha sva lakṣaṇa ākāraḥ tatra api kim pūrva dṛṣṭa ākāraḥ kim vā tad anya sva lakṣaṇa ākāraḥ iti yadi pūrva dṛṣṭa ākāraḥ saḥ anyatra avidyamānaḥ katham utpādakaḥ atiprasaṅgāt 
[265,29_265,31]	atha tad darśana āhita vāsanā krameṇa utpattiḥ tatas utpattiḥ ucyate prabhāyām maṇi jñānasya api tarhi tatas utpattiḥ syāt tasya api tad vāsanā prabhava tvāt atha yatra pravṛttiḥ saḥ adhyavasīyate tatas utpattiḥ ca avyavadhānena iti na tasya ananubhū tvāt na hi piśāca ādi vat atyantān anubhūtaḥ arthaḥ vyavasātum śakyate keśoṇḍaka ādi ākāraḥ api prāk abhūtaḥ eva smṛtyā kvacid āropya adhyavasīyate tadvat atra api iti ced na tarhi tad adhya vasita ākārāt utpattiḥ kim ca adhyavasāyaḥ api vikalpaḥ eva sa ca na bāhya ālambanaḥ iti kṛtāntaḥ tat katham bāhye adhyavasāyaḥ bhavati atad viṣayaḥ ca katham tena adhyavasīyate atiprasaṅgāt 
[266,6]	yat api uktam vyākhyātāraḥ khalu evam vivecayanti na vyavahartāraḥ te tu sva ālambanam eva artha kriyā yogyam manyamānāḥ dṛśya vikalpau arthau ekīkṛtya pravartante tad abhiprāya vaśāt evam ucyate iti tatra ekīkṛtya iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim vikalpe dṛśya ākāram āropya kim vā dṛśye vikalpa ākāram āropya iti prathame pakṣe vikalpa abhimukhyena eva dṛśya arthinaḥ pravṛttiḥ syāt rajata arthinaḥ śuktikā abhimukhyena iva dvitīye tu pakṣe arthe pravṛttiḥ na prāpnoti na hi ananubhūte śuktikā ādau rajata ādi ākāram āropya pravartamānaḥ kaścid upalabhyate 
[266,13_266,17]	kim ca ghṛtam ānaya iti coditaḥ svāminā yaḥ api taila ādikam ānayati saḥ api akuśalaḥ na syāt ubhayasya vikalpa ākāra adhyāropeṇa aśabda arthe pravṛtteḥ aviśeṣāt na hi anabhipreta artha kriyā yogye śabdaḥ pāramparyeṇa api pravartate tatra saṃketa asambhavāt yat ca uktam yathā rūpa āloka cakṣuḥ ādiṣu vyavahāra lāghava artham kaścid saṃketam karoti yavaḥ rūpa avijñāna hetuḥ saraḥ vā iti tathā anye api ye kiṃcid ekam sādhayanti eke na sādhyante vā te api sakṛt pratyaya artha brīhi ādi śabdāḥ kṛta saṃketāḥ kathyante iti viṣamaḥ ayam upanyāsaḥ tatra hi jñānam eva ekam nimittam saṃketa grahaṇe astu deśa ādi bhedena anantāsu ca vyaktiṣu na abhinnam kāryam kāraṇam vā asti iti uktam 
[266,22]	yat api āha tatra eva anena yogyāḥ te arthāḥ codanīyāḥ te ekena śabdena ca udyeran bahubhiḥ vā iti svātantryam atra vaktuḥ iti tat api aparyālocita abhidhānam yasmāt na atra vaktuḥ svātantryam nivāryate kim tarhi śābaleye kṛta saṃketaḥ go śabdaḥ katham mahaṣādi bhedeṣu iva abhinna nimittam antareṇa bāhuleya ādiṣu gṛhīta saṃketaḥ bhavati agra hīta saṃketaḥ ca katham pratipattim karoti atiprasaṅgāt na ca śābaleya bāhuleya ādibhiḥ saha ekam kāryam kurvan eka sādhanena janyamānaḥ vā anubhūtaḥ yena eka sādhya nimittaḥ sādhana nimittaḥ vā śabdaḥ pravarteta yogyatā āśrayaṇe ca sāmānyam eva nāma antareṇa iṣṭam bhavati anyathā vyakti rūpa vat aniścitā eva yogyatā syāt tasmāt ekam anekatra vartamānam ekām śrutim pravartayati anvaya buddhim ca janayati iti yuktam 
[267,2^1]	nanu ca kā iyam tasya anekatra vṛttiḥ kim ādheya tā kuṇḍabadara vat uta vyaktiḥ iti na tāvat ādheya tā nityasya anupakārya tvāt nityasya kim kurvāṇaḥ ādhāraḥ syāt tasya tatra samavāyāt ādhāraḥ iti ced kaḥ ayam samavāyaḥ apṛthak siddhānām āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ tat eva idam anupakārakasya āśraya tvam na sambhāvayāmaḥ atiprasaṅga bhayāt tasmāt samavāya saṃyoga eka artha samavāya ādayaḥ api vastu sambandhāḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt na vyatiricyante na api sthāpakaḥ eva ādhāraḥ sthāpakaḥ hi anupakārakaḥ katham syāt sāmānyasya ca nitya vyāpaka tvena sadā avasthānāt vyatirikta sthiti asambhava ādi vyatireke sthāpaka vaiyarthyam sāmānyasya anitya tā ca 
[267,2^2]	vyatirekeṇa avasthitau anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ iti atha avyaktasya vyaktibhiḥ vyakte sāmānyasya tatra vṛttiḥ ucyate na tat etat rūpa akaraṇe vyañjaka vaiyarthyāt tasmāt ye sva jñānam prati param apekṣante te avaśyam tadā ātmānam pratilabhante sāmānyasya tu na kutaścid ātma pratilambhaḥ sambhavati tasmāt na tat kenacid vyaṅgyam kim ca vyañjakasya ca jātīnām jāti mattā yadi iṣyate prāptaḥ go tva ādinā tadvān pradīpa ādi prakāśakaḥ iti 
[267,17^1]	atra ucyate vṛttiḥ ādheya tā vyaktiḥ ca ubhayam iṣyate tat ca ubhayam api sāmānyasya tat tasya samavāyaḥ eva yat uktam na anupakārakasya āśraya tvam yuktam tat na anupakāraka tvasya asiddha tvāt tad sahitasya viśiṣṭa jñānam hi kāryam eva upakāraḥ sva ātma bhūtaḥ ca upakāraḥ na kvacid upalabhyate na hi yaḥ yena janitaḥ tasya tena upakāraḥ kṛtaḥ iti prasiddhiḥ asti na ca janakaḥ eva ādhāraḥ kuṇḍasya bada rājanakasya api tad ādhāra tvāt nanu atra uktam prakṛtyā eva guruṇaḥ dravyasya asamāna deśa kārya utpādana dharmiṇaḥ samāna deśa kārya utpādana bhāvaḥ ādhāra kṛtaḥ tasmāt pūrva kṣaṇa sahakāri kuṇḍam tatra eva badara kāryam janayat ādhāraḥ iti ucyate iti na kṣaṇika tva asiddheḥ tat asiddhim ca uttaratra niṣedha yoṣyāmaḥ tasmāt pāta pratibandhakaḥ eva badara ādīnām kuṇḍādiḥ ādhāraḥ pāta pratibandhaḥ ca saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ eva tad abhāve hi pāta karaṇāt sahakāri sākalyam hi kārakāṇām śaktiḥ asākalyam vā śaktiḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[267,17^2]	tena saṃyoga viśeṣe sati tad abhāva sahakāri vaikalyāt pātaḥ na bhavati iti tad hetuḥ kuṇḍādiḥ pratibandhakaḥ ucyate atha vā kasmāt tayoḥ eva asau saṃyogaḥ sa hetu sāmagrī sāmarthyāt tayoḥ eva samavetasya utpādāt samavāyaḥ api kasmāt tayoḥ eva iti ced anyatara samavāyinaḥ tad dharma tvena sva hetu sāmarthya niyamitasya utpādāt nityayoḥ tu svabhāvaḥ anyatara nityasya tu sahakāri viśeṣa sāmarthyāt utpadyamānena ādhāreṇa ādheyena vā yathāsambhavam samavāya niyamaḥ iti nityasya api yathāsahakāri viśeṣaḥ sambhavati tathā uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ pratyakṣataḥ api kuṇḍa badara ādīnām saṃyogaḥ pratibhāti tasya adhikṣepaḥ gomaya pāyasīyam nyāyam ākṣipati tat na hetu phala bhāvaḥ eva āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ kin tu pāta pratibandhakaḥ eva badara ādeḥ kuṇḍādiḥ ādhāraḥ sāmānyasya tarhi pāta abhāvāt ādhāra anupapattiḥ na anyathā sāmānya guṇa karma ādīnām ādhāra pratipādanāt avayavi vicāre 
[268,9^1]	astu vā sthāpaka tvam sarva ādhāra vyāpi lakṣaṇam katham tatra tāvat patatām badara ādīnām gati nivṛtti lakṣaṇa sthitiḥ kuṇḍa ādibhiḥ kriyate avayavi guṇa karma ādīnām ca krameṇa sva ātma prakāśanam kārya antara karaṇam ca sthitiḥ sā tad ādhāra sāmarthyāt bhavati tad ādhāra abhāve hi anityānām vināśaḥ eva gatiḥ sāmānyasya tu asāmarthya prāptiḥ sā ca satya ādhāreṇa bhavati iti ādhāraḥ sthāpakaḥ ucyate ghaṭa ādi stha guṇa ādi dṛṣṭāntena nitya āśraya sthānām api krameṇa aneka kārya kartṛ tvam sthiti śabda vācyam āśraya sāmarthyāt avagantavyam 
[268,9^2]	na ca sahakāri antaram sarva tad kārya utpāde nimittam bhavati atas na anyatra api āśraya tva prasaṅgaḥ sva ātma stham ca darśayati ādhāraḥ na hetu antaram atas ca prāptaḥ go tva ādinā tadvān pradīpa ādiḥ iti ayuktam yadi api vastu svabhāvāt sva hetu sāmarthyāt vā kaścid eva kasyacid eva adharaḥ na sarvasya iti tathā api kuṇḍa ādi badara ādīnām idam atra iti ādhāra ādheya bhāvena upalambhaḥ sambandha āvinā abhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti dravya guṇa ādīnām api sambandha nimittaḥ api vyavasthāpyate sa ca sambandhaḥ saṃyoga ādi vilakṣaṇa tvāt samavāyaḥ iti ucyate tasmāt asti samavāya lakṣaṇā sva ādhāreṣu sāmānyasya vṛttiḥ iti 
[268,24]	atha kim ākāśa ādi vat sarva gatam sāmānyam kim vā sva āśraya mātra gatam yadi sarva gatam tadā ekatra abhivyaktam sarvatra abhivyaktam eva abhinna ātmaka tvāt tasya na kvacid anupalambhaḥ syāt vastu saṅkara prasaṅgaḥ ca sarva piṇḍeṣu sarva sāmānya sadbhāvāt kaścid eva piṇḍaḥ kasyacid eva vyañjakaḥ tatas na saṅkara doṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na niyama hetu abhāvāt kim ca vyañjaka apratipattau hi na vyaṅgyam sampratīyate viparyayaḥ punar kasmāt iṣṭaḥ sāmānya tadvatoḥ 
[269,1]	sāmānyam eva vyañjakam prāptam iti atha sva āśraya mātra gatam tat api asambhavati tathā hi anyatra vartamānasya tatas anya sthāna janmani sva sthānāt acalataḥ anyatra vṛttiḥ iti ayuktimat yatra asau vartate bhāvaḥ tena sambadhyate api na tad deśinam ca vyāpnoti kim api etat mahā adbhutam na yāti na ca tatra āsīt asti paścāt na ca aṃśa vat jahāti pūrvam na ādhāram aho vyasana santatiḥ iti 
[269,10^1]	atra eke pariharanti sva āśraya sarva gatam eva sāmānyam tatra eva upalambhāt na ca saṃyoga samavāya ādi sambandha abhāve piṇḍa antarāla ādiṣu sāmānyam vyapadeṣṭum śakyate yat punar etat anyatra vartamānasya ityādi tat na pramāṇa siddhasya vastu svabhāvasya upahāsa mātreṇa tyaktum aśakya tvāt vicitrā hi padārthānām śaktiḥ tena sāmānyasya eva īdṛśī śaktiḥ yayā hetu viśeṣaiḥ utpadyamāne arthe pūrva sthānāt acalat eva vartate calane hi pūrva sthānam tat śūnyam syāt yat api yatra asau vartate ityādinā ati adbhutam śaṅkitam na etat api adbhutam padārtha śakti vaicitryāt eva 
[269,10^2_269,26]	yathā mantra ādi saṃskṛtam astram udara stham vyādhi viśeṣam chinatti na udaram sūtra ādikam ca oṣadhi saṃskṛtam na agniḥ dahati tad upari bhājana stham taṇḍulam pacati kapotaḥ ca gṛha upari sthitaḥ eva pādau ābhyantara sthite dadhi ādau vinyasyati tathā sāmānyam api īdṛś śaktimat go tvam gopiṇḍena eva sambadhyate na tad avayava ādibhiḥ tad deśaiḥ iti anyatra utpadyamānena āśrayeṇa anyatra avasthitam sāmānyam katham sambadhyate iti ced tad āśraya utpādaka hetu sāmarthyāt atra api vastu svabhāvaḥ eṣa yena mūrtam vastu deśa antara saṃyoga utpādaka hetu sāmarthyāt deśa antare bhavati pūrva saṃyoga nivartaka hetutaḥ tatra na bhavati sāmānyam tu āśraya utpādaka hetutaḥ tatra bhavati tad nivartaka hetutaḥ tu na tatra bhavati iti vināśa utpāda rahita tvam ubhayatra api samānam kevalam sambandha asambandha hetu vailakṣaṇya mātram iti yat punar etat bhinna deśābhyām aṃśavataḥ eva sambandhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ āloka rajju vaṃśa daṇḍa ādi vat na ca sāmānyam aṃśa vat iti tat api avayavi dūṣaṇa nirākaraṇāt deśa kāla ityādi prasaṅga dūṣaṇe ca ukta uttaram iti 
[269,30]	nanu pralaya avasthāyām sarva ghaṭa ādi vināśe ghaṭa tva ādi sāmānyam kva asti na kvacid nanu kim vinaṣṭam na tasya nitya tvāt nityam vidyamānam na kvacid asti iti kā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ tadā nirādhāram eva asti iti eṣā vācoyuktiḥ bhūta bhāvya ādhāra apekṣayā tu tadā api sāmānyam ucyate na ca avyapadiśyamānam asat eva bhavati na ca sarveṣām ghaṭa ādīnām yugapad vināśaḥ iti atra asti pramāṇam nanu purāṇa ādiṣu pralayaḥ mahāpralayaḥ ca śrūyate satyam kin tu lokatraya vināśaḥ pralayaḥ saha aṇḍena caturdaśa sthāna vināśaḥ mahāpralayaḥ sarvāṇḍānān tu yugapad na vināśaḥ tena aṇḍa antareṣu ghaṭa ādayaḥ santi yadi punar sarvāṇḍānām vināśaḥ tadā sarva kriyā uparame rātrīḥ ca tāvatīḥ ca eva iti virudhyate na hi antareṇa kriyām kālaḥ parimātum śakyate iti alam prasaṅgena iti 
[270,11]	astu vā sarva gatam sāmānyam tat ca na ākāśa vat sarva saṃyuktam na api sattvāt go tva ādi api sarva samavetam kim tarhi sannidhi mātreṇa sarvatra asti yat ca anyatra abhāvaḥ tat na yatas sarvatra api vidyamānam yatra eva samavetam tatra eva upalabdhi yogyam tena tasya samavāyena ādhāraḥ vyañjakaḥ ca ucyate tat na jāti saṃkara upī iti nanu tat eva vyaktau upalabhyamānam anyatra api asti tat kim na anyatra api upalabhyate kaḥ evam āha upalabhyamānāt anyatra upalabhyate kim tarhi vyakti antarāla ādeḥ tad ādhāra vat vyañjaka tvam na asti tena tatra upalabdhi abhimānaḥ na bhavati na ca ādhāra tad sambandha grahaṇa adhīna tvena agrahaṇe atra idam iti pratyayaḥ bhavati 
[270,20]	yat punar etat vyañjaka apratipattau hi ityādi tat na aniyamāt na ayam niyamaḥ vyañjaka pratīti pūrvikā eva vyaṅgya pratītiḥ iti api tu viśeṣaṇa pratīti pūrvikā eva viśeṣya pratītiḥ iti ayam niyamaḥ tatas ca ghaṭa ādi arthaḥ api prakāśa ādi viśeṣaṇam yadi syāt tatas prāk eva gṛhyeta viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tva abhāve tu vyakti jātyoḥ api aniyamena grahaṇam yaugapadyena vā na ca sva pratipattyā para pratipatti hetuḥ vyañjakaḥ iti vyañjaka lakṣaṇam iṣyate indriya ādeḥ apratītasya api vyañjaka tvāt tasmāt sat eva vastu yat vaikalyāt anupalabhyam āsīt tat tasya vyañjakam na ca jāti vikalā vyaktiḥ kadācid āsīt yena jātiḥ eva vyakti vyañjikā syāt iti 
[270,29]	yat punar etasya upalabhya abhimatasya anupalabdheḥ abhāvaḥ anupalabhyatāyām ca tad darśana āśrayāḥ śabda pratyabhijñāna ādayaḥ na bhaveyuḥ iti tat na anupalabdheḥ asiddha tvāt nanu sataḥ api vyaktiṣu sāmānyasya upalabdhiḥ na lakṣyate sā hi varṇa saṃsthāna ākāravatī vibhāvyate na ca īdṛśam sāmānyam na ca tatas anyaḥ kaścid ākāraḥ daṇḍiṣu daṇḍa vat pratibhāti na ca ākāra bheda apratibhāsane api vastu bheda vyavasthāpanam yuktam atiprasaṅgāt iti na etat asti samāna tā ākāreṇa hi sāmānyam pratibhāti na vyaktiḥ iti uktam yat tu daṇḍa vat na pratibhāti tad padārthānām itaretara vaidharmyāt atas eva sāmānyam padārtha antaram daṇḍa vat pratibhāsane tu dravya antarbhūtam eva syāt deśa bhedena agrahaṇa ādayaḥ tu hetavaḥ prāk nirastāḥ eva avayavi vicāre tena tatas api na asattva siddhiḥ iti 
[271,11^1]	nanu vyaktayaḥ svabhāvena eva yadi samānāḥ kim tatra apareṇa sāmānyena vaiyarthyāt atha asamānāḥ tatas katham tāsu sāmānyam samānānām bhāvaḥ hi sāmānyam ucyate na ca sāmānyena eva samānaḥ kriyate tad sāmanya hetuka tvāt iti ucyate svabhāvena eva samānāḥ svaḥ bhāvaḥ svakīyaḥ dharmaḥ tad aviyogī sāmānyam eva ucyate tena eva saṃśliṣṭāḥ samānāḥ pratibhānti abhidhīyante ca iti atas katham sāmānya vaiyarthyam atha svabhāvena iti anvayi dharma vyatirekeṇa iti abhipretam tad abhāve api katham samānāḥ atiprasaṅgāt kim ca daṇḍa ādeḥ api vaiyarthya prasaṅgaḥ svabhāvena eva daṇḍinaḥ kuṇḍalinaḥ ca bhaviṣyanti kim ca darśanasya api vaiyarthyam tad abhāve api dṛṣṭāḥ arthāḥ iti evam tarhi yathā svabhāvena adaṇḍinaḥ api daṇḍa yogāt daṇḍinaḥ bhavanti tathā sva rūpeṇa asamānāḥ api sāmānya yogāt samānāḥ iti prāptam na sāmānyasya yāvat vyakti sambandhi tvāt 
[271,11^2]	etat eva kutas iti ced vastu svabhāva tvāt dahana śīta druta ādi vicitra svabhāva vat yadi sāmānyam na upalabhyate kim āśritya sarva upasaṃhāreṇa vyāpti saṃketayoḥ pratipattiḥ bhavati apoham āśritya iti ced na tasya niṣiddha tvāt kim ca tasya api upalabhya abhimatasya anupalabdheḥ abhāvaḥ anupalabhyatāyām vā tad darśana āśrayāḥ śabda pratyabhijñāna ādayaḥ na syuḥ na ca asau daṇḍiṣu daṇḍa vat ākāra bhedena upalakṣyate vikalpa āropita mātrasya ca asataḥ kha puṣpa ādi vat na āśraya tvam yuktam anya parihāreṇa pravṛtteḥ anya vyāvṛttiḥ eva śabda arthaḥ iti ced vastu ābhimukhyena pravṛtteḥ vastu eva kim na śabda arthaḥ pratyakṣa vat vastu grahaṇe api tad anya parihāreṇa eva pravṛttiḥ pratyakṣāt ca pravṛttiḥ tvayā āpīṣṭāḥ na hi ābhyām artham paricchidya pravartamānaḥ artha kriyāyām visaṃvādyate iti abhidhānāt 
[272,6_272,12]	yat ca vastunaḥ śabda artha tve bādhakam tat parihṛtam parihariṣyate ca dvividhaḥ ca śabda arthaḥ vācyaḥ gamyaḥ ca tatra gauḥ ityādi śabdānām jāti viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ eva vācyaḥ atad vyavacchedaḥ tu gamyaḥ nāgauḥ ityādi śabdānām tu atad vyavaccheda viśiṣṭaḥ vācyaḥ sāmānyam tu gamyam tasya atyanta abhāve tu tad atad varga pravibhāgaḥ api na syāt iti uktam tasmāt sāmānya grahaṇa āśraya eṣa ananta vyaktiṣu vyāpti saṃketayoḥ pratipattiḥ iti tat evam sthitam etat vyakti bhede api dṛṣṭa eka sāmānya viśiṣṭa artha anumāpakam anumānam dṛṣṭam iti tasmin pakṣe sūrya gati ādi anumānam api dṛṣṭam eva sambandhi vailakṣaṇye api abhinna jāti tvāt gateḥ parvata ādi vailakṣaṇye api agni jāti vat 
[272,15^1]	anye tu bruvate yatra anumeyam prāk dṛṣṭam pravṛtti uttara kāle ca draṣṭum śakyate yadi na naśyeta pramātṛ sadharmāṇām vā puṃsām kadāpi dṛṣṭam tad anumānam dṛṣṭam tad vilakṣaṇam tu sāmānyatodṛṣṭam iti asmin pakṣe sūrya ādi gati anumānam api sāmānyatodṛṣṭam eva kim atra liṅgam deśa antara prāptiḥ kim idam deśa antaram diś deśaḥ atha vā deśaḥ vā syāt ubhayam na pratyakṣam tad vṛtti saṃyogaḥ api vāyu giri saṃyoga vat na pratyakṣaḥ tat katham tena asiddhena gatiḥ anumīyate kevalam ayam āditya maṇḍalam paśyati na deśa antara śabda vācyam kiṃcid iti anumitā deśa antara prāptiḥ liṅgam iti adoṣaḥ katham deśa antara prāptimān ādityaḥ 
[272,15^2]	dravya tve sati kṣaya vṛddhi pratyaya aviṣaya tve ca prāṅmukha upalabhya tve ca anutpanna pāda vihārasya api parivṛttya pratyaya viṣaya tvāt maṇya ādi vat iti evam tarhi niṣkriya eka abhimukhasya arka candra ādi bimbam paśyataḥ arddha ghaṭikā ādi utsthāna pratipattiḥ na syāt tasmāt anyaḥ kaścid dharma viśeṣoḥ ka ādeḥ prāpti viśeṣa anumāpakaḥ vaktavyaḥ pratyakṣā vā prāptiḥ diś ādi pradeśa antareṇa yathā arddha ghaṭikā ādi pratītiḥ syāt na ca pratyakṣa apratyakṣa vṛtti tvena vāyu giri prāpti vat apratyakṣa tvam na hi dṛṣṭe anupapannam nāma kutas ca arddha ghaṭikā ādi pratītiḥ avisaṃvādinī yadi anyatra anyat nimittam ghaṭamānam kiṃcid ucyate tat eva astu na asmākam nirbandhaḥ iti tat punar sva artha para artha bhedena dvividham dṛṣṭam sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam ca ekam dvividham vidyate 
[273,2^1]	tatra para upadeśa anapekṣam sva artham tad apekṣam ca para artham iti na evam dvividham yuktam sva artha para artha asambhavāt vaktṛ apekṣayā anuvādaḥ śrotra pekṣayā tu sva artham eva kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣeṇa vā anumānena vā śabdena vā anugatam liṅgam iti tat na lakṣaṇa bhedāt tad upapatteḥ dṛṣṭa ādi bheda vat atas eva na vaktrapekṣayā ityādi yuktam na hi vaktṛ apekṣayā śrotra pekṣayā vā anumānam dṛṣṭam ucyate sāmānyatodṛṣṭam vā kin tu lakṣaṇa apekṣayā bhavatu vā vaktrapekṣayā para artham yatas eva vaktuḥ tad apekṣā na asti anuvādaka tvāt atas eva para prati iti artham tena upanyastam iti pārārthyam tasya astu vā śrotra pekṣayā svayam vyāpti smaraṇa ādau mūḍha tvāt sāmarthya vikalaḥ parasmāt pratipādakāt artham prayojanam anumāna ākhyam prāpnoti iti para artham ucyate 
[273,2^2]	yat punar kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ iti uktam tatra parihāraḥ para upadeśaḥ tu pañca avayavam vākyam iti etat uktam bhavati yaḥ hi śabdam cakṣuḥ ādi vat sva svarūpa mātreṇa liṅgam brūte vaktrapekṣam sva artham eva na hi paraḥ tatra anumāna artham śabdam uccāritavān kin tu apratīta dhūma ādi prati iti artham na api śrotā vyāpti smaraṇa ādau mūḍhaḥ param apekṣate yaḥ tu liṅgam pratipadyamānaḥ api vyāpti smaraṇa ādau mūḍhaḥ pañca avayavena vākyena pratibodhyate tasya tad vākya apekṣam anumānam para artham uktam tad moha nivartana viśeṣeṇa iti atra gṛhīte api vyāpti ādau tathā tva asmaraṇam eva mohaḥ tena sandigdhasya api pratibodhakam para artha anumānam bhavati iti 
[273,19_273,27]	nanu ca saḥ ayam paramaḥ nyāyaḥ iti abhidhānāt vākyam eva anumānam tat kim ucyate tad apekṣam iti na vākyasya upacāreṇa anumāna tva abhidhānāt na hi vākyam sākṣāt anumiti sādhanam tasya samartha hetu prakhyāpanena eva caritārtha tvāt nimitta prayojanayoḥ abhāvāt anupacāraḥ iti ced na tad upapatteḥ tathā hi nimittam tāvat tādarthyam sādhanam vā tad pravṛtti artham vākyam tad sādhakam vā tad śabdena uktam prāk avasthitam api anumiti sādhanam vākyena śaktimat kriyate prayojanam punar saḥ ayam paramaḥ nyāyaḥ iti atra eva vakṣyāmaḥ gauṇasya mukhya apekṣi tva jñāpana artham para upadeśa apekṣam iti uktam nanu evam uktam para upadeśaḥ pañca avayava vākyam iti kim punar atra vākyam ucyate kutas saṃśayaḥ vipratipatteḥ 
[273,30^1]	kecid atra bruvate varṇa vyatiriktāḥ pada vākya ātmānaḥ śabdāḥ santi yathā svam artham parisphuṭayantaḥ sphoṭa ākhyām labhante iti na pramāṇa abhāvāt na hi tathābhūta śabda astitve pramāṇam asti na na asti pratyakṣa artha āpattyoḥ sambhavāt pratyakṣeṇa eva tāvat abhinna ākāra jñānena padam vākyam ca pratīyate na ca bhinneṣu abhinna buddhiḥ avisaṃvādinī yukta avayavi pratyakṣa tve api ayam eva nyāyaḥ saḥ atra kid na mṛṣyate kim ca sphoṭa abhāve artha pratītiḥ na syāt na hi varṇānām samastānām vyastānām vā artha pratipādana sāmarthyam asti samudāya asambhavaḥ iti ced na tad abhāve sarva agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt iti uktam na ca evam sphoṭa abhāve kiṃcid aniṣṭam āpadyate 
[273,30^2]	kim vā avayava agrahaṇe api avayavi buddhi vat varṇa agrahaṇe api pada ādi budhi a bhāvāt kim ca varṇeṣu eva vibhakti anta tvena śiṣṭaiḥ pada saṃjñā karaṇāt suptiṅantam padam te vibhakti antāḥ padam iti ca tad saṃketa anusāreṇa varṇeṣu eva pada buddhiḥ bhavati iti tat na pratyakṣa grāhyaḥ sphoṭaḥ na api atha pratipatti anyathā anupapattyā varṇebhyaḥ eva artha pratīteḥ sphoṭāt artha pratītau ca varṇa uccāraṇa vaiyarthyam syāt tad vyañjaka tvāt na vaiyarthyam iti ced na samāna doṣa tvāt ye doṣāḥ artha vyañjaka tve varṇānām sphoṭa vyañjaka tve katham na atas yena ca prakāreṇa sphoṭa vyañjaka tvam iṣṭam tena artha vyañjaka tvam eva astu kim iti prayāsena iti 
[274,18]	ye api āhuḥ varṇaiḥ santānena ākāśe vartamānaiḥ padam ārabhyate padaiḥ tu vākyam iti tad matam api sphoṭa nirākaraṇa nyāyena nirākartavyam varṇa vyatireka pakṣasya sarvasya api sphoṭa samāna tvāt 
[274,22_274,26^1]	varṇa samūhaḥ padam pada samūhaḥ vākyam vākya samūhaḥ prakaraṇam prakaraṇa samūhaḥ yathāsamayam pādaḥ vā āhnikam vā adhyāyaḥ vā tad samūhaḥ śāstram iti katham punar kṣaṇikānām varṇānām samūhaḥ sambhavati na eva atra vana ādi vat avasthitānām samūhaḥ vivakṣitaḥ kin tu kalpanayā yāga ādi kriyā samūha vat katham punar varṇa samūhaḥ padārtha jñānasya hetuḥ katham ca na syāt antya varṇa aśravaṇe padārtha jñāna anutpatteḥ antya varṇa kāle pūrva varṇānām tirobhāvāt ahetu tvam iti na ca antyasya eva hetu tvam adhastana uccāraṇa anarthakya prasaṅgāt iti atra eke bruvate vinaṣṭ nām api hetu tvam asti yathā iṣṭa deśa prāptau antya kriyā kāle adhastana kriyāṇām iti tat na asiddha tvāt antyakriyā eva tatra hetuḥ na naṣṭāḥ kriyāḥ naṣṭānām janaka tve pramāṇa abhāvāt antya varṇāḥ eva tarhi padam 
[274,26^2]	na ca adhastanā narthakyam adhastana anuccāraṇe antya tva asambhavāt pūrva kriyā anutpattau antyakriyāvat iti viṣamaḥ ayam upanyāsaḥ tarhi yatas hi dūra deśa sthasya abhipreta deśāt pūrva pūrva deśaiḥ saha saṃyogaḥ yāvat na sambhavati tāvat uttarottara pradeśaiḥ saṃyogaḥ na bhavati tena pūrva pūrva pradeśāt uttarottara pradeśa saṃyoga arthāni karmāṇi upakārīṇi sambhavanti yaḥ tu abhipreta deśa anantara deśa sthaḥ sa karma antarāṇi akṛtvā eva abhipreta deśena saṃyujyate na ca atra pūrva pūrva varṇān uccāraṇe abhipreta varṇāt cāraṇam aśakyam yena tat uccāraṇam api arthavat syāt iti 
[275,8]	pūrva varṇa saṃskāra apekṣaḥ antyaḥ varṇaḥ padam iti ced na saṃskārasya sākṣāt anubhava utpattau sāmarthya anavadhāraṇāt anyathā hi liṅga śabdau api saṃskāra apekṣau eva artha pratipattim kariṣyataḥ kim vyāpti saṃketayoḥ smṛtyā kalpitayā iti evam tarhi pūrva saṃskārāḥ smṛtīḥ janayanti tābhiḥ saha antyaḥ varṇaḥ padam iti na jñāna yauga padya pratiṣedhāt ekām eva tarhi smṛtim mecakām janayantu tayā saha antyaḥ varṇaḥ padam iti na pratibandha abhāvāt eka ātma samavāyi tva pratibandhe deśa kāla viṣaya bhedena utpannānām api saṃskārāṇām eka smṛti janaka tva prasaṅgaḥ etena tebhyaḥ eka saṃskāraḥ tasmāt ca ekā smṛtiḥ iti eṣā api kalpanā pratyuktā tāḥ etāḥ kalpanāḥ vākya pakṣe api kṛtvā dūṣayitavyāḥ samāna nyāya tvāt iti 
[275,18]	anye tu āhuḥ prathama varṇena viśiṣṭaḥ dvitīyaḥ pratīyate dvitīyena viśiṣṭaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tāvat yāvat antyaḥ varṇaḥ sa ca evam viśiṣṭena anubhavena saha padam vākye api eṣā kalpanā yadi kriyate tatas apratīta arthaiḥ api padaiḥ viśiṣṭam antya padam vākyam syāt tena atra evam kalpanā padārtha jñāna kāle pada jñānasya vinaśyattā dvitīya pada jñānasya utpadyamāna tā tatas dvitīya pada jñānam pūrva pada padārtha avacchinnam utpadyate paratham apada saṃketa smṛteḥ vināśaḥ tṛtīya pada jñānasya utpadyam āna tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ tatas dvitīya pada padārtha viśiṣṭam tṛtīya pada jñānam sambhavati evam pada śate api yojyam smṛti anubhavayoḥ virodhaḥ na asti vijātīya tvāt tena smṛteḥ smṛti antarāt eva vināśaḥ uktaḥ anubhavasya anubhava antarāt eva iti 
[275,27]	atha vā prathama pada jñānena saṃketa smaraṇāt vinaśyat avasthena eva pada viśiṣṭam tad padārtha jñānam utpādyate tena tad padārtha avacchinnam dvitīya pada jñānam iti evam pada śate api yojyam evam viśiṣṭam antya padam vākyam ucyate na ca atra pūrva pada smṛtyā prayojanam tad kṛtasya arthasya viśeṣaṇa anukta viśeṣya jñāna utpādāt eva siddha tvāt iti 
[276,2]	tat etat api ayuktam uttara pade hi jñānam aneka varṇa anubhava krameṇa utpadyate tat katham vinaśyat avasthena pūrva pada jñānena tad artha jñānena ca uttara pada jñānam janyate tasya prathama varṇa anubhavāt eva naṣṭa tvāt kim ca akṛta prayojanasya ati bilambita uccāraṇe api padārthasya vākya arthasya ca pratipattiḥ bhavati varṇa antarāle pada antarāle ca kṣut niṣṭhīvana ādikam api karoti yadā tadā api artha pratītiḥ bhavati eva tat na pūrva uttara varṇayoḥ padayoḥ ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣa bhāvaḥ iti 
[276,9]	anye tu veda ādi abhyāsa balena saṃskārasya saṃskāra hetu tvam prasādhya vākyam anyathā kalpayanti prathama pada jñānena saṃskāraḥ janyate tad sahitena dvitīya pada jñānena viśiṣṭaḥ anyaḥ saṃskāraḥ janyate evam uttara uttara padeṣu api upāntya padam yāvat viśiṣṭam saṃskāra utpattiḥ cintanīyā sa ca saṃskāraḥ uttara pada anubhava anantaram eva pūrva padeṣu ekām smṛtim janayati tayā anubhavena ca viśiṣṭam antya padam vākyam saṃketa smṛtiḥ tu cintyate vākye saṃketā yogāt pade tarhi katham tatra api antya varṇa anubhava anantaram pūrva varṇeṣu saṃkete ca ekā eva smṛtiḥ utpadyate iti 
[276,17_276,22]	pare tu aprasiddha arthānām api padānām vākya tva prasaṅga bhayāt anyathā vākyam kalpayanti pada saṃskāreṇa padārtha jñānena ca viśiṣṭaḥ saṃskāraḥ kṛtaḥ tad sahitena dvitīya pada jñanena anya s tad sahitena dvitīya padārtha jñānena anyaḥ tad sahitena tṛtīya pada jñānena eva iti evam upāntyapadam yāvat tatas pūrvavat anti apadam smṛti anubhava sahitam vākyam antya padārthasya eva vākya artha tvāt tena tatra saṃketa smṛtiḥ api na cintitā pūrva pada padārtheṣu antya pada saṃkete ca ekā smṛtiḥ iti anye 
[277,2]	apare tu antya padārthasya eva vākya artha tvam na anumanyante pradhānasya vākya artha tvāt na ca antya padārthasya eva pradhāna tvam guṇa pradhāna bhāvasya aniyata tvāt ādi madhya pade api pradhānam kriyā ākhyam kartṛ saṃjakam vā anyat vā pratīyate eva te tu evam kalpayanti antya pada padārtha jñānena api pūrva saṃskāra sahitena viśiṣṭaḥ anyaḥ saṃskāraḥ janyate punar adṛṣṭa vaśāt avasthite antya pade anubhavaḥ tatas sarva pada padārtheṣu ekā smṛtiḥ tayā anubhavena ca viśiṣṭam antyam padam prathama padārthe api viśiṣṭām pratipattim kurvat vākyam ucyate iti nāśa hetau sati api adṛṣṭa vaśāt na nāśaḥ iti atiśraddheyam buddhīnām api evam kasmāt na kalpyate iti smṛti sthāne mānasam pratyakṣam eva kalpayanti anye tasya tri kāla viṣaya tvāt adṛṣṭa ādi sahakāri viśeṣaḥ ati prasaṅga nivārakaḥ saṃskāra viśeṣa ārambham eva smaraṇa vādinā api abhyupagantavyaḥ tad varam mānasam eva pratyakṣam astu vyāpti grahaṇa ādiṣu api asya abhyupagata tvāt iti 
[277,14]	aparaḥ tu āha sā hi śuddha pada padārtha grahaṇa apekṣiṇaḥ amānasāt bhavatu tatas sarva vākya mātra grahaṇāt vākya artha a agamaḥ bhavati tena antya pada grahaṇa anantaram kriyā kāraka anvaya sahiteṣu pada padārtheṣu adhyavasāya ākhya mānasam pratyakṣam bhavati tad sahitam antya padam vākyam iti tat api asamīkṣya uktam kasmāt tausala abhipreta artha siddhi prasaṅgāt yadi evambhūtam pratyakṣam iṣyate tadā vākyena kim kalpitena tad artha pratipattiḥ tu mānasa pratyakṣāt eva padārtha grahaṇa apekṣiṇaḥ bhavatu tatas sarvam vākyam daśa dāḍima ādi tulyam iti evaṃvādinaḥ abhipreta artha siddhiḥ syāt kaḥ hi atra viśeṣaḥ yena kriyākāraka anvaya ādiṣu eva mānasam pratyakṣam iṣyate na tad viśiṣṭe arthe vākya artha tvena abhiprete kim ca aśabda ātmaka tve vākyasya pramāṇa antara tva prasaṅgaḥ śabda ātmaka tve tu katham saṃketa nirapekṣāt tatas artha pratipattiḥ atiprasaṅgāt sūtra virodha prasaṅgāt ca na ca vākye saṃketaḥ asti apūrva vākyāt api artha pratīti darśanāt 
[277,25^1]	kim ca antya padārtha jñāna samakalam eva antya padasya api naṣṭa tvāt na vākya artha pratītiḥ śābdī na ca antya padārthena pratīyate tadā ca nāśa hetau sati api adṛṣṭa vaśāt anāśa pūrva padānām api avināśa kalpanā prasaṅgaḥ tulya nyāya tvāt tasmāt yat iṣṭā eva vākya saṃjñā vyavahāra mātreṇa tad arthānām saṃsarga viśiṣṭa pratyayaḥ tu mānasaḥ eva padam api na pūrva smṛti apekṣaḥ antyaḥ varṇaḥ kramasya bāhya indriya aviṣaya tvāt tad krama agrahaṇe ca na pada bhāva pratītiḥ tasmāt saṃtānena ākāśe vartamānāḥ krama viśiṣṭāḥ yugapad manasa anubhūtāḥ padam iti tausalaḥ kim ayam yugapad anubhavaḥ śrotra apekṣaḥ 
[277,25^2]	anapekṣaḥ vā iti śrotra apekṣaḥ ced tatra varṇānām yugapada samavāyāt na yuktaḥ śrotra anapekṣa tve ca atiprasaṅgaḥ śrotra vaiyarthyam vā adhiryā bhāva prasaṅgaḥ ca śrotreṇa ekaikam gṛhītvā tu yugapad manasā gṛhṇāti iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt tad ā aśubhau i tvāt mithyā abhimānaḥ śatapatra bheda vat vilambya vilambya uccāraṇe ca tathā abhimānaḥ api na asti krama pratiprattiḥ api asti tasmāt pūrva grahaṇa upakṛta bāhya indriyeṇa api kramaḥ gṛhyate iti kāla viśiṣṭasya kataham bāhya akṣa grāhya tvam iti ced na gandha viśiṣṭasya cakṣuḥ grāhya tva vat tad sambhavāt iti 
[278,14_278,18^1]	yat ca uktam śabda ātmaka tve vākyasya katham saṃketa nirapekṣāt tatas artha pratipattiḥ iti tat na anabhyupagamāt saṃketa abhāvasya pada samūhaḥ hi vākyam uktam teṣām saṃketa grahaṇe katham vākyasya tad abhāvaḥ na hi sarva vṛkṣāṇām cheda puṣpa ādi bhāve api vanasya tad abhāvaḥ sambhavī yat ca uktam vākye saṃketaḥ na asti apūrva vākyāt api artha pratītiḥ iti tat na asiddha tvāt avyutpannānām api veda ādi artha pratīti prasaṅgāt yat api uktam vyavahāra mātreṇa padeṣu eva vākya saṃjñā iṣṭā eva iti tat api asat saṃsarga viśiṣṭa artha pratipādaka tvena saṃjñā karaṇāt tathābhūte arthe saṃketā prasiddheḥ katham śabdebhyaḥ tasya pratītiḥ iti ced na liṅga vat pratīteḥ yathā sāmānyena eva dṛṣṭa sambandham liṅgam pradeśa ādi viśeṣa avacchinnam gṛhyamāṇam tad viśeṣa avacchinnam eva sādhyam sādhayati 
[278,18^2]	tathā padam api artha mātreṇa pratīta sambandham pada antara sannidhānena śrūyamāṇam tad artha saṃsarga avacchinnam eva artham pratipādayati evam hi śabdasya sārthaka tvam bhavet anyathā sāmānye siddha sādhya tāvadasya api vaiphalya doṣaḥ syāt tāvat mātrā arthasya saṃketa kāle api pratīta tvāt sūtra virodhaḥ api na asti yathā sāmānyena gṛhīta sambandham liṅgam deśa ādi viśeṣam sādhayat api na vyāpti nirapekṣam ucyate tathā śabdaḥ api sāmānyena gṛhīta samayaḥ sannihita pada antara artha viśiṣṭa tayā artham pratipādayan api sāmayikaḥ eva ucyate 
[279,3^1]	nanu ca liṅgasya yatra yatra iti sambandhaḥ prasiddhaḥ tena yatra tat upalabhyate tatra eva deśa ādau sva vyāpakam gamayati na tu śabdasya evam prakāraḥ asti liṅga antara anapekṣa liṅga vat pada antara anapekṣa padāt api artha viśeṣa avagama prasaṅgāt iti na idam sādhīyaḥ śabdaḥ hi pramāṇa antaram vakṣyāmaḥ tatas na asya sarvathā liṅgena sādharmyam sarva sādharmye hi liṅgam eva śabdaḥ syāt kiṃcid sādharmyeṇa liṅgam udāhṛtam kim ca āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti uktam na ca śuddhān padārthān padaiḥ pratipādayan na āptaḥ kaścid ucyate kin tu sa upāyam heya upādeya tattvam upadiśan na ca saṃsarga viśeṣa anabhidhāyibhiḥ padaiḥ tad upadeṣṭum śakyate saṃketaḥ api prāyeṇa vākya bhāva āpannānām padānām gṛhyate yathā vyākaraṇe kriyā kāraka abhidhāyinām padānām anyonya artha saṃsargeṇa viśiṣṭeṣu api artheṣu samayaḥ pratīyate nīlotpala ādi padānām anyonya viśiṣṭa artheṣu api iti evam loka vyavahāre api bāla vṛddhebhyaḥ āryāḥ kaṇāda ādibhyaḥ ca samayam pratipadyante iti evam saṃskṛta buddhiḥ anyathā vinyaḥ tasya api vākyasya pratibhohābhyām vākya artham pratipadyate 
[279,3^2]	yasya api kevala padasya kvacid arthe samayaḥ pratipannaḥ tasya api gṛhīta vākya bhāva padeṣu madhye prayuktasya tad viśiṣṭa tvam pratibhohābhyām pratipadyate yathā kvacid parti panna samayeṣu padeṣu madhye prayuktasya apratipanna samayasya api padasya artham pratipadyate tadā eva tatra pratibhohābhyām samayam gṛhītvā tasya artham pratipadyate na tu asaṃketitāt artha pratītiḥ iti ced vākyasya api tarhi kim na eva śiṣyate tathā hi yatra pratibhohābhyām samayam grahītum na śaknoti tatra prasiddheṣu api padārtheṣu vākya artham prativyākhyānam apekṣate 
[279,3^3_279,29]	atha kā iyam pratibhā iti janma antara abhyāsa jaḥ saṃskāra viśeṣaḥ kutaścid nimittāt pratibuddhaḥ smṛti hetuḥ pratibhā atra vivakṣitā na tu ārṣam pratyakṣam iti ūhaḥ tu bauddhī śaktiḥ parāmarśaḥ vā yadi evam arthaḥ asya tadā anena saṃgata artha tvam na syāt atas ayam arthaḥ iti parāmarśaḥ nanu ca evam parāmarśāt prāk eva naṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sa katham artham pratipādayet kim ca daśa dāḍima ādi pada samūhaḥ api vākya artham pratipādayet tasmāt na pada samūhaḥ vākyam kin tu padāni yathā svam artham pratipādya nivartante tatas padārtha samūhāt vākya artha pratipattiḥ iti apare tat api asādhīyaḥ padārtha samūhaḥ api hi na avaśyam vidyamānaḥ pāṇḍava ādi padārthānām agnihotra ādi kriyāṇām ca tad phalānām ca āvartamāna tvāt kutas tatas vākya artha avagamaḥ tad sādhanam padārtha samūha viṣayam jñānam iti ced pada samūha viṣayam jñānam kid na tathā 
[280,1]	kim ca daśa dāḍima ādi padārtha samūhaḥ api vākya artham kid na gamayet tatra apekṣā sannidhe yogyatā ādi nimitta abhāvāt iti ced pada samūhe api ayam samānaḥ parihāraḥ pramāṇa antara prasaṅgaḥ ca na hi padārtha samūhaḥ pratyakṣa ādīnām anyatame antarbhavati śabdāt avagataḥ padārtha samūhaḥ vākya artham gamayati tena asau śabde antarbhavati iti ced evam tarhi pratyakṣa avagatayoḥ śabda liṅgayoḥ sva artha pratipādaka tvāt tayoḥ pratyakṣe antarbhāva prasaṅgaḥ pratīti abhāvāt ca na hi padārtheṣu vākyam idam iti padārthebhyaḥ mayā vākya arthaḥ pratipannaḥ iti vā pratītiḥ asti 
[280,9]	na api abhihita anvayaḥ prāk api anvaya sadbhāvāt anvayaḥ hi kriyā kāraka viśeṣaṇa ādīnām anyonya saṃsarga viśeṣaḥ abhidhīyate sa ca prāk api asti tad darśī hi tad pratipādanāya vākyam uccārayati śyāmaḥ puruṣaḥ kuṭhāreṇa girau mahāntam vṛkṣam chinatti iti abhihitānām padārthānām paścāt anvayaḥ pratīyate tena abhihita anvayaḥ iti ced sa punar kim paścāt artha sāmarthyāt pratīyate kim vā śabda sāmarthyāt iti yadi artha sāmarthyāt tadā śyāmena kuṭhāraḥ puruṣam giraye mahataḥ vṛkṣeṇa chinatti eva śabdaiḥ abhihitānām api arthānām sāmarthyāt anvayaḥ pratīyeta na hi anyathā abhidhānena padārthānām sāmarthyam nivartate anyathātvam vā bhavet 
[280,17_280,25]	kim ca kāvya śāstra ādiṣu padārtha pratītau anvaya pratipatti artham keṣāṃcid vyākhyā apekṣi tva darśanāt kim ca anvayān abhidhāne katham anvitam idam vākyam idam tu ananvitam iti vyapadeśaḥ atha śabda samarthyāt paścāt anvayaḥ pratīyate sa kim svatantraḥ atha padārtha niṣṭhaḥ iti na tāvat svatantraḥ tathā pratīti abhāvāt abhihitānām anvayaḥ iti virodhāt ca atas eva na padārtha antara niṣṭhaḥ tad pratipatti upāya abhāvāt ca na api abhihita padārtha niṣṭhaḥ śyāma śabdena hi yathāsamayam pravṛttena āpuruṣaḥ api abhihitaḥ puruṣa śabdena ca aśyāmaḥ api evam kuṭhāra ādi śabdena kuṭhāra ādi mātram na ca evaṃbhūtānām padārthānām anvayaḥ bhavati atha anyonya saṃsarga viśiṣṭa artha abhidhānāya uccāritāḥ śyāma ādi śabdāḥ paraspara artha jñāna apekṣāḥ tathā aviśiṣṭān eva arthān abhidadhate samayaḥ api evam na hi te sāmānya śabdāḥ ye prakaraṇa ādi apekṣāḥ iti upadeśāt vyavahārataḥ ca pratīyante iti siddham tarhi anvita abhidhānam 
[280,29^1]	yat tu kaścid āha mānasa pratyakṣa jeyam anvaya pratītiḥ bādhita ani a sādhana tve sati viśiṣṭa pratītitvā chvaḥ me bhrātā agantā iti pratīti vat iti tat na viśeṣaṇā siddha tvāt na hi vākya janya tve asyāḥ kiṃcid bādhakam asti iti vakṣyāmaḥ śvas me bhrātā agantā iti na keṣāṃcid asti pratītiḥ iti asiddham nidarśanam nanu bālānām keṣāṃcid asti katham tvayā avagatam tad vacana avisaṃvādāt iti ced na yathā kathaṃcid bruvataḥ sa duktiḥ kasyacid vacanasya kākatālīya vat avisaṃvādaḥ bhavati api unmatta ādi vat na etāvatā teṣām tad artha niścayaḥ siddhyati atha vā kākaruta ādi vat bāla vacanam śakuna tvena artham sūcayat liṅgam eva yadi samāna saṃpratyakṣam vākya artha viṣayam syāt tadā śabda aśravaṇe api sukha ādiṣu iva vākya artheṣu tat bhavet saha kāri vaikalyāt na bhavati iti ced kim śabda jñānam sahakāri 
[280,29^2]	padārtha jñānam vā śabda jñānam ced katham na vākya artha pratītiḥ vākya jā pada samūha jñāna jā eva hi vākya ja iti ucyate yathā atīta liṅga jñāna jā api anumeyatratītiḥ na mānasa pratyakṣa jā kin tu laiṅgikā eva ucyate atha padārtha samūha jñānam manaḥ sahakāri tathā sati abhihita anvaya pakṣa siddhiḥ syāt tatra ca uktam doṣa jātam na ca abhihita anvayava ādi api manasaḥ kāraṇa tvam pratyācaṣṭe sarva jñānānām manaḥ kāraṇa tvāt na ca manaḥ janya tvāt eva mānasam pratyakṣam sarva jñānānām tad bhāva prasaṅgāt bāhya indriyā janyā aparokṣa anubhavaḥ ho mānasa pratyakṣam phalam na ca adṛṣṭa īśvara ādau vākya arthe asmad ādeḥ aparokṣa anubhavaḥ sambhavati yogya yoginoḥ aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt kim ca vākya arthe sukha duḥkha ādi pratyakṣe ca pratīti viśeṣaḥ na syāt mānasa pratyakṣa tva aviśeṣāt 
[281,18^1]	kim ca padārtha pratīteḥ api mānasa pratyakṣa ja tvam kalpayitavyam tulya nyāya tvāt sūkṣma īkṣikayā padārtha pratipattiḥ api na śābdī padasya api tṛtīye kṣaṇe avaśyam mūrta dravya saṃyogāt kārya śabdāt vā nivāśaḥ sambhavati na ca tṛtīye kṣaṇe padārtha jñānam bhavati saṃketa smṛtiḥ api hi tadā na sambhāvyate na ca nāśa kāraṇa yoge api adṛṣṭa vaśāt avasthānam sambhavati pada samūhasya api adṛṣṭa vaśāt vākya artha pratipatteḥ avasthāna prasaṅgāt kvacid tu praṇidhāna dharma adharma ādibhiḥ cireṇa saṃketam smṛtvā padārtham pratipadyate tathā lipi akṣareṣu manasā eva padāni anusandhāya tad saṃketam smṛtvā padārthāt vākya artham ca pratipadyate tat evam vākya artha jñānena samāna yogakṣema tvāt padārtha jñānasya api mānasa tvam prāptam tatas ca śabda ākhyām pramāṇam nivartate na hi padārtha jñāne api kvacid śabdasya sākṣāt hetu tvam asti śrūyamāṇasya api anavasthānasya ukta tvāt tad artha pratipatteḥ anyathā api sambhavāt na tat anyathā anupapattyā api śabda avasthāna siddhiḥ 
[281,18^2]	tasmāt vākya bhāvena śabda anusandhānāt bhavantī vākya artha pratipattiḥ api śābdī iti ucyate mukhyatas tu śabda anusandhānena eva samaya ādi apekṣeṇa padārtheṣu vākya artheṣu ca pratipattiḥ janyate tatra ca pada ādi anusandhāne padatvam vākya tvam śabda ākhya tvam ca gauṇam pramāṇa tvam tu mukhyam eva amukhye tu śabde gauṇam pramāṇa tvam sākṣāt artha jñāna asādhana tvāt anāpta vacanam tu praṇālikayā api na samyak anubhava sādhanam iti apramāṇam eva iti ucyate na evam āpta vacanam tasya praṇālikayā artha niścaya sādhana tvāt tat na gauṇa tvāt aviśeṣaḥ praṇālikayā artha niścaya sādhana tvam ca sarva varṇānām sarva padānām ca asti tat na antya varṇaḥ eva padam na antya padam eva ca vākyam iti tathā ca te vibhakti antāḥ padam iti sūtram sādhanīyasya arthasya yāvati śabda samūhe ityādi bhāṣyam ca vākya eka deśāḥ ca avayavāḥ ucyante na ca antya pada eka deśāḥ pratijña ādayaḥ iti tasmāt pada samūhaḥ eva vākyam iti sthitam 
[282,13]	tad eka deśāḥ kim padāni eva avayavāḥ iti ucyate na kim tarhi pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamanāni avayavāḥ sādhana aṅga abhidhāyakam vākyam api mahā vākyasya avayavam iti arthaḥ 
[282,17]	tatra pratipipādayiṣayā pakṣa vacanam pratijñā jijñāsuḥ api sādhana jijñāsana artham pakṣa vacanam uccārayati tat api pratijñā mā bhūt iti pratipipādayiṣaya iti viśeṣaṇam tatra codya parihāra artham vā sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā iti sūtram tatra hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ sādhana antareṇa siṣā dhayiṣayā nirdeśaḥ kriyate tadā pratijñā sa abhyupagamyā na hi parasya asiddham iti eva sādhyam atra abhipretam kim tarhi yat yadā pratipādakena siṣā dhayiṣitam tat ukta sādhana apekṣasya sādhya tvāt kim punar atra avadhāryate yadi sādhya nirdeśaḥ eva pratijñā iti pratijñā avadhāryate tadā sādhya nirdeśaḥ anavadhāritaḥ anyathā api asti iti ati vyāpakam lakṣaṇam syāt atha punar sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā eva iti sādhya nirdeśaḥ avadhāryate tathā api anavadhāritā pratijñā anyathā api asti iti avyāpi lakṣaṇam syāt iti nā aniyamāt iti tamoriḥ na ayam niyamaḥ asti sarvam vākyam sa avadhāraṇam iti yathā eṣa panthāḥ srughnam gacchai iti 
[283,2_283,11]	atra api avadhāraṇam asti eva iti kīrtiḥ yasmāt ayogam yogam aparaiḥ atyanta ayogam eva ca vyavacchinatti dharmasya nipātaḥ vyatirecakaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyābhyām kriyayā ca saha uditaḥ vivakṣātaḥ aprayoge api tasya arthaḥ ayam pratīyate vyavaccheda phalam vākyam yathā caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ pārthaḥ dhanurdharaḥ nīlam sarojam iti vā yathā pratiyogi vyavacchedaḥ tatra api artheṣu gamyate tathā prasiddheḥ sāmarthyāt vivakṣā anugamāt dhvaneḥ tena atra api yadā pathi antare śaṅkā tadā eṣaḥ eva iti avadhāraṇam yadā tu grāma antaram gamiṣyati iti āśaṃkā tadā srughnam eva iti avadhāraṇam yadā tu na eṣa srughnam yāvat gamiṣyati iti āśaṃkā tadā gacchati eva iti avadhāraṇam iti 
[283,15]	atra api tamoriḥ uktavān na avadhāraṇasya viṣayam paśyāmaḥ sāmānya śrutau atiprasaṅga nivṛttaye hi avadhāraṇam iṣyate yatra hi viśeṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ tatra avadhāraṇasya api iti na ca mārga svarūpa mātra jijñāsum prati gopālakena eṣa panthāḥ srughnam gacchati iti upadiṣṭe kvacid prasaṅgaḥ asti sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā iti ukte vā yat vyavaccheda artham avadhāraṇam āśrīyate 
[284,5_284,12]	pārthaḥ dhanurdharaḥ iti atra api droṇa śiṣya tvena śiṣya antareṣu tad tulya dhānuḥ dhārya āśaṃkāyām tad vyavacchittaye avadhāraṇam yuktam anyathā tu ayuktam eva na hi pārthaḥ eva dhanurdharaḥ tad tulyaḥ adhikaḥ vā na asti iti śakyam vaktum caitraḥ dhanurdharaḥ iti atra avadhāraṇam ayuktam dhānuḥ dhārya vidhānāt eva ayoga vyavaccheda siddheḥ vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ ekatra asambhavāt eka deśa āvṛtti pratiṣedha artham tu yuktam yathā pāṇḍu putrāḥ śūrāḥ eva iti eka deśa vṛttau api vṛtti vyapadeśaḥ asti yathā viṣāṇi tvam vipakṣe vartate iti nīlam sarojam bhavati eva iti api na yuktam bhavati śabdāt eva atyanta ayoga vyavacchedasya siddha tvāt vyavaccheda phala tvam ca vākyasya nirākṛtam nirākariṣyate ca vastu abhidhāyakasya api sāmarthyāt vyavaccheda siddhiḥ iṣṭā eva 
[284,15]	sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā iti atra api sāmarthyāt asādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā na bhavati iti gamyate tathā ca sati pratijña ābhāsāḥ api nirastāḥ tān ca prasaṅgena upariṣṭāt udāhariṣyāmaḥ sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī eva atra sādhya śabdena uktaḥ tena sādhya nirdeśaḥ pakṣa vacanam iti ekaḥ arthaḥ sādhya dharma nirdeśaḥ tu na pratijñā iti ācāryāḥ bhavatu vā dharmi viśiṣṭa dharmasya api sādhya śabdena atra grahaṇam tat nirdeśaḥ api pakṣa vacanam na hi agniḥ atra iti śabdāt agnimān pradeśaḥ na pratīyate na ca viśeṣyamāṇaḥ eva dharmī pakṣaḥ uktaḥ kin tu yogyatayā api kevala dharmiṇaḥ api abhidhānam tarhi pratijñā syāt na vaiyarthyāt na hi tatas abhipreta arthaḥ kaścid sidhyati asādhana aṅgam vacanam nigraha sthānam syāt 
[284,25_285,1]	evam tarhi pratijñā eva na kartavyā tatas sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā siddhi asambhavāt sākṣāt tāvat na kiṃcid vacanam sādhana aṅgam yasmāt arthāt artha gateḥ śaktiḥ pakṣa hetu abhidhānayoḥ na arthe tena tayoḥ na asti svatas sādhana saṃsthitiḥ sādhya abhidhānāt pakṣoktiḥ pāramparyeṇa na api alam śaktasya sūcakam hetu vacaḥ aśaktam api svayam 
[285,5]	sva arthe api liṅga sambaddha dharmi darśanam vyāpti smṛtiḥ ca etāvat eva upayogi dṛṣṭam tena sva pratipatti vat parasya api pratipattim cikīrṣayā antar vyāpti bahis vyāptī eva khyāpanīye tathā pratipāditaḥ api hetuḥ pratijñām vinā para pratipattim na karoti iti ced tat kim idānīm para arthinaḥ dṛṣṭvā parva brāhmaṇa vat ayam mūlyam mṛgayate kim ca yaḥ yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sa sarvaḥ api anityaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ śabdaḥ ca kṛtakaḥ iti ukte api anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti arthāt gamyat eva tathā ca ḍiṇḍika rāgam parityajya akṣiṇī nimīlya cintaya tāvat kim iyata artha pratipattiḥ bhavati na vā iti saṃśayāt pratijñātaḥ na artha niścayaḥ tasmāt asādhana aṅgam pratijñā iti 
[285,14]	atra ucyate yat tāvat sākṣāt na sādhanam iti tatra avivādaḥ pāramparyeṇa api sādhanam sādhya abhidhānāt iti uktam hetoḥ asādhāraṇa tvāt hetu anupakṛta sādhya abhidhāna vat na asādhāraṇa tā iti ced na hetu abhidhānasya api avayava antara anupakṛta hetu abhidhāna vat asādhana aṅga tva prasaṅgāt tasya śakta sūcaka tvāt iti ced na dṛṣṭānta vacasā mānekānta tvāt śakta aṅga sūcaka tvam ca pratijñāvacanasaḥ api asti tad viṣaya upadarśaka tvāt na hi kaścid anupadarśya viṣayam tad sādhanam upadiśati gṛhe sthitam ghaṭam pradīpena paśya iti upadeśa vat etena sva pratipatti vat ityādi api nirastam sva pratipatti upāya mātra upadeśaḥ hi gṛhe cakṣuṣā pradīpena iti etāvat eva upadeṣṭavyam syāt na ca evam upadiśati abhipreta arthaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati kim ca vādi prativādi guṇa doṣa cintā para arthe anumāne kriyate na sva arthe 
[285,24^1]	sā ca pakṣa ādi pravibhāga jñāna mūlā na ca pratijñām vinā sa pakṣa āsa pakṣa viveka jñānam tad abhāve viruddha tattva vādi vivekaḥ api na syāt yat kṛtakam tat anityam ghaṭa ādi vat iti vacanasya pratijñām antareṇa ubhayoḥ aviśeṣāt tat kim idānīm viruddha vādi tva khyāpana artham ātmanaḥ pratijñā iṣyate na etat evam kim tarhi viruddha bādha viśeṣa āśaṅkā apoha artham pratijñām vinā hi prāśnikānām saṃdehaḥ api syāt kṛtaka tvasya nitya tva anitya tvābhyām vyāpti abhidhānāt viruddha tva vādi viveka siddhiḥ iti ced na sādhya viśeṣān adhigame tad doṣa guṇa udbhāvanasya ayukta tvāt 
[285,24^2]	anitya tve sādhye hi kṛtaka tva nitya tvena vyāpti abhidhāne api na viruddham udbhāvayitum yuktam viparīta vyāpti vacana doṣaḥ eva vaktuḥ udbhāvanīyaḥ nitya tve ca sādhye na anitya tvena vyāpti abhidhāne api aviruddham yuktam nitya tvam śabde abhipretyānunmattaḥ katham kṛtaka tvasya anitya tvena vyāptim darśayati iti ced kṛtaka tvasya nitya tvena vyāptim api anunmattaḥ katham abhidhatte bhrāntitaḥ iti ced tat itaratra api tulyam na tu evam pratijñā iṣyate na etat evam upanyāse api anāśvāsaḥ iti na vākyasya guṇa doṣa parīkṣā dvāreṇa vaktuḥ tadvat tva udbhāvanāt citra ādeḥ guṇa doṣavat tayā tad kartuḥ guṇa doṣavattva udbhāvana vat 
[285,24^3]	na ca para vyāmohana arthā viduṣām pravṛttiḥ yena sva abhiprāya nivedakam parisphuṭam vākyam na uccāryate pakṣā vacane hi manda madhyama śaktīnām śrotṛṇām sādhya abhiprāyānavagame sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ api vyāmohaḥ syāt tasmāt tad parihāra artham pakṣa vacanam kartavyam iti yat ca uktam yaḥ yaḥ kṛtakaḥ ityādi tat api asat na hi kaścid atarkitam udgara pātāyamānam sabhā madhyam gatvā yaḥ yaḥ iti ādi upanyāsam aprastutam evaṃkurvan viduṣām na upahāsam arhati yadi ca pakṣoktiḥ asādhana aṅgam tat kim tvayā sā eva upadiśyate pakṣoktiḥ pāramparyeṇa na api alam aneka vṛtteḥ ekasya na deśa ādi viśeṣavatā anyena yogaḥ iti evamādyā 
[285,24^4]	śāstre vāla vyutpādana artham upadiśyate iti ced asādhana aṅga vacanena katham bālānām vyutpattiḥ pratyutā api asaṃskāraḥ eva syāt vyutpattim vā kurvan katham asādhanam bālān prati astu sādhanam iti ced na viśeṣa abhāvāt para artha anumāna pratipādyat tva aviśeṣāt ca iti na ca vāde api evam kaścid upalabhyate yaḥ sādhya nirdeśam na karoti yadi nāma mūla prayoge dvitīye vā tṛtīye vā na karoti na etāvatā tad parihāraḥ avaśyam hi sva pakṣam mahatā prapañcena vicārayata idam ittham na idam ittham iti vā kvacid vaktavyam tat eva pakṣa vacanam tad artha siddhaye hetu upanyāsaḥ 
[286,26_286,30]	yat ca uktam anuvāda mātram pakṣavacanan na tu sādhana aṅgam iti tat api ayuktam tathā hi yadi anuvāda mātram nirarthakam kim tena uktena nigraha sthānam ca syāt anya prayojanam api aprastuta tvāt ayuktam atha praṇālikayā artha siddhiḥ prayojanam tatas katham pāramparyeṇa na api alam yat punar etat jijñāsā ādīnām api avayavat tvam prasajyate pratijñāvat hetu vacaḥ pravṛtti nimitta tvāt iti tat ayuktam yasya hi śabdasya eka vākya bhāvaḥ asti tasya vākya avayava tvam vākya eka deśāḥ hi avayavāḥ iti uktam na ca jijñāsā ādīnām tathā abhāvaḥ asti tathā hi viśeṣataḥ arthe jñātum icchā jijñāsā vyāhata dharma upasandhātā saṃśayaḥ abhipreta artha niścāyaka pramāṇa sambhavaḥ śakya prāptiḥ tat niścayaḥ prayojanam pratipakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ saṃśaya vyudāsaḥ iti na ca ete vacana ātmakāḥ tat na daśa avayava prasaṅgaḥ iti 
[287,7]	yat punar atra bhadantena uktam idam tvayā jijñāsitam atra te saṃśayaḥ ityādi vacanānām avayava tva prasaktau daśa avayavam vākyam prasajyate iti tat na yuktam na hi vacana tvāt eva avayavāḥ kim tarhi sādhaka vākya eka deśa tvāt na ca ete sādhaka vākya eka deśāḥ pratijñā api tarhi na sādhaka vākya eka deśaḥ saṃśaya hetutvāt na avayava antara anupakṛtasya hetu ādi vacasaḥ api saṃśaya hetutvāt sva arthe tatas na saṃśayaḥ iti ced na sva arthe api saṃdehāt kim ayam hetu arthaḥ sādhakaḥ atha asādhakaḥ kasya ca ayam iti dharmi mātre pratijñā arthe api saṃdehaḥ kim ca hetu ādi arthe api na sarveṣām sampratipattiḥ tat vacaḥ api kasyacid sandeham kurvat asādhana aṅgam tena nigraha sthānam prāptam na hi pratijñā api sarveṣām sandeha kartrī yathā ca paścāt api niścayīte hetu ādau tat vacaḥ na asādhana aṅgam tathā pakṣa vacaḥ api iti 
[287,17]	prastāvāt pratijñā arthaḥ labhyate iti aparaḥ kaḥ ayam prastāvaḥ vādinoḥ pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ nanu sā eva pratijñā na ca pañca avayavam prayoktavyam iti niyamyate kim tarhi pañca avayavam eva vākyam sādhakam iti tatra yadi kaścid avayavaḥ kutaścid gamyamāna artha tvāt pratipādya prajñā anurodhāt ca na prayujyate na tāvatā doṣaḥ kaścid nyūnam tu nigraha sthānam tadā yadi jijñāsitam api sādhana aṅgam pratipādayitum na śaknoti yathā kim atra sādhyam iti evam pṛṣṭaḥ api bauddhaḥ sva samaya virodha bhayāt sādhyam nirdeṣṭum aśaktaḥ sāmarthyāt jānīṣṭha no ced sāmarthyāt jñātum śaknoti tatas adya api avyutpannaḥ tvam siddha mātṛkāśālām praviśa kaḥ te vāde adhikāraḥ iti evamādi asat uttaram vakti na ca etat satām yuktam tasmāt para avabodha artha pravṛttena pakṣoktiḥ api prayokta vyeva ataḥ na asādhana aṅgam pratijñā iti 
[287,29]	sādhana tva khyāpakam liṅga vacanam hetuḥ pañcamī antam tṛtīya antam vā yena liṅgasya sādhya siddhau hetu tvam khyāpyate tadvat tat vacanam hetuḥ iti upacaryate mukhyatas tu liṅgam eva hetuḥ tasya eva pakṣa dharma tva ādi sadbhāvāt sa trividhaḥ ityādi api mukhya gauṇa bhāvena vyākhyeyam parokta traividhya pratiṣedha artham anvaya vyatirekī ityādi uktam na tu pūrvavat ādi prakāra pratiṣedha artham 
[288,6]	paraḥ hi evam āha kārya svabhāva anupalabdhi lakṣaṇāḥ trayaḥ hetavaḥ yathā agniḥ atra dhūmāt vṛkṣaḥ ayam śiṃśapā tvāt iha pradeśe na asti ghaṭaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdheḥ trayāṇām api eṣām svabhāva pratibandhaḥ asti na anyeṣām matena anyeṣām hetu tvam svabhāva hetuḥ dvividhaḥ upādhi apekṣaḥ śuddhaḥ vā nāśe kṛtaka tva sattva vat apekṣita para vyāpāraḥ hi bhāvaḥ kṛtakaḥ iti ucyate anupalabdhiḥ tu dṛśya adṛśya anupalabdhi bhedāt dvividhā tatra adṛśya anupalabdhiḥ sat vyavahāra pratiṣedha mātra sādhanī na tu abhāvam sādhayati anaikāntika tvāt dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ tu bhāva sādhanī 
[288,13]	sā ca ekādaśadhā tatra svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ pūva udāhṛtā kārya anupalabdhiḥ yathā na iha apratibaddha sāmarthyāni dhūma kāraṇāni santi dhūma abhāvāt vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ yathā na śiṃśapātra vṛkṣa abhāvāt svabhāva viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na śīta sparśaḥ atra agneḥ viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ yathā na śīta sparśaḥ atra dhūmāt viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ yathā dhruva bhāvī vināśaḥ bhūtasya api hetu antara apekṣaṇāt kārya viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra aprativaddha sāmarthyāni śīta kāraṇani vahneḥ vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra tuṣāra sparśaḥ vahneḥ kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra dhūmaḥ anagneḥ kāraṇa viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na asya romaharṣa ādi viśeṣāḥ sannihita dahana viśeṣa tvāt kāraṇa viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ yathā romaharṣa ādi viśeṣa yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ atra dhūmāt yāvān kaścid pratiṣedhaḥ sa sarvaḥ api anupalabdhiḥ iti samayaḥ tena viruddha ādi upalabdhiḥ api anupalabdhiḥ eva ukta iti 
[288,26^1]	atra svabhāva hetuḥ tāvat anupapannaḥ tādātmya pratibandhasya asambhavāt tad asambhavaḥ ca dharmayoḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ ca artha antara tvasya prasādhita tvāt svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ api atas eva na hetuḥ pratyakṣa siddhe hi abhāve apārthika anupalabdhiḥ anupalabdhau ca abhāva siddhau dṛṣṭānta anavasthā syāt kvacid paratyakṣa siddha tva abhyupagame katham yāvān kaścid pratiṣedhaḥ sa sarvaḥ anupalabdheḥ iti ucyate mūḍham prati vyavahāraḥ sādhyate iti ced sa yadi abhidhāna lakṣaṇaḥ pravṛti ādi lakṣaṇaḥ vā tadā tad kārakasya na pramāṇa tvam 
[288,26^2]	tad jñāpaka tve tu artha antara sādhya tva prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca na tādātmyam sādhya sādhanayoḥ smṛti lakṣaṇaḥ api vyavahāraḥ yadi jñāpyate tadā tat eva dūṣaṇam atha kriyate tadā api na pramāṇa tvam smṛti sādhanasya praṇidhāna ādeḥ api pramāṇa tva prasaṅgāt atha vyavahāra yogya tā sādhyate sā api arthāt anyān anyā vā yadi anyā tatas katham tad svabhāvaḥ hetuḥ atha ananyā tathā api hetu siddhyā eva tad siddheḥ vyartham anumānam yasya hetu siddhau api asiddhiḥ tasya hetunā tādātmyam na yuktam dhūma agni vat dharmī apekṣayā tādātmyam eva ekaḥ pratibandhaḥ syāt dhūma agnimataḥ api dharmiṇaḥ pradeśa ādeḥ eka ātma tvāt 
[289,14^1]	siddhe api sādhye sa māropa vyavacchedaḥ eva anumānena kriyate iti ced kaḥ ayam samāropa vyavacchedaḥ kim anutpattiḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ vā tad asatya tā avadhāraṇam vā tad virodhi jñānam vā anutpatti pradhvaṃsau tāvat na pramāṇa phalam tad asatya tā avadhāraṇam ced tat asatya tayā saha na arthasya tādātmyam tat na arthaḥ samāropāsatya tāyāḥ sādhanam atha tad virodhi jñānam samāropa vyavacchedaḥ ucyate tat kim gṛhīta artham uta agṛhīta artham nirviṣayam vā yadi gṛhīta artham tadā anumānasya gṛhīta grāhi tvena aprāmāṇyam eva prāptam smṛti antara vat 
[289,14^2]	sarva smṛti sādhanānām prāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ vā atha agṛhīta artham tatas katham gṛhīta agṛhītayoḥ liṅga liṅginoḥ tādātmyam ghaṭa piśācayoḥ iva atha nirviṣayam tadā anumānam na yuktam na hi viṣaya anapekṣam prāmāṇyam asti prāmāṇyam vastu viṣayam dvayoḥ iti asya virodhaḥ ca syāt pāramparyeṇa api vastu viṣaya tve liṅga liṅgi niścayayoḥ abhinna viṣaya tvāt anyatara ānarthakyam dhūmaḥ ayam dhūmaḥ ayam iti eka artha niścayayoḥ iva tasmāt na svabhāvaḥ sva ātmani hetuḥ na api svabhāva anupalabdheḥ na asti atra ghaṭaḥ iti jñānam ca pratyakṣa phalam eva iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[290,3]	vyavahāre api sādhye na svabhāvaḥ hetuḥ artha antara sādhya tvāt iti uktam tasmāt pūrvavat ādi bhedena eva hetoḥ traividhyam anupalabdhi prakārāḥ tu pūrvavat ādiṣu eva antarbhavanti viruddha vyāpta upalabdheḥ tu na paroktam udāharaṇam yuktam dhruva bhāvinaḥ api ghaṭa ādi asabhā gakṣaṇasya hetu antara apekṣi tvāt kim tu idam udāharaṇam na hetu antarā anapekṣaḥ vināśaḥ kāla bhedena eva pratīyamāna tvāt iti 
[290,9]	yadi svabhāvaḥ sva ātmani na hetuḥ kāryam eva ekaḥ hetuḥ tarhi prāptaḥ anyasya pratibandha abhāvena ahetu tvam tat uktam kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt vā svabhāvāt vā niyāmakāt avinā abhau a niyamaḥ adarśanāt na na darśanāt avaśyaṃbhāva niyamaḥ kaḥ parasya anyathā paraiḥ artha antara nimitte vā dharme vāsasi rāga vat tasmāt tanmātra sambandhaḥ svabhāvaḥ bhāvam eva vā nivartayet kāraṇam vā kāryam avyabhicārataḥ 
[290,17]	svabhāvaḥ nivartamānaḥ bhāvam nivartayati yathā vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapām śākhā ādimat viśeṣasya eva tathā prasiddheḥ sa tasya svabhāvaḥ svam ca svabhāvam parityajya katham bhāvaḥ bhavet kāraṇam api nivartamānam kāryam nivartayati anyathā tat asya kāryam eva na syāt siddhaḥ tu kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ svabhāvam niyamayati iti ubhayathā svabhāva pratibadhyāt eva nivṛttiḥ 
[290,22_290,26]	anyathā eka nivṛttyā anya vinivṛttiḥ katham bhavet na aśvavān iti martyena na bhāvyam gomatā api kim saṃnidhānāt tathā ekasya katham anyasya saṃnidhiḥ gomān iti eva martyena bhāvyam aśvamatā api kim tasmāt svabhāva pratibandhāt eva hetuḥ sādhyam gamayati sa ca tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ vā saḥ eva avinābhāvaḥ dṛṣṭāntābhyām pradarśyate iti atas svabhāva pratibandha abhāvāt na kāraṇasya akārya kāraṇasya vā hetu tvam iti 
[291,4^1]	atra ucyate kim kārya tvena avinābhāvi tvam uta avinābhauvi tvena kāryatvam iti na tāvat kārya tvena avinābhāvi tvam yasmāt araṇi nirmanthana kārya tvam agneḥ asti na ca tad avinā bhāvi tvam vyabhicārāt agni pāṣāṇa abhighāta ādibhyaḥ api agneḥ utpādāt bīja udbhava kanda udbhava kadalyādi vat viśiṣṭasya avyabhicāraḥ iti ced na aśakya niścaya tvāt na hi kaścid evam niścetum śaknoti araṇi nirmanthana jaḥ agniḥ īdṛśaḥ agniḥ pāṣāṇa abhighāta jaḥ tu īdṛśaḥ sūryakānta jaḥ ca īdṛśaḥ iti na ca apratīyamānaḥ api viśeṣaḥ asti iti śakyam kalpayitum atiprasaṅgāt atha avinābhauvi tvena kāryatvam tat asiddhau api avinābhauvit tvasya siddheḥ 
[291,4^2]	itaretara āśraya tvam vā yāvat na agnikāryat tvam dhūmasya siddhyati tāvat na agni avinābhā vit tvam yāvat ca na agni avinā bhāvi tvam na tāvat agni kārya tvam iti na ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva avinābhāvaḥ kṛtaka tva ādeḥ tad abhāva prasaṅgāt kim ca kasyacid prāṇinaḥ kenacid āhāra viśeṣeṇa vṛddhi ādi dṛṣṭam na ca kasyacid vṛdhyādinā āhāra viśeṣaḥ anumātum śakyate mātuḥ kṣīram vā śālyodanaḥ vā kodrava ādīnām māṃsa kanda phala ādīnām anyatama viśeṣaḥ vā iti sarvatra vyabhicārāt na ca āhāra viśeṣa kāritaḥ śarīra viśeṣaḥ kaścid avyabhicāri asti varṇa lāvaṇya ādi viśeṣāṇām vyabhicārāt tat na kārya viśeṣa darśane api āhāra viśeṣa anumānam 
[291,21]	na eva āhāra viśeṣaḥ śarīra viśeṣasya api hetuḥ tathā api hi anvaya vyatirekāt yaḥ yasya dṛṣṭaḥ anuvartakaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya tad hetuḥ atas bhinnāt na sambhavaḥ na hi yasya yam antareṇa bhāvaḥ sa tasya hetuḥ bhavati 
[291,26]	yadi āhāraḥ na hetuḥ sa kasmāt sarva prāṇibhiḥ śarīra vṛddhi sthiti ādya arthibhiḥ apekṣyate bhavati āhāraḥ tad hetuḥ kim tu āhāra viśeṣaḥ na hetuḥ iti ced tat kim idānīm sāmānyam hetuḥ tathā ca sva kṛtānta yukti virodhaḥ te durnivāraḥ tasmāt āhāra viśeṣaḥ eva deha vṛddhi ādi hetuḥ śāstra auṣadha ādi viśeṣaḥ ca vraṇa rohaṇa ādi hetuḥ na ca tena avinābhāvaḥ kāryasya gṛhyate tat na kāryatvāt avyabhicāraḥ 
[292,4]	yat ca uktam sakṛt api darśana adarśanābhyām kārya kāraṇa bhāva siddhiḥ bhavati tatas tad pratipattiḥ na anyathā anvaya vyatirekayoḥ niḥśeṣa darśana adarśanāya āttatvāt iti tat ayuktam niḥśeṣa darśana adarśanāt sambhave api anvaya vyatireka grahaṇasya pratipādita tvāt kvacid ayathārtha grahaṇe api na sarvatra tathātvam rūpa ādi grahaṇasya api kvacid ayathārtha tve sarvatra ayathārtha tva prasaṅgāt kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya api sakṛt darśane api katham na vyabhicāra āśaṃkā nanu atra uktam dhūmaḥ kāryam hutabhujaḥ kārya dharma anuvṛttitaḥ sa bhavan tad abhāve tu hetumat tām vilaṅghayet 
[292,13^1]	yeṣām upalambhe tad lakṣaṇam anupalabdham yat upalabhyate tatra eka abhāve api na upalabhyate tat tasya kāryam tasya ca sva kāraṇam antareṇa bhāve hetumat tā eva na syāt tatas ca nityam sattvam asattvam vāhetoḥ anya anapekṣaṇāt apekṣātaḥ hi bhāvānām kādācid ka tva sambhavaḥ iti na etat asti yathā hi deha vṛddhi ādi kāryasya hetu viśeṣa antarāt tādṛśasya eva bhavataḥ na ahetuka tvam tathā dhūmasya api iti anivṛttā eva hetu antarāśaṅkā kim ca agni vat tṝṇa asya api sakṛt darśana adarśanābhyām hetu tva niścayāt na ca tad abhāve dhūmaḥ na bhavati tasya ghṛtān akāṣṭha āditaḥ api bhāvāt dahanāt api kevalāt abhāvāt tṛṇa abhāve api kāṣṭhāditaḥ dhūmasya bhāvān na tṛṇa hetu tvam iti ced 
[292,13^2]	kāṣṭha ādi abhāve api tṛṇāt utpatteḥ kāṣṭha ādi hetuka tvam api na syāt tṛṇa kāṣṭha ādīnām ahetu tve agni sahakārit tvam api na syāt ahetūnām sahakāri tva virodhāt kevalaḥ agniḥ ca na dhūmasya hetuḥ iti ahetukaḥ eva dhūmaḥ prāptaḥ dhūma viśeṣasya eva tṛṇam kāraṇan na dhūmasya iti ced kim tṛṇa kāṣṭha ādi janya viśeṣebhyaḥ anyaḥ api asti dhūmaḥ yasya agniḥ eva hetuḥ syāt yathā dṛṣṭa sāmagrī kāryeṇa anumīyate iti ced na anyathā sāmagrī darśanāt yādṛśī dhūmasya rasavatyām sāmagrī na tādṛśī agnihotre tathā kvacid kāṣṭha upalakṣitā kvacid tṛṇa ādi upalakṣitā tathā deha vṛddhi ādi hetu sāmagrī ca anyathā anyathā draṣṭavyā deśa kāla ādi anyatama vailakṣaṇyena api sāmagrī vailakṣaṇyāt 
[293,3^1]	atha yat viśeṣa viśiṣṭam kāryam yena kāraṇena vyāptam niścitam tad viśeṣa viśiṣṭam eva tasya liṅgam iti katham tarhi sakṛt darśanāt eva ittham niścayaḥ bhavati agniḥ sarva viśeṣa sahitasya api dhūmasya vyāpakaḥ na tṛṇam kāṣṭham vā iti bahuśas api kecid tṛṇa agnibhyām eva janyamānam dhūmam paśyanti kecid kāṣṭha agnibhyām eva iti tat kutas agneḥ eva vyāpaka tva niścayaḥ kim ca yathā sahakāri antara upetena agninā utpāditasya dhūmasya na kāṣṭhā janya tvena adhūmat tvam tathā sahakāri antara upetena kāṣṭhena tṛṇena ca utpāditasya dhūmasya na agni ajanya tvena ādhūma tvam bhaviṣyati tatas ca yat uktam śakra mūrddhādiḥ api yadi dhūmam janayati tatas agniḥ eva saḥ atha asau anagniḥ tatas asau dhūmam katham janayati iti tad apāstam atha tṛṇa janitaḥ api yaḥ dhūma viśeṣaḥ sa tad abhāve na bhavati eva iti avyabhicāraḥ evam tarhi agni janyaḥ api dhūma viśeṣaḥ agnim mā sma vyabhicaret anyaḥ tu dhūma viśeṣaḥ vyabhicariṣyati 
[293,3^2_293,25]	tayoḥ ca vyabhicārya vyabhicāri dhūma viśeṣayoḥ vivekaḥ na lakṣyate tadā katham dhūmena agniḥ anumīyate deha puṣṭi āhāra viśeṣavat nanu ca anagni janyaḥ dhūma viśeṣaḥ atṛṇa janya vat na kvacid upalabhyate tatas anupalambhāt eva asau na asti iti katham na avyabhicāraḥ kvacid na upalabhyate iti etat asarva vidā avagantu katham pāryate yathā tārṇa dhūma upalambha kāle anupalabhyamānaḥ api kāṣṭha ādi janitaḥ dhūmaḥ kāla antareṇa upalambhāt api na na asti ghṛta nārikela drākṣā ādi janyaḥ ca dhūmaḥ kaiścid kirāta ādibhiḥ sarvadā anupalambhe api na na asti anyaiḥ anyatra upalambhāt tathā anagni janyaḥ api dhūmaḥ kaiścid kvacid upalapsyate asmad ādibhiḥ vā kadācid iti tat na agni janya svabhāvaḥ eva dhūmaḥ kim ca cira nivṛtte api agnau gopāla ghaṭikā ādau dhūma janya svabhāvasya api dhūmasya upalambhāt pāramparyeṇa vā deha ādayaḥ api agni janyāḥ iti na api agni janyaḥ dhūmaḥ eva bhasma ādeḥ api agni janya tvāt na api dhūma janaka svabhāvaḥ eva agniḥ ayaḥ golaka aṅgāra ādi avasthāyām dhūmājanakasya api agni tvāt na api dhūma janakaḥ agniḥ eva kāṣṭha ādeḥ api agni tva prasaṅgāt na ca kṣaṇika vādi mate kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ siddhyati iti abhidhāsyāmaḥ 
[293,29]	api ca dhūmena agniḥ kim atītaḥ eva jñāpyate kim vā tad samāna kālaḥ atha prāpyaḥ agniḥ iti yadi atītaḥ eva jñāpyate tadā vyartham anumānam na hi atītena kaścid arthaḥ sādhyate artha kriyā arthī sarvaḥ pramāṇam apramāṇam ca ityādi virodhaḥ na hi āmyām iti avirodhaḥ ca iti atas na atīta jñāpakam pramāṇam yuktam etena dhūma samāna kālāgni anumānam pratyuktam dhūma samāna kālasya api agneḥ anavasthāyi tvena pravṛtti prāptyoḥ aviṣaya tvāt kṣaṇa bhaṅga vādi mate tu jñāna samāna kāla arthasya kasya api pravṛtti prāpti viṣa tvam na asti iti sarvasya api vartamāna artha jñāpakasya aprāmāṇyam prāptam na vā samāna kālayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ asti akāryam ca artha antarasya liṅgam tvayā na eva iṣṭam prāpyasya api akāraṇa tvāt eva ananumeya tvam atha tad jātīyasya tad santānasya vā kāraṇa tvāt prāptyā arthasya api kāraṇa tvam ucyate gauṇam tarhi kāraṇam na anumeyam yuktam na hi devadatta kṛtam kāvya śāstra ādi kāryam tad putra pautra ādikam anumāpayati 
[294,12_294,16^1]	kim ca agni kāryam bhasma api bhavati na ca tad samāna kālam prāpyam vā agnim gamayati vyabhicārāt etena etat api nirastam yat āha eka sāmagrī adhīnasya rūpa ādeḥ asataḥ gatiḥ hetu dharma anumānena dhūma indhana vikāra vat yathā indhana vikāra upādāna sahakārī agninā janitaḥ dhūmaḥ tathābhūtam agnim anumāpayan indhana vikāram api anumāpayati tathā rūpa sahakāriṇaḥ rasāt utpannaḥ rasaḥ tathābhūtam eva rasam anumāpayan rūpam api anumāpayati iti etena pipīlika utsaraṇa matsya vikāra ādeḥ varṣa ādi anumānam vyākhyātam tatra api bhūta pariṇāmaḥ eva kaścid varṣā hetu pipīlikā saṃkṣobha ādi hetuḥ iti evam tarhi pipīlika utsaraṇa ādi samāna kālā eva vṛṣṭiḥ syāt eka sāmagrī adhīna tvāt rūpa rasa ādi vat tatas ca pratyakṣā eva vṛṣṭiḥ tad liṅga vat tadānīm vṛṣṭeḥ anupalambha kāraṇa abhāvāt pipīlika utsaraṇa ādi liṅgena ca bhaviṣyantīm eva vṛṣṭim anuminvanti anumātāraḥ tayoḥ ca eka sāmagrī adhīna tvam ayuktam na ca eka sāmagrī adhīna tve api avyabhicāraḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vā asti yama lakayoḥ api eka sāmagrya adhīna tvena tathā bhāva prasaṅgāt
