[294,16^2]	api ca arkasya udayena ahetuḥ asva ātma bhūtaḥ ca bhaviṣyan astamayaḥ anumīyate candrasya śukla pakṣe pratidinam vṛddhiḥ kṛṣṇa pakṣe ca apacayantyaḥ tathā deha ghaṭānām vināśaḥ kṣaṇa saṃjñakaḥ visadṛśa kṣaṇa utpāda ākhyaḥ vā ariṣṭa abhijñaiḥ ca kāla saṃkhyayā api mṛtyuḥ anumīyate jyotiśśāstra jñaiḥ ca kasyacid nimittasya darśanena soma graha ādiḥ iti evam anumānam tādātmya tad utpatti pratibandha abhāve api na vyabhicarati kadācid vyabhicariṣyati iti āśaṃkāyām sarva tra anāśvāsa prasaṅgaḥ iti na ca niṣpannā niṣpannayoḥ tādātmyam na api aniṣpannāt utpattiḥ tatra bhaviṣyat anumāpakasya svabhāve kārye vā antarbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati arthe pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti bruvate ebhiḥ eva anumānaiḥ virodhaḥ 
[295,10_295,22]	kim ca iṣṭā aniṣṭa sādhanayoḥ prāpti parihāra arthā pravṛttiḥ prekṣāvatām na syāt na hi dharma ādi phalānām avaśyaṃbhāva niścaye tad artham siddhasya dhana dāra ādeḥ arthasya tyāgaḥ yuktaḥ tyāge hi aprekṣāvadbhiḥ aviśeṣaḥ syāt iti aparaḥ tu āha yadā artha antara vyāpakam tad kāraṇam vyāpyam ca kāryam tena yayoḥ parasparam vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ tayoḥ eka kālayoḥ bhinna kālayoḥ vā parasparam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ yatra tu viṣama vyāptiḥ agni dhūma ādi vat tatra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ api na parasparam vyāpyasya eva kāryatvāt iti na etat asti sva paribhāṣā mātra tvāt na hi loke śāstre vā kvacid vyāpaka tva mātreṇa saha bhāvinaḥ anāgatasya vā kasya api kāraṇa tvam prasiddham kim tarhi yat yasya janakam tat tasya kāraṇam iti na ca parasparam janya janaka bhāvaḥ asti itaretara asiddhatvena ubhayoḥ api anutpāda prasaṅgāt asiddhasya api janaka tve sva ātma janaka tvam api syāt vyāpaka tva aviśeṣāt tasmāt yat vyāpārān anantaram yat utpadyate tat tasya kāraṇam yat ca uktam suṣuptasya ciram utthitasya ye vikalpāḥ teṣām pūrva abhyāsāt utpādaḥ na syāt anantara bhāvi tva abhāvāt iti tatra praṇidhāna ādi upakṛtāt saṃskārāt tad utpādaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ bhavatām bhavatu ayam doṣaḥ saṃskāra ādeḥ api sthirasya anabhyupagamāt 
[295,27]	yat punar etat na ca vyāpāraḥ utpādaḥ ca svarūpāt anyaḥ tatas svarūpāt sva rūpam iti prāptam na vāda antara tvāt idam atra vyāvṛtam idam asmāt utpannam iti asti tāvat iyam laukika parīkṣakāṇām pratipattiḥ sa ca vyāpāraḥ utpādaḥ ca artha antaram anartha antaram ca iti vāda antaram etat nanu anantara bhāvit tvena kāraṇattve trailokyasya api anantara bhāvinaḥ kāraṇat tvam syāt na ca sambandhaḥ kaścid niyāmakaḥ asti bhinna kāla tvāt na khalu kāraṇa kāle kāryam svarūpataḥ asti na api kārya kāle kāraṇam pūrvakam api svarūpataḥ asti avinābhauvi tva mātram tu bhāvinī api vidyate atha dṛṣṭam bhūtam vā yat tad vyāpakam satkāraṇam na tu bhāvi iti atra ucyate dṛṣṭasya svarūpeṇa vyāpaka tvam pratīyate āropitena rūpeṇa bhāvinaḥ api bhavet idam 
[296,8]	dṛśyamānam hi na tāvatā vyāpakam vyāpyasya tadānīm apratīteḥ yadā ca vyāpya pratītiḥ tadā tad bhāvi bhūta rūpeṇa vyāpakam anyathā bhāvi svarūpa agrahaṇe vyāpitā syāt atha yena eva svarūpeṇa dṛṣṭam tena eva vyāpaka tvam pratīyate na bhāvi rūpeṇa iti tat asad yatas bhāvi rūpā pratītau na vyāpaka tvam pratīyate prādeśikī na hi vyāptiḥ avyāptiḥ sā tathā bhavet 
[296,14]	bhūta bhaviṣyat kāla vyāpi tvena hi pratīyamānam kāraṇam na anyathā sā ca vyāptiḥ dṛṣṭasya drakṣyamāṇasya api samānā drakṣyamāṇasya katham kāraṇa tvam dṛṣṭasya api tadānīm asatvāt katham iti samānam sattvāt ced drakṣyamāṇasya api sā tadā na iti etat api samānam pūrva tā ced kaḥ pūrva parayoḥ svabhāve viśeṣaḥ dvayam api āropita ākāreṇa gṛhyate na apareṇa iti na bhedaḥ atha ekam pūrvarūpa tayā dṛṣṭam āropyate aparam drakṣyamāṇa tayā para rūpa tayā ca tena dvayoḥ api na asti kāraṇa tā iti 
[296,21_296,28]	anyonyam avinā abhāvaḥ dvayoḥ api tayoḥ samaḥ avāntara vibhāgaḥ tu tatra naḥ kva upayogavān yena vinā yat na bhavati tat tasya kāraṇam yathā ca kāraṇasya pūrva bhāvam vinā kāryam na bhavati tathā avaśyaṃbhāvinaḥ kāryasya para bhāvam vinā na kāraṇam bhavati iti samānam kārya kāraṇa nibandhanam samāna tvāt nimittasya kārya kāraṇa tā dvayoḥ vyāpi tva vyatirekasya para lokānumāpyataḥ na khalu vyāpitām vyatirekam ca vyudasya aparam atra jagati nibandhanam upalabhāmahe tat ca kāraṇa vat avaśyaṃbhāvinaḥ kāryasya api asti tena ubhayoḥ paraspara kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti 
[297,4]	tat etat asat śāstra abhyāsa vivarddhita mahā moha viceṣṭitam na hi kaścid anāgatābhyām naṣṭābhyām vā pitṛbhyām putraḥ janyate iti avinaṣṭa dhīḥ pratipadyate na api pitṛ vat tad kāla vartinām anyeṣām api kāraṇa tvam pitroḥ eva tena putreṇa saha janya janaka sambandha upalambhāt pitṛ ādi upalambha vat sambandha upalambhasya api visaṃvāda abhāvāt na bhrānta tvam sa ca sambandhaḥ kim artha antaram uta anartha antaram iti vāda antaram etat kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tāvat tvayā api iṣṭaḥ sa ca vyavahartṛ prasiddhyā na sva paribhāṣā mātreṇa vyavaharttāraḥ ca vidyamānasya eva kāraṇa tvam pratipadyante yatas kārya arthinaḥ kāraṇeṣu anutpanneṣu naṣṭeṣu ca kāryam na utpadyate iti manyamānāḥ kāraṇāṇi upādadate yadi punar atīta anāgatāni api kāraṇāṇi kāryam janayanti tat kim artham kārya arthinaḥ kāraṇāni vartamānīkartum pravartante tasmāt vartamānāni eva kāraṇāni kāryam utpādayanti kārya utpadyamāna tā kāle santi eva kāraṇāni kārya kāle tu bhavantu vā mā bhūvan iti kṣaṇika tva asiddheḥ kārya kāle api kāraṇa avasthāne na asti virodhaḥ 
[297,18]	kim ca anāgatasya kāraṇa tve sarvadā tatas kārya utpāda prasaṅgaḥ tad rūpasya prāk sarvadā viśeṣāt naṣṭasya api janaka tve nāśāt ūrdhvam tatas sarvadā kārya utpāda prasaṅgaḥ tad rūpā viśeṣāt tad rūpeṇa eva ca śakta tvāt śaktasya ca kṣepā yogāt sahakārī apekṣasya janaka tvam ced na atīta anāgatayoḥ anupakārya tvena saha kāri vaiyarthyāt upakārya tve ca upakārasya upakāryāt abhinna tvāt tayoḥ sahakāribhyaḥ utpādena vartamāna tā prasaṅgaḥ kim ca artha kriyā lakṣaṇa tvāt vastunaḥ iti abhyupagamāt atīta anāgatayoḥ janakatvena satvam satvena ca kṣaṇika tvam prasaktam tatas ca kṣaṇa mātram atīta anāgata tā ca syāt kṣaṇika tvāt vartamāna tāvat kim ca anāgata avasthāyām kāryam kṛtvā punar vartamāna avasthāyām karoti iti ekasya karma kartṛ tvam syāt tatas ca akṣaṇika tva abhyupagamaḥ syāt ekasya karma kartṛ tvam eva hi akṣaṇika tvam 
[298,3]	yat ca idam uktam bhūta bhaviṣyat kāla vyāpi tvena hi pratīyamānam kāraṇam na anyathā iti tat ca na na hi evam kaścid kāraṇam pratyeti sva ātmanaḥ api kāraṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ ca uktaḥ kim ca kāraṇa kārya bhāva pratipattim antareṇa āvinābhāvaḥ na siddhi ati iti āha kīrtiḥ tvayā punar viparītam kalpitam tathā ca yadi ādau vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ pratīyate na tarhi kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratīti nibandhanāvinā bhāva pratītiḥ atha na ādau avinābhāvaḥ pratītyate na tarhi vyāpi tva vyatirekasya kāraṇa tva vyavasthāpane nimitta tvam iti 
[298,10]	yat punar etat kāryasya para bhāvam vinā kāraṇam na bhavati iti tat ayuktam para bhūte kārye anutpanne api utpannam kāraṇam katham tena vinā na bhūtam na hi yat utpadyamānam yasya sattām na apekṣate tat tasya api kāraṇa tvam yuktam agneḥ api hi na vyāpaka tva mātreṇa pūrva bhāva mātreṇa vā kāraṇa tvam kim tu kāraṇa antareṣu satsu api yāvat tatra agniḥ na bhavati tāvat tatra dhūmaḥ na utpadyate iti agneḥ sāmarthya avagatiḥ na ca evam anāgatasya sāmarthyam gamyate vyāpaka tva mātreṇa vṛkṣaḥ api śiṃśapā kāraṇam syāt vyatirikta tve sati iti viśeṣaṇam na kartavyam sva ātmanaḥ api yat vyāpakam tad kāraṇam eva astu sva ātmanaḥ kāraṇam laukika parīkṣakāṇām aprasiddha tvāt na iṣyate iti ced anāgata ādi api tarhi na iṣṭavyam na hi tatra api kāraṇa tva prasiddhiḥ asti tasmāt na anāgatam api kāraṇam tatra anāgatasya para loka ādeḥ anumānam kārya anumāne antarbhavati 
[298,22]	na api vṛkṣa tva śiṃśapā tu ādeḥ tādātmyam asti ukta nyāyāt atha ca gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ asti kim ca sāmānyayoḥ gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ na ca tayoḥ tādātmyam tādātmye hi śiṃśapā tu akṛtaka tva ādi niścayaḥ eva vṛkṣa tva anitya tva ādi niścayaḥ syāt na hi bhinna yogakṣemayoḥ tādātmyam yuktam vastuni ca tādātmye api na anumāna viṣaya tvam liṅga liṅgi vikalpayoḥ tatra asambhavāt sambhave vā liṅga niścayaḥ eva liṅgi niścayaḥ syāt abhinna viṣaya tvāt yena ca prakāreṇa bhinna viṣaya tvam tena tādātmyam api nasti iti anumānam na syāt 
[298,29^1]	kim ca vṛkṣa śiṃśapayoḥ tādātmya aviśeṣāt viparyaye api gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ syāt na hi aṃśena tādātyam tādātmya aviśeṣe api vyāpaka aṃśasya eva gamya tvam vyāpya aṃśasya anugamaka tvam eva iti ced na niraṃśa tvāt eka ātmanaḥ sa aṃśa tve vā tādātmya virodhaḥ ekam ca tat vastu vyāpakam vā syāt vyāpyam vā iti etena vṛkṣa viśeṣa tvam vṛkṣa svabhāva tvam vā tanmātra anubandhi tvam vā śiṃśapāyāḥ na tu tad viśeṣa tvam tad svabhāva tvam vā tanmātra anubandhi tvam vā vṛkṣasya iti niyamaḥ pratyuktaḥ vṛkṣaḥ vyabhicarati na śiṃśapā iti ced tādātmye api yadi vyabhicāraḥ śiṃśapā na vyabhicariṣyati iti kā pratyāśā atha vṛkṣaḥ aśiṃśapā svabhāvaḥ asti iti tena asau vyabhicārī avṛkṣa svabhāvā śiṃśapā na asti iti kim nirśeṣa darśanam te asti sā api hi vṛkṣa vat ubhaya svabhāvā śaṃkyeta 
[298,29^2]	yathā kvacid deśe nīlotpalam eva asti tatas tad deśa jaiḥ sarvaiḥ api anya adṛśa utpala adarśanena nīla svabhāvam eva utpalam iti vyavasthāpitam na tathā eva bhavati tasmāt kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt vā svabhāvāt vā ityādi ayuktam eva tathā anyathā eka nivṛttyā ityādi api na yuktam vyāpaka nivṛttau hi vyāpya nivṛttiḥ vyāpya sannidhānāt ca vyāpakasya sannidhiḥ bhavati na ca gavāśu ādīnām vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ asti atha gavāśvādi vat bhede sati na keṣāṃcid vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ prāpnoti iti ucyate tādātmye sati api tarhi nīlotpala tva ādi vat na kvacid api syāt kim ca bhede sati gavāśu ādi vat agni dhūma ādīnām kārya kāraṇa bhavaḥ api na syāt artha antara tva aviśeṣe api ittham svabhāvena niyatam vastu kiṃcid eva kasyacid vyāpakam na sarvam sarvasya iti alam prasaṅgena tad siddham etat anvayavyatirekyādi grahaṇam para abhipreta traividhya niṣedha arthan na tu kārya kāraṇa ādi bheda niṣedha artham iti 
[299,21^1]	katham punar kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate na hi avaśyam hetavaḥ phalavantaḥ bhavanti antarāle pratibandha vaikalya sambhavāt sāmagrī kāle api na anumānam liṅga darśana anantaram eva kārya niṣpatteḥ tadā na kāryam pratyakṣam eva syāt na vā apratibandha sāmagrī viśiṣṭam kāraṇam niścetum śakyate na ca aniścitam liṅgam siddhi aṅgam iti atra ucyate yat tāvat na avaśyam hetavaḥ phalavantaḥ iti tat na keṣāṃcid avaśya phala tvāt na khalu sarva kāraṇānām kārya anumāpaka tvam brūmaḥ kim tarhi 
[299,21^2]	yat eva kāraṇam yathā viśiṣṭam yat kāryam na vyabhicarati tena eva tathā aviśiṣṭam tat kāryam anumīyate yathā medha viśeṣa jñāḥ medhena viśiṣṭena vṛṣṭim anuminvanti na ca aviśiṣṭasya vyabhicārāt viśiṣṭasya api vyabhicāraḥ atiprasaṅgāt kim ca tad abhyāsa ādara pratyayaiḥ tad kāryasya saṃskārasya anumānam tad saṃskāreṇa vāyuṣi niścite bhāvinī smṛtiḥ anumīyate hiṃsā ādibhiḥ ca adharma utpattiḥ viśiṣṭena parasya śarīra dāha cheda ādinā duḥkha utpattiḥ iti evam anyatra api kāraṇena kārya anumānam ūhyam yat punar etat hetunā yaḥ samagreṇa kārya utpādaḥ anumīyate artha antara anapekṣa tvāt sa svabhāvaḥ anuvarṇitaḥ iti 
[300,11]	tat vyāmūḍha bhāṣitam kārya utpādaḥ hi kārya dharmaḥ sa katham hetu svabhāvaḥ syāt na hi hetu kāryayoḥ tādātmyam yuktam kārya utpādana yogya tā tu asamagrāt api hetoḥ anumīyate kārya avyabhicāritā samagrasya eva iti ced sa avaśyam tarhi kāryam api anumāpayati iti siddham kāraṇena kārya anumānam nadī pūra ādi kāryeṇa bhūta varṣa ādi karaṇa anumānam pipīlikā aṇḍa saṃcaraṇa ādi viśeṣeṇa bhaviṣyat varṣa anumānam iti evamādya kārya kāraṇa anumānam 
[300,18]	atha vā pūrvavat iti akāraṇena api pūrva niṣpannena uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ anumānam tad viparyayeṇa anumānam tu śeṣavat iti ucyate dvayoḥ ekaḥ kālaḥ sāmānyam tena dṛṣṭam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam liṅga samāna kāla tvena dṛṣṭam iti arthaḥ etasmin pakṣe pipīlika ādinā varṣa anumānam pūrvavat eva sāmānyatodṛṣṭa udāharaṇam tu rūpa rasa ādi anumānam kṛtaka tva anitya tva ādi anumānam vā iti 
[300,23]	atha vā pūrvam niṣpannam anumeyam yasya asti tat pūrvavat yathā nadī pūra darśanāt abhūta vṛṣṭiḥ iti anumānam pipīlika ādinā varṣa anumānam tu śeṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu tat eva iti kevala anvaya ādi bhedaḥ api pūrvavat ādeḥ eva arthaḥ iti vyākhyātam tasya idānīm lakṣaṇa udāharaṇābhyām svarūpa prakaṭana artham upanyāsaḥ 
[301,14^1]	tatra pañca rūpaḥ anvayavyatirekī rūpāṇi tu pakṣa dharma tvam sa pakṣe satvam vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ avādhita viṣaya tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam ca iti tatra sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī pakṣaḥ tatra vyāpya vṛtti tvam hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam tatra tasmin pakṣe vyāpya vartate na tu pakṣa eka deśe sa vyāpya vṛttiḥ sa pakṣa vyāpakaḥ iti arthaḥ sādhya samāna dharmā dharmī sa pakṣaḥ tasmin sa pakṣe sarvasmin eka deśena vā hetoḥ vṛttiḥ sa pakṣe sattvam sādhya vyāvṛtta dharmā dharmī vipakṣaḥ tatra sarvasmin vipakṣe hetoḥ avṛttiḥ vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ pramāṇa avirodhini pratijñā arthe hetoḥ vṛttiḥ abādhita viṣaya tvam 
[301,14^2]	sādhya tad viparītayoḥ sādhanasya atri rūpa tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam sa dvividhaḥ saḥ anvaya vyatirekī dvividhaḥ sa pakṣa vṛtti bhedāt tat yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ kāryatvāt iti sa pakṣa vyāpakaḥ sāmānyavat tve sati asmad ādi bāhya indriya grāhya tvāt iti sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ iti pakṣa vyāpakaḥ sa pakṣa vṛttiḥ avidyamāna vipakṣaḥ kevala anvayī sa pūrvavat dvividhaḥ anvaya vyatireki vat sa pakṣa vṛtti bhedāt dvividhaḥ iti arthaḥ tat yathā vivāda āspadībhūtāni adṛṣṭa ādīni kasyacid pratyakṣāṇi prameya tvāt kara tala āmalaka vat iti ayam sa pakṣa vyāpakaḥ hetuḥ tasmin eva pratijñā arthe mīmāṃsakānām apratyakṣa tvāt asmad sukha ādi vat iti ayam hetuḥ sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ iti 
[302,9]	nanu ca vyatireka abhāve asya avinā abhāvaḥ eva na syāt tena vinā na bhavati iti ayam eva hi vyatirekaḥ sādhya abhāvaḥ hi vipakṣaḥ tatra avaśyam sādhanasya asattvam khyāpanīyam anyathā sandigdha anaikāntika tvam syāt atha sādhya abhāvasya khapuṣpa ādeḥ niḥsvabhāva tvāt adhikaraṇa āpādāna ādi bhāvaḥ anupapannaḥ tena hetoḥ na tatra sattvam tatas nivṛttiḥ vā iti tat kim idānīm vṛttiḥ astu sā api na iti ced na tat kim idānīm mūkena bhavitavyam tat āha 
[302,15]	nivṛttiḥ yadi tasmin na hetoḥ vṛttiḥ kim iṣyate sā api na pratiṣedhaḥ ayam nivṛttiḥ kid niṣidhyate vidhānam pratiṣedham ca muktvā śābdaḥ asti na aparaḥ vyavahāraḥ sa ca asatsu na iti prāptā atra mūka tā satām ca na niṣedhaḥ asti saḥ asatsu ca na vidyate jagati anena nyāyena nañarthaḥ pralayam gataḥ tasmāt vaidharmya dṛṣṭānte na iṣṭaḥ avaśyam iha āśrayaḥ tad abhāve ca tat na iti vacanāt api tad gateḥ tasmāt na kevala anvayī hetuḥ asti iti 
[302,25]	tat etat ayuktam yat tāvat vyatireka abhāve avinā abhāvaḥ na syāt iti tat na vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ hi avinā abhāvaḥ ucyate sa ca kevala anvayinaḥ api asti śabda vyutpatti asambhava mātreṇa artha pratiṣedhe ati prasaṅgaḥ syāt tathā hi pratigatam akṣam iti vyutpatti asambhavāt mānasa ādi trayam pratyakṣam na syāt agacchan ca gauḥ na syāt tasmāt lakṣaṇa vaśāt eva tattva vyavasthā sādhyena sādhanasya vyāptiḥ avinā abhāvaḥ uktaḥ saḥ atra api asti eva iti 
[303,5]	yat ca uktam sādhya abhāve hetoḥ asattvam eva vyatirekaḥ tad akhyāpane ca sandigdha anaikāntika tvam iti tat api ayuktam vipakṣe hi sati kim tatra hetuḥ asti na vā iti āṃśakā api syāt na ca atra vipakṣaḥ asti sarvasya api sat asat rūpasya pratyakṣa tva abhyupagamāt kha puṣpa ādeḥ ca sat rūpa tvena asat rūpa tvena vā pratīyamāna tve sādhya tvam eva apratīyamāna tve vā katham tasya sādhya abhāva tvam vipakṣa tvam pratipādyate na ca apramāṇakasya vipakṣa tvam yuktam na api tatra hetoḥ sattvam asattvam vā cintyate na hi nakha agra sthe hasti yūthe hetuḥ kim asti na vā iti buddhimantaḥ vicāram ādriyante yadi punar apramāṇakeṣu kha puṣpa ādiṣu hetuḥ na asti iti asya eva vyatireka saṃjñā kriyate bhavatu evaṃvidhena vyatirekeṇa ayam vyatirekī kin tu ukta lakṣaṇāt vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ asti iti kevala anvayī kathyate vipakṣasya api lakṣaṇe dharmi grahaṇam kalpitasya tad bhāva niṣedha artham sa pramāṇakaḥ hi arthaḥ sa pakṣa vipakṣa tvena loke prasiddhaḥ tasmāt ukta lakṣaṇa vipakṣa abhāvaḥ yasya sa kevala anvayī iti 
[303,18]	nivṛttiḥ yadi tasmin na iti ādi prasaṅgaḥ tu bhavataḥ eva siddhāntam bādhate kṣaṇāt ūrdhvam nivṛttau vastunaḥ tādātmya virodhaḥ tad anivṛttau ca kṣaṇika tva virodhaḥ tad ubhaya anabhyupagame tu avidhānam pratiṣedham ca a ityādi bādhakam nañarthaḥ api tava eva pralayam gataḥ yena sataḥ aparamabhāvam na abhyupagacchasi yasya ca hetoḥ vyatireka balena gamaka tvam tasya avaśyam vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta āśrayaḥ eṣṭavyaḥ anyathā vacana mātreṇa vyatireka apratīteḥ pratītau vā anvaya dṛṣṭānta āśrayaḥ api na iṣṭavyaḥ tad bhāve tat asti iti vacanāt eva tad gatiḥ bhaviṣyati iti tasmāt sa pramāṇakasya avaidharmya dṛṣṭāntasya abhāvāt kevala anvayinaḥ na vyatireki tvam na api ahetu tvam pakṣa vyāpaka tve sati avādhita viṣaya asat pratipakṣa tve ca sati sa pakṣe vartamāna tvāt anvaya vyatireki vat iti 
[303,29]	avidyamāna sapakṣaḥ pakṣa vyāpakaḥ vipakṣāt vyāvṛttaḥ kevala vyatirekī yathā sarva vid kartṛ pūrvakam sarvam kāryam kādācid ka tvāt yat sarva vid kartṛ pūrvakam na bhavati tat na kādācid kam yathā akāśa ādi tathā sa ātmakam jīvat śarīram prāṇa ādima tvāt yat na sa ātmakam na tad prāṇa ādimat yathā loṣṭha ādi prasaṅga dvāreṇa vā prayujyate na idam nirātmakam jīvat śarīram aprāṇa ādima tva prasaṅgāt loṣṭha vat iti 
[304,9]	nanu ca dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi dṛṣṭaḥ dharmaḥ tad vyāptena hetunā sādhya dharmiṇi vidhīyate vā pratiṣidhyate vā na ca ātmā kvacid prāṇa ādi vyāpaka tvena dṛṣṭaḥ tat katham jīvat śarīreṣu prāṇa ādi upalambhāt ātma siddhiḥ tad nivṛttau ca ghaṭa ādiṣu prāṇa ādi nivṛttiḥ iti atha aprāṇa ādimattvena vyāptam ghaṭa ādiṣu nairātmyam dṛṣṭam tena jīvat śarīreṣu aprāṇa ādimattva nivṛttau nairātmya nivṛttiḥ iti na etat asti adṛśya anupalambhāt abhāva asiddhau ghaṭa ādīnām nairātmya asiddheḥ para abhyupagamāt siddhiḥ iti ced katham idānīm ātma siddhiḥ parasya api aprāmāṇikā katham nairātmya siddhiḥ abhyupagama mātreṇa ca tad siddhau āgamika tvam ātmani pratipannam syāt na anumeya tvam tasmāt adarśane api ātmanaḥ nivṛtti asiddheḥ prāṇa ādīnām asiddha pratibandha tvāt na ātma nivṛttau eva tad nivṛtti siddhiḥ iti agamaka tvam iti 
[305,2^1]	atra eke pariharanti ghaṭa ādiṣu ātmanā sambandha mātram nairātmyam atra abhipretam na tu tat rahita tvam nitya vyāpi tvāt ātmanaḥ tat sattvam vecchā ādiḥ tatra siddham tasya jīvat śarīre vyatirekiṇā prāṇa ādi janana samarthaḥ sambandhaḥ sādhyate na nirātmakam iti asya ayam arthaḥ na sambandha mātra upetam iti ghaṭa ādi vat aprāṇa ādimattva prasaṅgāt ghaṭa ādiṣu ca nairātmyam prāṇa ādi anutpattyā eva niścitam iti te tu evam praṣṭavyāḥ prāṇa ādi anutpattiḥ kim anvaya sāmarthyena ghaṭa ādiṣu nairātmyam gamayati āho svid vyatireka sāmarthyena iti kim ca atas 
[305,2^2]	sarvatra nairātmyam syāt ātma sambandha viśeṣa vat adṛṣṭa tvāt na kvacid anvaya siddhiḥ anumānena eva anavasthā syāt vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt na vyatirekataḥ api nairātmya siddhiḥ jīvat śarīrasya dṛṣṭānta tve tu itaretara āśraya tva prasaṅgaḥ prāṇa ādi kārya anutpattyā tad samartha hetvā abhāvaḥ anumīyate dāru vāsya ādi sambandha viśeṣa abhāve chidādi anutpatti vat atas na itaretara āśraya tva ādi doṣaḥ iti ced evam tarhi prāṇa ādi kārya utpattyā tat samartha hetuḥ chidādi utpattau dāru vāsya ādi sambandha viśeṣa vat anvayena eva anumīyate iti apārthakaḥ vyatirekī syāt iti 
[305,16]	atra ucyate laukika parīkṣakāṇām yasmin arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti uktam ghaṭa ādiṣu ca nairātmyam aprāṇādimattvam ca iti asmin arthe asti eva bhavatām asmākam ca sampratipattiḥ tat katham na ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ kutas pramāṇāt iti kim anena vicāreṇa āgamāt anyatas vā bhavatu vicāreṇa api hi sampratipattiḥ kartavyā sā ced tam vinā api siddhā kim vicāreṇa sampratipannasya vicāre hi anavasthā syāt iti yadi ca ghaṭa ādiṣu nairātmya buddhiḥ mithyā tatas sa ātmaka tvam samyak astu tat ca api aniṣṭam 
[305,25^1]	yadi vā ubhayatra sa ātmaka tvam anātmaka tvam vā syāt tadānīm ekatra prāṇa ādi sambhavaḥ anyatra na iti kiṃkṛtaḥ ayam viśeṣaḥ svabhāvataḥ eva iti ced na nityam sattvam asattvam ca iti ādi prasaṅgāt buddhi sadbhāva asadbhāva kṛtaḥ iti ced na prāṇa apāna nimeṣa unmeṣa jīvana manaḥ gata indriya antara vikāra buddhi sukha duḥkha ādīnām prāṇa ādi śabdena abhidhānāt vibhoḥ sarvatra sadbhāvāt ghaṭa ādiṣu api sa ātmaka tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na ātma adhiṣṭhita tva viśeṣasya sa ātmaka tvena abhihita tvāt tasya ca prāṇa ādi anyathā anupapattyā eva siddhiḥ sa ātmakān ātmaka tva viśeṣaḥ api kiṃkṛtaḥ iti ced adṛṣṭa viśeṣa kṛtam tad viśeṣyaḥ api janma antara ja prāṇa ādi viśeṣa kṛtaḥ saḥ api janma antara kṛtaḥ iti anādi tvam parihāraḥ 
[305,25^2]	na ca adṛṣṭa viśeṣam antareṇa kasyacid niruddha prāṇa ādikasya eva utpādaḥ kasyacid utpannasya dina dvayena vārddha māsa saṃvatsara ādi vikalpena vā prāṇa ādi nirodhaḥ iti ayam viśeṣaḥ upapadyate pitṛ ādi kāraṇeṣu api viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ jñānam eva pūrva adṛṣṭa viśeṣa niyamitam kvacid eva utpadyate kiyat kālam yāvat avatiṣṭhe tad anuvidhāne na prāṇa ādeḥ api utpattiḥ avasthānam ca iti kim atra adṛṣṭa sāmarthyena ātmanā kalpitena iti ced na etat asti jñānasya api hi nāśi tvena para loki tvam pūrva dṛṣṭa anusandhātṛ tvam ca na sambhavati iti vakṣyāmaḥ tat yaḥ asau para lokī pūrva dṛṣṭa anusandhānāt ca saḥ eva ātmā tena adhiṣṭhite śarīre prāṇāḥ bhavanti na anyathā iti evam ca na kha puṣpa ādimattvasya api siddhiḥ kha puṣpa ādeḥ prāṇa ādi utpattau vipakṣa bādhakena api sāmarthya asiddhiḥ siddhau vā saḥ eva ātmā iti na asti vivādaḥ 
[306,17]	nanu evam tarhi prāṇa ādi kāryeṇa tad hetuḥ anumīyate ghaṭa ādi kāryasya ca hetumat tva darśanāt anvayaḥ api asti iti katham kevala vyatirekī na viśiṣṭa sādhyena anvaya abhāvāt nitya tva ādi dharmakaḥ hi prāṇa ādi hetuḥ sādhya sthāvidhena ca na kvacid anvayaḥ prasiddhaḥ 
[306,22]	sāmānya siddhau adhikaraṇa siddhānta balena deśa ādi sambandha viśeṣaḥ eva siddhyati na tu nitya tva ādi viśeṣaḥ tatra hetoḥ sāmarthya abhāvāt sāmānya mātra siddhau pariśeṣāt abhipreta viśeṣa siddhiḥ iti ced kaḥ ayam pariśeṣaḥ prasakta pratiṣedhe anyatra aprasaṅgāt śiṣyamāṇe sampratyayaḥ pariśeṣaḥ śiṣyamāṇe sampratyayaḥ kutas bhavati prasakta pratiṣedha hetavaḥ tāvat pratiṣedhya siddhau eva kṛtārthāḥ tad upakṛtaḥ tu maulaḥ hetuḥ tathāvidha sādhyena anvaya anapekṣaḥ tam viśeṣam sādhayan kevala vyatireki eva sampadyate 
[307,2^1]	tasya sva sādhyena vyāpti samarthana artham itare hetavaḥ tathā hi kāraṇa mātra sādhakena kāryatvena prāṇa ādeḥ nirhetuka tvam pratiṣiddham anya kṛtau adṛṣṭa saṃskārau na anyasya phalate iti anena deha ādyavyatirikta hetuka tvam pratiṣiddham pūrva abhyasta smṛti anubandha tva ādinā kṛtaka hetuka tvam pratiṣiddham iti evam pratipakṣa bādhaka hetubhyaḥ prāṇa ādeḥ sādhya viśeṣeṇa vyāptiḥ kākatīra adarśana nyāyena pakṣaḥ eva siddhyati saḥ eva anvayaḥ iti ced bhavatu nāma evam tathā api anyatra pakṣāt anvayaḥ asya na asti iti vyatireki tvam uktam iti evam samarthitasya vyatirekiṇaḥ samyak hetu tvam na vipakṣa adarśana mātreṇa ḍittha ādi siddhau api hetu tva prasaṅgāt tathā sarva vid kartṛ abhāve kāryatvam eva na sambhavati 
[307,2^2]	na hi acetanam cetanā anadhiṣṭhitam pravartate iti vakṣyāmaḥ yatra api kumbhakāra ādiḥ adhiṣṭhātā asti tatra api na tasya eva kartṛ tvam adṛṣṭa ādi kāraṇa adhiṣṭhātṛ tve sāmarthya abhāvāt tad anadhiṣṭhitasya vā adṛṣṭa ādeḥ na pravṛttiḥ tad vikalā ca sāmagrī na kārya utpattau samarthā na hi eka kāraka apravṛttau api kārya utpattiḥ kvacid asti iti adṛṣṭa ādi sahakāri vikalebhyaḥ kulāla ādi adhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ api hetubhyaḥ kārya utpādaḥ na syāt tasmāt yathā kulāla ādi adhiṣṭhitāni daṇḍa ādīni ghaṭa ādau pravartante tathā sarvajña adhiṣṭhitāni adṛṣṭa ādīni iti kulāla vat ghaṭa ādiṣu api sarva vidaḥ kartṛ tvam atas sarvam kāryam sarva vid kartṛ pūrvakam iti siddham evam anyaḥ api vyatirekī samarthayitavyaḥ iti 
[307,20^1]	udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ tathā vaidharmyāt iti sūtram hetu lakṣaṇa artham udāharaṇa śabdena atra sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ uktaḥ tena sādharmyam sādhyasya iti prakramāt labhyate evam ca viruddha sādhāraṇa prakārasya asiddhasya ca vyudāsaḥ udāharaṇena eva iti avadhāraṇa āśrayaṇāt anaikāntikasya api vyudāsaḥ bhāga asiddha niṣedha artham sādhyasya sādharmyam eva iti kartavyam evam ca dvi lakṣaṇa tri lakṣaṇau anvayinau labdhau iti tamoriḥ na kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa prakaraṇā samayoḥ api hetu tva prasaṅgāt atha tad nivṛtti artham sādhya sādhana grahaṇam evam tarhi sādhya sādhana grahaṇam eva astu tatas eva hi sarva hetu ābhāsānam vyudāsaḥ siddhaḥ sādhya sādhana tva aviśeṣāt iti satyam evam etat tathā api udāharaṇa ityādi viśeṣa lakṣaṇa artham kṛtam sādharmyāt iti vītasya lakṣaṇam vaidharmyāt iti avītasya iti atas dvividhaḥ eva hetuḥ sva rūpeṇa hi artha sādhaka tvam vītasya lakṣaṇam para pakṣa niṣedhena avītasya iti atha vā sādharmyāt iti anvayinaḥ vaidharmyāt iti vyatirekiṇaḥ samuccitam ca anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ iti 
[307,20^2]	tathā vaidharmyāt iti udāharaṇa vaidharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti arthaḥ udāharaṇam ca atra vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ tatra artha ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇa apekṣayā prathama antam eva sādharmya vaidharmya padam draṣṭavyam vacana ātmaka apekṣayā tu pañcamī antam kṛtam tasya eva prādhānyena lakṣaṇam avayava prastāvāt ucyamānasya karma tvam tatra ca ṣaṣṭhī yuktā iti ced na nimitta tvasya vivakṣita tvāt nimitta tvam ca arthe sati tad darśanam tatas vivakṣā krameṇa śabda utpattiḥ iti yadā anvayi ādi lakṣaṇa artham pūrvavat ādi sūtram tadā tad lakṣaṇasya anuvādaḥ avayava lakṣaṇa arthaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ 
[307,20^3]	yadā tu anya artham tat sūtram tadā atra eva anuṣaṃgataḥ anvaya ādi lakṣaṇa vidhānam iti udāharaṇa sādharmyāt yat vacanam iti adhyāhāryam nirdeśaḥ vā adhikṛtaḥ pratijñā sūtrāt nigamana lakṣaṇe vā vacana grahaṇam kṛtam sarvatra api draṣṭavyam sādhana padasya liṅga vāci tvāt sādharmya ādi pada vat pañcamī prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na vacana vāci tvasya api vivakṣita tvāt na udāharaṇa sādharmyāt utpannam vacana mātram hetuḥ kim tu yat sādhya sādhanam sādhana tva khyāpakam iti arthaḥ tat vyākhyātam parastāt iti 
[308,23]	etena hetvābhāsānām ahetu tvam uktam bhavati hetu lakṣaṇa rahitāḥ hetu vat ābhāsamānāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ savyabhicāra viruddha prakaraṇa sama sādhya sama atīta kālāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ iti sūtram tasya artha saṃgraha artham asiddha viruddha anaikāntika anadhya vasita kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa prakaraṇa samāḥ iti vākyam vyutpatti artham anyathā vinyastam sarvatra tathā upanyāse hi chāndasaḥ śrotā syāt iti 
[309,4]	atra aniścita pakṣa vṛttiḥ asiddhaḥ aniścitā sandigdhā vipratipannā vā na asti iti niścitā vā pakṣe vṛttiḥ yasya hetoḥ sa tathā uktaḥ sādhya aviśiṣṭaḥ sādhya tvāt sādhya samaḥ iti sūtram sampratipatti aviṣaya tvam sādhya aviśiṣṭa tvam vyāpakam lakṣaṇam sādhya tvāt iti antara asiddhasya lakṣaṇa pramāda pāṭhaḥ vā siddha tva ādi vyarthaḥ vā iti 
[309,10]	pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ eva vartamānaḥ viruddhaḥ siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ iti sūtram siddhānta abhyupagama lakṣaṇaḥ sādhya dharmaḥ iti arthaḥ tam abhyupagamya yaḥ hetuḥ tam viroddhum śīlaḥ tad viparyayam vyāpnoti sa viruddhaḥ katham acetanaḥ hetuḥ abhyupagacchati upacāreṇa tad prayoktṛ abhyupagatam tat balena vā tena eva abhyupagatam iti upacaryate upacāre ca prayojanam viśeṣa viruddha nivṛttiḥ 
[309,17]	pakṣa traya vṛttiḥ anaikāntikaḥ anaikāntikaḥ savyabhicāraḥ iti sūtram paryāyaḥ atra lakṣaṇam buddhiḥ upalabdhiḥ ityādi vat niruktiḥ vā anyonya lakṣaṇam 
[309,21]	sādhya asādhakaḥ pakṣaḥ eva vartamānaḥ anadhyavasitaḥ kevala vyatireki vyavaccheda artham sādhya asādhaka grahaṇam sādhya vyabhicāre asya antar bhāvaḥ iti eke yathā hi hetoḥ ubhayatra vṛttiḥ vyabhicāraḥ tathā ubhayatas vyāvṛttiḥ api vyabhicāraḥ yathā ca na ekasmin ante vṛttiḥ tathā anaikasmāt antāt vyāvṛttiḥ iti sādhāraṇa vat asā dhāraṇaḥ ayam anaikāntikaḥ asat vipakṣaḥ anupasaṃhāryaḥ ca tarhi katham anaikāntikaḥ yathā sarvam kāryam nitya janma tvāt sarvam anityam prameya tvāt iti na api anayoḥ prakaraṇa same antarbhāvaḥ tad lakṣaṇa vikala tvāt tad lakṣaṇa vikalasya api tatra antarbhāve hi atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt iti tasmāt na pañcatva avadhāraṇa artham savyabhicāra viruddha ityādi sūtram kin tu nidarśana artham yathā ete hetvābhāsāḥ tathā anyaḥ api hetu lakṣaṇa rahitaḥ hetu vat ābhāsamānaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ pratyetavyaḥ iti arthaḥ 
[310,6]	pramāṇa bādhite pakṣe vartamānaḥ hetuḥ kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ kāla atītaḥ iti sūtram nirdiṣṭa pakṣa upanyāsa anantaram hetu upanyāsa kālaḥ tad atyayena apadiṣṭaḥ kālam atītaḥ kāla atītaḥ 
[310,10^1]	sva para pakṣa siddhau api trirūpaḥ hetuḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ prakaraṇayoḥ pakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ siddhau samaḥ tri rūpa tvena tri rūpa tvam ca pakṣa dharma tvam sa pakṣe sattvam vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ iti yasmāt prakaraṇa cintā sa nirṇaya artham apadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ iti sūtram yasmāt nitya anitya viśeṣa anupalambhāt kim ayam nityaḥ vā anityaḥ iti eṣā prakaraṇa cintā sa viśeṣa dharma anupalambhaḥ hetu tvena uktaḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya dharma anupalabdheḥ iti viruddha vyabhicārī tarhi prakaraṇa samaḥ vipakṣa dharma anupalabdheḥ iti ucyate tathā api sattva ādeḥ vipakṣa dharmasya anupalabdhiḥ ubhayā siddhi viśiṣṭa dharma anupalabdhiḥ ca anyatara asiddha iti 
[310,10^2]	atha yaḥ akṛtaka tva ādi anupalabdheḥ asiddha tām na udbhāvayitum śaknoti tad viṣayaḥ ayam prakaraṇa samaḥ viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ api tarhi ye doṣa antaram na udbhāvayitum śaknuvanti tān prati kid na hetvābhāsa antara tvam iṣyate pakṣa sa pakṣa ani atara tva ādeḥ ca anena lakṣaṇena katham saṃgrahaḥ iti ucyate yasmāt pratipakṣa siddhau aviśeṣeṇa pratīyamānāt prakaraṇa cintā bhavati sa prakaraṇa samaḥ iti etāvat eva vyāpakam lakṣaṇam nirṇaya artham apadiṣṭaḥ iti etat anya artham anyaḥ api hetvābhāsaḥ yena eva nirṇaya artham apadiṣṭaḥ tasya eva nigraha sthānam na punar prativādinā prāśnikena vā anubhāṣaṇa artham apadiṣṭaḥ api iti 
[310,28]	atha eṣām saha udāharaṇena avāntara bhedaḥ prapañcyate nanu deśa kāla bhedena anantaḥ sūkṣma īkṣikayā svarūpa bhedena api anantaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ tat katham tad bhedaḥ prapañcena vaktum śakyate iti ucyate yadi api ca eṣām sūkṣmaḥ bhedaḥ ananta tvāt na śakyate vaktum tathā api sthūla dṛṣṭim āśritya kiyantaḥ bhedāḥ pradarśyante vyutpatti artham 
[311,10^1]	asiddha bhedāḥ tāvat svarūpeṇa asiddhaḥ svarūpam vā asiddham yasya saḥ ayam svarūpa asiddhaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt iti nanu cākṣuṣa tvam rūpa ādau asti tena asya vyadhikaraṇa asiddha tvam yuktam na rūpa ādi adhikaraṇa tvena apratipādita tvāt dharmiṇi ca apadiṣṭam cākṣuṣa tvam na svarūpataḥ asti iti āhaṅkārika cakṣuḥ viṣaya tvam vā jāti andham prati vā svarūpa asiddham iti vyadhikaraṇa asiddhaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ paṭasya kṛtaka tvāt vyadhikaraṇaḥ ca asau asiddhaḥ ca iti nanu śabde api kṛtaka tvam asti satyam na tathā pratipāditam na ca anyatra pratipāditam anyatra siddham bhavati anyatarasya vā vyadhikaraṇa asiddham 
[311,10^2]	anyaḥ tu āha vyadhikaraṇaḥ api hetuḥ gamakaḥ asti yathā brāhmaṇaḥ ayam pitroḥ brāhmaṇa tvāt iti yadi evam naṭa ādīnām api brāhmaṇyam kasmāt na sādhayati teṣām pitroḥ brāhmaṇya abhāvāt iti ced evam tarhi prayojaka sambandhena pakṣa sambandhaḥ hetuḥ katham vyadhikaraṇaḥ pratibandha śaktyā vā anyathā abhidhāne api brāhmaṇaḥ brāhmaṇa janya tvāt iti evam hetu artham pratipadya sādhyam pratipadyate iti viśeṣya asiddhaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyavat tve sati cākṣuṣa tvāt viśeṣaṇā siddhaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tve sati sāmānyavat tvāt bhāga asiddhaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt nanu ca vāyu ādi śabdānām api īśvara prayatna pūrvaka tvāt katham bhāga asiddhatvam iti 
[311,10^3]	na etat asti prayatnasya tīvra manda ādi bhāva anantara śabdasya tathā bhāvaḥ hi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam vivakṣitam na ca īśvara prayatnasya tīvra ādi bhāvaḥ asti nitya tvāt anabhyupagata īśvaram prati vā bhāga asiddha tvam āśraya asiddhaḥ yathā asti pradhānam viśva pariṇāmi tvāt āśraya eka deśa asiddhaḥ yathā nityāḥ pradhāna puruṣa īśvarāḥ akṛtaka tvāt vyartha viśeṣya asiddhaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyavat tve sati kṛtaka tvāt nanu ca asiddha lakṣaṇa abhāvāt na ayam asiddhaḥ satyam kim tu eka deśīya abhiprāyeṇa uktaḥ vyartha tvam tu dūṣaṇam bhavati eva kin tu asiddhatvam na asti yasya tu śabde kṛtaka tvam asiddham pratyasiddha tvam api ucyate vyartha viśeṣaṇā siddhaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyavat tve sati kṛtaka tvāt 
[311,10^4]	vyartha viśeṣaṇaḥ ca asau asiddhaḥ ca iti evam vyartha viśeṣya asiddhaḥ api vyākhyeyaḥ paramāṇu ādau vā pakṣīkṛte vyartha viśeṣya asiddhaḥ vyartha viśeṣaṇā siddhaḥ ca draṣṭavyaḥ iti sandigdha asiddhaḥ yathā dhūma bāṣpa ādi vivekā niścaye kaścid āha agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ dhūmavat tvāt sandigdha viśeṣya asiddhaḥ yathā adya api rāga ādi yuktaḥ kapilaḥ puruṣa tve sati adya api anutpanna tattva jñāna tvāt sandigdha viśeṣaṇā siddhaḥ yathā adya api rāga ādi yuktaḥ kapilaḥ sarvadā tattva jñāna rahita tve sati puruṣa tvāt te ete asiddha bhedāḥ yadā ubhaya vādya siddha tvena vivakṣitāḥ tadā ubhaya asiddhāḥ bhavanti yadā tu anyatara vādya siddha tvena vivakṣitāḥ tadā anyatara asiddhāḥ bhavanti 
[312,22]	na asti anyatara asiddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ iti eke tathā hi pareṇa asiddhaḥ iti udbhāvite yadi vādī tad sādhakam pramāṇam na darśayati tatas pramāṇa abhāvāt ubhayoḥ asiddhiḥ atha pramāṇam darśayati tatas pramāṇasya apakṣa pāti tvāt ubhayoḥ siddhaḥ anyathā sādhyam api antarā siddham na kadācid siddhyati iti vyarthaḥ pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ syāt yāvat na param pratipramāṇena prasādhyate tāvat tam pratyasiddhaḥ iti ced gauṇam tarhi asiddha tvam yathā ratna ādi padārthaḥ tattvataḥ apratīyamānaḥ tāvantam api kālam na mukhyaḥ kin tu tad ābhāsaḥ kim ca hetvābhāsaḥ ca nigraha sthānam iti uktam tatas ca anyatara asiddhaḥ yadā hetvābhāsaḥ tadā vādī nigṛhītaḥ syāt na nigṛhītasya paścāt anigrahaḥ iti yuktam na api hetu samarthanam paścāt yuktam nigraha anta tvāt vādasya iti 
[313,7]	atra ucyate yadi vādī samyak hetu tvam pratipadyamānaḥ api tad samarthana nyāya vismaraṇa ādi nimittena prativādinam prāśnikān vā pratibodhayitum na śaknoti anyatara asiddha tām api na anumanyate tadā anyatara asiddha tvena eva nigṛhyate svayam anyabhyupagataḥ ca para prasiddhaḥ iti etāvatā eva upanyastaḥ hetuḥ anyatara asiddhaḥ nigraha sthānam iti 
[313,13]	viruddha bhedāḥ tu uda ahriyantaḥ iti śeṣaḥ sati sa pakṣe catvāraḥ viruddhāḥ pakṣa vipakṣa vyāpakaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kāryatvāt sva kāraṇa samavāyaḥ kāryatvam ubhayānta upalakṣitā sattā nitya tvam iti eke tad abhiprāyeṇa prāk abhāvasya api nitya tvādi uktam eva viruddha udāharaṇam anyathā na vipakṣavyāpi kāryatvam yadā tu ādimat tvam eva kāryatvam tadā pradhvaṃsasya nitya tve api kāryatvam asti iti anaikāntikam syāt na viruddham iti vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ pakṣa vyāpakaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyavat tve sati asmad ādi bāhya indriya grāhya tvāt arhati arthe kṛtyā abhidhānāt grahaṇa yogya tā mātram grāhya tvam uktam tena asya api pakṣa vyāpaka tvam pakṣa vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ vipakṣa vyāpakaḥ yathā nityā pṛthivī kṛtaka tvāt 
[314,16^1]	asati sa pakṣe catvāraḥ viruddhāḥ pakṣa vipakṣa vyāpakaḥ yathā ākāśa viśeṣa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tāt pakṣa vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā ākāśa viśeṣa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt pakṣa vyāpakaḥ vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā ākāśa viśeṣa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ bāhya indriya grāhya tvāt vipakṣa vyāpakaḥ pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā ākāśa viśeṣa guṇaḥ śabdaḥ apad ātmaka tvāt nanu catvāraḥ eva viruddha bhedāḥ ye pakṣa vyāpakāḥ te na anye ye pakṣa eka deśa vṛttayaḥ teṣām asiddha lakṣaṇa upapanna tvāt 
[314,16^2]	pakṣa dharmasya hi trayī gatiḥ hetuḥ viruddhaḥ anaikāntikaḥ vā iti na eṣa doṣaḥ ubhaya lakṣaṇa upapanna tvena ubhaya vyavahāra viṣaya tvāt tulāyām pramāṇa prameya vyavahāra vat yathā tulā dravyam suvarṇa ādīnām iyattā pariccheda sādhana tvāt pramāṇam tulā antara paricchinnena dravyeṇa pramīyamānam pratyakṣatas vā svarūpeṇa upalabhyamānam prameyam bhavati tathā pakṣa eka deśa vṛttayaḥ asiddha lakṣaṇa yogāt asiddhāḥ bhavanti viruddha anaikāntika ādi lakṣaṇa yogāt viruddhaḥ anaikāntikaḥ na vyavasthitaḥ ca iti yat punar etat pakṣa dharmasya trayī gatiḥ iti tatra kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa prakaraṇa samayoḥ api pakṣa dharma gati tvāt iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[315,14]	anaikāntika bhedāḥ api udāhriyante pakṣa traya vyāpakaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt pakṣa vyāpakaḥ sa pakṣa vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ pratyakṣa tvāt asmad ādi indriya grahaṇa yogya tā mātram pratyakṣa tvam atra abhipretam tatas na asya pakṣa traya vyāpaka tvam pakṣa eka deśa vṛtti tvam vā prasajyate iti pakṣa sa pakṣa vyāpakaḥ vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā gauḥ ayam viṣāṇi tvāt pakṣa vipakṣa vyāpakaḥ sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā na ayam gauḥ viṣāṇi tvāt pakṣa traya eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā nityā pṛthivī pratyakṣa tvāt ayogyakṣa viṣaya tvam eva atra pratyakṣa tvam draṣṭavyam pakṣa sapakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ vipakṣa vyāpakaḥ yathā dravyāṇi diś kāla manāṃsi amūrta tvāt pakṣa vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ sa pakṣa vyāpakaḥ yathā na dravyāṇi diś kāla manāṃsi amūrta tvāt sa pakṣa vipakṣa vyāpakaḥ pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā na dravyāṇi ākāśa kāla diś ātma manāṃsi kṣaṇika viśeṣa guṇa rahita tvāt 
[315,27^1]	anadhyavasita bhedāḥ tu uda ahriyante avidyamānasapakṣa vipakṣaḥ pakṣa vyāpakaḥ yathā sarvam anityam sattvāt avidyamānasapakṣa vipakṣaḥ pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā sarvam anityam kāryatvāt vidyamānasa pakṣa vipakṣaḥ pakṣa vyāpakaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ ākāśa viśeṣa guṇa tvāt vidyamānasa pakṣa vipakṣaḥ pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā sarvam dravyam anityam kriyāvat tvāt avidyamāna vipakṣaḥ vidyamānasapakṣaḥ pakṣa vyāpakaḥ yathā sarvam kāryam nityam utpatti dharmaka tvāt avidyamāna vipakṣaḥ vidyamānasapakṣaḥ pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ yathā sarvam kāryam nityam sa avayava tvāt iti 
[315,27^2]	nanu avidyamāna sapakṣaḥ vidyamāna vipakṣaḥ pakṣa vyāpakaḥ pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ ca anadhyavasita bhedau kasmāt na udāhṛtau tayoḥ kevala vyatireki tvāt iti ced evam tarhi pradhāna anvitāni sarva kāryāṇi ḍittha ādi anvitāni ca utpattimat tvāt rūpi tvāt ca iti evamādayaḥ api samyak vyatirekiṇaḥ syuḥ iti na kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa bhāga asiddha doṣāt anadhyavasita bhedau etau bhavatām kṛtsnā udāharaṇasya ca apratijñāta tvāt sāmānya hetu lakṣaṇa anuvādena hi kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ api lakṣaṇam vihitam draṣṭavyam tena ati vyāpakam na bhavati 
[316,20]	kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa bhedāḥ tu 
[316,22]	pratyakṣa viruddhaḥ pratyakṣa apahṛta viṣayaḥ pratyakṣa bādhita viṣayaḥ iti ekaḥ arthaḥ yathā anuṣṇaḥ ayam agniḥ kṛtaka tvāt 
[316,25]	anumāna viruddhaḥ yathā paramāṇūnām anitya tvam mūrta tvāt 
[316,27^1]	anye tu anumāna viruddham anumānam na anumanyante tulya adhika nyūna bala tve api bādhya tva anupapatteḥ tulya bala tve kim kasya bādhakam vācyam vā bādhyam bādhyam hi nyūna balam eva syāt na tulya balam adhika balam api bādhakam syāt na bādhyam nyūna balam tu nyūna tvāt eva duṣṭam kim tasya bādhakena iti pratyakṣa virodhi api tarhi na prāpnoti yasmāt anumāna lakṣaṇa upapannam aśakya bādham tad vikalam tu tatas eva duṣṭam anarthikā pratyakṣa bādhā atha trirūpasya pratyakṣa bādhya tvena eva anumāna lakṣaṇa vikala tvam hanta tarhi trirūpasya mūrta tva ādeḥ anumāna bādhita tvena eva nyūna tvam na anyathā 
[316,27^2]	nanu ca mūrta tva ādeḥ anyathā siddha tvena duṣṭa tvam yatas kṛtaka tvena anitya tvam na mūrta tvena iti na sādhana niyama anabhyupagamāt anekāni hi sādhanāni ekatra api samarthāni abhyupagamyante anyathā hi sāvayava tva ādayaḥ api anitya tva siddhau anyathā asiddhāḥ syuḥ kim ca pratyakṣa āgama viruddhayoḥ api anyathā siddha tva abhyupagame kim vācyam na ca anyathā siddhaḥ asiddha lakṣaṇena saṃgṛhītaḥ asti na api viruddha ādi lakṣaṇena iti kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa bhedasya eva nāma antaram kṛtam syāt katham tarhi bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ 
[316,27^3]	ubhayoḥ api anumāna tva aviśeṣāt iti na bala abala viśeṣāt yat vicāryamāṇam balavat pratibhāti tat bādhakam anumāne yat ca abalam tat bādhyam vastutas tatra anumānam yathā uṣṇā ugniḥ iti pratyakṣam anya nimitta abhāvāt viṣaya balena pravṛttam bādhakam anumānasya na tu toya ādau uṣṇam iti alāta cakra ādi pratyakṣam vā tatra hi anumānasya balīyaḥ tvam tathā paramāṇu svarūpa sādhakena anumānena anitya tva anumānam bādhyate dharmya siddham vā na ca anitya tve parama aṇu tvam kṣaṇa bhaṅga pradhāna vāda nirākaraṇe hi alpa parimāṇam eva dravyasya upādāna kāraṇam 
[316,27^4]	tat ca katham paramāṇūnām syāt yatas hi alpataran na asti sa paramāṇuḥ ucyate anavadhika tve ca alpatara ādi bhāvasya truṭi parvata ādeḥ ananta kāraṇa janya tva aviśeṣāt guru tva parimāṇābhyām viśeṣaḥ na syāt evam paramāṇu sādhaka anumānasya anitya tvena virodhāt balīyaḥ tvam mūrta tvasya tu nitya tvena virodha abhāvāt abala tvam paramāṇu sādhakam ca idam anumānam aṇutaratama ādi bhāvaḥ kvacid viśrāntaḥ parimāṇataratama ādi bhāva tvāt mahattaratama ādi bhāva vat iti evam sarvatra bala abalavat tā adhigamena bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ pramāṇayoḥ niśceyaḥ iti 
[317,28]	āgama viruddhaḥ yathā brāhmaṇena peyam sura ādi drava dravya tvāt kṣīra vat na atra pāna mātram sādhyam kim tarhi yat pāpa nimittam tat ca āgama eka samadhigamyam na anumāna viṣayaḥ na hi kṣīra pānasya api pāpa nimitta tvam dharma hetu tvam ca asmad ādibhiḥ pramāṇa antareṇa adhigantum śakyate tasmāt aviṣaye pravṛttam anumānam āgamena bādhyate na tu arūpa vyāpaka ātma anumānam āditya varṇa aṅguṣṭha mātra puruṣa pratipādakena āgamena bādhyate tat dhi anumānam sva viṣaye pravṛttam āgamaḥ tu anya arthaḥ iti 
[318,10]	pratyakṣa eka deśa viruddhaḥ yathā sarvam tejaḥ anuṣṇam rūpi tvāt 
[318,12]	anumāna eka deśa viruddhaḥ yathā nitya āśrayāḥ sarva indravat tva rūpa rasa gandha sparśāḥ nityāḥ apradeśa vṛtti samāna jāti ārambhaka tve sati paramāṇu vṛtti tvāt tad gata eka tva ādi vat saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ samāna jāti ārambhaka tvam paramāṇu vṛtti tvam ca asti tad vyavaccheda artham apradeśa vṛtti grahaṇam aneka tva saṃkhyā parimāṇa ārambhikeṣṭā tad vyavaccheda artham samāna jāti ārambhaka tva grahaṇam tatra anumānena naimittika dravya tva pākaja rūpa ādīnām eva nitya tvam virudhyate na tu sāṃsiddhika drava tvānādi paramāṇu rūpa ādīnām iti 
[318,20_318,24]	āgama eka deśa viruddhaḥ yathā sarveṣām deva ṛṣīṇām śarīrāṇi pārthivāṇi śarīra tvāt asmad ādi śarīra vat varuṇāt itya vāyu ādī nām ā api ataijasa vāyavya śarīra śravaṇāt tad prāmāṇya anabhyupagame ca dharmi siddhiḥ api na syāt iti nanu ca ete pratyakṣa viruddha ādayaḥ pratijñāyai eva doṣā na hetoḥ iti na karmaṇaḥ tādavasthyāt iti eke na hi anyathā abhidhāne api agniḥ anyathā bhavati kṛtaka tvam api anyathā na bhavati iti hetu doṣāḥ api na syuḥ satyam sarvam sādhanam sva viṣaye samartham tat yadi aviṣaye puruṣeṇa prayuktam artha siddhim na karoti tatas puruṣaḥ eva aparādhyate yaḥ aparijñānāt aviṣaye prayuṅkte na tu acetanasya sādhanasya kaścid upālambhaḥ asti kin tu tad dvāreṇa puruṣasya eva doṣaḥ udbhāvyate yathā citra ādi kārya dvāreṇa tad kartuḥ iti evam tarhi pratijñādvāreṇa api tad vaktuḥ doṣa udbhāvane kācid na kṣatiḥ iti pratijñā doṣāḥ api vaktavyāḥ te khalu pratyakṣa ādi virodhāḥ pratijñā dvāreṇa udbhāvayitum vivakṣitāḥ tadā hetu doṣāḥ iti 
[319,13]	nanu anye api sva vacana virodha ādayaḥ pratijñā doṣāḥ santi te kasmāt na uktāḥ teṣām pratyakṣa ādi virodheṣu eva antar bhāvāt pramāṇa traya niyamasya iṣṭa tvāt na ca apramāṇena virodhaḥ asti na śabdaḥ artha pratyāyakaḥ iti sva vacana virodhaḥ sāṃkhyasya asat kāryam iti sva śāstra virodhaḥ śāstram pramāṇīkṛtya pravṛttasya pratijñāyāḥ śāstreṇa virodhaḥ pratijñayā vā śāstrasya iti acandraḥ śaśī iti prasiddhi virodhaḥ hetuḥ akiṃcitkaraḥ iti pratijñāpadayoḥ virodhaḥ te ime virodhāḥ āgama virodhe anumāna virodhe vā antarbhūtāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ iti 
[319,21]	prakaraṇa samasya tu bheda abhāvāt sāmānyena udāharaṇam uktam iti ekatra dharmiṇi tulya lakṣaṇayoḥ viruddhayoḥ hetvoḥ sannipātaḥ viruddha avyabhicāri iti eke yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyavataḥ asmad ādi bāhya indriya grāhya tvāt ghaṭa vat nityaḥ śravaṇa tvāt śabda tva ādi vat iti 
[319,26]	atra āhuḥ samasta vyasta prayoga asambhavān na ayam hetvābhāsaḥ pṛthak samastasya anyatra asambhavāt asādhāraṇa tvam vyasta prayogam yadi ekaḥ kuryāt tadā unmattaḥ syāt dvau ced vādinau yugapad kurvāte tatas artha pratipattiḥ na syāt atha krameṇa tatas prathamasya duṣṭa tvam aduṣṭa tvam vā avagatam duṣṭa tve katham avyabhicāri tvam aduṣṭa tve tad sādhite arthe tad viruddha hetoḥ utthānam eva na syāt pratyakṣa viruddha vat 
[320,10]	atra ucyate puruṣa viśeṣam apekṣya ayam hetvābhāsaḥ anyatara asiddha prakaraṇa sama vat yat ca uktam prathamasya duṣṭa tvam aduṣṭa tvam vā iti tat na vipratipatti vat aviśeṣa mātra darśanāt tad viśeṣa prakāśana artham eva hi prativādī dvitīyam prayuṅkte viśeṣān abhidhāne hi sandehaḥ atra yuktaḥ na anyatara pakṣa niścayaḥ iti abhiprāyavān yathā samyaktva asamyaktvā niścaye vipratipatteḥ utthānam tathā avyabhicāriṇaḥ api iti avyabhicāri tvam ca ubhayoḥ pratipatrabhiprāyeṇa na paramārthataḥ tatas na ubhaya pakṣa siddhiḥ prasajyate yadā vādī vipakṣa bādhaka dvāreṇa sva hetaḥ sādhya avinā abhāvi tva samarthanam itarasya tu kāla atyaya āpadiṣṭa tā udbhāvanam ca kartum na śaknoti tadā viruddha avyabhicārī hetvābhāse iti 
[320,20^1]	samyak dṛṣṭānta abhidhānam udāharaṇam tat dvividham sādharmya udāharaṇam vaidharmya udāharaṇam ca tatra anvaya mukhena dṛṣṭānta abhidhānam sādharmya udāharaṇam yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ tīvra ādi dharma upeta tvāt yat yat tīvra ādi dharma upetam tat tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā sukha ādi vyatireka mukhena dṛṣṭānta abhidhānam vaidharmya udāharaṇam yathā yat anityam na bhavati na tat tīvra ādi dharma upetam yathā ākāśam iti sūtrataḥ api udāharaṇa dvaividhyam uktam yat āha sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam tad viparyayāt vā viparītam iti sādhyasya sādharmyam udāharaṇena hetu lakṣaṇe vyākhyātam 
[320,20^2]	tad dharmaḥ sādhya dharmaḥ sa bhavati vidyate yatra dharmiṇi sa tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ tad viparyayāt iti sādhya vaidharmyāt atad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam pūrvavat asya api vyākhyānam atra pañcamī artham paśyāmaḥ sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī kim utpadyate kim vā jñāyate na tāvat utpadyate anyatas utpanna tvāt kasyacid nitya tvāt ca na api jñāyate pratyakṣataḥ sādhana antarāt vā niścita tvāt tasmāt anyathā vyākhyāyate viśeṣa lakṣaṇam eva atra dṛṣṭāntasya ucyate sāmānya lakṣaṇam tu prāk eva laukikaḥ parīkṣaka ityādinā uktam tad anuvādena sādharmya vaidharmyam ca atra viśeṣa lakṣaṇam draṣṭavyam 
[320,20^3]	pañcamī tu tad bheda siddhi artham etat uktam bhavati pūrva uktaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ dvividhaḥ tad dharma bhāvi atad dharma bhāvī ca sādharmyavān vaidharmyavān iti arthaḥ tatra pūrvaḥ itarasmāt kutas bhinnaḥ pratipattavyaḥ iti āha sādhya sādharmyāt iti eva dvitīye api vyākhyānam yat etat tatra eva dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇe vaktavye atra abhidhānam sa bheda udāharaṇa lakṣaṇa prasiddha artham dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam iti etat sāmānādhikaraṇyam katham abhidhīyamānaḥ iti adhyāhāreṇa iti ekaḥ yat vā śāstra antareṣu dṛṣṭānte udāharaṇam iti abhedena vyavahāraḥ prasiddhaḥ tasya gauṇa tva jñāpana artham atra api upacāreṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam iti uktam 
[320,20^4]	dṛṣṭānta guṇa doṣābhyām udāharaṇasya guṇa doṣavat tvam iti ca upacāre prayojanam vākya eka deśāḥ hi avayavāḥ iti uktam na ca arthaḥ vākya eka deśaḥ tasmāt vacanam eva mukhyatas udāharaṇam na dṛṣṭāntaḥ tat vacanam iti adhyāhāraḥ vā āśrayaṇīyaḥ iti dṛṣṭānta vacanam udāharaṇam iti ukte api udāharaṇa ābhāsāḥ pratyuktāḥ bhavanti teṣām adṛṣṭānta vacana tvāt tat kim artham samyak grahaṇam iti na vacana doṣasya api vyudāsa artha tvāt tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ udāharaṇa vat ābhāsamānāḥ udāharaṇa ābhāsāḥ tad lakṣaṇa rahita tvam viśeṣaṇam hetvābhāsa vat atra api draṣṭavyam tattvam api keṣāṃcid tadvat avabhāsate tad vyavaccheda artham iti 
[322,6^1]	te ca udāharaṇa ābhāsāḥ aneka prakārāḥ sādhya vikalaḥ sādhana vikalaḥ iti evamādayaḥ aṣṭau artha doṣāḥ catvāraḥ vacana doṣāḥ te eva ete dvādaśa bhedāḥ bahubhiḥ ācāryaiḥ abhyupagatāḥ iti ādau uddiṣṭāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ tathā ca tad bheda pratipatti artham tad udāharaṇāṇi dvādaśa eva ucyante tatra grantha gaurava parihāra artham anityam manaḥ mūrta tvāt iti etasmin prayoge sarvāṇi udāharaṇāni ucyante iti yat mūrtam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā paramāṇuḥ iti sādhya vikalaḥ anitya tva sādhyena vikalaḥ paramāṇuḥ iti yathā karma iti sādhana vikalaḥ mūrta tvam sādhanam tena vikalpaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā ākāśam iti ubhaya vikalaḥ ubhayena anitya tvena mūrta tvena ca vikalaḥ 
[322,6^2]	khara viṣāṇam iti āśraya hīnaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ svayam asati dharmiṇi kim āśrayaḥ sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ pratīyate tad apratītau vacana mātreṇa pratītau vā kim dṛṣṭāntasya phalam pradhāna ādi pratiṣedhaḥ api na apramāṇakena dṛṣṭāntena kartavyaḥ kim tarhi paramāṇu ādi samarthana nyāyena na hi sukha ādeḥ ātma āśrita tve paramāṇu ākāśa nitya tve ca pradhāna ādi siddhiḥ sambhavati tad vyavahāra pratiṣedhaḥ api evam kāryaḥ pradhāna ādi asti iti vyavahāraḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ na kartavyaḥ pramāṇataḥ anupalabhyamāna artha tvāt kha puṣpa ādi asti iti vyavahāra vat evam tarhi hetu dṛṣṭāntayoḥ na āśraya asiddha tva ādi doṣaḥ pramāṇataḥ anupalabhyamāna artha tvam ca paroktānām anvaya parimāṇa ādi hetūnām pratiṣedhena samarthanīyam iti 
[322,24]	ghaṭa vat iti avyāpti abhidhānam śabda dūṣaṇam kecid icchanti kila yat yat iti vīpsayā yat ittham tat sarvam iti evam vā vyāptiḥ pratyāyate na anyathā iti anye tu idam dūṣaṇam na anumanyante sarva śāstreṣu evam prayoga darśanāt na prativādi vācaḥ svātantryeṇa pramāṇam kim tarhi pramāṇa antara anugṛhītam tatas ca yadi pratyakṣa ādi siddhā asti vyāptiḥ tadā anityaḥ śabdaḥ kāryatvāt ghaṭa vat iti evam api pratīyate atha na pratyakṣa ādi siddhā tadā vīpsā sarva grahaṇābhyām api na pratīyate siddha anuvāda artham hi dṛṣṭānta vacaḥ na tu asiddha vidhāyakam iti 
[323,8]	yat anityam tat mūrtam dṛṣṭam iti viparīta vyāpti abhidhānam sādhana anuvādena hi sādhyam vidhātavyam yena sādhanasya sādhya siddhau sāmarthyam pratipāditam syāt anyathā hi asādhana aṅga vacanam syāt na hi yaḥ yaḥ kaścid agnimān sa sa dhūmavān iti evam śabdāt agninā vyāptaḥ dhūmaḥ pratīyate iti etau śabda doṣau avyāpti abhidhāna viparīta vyāpti abhidhāna ākhyau pūrve catvāraḥ artha doṣāḥ iti ete ṣaṭ sādharmya udāharaṇa ābhāsāḥ ucyante 
[323,15^1]	atha vaidharmya udāharaṇa ābhāsāḥ ucyante anityam manaḥ mūrta tvāt iti etasmin eva prayoge yat tu nityam tat mūrtam api na bhavati yathā paramāṇuḥ iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhana avyāvṛttaḥ udāharaṇa ābhāsa apekṣayā vā sādhya vikala ādīnām api pūn liṅga tā draṣṭavyā sādhanam mūrta tvam tat vyāvṛttam yasmāt paramāṇoḥ sa tathā uktaḥ yathā karma iti sādhya avyāvṛttaḥ sādhyam anitya tvam tat karmaṇaḥ na vyāvṛttam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti ubhaya avi āvṛttaḥ sādhyam sādhanam ca ubhayam na vyāvṛttam yasmāt sa tathā uktaḥ yathā khapuṣpam iti āśraya hīnaḥ kaiścid vaidharmya dṛṣṭānte dharmya bhāvaḥ doṣa tvena na abhyupagamyate tad niṣedha artham iha api āśraya hīnaḥ uktaḥ kevala anvayi prastāve hi uktam yatra vyatireka balena siddhiḥ iṣyate tatra avaśyam vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta āśrayaḥ api eṣṭavyaḥ vacana mātreṇa vyāpti siddhau atiprasaṅgāt iti 
[323,15^2]	ākāśa vat iti avyāvṛtta abhidhānam mūrta tvam anitya tvam ca ākāśāt vyāvṛttam na ca anena śabdena tathā abhihitam iti śabda doṣaḥ ayam tulya arthe hi vatiḥ śrūyate katham tatas vyāvṛtta pratītiḥ na ca vīpsām sarva śabdam ca antareṇa sarvasmāt vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ sādhya sādhanayoḥ pratīyate iti atas atra avyāvṛtta abhidhānam yat amūrtam tat anityam na bhavati yathā ākāśam iti viparīta vyāvṛtta abhidhānam sādhya vyāvṛtta anuvādena hi sādhanam vyāvṛttam vidhātavyam yena sādhyasya sādhana vyāpaka tvam sādhana abhāvasya sādhya abhāva vyāpaka tvam ca pratīyeta sādhana vyāvṛtta anuvādena tu sādhyam vyāvṛttam yat ucyate tat idam viparīta vyāvṛtta abhidhānam na sādhana aṅgam na hi bhavati yatra na asti dhūmaḥ tatra sarvatra agniḥ na asti iti tasmāt atra api dvau śabda doṣau catvāraḥ artha doṣāḥ sādhana avyāvṛtta ādayaḥ iti vaidharmya udāharaṇa ābhāsāḥ api ṣaḍ 
[324,19]	anye tu sandeha dvāreṇa aparān aṣṭau udāharaṇa ābhāsān varṇayanti sandigdha sādhyaḥ yathā mahā rājyam kariṣyati ayam soma vaṃśa udbhūta tvāt vivakṣita rāja puruṣa vat sandigdha sādhanaḥ yathā na ayam sarvajñaḥ rāga ādimattvāt rathyā puruṣa vat sandigdha ubhayaḥ yathā gamiṣyati svargam vivakṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ samupārjita śukla dharma tvāt devadatta vat sandigdha āśrayaḥ yathā na ayam sarvajñaḥ bahu vaktṛ tvāt bhaviṣyat devadatta putra vat sandigdha sādhya vyāvṛttaḥ yathā yaḥ mahā rājyan na kariṣyati sa soma vaṃśa udbhūtaḥ api na bhavati yathā anyaḥ rāja puruṣaḥ sandigdha sādhana avyāvṛttaḥ yathā yaḥ tu sarvajñaḥ sa rāga ādi rahitaḥ yathā samasta śāstra abhijñaḥ sandigdha ubhaya avi āvṛttaḥ yathā yaḥ svargam na gamiṣyati sa samupārjita śukla dharmaḥ api na bhavati yathā duṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ sandigdha āśrayaḥ yathā yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa bahu vaktā api na bhavati yathā bhaviṣyat devadatta putraḥ 
[324,31]	dṛṣṭānte prasiddha avinā bhāvasya sādhanasya dṛṣṭānta upamānena pakṣe vyāpti khyāpakam vacanam upanayaḥ sa ca dvividhaḥ tathā ca tīvra ādi dharma upetaḥ śabdaḥ iti sādharmya upanayaḥ na ca tathā tīvra ādi dharma upetaḥ śabdaḥ na bhavati iti vaidharmya upanayaḥ tathā ca sūtram udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ udāharaṇe avinābhauva siddhau apekṣā yasya saḥ udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ dṛṣṭānte prasiddha avinā bhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ tathā ityādinā dṛṣṭānta upamānena iti uktam bhavati sādhyasya sambandha tvena upasaṃhāraḥ artha lakṣaṇa apekṣayā upasaṃhriyate iti upasaṃhāraḥ pakṣa vyāpi tvena khyāpyamānaḥ hetuḥ iti arthaḥ tathā ca upanīyate iti upanayaḥ prāsaṅgikam ca atra artha lakṣaṇam avayava lakṣaṇa apekṣayā tu upasaṃhriyate anena iti upanīyate anena iti ubhayatra api karaṇa vyutpattiḥ 
[325,14^1]	nanu ca upanaya vacanam anarthakam vyāpteḥ udāharaṇena eva pratipādita tvāt antar vyāpti siddhi artham iti ced na hetu vacanāt tad siddheḥ cākṣuṣa tva ādi vacanāt api tad siddhi prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na tasya hetvābhāsa vacana tvāt kim ca tathā ca cākṣuṣaḥ śabdaḥ iti upanayāt api na tasya pakṣa dharma tvam pratīyate kim ca hetu vacanasya anarthakya prasaṅgāt upanayāt eva tad artha siddheḥ tasmāt śabda karaṇa tva pratītiḥ api bhaviṣyati aviśiṣṭam karaṇa mātram hetu vacaḥ vakti upanayena tu niścita śaktikam pakṣa viśiṣṭam ca ucyate iti ced na aviśiṣṭa kāraṇa mātra abhidhānasya niṣprayojana tvāt 
[325,14^2]	pakṣa dharma tva niścāyakam pramāṇam upanayena ucyate iti api ayuktam hetu vacaḥ vadasya api vacana mātra tvāt na hi asmāt api pramāṇa viśeṣaḥ pratīyate tad phala upasaṃhāra artham iti ced na prayojana abhāvāt dhetu vacanam eva vā tad artham astu anyathā udāharaṇa artha samarthana pramāṇa phala upasaṃhāra artham api avayava antaram karaṇīyam syāt iti sva arthe tad arthaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti apare yasmāt kila sva artha anumāne vyāpti smṛti anantaram tathā ca ayam iti parāmarśa jñānam bhavati tad anantaram ca liṅgi jñānam iti ayam dṛṣṭaḥ kramaḥ sa ca avaśyam vācyaḥ sva pratipatti upāya pratipādana artham hi para artha anumānam iti na parāmarśa jñāna astitve pramāṇa abhāvāt 
[325,14^3]	upanaya ānarthakya prasaṅgaḥ iti ced śobhanam pramāṇam itaretara āśraya tvam ca syāt kim ca anumāna āgama adhigate liṅge parāmarśa jñānam kutas bhavati mānasa pratyakṣāt iti ced tat ayuktam pramāṇa abhāvāt kim ca atīndriyeṣu api pratyakṣa pravṛtti abhyupagame anumāna ādi ānarthakya prasaṅgaḥ kāryam dṛṣṭvā ca kāraṇam kalpyate na ca parāmarśa ākhyam kāryam niścitam na api tad abhāve kiṃcid dṛṣṭam virudhyate yatas tat kalpyeta liṅga darśana vyāpti smṛtibhyām ayam agnimān ityādi anumāna pravṛtteḥ avirodhāt kim ca yadi nāma adṛḍha matiḥ punar punar darśanam apekṣate kim etāvatā para arthe api āvṛttyā upadeṣṭavyam 
[325,14^4]	kvacid āvṛttyā vyāpti smṛti apekṣi tve dṛṣṭāntasya api āvṛttyā abhidhāna prasaṅgāt tasmāt sādhana aṅgam eva vaktavyam iti hetoḥ abādhita viṣaya tva khyāpana artham upanayaḥ iti adoṣaḥ katham yathā kṛtakaḥ ghaṭa ādiḥ anityaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ pratyakṣa ādinā na bādhyate tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ śabdaḥ api kṛtakaḥ san anityaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratyakṣa ādinā na bādhyate iti arthaḥ na ca tathā śabdaḥ akṛtakaḥ iti asya api ayam arthaḥ yathā ākāśa ādi nityam akṛtakam ca pramāṇataḥ upalabdham na ca tathā śabdaḥ yatas akṛtakaḥ tāvat na bhavati kṛtaka tva upalambhāt na api kṛtakaḥ api san nitya tva viśiṣṭaḥ pramāṇena upalabhyate tasmāt anitya tva avinā abhāvi eva kṛtaka tvam iti 
[326,14^1]	yat punar etad lakṣaṇa yukte bādhā samaveta lakṣaṇam eva dūṣitam syāt tasmāt bādhāvinā bhāvayoḥ virodhāt na ābādhita viṣaya tvam hetu rūpam iti tat ayuktam yaḥ hi trairūpyam hetu lakṣaṇam ācaṣṭe tad mate tad lakṣaṇam dūṣitam eva astu kā naḥ kṣatiḥ vayam tu pañca rūpa tvam catū rūpa tvam vā hetu lakṣaṇam brūmaḥ tat katham asmākam ayam upālambhaḥ na ca triṣu eva avinābhāvaḥ paryavasitaḥ kim tarhi pañcasu caturṣu vā tasmāt avinā abhāva svarūpam ajñātvā eva bādhāvinā bhāvayoḥ virodhāt iti uktam kaḥ hi avinā abhau a yuktasya bādhām brūte trirūpasya tu bādhā darśitā eva abādhayā eva sādhya siddheḥ vyarthaḥ hetuḥ iti ced na abādhāyāḥ hetu dharma tvāt akṣa jñāna vat yathā akṣa jñānasya tattva atattva saṃśaye sati abādhā niḥ cayena tattva adhigame akṣa jñānam vyartham abādhayā eva sādhya siddheḥ iti ca udyam na yuktam abādhāyāḥ tad dharma tvāt tathā hetoḥ abādhā niḥ cayena avinābhāvi tva adhigamaḥ astu 
[326,14^2]	na tu vaiyarthyam iti kim ca ābādhita viṣaya tva rūpa anabhyupagame uṣṇaḥ agniḥ kṛtaka tvāt ityādeḥ api gamaka tva prasaṅgaḥ pakṣa dharma tva abhāvāt na iti ced syāt etat sva rūpeṇa eva nirdeśāḥ svayam iṣṭaḥ anirākṛtaḥ pakṣaḥ ucyate na ca tathā alakṣaṇe pakṣe kṛtaka tva ādeḥ vṛttiḥ atas apakṣa dharma tvāt eva tasya āgamaka tvam iti evam tarhi anirākṛta tva niścayāt eva sādhya siddhau vyarthaḥ hetuḥ syāt tad aniścaye tu aniścitam pakṣa dharma tvam katham gamaka aṅgam atha anirākṛta tva niścaye api na antareṇa hetum sādhya siddhiḥ tat kim ucyate abādhayā eva sādhya siddheḥ vyarthaḥ hetuḥ iti anirākṛta ābādhita śabdayoḥ paryāya tvāt vādī abhyupagama apekṣayā eva pakṣa tvam tad vṛtteḥ hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam eva iti vādinaḥ prāyeṇa saṃpratipannāḥ tad abhiprāya vaśāt abādhita viṣaya tvam hetu rūpam pakṣa dharma rūpāt pṛthak uktam tad khyāpana artham upanaya vacanam iti 
[327,7]	upanaya anantaram nigamanam vaktavyam tat ucyate sa hetukam pratijñāvat vacanam nigamanam tasmāt iti anūdyamāna hetu sahitam sa hetukam pratijñāvat iti tat tulyam na tu pratijñā eva nigamanasya bhinna artha tvena pratijñā lakṣaṇa abhāvāt abhinna artha tve vā punarukta tvam syāt iti hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam iti sūtram hetu apadeśāt upanayanāt iti eke vayam tu brūmaḥ tasmāt iti ayam hetu anuvādaḥ hetu apadeśaḥ hetu apadeśena saha iti prāpte moha nivṛttaye tṛtīyā sthāne pañcamī uktā anyathā udāharaṇāt prāk eva hetu apadeśena saha pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam prayoktavyam iti āśaṃkā api syāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam iva iti upamā atra draṣṭavyā nigamyante pratijña ādaye eka artha tvena vyavasthāpyante anena iti nigamanam 
[327,16^1]	atha idam kim prayojanam iti vākya parisamāpti artham iti eke tat ayuktam tad samāptau prayojana abhāvāt anumānena hi atra arthaḥ pratipādayitum iṣṭaḥ tena avinābhā viliṅgam eva vaktavyam tatas sādhyam svayam eva avagacchati iti gamyamāna arthasya anabhidhāne nidarśana ādeḥ api anabhidhāna prasaṅgaḥ iti ced bhavatu yadi tad antareṇa api sādhya siddhiḥ bhavati na hi vyasanam eva etat asya yat siddhe api arthe avaśyam vākyam pūrayitavyam iti api ca uktam viduṣām vācyaḥ hetuḥ eva hi kevalaḥ iti yad artham dṛṣṭāntaḥ ucyate saḥ arthaḥ ced siddhaḥ kim tat vacanena apratipanna avinā abhāvān prati yuktam tat vacanam avinābhāvi liṅga pratītau ca tasmāt idam ittham iti bhavati eva pratītiḥ kim tatra nigamanena iti tat api ayuktam yasmāt na idam anarthakam sādhya viruddha abhāva pratipādaka pramāṇa sūcaka tvāt asya 
[327,16^2]	etat uktam bhavati asat pratipakṣatva apratipādane api avinā abhāvaḥ apratipāditaḥ eva syāt pakṣa dharma tva ādi vat asat pratipakṣa tvasya api hetu rūpa tvāt tad pratipādana artham ca nigamanam tahā hi tasmāt anityaḥ iti sati ārambhaḥ niyamam gamayati anityaḥ eva tasmāt na nityaḥ iti sādhya viruddhasya pratipakṣa ākhyasya asattvam gamyate tatas ca na ayam viruddha avyabhicārī na prakaraṇa samaḥ iti siddham bhavati nanu pratipakṣa abhāva siddhau pramāṇa antaram vācyam na nigamana ākhyam vacana mātram vipratipannam prati vacana mātrasya apramāṇa tvāt iti evam tarhi pakṣa dharma tva ādi siddhau api pramāṇa antaram eva vācyam na hetu udāharaṇa ādi vacana mātram iti pakṣa dharma tva ādi sādhana pramāṇa stabaka tvāt na vacana mātram iti ced nigamanam api tarhi pratipakṣa abhāva sādhaka pramāṇa sūcaka tvāt na vacana mātram 
[327,16^3]	nanu sādhya avadhāraṇam prastutam tat eva kriyatām kim sādhya viruddha abhāva pratipādanena iti na etat asti na hi pratipakṣa abhāva pratipādanam antareṇa sādhya avadhāraṇam upapadyate tathā ca uktam pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ iti kṛtam asya vyākhyānam purastāt iti yadi nigamana abhidhānam asādhana aṅgam abhyupagamyate tatas kṣaṇika tva ādi siddhau sattva kṛtaka tva ādi sādhanam eva vaktavyam asantaḥ akṣaṇikāḥ tasyām krama akrama virodhataḥ ityādinā bādhakam pramāṇam na abhyupagantavyam tat abhyupagacchataḥ hi tava nigraha sthānam prasajyate kasmāt nigamana artha tvāt bādhakasya viparīta prasaṅga pratiṣedhaḥ hi ubhayoḥ arthaḥ pratipakṣa pratiṣedha dvāreṇa hetoḥ avinā abhāva samarthanam ubhābhyām api abhipretam 
[327,16^4]	nanu ca abhihite api nigamane tad artham prati yadā prativādī vipratipadyate tadā asau bādhakena eva pratibodhayitum śakyate na vacana mātreṇa tasmāt bādhakam eva vaktavyam iti tat ayuktam nigamana artha pratipattau hi bādhaka pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ yujyate hetu ādi artha vipratipattau tad sādhaka pramāṇa upanyāsa vat anyathā hetu ādi avayavaḥ api na vaktavyaḥ tad artha sādhaka pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ eva kartavyaḥ saḥ api na kartavyaḥ tad arthe vipratipadyamānaḥ yena pramāṇa antareṇa pratibodhayitum śakyaḥ tat eva vaktavyam iti anavasthā iti tasmāt yadā eva yat avayava artham prati vipratipadyate paraḥ tadā eva tat avayava artha samarthana artham bādhakam sādhakam vā pramāṇa antaram ucyate iti alam prasaṅgena 
[328,29^1]	saḥ ayam pañca avayava lakṣaṇaḥ paramaḥ nyāyaḥ kasmāt vipratipanna puruṣa pratipādaka tvāt kathā pravṛtti hetu tvāt ca kā punar iyam kathā iti ucyate vādi prativādinoḥ pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ kathā sādhana upālambha rahitam pakṣa pratipakṣa parigraha mātram kathāḥ mā bhūt iti vādi prativādi grahaṇam sā dvividhā vīta rāga kathā vijigīṣu kathā ca iti yatra kathāyām vīta rāgaḥ vīta rāgena eva saha tattva nirṇaya artham sādhana upalambhau karoti sā vīta rāga kathā vāda saṃjñakā eva ucyate na tatra viśeṣa saṃjñā antaram asti 
[328,29^2]	yathā vijigīṣu kathāyāḥ vādaḥ iti sāmānya saṃjñā jalpaḥ iti vitaṇḍa iti ca viśeṣa saṃjñā iti tatra kathā traye api vādaḥ iti saṃjñā vyavahārataḥ prasiddhā kathā iti saṃjñā tu sūtrataḥ prasiddhā yadi api daṇḍaka sūtre kathā iti uddeśaḥ kaṇṭha uktaḥ na asti tathā api abhiprāyataḥ asti eva anyathā katham uttaratra vyavahāram sūtrakāraḥ kuryāt kārya vyāsaṅgāt kathā vicchedaḥ vikṣepaḥ iti vicitrā hi asya sūtrakārasya pravṛttiḥ tena pramāṇa ādi vat kathā iti sāmānya uddeśam daṇḍaka sūtre kṛtvā paścāt vāda jalpa vitaṇḍāḥ iti viśeṣa uddeśaḥ na kṛtaḥ 
[329,22^1]	vādānām viśeṣa lakṣaṇam api kaṇṭha uktam asti tathā ca uktam pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ siddhānta aviruddhaḥ pañca avayava upapannaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ vādaḥ iti eka dharmi sthau viruddhau dharmau pakṣa pratipakṣau yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti virodhaḥ tu saha asambhavaḥ sa ca yathādarśanam pratyetavyaḥ tatra mūrta amūrta tva ādīnām kāla bhedena api eka adhikaraṇa tvam na sambhavati sa kriya tva niṣkriya tvayoḥ ca kāla bhedena mūrteṣu asti sambhavaḥ iti avirodhaḥ tathā sattva asattvayoḥ kāla bhedena deśa bhedena vā ghaṭa ādiṣu eva avirodhaḥ na tu ākāśa ādiṣu iti evam anyatra api virodha avirodhau yathādarśanam pratipattavyau 
[329,22^2]	bhinna dharmi sthayoḥ virodhaḥ eva na asti iti jñāna artham eka dharmi sthatva grahaṇam tatra pakṣa pratipakṣa rūpa tā kathā traye api asti iti viśeṣa lakṣaṇa artham āha pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ iti tatra sādhana upālambha grahaṇena vitaṇḍātaḥ vyavacchidyate na hi vitaṇḍāyām ubhayam sādhanam upālambhaḥ ca abhidhīyate jalpāt aviśeṣa nivṛtti artham pramāṇa tarka grahaṇam pramāṇaiḥ tarkeṇa ca sādhanam upālambhaḥ ca asmin kriyate iti pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ atra sāmarthyāt pakṣe sādhana pratipakṣe vā upālambhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tatra yadā mukhyaḥ eva pratipakṣaḥ tadā ekasya sādhana śabdasya lupta nirdeśaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ pramāṇaiḥ tarkeṇa ca sādhanam sādhana upālambhaḥ ca utpatya ca draṣṭavyam 
[330,8^1]	pramāṇa grahaṇam na kartavyam gamyamāna tvāt tathā hi sādhyate anena iti sādhanam upālabhyate anena iti upālambhaḥ pañca avayavam vākyam tat ca pramāṇaiḥ avayavaiḥ eva kriyate teṣu ca avayaveṣu pramāṇa śabda pravṛtteḥ eva pramāṇa mūla tvam labdham tasmāt pramāṇa grahaṇam anarthakam na anarthakam nānā arthaka prayoga niyama jñāpana artha tvāt vāde hi pramāṇa mūla tvena buddhau sthitāḥ pratijña ādayaḥ avayavāḥ sādhanāya upālambhāya ca vādinā prayoktavyā vādasya vīta rāga kathā tvāt na ca vīta rāgāḥ para vacana buddhyā pravartante 
[330,8^2]	nanu jalpe api kaścid na jñātvā hetvābhāsān prayuṅkte satyam tathā api ādau samyak buddhyā prayuktasya pareṇa ābhāsa tve pratipādite jalpākaḥ tad samarthana artham punar yatate vijigīṣu tvāt na nivartate vāde tu vādī vīta rāga tvāt nivartate kim ca ātmanaḥ parājayam dṛṣṭvā ekānta parājayāt varam saṃdehaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa jalpākaḥ sādhanāya upālambhāya vā ābhāsān api prayuṅkte na tu vīta rāgaḥ tat ayam prayoga niyamaḥ pramāṇa grahaṇāt ṛte na siddhyati prayoga niyamena jalpāt bhidyate vādaḥ tat na anarthakam pramāṇa grahaṇam 
[330,21^1]	idam ca anyat pramāṇa grahaṇasya prayojanam antareṇa api avayava sambandham pramāṇāni artham sādhayanti niṣedhayanti ca iti asya arthaḥ pratijña ādi ava yava sambandham antareṇa api yadā pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ svatantraiḥ kasyacid arthasya siddhiḥ upālambhaḥ ca kriyate tadā api vādaḥ iti jñāpana artham pramāṇa grahaṇam tarkasya bhūta pūrva tvena vyāpāraḥ sva artha anumānam yat tarka anugṛhītam tat eva vaktavyam na tu laukāyatikaiḥ iva svayam apratipannam api iti atas tarka grahaṇam api vīta rāga kathā tu a jñāpana artham kṛtam etat pūrva ācārya matena vyākhyātam 
[330,21^2]	sva mate nanu pratyakṣa ādi anyatamam sva pakṣa siddhi artham sādhanam iti ucyate pratipakṣa dūṣaṇa artham upālambhaḥ tau pramāṇena anumānena niścita sāmarthyau tarkeṇa pratiṣedha vidhe viṣayam kṛta sāmarthyau vā naiyāyikena vāde vaktavyau iti pramāṇa tarka grahaṇam jalpe api evam draṣṭavyam yathā ukta upapanna grahaṇāt vitaṇḍāyām api saḥ iti parāmarśāt evam ca vāda ādiṣu naiyāyikasya pravṛttiḥ na prāpnoti anartha aśaṃkayā iti ca udyāna vakāśaḥ tat etat codyam pratisamādhānam ca tarkasya pṛthak abhidhāne prayojana kathana prasaṅgena prapañcitam iti 
[331,4^1]	siddhānta aviruddhaḥ pañca avayava upapannaḥ iti kim artham nigraha sthāna niyama artham iti eke jalpe nigraha sthāna vidhānāt vāde tad pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhe ca keṣāṃcid abhyanujñā kriyate tatra siddhānta aviruddha grahaṇāt apasiddhāntaḥ abhyanujñātaḥ pañca avayava upapanna grahaṇāt pañca hetvābhāsāḥ adhika nyūnam ca iti aṣṭau eva vāde nigraha sthānāni iti yadi anyāni api udbhāvi ante tatas kim prāyaścittam bhavet vīta rāga tva nivṛttiḥ iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt apasiddhānta ādi aṣṭa nigraha sthāna udbhāvane api vīta rāga tvam na nivartate 
[331,4^2]	nigraha sthāna antara udbhāvane tu tad nivṛttiḥ iti na atra pramāṇam asti kim ca vāde pratijñāhāni a ādīnām apārthaka nirarthaka ādīnām ca adūṣaṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ tad dūṣaṇa tve vā katham nigraha sthāna niyamaḥ dūṣaṇasya eva nigraha sthāna tvāt apasiddhānta ādi vat nirartha ka apārthaka ādīnām tyāga artham udbhāvanam na nigraha artham iti ced apasiddhānta ādi udbhāvanam guru ādīnām kim nigraha artham na khalu vāde vādinām prakṛta anupayogi tva pratīti pūrvaka parityāgāt anyaḥ asti nigrahaḥ khara ārohaṇa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ tu jalpe api nigrahaḥ na viduṣām anumataḥ pāpa hetu tvāt iti 
[331,17]	anye tu varṇayanti siddhānta aviruddha ādi grahaṇam udāharaṇa artham chala jāti nigraha sthānāni sarvāṇi vāde api udbhāvayinavyāni kin tu vāde tyāga artham jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu jaya parājaya artham udbhāvyante iti asya viśeṣasya jñāpana artham uttara sūtre chala jāti nigraha sthāna grahaṇam viśeṣataḥ kṛtam na ādau iti atha vā siddhānta aviruddhaḥ pañca avayava upapannaḥ ca vādaḥ kartavyaḥ iti sūtrakāraḥ śiṣyān śikṣayati kecid viśuṣka tārkikāḥ siddhānta virodhena api vādam kurvanti yathā īśvara jñānam anityam vibhu dravya viśeṣeṇa guṇa tvāt iti evam ādikam tad pratiṣedha artham siddhānta aviruddha grahaṇam tathā ca uktam 
[331,25_331,28]	ārṣam dharma upadeśam ca veda śāstra avirodhinā yaḥ tarkeṇa anusaṃdhatte sa dharmam veda na itaraḥ iti sva pakṣa sādhanam pratipakṣa dūṣaṇam sādhana samarthanam sādhana samarthanam śabda doṣa varjanam na ca iti etaiḥ pañcabhiḥ avayavaiḥ upapannaḥ vādaḥ kartavyaḥ yena abhipreta artha siddhiḥ syāt śabda doṣa varjanam iti nirartha ka apārthaka apratīta prayoga atidruta uccāraṇa ādi doṣa varjanam iti arthaḥ 
[331,31]	atha vā vādaḥ api dvividhaḥ bhavati śāstra abhyupagama pūrvakaḥ tad viparītaḥ ca iti tatra śāstram abhyupagamya siddhānta aviruddhaḥ vādaḥ kartavyaḥ tatas ca yena kenacid śāstram virudhyate tat sarvam tasya vācyam śāstram anabhyupagamya pañca avayava upapannaḥ vādaḥ kartavyaḥ tasya tu śāstra virodhaḥ na doṣa tvena udbhāvanīyaḥ kim tu yena kenacid pañca avayava upapanna tvam virudhyate tat sarvam tasya nigraha sthānam udbhāvanīyam iti 
[332,7]	vīta rāga kathā api dvividhā bhavati sa pratipakṣā vā pratipakṣā ca tathā ca sūtram na pratipakṣa hīnam api vā kuryāt prayojana arthi tvena iti evam ca avāntara bheda vivakṣāyām catasraḥ kathāḥ bhavanti na tisraḥ iti vyavahāraḥ tu viśeṣa saṃjñā trayeṇa eva asti iti tisraḥ eva viśeṣa saṃjñāḥ uddiṣṭāḥ atha vā tisraḥ eva bhavantu vādaḥ api hi pratipakṣa hīnaḥ vitaṇḍā eva iti vakṣyāmaḥ yatra tu vijigīṣuṇā saha lābha pūjā khyāti kāmaḥ jaya artham pravartate sā vijigīṣu kathā 
[332,13]	nanu ca mokṣa mārga viruddha tvāt lābha ādi prāpteḥ tad prayojanā kathā na yuktā iti satyam na iyam mumukṣuṇā kartavyā kim tu jñātvā varjanīya iti nirūpitā yadā tu vīta rāgaḥ vijigīṣuṇā ākṣiptaḥ kathām parihartum para uparodhāt na śaknoti tadā asau vīta rāgaḥ tena vijigīṣuṇā saha para anugraha artham jñāna aṃkura rakṣaṇa artham ca tām eva catur aṅgām kathām kuryāt na hi anyathā asau vijigīṣuḥ pratibodhayitum śakyate tathā ca āha tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇa artham jalpa vitaṇḍe bīja praroha saṃrakṣaṇa artham kaṇṭaka śākhā āvaraṇa vat iti sva ātmani śiṣya ādi ātmani ca utpannaḥ tattva adhyavasāya aṃkuraḥ śākya ādi mṛgaiḥ bhakṣyeta api yadi jalpa vitaṇḍābhyām kaṇṭaka śākhābhyām āvaraṇam na kriyeta ye ca anutpanna tattva jñānāḥ śiṣya ādayaḥ teṣām prativādinaḥ ca anugraha artham vīta rāgeṇa api jalpa ādau pravartatavyam iti uktam anugrahaḥ ca mokṣa śāstra ācāryādiṣu śraddhā utpatti dvāreṇa bhavati 
[332,25^1]	jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tarhi lakṣaṇam vācyam tat ucyate yathā ukta upapanna chala ja ati nigraha sthānasya asādhana upālambhaḥ jalpaḥ yathā ukta upapannaḥ iti samasta vāda lakṣaṇa upapannaḥ iti vāda lakṣaṇa yogi tve api aṅga ādhikyena aṅga hānyā ca jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ vādāt bhedaḥ jalpasya aṅga ādhikya pradarśana artham chala ja ati nigraha sthāna grahaṇam evam ca utsarga apavāda lakṣaṇasya atipyāpi tva doṣaḥ apare tu ekasya upapanna padasya lupta nirdeśam manyante ayam arthaḥ yathā ukte vāda lakṣaṇe yat upapannam ghaṭamānam tena upapannaḥ upetaḥ chala jāti nigraha sthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ jalpaḥ iti 
[332,25^2]	nanu chala ādibhiḥ na kasyacid sādhanam na api upālambhaḥ sambhavati ayukta uttara tvāt teṣām pratiṣedha artha tā ca sāmānya lakṣaṇe viśeṣa lakṣaṇe ca śrūyate iti na ca eṣām pratiṣedha artham na eva artha sādhaka tvam na hi apramāṇikā kasyacid siddhiḥ asti kim ca upālambha grahaṇāt eva tad artha siddheḥ sādhana grahaṇa ānarthakyam syāt iti bhrāntam pratisādhaka tvam iti eke yasya hi chala jāti nigraha sthānaiḥ bhramaḥ kriyate tasya etāni sādhana tvam buddhyā adhyavasitāni sādhanāni iti ucyante tam prati vā sat uttara tvāt iti asiddham pratiṣedha artha tā api bhrānta abhiprāyeṇa eva na tu paramārthataḥ chala ādīnām pratiṣedhaka tvam api asti asat uttaratvāt iti 
[333,13]	nanu ca chala ādibhiḥ parasya bhramaḥ kartavyaḥ iti na ayam sat ācāraḥ duṣṭam prati duṣṭena bhavitavyam iti ced evam tarhi khara capeṭa viṣa dāna astra ādi prayogeṇa api tasya apakāraḥ kartavyaḥ syāt iti na etat asti dṛṣṭa apalāpa ayogāt vijigīṣavaḥ hi chala ādīni api sādhanāya upālambhāya ca prayuñjānāḥ dṛśyante tatas sādhana upālambha buddhiḥ api atadvidām bhavantī dṛśyate saḥ ayam dṛṣṭa anuvādaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ na doṣāya anuvāde ca parityāgaḥ prayojanam vijigīṣu vat mumukṣubhiḥ na pravartitavyam para anugraha artham pravṛttānām ca vyāmoham vijigīṣu vat chala ādibhiḥ kartum na śaknuvanti iti na punar atra mumukṣūṇām chala ādīni prayoktavya tvena vidhīyante 
[333,21]	apare tu paraiḥ daṇḍaka toṭaka ādi upanyāsena ākulita buddhīnām naiyāyikānām api kiyantam kālam chala ādi prayoktṛ tvam icchanti yāvat samyak sādhaneṣu smṛtiḥ na bhavati anyathā chala ādīnām anupanyāse hi apratibhā ādi nigraha sthānam udbhāvya jayam labdhā api asat vādinaḥ gaccheyuḥ iti bhāṣya kāraḥ tu āha na sākṣāt chala ādīnām sādhana upālambha nimitta tvam iṣyate kim tarhi pramāṇaiḥ eva sādhanaḥ upālambhe ca kriyamāṇe tad vighātāya pareṇa chala ādīni prayuktāni yadi na udbhāvyante tatas satsu api pramāṇeṣu dūṣita tva pratibhāsāt na sādhanam na upālambhaḥ syāt udbhāvitāni chala ādīni sat dūṣaṇāni etāni iti pratīyante tathā pratītāni tu sādhana upālambha nimittānām pramāṇānām aṅga bhāvam gacchanti niravadyebhyaḥ hi pramāṇebhyaḥ sādhanam upālambhaḥ ca bhavati iti tat evam aṅga bhūtānām chala ādīnām upādānam jalpe na svatantrāṇām iti 
[334,3]	sa pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnaḥ vitaṇḍāḥ iti saḥ iti anena jalpaḥ eva sambadhyate iti apare tathā ca dvi rūpā vitaṇḍā bhavati vijigīṣu vitaṇḍā vīta rāga vitaṇḍa iti tam pratipakṣa hīnam api vā prayojana artham iti anena vīta rāga vitaṇḍām āha sva pakṣaḥ eva vaitaṇḍikasya prativādi pakṣa apekṣayā atra pratipakṣaḥ uktaḥ tasya sthāpanā sādhanam tena vikalaḥ vādaḥ jalpaḥ ca vitaṇḍa iti ucyate 
[334,8]	nanu ca sādhana abhāvāt abhāvaḥ eva pratipakṣasya prāptaḥ pacyamānaḥ hi pakṣaḥ ucyate sādhana abhāve tu vyaktīkriyamāṇa tva abhāvāt na pakṣa tvam tatas ca sa pratipakṣa hīnaḥ vitaṇḍa iti vācyam sthāpana agrahaṇam anarthakam tat etat ayuktam yasmāt vādī abhyupagata tvena pakṣaḥ ucyate tad viruddha tvena prativādi abhyupagata tvena vā pratipakṣaḥ iti na tu pacyam ānatena eva tathā tve hi ekaḥ eva pakṣaḥ syāt tatas ca vivāda abhāva prasaktiḥ na hi eka pakṣa apekṣayā vādinoḥ vivādaḥ dṛśyate kim ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti asya apakṣa tve tad vṛtteḥ kṛtaka tva prameya tva ādeḥ viruddhāḥ na aikāntika tvam na vācyam syāt pakṣa dharmasya trayī gatiḥ iti abhyupagamāt tasmāt vādi abhyupagama mātreṇa pakṣa tvam na pacyamāna tvena eva iti 
[334,17^1]	nanu ca yathā nirṇaya lakṣaṇe pakṣa śabdena tad viṣayam sādhanam uktam tathā atra api sa pratipakṣa hīnaḥ vitaṇḍa iti ukte api pratipakṣa viṣaya sthāpanā hīnaḥ iti gamyate eva tasmāt na sthāpana agrahaṇam kāryam iti na para mata niṣedha artha tvāt vaitaṇḍikasya na pakṣaḥ kaścid asti dūṣaṇa mātram hi vitaṇḍa iti eke manyante tad niṣedha artham sthāpanā grahaṇam para abhipretā tu vitaṇḍā yathā na sambhavati tathā ucyate vitaṇḍayā vartamānaḥ vaitaṇḍikaḥ sa prayojanam anuyuktaḥ yadi pratipadyate saḥ asya pakṣaḥ iti vaitaṇḍika tvam jahāti atha na pratipadyate tatas na ayam laukikaḥ na parīkṣakaḥ iti āpadyate tatas ca unmatta vat upekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt 
[334,17^2]	atha api para pakṣa pratiṣedha jñāpanam prayojanam brūyāt etat api tādṛś eva yaḥ jñāpayati yaḥ jānīte yena jñāpayati yat ca jñāpyate etat catuṣṭayam ced pratipadyate vaitaṇḍika tvam jahāti atha na pratipadyate tadā apara pakṣa pratiṣedha jñāpanam prayojanam iti etat na upapadyate vākya samūhaḥ ca sthāpanā hīnaḥ vitaṇḍā tasyāḥ yadi abhidheyam artham pratipadyate saḥ asya pakṣaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ bhavati atha na pratipadyate pralāpa mātram anarthakam bhavati vitaṇḍā tvam ca nivartate iti tasmāt na avidyamāna pakṣasya dūṣaṇa mātram vitaṇḍā kim tarhi yatra kathāyām anyatara vādī sva pakṣa sthāpanām na abhidhatte pāriśeṣyāt sva pakṣa siddhim manyamānaḥ para pakṣa dūṣaṇāni eva abhidhatte sā vitaṇḍa iti 
[335,10]	chala ja ati nigraha sthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ iti uktam na ca aniścita svarūpāṇām chala ādīnām sādhana upālambha hetu tvam asti iti śakyam vaktum na api sva vākye parivarjanam para vākyeṣu udbhāvanam ca kartum śakyate iti tasmāt chala ādi svarūpam viśeṣataḥ api vaktavyam iti atas ucyate vacana vighātaḥ artha vikalpa upapattyā chalam vacanasya vighātaḥ yaḥ kriyate artha vikalpa upapattyā tat chalam vighātaḥ nirākaraṇam dūṣaṇam iti arthaḥ artha vikalpaḥ anyathā artha kalpanam tasya upapattiḥ sambhavaḥ iti udāharaṇam viśeṣa lakṣaṇe draṣṭavyam hetvābhāsa vat na hi viśeṣa udāharaṇāt anyat sāmānya lakṣaṇasya udāharaṇam asti iti 
[335,19]	tat trividham vākchalam sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalam ca iti traividhyam lakṣaṇa traividhyāt yathā lakṣaṇa traividhyāt śala tra evidhyam tathā ucyate 
[335,23^1]	aviśeṣa abhihite arthe vaktuḥ abhiprāyāt artha antara kalpanā vākchalam atra artha grahaṇam vacanasya artha pratiṣedhāt pratiṣedhaḥ na svarūpataḥ iti jñāpana artham aneka artha abhidhāyi padam vākyam vā aviśeṣaḥ tasya artha abhidhānāya prayogaḥ eva abhihitaḥ arthaḥ iti uktaḥ tasmin sati vaktuḥ abhiprāyāt artha antara kalpanā nimittam yatra vacana vighāte tat vāc nimittam chalam vākchalam nanu anyat api vāc nimittam eva chalam satyam tathā api anyatra sāmānya ādi nimittam prādhānyena asti iti tena eva vyapadiśyate nava kambalakaḥ ayam māṇavakaḥ iti ukte chalava ādi āha kutas asya nava kambalāḥ iti 
[335,23^2]	pratyagra kambala sambandhi tvam vaktuḥ vivakṣitam chalavādī tu nava saṃkhyā avacchinna kambala sambandhi tvam tava vivakṣitam iti adhyāropya asambhavena nirākaroti atra ayam paryanuyoktavyaḥ śabda artham budhvābudhvā vā pratiṣedham karoṣi yadi budhvā tadā sāmānya śabdāt ayam viśeṣaḥ kutas tvayā avagataḥ na hi sāmānya śabdaḥ prakaraṇa ādi apekṣaḥ artha viśeṣam vyavasthāpayitum yuktaḥ sāmānya prayoge artha viśeṣam prati vaktā eva praṣṭavyaḥ kim te vivakṣitam iti tatas tad abhiprāyam jñātvā tasya abhyanujñā dūṣaṇam vā vaktum yuktam na cchandataḥ 
[335,23^3]	pratyakṣe arthe śabda prayoge ca artha darśanam eva niyāmakam yathā ayam śvetaḥ dhāvati iti ukte śvetasya adarśane śuni dṛṣṭe ca śvā itas dhāvati iti eṣā eva vaktuḥ vivakṣā gamyate tathā pratyagra kambala darśane nava kambalakaḥ ayam māṇavakaḥ iti vaktrā śabdaḥ uktaḥ tena pratyagra kambalaḥ atra vaktuḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti pratipattiḥ yuktā tad apratipattau ca tasya apratipatti lakṣanam nigraha sthānam vācyam nava kambalā asya iti pratipattiḥ tu viparītā tena vipratipatti lakṣaṇam nigraha sthānam vācyam atha abudhvā eva śabda artham pratiṣedham karoṣi tathā api apratipatti lakṣaṇam nigraha sthānam 
[335,23^4]	atha navaḥ kambalaḥ asya iti vaktuḥ abhiprāyaḥ avagataḥ eva mayā tathā api prativādinā avaśyam kiṃcid uttaram vaktavyam iti uttaram uktam kutas asya nava kambalāḥ iti tathā api uttara aparijñānāt apratipatti lakṣaṇam nigraha sthānam tathā artha pratipattau hi satyam siddha sādhyatā vā iti uttaram yuktam na hi toya pūrṇam taḍāgam iti ukte kutas atra agniḥ iti uttaram yuktam vipratipattiḥ vā nigraha sthānam uttarasya viparīta parijñānāt atha nava śabda sādṛśyāt atra saṃkhyā pratipattiḥ tathā api vipratipattiḥ nigraha sthānam viparīta parijñānāt iti 
[336,28^1]	sambhavataḥ arthasya ati sāmānya yogāt asat bhūta artha kalpanā sāmānyacchalam vivakṣitaḥ dharma jñaḥ catur veda abhijña tva ādi lakṣaṇa abhiprāyeṇa sambhavati sa sambhavat śabdena uktaḥ tam atikramya ātad dharmiṇī api vrātya ādau yat vartate sāmānyam brāhmaṇa tva ādi lakṣaṇam tad atisāmānyam tena sambhavataḥ arthasya yogāt asat bhūta artha kalpanā nimittam yatra vacana vighāte tad sāmānyacchalam sāmānya nimitta tvāt iti aho nu khalu asau brāhmaṇaḥ catur veda abhijñaḥ iti ukte kenacid nyāya vādi āha kim atra āścaryam sambhavati brāhmaṇe catur veda abhijña tvam iti evam ukte chala vādī brāhmaṇa tvam veda abhijña tve liṅgam uktam iti enām asat bhūta artha kalpanām kṛtvā pratiṣedham āha na ayam hetuḥ vrātyena ana ekāntāt kāraṇam ced brāhmaṇa tvam tat vrātye api brāhmaṇa tvam asti iti saḥ api veda abhijñaḥ syāt iti tatra api pūrvavat nigraha sthānam vācyam buddhvā buddhvā vā pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate yadi abuddhvā tatas apratipattiḥ nigraha sthānam atha buddhvā tadā api ayathārtha avabodhāt vipratipattiḥ nigraha sthānam 
[336,28^2]	atha yathā artha pratipattau api avaśyam kiṃcid uttaram vaktavyam iti atas mayā api evam uttaram uktam iti tathā api uttara aparijñānāt apratipattiḥ nigraha sthānam vipratipattiḥ vā viparīta parijñānāt kasmāt hetu tva avivakṣita tvāt na hi atra brāhmaṇa tvam liṅga tvena uktam yena anaikāntika tva udbhāvanā kriyeta na api brāhmaṇa tva veda abhijña tvasya janakam eva uktam yena atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt kim tarhi brāhmaṇa tve sati catur veda abhijña tvam bāhulyena dṛṣṭa tvāt āścarya kāraṇam na bhavati iti bhiprāyaḥ su kṣetra tve sati śāli sampatti vat
