[336,28^3]	yogya tā mātra abhidhānam ca idam yathā sukṣetram śāli sampatti yogyam pratipannam tatra kutaścid nimitta vaiguṇyāt śālya sampattau api ayogyam na ucyate tathā keṣucid brāhmaṇeṣu kutaścid nimitta vaiguṇyāt veda jñāna asampattau api ayogya tvam na yuktam praśaṃsā vādaḥ vā ayam yathā sambhavanti asmin kṣetre śālayaḥ iti anena kṣetram stūyate karṣakāṇām tatra pravṛtti artham tathā sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyā caraṇa sampad iti anena brāhmaṇaḥ praśasyate tatra śraddhā utpādana artham avajñā parihāra artham ca tatas dharma adharmayoḥ upacaya parivarjana siddhiḥ iti 
[337,27^1]	dharma vikalpa nirdeśaḥ artha sadbhāva pratiṣedhaḥ upacāracchalam abhidhānasya dharmaḥ yathārtham prayogaḥ tasya vikalpaḥ anyatra dṛṣṭasya sahacaraṇa ādi nimittena anyatra prayogaḥ tad nirdeśe artha sadbhāvasya mukhya ādhyāropeṇa pratiṣedhaḥ kim uktam bhavati upacāra prayoge mukhya artha kalpanayā pratiṣedhaḥ upacāracchalam pratiṣedhaḥ mukhya artha asambhavena vacana vighātaḥ mañcāḥ krośanti iti ukte chalavādi āha puruṣāḥ krośanti na mañcāḥ teṣām acetana tvāt na hi acetanānām kāṣṭha saṃghātānām krośanam sambhavati tasmāt ayuktam uktam mañcāḥ krośanti iti tasya api pūrvavat nigraha sthānam buddhvā budhvā vā pratiṣedhaḥ yadi abuddhvā tatas apratipattiḥ nigraha sthānam buddhvā ced viparīta bodhāt vipratipattiḥ nigraha sthānam yasmāt ubhayathā api mukhya gauṇa prakāreṇa api loke śāstre ca śabda prayogaḥ dṛśyate 
[337,27^2]	tena vaktā yatheṣṭam mukhyam gauṇam vā śabdam prayuṅkte tatra pradhāna śabda prayoge pradhāna arthasya eva anujñā pratiṣedhaḥ vā yujyate bhākta prayoge tu bhākta arthasya eva iti yadā tu guṇa bhūtam śabdam vaktā prayuṅkte paraḥ tu pradhānam adhāropya pratiṣedhati sva manīṣayā pratiṣedhaḥ saḥ na para upālambhaḥ iti vākchalam eva upacāra chalam tad aviśeṣāt ubhayatra api artha antara kalpanā iti na tad artha antara bhāvāt ekatra aviśeṣa abhidhāne artha antara kalpanā ani atra gauṇa abhidhāne mukhya artha kalpanā iti katham aviśeṣaḥ aviśeṣe vā kiṃcid sādharmyāt eka chala prasaṅgaḥ vaktuḥ avivakṣita artha kalpanā vacana vighāta tvam vā sādharmyam chala traye api asti iti abheda prasaṅgaḥ tatas ca chala dvi tvam yat abhyupagatam tat api nivartate tasmāt lakṣaṇa bhedāt upacāracchalam api artha antaram iti 
[338,16^1]	upacāraḥ eva na asti kutas tad nimittam chalam iti aparaḥ tathā hi mañca śabdaḥ kim samaya apekṣaḥ puruṣeṣu buddhim janayati athā tad nirapekṣaḥ iti samaya apekṣaḥ ced na tarhi gauṇaḥ tatra kṛta samaya tvāt mañca vat aneka artheṣu api saṃketitaḥ go śabda ādi vat mukhyaḥ eva atha tad nirapekṣaḥ tathā sati katham pratipattim janayet na hi śabdaḥ pradīpa ādi vat yogya tayā eva artham pratipādayati kim tarhi liṅga vat sambandha grahaṇa balena kim ca samaya nirapekṣa tve gauṇa śabdānām vyākhyā apekṣi tvam na syāt sūtra virodhaḥ ca sāmayika tvāt śabdāt arthe sampratyayasya iti bhrānta abhra anta vikalpa anupapattiḥ ca yadi bhrāntām pratītim janayati tatas śabdaḥ eva asau na bhavati śabda ābhāsa tvāt āpta upadeśaḥ hi śabdaḥ uktaḥ na ca bhrānti artham āptaḥ śabdam uccārayati 
[338,16^2]	atha abhrānta jñāna janakaḥ tathā sati mukhyaḥ eva asau śabdaḥ tad lakṣaṇa yogi tvāt mañca śabdaḥ puruṣeṇa sākṣāt na sambaddhaḥ tena asau tasmin arthe gauṇaḥ iti ced kaḥ ayam sākṣāt sambandhaḥ saṃyogaḥ tāvat guṇa tvāt na śabdānām kenacid asti samavāyaḥ tu sarva śabdānām ākāśena eva samayaḥ tu puruṣeṇa api sākṣāt eva anyathā pratītiḥ na syāt iti uktam na hi sambaddha sambaddhāt bhū tala śabdāt tad stheṣu vṛkṣa ādiṣu pratītiḥ dṛṣṭā kim ca sambaddha sambandhāt api yadi viśiṣṭām pratītim janayati tadā na gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ na hi indriya sambaddha sambaddhāt api guṇa ādiṣu viśiṣṭam jñānam janayan gauṇaḥ ucyate atha aviśiṣṭam jñānam janayati tadā api apramāṇam śabdaḥ iti eva vaktavyam na gauṇaḥ iti pratāraka śabda vat tasmāt na gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ asti iti 
[339,5^1]	tat etat akṛtabuddhi saṃmohana mātram na viduṣām manāṃsi anurañjayati lokeṣu api mukhya gauṇa bhāvena śabda pravṛtti vyavahāra prasiddheḥ śabda artha vyavasthām prati hi vyavahāriṇaḥ eva paṇḍitāḥ tena vyavahārataḥ eva śabda arthaḥ vyavasthāpayitavyaḥ ayam mukhyaḥ ayam gauṇaḥ iti tasmin eva khalu arthe kenacid nimittena pravartamānaḥ śabdaḥ mukhyaḥ kenacid bhāktaḥ iti ucyate yathā ekasmin eva parvate bhūdharaḥ tiṣṭhati ityādiḥ kriyā śabdaḥ śvetaḥ mahān ityādiḥ guṇa śabdaḥ parvataḥ ityādiḥ jāti śabdaḥ sa vṛkṣaḥ ityādiḥ dravya śabdaḥ iti evam vyapadeśa bhedam śabdāḥ nimitta bhedāt pravartamānāḥ labhante yathā vā saḥ eva śabdaḥ kvacid arthe pāribhāṣikaḥ kvacid naimittikaḥ ucyate samaya apekṣi tva viśiṣṭa jñāna janakatva aviśeṣe api samayaḥ api khalu dvividhaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ ca iti 
[339,5^2]	tatra yaḥ bahuṣu api śāstreṣu lokeṣu ca vyavahāra hetuḥ sa sādhāraṇaḥ yathā vṛddhi śabdena upacayaḥ abhyadhikībhāvaḥ ucyate yaḥ tu pratiniyata śāstre loke vā vyavahāra hetuḥ saḥ asādhāraṇaḥ yathā vṛddhiḥ ādaicvarṇaḥ ucyate loke ca gṛhe gṛhe sva abhiprāyeṇa putra ādiṣu saṃjñā kriyate gavā ādiṣu ca sva samaya adhikṛtaiḥ saha gupta vyavahāra artham apūrvaḥ śabdaḥ saṃketyate iti tatra asādhāraṇa samaya apekṣiṇaḥ śabdāḥ yeṣu yeṣu artheṣu saṃketitāḥ teṣu teṣu yathārtha pratītim janayantaḥ mukhyāḥ eva sādhāraṇa samaya apekṣiṇaḥ api ye jāti ādi nimitta upādānena samitāḥ te tad nimitta yogiṣu artheṣu mukhyāḥ eva nimitta nirapekṣaḥ api vyoma ādi śabdaḥ yasmin arthe paribhāṣitaḥ tasmin mukhyaḥ eva ye tu sahacaraṇa ādi nimitta upādānena samitāḥ te anādi kāla tvena bhāktāḥ iti prasiddhāḥ 
[339,25^1]	tathā ca anādi prasiddhiḥ ullaṅghayitum na śakyā iti manvānaḥ sūtrakāraḥ sarva loka śāstra prasiddheḥ anuvādam karoti sma aha caraṇa sthāna tādarthya vṛtta māna dhāraṇa sāmīpya yoga sādhana ādhipatyebhyaḥ brāhmaṇa mañca kaṭa rāja saktu candana gaṅgā śāṭaka anna puruṣeṣu atadbhāve api tadvat upacāraḥ iti ayaṣṭika ādi svabhāveṣu api brāhmaṇa ādiṣu yaṣṭika ādiṣu iva vartamānaḥ śabdaḥ upacāraḥ ucyate iti arthaḥ tatra yaṣṭikām bhojaya iti yaṣṭikā sahacaritaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ abhidhīyate sthānāt mañcāḥ krośanti iti puruṣāḥ ucyante 
[339,25^2]	tādarthyāt kaṭārthāni vīraṇāni karoti kaṭam karoti iti tat ayuktam karoti utpādayati iti eka artha tvāt na ca utpannānām vīraṇānām punar utpādanam yuktam kim vā satkārya tva virodhāt mukhye bādhaka abhāvāt ca karma tva virodhaḥ iti ced na jāyate iti kartṛ tvam ca saṃjñā mātreṇa karma tvāt tat uktam trividham karma nirvartyam vikāryam prāpyam ca iti tat na sarvatra janakasya kāraka tvam iṣṭam śabda vidbhiḥ kim tu dvitīya ādi vibhakti utpatti artham khara viṣāṇa ādiṣu api vivakṣā mātreṇa karma ādi saṃjñā kṛtā khara viṣāṇam abhidhattaḥ iti 
[339,25^3]	tasmāt anyathā vyākhyāyate kaṭārthāni vīraṇāni ānīyante kaṭaḥ ānīyate iti kaścid upacarati yūpa artham dāru ānīyate iti vṛttāt yamaḥ ayam rājā kuberaḥ ayam rājā tadvat eva vartate iti mānāt āḍhakena mitān saktūn aśnāti āḍhakam aśnāti iti dharaṇāt tulayā dhṛtam candanam tulā iti ucyate sāmīpyāt gaṅgāyām gāvaḥ caranti iti yogāt nīlaḥ śāṭakaḥ iti sādhanāt annam vai prāṇāḥ iti ādhipatyāt ayam puruṣaḥ kulam ayam ca gotram iti atadbhāve api tadvat upacāraḥ iti bruvatā gauṇa mukhyayoḥ skhalat gati kṛtaḥ api viśeṣaḥ ukta skhalat gatiḥ śabdaḥ gauṇaḥ askhalat gatiḥ tu mukhyaḥ iti 
[339,25^4_341,1]	tathā hi mañcāḥ krośanti iti ukte kāṣṭha saṅghāteṣu eva tāvat gatiḥ bhavati tasyām vācakena bādhitāyām paścāt puruṣeṣu gatiḥ iti atas ekatra skhalitvā anyatra gati hetuḥ gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ na tu evam puruṣāḥ krośanti iti ukte kvacid skhalanam asti kṣaṇika tvāt śabdānām krama vyāpāraḥ na yuktaḥ iti api na vācyam vākya vicāre nirūpita tvāt kim ca vākyasya vicāra pūrvakaḥ artha niścayaḥ na syāt saṃketa mātra apekṣi tve ca go śabdaḥ kam artham pratipādayet vāc ādīnām sarveṣām kvacid api apratīteḥ saṃketaḥ ca aviśeṣeṇa vṛttaḥ tat uktam vāc digbhū raśmi vajreṣu paśu akṣi svarga vāriṣu navasu artheṣu medhāvī go śabdam avadhārayet 
[341,3^1]	evam ca dugdhā gauḥ iti ukte katham paśuḥ eva pratipattavyaḥ prastāvāt iti ced nanu prakaraṇa vaśāt na artha dhiṣaṇā iti matam te virudhyate na ca go śabdānām eva viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti yad upalambhāt ayam go śabdaḥ paśau samitaḥ iti smṛtvā tatas śabdāt paśuḥ eva pratīyeta tasmāt prakaraṇa deśa kāla śabda antara sannidhāna ādi nimittam śabda artha pratītau sarvam abhyupagantavyam na samayaḥ eva kevalaḥ sūtra kāreṇa api na samayaḥ eva nimittam iti uktam yena prakaraṇa ādi vaśāt artha pratītau sūtra virodhaḥ syāt mānasa pratyakṣa abhyupagame śabda ākhya pramāṇa nivṛttiḥ syāt artha viśeṣa viṣayaḥ hi śābda vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate sa ca artha viśeṣaḥ mānasa pratyakṣeṇa eva gṛhyate iti kim śabda pramāṇena na ca āptaḥ api aviśiṣṭa artha pratītaye śabdam uccārayati tasmāt na samayāt eva śabdaḥ artham pratipādayati 
[341,3^2]	prakaraṇa ādi apekṣāt ca śabdāt krameṇa api artha pratītiḥ bhavati atas na anumānikī api puruṣa pratītiḥ eṣṭavyāḥ mañca stha tve liṅga anupalabdheḥ ca kim tu krośanti iti pada sahitān mañca śabdāt eva mañca stha puruṣa pratītiḥ ayam ca mukhya gauṇayoḥ viśeṣaḥ puruṣa śabdaḥ khalu sādhāraṇa kriyā sāmāna adhikaraṇyena tiṣṭhati puruṣaḥ asti puruṣaḥ krośati iti evam prayuktaḥ puruṣam eva abhidhattaḥ iti mukhyaḥ ucyate mañca śabdaḥ punar tiṣṭhanti mañcāḥ santi ityādi sādhāraṇa kriyā sā māna adhikaraṇyena prayuktaḥ puruṣam na pratipādayati kin tu kriyā na mañceṣu sambhavati puruṣeṣu ca sambhavati tad sāmānādhikaraṇyena eva prayuktaḥ puruṣam pratipādayati tena tatra bhāktaḥ iti ucyate evam guṇa sāmānādhikaraṇya prayoge api mukhya gauṇayoḥ pratīti janaka tva viśeṣaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti 
[341,22]	nanu ca ātasmin tat iti jñānam bhrāntam uktam tatas ca āmañce puruṣe mañca jñānam bhrāntam eva tad hetuḥ ca gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ apramāṇam eva iti na etat asti vivekataḥ pratīteḥ puruṣaḥ atra bhaktyā mañca śabdena uktaḥ iti vivekataḥ pratītiḥ katham bhrāntā syāt avivekena hi pratītiḥ bhrāntiḥ bhavati yathā sthāṇau puruṣaḥ eva ayam iti nīlaḥ eva ayam sphaṭikaḥ iti yadi punar evam pratipadyate sthāṇuḥ eva ayam dūra ādi nimittāt puruṣa ākāra tayā pratibhāti śuklaḥ eva ayam sphaṭikaḥ nīla upādhi vaśāt nīla ākāraḥ pratibhāti tadā samyak pratītiḥ eva na bhrāntiḥ iti evam ca ātasmin tat iti bhrānta jñāna hetuḥ śabdaḥ gauṇaḥ iti lakṣaṇam draṣṭavyam 
[341,30]	kim ca yaḥ yatra sākṣāt saṃketyate sa tatra mukhyaḥ ucyate yathā daṇḍī iti śabdaḥ daṇḍam upādāya puruṣaḥ eva saṃketyate na tu daṇḍe saṃketinaḥ tatra bādhake sati puruṣe pravartate mañca śabdaḥ tu mañca tvam upādāya sākṣāt mañceṣu saṃketitaḥ tatra bādhake sati sthānāt nimittāt puruṣe pravartate iti atas asti gauṇa mukhyayoḥ viśeṣaḥ tat evam upacārasya sambhavāt tad nimittam chalam api upapannam iti 
[342,8]	prayukte hetau samīkaraṇa abhiprāyeṇa prasaṅgaḥ jātiḥ pratipakṣeṇa aviśeṣa pratipādanam samīkaraṇam sa ca prasaṅgaḥ dvidhā kriyate sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca yasmāt āha sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ iti pratyavasthānam upālambhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti arthaḥ udāharaṇam viśeṣa lakṣaṇeṣu vakṣyāmaḥ 
[342,13]	parājaya nimittam nigraha sthānam tat api saṃkṣepataḥ dvividham yat āha vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca nigraha sthānam iti viparītā kutsitā vā pratipattiḥ vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ tu ārambha viṣaye anārambhaḥ pakṣam abhyupagamya na sthāpayati pareṇa sthāpitam vā na pratiṣedhayati pratiṣiddham vā na uddharati bahavaḥ ca anayoḥ sūkṣmāḥ bhedāḥ bahavaḥ aparisaṃkhyātāḥ anayoḥ jāti nigraha sthānayoḥ sūkṣmāḥ bhedāḥ avāntara viśeṣāḥ tathā ca āha tad vikalpāt jāti nigraha sthāna bahu tvam iti tayoḥ jāti bhedayoḥ nigraha sthāna bhedayoḥ ca vikalpāt avāntara viśeṣāt jñāti bahu tvam nigraha sthāna bahu tvam ca bahu tvam atra aparisaṃkhyāta tvam vivakṣitam anyathā caturviṃśati dvāviṃśati bheda abhidhānāt eva bahu tvam siddham iti anarthakam bahutva grahaṇam syāt iti tasmāt teṣām jāti nigraha sthāna bhedānām anantānām niḥśeṣa abhidhānam na śakyate iti kiyantaḥ bhedāḥ śiṣya buddhi prakarṣa artham lakṣaṇa udāharaṇābhyām pradarśyante iti 
[343,10]	tatra jāti bhedāḥ tāvat prapañcyante s ā d h a r m y a v a i d h a r m y o t k a r ṣ ā p a k a r ṣ a v a r ṇ y ā v a r ṇ y a v i k a l p a s ā d hi aprāpti aprāpti prasaṅga pratidṛṣṭānta anutpatti saṃśaya prakaraṇā hetu artha apatti aviśeṣa upapatti upalabdhi anupalabdhi nitya anitya kārya samā iti sama śabdaḥ pratyekam sambadhyate sādharmya samaḥ utkarṣa samaḥ iti evam sarvatra yojyam 
[343,15^1]	tatra sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām upasaṃhāre tad dharma viparyaya upapatteḥ sādharmya vaidharmya samau sādharmyeṇa anvayena vaidharmyeṇa vyatirekeṇa upasaṃhāre dṛṣṭānta nirvacane tad dharma viparyayaḥ dṛṣṭānta dharma viparyayaḥ pratidṛṣṭānta dharmaḥ iti arthaḥ tasya upapatteḥ sambhava ādau prasaṅgau jāyete tau sādharmya vaidharmya samau tatra anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt paṭa vat iti evam sādharmya upasaṃhāre kṛte paraḥ pratyavasthānam karoti yadi anityena paṭena sādharmyāt anityaḥ iṣyate nityena ākāśena sādharmyāt amūrta tva lakṣaṇāt nityaḥ kid na iṣyate na hi atra viśeṣaḥ asti yena anitya sādharmyāt anityaḥ bhavati na tu nitya sādharmyāt nityaḥ iti yadi ca anitya paṭa sādharmyāt anityaḥ iṣyate tadā tad vaidharmyāt nityaḥ kid na iṣyate 
[343,15^2]	asti ca vaidharmyam api paṭaḥ rūpa ādimān śabdaḥ tu tad vilakṣaṇaḥ iti na ca atra viśeṣaḥ asti anitya sādharmyāt anityena bhavitavyam na punar anitya vaidharmyāt nityena iti tathā yat nityam tat akṛtakam dṛṣṭam yathā ākāśam śabdaḥ tu kṛtakaḥ tasmāt anityaḥ iti evam vaidharmyeṇa upasaṃhāre api ubhayathā pratyavasthānam yadi nitya vaidharmya akṛtaka tvāt anityaḥ iṣyate paṭa ādi anitya vaidharmyāt amūrta tva ādi lakṣaṇāt nityaḥ kid na iṣyate na ca atra viśeṣaḥ asti nitya vaidharmyāt anityena bhavitavyam na punar anitya vaidharmyāt nityena iti yadi ca nitya vaidharmyāt anityaḥ tad sādharmyāt nityaḥ kid na iṣyate na ca atra viśeṣaḥ asti nitya vaidharmyāt anityena bhavitavyam na punar nitya sādharmyāt nityena iti 
[344,10]	anayoḥ uttaram avinābhāvinaḥ sādharmyasya vaidharmyasya ca hetu tva abhyupagamāt aprasaṅgaḥ dhūma ādi vat iti yathā agnimat sādharmyāt anagnimat vaidharmyāt ca dhūmāt eva agnimat tvam parvata ādau sidhyati na tu anagnimat sādharmyāt agnimat vaidharmyāt ca vṛkṣa ādi sambandha tvāt anagnimat tvam api sidhyati tasya avinābhāvi tva abhāvāt evam anitya sādharmyasya nitya vaidharmyasya ca avinābhāvinaḥ eva kṛtaka tva ādeḥ sādhakatam na tu avinā abhāva vikalasya api amūrta tva ādeḥ iti tasmāt nitya sādharmyāt anitya vaidharmyāt ca nitya tva siddhiḥ api prāpnoti iti ayam aprasaṅgaḥ 
[344,17]	na ca atra viśeṣaḥ asti iti asiddham avinā abhāvi tva tad vihīna tva viśeṣasya ukta tvāt tathā ca sūtram go tvāt go siddhi vat tad siddhiḥ katham punar go tvāt sādhya aviśiṣṭāt gauḥ sidhyati iti go vyavahāraḥ sādhyate iti adoṣaḥ atha vā go tva śabdena tad avinābhūtam sāsnādi liṅgam uktam tat eva go sādharmyam ago vaidharmyam ca goḥ sādhanam bhavati tad avinābhūta tvāt na tu prāṇi tva ādi api sādharmya mātram ca iti 
[344,24_344,27]	sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpāt ubhaya sādhya tvāt ca utkarṣa apakarṣa varṇyāvarṇya vikalpa sādhya samāḥ atra ṣaṇṇām lakṣaṇa abhidhānāt ṣaṣ eva vākyāni draṣṭavyāni sādhye dṛṣṭāntāt aniṣṭa dharma prasaṅgaḥ utkarṣa samaḥ tat yathā tasmin eva śabda anitya tva anumāne paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate yadi kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ tadā ghaṭa vat eva sāvayavaḥ prāpnoti iti utkarṣa samaḥ 
[344,31]	atha kṛtaka tve sati api sāvayavaḥ śabdaḥ na iṣyate tathā sati anityaḥ api tarhi na syāt aviśeṣāt aśrāvaṇaḥ ca ghaṭaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ api kṛtaka tvāt aśrāvaṇaḥ prāpnoti anityaḥ api vā na iṣṭavyaḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt iti apakarṣa samaḥ 
[345,16]	śabdaḥ yadi kṛtaka tva anumānena anityaḥ varṇyate tathā sati ghaṭaḥ api kṛtaka tva anumānena eva varṇyaḥ syāt atha anavasthā bhayāt ghaṭaḥ tena eva anumānena anityaḥ na varṇyate tatas śabdaḥ api avarṇyaḥ syāt aviśeṣāt iti varṇyāvarṇya samau etau ca sādhya samāt ukti bheda mātreṇa bhinnau tena saṃgraheṇa vyākhyātau 
[345,21]	atha vikalpa samaḥ kṛtaka tva aviśeṣe api yathā kiṃcid mūrtam kiṃcid amūrtam kiṃcid kaṭhinam iti evamādi dharma vikalpaḥ tathā kiṃcid kṛtakam nityam kiṃcid anityam iti eṣaḥ api vikalpaḥ syāt viśeṣa abhāvāt iti 
[345,25]	atha sādhya samaḥ yadi kṛtaka tvāt ubhayoḥ anitya tvam tatas tarhi sādhya tvam ubhayoḥ syāt na vā kasyacid atha kṛtaka tvāt api sādhya tvam na ubhayoḥ tad ā ubhayoḥ anitya tvam api na syāt viśeṣa abhāvāt iti 
[345,29^1]	eteṣām ṣaṇṇām uttaram kiṃcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāra siddheḥ vaidharmyāt apratiṣedhaḥ yathā dhūmavat tva ādi lakṣaṇāt mahānasa ādi parvata ādi pradeśayoḥ kiṃcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāra siddhiḥ dṛṣṭā upasaṃhriyate asmin iti upasaṃhāraḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyam vā hetuḥ vā karma vyutpattyā tasya siddhiḥ tathā bhāva vyavasthā sā tu sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ parvata ādi mahānasa ādi pradeśayoḥ dharma vikalpe api dṛṣṭā sarva loka prasiddhā na sarvaḥ mahānasa ādi dharmaḥ parvata ādau sidhyati na api tat asiddhau agneḥ api asiddhiḥ na api mahānasa ādau anupalabdhaḥ dharmaḥ parvata ādau dṛṣṭaḥ api nivartate 
[345,29^2]	na api dhūmavatām dharma antara vikalpavat agni mattva vikalpaḥ api bhavati na api ubhayoḥ pradeśayoḥ anumeya tvam ananumeya tvam ca ubhayoḥ iti sā iyam vyavasthā sarva vyavahāri prasiddhā śāstreṣu api abhyupagatā tad apalāpe ca loka virodhaḥ śāstra virodhaḥ sarva anumāna aprāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ ca sarva anumāneṣu api utkarṣa apakarṣa ādīnām sambhavāt tasmāt sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ kiṃcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāra siddhe vaidharmyāt pratiṣedhaḥ na yuktaḥ sādhya nirdeśāt ca dṛṣṭānta upapatteḥ yena ca ubhaya prasiddhena sādhyam atidiśyate sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva upapadyate na tasya api sādhya tvam yuktam iti 
[346,21]	prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyā viśiṣṭa tvāt aprāpti ā asādhaka tvāt ca prāpti aprāpti samau hetuḥ sādhyam prāpya sādhayet aprāpya vā na tāvat prāpya sādhayet ubhayoḥ prāptyā viśiṣṭa tvāt aṅgulyoḥ iva kim kasya sādhanam sādhyam vā iti na api aprāpya sādhyet na hi aprāptam kāṣṭham agniḥ dahati pradīpaḥ vā ghaṭa ādi aprāptam prakāśayati iti 
[346,27]	anayoḥ uttaram ghaṭa ādi niṣpatti darśanāt pīḍane ca abhicārāt apratiṣedhaḥ prāpti aviśeṣe api mṛd piṇḍaḥ eva kulāla ādibhiḥ ghaṭaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ pradīpena prakāśyamānaḥ ca dṛśyate na tu tad viparyayaḥ aprāpti aviśeṣe api abhicāra karma pīḍanam kurvat upalabhyate tasmāt ubhayathā api ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpti aprāpti aviśeṣe api hi pratiniyata artha vṛttayaḥ eva ete sādhya sādhana tva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ te nirākartum aśakyāḥ sarva pramāṇa virodhāt iti 
[347,4]	dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇa anapadeśāt pratyavasthānāt ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅga pratidṛṣṭānta samau dṛṣṭāntasya api sādhanam vācyam kṛtakam ghaṭa ādi anityam eva iti na atra kāraṇam apadiṣṭam na ca apramāṇikā siddhiḥ asti sādhyasya api sādhana anabhidhāna prasaṅgena pratyavasthānam prasaṅga samaḥ yathā ca śrotra grāhyam śabda tvam nitya dṛṣṭam tathā śabdaḥ api nityaḥ syāt na ca atra viśeṣaḥ asti ghaṭa ādi dṛṣṭāntāt anityena bhavitavyam na punar śabda tva dṛṣṭāntān nityena iti pratidṛṣṭāntena pratyavasthānam pratidṛṣṭānta samaḥ tatra prasaṅga samasya sādhya samāt ukti mātreṇa bhedaḥ pratidṛṣṭānta samasya ca sādharmya vaidharmya samābhyām iti atas anayoḥ saṃgrahe anabhidhānam samasta abhidhāna apratijñānāt ca adoṣaḥ tathā ca kiyantaḥ bhedāḥ pradarśyante iti uktam tatra prasaṅga samasya tāvat uttaram āha pradīpa upādāna prasaṅga vinivṛtti vat tad vinivṛttiḥ 
[347,16]	yathā ghaṭa ādi prakāśanāya upātte pradīpe pradīpa antara upādāna prasaṅgaḥ anarthakaḥ pradīpasya pradīpa antara anapekṣasya pratīteḥ tathā dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭānta antara anapekṣasya pratyakṣeṇa api siddheḥ tad prasaṅgaḥ anarthakaḥ iti 
[347,20_347,23]	pratidṛṣṭānta samasya api uttaram āha pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve ca na hetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ eva uktaḥ tvayā na tu dṛṣṭāntasya doṣaḥ kaścid atas doṣa abhāvāt na hetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve abhidhīyamāne api iti atha vā yaḥ ayam pratidṛṣṭānte uktaḥ sa kena abhiprāyeṇa kim yathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhakaḥ tathā pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ api sādhakaḥ kim vā yathā pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ asādhakaḥ tathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ api asādhakaḥ iti prācīne pakṣe pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve na ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭānta vat pratidṛṣṭāntasya hetu tve abhyupagamyamāne abhyupagatam tāvat tvayā api dṛṣṭāntasya anitya tva siddhau hetu tvam tatas ca tatra āvayoḥ saṃpratipattiḥ saṃjātā iti siddhaḥ asmad pakṣaḥ pratidṛṣṭānte tu adya api vipratipattiḥ dvitīye api pakṣe pratidṛṣṭānta vat dṛṣṭāntaḥ api asādhakaḥ iti bruvata abhyupagatam tāvat tvayā api pratidṛṣṭāntasya ahetutvam dṛṣṭānte tu vicāryam iti evam ca dṛṣṭāntasya asādhaka tva siddhau pratidṛṣṭāntasya hetu tve abhidhīyamānena ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti ubhaya pakṣe api sūtram sambadhyate 
[348,8]	prāk utpatteḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt anutpatti samaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ kāryatvāt iti ukteḥ paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate prāk utpatteḥ śabdasya anitya tva kāraṇam kārya tvam na asti iti nityaḥ prāptaḥ nityasya ca utpattiḥ anupapanna iti anutpattyā pratyavasthānam anutpatti samaḥ 
[348,13]	asya uttaram tathā abhāvāt utpannasya kāraṇa upapatteḥ apratiṣedhaḥ anutpannaḥ khalu śabdaḥ eva na asti kasya nitya tva ādi dharmaḥ cintyeta utpannaḥ hi śabdaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati tadā ca anitya tva sādhakam kāraṇam kāryatvam upapadyate tasmāt nityasya utpattiḥ anupapanna iti ayam apratiṣedhaḥ 
[348,18]	sāmānya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ aindriyaka tve samāne nitya anitya sādharmyāt saṃśaya samaḥ sati api kṛtaka tva ākhye hetau saṃśaya kāraṇa sadbhāvāt śabde saṃśayaḥ na nivartate saṃśaya kāraṇam ca sāmānya ghaṭayoḥ nitya anityayoḥ sādharmyam aindriyaka tvam tat asti śabde atha saṃśaya kāraṇe sati api saṃśayaḥ na iṣyate tadā niścaya kāraṇe sati api niścayaḥ api mā bhūt viśeṣa abhāvāt iti saṃśayena pratyavasthānam saṃśaya samaḥ 
[348,25]	asya uttaram sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayaḥ vaidharmyāt ubhayathā vā saṃśaye atyanta saṃśaya prasaṅgaḥ nitya tva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya apratiṣedhaḥ sādharmyāt aindriyaka tvāt saṃśaye api vaidharmyāt kṛtaka tvāt na yuktaḥ saṃśayaḥ tasya viśeṣa tvāt atas tad upalambhāt anitya niścayaḥ eva astu atha tatas api saṃśayaḥ eva iṣyate tadā sādharmyāt vaidharmyāt api saṃśaye abhyupagamyamāne atyanta saṃśaya prasaṅgaḥ kutas hi asau saṃśayaḥ nivarteta iti 
[349,4]	yat ca uktam sati api kṛtaka tve saṃśaya kāraṇa sadbhāvāt śabde saṃśayaḥ na nivartate iti tatra āha nitya tva anabhyupagamāt ityādi sarvadā saṃśaya kartṛ tva anabhyupagamāt sāmānyasya iti arthaḥ na hi śiraḥ pāṇi ādi viśeṣa darśane api ūrdhva tva sāmānyāt saṃśayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ dṛśyate tasmāt ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ saṃgrahe tu asya api anabhidhānam vistara parihāra artham 
[349,10_349,14]	ubhaya sādharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ ubhayam ca tat sādharmyam ca ubhaya sādharmyam sādharmya dvayam iti arthaḥ prakriyate iti prakriyā pakṣaḥ pratipakṣaḥ ca ucyate tatra anitya sādharmyāt pakṣa siddhiḥ nitya sādharmyāt tu pratipakṣa siddhiḥ sādharmya grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham vaidharmyeṇa api samānam ubhaya vaidharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ iti asya api sādharmya vaidharmya samābhyām ukti mātreṇa bhedaḥ yadi tu viruddha avyabhicāri vat trirūpeṇa sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam prakaraṇa samaḥ sādharmya samaḥ tu sādharmya mātreṇa pratyavasthānam iti ucyate tadā etat vailakṣaṇyam api asti 
[349,19]	asya uttaram pratipakṣāt prakaraṇa siddheḥ pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ pratipakṣa upapatteḥ dvitīya pakṣa apekṣayā prathamasya atra pratipakṣa tvam tasmāt pratipakṣāt prathama sādhanāt prakaraṇasya prathama pakṣasya siddheḥ pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ dvitīya pakṣasya anutthānam iti arthaḥ kutas pratipakṣa upapatteḥ prathama sādhanasya niravadya tvāt iti arthaḥ 
[349,25]	traikālya asiddheḥ hetoḥ ahetu samaḥ hetuḥ sādhanam tat kim sādhyāt pūrvam kim vā paścāt uta yugapad iti yadi pūrvam sādhanam asati sādhye kasya tad sādhanam atha paścāt sādhanam pūrvam sādhyam katham utpannam sādhanam vinā bhaviṣyat avidyamānam katham sādhanam atha yugapad sādhyam sādhanam ca tathā kim kasya sādhanam vidyamāna tvena dvayoḥ tulya tvāt iti hetuḥ ahetunā na viśiṣyate iti eva pratyavasthānam ahetu samaḥ 
[350,5]	asya uttaram na hetutaḥ sādhya siddheḥ na hi nirvartyam jñāpyam vā kiṃcid api sādhyam hetum antareṇa sidhyati hetutaḥ tu mṛd piṇḍa kulāla ādibhyaḥ pradīpa akṣa dhūma ādibhyaḥ ca ghaṭa ādeḥ sādhyasya siddhiḥ upalabhyate teṣām api traikālya asiddheḥ samāna tvāt ahetu tvam prāptam tatas ca sarva hetūnām ahetu tve prāpte na kaścid kvacid pravarteta nivarteta vā iti andhamūkam sarva vyāpāra śūnyam ca jagat syāt na ca etat asti tasmāt dhetutaḥ eva sādhya siddhiḥ pūrva apara sahabhāvaḥ api yathādarśanam abhyupagantavyaḥ tatra nirvartakaḥ hetuḥ sarvaḥ api sādhyāt prāk eva jñāpakaḥ tu kaścid prāk yathā akṣa arka ādiḥ utpadyamānānām kaścid paścāt yathā dhūma śabda icchā ādiḥ dahana ākāśa ātma ādīnām kaścid sahabhāvī yathā rūpa ādiḥ sparśa ādīnām yogyatām anumāya asati api sādhye sādhana vyapadeśaḥ sati api ca sādhane sādhya vyapadeśaḥ kriyate iti 
[350,17]	pratiṣedha anupapatteḥ ca yaḥ ayam pratiṣedhaḥ sa kim pratiṣedhyāt pūrvam kim vā paścāt uta yugapad iti yadi pūrvam tatas asati pratiṣedhye kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ atha paścāt asati pratiṣedhe katham pratiṣedhyam atha yugapad tatas sādhya itarayoḥ go viṣāṇayoḥ iva pratiṣedha pratiṣedhya bhāva anupapattiḥ tat evam traikālya asiddheḥ pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ tad anupapattau ca niravadyaḥ hetuḥ siddhaḥ iti 
[350,24]	arthāpattitaḥ pratipakṣa siddheḥ arthāpatti samaḥ yadi anitya sādharmyāt kāryatvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iṣyate arthāt āpannam nitya sādharmyāt nityaḥ iti asti ca śabdasya nityena api sādharmyam asparśa tvam evam vaidharmya prayoge api arthāpattyā pratyavasthānam draṣṭavyam asya api sādharmya vaidharmya samābhyām ukti mātreṇa bhedaḥ atha vā sādharmyeṇa upasaṃhāre sādharmyeṇa eva pratyavasthānam sādharmya samaḥ yadi anitya sādharmyāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ arthāt āpannam nitya sādharmyāt nityaḥ iti vaidharmyeṇa upasaṃhāre vaidharmyeṇa eva pratyavasthānam vaidharmya samaḥ yadi nitya vaidharmyāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ arthāt āpannam anitya vaidharmyāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti vaidharmyeṇa upasaṃhāre api sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam arthāpatti samaḥ iti atas svarūpa bhedaḥ asti 
[351,11]	asya uttaram anuktasya arthāpatteḥ pakṣa hāneḥ upapattiḥ anukta tvāt anuktasya nitya tva pakṣasya arthāpattitaḥ siddhim icchataḥ pakṣasya nitya tvasya hāniḥ prāpnoti kasmāt pakṣa hāneḥ anukta tvāt na ca arthāpatteḥ ittham svarūpam kim tarhi yena vinā yat na upapadyate tat anupapadyamānam tat kalpayat arthāpattiḥ ucyate na ca nitya sādharmyāt nitya tva siddhim vinā anitya tva siddhiḥ na upapadyate yena sā tām kalpayet anaikāntika tvāt ca arthāpatteḥ yā ca iyam vākya artha viparyayeṇa eva artha āpattiḥ sā khalu anaikāntikī na hi ghanasya grāvṇaḥ patanam iti ukte arthāt āpadyate dravāṇām apāma patanam iti 
[351,20]	eka dharma upapatteḥ aviśeṣe sarva aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt sadbhāva upapatteḥ aviśeṣa samaḥ yadi ghaṭa śabdayoḥ ekasya dharmasya kāryatva ākhyasya upapatteḥ anitya tve na aviśeṣaḥ iṣyate nanu evam tarhi sarva bhāvānām api aviśeṣaḥ prasajyate sadbhāva ākhyasya eka dharmasya sarvatra upapatteḥ iti 
[351,25]	tatra idam ucyate yadi sarva bhāvānām sarvathā eva aviśeṣaḥ sādhyate tadā pratyakṣa ādi virodhaḥ atha yena kenacid aviśeṣaḥ tadā prameya tva ādinā sarveṣām aviśeṣa abhyupagamāt siddha sādhanam atha nitya tvena anitya tvena vā sarveṣām aviśeṣaḥ tadā api anumāna ādinā virodhaḥ tat āha kvacid tad dharma upapatteḥ kvacid ca anupapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ kvacid ghaṭa ādau tad dharmasya anitya tvasya upapatteḥ pramāṇena upalabdheḥ kvacid ākāśa ādau vā anupapatteḥ pramāṇatā anupalabdheḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ sarva aviśeṣa prasaṅga abhāvaḥ iti athavā kvacid anitya tva ādau tad sādhakasya dharmasya kārya tva ādeḥ hetu tvena upapatteḥ sambhavāt kvacid ca sarva aviśeṣe ca sadbhāvasya anyasya vā dharmasya hetu tvena anupapatteḥ asambhavāt pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ iti pūrvavat 
[352,10]	ubhaya kāraṇa upapatteḥ upapatti samaḥ yadi anitya tva kāraṇa upapatteḥ śabdasya anitya tvam iṣyate nanu evam nitya tva kāraṇasya asparśa tvasya upapatteḥ nitya tvam api kid na iṣyate iti upapattyā pratyavasthānam upapatti samaḥ na hi atra viśeṣaḥ asti iti sādharmya vaidharmya samābhyām asya api ukti mātra bhedaḥ na vastu bhedaḥ ukti bhedāt ananta tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced abhyupagamāt adoṣaḥ prapañca udāharaṇa artha tvāt sūtrāṇām pratisamādhāna prakāra vyutpatti artha tvāt ca iti 
[352,17]	asya uttaram upapatti kāraṇa anujñānāt apratiṣedhaḥ ubhaya kāraṇa upapatteḥ iti bruvata anujñātam tāvat anitya tva kāraṇa upapatteḥ anitya tvam anujñātasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ na yuktaḥ na ca asmābhiḥ ubhaya kāraṇa upapattiḥ abhyupagamyate yena asmākam vyāghātaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vā codyate asparśa tvasya akāraṇa tvāt iti 
[352,22]	nirdiṣṭa kāraṇa abhāve api upalambhāt upalabdhi samaḥ pṛthivī ādiṣu kāryatva siddhaye nirdiṣṭasya sāvayava tva ākhyasya kāraṇasya abhāve api buddhi ādau kāryatvam upalabdham iti arthataḥ aprayojakaḥ ayam hetuḥ upalabdhyā pratyavasthānam upalabdhi samaḥ 
[352,27]	sa pakṣa eka deśasya api dhūma ādeḥ gamaka tva darśanāt apratiṣedhaḥ sa pakṣa eka deśa śabdena atra hetuḥ upacaritaḥ sthānāt nimittān mañca śabda vat atha vā sa pakṣasya eka deśaḥ yasya asau iti evam bahuvrīhiḥ na khalu aprayojakaḥ nāma hetvābhāsaḥ asiddha ādibhyaḥ asti tad vyāvartaka lakṣaṇa abhāvāt sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛtti tvam ca dhūma ādi hetuṣu api asti na api bhāga asiddha tvam eva atra aprayojaka tvam buddhi ādeḥ apakṣa tvāt na hi buddhi ādau sāvayava tvena kārya tvam sādhayitum iṣṭam evam tarhi buddhi ādeḥ kāryatva siddhiḥ na syāt atas āha kāraṇa antarāt api tad dharma upapatteḥ apratiṣedhaḥ yathā nirdhūmasya agneḥ na asiddhiḥ eva pratyakṣataḥ liṅga antarāt ca tad siddheḥ tathā kāryatvasya api pramāṇa antarāt api siddheḥ na buddhi ādau tad siddhi pratiṣedhaḥ kim punar atra pramāṇam tat ucyate kāryam buddhi ādikam anupalabdhi kāraṇeṣu asatsu prāk ūrdhvam ca anupalabdheḥ paṭa ādi vat iti 
[353,19]	tad anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt abhāva siddhau tad viparīta upapatteḥ anupalabdhi samaḥ tasya buddhi ādi kāryasya yā anupalabdhiḥ sā api na upalabhyate yadi upalabhyeta tadā upalabdhiḥ eva syāt atas anupalambhāt tasya anupalabdheḥ abhāva siddhiḥ tad siddhau ca anupalabdhiḥ viparītā buddhi ādeḥ upalabdhiḥ upapadyate tatas prāk ūrdhvam api buddhi ādeḥ sadbhāvaḥ setsyati iti abhiprāyaḥ na ca atra viśeṣaḥ asti buddhi ādeḥ prāk anupalabdhiḥ abhāvam sādhayati na tu tad anupalabdheḥ anupalambhaḥ iti anupalabdhyā pratyavasthānam anupalabdhi samaḥ 
[353,27]	atra uttaram anupalambha ātmaka tvāt anupalabdhiḥ ahetuḥ na asti iti jñānam anupalabdhiḥ sā tad svabhāva tayā eva pratyātma vedyātaḥ tad anupalabdheḥ anupalabdhiḥ asiddhā iti abhiprāyaḥ yadā api upalabdhi abhāvaḥ anupalabdhiḥ tadā api upalabdhi abhāvasya pratyātma vedya tvāt tad anupalabdhiḥ asiddhā tathā hi sukha jñānam me na asti sukha jñānam aham na upalabhaḥ iti anupalambha tvena eva saṃvedyate atas eva upalabhyamāna tvāt upalabdhi tvam na aśaṃkanīyam na hi yathā vidhi mukhena utpadyamāna upalabdhiḥ saṃvedyate tathā anupalabdhiḥ api iti 
[354,7]	sādharmyāt tulya dharma upapatteḥ sarva anitya tva prasaṅgāt anitya samaḥ anityena ghaṭena sādharmyāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti bruvataḥ sarva bhāvānām anitya tvam prasajyate asti hi ghaṭena sādharmyam sarva bhāvānām astitva ādi na ca atra viśeṣaḥ asti yena ghaṭa sādharmyāt śabdasya eva anitya tvam na sarva bhāvānām iti anitya tvena pratyavasthānam anitya samaḥ 
[354,13]	aviśeṣa samādasya ukti bhedāḥ bhedaḥ tena tatra uktam uttaram atra api draṣṭavyam vyutpatti artham anyat api āha sādharmyāt asiddheḥ pratiṣedha asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhya sādharmyāt sarva nitya tva prasaṅgaḥ kim artham codyate na hi sarva anitya tva prasaktau śabdasya anitya tvam na sidhyati atha yatas atiprasaṅgaḥ tatas artha siddhiḥ na iṣṭā yathā vacana mātrāt iti nanu evam sati asādhakena vacana mātre sādharmyāt tvayā śabda anitya tva hetoḥ asiddhiḥ iṣṭā tatas kim atha asādhakena sādharmyāt dhetu asiddheḥ abhyupagame tvad uktasya pratiṣedhasya api asiddhiḥ prāpnoti kasmāt pratiṣedhyena asādhakena sādharmyāt asti hi pratiṣedhyena pratiṣedhasya sādharmyam abhidheya tva ādi tasmāt ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti 
[354,23]	nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye nitya tva upapatteḥ nitya samaḥ anitya tva dharmasya nityam sarvadā sadbhāvāt dharmiṇaḥ api śabdasya sarvadā sadbhāvaḥ prāpnoti anyathā katham asati dharmiṇi dharmaḥ syāt dharmiṇaḥ api sarvadā vyavasthāne na anitya tvam atha anitya tva dharmaḥ sarvadā na asti tathā api anitya tva abhāvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti nitya tvena pratyavasthānam nitya samaḥ 
[354,29]	atra uttaram pratiṣedhye nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye nitya tva upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anitya bhāvāt iti bruvata abhyupagatam śabdasya anitya tvam tatas ca anitya tva upapatteḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na yuktaḥ atha anitya tvam śabde na abhyupagamyate tathā api nityam anitya bhāvāt iti asya hetoḥ asiddha tvāt ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ atha matam na anitya tvam mayā pratiṣidhyate kim tu nitya tvam asti iti upapādyate tat api ayuktam iti āha nitya aniti avirodhāt ca na hi vidhi pratiṣedhau ekatra sambhavataḥ sambhave hi dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa phala anartha prāpti parihāra arthinām sādhana viśeṣeṣu pravṛtti nivṛtti niyamaḥ na syāt pradhvaṃsaḥ ca anitya tvam na tasmin sati śabda sadbhāvaḥ iti nanu evam sati śabda kāle pradhvaṃsa abhāvāt nitya tvam prāptam na bhāvinaḥ tad dharma tvāt bhāvī nāśaḥ anityatā iṣyate yasya hi nāśaḥ bhaviṣyati tat anityam iti ucyate nāśa yogya tā vā anitya tā yogyatā eva atra upacāreṇa pradhvaṃsa śabdena uktā iti 
[355,19]	prayatna kārya aneka tvāt kārya samaḥ varṇa ātmakaḥ śabdaḥ anityaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate prayatna kārya anekatvāt iti prayatna anantaram ghaṭa ādīnām janma dṛṣṭam vyavahitānām tu vyavadhāna apohāt abhivyaktiḥ ca tatra na jñāyate kim prayatna ānaṃtaram ātma lābhaḥ śabdasya āho svid abhivyaktiḥ iti na ca atra viśeṣaḥ asti yena śabdasya prayatna anantaram ātma lābhaḥ eva iti niścīyate kārya bhedena pratyavasthānam kārya samaḥ 
[355,26]	asya uttaram kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ yatra hi anupalabdhi kāraṇam vyavadhāna ādi upapadyate tatra kārya anya tve abhivyakti vyatirikte janmani prayatnasya ahetu tvam yuktam na ca śabdasya anupalabdhi kāraṇam vyavadhāna ādi kiṃcid upalabhyate tasmāt śabda ātma lābhe prayatnasya na ahetu tvam iti atha vā kārya anya tve janma vyatiriktāyām śabdasya abhivyaktau prayatna ahetu tvam kasmāt anupalabdhi kāraṇa upapatteḥ abhivyakti hetu tvam yatas anyatra dṛṣṭam iti adhyāhāryam na śabdasya anupalabdhi kāraṇam kiṃcid asti yena prayatnāt abhivyaktiḥ syāt api ca prayatnasya tīvra manda ādi bhāvāt śabdasya tathā abhāvaḥ utpatti pakṣaḥ eva yujyate na hi mahatā prayatnena vyajyamānam alpam suvarṇa ādi mahat bhavati tasmāt icchā prayatna dharma anuvidhāyi tvāt śabdasya vega utkṣepaṇa ādi vat utpattiḥ eva prayatna anantaram śabdasya iti 
[356,6]	etena jāti bheda prapañca abhidhānena tad dūṣaṇa prakārāḥ ca sukhena eva vyutpāditāḥ bhavanti yadi anye api jāti bhedāḥ santi kasmāt na udāhriyante sarveṣām udāhartum aśakya tvāt kasmāt sarvāṇi jāti uttarāṇi udāhartun na śakyante ānantyāt na ca ananta tva abhyupagame sūtra virodhaḥ sūtrāṇām api udāharaṇa artha tvāt kutas etat gamyate sūtrāṇām udāharaṇa artha tvam eva na punar etāvantaḥ eva jāti bhedāḥ iti avadhāraṇa artha tvam iti gamyate jāti antareṇa pūrva pakṣa karaṇāt yadi avadhāraṇam vivakṣitam syāt tadā sūtrakāraḥ pūrva pakṣam kurvan caturviṃśati vyatiriktām jātim na brūyāt uktam ca jāti antaram yathā 
[356,15]	anyat anyasmāt ananya tvāt ananyat iti anya tā bhāvaḥ śabda anitya tva parīkṣāyām abhyāsāt iti pūrva pakṣam kṛtvā na anya tve api abhyāsa upacārāt iti anena dūṣitavān punar pūrva pakṣa vādī āha yat idam anyat iti ucyate kim ātmanaḥ anyat uta ananyat iti yadi anyat tad ātma hānān na asti eva atha ananyat tadā ananya tvāt eva anyat na bhavati iti anya tā bhāvaḥ eṣā ananya samā jātiḥ 
[356,22]	tathā vipratipattau ca saṃpratipatteḥ iti yadi na vipratipattiḥ sampratīyate tadā asti iti katham vetsi atha sampratīyate tadā api sampratīyate iti sampratipattiḥ eva sā na vipratipattiḥ atha vā yadi tad arthaḥ na sampratīyate tadā mleccha bhāṣā vat apratīta artha tvāt na saṃśaya hetuḥ atha sampratīyate arthaḥ tathā api sva artham sampratyāyayantī samratipattiḥ eva iti eṣā sampratipatti samā jātiḥ 
[356,29]	avyavasthā ātmani vyavasthita tvāt ca avyavasthāyāḥ atra ṣaṣṭhī vivakṣāyām abhāvaḥ iti adhyāhāryam pañcamī vivakṣāyām na saṃśayaḥ iti yadi avyavasthā ātmani na vyavasthitā tad ātma hānāt na asti eva atha ātmani vyavasthitā tadā api vyavasthānāt vyavasthā eva iyam iti vyavasthā samā jātiḥ tasmāt na caturviṃśatiḥ eva iti avadhāraṇam sūtrakārasya vivakṣitam anyanyasam ādīnām ca uttaram nimitta antarāt saṃjñā antare saṃyojyamāne arthe tathā abhāvasya nirākartum aśakya tvāt iti na hi kārye kārya antara janaka tvena kāraṇa śabde saṃyojyamāne kārya tvam nivartate na api kāraṇe ca sva ātma ākāśa ādya janaka tvena akāraṇa śabde saṃyojyamāne sva kārya kāraṇa tvam nivartate iti 
[357,14]	uktāḥ jāti bhedāḥ atha idānīm nigraha sthānāni ucyante tāni api vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ vikalpāt na saṃkhyātāni iti atas saṃkṣepataḥ vyutpādyante pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaram pratijñā virodhaḥ pratijñāsaṃnyāsaḥ hetu antaram artha antaram nirarthakam avijñāta artham apārthakam aprāpta kālam nyūnam adhikam punaruktam ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ mata anujñā paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam niranuyojya anuyogaḥ apasiddhāntaḥ hetvābhāsāḥ ca nigraha sthānāni iti vipratipatti apratipatti liṅga tvena vākya ātmakānām api pratijñāhāni a ādīnām parājaya nimitta tvāt nigraha sthāna tvam uktam iti 
[357,25^1]	tatra pratidṛṣṭānta dharma abhyanujñā sva dṛṣṭānte pratijñāhāniḥ yadi sva dṛṣṭānte ghaṭa ādau pratidṛṣṭāntasya ākāśa ādeḥ dharmam nitya tvam anujānāti tadā dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvam eva nigraha nimittam syāt na pratijñāhāniḥ atha matam pratidṛṣṭānta dharma anujñānāt sva dṛṣṭāntam jahāti dṛṣṭāntam ca jahan nigamana antam eva pakṣam jahāti iti pratijñā hāniḥ iti ucyate dṛṣṭānta hāniḥ eva tarhi upacāreṇa pratijñā hāniḥ iti uktā iti na eṣa doṣaḥ pakṣasya atra dṛṣṭānta śabdena abhidhānāt katham dṛṣṭa ḥ pratipakṣaḥ tu pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ iti tamoriḥ vayam tu brūmaḥ sādhana adhikaraṇa tva ādi sādharmyāt pakṣaḥ atra dṛṣṭānta śabdena upacaritaḥ sahacaraṇa ādi sūtre asya upacāra nimittasya anabhidhānāt ayuktam iti ced na udāharaṇa artha tvāt na hi tatra avadhāraṇam asti anyathā api upacāra pravṛtteḥ siṃhaḥ māṇavakaḥ agniḥ vaṭuḥ samudraḥ taḍāgaḥ grāma eka deśe api dagdhe grāmaḥ dagdhaḥ iti evamādi 
[357,25^2]	prayojana abhāvāt anupacāraḥ iti ced na prayojana abhāve api upacārasya dṛṣṭa tvāt yaṣṭikā bhuṅkte mañcāḥ krośanti ityādi asti ca atra prayojanam pratidṛṣṭānta dharma anabhyupagame api pratijñātam artham tyajataḥ pratijñā hāniḥ eva iti pratidṛṣṭāntasya yaḥ dharmaḥ sādhya virodhī tam sādhye sva pakṣe anujānataḥ pratijñāhāniḥ tat yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti evam kṛte paraḥ brūte yadi kṛtaka tvāt anitya sādharmyāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iṣyate nanu ākāśa vat amūrta tvāt nitya sādharmyāt nityaḥ kid na iṣyate na ca atra asti viśeṣaḥ kaścid iti evam prativādinā jāti prayogeṇa anyathā vākulīkṛtaḥ vādī āha bhavatu nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tasya nitya tva abhyupagamena anitya tva pratijñā hīyate iti atas pratijñā hāniḥ nigraha sthānam 
[358,15]	anabhyupagamāt na iti ced syāt kasyacid matam na eva nigraha sthānam kiṃcid mayā abhyupagamyate iti evam tarhi na kasyacid jayaḥ parājayaḥ vā iti vyarthāḥ vāde pravṛttiḥ atha asti kiṃcid nimittam yatas parājitaḥ asādhuvādī ca ucyate nanu tat eva nigraha sthānam pratijñā tyāgena katham sādhu vādi tvam katham na parājaya iti 
[358,20]	nanu ca svayam anityam śabdam abhyupagamya svastha ātmā katham nityam pratipadyate yadi nāma pratipadyate anitya dharmasya api darśanāt saṃśayitaḥ syāt iti na para ukte doṣam ajānataḥ siddha sādhya tā apa hṛta cittasya nitya tva abhyupagamāt bhrānteḥ puruṣa dharma tvāt aniyata nimitta tvāt ca na ca viduṣaḥ svastha ātmanaḥ kiṃcid api nigraha sthānam sambhavati vipratipatti apratipatti lakṣaṇa tvāt nigraha sthānasya saṃśayitaḥ api ca vādī na ātmanaḥ saṃśayam prakaṭayati jaya akāṃkṣi tvāt kim ca atra bahunā uktena yaḥ tāvat yatas kutaścid nimittāt pratidṛṣā anta dharmam abhyanujānāti anyathā vā pratijñātam artham jahāti tasya pratijñā hāniḥ nigraha sthānam iti 
[359,12]	pratijñāta artha pratiṣedhe dharma vikalpāt tad artha nirdeśaḥ pratijñāntaram anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt iti asya sattā ādibhiḥ vyabhicāreṇa pratiṣiddhe pratijñāte arthe dharma vikalpena pratijñāntaram karoti yathā ghaṭaḥ asarva gataḥ evam śabdaḥ api asarva gataḥ anityaḥ iti tad arthaḥ iti sādhya siddhi artham sarva gataḥ iti nirdeśaḥ iyam api pratijñā eva na ca pratijñā pratijñā antara sādhana samarthā iti asamartha upādānāt nigraha sthānam iti eke tat ayuktam hetu antaram hi etat na pratijñā antaram hetu viśeṣaṇa tvena asarva gata tvasya upādānāt na ca pratijñā pratijñā sādhanāya ucyamānā pratijñā antaram bhavati kim tarhi hetu ādeḥ ananyatamaḥ sādhya sādhanāya upādānāt sādhya tvena hi nirdeśaḥ pratijñā ucyate sādhana abhiprāyeṇa tu asiddha nirdeśaḥ api na pratijñā yathā ākāśam mūrtam yatas rūpa ādimat iti 
[359,23]	tasmāt anyathā vyākhyāyate sarvam anityam sattvāt iti atra dṛṣṭānta abhāvena pratijñāta arthasya pratiṣedhe kṛte dharmaḥ vivāda āspadībhūta tva lakṣaṇaḥ tasya vikalpaḥ pūrvam pratijñā viśeṣaṇa tvena anabhidhānam paścāt abhidhānam iti tad arthaḥ iti atra tat iti pratiṣedhasya parāmarśaḥ artha śabdaḥ ca nivṛtti vācī yathā maśaka arthaḥ ayam dhūmaḥ iti evam tad arthaḥ pratiṣedha nivṛtti arthaḥ iti arthaḥ nirdeśaḥ iti sa viśeṣaṇa abhidhānam vivāda āspadībhūtam sarvam anityam iti etat pratijñāntaram nigraha sthānam hetu antara vat tat yathā aviśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchataḥ hetu antaram tathā atra api aviśeṣa uktāyām pratijñāyām pratiṣiddhāyām viśeṣam icchataḥ pratijñāntaram draṣṭavyam tulya nyāya tvāt iti 
[360,8]	pratijñā hetvoḥ virodhaḥ pratijñā virodhaḥ yathā guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antara tvena anupalambhāt iti 
[360,11]	viprakarṣiṇām bhāvānām bhedena anupalambhe api bheda sadbhāvāt na virodhaḥ iti ced na vaktṛ doṣa udbhāvanāt yadi vyaktiḥ ekam na upalabhase katham ajānānaḥ para pratipādanāya pratijñām karoṣi na hi avyutpannaḥ pratipādakaḥ asti atha upalabhase guṇa dravyayoḥ bhedam tathā api bhedena anupalabdheḥ iti vyāhataḥ hetuḥ tat evam pratijñā hetu abhidhānayoḥ virodhāt pratijñā virodhaḥ pratyakṣa ādi virodhaḥ api atra pratijñā virodhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ hetu grahasya upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt 
[360,17]	yat ca uktam śramaṇā garbhiṇī ityādau pratijñāyām sva vacana virodha udbhāvanam na yuktam vyartha tvāt asādhana aṅga pratijñā prayogeṇa eva upasaṃgṛhīta tvāt parājitasya ca parājaya abhāvāt bhasmīkṛta jvalana vat iti tat ayuktam pratijñāyāḥ sādhana aṅga tvena prāk pratipādita tvāt evam ca pratijñāyāḥ virodhaḥ pratijñayā vā virodhaḥ pratijñā virodhaḥ iti ubhayathā vigrahe api na asti doṣaḥ pratijñayā hetu virodhasya udāharaṇam na asti ekaḥ bhāvaḥ samūhe bhāva śabda prayogāt iti na hi eka abhāve samūhaḥ sambhavati eka samuccayaḥ hi samūhaḥ iti 
[361,7]	na atra pratijñāyāḥ prayogaḥ na hetoḥ kin tarhi hetu antara sādhitasya upasaṃhāra vacanam tasmāt na atra virodhaḥ iti ced īdṛśam api yat upasaṃhāra vacanam pratijñā hetu vacanam tarhi kīdṛśam kim ca avayava dvaya vādinaḥ upasaṃhāra vacanam api asādhana aṅgam eva na hi para artha anumānāt anyat vacanam sādhana aṅgam tvayā iṣṭam para artha anumānam ca avayava dvaye niyatam tvayā iṣṭam na ca upasaṃhāra vacaḥ hetu dṛṣṭānta vacasi antarbhavati tasmāt upasaṃhāra vacaḥ api tava nigraha sthānam eva iti 
[361,13]	yat ca uktam na ca ekam na asti iti bruvāṇaḥ kaścid ekam samuccaya rūpam samūham icchati iti tat api ayuktam na hi tava niḥśeṣam jagat pratyakṣam vicitra abhiprāyavantaḥ ca prāṇinaḥ dṛśyante tena evam api kaścid icchati iti sambhāvyate loka prasiddha arthaiḥ ca śabdaiḥ vāde vyavaharttavyam tena samūha śabdasya anyaḥ eva arthaḥ iti api na vācyam 
[361,18_362,7]	yat api uktam virodhasya dviṣṭha tvāt tatra hetu pratijñāyāḥ pṛthak bādha udāharaṇayoḥ na kaścid artha bhedaḥ iti satyam na vastutas kim tu vivakṣātaḥ bhedaḥ abhyupagamyate yadā pratijñām pramāṇīkartum icchati tadā pratijñayā hetoḥ virodhaḥ yadā tu hetum pramāṇīkaroti tadā pratijñāyāḥ hetunā virodhaḥ iti evam abhiprāya bhedāt bhedaḥ samūhe bhāva śabda prayogāt iti ayam vyadhikaraṇa asiddhaḥ na pratijñā virodhaḥ iti ced na pramāṇa saṃplava vat doṣa saṃplava abhyupagamāt dṛśyate hi loke api ekasmin api vastuni aneka doṣa kīrtanam kim ca aneka doṣa niścaye sati yaḥ yadā smaryate sa tadā udbhāvyate tena ekaḥ eva doṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti ayam niyamaḥ śāstre na iṣyate ye api pratijñā virodhāḥ hetvābhāseṣu eva antar bhāvyante teṣām api udbhāvayitum vivakṣā bhedena bhedaḥ uktaḥ kāla atīta udāharaṇa prastāve tat na pratijñā virodhasya apṛthak vacanam iti 
[362,11]	pakṣa pratiṣedhe pratijñāta artha apanayanam pratijñā saṃnyāsaḥ pratijñā arthasya apanayanam apahnavaḥ atas eva pratijñā hānitaḥ asya bhedaḥ tatra hi asāmarthyāt pratijñā artham tyajati na tu anaivam mayā pratijñātam a iti apahnute atra punar anuṣṇaḥ agniḥ iti asya pratyakṣa bādhita tvena pratiṣedhe kṛte vādī hetvābhāsa nigraha sthāna bhayāt tad apahnavam karoti sampaśyadhvam aho madhyasthāḥ sākṣiṇaḥ na aham anuṣṇam agnim bravīmi iti anukta upālambhaḥ ayam iti etat tasya pratijñā saṃnyāsa lakṣaṇam nigraha sthānam iti samaḥ gamyṛt chipracchi ityādi sūtre dṛśeḥ ca iti vaktavyam iti anena sampaśyadhvam iti ātmanepadam 
[362,20^1]	nanu ca hetvābhāsena nigṛhītasya kim pratijñā saṃnyāsa apekṣayā tat eva hi nyāyyam nigraha sthānam kim aparaiḥ aśakya paricchedaiḥ klība pralāpa ceṣṭitaiḥ upanyastaiḥ evam hi atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt pakṣa pratiṣedhe tūṣṇīṃbhavataḥ tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ nigraha sthānam prapalāyi tvam iti evamādi api vācyam syāt tasmāt etat api asambaddham iti tat etat ayuktam yasmāt nimitta apāye naimittikasya api apāyaḥ iti anena nyāyena pratijñā apahnavāt dhetu ābhāsa doṣam parihartum icchati viṣa ādi tyāgāt tad nimitta duḥkha parihāra vat tam pratyucyate yadi pratijñām tyajasi tatas te pratijñāsaṃnyāsaḥ nigraha sthānam na ced tyajasi tadā pūrva uktam eva 
[362,20^2]	kim ca samyak sādhana prayoge api kaścid jāti ādibhiḥ ākulīkṛtaḥ pratijñām apahnute tasya api etat nigraha sthānam samuccayaḥ vā na kevalam tad nigraha sthānam idam ca iti abhyupagama vādena vā mā bhūt tat nigraha sthānam tathā api anena pratijñā saṃnyāsena tava nigrahaḥ iti pakṣa pratiṣedhe tūṣṇīṃbhau a ādau sati abhyupagatam eva tena tad dūṣaṇam bhavati iti atas na tasya anyat udbhāvyate parisaṃkhyā anabhyupagamāt ca adoṣaḥ iti 
[363,17]	aviśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchataḥ hetu antaram yathā nityāḥ vedāḥ asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti asya jīrṇa kūpa ādibhiḥ anaikāntika tvena pratiṣedhe kṛte sampradāya avicchede satī iti viśeṣam icchataḥ hetu antaram nigraha sthānam pūrvasya asādhakasya upādānāt iti 
[363,22]	anaikāntika tvena eva nigṛhītasya vyartham hetu antaram iti ced na anaikāntikasya samarthanāt sa viśeṣaṇaḥ ayam hetuḥ na vyabhicarati iti anaikāntika tva parihāre kṛte satī ucyate na tāvat prathamam sa viśeṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ uktaḥ idānīm tu viśeṣaṇa upādāne api hetu antaram bhavati tasya tu anaikāntika tvam tad avastham eva sa viśeṣaṇa nirviśeṣaṇayoḥ ananya tvāt yadi sa viśeṣaṇasya sāmarthyam pūrvam nirviśeṣaṇasya upādānam kim artham iti 
[364,7]	prakṛtāt arthāt apratisambaddha artham artha antaram nityaḥ śabdaḥ asparśa tvāt iti hetuḥ hetuḥ ca hinoteḥ dhātoḥ tun pratyaye kṛdantam padam bhavati iti padam ca nāma ākhyāta upasarga nipāta bhedāt caturvidham iti evam prastutya nāma ādīni vyācaṣṭe tatas prasaktya anuprasaktyā anyat api artha antaram upadiśati tat etat prakṛta anupayogi tvāt nigraha sthānam 
[364,13]	vādinaḥ tāvat upanyasta sādhanasya samarthane kartavye tat akṛtvā anyasya prasaṅgena aprasaṅgena ca abhidhānam parājaya sthānam prativādinaḥ api tad doṣa udbhāvana mātrāt aparasya upakṣepaḥ artha antara gamanam eva iti 
[364,17]	varṇa krama nirdeśa vat nirarthakam varṇa krama nirdeśaḥ siddha mātṛkā pāṭhaḥ tena tulyam varṇa krama nirdeśa vat yatra prāśnika prativādibhyām padārthaḥ api na vijñāyate tad nirarthakam yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kacaṭatapānām jabagaḍa daśa tvāt jhabha ghaḍha dhaṣa vat iti 
[365,7]	yadi api kacaṭa ātapa ādi śabdānām api arthaḥ kvacid prakaraṇe asti tathā api evam prayoge na padārthaḥ api kaścid prasiddhaḥ prāśnika ādi prasiddha arthaiḥ ca śabdaiḥ vāde vyavahartavyam tad aprasiddha samayaiḥ tvayā arthān prati karṇa āṭa ādi śabdaiḥ iva bruvataḥ artha apratipādaka tvāt eva asādhana aṅga vacanam nigraha sthānam ati alpam idam ucyate kapola vādita kakṣa piṭṭanaka ādīnām api vācya tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na udāharaṇa para tvāt sūtrāṇām na teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ iti 
[365,14]	pariṣad prativādibhyām tris abhihitam api avijñātam avijñāta artham yat vācyam tris abhihitam api apratīta prayogāta druta uccārita ādinā nimittena pariṣad prativādibhyām na jñāyate tad ajñāna saṃvaraṇāya uktam ajñāta artham nāma nigraha sthānam yathā a r t h ā n t a r a b h ū t a s a r vā artha grāhaka indriya jñāna ādhāra tathā gata viśuddha jñāna grāhya viṣaya grahaṇa ādhāra kṣa paṇaka tīrthaṅkara ādi sattva samanugata paṭa sattva ghaṭaḥ na ghaṭaḥ śaśa viṣāṇa anutpādaka tvāt paṭa vat iti 
[366,6]	nirarthakāt ajñāna artham na bhidyate artha apratipādaka tva aviśeṣāt iti ced na atra bāhulyena pada padārtha anusandhāne api vā artha apratīteḥ na api apārthakāt abhedaḥ asya tatra hi vākya arthaḥ eva na sambhavati atra tu sambhavan api ati druta uccārita ādi nimittān na pratīyate iti evam tarhi vai jāḍyāt pariṣad ādayaḥ na pratipadyante iti na vidvān nigraham arhati iti tat ayuktam ubhaya sammatāḥ hi prāśnikāḥ bhavanti na jaḍāḥ kim ca apratīta prayoga atidruta uccārita ādi nimittena iti uktam prāśnikān api bodhayitum na śaknoti atha ca vidvān iti aho vidvat tvam yat api uktam pariṣad ādyapratipādana sāmarthye jetā na syāt na nigraha arhaḥ iti tat api ayuktam ekasya pariṣad pratipādane asti sāmarthyam anyasya na asti iti katham na jaya parājayau yadi pariṣad pratipādane api asamarthaḥ kim iti abhyupagamam karoti yukta vādi tvam ca asya kaḥ katham pratipadyate iti 
[366,18]	paurvāparya ayogāt apratisambaddha artham apārthakam yatra anekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāparyeṇa yogaḥ na asti iti asambaddha artha tā gṛhyate tad samudāya arthasya apāyāt apārthakam yathā daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṣ apūpāḥ kaṇḍam aja ajinam palala piṇḍaḥ raurukam kumāryāḥ pāyyam tasyāḥ pitā apratiśīnaḥ iti etat eva asambaddham vākyam asambaddha abhidhānam vā ucyate iti 
[366,24]	avayava viparyāsa vacanam aprāpta kālam pratijña ādīnām artha vaśāt kamaḥ teṣām viparyayeṇa abhidhānam nigraha sthānam 
[366,27]	evam api artha siddheḥ śabda apeta vat etat iti ced na evam syāt matam yathā gauḥ iti asya padasya arthe goṇī iti padam prayuktam pratītim janayati na tu sākṣāt tathā hi goṇī śabdāt go śabde smṛtiḥ bhavati tatas smṛti upasthāpitāt go śabdāt eva kakudādimati artha pratītiḥ iti tathā pratijña ādīnām viparyaya abhidhānāt ānupūrvīm pratipadyate tayā ca vākya artham iti tat idam asiddham asiddhena sādhyate iti apaśabdāt sādhu śabda pratītau artha pratītiḥ iti etat eva asiddham na hi asmin krame pramāṇam kiṃcid asti kim ca yaḥ tāvat ubhayam śabdam apaśabdam ca vetti saḥ evam pratyetu strī śūdra ādayaḥ śabda apaśabda vivekam na jānanti te katham apaśabdāt śabdam pratipadya tatas artham pratipatsyante 
[367,8]	dṛṣṭā ca anubhaya vedinaḥ api na paramparayā pratītiḥ arthe asamarthasya ca śabde api pratīti janana asāmarthyāt na hi arthe api bodhaka tvam nāma anyat eva tad viṣaya pratīti janaka tvāt apaśabdaḥ ced śabde pratītim janayet arthaḥ eva kid na janayati na hi asya arthāt kiṃcid bhedam śyāmaḥ yena tam pariharet akṛta samayasya śabde api pratītya jananāt ca na hi ayam apaśabdaḥ śabde api svabhāvataḥ pratītim janayati adarśanāt samaya vaśāt tu janayan arthaḥ eva kid na janayati evam hi pratipatti paramparā pariśramaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati viparyaya darśanāt ca śabdāt artham pratipattum icchantaḥ apaśabdaiḥ eva bahulam vyutpādyamānāḥ lokāḥ dṛśyante iti vyartham śabdānvākhyānam 
[367,17]	saṃskṛta śabda vyutpatti artha tvāt na vyartham iti ced kaḥ ayam śabdānām saṃskāraḥ na hi eṣām prajñā bāhu śruti ādi saṃskāram paśyāmaḥ na api ekāntena śravya tā na api artha pratyāyane kaścid atiśayaḥ na api dharma sādhana tā mithyā pravṛtti codanebhyaḥ saṃskṛtebhyaḥ api adharma utpatteḥ priya hita satya vacanebhyaḥ apaśabdebhyaḥ api dharma utpatteḥ na ca vacana mātram āgamam ādriyante yukti jñāḥ tasmāt na saṃskṛtaḥ nāma kaścid śabdaḥ 
[367,22]	śiṣṭa prayogaḥ saṃskāraḥ iti ced ke śiṣṭāḥ ye vidita vedya tā ādi guṇa yuktāḥ kaḥ punar eṣām guṇa utkarṣa anapekṣaḥ alīka nirbandhaḥ yat te amūn eva śabdān prayuñjate na aparān na ca atra kaścid śraddhe aparokṣaḥ sākṣī yatas idam evam niścinumaḥ prayuñjate nāma te śiṣṭāḥ nanu evam vayam guṇa atiśayam apaśyantaḥ saṃskāram ca keṣāṃcid śabdānām anumanyāmahe tad anvākhyāna yatnam vā guṇa atiśaya abhāvāt sati api guṇa atiśaye na anvakhyāne yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ tad svabhāvasya anyatas api siddheḥ prākṛta apabhraṃśa draviḍa āndhra ādi bhāṣā vat na hi pratideśam bhāṣāṇām kiṃcid lakṣaṇa śāstram asti atha ca sampradāya vaśāt tāḥ tathā eva lokaḥ tad bhraṃśam ca pratipadyate tathā saṃskṛta śabdānām api pratītiḥ bhaviṣyati iti jaḍa pravṛttiḥ eva eṣā yā vyākaraṇe pravṛttiḥ 
[368,11_368,13]	kim ca loke api vipratipatti viṣayaḥ kena api śabdena nyāyam bruvataḥ śabda skhalane api jayaḥ eva dṛśyate na parājayaḥ tat na apaśabdaḥ parājaya sthānam avayava viparyaye ca yadi teṣām sambandhaḥ na pratīyate tatas apārthakān na bhedaḥ asya atha pratīyate tatas sādhana aṅga abhidhāne api katham nigraha sthānam na hi atra kaścid samayaḥ pratyāyanā viśeṣe api evam eva avayavāḥ prayoktavyāḥ iti saḥ eva eṣām kramaḥ yathā avasthitānām sambandhaḥ pratīyate na hi vākye padānām krama niyamaḥ kaścid yathā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣaḥ rājñaḥ iti tasmāt na aprāptakālam nāma nigraha sthānam iti 
[368,20]	ucyate śabda apeta vat etat iti asya ayam arthaḥ yathā apaśabdaḥ niyama kathāyām eva nigraha sthānam tathā aprāpta kālam api iti vijñāna abhimānena sraj dharāt i chandaḥ aviśeṣeṇa api niyamam kṛtvā vijigīṣavaḥ kecid vādam kurvantaḥ dṛśyante teṣām yathāpratijñātān anupālanam eva doṣaḥ kṛte hi niyame yathā ābhāṣitam eva jaya parājayayoḥ nimittam dyūta ādiṣu iva na tatra anyaḥ asti nyāya iti 
[368,26]	hīnam anyatamena api avayavena nyūnam sādhana abhāve sādhya siddheḥ ayogāt tathā ca avayavi vicāre pañcānām api sādhana aṅga tvam samarthitam tatra eva ca yathā nyūnam nigraha sthānam tathā uktam iti 
[369,9]	hetu udāharaṇa adhikam adhikam ekena kṛta tvāt itara ānarthakyam iti etat api niyama kathāyām nigraha sthānam prapañca kathāyām tu niyama abhāvāt na doṣaḥ samplavān abhyupagame tu bhavatii eva ayam doṣaḥ iti 
[369,13]	śabda arthayoḥ punarvacanam punar uktam anyatra anuvādāt yat niṣprayojanam śabdasya punar uccāraṇam paryāyeṇa artha abhidhānam vā punaruktam tat veditavyam tatra nityaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti śabda punaruktam nityaḥ dhvaniḥ avināśī śabdaḥ iti artha punaruktam yat tu prayojana vaśena śabdasya arthasya vā punarvacanam tat na punaruktam anuvāda tvāt yathā nigamane tatra tasmāt iti śabda antareṇa hetu arthasya anuvādaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tena eva śabdena tasya eva arthasya anuvādaḥ gauḥ gauḥ kāmadughā iti śabda mātrasya eva anuvādaḥ evam vīpsā ādi artha paunaḥpunyādi artheṣu api śabda mātra anuvādaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti 
[369,22]	nanu evam sati artha punaruktam eva ekam vācyam tatas anyasya śabda punaruktasya abhāvāt iti satyam etat tathā api bāla vyutpatti artham tasya eva avāntara bheda udāharaṇa vivakṣayā uttara sūtram api ārabhyate 
[369,26]	arthāt āpannasya sva śabdena punarvacanam punaruktam yathā sādharmya udāharaṇa abhidhānāt nyāya labdha arthasya vaidharmya udāharaṇasya abhidhānam iti vyāpti siddhi artham hi udāharaṇam sā ca ekena eva udāharaṇena pradarśitā iti vyartham dvitīyam ekasya asāmarthye ca kevala anvayinaḥ kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ ca vyāpti siddhiḥ na syāt yasya api anvaya vyatirekavān eva hetuḥ tasya api na ananvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ na avyatirekaḥ anvayaḥ iti eka abhidhānāt eva dvitīya siddheḥ vyartham tat vacanam anvaya vyatireki tva prati iti artham dvaya abhidhānam iti ced kim tad pratītyā na hi tad pratītiḥ sādhana aṅgam kim tu avyabhicāraḥ sa ced asti tadā eka udāharaṇena eva gamyate na ced asti tadā dvayam api asādhanam nitya tva siddhau amūrta tva hetoḥ vyoma ghaṭa udāha raṇa vat iti 
[370,11]	katham punaruktam nigraha sthānam kathā avasāna virodhi tvāt ekena kṛtasya itara anarthakyāt ca iti etat api niyama kathāyām eva nigraha sthānam na anyatra vyācakṣāṇaḥ hi kadācid asamyak śravaṇa pratipatti śaṃkayā sākṣi prabhṛtīnām punar punar brūyāt api na tatra chalam na ayam guruḥ na śiṣyaḥ iti atas na yatnatas pratipādanīyaḥ iti ced na sākṣiṇām yatnena pratipādya tvāt tad apratipādane ca doṣa abhidhānāt tris abhihitam iti abhidhānāt ca tat idam adhikāt na bhidyate iti ced satyam śabda punarukta vat ava antara bhedena adhikasya api pṛthak abhidhānāt na ca asya muneḥ sūtra laghavam vivakṣitam kim tarhi śiṣyam tivistāraṇam tat ca tridhā abhidhāne bhavati kvacid saṃgrahaḥ kvacid pramañcaḥ kvacid madhyamam prasthānam iti 
[370,21]	vijñātasya pariṣadā tris abhihitasya api apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam prativādinaḥ nigraha sthānam apratyuccārayan kim āśrayaḥ para pakṣa pratiṣedham brūyāt 
[370,25]	nanu asti kaścid uttare samarthaḥ na pratyuccāraṇe na asau tāvatā nigraham arhati sat uttareṇa eva tasya amūḍha tvam gamyate kim pratyuccāraṇena iti na uttarasya nirviṣaya tu a prasaṅgāt kim ca sat uttaram bravīti na ca pratyuccārayati tat idam vyāhatam ucyate na ca idam pratijñāyate pūrvam sarvam uccārayitavyam paścāt uttaram vācyam iti api tu yathā kathañcit anubhāṣya uttaram vācyam anyathā nirviṣayam uttaram prasajyate 
[371,4]	yadi nāma prasakta anuprasaktyā ati vistāritām kathām prativādī na uccārayitum śaktaḥ kaḥ tasya vivāda āśraya mātra uttara vacane sāmarthya vighātaḥ yena asau nigṛhyate iti ced ucyate yadi vādinā pakṣa sādhana anupayogī vistaraḥ kṛtaḥ śloka ādi pāṭhaḥ kliṣṭa upanyāsaḥ vā tadā vādinaḥ eva artha antara gamanam avijñāta artham vā nigraha sthānam na tad apratyuccāraṇe doṣaḥ api yadi sākṣiṇaḥ manyante atha sādhana upayoginam akliṣṭam ca upanyāsam sākṣiṇaḥ pratipadyante tadā tad apratyuccāraṇe prativādinaḥ katham na apratipatti nigraha sthānam tatra yadi dvis uktam na vācyam iti kathā niyamyate tadā prāk sarva anubhāṣaṇe asti doṣaḥ avaśyam hi dūṣayatā asya doṣasya ayam viṣayaḥ iti pratidoṣa pradarśana artham punar anubhāṣaṇam kartavyam atas prāktanam vyartham syāt sarvaiḥ prāk anubhāṣitavyam iti niyame tu prāc ananu bhāṣaṇa doṣaḥ yadā tu aniyama kathā tadā yathā iṣṭa anubhāṣaṇe api na doṣaḥ iti 
[371,15]	nanu ca kaḥ ayam niyamaḥ tris abhihitasya ananubhāṣaṇam iti yadi tāvat para pratipādana arthā pravṛttiḥ tadā śataśas api tathā vaktavyam yathā asya pratipattiḥ bhavati atha para upatāpana arthā pravṛttiḥ tathā api kim tris abhidhīyate sākṣiṇām karṇe nivedya prativādī kaṣṭā pratīta ati saṃkṣipta ādibhiḥ upadrotavyaḥ yathottara pratipatti vimūḍhaḥ tūṣṇīm bhavati na hi para upatāpana prakrame kaścid nyāyaḥ yena kliṣṭā pratīta atidruta uccārita ādīni pratiṣidhyante tris abhidhānam ca vidhīyate iti na tris abhidhāna grahaṇasya pariṣad anujña upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt yāvat dhi prāśnikaiḥ anyatarasya asāmarthyam na niścitam tāvat vakta vayam iti ubhābhyām parīkṣya vidvāṃsaḥ pramāṇīkṛtya sākṣiṇaḥ abhyanujñātāḥ te paścāt apramāṇīkartum na yuktāḥ iti 
[371,24]	apratipatti tva aviśeṣāt ajñānānanubhāṣaṇayoḥ apratibhātaḥ na asti bhedaḥ iti api ayuktam lakṣaṇa bhedena bheda abhidhānāt sāmarthyāt artha prāptau atiprasaṅgena prapañca adhikāra virodhāt yadi ca saṃgraha ruci tvam tatas saṃgrahaḥ api vipratipatti pratipattibhyām kṛtaḥ eva prapañca adhikāraḥ tu vistara rucīn pratyārabdhaḥ iti adoṣaḥ 
[371,29]	avijñāta artham ca ajñānam yat ca vākyam tris abhihitam api pariṣad avagata artham prativādī pratyuccārayan api na arthataḥ samyak adhigacchati tat ajñānam nāma prativādinaḥ nigraha sthānam 
[372,7]	kathām abhyupagamya tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ apratibhā vādi prativādinoḥ nigraha sthānam iti nanu uttarasya apratipattiḥ apratibhā iti sūtram satyam asya eva arthaḥ kathām abhyupagamya ityādinā uktaḥ katham iti uttara grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham pūrva upanyāsasya api apratipattiḥ apratibhā iti abhipretam na ca atra aparijñāna mātram apratipattiḥ iti abhipretam kin tarhi vacana anadhyavasāyaḥ anadhyavasāyāt abruvataḥ apratibhā iti arthaḥ atha vā prathama vādinaḥ api vacanam uttaram atra uktam katham pariṣadā prativādinā kaḥ te pakṣaḥ kim sādhanam ca iti praśne tvam eva prathamam brūhi iti anuyoge vā pakṣa ādi vacanam uttaram bhavati tasmin vaktavye yadā anadhyavasāyena tūṣṇīm āste tadā vādinaḥ apratibhā iti vācyam prativādinaḥ tu kadācid anubhāṣaṇam kṛtvā api uttara apratipattiḥ sambhāvyate śakti vaicitrya darśanāt akṛtvā tu anubhāṣaṇam tūṣṇīmbhavataḥ apratibhā udbhāvane api na nirviṣayam anubhāṣaṇam yaḥ hi apratyuccārayan api yat kiṃcid bravīti na tūṣṇīm āste tasya ananubhāṣaṇam nigraha sthānam iti 
[372,21]	kārya vyāsaṅgāt kathā vicchedaḥ vikṣepaḥ kiṃcid kāryam vyāsajya yaḥ kathām vicchinatti sa khalu anyatara nigraha anta ayam kathāyām svayam eva kathantam pratipadyamānaḥ nigraha arhaḥ iti nanu yadi jvara ādi duḥkhena abhibhūtaḥ prayojana atiśayena vā tadā na vadati dina antare ca vadiṣyati iti kaḥ tasya aparādhaḥ syāt etat eva sabhyamilanāt prāk eva duḥkham prayojanam vā nivedayati yat tu sabhyeṣu militeṣu duḥkha ādi nivedanam tat duṣṭa abhiprāyam prakaṭayati kila punar punar sabhyāḥ na miliṣyanti tatas vādaḥ na bhaviṣyati tatas samāna tā eva vidvadbhiḥ saha mama bhaviṣyati na bhaṅgaḥ iti yadi punar tadā eva jātam cāturthika jvara ādi duḥkham sākṣiṇaḥ api pratipadyante tadā na tasya doṣaḥ iti na ca idam artha antare antarbhavati sādhana upanyāsa prasaṅgena tad anupayogi vacanam artha antaram sādhana upanyāsam api paścāt kariṣyāmi iti evam vacanam vikṣepaḥ iti asti viśeṣaḥ 
[373,9^1]	sva pakṣa doṣa abhyupagamāt para pakṣa doṣa prasaṅgaḥ mata anujñā yathā cauraḥ tvam para dravya upāditsayā pravṛtteḥ iti ukte paraḥ api āha tvam api evam cauraḥ iti prasaṅga vyājena anaikāntika tva udbhāvanāt adoṣaḥ iti ced tat ayuktam vaktuḥ abhiprāyaḥ hi vacanāt avagamyate pūrvam paścāt vā na aikāntika tva udbhāvanā uktim antareṇa ca na jñāyate anaikāntika tva udbhāvanā abhiprāyeṇa ayam evam āha iti na ca vāde api vyākhyān agamyaiḥ vākyaiḥ vaktavyam kim ca ubhaya prasiddhyā hetoḥ vipakṣa vṛttyā anaikāntika tvam yuktam na ca mama para sva upāditsayā pravṛttiḥ siddhā mama api asiddhā iti ced asiddha tvam eva tarhi vācyam kim para doṣa prasaṅgena 
[373,9^2]	yaḥ ca ubhayoḥ ityādi nyāyena prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na ubhayoḥ tulya yogakṣema tvasya pramāṇataḥ aprasādhita tvāt kim ca sva pakṣa doṣa parihāre abhihite api yadā tam vyāmohāt na paraḥ pratipadyate tadā tad vyāmoha nivartana artham tad pratipannena nyāyena saha ātmīya nyāyasya samāna yogakṣema tām prasādhya yaḥ ca ubhayoḥ iti ādi prasaṅgaḥ kartum yuktaḥ yaḥ tu sva pakṣe na manāk api doṣam pariharati kevalam para pakṣe doṣam prasañjayati tvam api cauraḥ iti sa khalu evam bruvāṇaḥ para matam anujānāti para matam ca anujānataḥ tasya eva idam mata anujñā ākhyam nigraha adhikaraṇam bhavati kasmāt tena sva doṣa abhyupagamāt pareṇa anabhyupagamāt iti 
[373,26]	nigraham prāptasya anigrahaḥ paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam paryanuyojyaḥ nāma nigraha upapattyā codanīyaḥ tasya upekṣaṇam nigraham prāptaḥ asi iti ananuyogaḥ 
[374,8]	etat ca kasya parājaya iti anuyuktayā pariṣadā vaktavyam na khalu nigraham prāptaḥ svam kaupīnam vivṛṇuyāt iti nigraham prāptasya jaya avadhāraṇam api na yuktam tad abhāvāt parājayaḥ api na yuktaḥ tasya jaya apekṣi tvāt iti ced na ubhayoḥ api na yuktaḥ tasya jaya apekṣi tvāt iti ced na ubhayoḥ api yukta ayukta anabhijña tvena pariṣadā upekṣaṇīya tvāt tādana vadheya vacana tvam eva atra nigrahaḥ yadi punar kiṃcid doṣam udbhāvayati tadā para doṣān udbhāvane api jetā eva asau na nigrahaḥ tasya nahiḥ tattaḥ iti kṛtvā sarve doṣāḥ vaktavyā avacane vā nigrahaḥ ekena api tad sādhana vidhānāt eka sādhana vacana vat yathā ekasya arthasya aneka sādhana sadbhāve api ekena eva sādhanena tad siddheḥ na sarva upādānam sādhana aṅgāvacanam vā bhavati sarva sambhavāt doṣa udbhāvana niyama pūrvakavāde tu eka anubhāvane api yuktam paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam nigraha sthānam iti 
[374,19]	anigraha sthāne nigraha sthāna abhiyogaḥ niranuyojya anuyogaḥ adoṣe doṣa udbhāvanam iti arthaḥ yathā sāvayava tvena pṛthivī ādeḥ kāryatva sādhane paraḥ brūyāt aprayojanakaḥ ayam hetvābhāse iti tasya idam mithyā abhiyoga lakṣaṇam nigraha sthānam na hi aprayojakaḥ nāma hetvābhāsaḥ asti asiddha ādi vyatiriktaḥ sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ tu dhūma ādi vat gamaka tvāt 
[374,25]	anupapanna uttara tvāt uttara apratipattiḥ eva ayam atas apratibhātaḥ na bhidyate iti ced na apratibhāyāḥ tūṣṇīṃbhāva svarūpa tvena vyākhyāta tvāt kim ca uttara mātram tatra vivakṣitam na tu sat uttaram iti 
[374,29]	siddhāntam abhyupetya aniyamāt kathā prasaṅgaḥ apasiddhāntaḥ yathā mīmāṃsām abhyupagamya kaścid agnihotram svarga sādhanam iti āha sa ca evam paryanuyujyate katham punar agnihotra kriyā dhvastā satī svarga sādhikā bhavati iti evam paryanuyuktaḥ anabhyupagata ātma guṇam dharmam gati antaram apaśyan āha tayā kriyayā ārādhitaḥ parameśvaraḥ phalam dadāti rāja ādi vat tasya īśvara anabhyupagamāt api apasiddhāntaḥ nigraha sthānam kecid tu sūtra artham varṇayanti kasyacid arthasya tathā abhāvam pratijñāta artha viparyayāt kathā prasaṅgam kurvataḥ apasiddhāntaḥ vijñeyaḥ iti tat ayuktam pratijñāta artha viparyayaḥ hi pratijñā hāniḥ na apasiddhāntaḥ tasmāt śāstram abhyupagamya tad artha virodhena kathām prasajjayataḥ apasiddhāntaḥ iti atha vā sādhana vākye yā pratijñā tad artha viparyayāt eva pratijñāhāniḥ ucyate yā tu siddhārthasya abhyupagama mātreṇa pratijñā kenacid prasaṅgena kṛtā punar tad artha viparyayāt kathām kurvataḥ apasiddhāntaḥ iti 
[375,18]	hetvābhāsāḥ ca yathā uktāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ ca nigraha sthānāni kim lakṣaṇa antara yogāt pramāṇa prameya vat na kim tarhi yathā uktāḥ hetvābhāsa lakṣaṇena eva yathā uktena hetvābhāsa nigraha sthānāni iti arthaḥ caśabdaḥ dṛṣṭānta ābhāsa avarodhakaḥ na ca nigraha sthāna parisaṃkhya arthāni sūtrāṇi kim tarhi lakṣaṇa udāharaṇa prapañca upalakṣaṇāni tasmāt etena sūtra kalāpena durvacana ādīnām sādhana anupayogi tvena nigraha sthāna tvam veditavyam niyama kathāyām tu apaśabda ādīnām api iti 
[375,26^1]	rakta ambaraḥ tu āha asādhana aṅga vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam dvayoḥ nigraha sthānam anyat tu na yuktam iti na iṣyate tatra asādhana aṅga vacanam vādinaḥ eva nigraha sthānam doṣa udbhāvanam tu prativādinaḥ eva iti siddhiḥ sādhana sādhya niścayaḥ tasya nirvartakam aṅgam tasya vacanam sādhana aṅga vacanam tasya anuccāraṇam asādhana aṅga vacanam vādam abhyupagamya apratibhayā tūṣṇīṃbhāvāt sādhana aṅgasya asamarthanāt vā vādinaḥ asādhana aṅga vacanam nigraha sthānam prārabdha artha aprasādhanāt vastutas samartha sādhana upādāne api sāmarthya apratipādanāt 
[375,26^2]	na hi asamarthitāt sādhanāt sādhya siddhiḥ iti atha vā sādhyate anena iti sādhanam tri rūpa hetu vacana samudāyaḥ tasya aṅgam pakṣa dharma ādi vacanam tasya ekasya api avacanam asādhana aṅga vacanam atha vā tasya eva sādhanasya yat na aṅgam pratijñā upanaya ādi tasya asādhana aṅgasya vacanam athavā anvaya vyatirekayoḥ ekasya abhidhānena siddheḥ abhāvāt dvitīyasya asāmarthyam iti tasya api asādhana aṅgasya abhidhānam nigraha sthānam vyartha abhidhānāt eva atha vā sādhanasya siddheḥ yat na aṅgam hetvābhāsaḥ asiddha ādiḥ tasya ekasya api vacanam nigraha sthānam asamartha upādānāt 
[375,26^3]	tathā sādhya ādi vikalpasya ananvayā pradarśita anvaya ādeḥ dṛṣṭānta ābhāsasya vacanam asādhana aṅga vacanam atha vā siddhiḥ sādhanam tad aṅgam dharmaḥ yasya vivāda āśrayasya vāda prastāva hetoḥ sa sādhana aṅga s tad vyatirekeṇa aparasya api ajijñāsitasya viśeṣasya śāstra āśraya vyāja ādibhiḥ prakṣepaḥ ghoṣaṇam ca para vyāmohanāya anubhāṣaṇa śakti vighāta ādi artham ca tat api asādhana aṅga vacanam nigraha sthānam aprastuta abhidhānāt na hi kvacid kriyamāṇaḥ prasaṅgaḥ na prasajyate nṛtya gīta ādeḥ api prasaṅgena sambhavāt yathā kaścid nairātmya vādī brūyāt na asti ātmā iti vayam bauddhāḥ brūmaḥ ke bauddhāḥ ye buddha śāsanam abhyupagatāḥ kaḥ buddhaḥ yasya śāsanena bhadanta aśvaghoṣaḥ nāma pravrajitaḥ kaḥ bhadanta aśva ghoṣaḥ yasya rāṣṭrapālakam nāṭakam iti prasaṅgam kṛtvā tatas praviśati sūtradhāraḥ ityādi paṭhan nṛtyet gāyet ca iti prativādī sarvam tam prasaṅgam na anukartum śaktaḥ iti parājitaḥ syāt tasmāt nṛtya ādi prasaṅga vat ajijñāsitānām prasaṅga paramparāyāta arthānām sva kriyāyāt ca ghoṣaṇam artha antara gamanam eva jijñāsāyām tu adoṣaḥ iti 
[376,29]	adoṣa udbhāvanam iti na doṣa udbhāvanam adoṣa udbhāvanam hetvābhāsa ādayaḥ doṣāḥ teṣām anudbhāvanam apratyāyanam sādhanasya nirdoṣa tvāt sa doṣa tve api prativādinaḥ tad ajñānāt pratipādana asāmarthyāt vā na hi san api doṣaḥ na pratipāditaḥ parājaya hetuḥ bhavati atha vā sādhanasya doṣaḥ tasya adoṣasya udbhāvanam prativādinaḥ nigraha sthānam mithyā uttara abhidhānāt iti etat nyāyyam nigraha sthāna lakṣaṇam anyat tu naiyāyika uktam pratijñāhānya ādikam na yuktam iti na iṣyate yathā na pratijñāhāni ādeḥ ayukta tvam kīrtiḥ uvāca tathā tad lakṣaṇeṣu eva pūrva pakṣam kurvatā pratyekam mayā abhihitam tatra eva tad parihara tā kīrteḥ aparijñānam api prakaṭitam iti pratijñā upanaya ādi vacanam nigraha sthānam iti atra api mohaḥ kīrteḥ prakṛti ādi sādhana aṅga tvam samarthayatā prakaṭitaḥ yat tu muni pradarśitam eva nigraha sthānam bhāṣā antareṇa uktam tat anujñāyate eva bhāṣa antareṇa abhidhāne api arthasya tathā tva avirodhāt iti śrīmat ācārya bhāsarvajñaviracite nyāya bhūṣaṇe saṃgraha vārtike dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ 
[379,6]	avasitam anumānam āgamasya idānīm lakṣaṇam ucyate samaya balena samyak parokṣa anubhava sādhanam āgamaḥ yatra anubhava sādhane samayasya anvaya vyatirekābhyām pradhāna bhāvaḥ gamyate tad śabda ātmakam aśabda ātmakam vā karaṇam samaya sāmarthyena anubhavam sādhayat āgamaḥ iti ucyate samayāvinā bhāvayoḥ vailakṣaṇyam paśyāmaḥ tena anumāne prasaṅgaḥ samaya grahaṇena nirvartitaḥ samaya sāmarthyāt api saṃśayaḥ viparyayaḥ ca kvacid bhavati tad artham samyak grahaṇam sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa vyavaccheda artham parokṣa grahaṇam 
[379,13]	nanu āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti lakṣaṇam sautram satyam asya eva arthaḥ ayam prakaṭitaḥ tathā hi upadiśyate anena arthaḥ iti upadeśaḥ samaya apekṣam artha pratīti sādhanam ucyate na hi pratyakṣāt anumānāt vā avagataḥ arthaḥ upadeśataḥ pratipannaḥ iti ucyate na api sandigdhaḥ viparyastaḥ vā arthaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ iti ucyate 
[379,17]	atha vā pratyakṣa sūtrāt avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmaka padayoḥ iha api anuvṛttiḥ draṣṭavyā tatas na saṃśaya viparyaya sādhanayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ evam ca āpta grahaṇam na lakṣaṇa artham tena vyavacchedya abhāvāt kim tu adṛṣṭa arthānām vākyānām prāmāṇya siddhau āpta ukta tva ahetu sūcanā artham astu vā lakṣaṇa artham yadā avyabhicārya ādi padayoḥ iha anuvṛttiḥ na iṣyate upadeśa śabdaḥ ca mithyā upadeśe api dṛṣṭaḥ tad āpta grahaṇam sārthakam iti āptaḥ hi ajñāna rāga ādi doṣa rahitaḥ upadeṣṭā bhaṇyate tad upadeśaḥ pramāṇam eva tathā ca uktam āgamaḥ hi āpta vacanam āptim doṣa kṣayam viduḥ kṣīṇa doṣaḥ anṛtam vākyam na brūyāt dhetu asambhavāt iti 
[380,3]	avyāpaka tvāt alakṣaṇam iti ced na para apara bhedena doṣa kṣayasya api dvaividhyāt tatra aparasya āpta sārya mleccha ādeḥ aparaḥ doṣa kṣayaḥ pratiniyata viṣaya tvāt ajñāna ādi nivṛtteḥ para āptasya tu īśvara ādeḥ paraḥ doṣa kṣayaḥ sarva artheṣu ajñāna ādeḥ atyanta ucchedāt iti nanu āpta upadeśaḥ api śrotṛ prajñā ādi vaiguṇyāt asādhanam saṃśaya ādi sādhanam vā bhavati tat katham ekāntena āpta upadeśaḥ pramāṇam iti ced na tasya aupacārika tvāt na hi jñānam akurvan saṃśaya ādi jñānam kurvan vā śabdaḥ kvacid āpta upadeśaḥ ayam iti prasiddhiḥ asti kim tu āptaḥ artham yena upadiśyati parān niścāyayati sa pareṣām aviparīta artha niścayam kurvan aṃjasā āpta upadeśaḥ iti ucyate 
[380,11]	atha vā āptaḥ ca asau upadeśaḥ yathā vaktā jñānam akurvan saṃśayam viparyayam vā kurvan na loke api āptaḥ ucyate kin tu aviparītam artham niścāyayan eva āptaḥ prasiddhaḥ tathā śabdaḥ api aviparīta artha niścayam kurvan āptaḥ iti ucyate nanu evam āpta vāc iti laghu lakṣaṇam kartavyam na aśabda ātmakasya ceṣṭā ādeḥ anavarodha prasaṅgāt upadeśa grahaṇe tu samaya pūrvakeṇa aṅguli ceṣṭā ādinā api yena arthaḥ upadiśyate tat sarvam śabda ākhyam pramāṇam labhyate smṛti pratyakṣa vyavacchedaḥ api atas eva labhyate na hi śabdam śrutvā api smṛtaḥ arthaḥ sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa upalabdhaḥ vā kvacid āptena upadiṣṭaḥ iti prasiddhiḥ asti tasmāt samaya balena samyak parokṣa anubhava sādhanam āgamaḥ iti ayam eva sūtrasya arthaḥ iti 
[380,21_381,1^1]	nanu ca parokṣa artha viṣaya tve śabdasya anumānāt anartha antara bhāvaḥ prāptaḥ tathā ca āha mānam hi dvividham meya dvaividhyāt śakti aśaktitaḥ artha kriyāyām keśa ādina arthaḥ anartha adhimokṣataḥ māna dvaividhya siddhau meya dvaividhyam hetuḥ meya dvaividhye tu śakti aśaktitaḥ iti hetuḥ sākṣāt su a ākāra jñāna jananam prati śakta tvam śaktiḥ pāramparyeṇa śakta tvam tu aśaktiḥ paryudāsa vṛttyā tatra śaktaḥ arthaḥ svena rūpeṇa lakṣyamāṇa tvāt sva lakṣaṇam pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ itaraḥ tu sāmānya rūpeṇa pratīyamāna tvāt sāmānya lakṣaṇam anumānasya viṣayaḥ keśa ādeḥ tu pramāṇa dvaya agocarasya artha kriyāyām na sākṣāt na api pāramparyeṇa śaktiḥ iti atas na asau arthaḥ tasmāt anartha adhimokṣataḥ tat jñānam na pramāṇam anartha adhimukteḥ artha adhigama abhāvāt iti arthaḥ 
[381,1^2]	prakaraṇa antere api amum eva artham āha dvividhaḥ eva arthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ parokṣaḥ ca tatra yaḥ jñāna pratibhāsam anvaya vyatirekau ātmanaḥ anukārayati sa pratyakṣaḥ tat asādhāraṇam vastu rūpam sva lakṣaṇam anyaḥ tu sākṣāt svabhāva upadhāna sāmarthya rahitaḥ ayukta pratipattiḥ eva na ca anya darśane anya kalpanā yukta atiprasaṅgāt tasya na antarīyaka tayā syāt sa hi pratibaddha svabhāvaḥ yathāvidha siddhaḥ tathāvidha sannidhānam sūcayati sāmānyena ca sva sambandhinaḥ arthasya pratipattiḥ anumānam iti dve eva pramāṇe anyathā pratipatti ayogāt iti 
[381,15]	atra ucyate meya dvaividhyam kena gamyate yadi pramāṇa dvaividhyena eva tadā itaretara āśraya tvam syāt atha pratyakṣeṇa eva tadā anumānam vyartham syāt parokṣasya api pratyakṣeṇa eva siddha tvāt na ca pratyakṣeṇa eva gṛhītasya parokṣa tvam yuktam tad agrahaṇe ca na pratyakṣatas dvaividhya siddhiḥ pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvāt na anumānataḥ api dvaividhya siddhiḥ pramāṇa antareṇa siddhau ca viruddha tvam syāt tṛtīyasya api sambhavāt śakti aśaktitaḥ iti api ayuktam śakti aśakti bhedaḥ api kena avagamyate iti pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt asiddham meya dvaividhyam katham sādhanam iti 
[382,3]	yat tu atra uktam viṣaya dvaividhyam pratyakṣa gamyam sadṛśa asadṛśa tva pratītiḥ hi patīteḥ eva dharmaḥ sa ca sva saṃvedana pratyakṣa siddhaḥ iti tat idam vyāmūḍha bhāṣitam na hi pratīti dharmaḥ eva prameyam tasya śakti aśakti lakṣaṇa abhidhānāt na ca anartha antarasya pratīti dharmasya pratīti janaka tvam sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca asti katham ca pratīti dharmaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ sādṛśyam ucyate tasya anyatra āvṛtteḥ asādṛśya lakṣaṇa tvāt samāropita ākāraḥ ca na pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ sva saṃvedana pratyakṣa viṣayasya api rāga ādi vat parokṣa tvam ayuktam sva saṃvedanena artha dharmaḥ parokṣatā gṛhyate parokṣam tu dharmi pratyakṣa antarena indriya jñānena gṛhyate tatas sambandha pratītiḥ tatas pratyakṣeṇa para ukṣata apratītau api vastu anumānena pratīyate iti ced parokṣam vastu indriya pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate iti etat api na budhyāmahe dharma dharmiṇoḥ tādātmya abhyupagame api bhinna pramāṇa grāhya tvam na naṣṭa dhiyaḥ anyaḥ brūyāt iti 
[382,16]	kim ca yadi nāma pratyakṣa parokṣa bhedena meya dvaividhyam tatas pratyakṣa anumāne dveṣaḥ eva pramāṇaḥ iti kutas sidhyati vyadhikaraṇa tvāt pratibandha asiddheḥ ca iti lakṣaṇa bhedena ca pramāṇa bhedasya api vyavastheṣṭā na ca tvayā adya api meya viśeṣa viṣaya tvam māna viśeṣasya lakṣaṇam uktam yena meyā antara abhāvāt māna antara abhāvaḥ sidhyet na ca kalpanā apoḍha tvena pratyakṣa lakṣaṇena trirūpa liṅga ja tvena vā śabdasya saṃgrahaḥ śakyaḥ kartum yena pramāṇasya sataḥ atra eva antarbhāvāt iti hetuḥ asiddhaḥ na syāt nanu uktam anyathā pratipatti ayogāt iti satyam uktam idam ayuktam tu uktam tathā hi kṣāram samudra udakam himālayaḥ giriḥ uttareṇa sthitaḥ iti evamādi śabdāt bhavati artha pratipattiḥ na ca sākṣa jā na api liṅga jā pakṣa dharma tva ādi apratīteḥ tasmāt māna antaram śabdaḥ iti 
[383,4_383,10]	nanu ca trirūpa liṅga sūcakasya eva śabdasya artha avi abhicāri tvena pramāṇa tvam tasya ca para artha anumāna tvam eva tad anyeṣām tu śabdānām prāmāṇyam eva na asti yat āha na antarīyaka tā bhāvāt śabdānām vastubhiḥ saha na artha siddhiḥ tatas te hi vaktrabhiprāya sūcakāḥ pratibandhe hi sati arthaḥ artham gamayati yathā agnim dhūmaḥ vṛkṣam śiṃśapa iti na ca śabdānām vastubhiḥ saha anyataraḥ api sambandhaḥ asti tena na artha siddhiḥ tatas tebhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ na artha siddhiḥ iti arthaḥ vaktṛ abhiprāya pūrvakāḥ tu śabdāḥ tena te vaktrabhiprāya sūcakāḥ iti 
[383,15]	atra ucyate yat tāvat na antarīyaka tā bhāvāt iti atha kā iyam na antarīyaka tā kim sambandha mātram uta avinābhāvaḥ sambandha mātram tāvat asti eva śabda arthayoḥ vācya vācaka bhāva upapatteḥ atha avinābhāvaḥ tad abhāvāt eva śabdasya pramāṇa antara tvam ucyate pratyakṣa vat avinā abhāva tvena artha pratipādaka tvena anumānam eva śabdaḥ syāt kaḥ pramāṇa antaram brūyāt atha avinābhāvi tva abhāvāt artha pratipādaka tvam eva na asti tat na akṣaiḥ vyabhicārāt teṣām svābhāvikam artha pratyāyaka tvam iti api ayuktam pradīpa ādi apekṣi tvāt yathā ca pradīpa ādi sahakāri viśeṣam apekṣya akṣāṇi artham sādhayanti tathā śabdāḥ api saṃketa smṛti ādi sahakāri viśeṣam apekṣya artham sādhayanti aniyata sahakāriṇaḥ hi hetavaḥ tena kasyacid kiṃcid sahakārī iti tasmāt na antarīyaka tāya abhāve api śabdānām artha asādhaka tvam ayuktam 
[383,25]	syāt matam pratyakṣa jñānānām api su a ākāra sādhaka tvam tādātmyena bāhya artha sādhaka tvam tu tad utpattyā akṣāṇām api arthaiḥ saha tad utpatti sambandhaḥ asti eva tena sarveṣām na antarīyaka tayā eva artha sādhakam iti tatra sambandha dvaya niyamasya nirasta tvāt kṣaṇika tva asiddheḥ ca akṣa arthayoḥ tad utpattiḥ asiddhā 
[384,3]	kim ca atiṭānā gata arthaiḥ saha yogi jñānānām api kaḥ sambandhaḥ na hi tad arthānām janaka tvam asti iti uktam prāk pāramparyeṇa tatas utpattiḥ iti ced na anāgata arthānām pāramparyeṇa api ajanaka tvāt na hi taiḥ kiṃcid jñānam sākṣāt utpāditam yena tad vāsanā utpatti krameṇa jñāna antarāṇām pāramparyeṇa tatas utpattiḥ kalpyeta tad jātīyasya asti janaka tvam iti ced na janakasya atīta tvāt na ca tad jātīya tve api anyatas utpannam jñānam anyat paricchinatti atiprasaṅgāt ekasmāt strī suvarṇa ādi arthāt utpannasya jñānasya sarva strī suvarṇa ādi artha paricchedaka tva prasaṅgāt 
[384,10]	api ca eva śabdasya api arthāt utpattiḥ kid na kalpyate tasya api artha jajñāna ahita vāsanā krameṇa utpatteḥ vyabhicārāt na iṣyate iti ced syāt matam yadi śabda arthayoḥ tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ pratibandhaḥ syāt tadā na śabdaḥ kadācid api artham vyabhicaret vyabhicāra pratibandhayoḥ virodhāt iti evam tarhi bhāvanā prakarṣa indriyayoḥ api artha vyabhicārāt pratibandhaḥ naiṣṭavyaḥ tathā hi indriyam tāvat asatsu api keśa ādi artheṣu tad nirbhāsam jñānam utpādayati bhāvanā prakarṣe api asatsu api strī ādiṣu tat nirbhāsam jñānam janayati iti atas bhāvanā prakarṣa ja indriya jñānayoḥ api artha pratibandhaḥ naiṣṭavyaḥ sarvam indriya jñānam bhāvanā prakarṣa jam ca na artha pratibaddham iṣṭam kim tarhi yasya eva artha avi abhicāraḥ tasya eva tad pratibaddha tvam iti ced nanu avyabhicāra siddhi artham pratibandhaḥ anviṣyate sa ced pratibandha siddhim vinā api siddhaḥ kim pratibandha sādhanena pratibandha siddhyā eva avyabhicāra siddau anyaḥ anya saṃśraya prasaṅgaḥ iti 
[384,21_384,26]	kim ca śabda jñānasya api yasya vyabhicāraḥ asti tasya pratibandhaḥ mā bhūt yasya tu artha avyabhicāraḥ asti tasya artha pratibandhaḥ kid na iṣyate tad sadṛśasya vyabhicārāt apratibandhe akṣaja ādi jñānasya api tad sadṛśasya vyabhicārāt apratibandha prasaṅgaḥ yathā ca akṣaja ādi jñānayoḥ vyabhicārya vyabhicāriṇoḥ bhedam tad jñāḥ vivecayanti tathā śābda jñānayoḥ api iti sarvam samānam yat ca uktam vaktṛ abhiprāya sūcakāḥ iti tat ayuktam tatas artheṣu apravṛtti prasaṅgāt na hi anya pratītyā anyatra apratipanneṣu pravṛttiḥ sambhavati atiprasaṅgāt bhrāntitaḥ pravṛttau ca śabda viśeṣāt artha viśeṣe pravṛtti niyama abhāva prasaṅgāt saṃvāda abhāva prasaṅgāt ca 
[385,2^1]	śabdāt vivakṣā pratītau tatas artha pratītiḥ iti ced na vivakṣāyāḥ api arthena sambandha abhāvāt asati api arthe vivakṣā utpatti darśanāt kā ca iyam vivakṣā kim śabda uccāraṇa icchā mātram kim vā anena śabdena amum artham pratipādayāmi iti eṣaḥ abhiprāyaḥ kim ca atas śabda nimitta icchā pratītau vaktṛ śrotroḥ śāstra ādiṣu api pravṛttiḥ na syāt na hi kaścid anunmattaḥ śabda nimitta icchā mātra pratipatti artham śāstram vākya antaram ca praṇetum śrotum vā pravartate kim ca kacaṭa tapādi daśa dāḍima ādi vākyaiḥ saha sarva vākyānām aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ sarveṣām sva prabhava icchā mātra anumāpakatva aviśeṣāt atha anena śabdena amum artham pratipādayāmi iti abhiprāyaḥ vivakṣā tad sūcaka tvena śabdānām anumāna tvam ucyate
