[385,2^2]	tathā api vyabhicārāt na anumānam śabdaḥ śuka sārika unmatta ādayaḥ hi na tathā abhiprāyeṇa vākyam uccārayanti api ca kim samaya nirapekṣam vākyam tādṛśam abhiprāyam gamayati āhosvit samaya apekṣam iti samaya anapekṣa tve sarva pratipatti prasaṅgāt na kaścid bhāṣān abhijñaḥ syāt samaya apekṣaḥ tu śabdaḥ artham eva kim na gamayati na hi ayam arthāt bibheti yena tatra sākṣāt na pravarttate na ca abhiprāya pratīti krameṇa artha pratītiḥ anubhūyate yaḥ ca aśakya samaya tva ādike arthe śabda apravṛttau nyāyaḥ saḥ abhiprāye api samānaḥ iti abhiprāya avagamaḥ api śabdāt na syāt yena vā prakāreṇa abhiprāya viśeṣe śabda pravṛttiḥ tena arthaḥ eva astu kim pratīti viruddhena pāramparya āśrayaṇena 
[385,20]	nanu ca arthe sākṣāt śabdasya pravṛttim icchataḥ parokṣa ākāra janaka tva virodhaḥ indriya vat na hi abhinne viṣaye pratīti vailakṣaṇyam yuktam asti ca akṣaja śabda jajñānayoḥ vailakṣaṇyam tasmāt na abhinna viṣaya tvam iti tat uktam anya deva indriya grāhyam anyaḥ śabdasya gocaraḥ śabdāt pratyeti bhinna akṣaḥ na tu pratyakṣam īkṣate 
[385,25_385,29]	tatra pūrva arddhena pratijñā kṛtā tad sādhanam uttra arddhena uktam naṣṭa akṣaḥ api śabdāt artham pratyeti na tu pratyakṣa vat īkṣate iti arthaḥ etat eva spaṣṭayati anyathā indriya sambandhāt dāham dagdhaḥ abhimanyate anyathā eva agni śabdena dāha arthaḥ sampratīyate tasmāt na indriya viṣaye śabdaḥ pravartate iti 
[386,2]	tat etat ayuktam yasmāt na atra viṣaya bheda kāritam pratīti vailakṣaṇyam kim tarhi karaṇa bheda kāritam yadi tu viṣaya bheda kāritam syāt tadā tad pūrvikā pravṛttiḥ jala agni pratīti pūrva kā iva abhinna viṣayāḥ na syāt kim ca agni śabda jāyāḥ pratīteḥ pravṛttasya jñātuḥ indriyeṇa agni prāptau saṃvādaḥ na syāt na hi nirviṣayasya jñānasya artha antara viṣayasya vā artha antara prāptau saṃvāda vyavasthā loke api dṛṣṭā tad abhāvāt na satya vādi tvam kasyacid syāt pratijñāpadayoḥ ca vyāghātḥ tathā hi anya deva indriya grāhyam iti anena śabdena yaḥ arthaḥ ucyate sa katham śabdasya gocaraḥ na bhavati sākṣāt agocaraḥ iti ced pāramparyeṇa api śabdāt tasmin arthe kim pratītiḥ bhavati na vā yadi na bhavati tatas pāramparyeṇa api agocaraḥ eva atha bhavati sā kim indriya ja pratīti tulyā tad vilakṣaṇā vā yadi tad tulyā tadā na tu pratyakṣam īkṣate iti anena virodhaḥ tad vilakṣaṇā ced na tarhi pratīti vailakṣaṇyam viṣaya bheda sādhanam 
[386,14^1]	dāha śabdena ca kaḥ arthaḥ ucyate kim agniḥ uṣṇa sparśaḥ vā rūpa viśeṣaḥ vā visphoṭaḥ vā tad duḥkham vā iti kim ca atas sarve api ayam arthaḥ pratyartha kṛta samayāt śabdāt tathā eva pratīyate agni śabdaḥ tu agnau eva kṛta samayaḥ tena asau visphoṭa ādikam na abhidhatte agniḥ ca tatas pratīyate yadi evam kim iti visphoṭaḥ tad duḥkham vā na bhavati na anya kārya tvāt na khalu dahana pratīti kāryam visphoṭa ādi kin tarhi dahana deha sambandha viśeṣa kāryam suṣupta ādi avasthāyām apratītau api agneḥ sambandha viśeṣāt visphoṭa ādeḥ darśanāt dūra sthasya cakṣuṣā pratītau api adarśanāt tathā duḥkha śabdāt tad pratītau duḥkhi tva prasaṅgaḥ iti api nirastam duḥkha samavāyaḥ hi duḥkhi tvam na duḥkha jñāna mātram 
[386,14^2]	yasya tu duḥkha jñānāt na anyat asti duḥkhi tvam tasya para duḥkha jñāne api duḥkhi tvam prasaktam tatas ca buddhasya api duḥkhi tvam syāt asarvajña tvam vā pratyakṣam ca buddhasya sarva viṣaya jñānam iṣṭam tat ca sākṣāt tad svarūpam svīkurvat arthasya grāhakam bhavati tena buddhasya para duḥkham pratyakṣeṇa gṛhṇataḥ parasya eva duḥkha ākāra tā āpatteḥ duḥkhi tvam prāptam etena rāga ādi mattva prasaṅgaḥ api draṣṭavyaḥ iti tasmāt abhinne api viṣaye sāmagrī vailakṣaṇyāt pratīti vailakṣaṇyam eṣṭavyam tena śabdāt na indriya arthe sarvathā tulyā pratītiḥ bhavati iti atas andhasya anandha tva prasaṅgaḥ api ayuktaḥ iti 
[386,30^1]	nanu vidhi viṣaya tve ghaṭa ādi śabdasya na asti asti iti padābhyām sāmānādhikaraṇyam na prāpnoti na asti iti padena vidhi virodhāt asti iti padasya ca vaiyarthyāt iti na eṣa doṣaḥ prakaraṇa ādi anapekṣasya śabdasya sva artha anuvāda mātra kartṛ tvāt yaḥ hi brūte aprakaraṇāt anapekṣaḥ api śabdaḥ sva artham vidhatta a iti tam prati syāt ayam doṣaḥ sāmānyena artha mātra anuvādaka tve tu tasya ubhayathā darśanāt syāt sandehaḥ kim asya vidhiḥ uta pratiṣedhaḥ iti tatra vidhi vivakṣāyām asti ghaṭaḥ iti āha pratiṣedha vivakṣāyām tu na asti iti āha tatra api kva asti kva ca na asti iti sandehe tat niścāyakam deśa viśeṣa ādi padam prayuṅkte punar viśeṣaṇa antaram ākāṅkṣataḥ tad viśeṣaṇa antara abhidhāyi padam prayuṅkte yāvat nirākāṅkṣaḥ bhavati tat evam vākyena eva niḥsandigdhaḥ arthaḥ pratyāyyate iti tat eva vastutas pramāṇam padam tu abhyadhika abhāvāt smārakāt na viśeṣyate iti 
[386,30^2]	pramāṇa tve api adoṣaḥ sāmānyavataḥ artha mātrasya abhidhānāt yathā ūrdhva vastu mātre dūrāt cakṣuṣā niścite api sthāṇu tva ādi viśeṣaṇā niścita tvāt tathā niścaya artham tad upasarpaṇam viśeṣa darśanam ca vyartham na bhavati tathā āpadena sāmānyavataḥ artha mātrasya abhidhāne api kāla deśa ādi vikalpena vidhi pratiṣedha vat tva darśanāt syāt sandehaḥ tatas pratipādya ākāṅkṣita viśeṣavat tvena niścāyana artham asti ityādi padam sārthakam bhavati na asti iti anena sāmānādhikaraṇya virodhaḥ api na asti tat eva hi anyatra anyadā vā na asti iti ucyate khapuṣpam sarvatra sarvadā na asti iti atra kā vārtā iti ced atra api dṛṣṭam eva puṣpam svābhāva anya tvena atyantam pratiṣidhyate nanu kha puṣpa śabdāt eva ayam arthaḥ siddhaḥ na hi ākāśa ātmakam puṣpam kadācid kvacid asti iti satyam tathā api yaḥ kenacid pratāritaḥ anyena vā nimittena na eva pratipadyate tam prati pada antaram sārthakam ākāśam sarvatra sarvadā asti iti atra api ayam eva nyāyaḥ 
[387,23]	nanu yadi āśaṅkā nivṛtti artham pada antaram iṣyate tadā apohaḥ eva śabda artha dṛṣṭaḥ syāt kaḥ ayam apohaḥ yaḥ śabdāt pratīyate kaḥ śabdāt pratīyate na kiṃcid bhrānti mātra tvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ tat ayuktam śabdebhyaḥ artham paricchidya pravartamānasya tad artha prāpti artha kriyā saṃvādena visaṃvāda nivṛttau tad vyāptasya bhrānta tvasya nivṛtteḥ pratyakṣasya api abhrānta tve ayam eva nyāyaḥ satya anṛta vyavahāra abhāva aprasaṅgaḥ ca iti uktam saṃvṛti sat asatoḥ satya anṛta vyavahāraḥ iti ced na prāk eva vistareṇa asaṃvṛta tvasya nirākṛta tvāt api ca sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa samarthane vastu sāmānya samarthane ca vastuni api śabdaḥ pravartate iti vistareṇa samarthitam tat sarvam anusmṛtya vaktavyam iti alam prasaṅgena 
[388,2_388,4]	evam ca śabda ādi viśeṣasya artha pratipādaka tvena pramāṇa tve sthite anumānāt bhedaḥ sidhyate na anumānam śabdaḥ pakṣa dharma tva ādi grahaṇa anapekṣa tvāt pratyakṣa vat iti asiddhaḥ ayam hetuḥ iti apare tathā hi go śabdaḥ dharmī kakudādimad artha pratipādakaḥ iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ go śabda tvāt saṅketa kāla upalabdha go śabda vat evam indra ādi śabdānām api indra ādi artha pratipādaka tvam sādhayitavyam iti tat etat ayuktam saṅketa kāle artha pratipādaka tva siddhau dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt 
[388,8^1]	kim ca artha pratipādaka tvasya śabda dharmasya siddhau api katham deśa ādi viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ sidhyati na hi rūpa grāhakam cakṣuḥ cakṣuṣṭvāt iti anumānāt eva rūpa viśeṣaḥ sidhyati evam hi pratyakṣasya api anumāna tva prasaṅgaḥ pradeśa viśeṣe agni siddhaye api na kaścid evam anumānam karoti agni pratipādakaḥ ayam dhūmaḥ dhūma tvāt iti kim tarhi agnimān ayam pradeśaḥ dhūmavat tvāt iti yadā api dhūmaḥ pakṣīkriyate tadā api tasya samāna deśa sthena agninā sambandhi tva siddhau pradeśa viśeṣe agniḥ siddhyati na tu agni pratipādaka mātra sādhanāt eva 
[388,8^2_388,23]	na ca evam śabdasya samāna deśa sthena arthena vyāptiḥ pratipattum śakyate na api samudra vṛddhim candra udaya ādi vat kāla viśeṣa avacchinnena arthena go śabdasya vyāptiḥ sambhavati pada antara sannidhim prakaraṇa ādikam ca apekṣya go śabdaḥ deśa ādi avacchedena artham pratipādayati liṅgani ūna liṅga antaram prakaraṇa ādikam ca anapekṣya api deśa ādi avacchinnam eva artham pratipādayati vāc ādi pratipādaka go śabdena anekāntaḥ ca viśiṣṭasya avyabhicāraḥ iti ced kaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ prakaraṇa ādiḥ eva iti ced na dhūmasya ūrdhva gāmi tva ādi vat avyabhicāri tvenaka kudādi mad artha pratipādaka aśeṣa go śabdeṣu aviśiṣṭasya prakaraṇa ādi dharmasya adṛṣṭa tvāt kim ca liṅgam anāpta kṛtam api sva sādhyam na vyabhicarati śabdaḥ tu anāpta kṛtaḥ asati arthaḥ eva syāt kim ca liṅgasya pakṣa dharma tva ādi niścayena eva avyabhicāri tvam niścīyate śabdasya tu āpta ukta tva niścayena pravṛtti sāmarthyena eva na tu pakṣa dharma tva ādi niścayena iti 
[388,28]	kim ca liṅgasya avinā abhāva balena artha pratipādaka tvam śabdasya tu saṃketa mātreṇa saḥ eva avinābhāvaḥ iti ced na svābhāvika puruṣa āyattatva viśeṣāt svābhāvikaḥ hi avinā abhā a sambandhaḥ saṅketaḥ tu puruṣa icchā anuvidhāyi iti viruddha aviruddha artha bhedāt ca śabdaḥ hi sāsnādimat artha viruddheṣu api vāc ādiṣu tad anyeṣu ca vyutpādita samayaḥ prayujyamānaḥ pratītim janayati dhūma ādi liṅgam tu na agni ādi viruddheṣu jala ādiṣu avinā abhāvena pratītim kutaścid prastāvāt api janayati tasmāt na anumānam śabdaḥ kim ca āpta upadeśa tvena lakṣaṇena pratyakṣāt api bhidyate iti 
[389,7]	nanu ca āpta ukta tvam śabdasya kutas niścīyate sarva puruṣāṇām jñāna ajñāna ādi upapattau satya anṛta vaktṛ tva sambhavena saṃśaya ādi anivṛtteḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyena tat niścaye tu vyarthaḥ tad niścayaḥ tad abhāve api pravṛtteḥ cakrakam vā syāt yāvat na āpta ukta tva niścayaḥ tāvat na prāmāṇya niścayaḥ tad abhāvāt na pravṛttiḥ tad abhāvāt na tad sāmarthyam tad abhāvāt ca na āpta ukta niścayaḥ iti atha sarva vidaḥ atyanta vīta rāgasya anṛta vaktṛ tva asambhavāt tad praṇītasya āgamasya prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti na tad praṇetuḥ duranvaya tvāt yadi api tathāvidhaḥ puruṣaḥ asti tathā api tad praṇītaḥ ayam āgamaḥ iti kutas niścīyate tad āgamāt eva iti ced na itaretara āśraya tva prasaṅgāt yāvat āgamasya prāmāṇyam na siddhyati tāvat na puruṣa viśeṣa praṇīta tvam siddhyati yāvat ca na tad praṇīta tva siddhiḥ tāvat na prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti 
[389,18]	atra ucyate syāt ayam doṣaḥ yadi sarvasya āgamasya āpta ukta tvena eva prāmāṇyam sādhyate yāvatā kasyacid āpta ukta tvena kasyacid pravṛtti sāmarthyena iti na ca pravṛtti sāmarthyena prāmāṇya siddhau cakrakam kasmāt aniścite api prāmāṇye artha saṃśayāt eva pravṛtteḥ ukta tvāt na ca evam vyarthaḥ tad prāmāṇya niścayaḥ anyatra āpta ukta tvena prāmāṇya siddhau dṛṣṭānta artha tvāt pravṛtti sāmarthyena niścitasya punar āpta ukta tvena niścayaḥ anarthakaḥ iti ced syāt etat eva yat ekavidhaḥ eva āgamaḥ syāt yāvatā sa dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha bhedāt 
[389,26]	tatra dṛṣṭa arthānām vākyānām prāyeṇa pravṛtti sāmarthyāt prāmāṇyam gamyate tatra hi aniścite api prāmāṇye arthinaḥ kāpīḍayā pravṛttiḥ bhavati svarga ādiṣu punar atyanta adṛṣṭa tvena prāpti sambhāvanā api na asti tena tatra vicārakasya prāmāṇya aniścaye pravṛttiḥ na sambhavati tasmāt adṛṣṭa arthānām vākyānām āpta ukta tvena prāmāṇyam niścitya tad artheṣu prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante iti 
[390,5]	katham punar atyanta adṛṣṭānām vākyānām praṇetuḥ adarśane api āpta ukta tvam pratyetum śakyate iti ucyate kārīrim nirvapeta vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ paśu kāmaḥ yajeta putra kāmaḥ yajeta iti evamādi vākyānān tāvat pravṛtti sāmarthyena prāmāṇyam anumīyate pravṛttiḥ ca atra vṛṣṭi ādibhiḥ atyarthi tvāt anyasya niścita upāyasya anupalambhāt aniścita sāmarthyeṣu vaidha upadeśeṣu ātura vat jijñāsā ataḥ kāpīḍayā api iti uktam 
[390,12^1]	pravṛttasya api prāyeṇa vṛṣṭi ādi phalā anupalambhāt prāmāṇya avagamaḥ na yuktaḥ iti ced na karma kartṛ sādhana vaiguṇyāt tatra karma vaiguṇyam ayathākaraṇam kartṛ vaiguṇyam avidvat tvam prāyaścitti tvam ca yajamānasya ṛtvijām vā sādhana vaiguṇyam haviḥ asaṃskṛtam upahatam vā mantrāḥ nyūna adhikā vā svara varṇa bhraṣṭā vā dakṣiṇā durāgatā hīnā vā ninditā vā iti teṣām anyatama vaiguṇye api phalam na niṣpadyate aviguṇebhyaḥ tu karma kartṛ sādhanebhyaḥ phala niṣpatteḥ na aprāmāṇyam loke api agni kāmaḥ dāruṇī mathnīyāt iti vākyam tatra karma vaiguṇyam mithyā abhimanthanam kartṛ vaiguṇyam prajñā prayatna gataḥ pramādaḥ sādhana vaiguṇyam ārdram suṣiram vā dāru iti tatra eka vaiguṇye api phalam na niṣpadyate iti 
[390,12^2]	tāvatā na aprāmāṇyam guṇa yoge phala niṣpatti darśanāt tat evam laukika vat vaidika vākyānām api dṛṣṭa arthānām karma kartṛ sādhana vaiguṇya abhāve sati phala niṣpatti darśanāt prāmāṇyam anumīyate anumāya ca tad praṇetuḥ atīndriya artha darśi tvena parama āpta tvam avadhāryate na hi ajñasya yathārtha upadeśa kartṛ tvam sambhavati na ca yajña viśeṣa phala viśeṣayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ asmad ādi pratyakṣa gocaraḥ pratyakṣa apravṛttau tatra anumānasya api apravṛttiḥ tad pūrvaka tvāt sāmānyatas api atra vyāptyaprasiddheḥ āgama antareṇa tad pratītau vā anavasthā syāt sā ca pramāṇa abhāvāt anupapannā kvacid mūla vaktrabhyupagame ca saḥ eva atīndriya artha draṣṭā iti avagamyate tatas tad praṇītānām sarva vākyānām aprāmāṇya kāraṇa abhāvāt prāmānyam anumīyate 
[391,15^1]	aparaḥ tu āha yadi anena prakāreṇa prāmāṇyam ucyate tadā ye brāhmaṇa ādi vadham svargasya mokṣasya vā sādhanam vadanti tat śāstrasya api prāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ tatra api eka deśa saṃvāda upapatteḥ tathā jina buddha ādi āgamānām ca prāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ tat eka deśa saṃvāda sadbhāvāt tasmāt yeṣām eva veda vākyānām pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vā saṃvādaḥ sambhavati teṣām eva prāmāṇyam yeṣām tu visaṃvādaḥ teṣām aprāmāṇyam pūrva pakṣa vākyāni ca tāni draṣṭavyāni tena āpta ukta tvam api na virudhyate yeṣām tu sapta dvīpā ādi arthānām na saṃvādaḥ na api visaṃvādaḥ teṣām na prāmāṇya niścayaḥ na aprāmāṇya niścayaḥ sandehaḥ eva tatra iti evam tridhā veda vākyāni draṣṭavyāni 
[391,15^2]	anyathā aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ puruṣaḥ ekam eva idam na dvitīyam ajām ekām ityādi vākyānām api prāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ tatas ca āditya varṇaḥ puruṣaḥ rūpa ādi rahitaḥ ca vyāpakaḥ aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ ca advitīyaḥ anekaḥ ca etya ādi vyāghātaḥ syāt iti tasmāt pratyakṣa anumāna saṃvādāt eva prāmāṇya vyavasthāpanam yuktam tatra paśu kāma iṣṭi ādīnām anuṣṭhāna uttara kālam tāvat paśu ādayaḥ prāpyante tatas tad anuṣṭhānāt dharmaḥ bhavati iti anumīyate katham yajamāna guṇena ākṛṣṭā paśu ādayaḥ yajamānam prati upasarpaṇavat tvāt bhakta sūpa ādi vat pariśeṣāt dharma siddhiḥ tad siddhau ca agnihotra ādīnām api dharma sādhana tvam anumīyate tathā hi agnihotra ācaraṇam dharma niṣpādakam śraddhā upagṛhīta tve sati ācaraṇa tvāt paśu kāma iṣṭi ādi ācaraṇa vat iti 
[392,4]	atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam ṭaka śāstra ādeḥ api eka deśa saṃvāda upapatteḥ prāmāṇyam prasajyate iti tat na abhiprāya aparijñānāt na brūmaḥ eka deśa saṃvāda mātreṇa sarvasya prāmāṇyam kim tarhi yatra eka deśa saṃvādaḥ tad praṇetuḥ atīndriya artha draṣṭṛ tvam pūrva uktena nyāyena vyavasthāpayati tasya aprāmāṇya kāraṇa bhāvāt prāmāṇyam iti uktam na ca anna bhakṣaṇa ādi vākya saṃvādaḥ api atīndriya artha draṣṭṛ tvam sādhayati sāmarthya abhāvāt atiprasaṅgāt ca 
[392,10]	nanu ca culika māsa ādi jñānam divyam tad upadeṣṭuḥ atīndriya artha draṣṭṛ tvam jñāpayati satyam kim tu mūla upadeṣṭuḥ eva atīndriya artha draṣṭṛ tvam jñāpayati na upadeṣṭṛ mātrasya atiprasaṅgāt mūla upadeṣṭā ca veda praṇetā eva tat vijñānam vedāṅge jyotiḥ jñāne antarbhavati cāturlakṣyam hi jyotiḥ jñānam tatra hi dravya āyuḥ strī puruṣa lakṣaṇa vaura ādi gaṇitam sarvam asti tena tatas artham vijñāya śabda antareṇa culika māsa ādi jñānam upadiśya rāga ādi upahatena eva dṛṣṭa artham ṭaka śāstra ādi praṇītam 
[392,16]	jina ādibhiḥ tu dṛṣṭa arthena vañcitaiḥ anādya vidyā abhyāsa janitena mithyā abhimānena sva pakṣa rāgeṇa ca veda vedāṅgebhyaḥ artham vijñāya sva darśane pratyaya utpādana artham gāruḍa ādikam ca bhāṣā antareṇa upadiṣṭam iti viparyayaḥ na kasmāt iti ced na tad apratipāditasya api śānta puṣṭyā abhicāra ādi phalasya yajña prakārasya jyotiḥ jñāna antarasya ca iha upadiṣṭasya saṃvāda upalambhāt jina buddha ādi āgameṣu ca yāni vaidika siddhānta ādi anupādiṣṭa artha abhidhāyīni vākyāni teṣām visaṃvādaḥ eva iti kutas tad praṇetṝṇām sarvajña tvam niścīyate 
[392,24]	vedaḥ tu yadi asarvajña praṇītaḥ syāt tadā jina ādi praṇīta āgama vat purāṇa ādi āgameṣu aparimiteṣu na pramāṇa tvena praśasyeta loke api deśa antara sthita artha vārttāyāḥ tad vaktṛ guṇa doṣa sandehe api prabhūta vārttā saṃvādāt prāmāṇyam dṛṣṭam kaṇṭha stha tvā anupapatti prasaṅgāt ca na hi asarva jñaḥ pustaka nirapekṣaḥ granthānām aneka sahasrāṇi praṇetum śaknoti praṇītāni ca yadi apramāṇāni tadā pratirāṣṭram asaṃkhyātaiḥ puruṣaiḥ na gṛhyeran kleśa bhūyaḥ tvāt dṛṣṭa artha anuśaya anupalabdheḥ ca 
[393,5^1]	nanu jina ādi āgamaḥ api dṛṣṭam prayojanam vinā api bahubhiḥ gṛhītaḥ tena tasya api prāmāṇyam eṣṭavyam na anyathā tasya grahaṇāt adhyayana adhyāpane mahābhāgyam śrutvā śūdrāḥ kecid adhyayana ādi utsukāḥ saṃjātāḥ te ca anadhikāri tvena vedān adhyetum alabhamānā jina ādinā khyātim icchatā sva praṇita āgama adhyayane phala atiśayam upavarṇya pravartitāḥ taiḥ tu anye tathāvidhāḥ pravartitāḥ taiḥ api anye brāhmaṇa ādayaḥ api kecana manda prajñāḥ dāridrya duḥkha santaptāḥ ca duḥkha kṣaya upadeśena patārya pravartitāḥ iti evam tad āgamaḥ pracayam gataḥ na veda vat vana sthaiḥ api sarva āgamā bahiṣkṛtaiḥ ca kaṇṭha sthaḥ kriyate na api brāhmaṇena eva adhyāpya manaḥ tribhiḥ eva varṇaiḥ abhidhīyamānaḥ pracayam gataḥ 
[393,5^2]	tasmāt na veda vat jina ādi āgamānām api prāmāṇyam prasajyate yat ca uktam tridhā veda vākyāni pramāṇa ani apramāṇāni sandigdha prāmāṇyāni iti tat anupapannam asarvajña praṇītānām hi vākyānām kadācid aprāmāṇyam api sambhāvyate sarvajña praṇītānām tu aprāmāṇya kāraṇa abhāvāt tad anupapattiḥ tathā ca uktam rāga ajñāna ādibhiḥ doṣaiḥ grasta tvāt anṛtam vadet te ca īśvare na vidyante sa brūyāt katham anyathā 
[393,19]	pūrva pakṣa artha tvāt iti api ayuktam tad dūṣaṇa siddhāntayoḥ anabhidhāne hi āgamasya pūrva pakṣa artha abhidhāna anupapatteḥ anyathā hi śrotṝṇām saṃmoha janaka tvena tad praṇetuḥ anāpta tva prasaṅgaḥ kim ca yukti śāstreṣu pūrva pakṣa upanyāsaḥ kriyate vedaḥ tu ājñā siddha tvena upadiṣṭaḥ pitṛ ādi vākya vat na hi atra yuktyā kaścid arthaḥ pratipāditaḥ tasmāt śuṣka tarka abhyāsa janita bhramasya ayam ullāpaḥ pūrva pakṣa arthāni kānicid veda vākyāni iti 
[393,26]	katham tarhi viruddha arthānām vākyānām prāmāṇyam na viruddha artha abhāvāt yaḥ hi veda vākyāṇām tattvataḥ artham na vivecayati tasya eva virodhaḥ pratibhāti udita ādi vākya vat tat yathā udite hotavyam anudite hotavyam samaya adhuṣite hotavyam iti evam vidhāya tad pratiṣedha artham nindām karoti śyāmaḥ vā asya āhutim abhyavaharati yaḥ udite juhoti śabalaḥ vā asya āhutim abhyavaharati yaḥ anudite juhoti śyāma śabalau vā asya āhutim abhyavaharataḥ yaḥ samaya adhyuṣite juhoti iti asya virodham pariharan āha abhyupetya kāla bhedam doṣa vacanāt iti etat uktam bhavati yaḥ yena kālaḥ abhyupagataḥ tasya tad kālam atikramya ani atra kāla bhede juhvataḥ ayam doṣaḥ uktaḥ iti tathā anyeṣām api āgama vākyānām avirodhena vyākhyānam kartavyam na hi anyāni api śāstrāṇi ku buddhibhiḥ vyākhyātāni yathā abhimatam artham jñāpayanti 
[394,8]	tatra advaita abhidhāyīni vākyāni paramātma artha tvena pramāṇāni prakṛti abhidāyya jām ekām ityādi vākyam paramāṇu artha tvāt pramāṇam paramāṇavaḥ hi lohita ādi rūpa yuktāḥ ajanmānaḥ sadṛśam asadṛśam ca kāryam sthāvara jaṅgama ādi ananta bhedam janayanti samavāyi kāraṇam prakṛtiḥ tad apekṣayā strī liṅga tvam samudāya apekṣayā tu ekām iti uktam anyathā pradhānasya api triguṇa tvāt ekatva anupapattiḥ tathā aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ ityādeḥ api ātivāhika taijasa śarīra abhidhāyi tvena pramāṇa tvam sthūle api śarīre puruṣa śabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kim uta tasmin antaraṅge atha vā parama ātmā eva atyanta nirmala tvāt āditya varṇaḥ iti upacaryate anaṅguṣṭha mātram api aṅguṣṭha mātre hṛd pradeśe antaḥkaraṇa saṃyamāt yogibhiḥ upalabhyamāna tvena upacaryate iti evam anyeṣām api vākyānām avirodhena yatnataḥ arthaḥ pratipattavyaḥ na tu prajñā dāridryāt ālasyāt vā yathā artha pratipatti aśaktau aprāmāṇyam pratipattavyam iti 
[394,20]	yat punar etat pratyakṣa anumāna saṃvādena eva āgamasya prāmāṇyam iti tat ayuktam svarga dṛṣṭa viśeṣa devatā ādi pratipādaka āgamasya prāmāṇya abhāva prasaṅgāt na ca sukha mātram svargaḥ kaḥ hi buddhimān upanatam sukham parihṛtya janma antara bhāvi sukha mātra artham tapaḥ caraṇa yajña ādiṣu mahā prayāseṣu pravartate yaḥ ca pravṛtti hetuḥ āgama darśitaḥ anekāni abda sahasrāṇi yāvat nairantaryeṇa sukha viśeṣaḥ tatra pratyakṣa anumāna apravṛtteḥ saṃvāda abhāvaḥ iti apravṛttiḥ eva svarga arthinām prāptā 
[394,26]	kim ca adṛṣṭa viśeṣam prati sādhana viśeṣa abhidhāyinaḥ pavitrā pavitrādi viśeṣa abhidhāyinaḥ ca āgamasya na pratyakṣa anumāna saṃvādaḥ asti iti aprāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ tathā hi pañca mahāyajña ādikam gṛhasthasya dharma sādhanam yateḥ tu adharma sādhanam kiṃcid kasyacid pavitram tat eva anyasya apavitram hiṃsā ādikam api kvacid dharma sādhana tvena uktam kvacid adharma sādhana tvena iti evaṃvidhe āgama viṣaya vibhāge asmad ādīnām na eva pramāṇa antaram pravartate iti środdha upagṛhīta tve sati ācaraṇa tvam sāmānya mātra sādhakam yadi syāt na ca tat api yuktam yatas kenacid anāptena pratāritasya kasyacid adharma sādhanam api środdha upagṛhītam sambhavati tasya api dharma sādhana tve pratāraka apratāraka praṇīta āgamayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ syāt na ca etat upapannam 
[395,9]	yat api dṛṣṭānta siddhi artham sādhanam uktam deva datta guṇena ākṛṣṭāḥ paśu ādayaḥ devadattam prati upasarpaṇa tvāt iti na etat api yuktam sandigdha anaikāntika tvāt anya guṇa preritasya api anya abhimukham upasarpaṇam dṛṣṭam na ca atra bādhakam kiṃcid asti yena anya guṇa preritānām paśu ādīnām devadattam prati upasarpaṇam na syāt 
[395,14]	api ca dharma sādhana tvam kutas pratipattavyam sukha sādhana viśeṣaḥ hi dharmaḥ prasiddhaḥ tat na jñāyate dharmeṇa adharmeṇa vā ākṛṣṭāḥ kim ca atas eva daśamaḥ guṇaḥ sidhyatu iti dharma ākṛṣṭa tva siddhau api na tat iṣṭeḥ tad dharma utpādaka tva siddhiḥ janma antara kṛtasya dharmasya adharma sādhana upekṣasya api phala dātṛ tva sambhavāt yathā abhicāra ākarṣaṇa ādi karma anuṣṭhāyinām ḍākinī tantra ādiṣu kraurya steya maithunāt yati nindita karma upeta vrata anuṣṭhāyinām dhaneśvara ādeśena tat śatrum brāhmaṇa ādikam api viśvāsya ghātayatām caurya ādi karma kāriṇām ca iti tathā anyeṣām api dharma adharma kāraṇa viśeṣa sādhanāya uktānām hetūnām sandigdha anaikāntika tvam sandigdha kāla atīta tvam vā draṣṭavyam na hi pratipakṣa bādhakam antareṇa vipakṣa adarśana mātrāt dhetoḥ vyāptiḥ sidhyati atiprasaṅgāt tathā hi sa śyāmaḥ tad putra tvāt paridṛṣṭa tad putra vat pakvāni tāni phalāni etad śākhā prabhava tvāt upabhukta phala tvāt aloha lekhyaḥ vajramaṇiḥ pārthiva tvāt a iti evamādīnām api hetu tvam syāt 
[396,1]	dharmi hetu dṛṣṭānta grāhakaiḥ eva pramāṇaiḥ virodhāt kāla atītaḥ hetuḥ bhavati tad abhāve samyak hetuḥ eva iti ayam api mithyā abhiniveśaḥ tad putra tva ādīnām api samyaktva prasaṅgāt na hi tad putra tva ādīnām dharmya ādi anyatama grāhaka pramāṇena bādhaḥ asti kin tu uttara kāla bhāvinā tad putra rūpa darśanena tad phala āsvādena loha vyavāparāphala darśanena āpta vacanena vā iti 
[396,7]	kim ca kasya api bādhaḥ na asti iti asarva vidā avagamantum aśakyam tad pratyakṣa darśinām ca bādhā bhaviṣyati iti atas asarva vidbāda anutpāde api sandigdha anaikātika tvam sandigdha kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvam vā hetoḥ dūṣaṇam na nirvartate na ca aniścitam abādhita viṣaya tvam gamaka aṅgam hetu rūpa tvāt pakṣa dharma tva ādi vat tasmāt abādhita viśaya tva niścaye sādhya abhāva sādhanayoḥ virodhaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ sambhāvita āgama saṃvādaḥ vā anyathā anumāna mātram syāt iti 
[396,14^1]	yat punar etat sapta loka ādi pratipādakānām āgamānām sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt āgama antarāṇām ubhayathā darśanāt ca sandigdha artha tvam iti tat ayuktam indriya ādi jñānasya api ubhayathā darśanena sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvena ca sandigdha artha tva prasaṅgāt viśeṣa darśanāt tatra sandeha nivṛttiḥ iti ced na viśeṣa darśanasya api ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt sādhaka bādhakayoḥ api ubhayathā dṛṣṭa tvāt sandigdha artha tvam anavasthā vā syāt 
[396,14^2]	atha yādṛśena cakṣuḥ ādinā liṅgena vā janitam niścaya jñānam pravṛtti sāmarthyāt avyabhicāri iti niścitam tādṛśena eva cakṣuḥ ādinā liṅgena vā utpāditam niścaya jñānam bhrānti nimitta anupalambha mātrāt eva pramāṇa phala tvena vyavasthāpyate anyasya ubhayathā darśane api na tasya sandigdha artha tvam na api anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ iti yadi evam anyeṣām āgamānām ubhayathā darśane api pūrva uttara avirodhena vyākhyātaiḥ veda vākyaiḥ utpāditasya niścaya jñānasya pramāṇa antara saṃvāda abhāve api sandigdha artha tvam ayuktam mithyātva nimittasya leśataḥ api anupalambhāt yathāvat vyākhyāta veda vākya janita jñānasya dṛṣṭeṣu artheṣu samyaktvena avadāritasya dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt iti 
[396,28_397,9]	anye tu apauruṣeya tvena vedānām prāmāṇyam varṇayanti paurṣeya tve hi durlabhaḥ prāmāṇya niścayaḥ puruṣāṇām doṣa āśraya tvena tad saṃśaya anivṛtteḥ yatas śabde doṣa udbhavaḥ tāvat vaktra dhīnaḥ iti sthitaḥ tad abhāvaḥ kvacid siddhaḥ guṇavat vaktṛka tvataḥ vede tu guṇavān vaktā durjñānaḥ tena doṣa abhāvaḥ api aśakya niścayaḥ kartuḥ abhāve tu sukhena eva niścīyate tathā hi doṣāḥ santi na santi iti pauruṣeyeṣu yujyate vede kartuḥ abhāvāt dhi doṣa śaṅkā eva na asti atas puruṣaḥ hi doṣānām āśrayaḥ tad abhāve kutas doṣa aśaṃka iti tat ayuktam yatas 
[397,12_397,17]	śabde pramāṇa tā tāvat vaktra dhīnā eva niścitā tad abhāvaḥ api sarvatra guṇavat vaktra bhāvataḥ tatas ca prāmāṇyam vidyate na iti pauruṣeyeṣu yujyate vede kartuḥ abhāve vaḥ tad vārtā api hi durlabhā yathā eva hi rāga ādi parigataḥ puruṣaḥ mṛṣāvādī dṛṣṭaḥ tadvat parijñāna dayā ādi yuktaḥ satya vādī tatas ca yathā śabde vaktṛ vaśāt mithyā artha tā tathā satya artha tāpī iti sa nirvartamānaḥ tām api nirvartayati iti ānarthakyam eva syāt vaktṛ guṇāḥ tad doṣān eva apaghnanti prāmāṇyam tu svatas eva iti ced na svatas prāmāṇyasya prāk eva nirasa tvāt kim ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām siddhasya prāmāṇyam prati guṇānām hetu bhāvasya anyathātvam kalpayitum ayuktam atiprasaṅgāt api ca vaktṛ doṣāḥ tad guṇān eva apadhnanti aprāmāṇyam tu svatas eva iti evam api bruvataḥ na sukham vakrībhavati 
[398,3]	api ca apauruṣeyaḥ api avaśyam puruṣa kṛtam samayam apekṣya artham pratipādayati anyathā hi bāla gopāla ādīnām api veda pāṭha śravaṇa mātrāt tad artha pratītiḥ syāt na ca asaṅketitāḥ śabdāḥ kvacid api artham abhidadhānā dṛṣṭā saṅketaḥ ca puruṣeṇa yadi anāptena kṛtaḥ tadā tam apekṣya vedasya artham abhidadhataḥ aprāmāṇyam eva prasaktam āptenā kṛtaḥ ced nanu evam āpta prāmāṇyāt eva prāmāṇyam vedasya abhyupagatam bhavati tatas ca vyartham apauruṣeya tva upavarṇanam puruṣa viśeṣa pratiṣedha virodhaḥ ca 
[398,10]	sambandha balena śabdāḥ saṅketa anapekṣiṇaḥ artham abhidadhati iti ced sambandhaḥ api anityaḥ syāt nityaḥ vā iti anitya tve saṅketa vat doṣaḥ nitya tve api sarveṣām veda pāṭha śrotṝṇām tad artha pratipatti prasaṅgaḥ vyutpatti apekṣi tvāt aprasaṅgaḥ iti ced syāt matam sthitaḥ asya vācakasya vācyena sambandhaḥ saṅketaḥ tu tam eva abhijvalayati yathā pitāputrayoḥ avasthitaḥ eva sambandhaḥ saṅketena abhidyotyate iti na pramāṇa abhāvāt yathā pitāputrayoḥ janya janaka lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām pratīyate na eva śabda arthayoḥ sambandha viśeṣa astitve pramāṇam asti 
[398,18_398,22]	na na asti vyavasthā darśanāt śabdaḥ eva vācakaḥ arthaḥ eva vācyaḥ iti eṣaḥ vyavasthā na asati sambandhe yuktā saṅketa kāritā eva iti ced na viparyayeṇa api vācya vācaka bhāva prasaṅgāt asya śabdasya ayam arthaḥ vācakaḥ asya arthasya ca ayam śabdaḥ abhidheyaḥ iti evam api hi saṅketaḥ kartum śakyate anavasthā prasaṅgāt ca yadi saṅketa balena eva śabdaḥ artham pratipādayati sa saṃketaḥ na avācakena śabdena kartum śakyate saṅketa hetoḥ api śabdasya vācaka tvam saṅketa antara sāmarthyāt iti anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt asti śabda arthayoḥ svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ iti 
[399,4_399,8]	atra ucyate yat tāvat vyavasthā darśanāt iti tat na vyavasthāyā śakti nimitta tvāt yā eṣām śabdānām abhidhātrī śaktiḥ sārtheṣu na asti iti tena iyam vyavasthā anyathā hi sarveṣām kārakāṇām vyaṃjakānām ca vyavasthā darśanāt sva kāryaiḥ vyaṅgyaiḥ ca svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ prasajyate yat api uktam anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti tat api ayuktam niyama anabhyupagamāt na ayam niyamaḥ abhyupagamyate vācaka śabdena eva saṅketaḥ kriyate kin tu anyathā api yathā aṅguli ādinā nirdiśya hastena saṃspṛśya vā ayam gauḥ iti saṅketam karoti vṛddha vyavahāreṣu ca āvāpa udvāpābhyām para abhiprāya stham saṅketam pratipadyante yathā karṇa āṭa ādi vyavahāreṣu āryaḥ iti sambandha vyutpatti artham saṅketa apekṣaṇe api ayam nyāyaḥ avaśyam abhyupagantavyaḥ tasmāt samaya balena eva śabdānām vācaka tvāt na svābhikaḥ sambandhaḥ asti 
[399,15]	deśa viśeṣe ca aniyamāt yathā cora śabdaḥ taskaram āryeṣu abhidhatte draviḍeṣu odanam iti svābhāvika sambandhe tu aniyama anupapattiḥ na hi dhūmaḥ kvacid agnim pratipādayati kvacid jalam iti kim ca yatra yatra arthe puruṣeṇa śabdaḥ saṅketyate tam tam artham pratipādayan upalabhyate svābhāvika sambandhe tu dhūma ādi vat puruṣa icchā anuvidhāna anupapattiḥ syāt putra ādiṣu ca sva icchayā nāmakaraṇam dṛśyate tasmāt avasthitaḥ eva sambandhaḥ saṅketena avadyotyate iti api ayuktam vaidika śabdānām eva arthaiḥ saha svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ iti ced na pramāna abhāvāt na ca atra viśeṣaḥ asti yena ekatra śabda arthayoḥ svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ anyatra sāṃketikaḥ iti nāma ākhyāta upasarga ādīnām ca ubhayatra viśeṣāt nanu ca sāṃketika tve śabda artha sambandhasya sarvatra ca vyavahāra hetu tvam na syāt sva putra ādiṣu nara siṃha ādi saṅketa vat dhṛta ādiṣu bhava amitra ādi saṅketa vat ca iti na asiddha tvāt na eva sarvadā sarvatra vyavahāraḥ kaścid asti mleccha ādi vyavahārāṇām anyaḥ anyatra aprasiddha tvāt 
[400,5_400,12]	ādimattvāt ca sarva vyavahārāṇām nanda vikrama āditi aśrī harṣa ādi vi avahāra vat anādi tve tu dṛṣṭāntaḥ na asti ādimattve api samaya kāra prabhāvāt anyasmāt vā kutaścid nimittāt bhūyaḥsu api deśa ādiṣu kaścid vyavahāraḥ prasiddhim gataḥ kaścid na iti yathā rāma rāvaṇa yudhiṣṭhira ādi nāmāni eva prasiddhārthāni adya api vyavaharanti na sarva puruṣa nāmāni nighaṇṭau uktānām api paryāyanānām kiṃcid bahuṣu api śāstreṣu lokeṣu ca prasiddha artham kiṃcid na iti na etāvatā svābhāvika sāṃketika sambanda bhedaḥ kim ca saṅketasya yadi asāmarthyam syāt tadā anyaḥ kalpayate yadā tu ekatra api saṅketasya sāmarthyam iṣṭam tadā anyatra api samayād eva śabdānām vācaka tvam bhaviṣyati iti vyarthā sambandha antara kalpanā na hi atra viśeṣaḥ asti yena kvacid samayasya sāmarthyam kvacid sambandha antarasya iti 
[400,17]	sarvatra api svābhāvika sambandhasya eva sāmarthye dhūma ādi vat yathā abhipreta artheṣu śabdānām pravṛttiḥ na syāt iti uktam pratyekam śabdasya sarvaiḥ arthaiḥ sambandhaḥ asti iti ced yadi evam go śabdāt eva sarva artha pratipatti prasaṅgaḥ samaya apekṣi tvāt aprasaṅgaḥ iti ced samayaḥ eva tarhi astu kim siddha upasthāyinā svābhāvika sambandhena apramāṇakena kalpitena iti ayogye samayaḥ na yuktaḥ iti ced nanu yogyatā api uktā śabdānām abhidhāna tvam arthānām tu abhidheya tvam iti 
[400,23]	yadi ca pratyekam śabdasya sarvaiḥ arthaiḥ sambandhaḥ asti sa puruṣa kṛtena samayena niyamitaḥ artha viśeṣa pratīti hetuḥ bhavati tadā vaidika śabdānām samaya kāra anabhyupagame artha pratipādaka tvam na syāt atha tatra api samaya kāraḥ kaścid asti tatas pauruṣeya apauruṣeyayoḥ na kaścid viśeṣaḥ śaṅkā ca vedeṣu anivṛttā kim doṣavān tatra samaya kāraḥ atha guṇavān iti tatas ca aprāmāṇyaśaṅkā api syāt iti vyarthaḥ apauruṣeya tva prayāsaḥ 
[401,7]	na ca apauruṣeya tve pramāṇam kiṃcid asti nanu uktam kartuḥ asmaraṇāt iti na vyadhikaraṇa tvāt atha asmaryamāṇa kartṛ tvāt iti vivakṣitam tathā api dṛṣṭāntaḥ na asti nityam hi na smaryamāṇa kartṛkam na api asmaryamāṇa kartṛkam kim tu akartṛkam eva iti akartṛ kaka tva vivakṣāyān tu asmaryamāṇa grahaṇam vyartham 
[401,11]	jīrṇa ārāma kūpa ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ ca saṃpradāya avicchede satī iti ced tathā api asādhāraṇaḥ hetuḥ na hi nityasya ākāśa ādeḥ sampradāyaḥ kaścid asti prayojana abhāve api kartuḥ asmaraṇam dṛṣṭam santi hi anekāni asmaryamāṇa kartṛkāni śloka ādīni yeṣām sampradāyaḥ api na siddhaḥ na ca teṣām apauruṣeya tvam bhavatā āpīṣyate 
[401,16^1]	asiddhaḥ api ayam hetuḥ paurāṇikāḥ hi brahma kartṛka tvam smaranti vaktrebhyaḥ vedāḥ tasya viniḥsṛtāḥ iti pratimanvataram ca eva śrutiḥ anyā vidhīyate iti kim ca yaḥ vai vedān ca prahiṇoti iti atra vedena eva ca bhagavān rudraḥ kartā pratipāditaḥ kim ca smṛti purāṇa ādi vat ṛṣi nāma aṅkitāḥ kāṇvam ādhyandina taittirīya ādau śākhā bhedaḥ katham asmaryamāṇa kartṛkāḥ atha vā yena dṛṣṭā prakāśitā vā śākhā sā tad nāma aṅkitā na tu tena kṛtā iti tat idam vyāmūḍha bhāṣitam tathā hi yadi tāvat utsannā śākhā tena dṛṣṭā tadā sampradāya aviccheda virodhaḥ atīndriya artha dṛś pratikṣepa virodhaḥ ca 
[401,16^2_402,9]	atha anutsannā eva sampradāyena dṛṣṭā tadā yāvadbhiḥ upādhyāyaiḥ sā dṛṣṭā prakāṣitā ca tāvatām nāmabhiḥ aṅkitā syāt kim ca buddha ādi āgamaḥ api buddha ādibhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ prakāśitaḥ vā na tu pauruṣeyaḥ iti ukte kim uttaram abhyupagama virodhaḥ iti ced pauruṣeya tvam eva āha tasya katham abhyupagama virodhaḥ na ca abhyupagama vaśena vastu vyavasthitiḥ kin tarhi pramāṇa vaśena na ca atra viśeṣakam pramāṇam asti yena vedeṣu śrūyamāṇaḥ api kartā mithyā anyathā vā kalpyate na buddha ādi āgameṣu iti etena veda adhyayanam adhyayana antara pūrvakam veda adhyayana tvāt idānīntana adhyayana vat ityādi nirastam buddha ādi āgama adhyayane api tulya tvāt 
[402,12]	yat api apauruṣeya tve vedasya pariśeṣataḥ prāmāṇyam iti uktam na tāvat anutpatti lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam jñāna utpatti darśanāt na api saṃśaya lakṣaṇam akim juhuyām na vā a iti evaṃprakāra saṃśaya ājananāt na api viparyaya lakṣaṇam deśa antara ādiṣu abādhyamāna tvāt na ca anyat aprāmāṇya lakṣaṇam asti yatas aprāmāṇyam tridhā bhinnam mithyātva ajñāna saṃśayaiḥ iti sahasra śīrṣā puruṣaḥ ityādeḥ tu arthavāda tvāt na tad uparodhena vidhi vākyānām api aprāmāṇyam codanā arthe ca pramāṇa antara vṛttiḥ niṣiddhā dharmam prati animittam pratyakṣam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt ityādinā tena apauruṣeya tvam vedasya iti yat api ayuktam evam hi svarga kāmaḥ keśān utpāṭayet caitya vandanam kuryāt puruṣa ādi bhakṣaṇam brāhmaṇa ādi vadham ca kuryāt svarga kāmaḥ iti evamādīnām api codanānām apauruṣeya tvam prāmāṇyam ca pratipattavyam jinaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādīnām ca arthavāda tvam tulya nyāya tvāt iti 
[403,6_403,11]	nanu ca pauruṣeya tve vedānām mantra tva anupapattiḥ mantraḥ hi japyamānaḥ phala dāyī dṛṣṭaḥ na ca tathā pauruṣeyam vākyam tasmāt na pauruṣeyaḥ vedaḥ iti na śaiva siddhānta ādīnām api apauruṣeya tva prasaṅgāt tatra api hi mantrāḥ phala dāyinaḥ santi te api vaidikāḥ eva iti ced na śūdrāṇām api phala dāyi tvāt vedeṣu ca śūdrāṇām adhikāraḥ na asti anadhikāriṇaḥ ca na mantrāḥ phalam prayacchanti kim ca prākṛtāḥ api mantrāḥ phala dāḥ dṛśyante na ca vedeṣu prākṛtaḥ śabdaḥ asti tasmāt prākṛta mantra vat vaidikāḥ api mantrāḥ pauruṣeyāḥ iti 
[403,14]	nanu evam sarve puruṣāḥ mantra kāriṇaḥ bhaveyuḥ iti na sarveṣām atulya śakti tvāt ye hi satya saṅkalpāḥ te eva mantrān kartum śaknuvanti satya saṅkalpa tā ca īśvarasya svābhāvika aiśvarya prabhāvāt mahā ṛṣīṇām ca ahiṃsā brahmacarya satya ādi sthairya prabhavāt tapaḥ prabhṛti prabhāvāt vā sa ca ittham prabhāvaḥ na itara puruṣāṇām asti tena sarveṣām na mantra kartṛ tvam 
[403,20_403,24]	api ca kāvyasya api pauruṣeya tve sarve puruṣāḥ kāvya kṛtaḥ syuḥ na vā kaścid iti apūrvā eṣā vācaḥ yuktiḥ nanu kāvyam kuruvāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ dṛśyate na mantram kuruvan iti na mantra kṛtaḥ api anumāna āgamābhyām darśanāt na ca asarva vid darśanam samasta vastu vyāpi yena tad nivṛttau eva adṛṣṭasya abhāvaḥ syāt kim ca bhārata ādīni kurvāṇaḥ api kaścid idānīm na dṛśyate iti teṣām api apauruṣeya tva prasaṅgaḥ kaḥ ca mantrāṇām viśeṣaḥ yena varṇa pada vākya ātmanaḥ api santaḥ akṛtakāḥ iti phala niṣpādanam viśeṣaḥ iti ced na pauruṣeyaiḥ eva mudrā maṇḍala dhyāna ādibhiḥ phala niṣpādana darśanāt 
[404,2_404,11]	na ca śabda śaktitaḥ phala niṣpattiḥ upāṃśu mānasayoḥ niṣphala tva prasaṅgāt kāla vikalpa abhāva prasaṅgāt vidhi abhisandhi viśeṣa anapekṣi tva prasaṅgāt ca puruṣa śaktitaḥ pala niṣpattau ca na ayam doṣaḥ tena hi yatra yathā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ tatra tathā samaya anupālanāt phalam niṣpadyate tad samabhivyāhāra sāmarthyāt saḥ eva vā devatā viśeṣaḥ tad samayam anupālayan tam anugṛhṇati rāja ādi vat tat evam mudrā maṇḍala ādi vat mantraḥ api samaya mātram eva tathā ca ekasmāt eva mantrāt samaya bheda anuvidhānena phala bhedaḥ api upapadyate anyathā agneḥ dāha ādi vat aviśeṣeṇa phalam syāt kasyacid acirāt siddhiḥ anyasya cirāt aparasya brahmacarya ādi apekṣaṇāt kasyacid tatas eva anarthaḥ iti evam vikalpaḥ na syāt kim ca samayā abhijñena uccāritam ekaikam api akṣaram viṣāpnutyādi kārtyam kurvat upalabhyate na itaraiḥ svābhāvika tve tu agni vat atadvid prayoge api sva kāryam kuryāt tasmāt na mantraḥ api apauruṣeyaḥ iti 
[404,15^1]	kim ca apauruṣeyaḥ api vedaḥ tāvat avyākhātaḥ na artham pratipādayati adarśanāt vyākhyānam ca pauruṣeyam pauruṣeyāt ca pratipattau katham na doṣa āśaṅkā puruṣāḥ hi viparītam api śabda artham vyācakṣāṇāḥ dṛśyante saṃvādena prāmāṇya abhyupagame ca apauruṣeya tva kalpanā narthikā vedasya api tad vyākhyāna vat pramāṇa antara saṃvādāt eva prāmāṇya upapatteḥ na ca tad vyākhyānasya api nitya tvam anādya vicchinna sampradāya rūpa tvam vā vedeṣu api vyākhyāna bhedasya atyanta viruddhasya sāṃkhya vaiśeṣika mīmāṃsaka ādi kṛtasya darśanāt na ca tatra kasyacid eva anādi tvam na sarvasya iti atra pramāṇam kiṃcid asti yadi ca apauruṣeyaḥ vedaḥ tadā tad śabdānām anyaḥ eva arthāḥ syuḥ pauruṣeyāṇām api mleccha ārya ādi śabdānām eka artha tvam na asti kutas apauruṣeya śabdānām 
[404,15^2]	tatas ca agni hotra havana ādi śabdānām śva māṃsa khādana ādayaḥ anyaḥ eva arthāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti āśaṅkā na nivartate na ca yaḥ eva laukika śabdānām arthāḥ te eva madīyānām iti evam vedaḥ svayam pratipādayati jaimini prabhṛtayaḥ tu pratipādayantaḥ api na pramāṇībhavanti puruṣa tvāt na hi jaiminiḥ api atīndriya artha draṣṭā bhavadbhiḥ iṣyate yena laukika vaidika śabdāyoḥ eka artha tām paśyati adṛṣṭvā abhidadhataḥ ca vākyam katham pramāṇam prakaraṇa ādibhiḥ api tasya arthaḥ niścīyate yaḥ śabdaḥ kvacid anekeṣu api artheṣu gṛhīta samayaḥ syāt na ca vaidikasya śabdasya kasya api arthaḥ kvacid iti mleccha śabda vat aniścita arthaḥ eva prasajyet 
[405,6]	pauruṣeya tve tu na ayam doṣaḥ sa hi para anujighṛkṣayā pravṛttaḥ prasiddha arthaiḥ saṃskṛta śabdaiḥ vedān racayitvā svayam vyākhyātavān idānīntana grantha kāra vat tatas tad sampradāyena anye api vyācakṣīran kvacid padārtha vipratipattau ca prakaraṇa ādibhiḥ api arthān avadhārayate śāstra antara vat pratyakṣe api laukikena agni ādi śabdena aviśiṣṭaḥ vaidika agni ādi śabdaḥ katham na tad arthaḥ iti ced nanu evam sati pauruṣeyena api viśiṣṭaḥ katham na pauruṣeyaḥ iti kim ca laukikasya agni ādi śabdasya arthavat tvam pauruṣeya tvena vyāptam tatra ayam vaidikaḥ agni ādi śabdaḥ katham pauruṣeya tvam tyaktvā tad artham grahītum śaknoti ubhayam api hi gṛhṇīyāt jahyāt vā ubhayam api iti 
[405,14]	api ca vākyasya nitya tvam sādhyate varṇānām vā iti na tāvat vākyasya varṇa avyatirekāt na hi varṇa vyatiriktam śabda ātmakam vākyam asti tathā ca varṇa samūhaḥ padam pada samūhaḥ vākyam iti etad prapañcena prāk prasādhitam samūhaḥ ca vastutas na bhidyate kalpanāyā tu bhedaḥ tathā api kalpanāyāḥ jñāna ātmaka tvāt anitya tvam eva na ca vākya nitya tve pramāṇam asti anitya tve tu vākya tvāt laukika vākya vat iti anumānam atha varṇāḥ eva nityāḥ teṣām nitya tve api na prāmāṇya siddhiḥ sarva śāstrāṇām prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt asatya vacana abhāva prasaṅgāt ca na hi anyaḥ eva vaidikāḥ varṇāḥ pratyabhijñāyai aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt 
[405,22^1]	atha vedeṣu varṇānām ānupūrvī nityāḥ na anyatra iti na ānupūrvyāḥ api śabda ātmaka tve varṇebhyaḥ artha antara tva asambhavāt yadi ca varṇa ānupūrvī nityā tadā agniḥ iti akāragakārayoḥ pūrva apara bhāvasya nitya tvāt gacchati ityādau viparyaya anupapattiḥ na ca varṇa bahu tvam iṣyate yena gacchati ityādau anyau eva ākāra gakārau ucyete tayoḥ eva ca himavat vindhyayoḥ iva anyathā kramaḥ na sambhavati kṛtakānām api hetu pariṇāma niyamavatām na krama viparyayaḥ kartum śakyate yathā bīja aṅkura patra ādinām ṛtu saṃvatsara ādīnām ca kutas eva nitya avicalita svabhāvānām iti 
[405,22^2]	na hi pūrva avasthā tyāgam antareṇa anyathā avasthā sambhavati tyāge ca anitya tvam api ca iyam ānupūrvī deśa kṛtā vā syāt yathā pipīlikā ādīnām paṅkutau kāla kṛtā vā yathā vṛddha ānupūrvī bīja aṅkura ādīnām ca sā dvividhā api atra na sambhavati sarva varṇānām sarva deśa vyāpi tvāt nitya tvāt ca ākāśa ātma ādi vat na ca anyathā asti paurvāparyam abhivyakti paurvāparyāt varṇānām paurvāparyam iti ced na mithyātva prasaṅgāt upādhi dharma adhyāropāt sphaṭika ādiṣu nīla ādi ākāra āropavat kim ca upādhi nivṛttau nīla ādi ākāra nivṛtti vat abhivyakti nivṛttau varṇānām pauruva aparya nivṛttiḥ tat kutas apauruṣeya tvam 
[406,13]	anādi pravāha tvena apauruṣeya tvam iti ced na atiprasaṅgāt tathā hi mleccha vyavahārāṇām api mātṛ vivāha ādīnām nāstika vacana ādīnām ca para loka adṛṣṭa ātma ādi apavādānām anādi pravāha tvāt apauruṣeya tva prasaṅgaḥ teṣām api hi parebhyāhita saṃskāraiḥ pravṛttiḥ kartum śakyate na anyathā na hi anāhita saṃskāraḥ kaścid apūrvam vyavahāram pravartayati ādisarge api vyavahārasya pūrva sarga darśana āhita saṃskāra pūrvaka tvāt na ca ādisargaḥ tvayā iṣṭaḥ prathama puruṣaḥ vā kaścid apūrva vyavahāra pravartayitā iti sarva vyavahārāṇām anādi tvāt apauruṣeya tvam prasajyeta abhyupagamāt adoṣaḥ iti ced tādṛśā pauruṣeya tve siddhe kaḥ guṇaḥ pramāṇa siddhi artham hi apauruṣeya tvam iṣṭam tat ca nāstika vacaneṣu api asti iti asādhanam 
[407,4^1]	yat api sarveṣām varṇānām padānām ca nitya tva siddhau pratyabhijñā ākhyam sādhanam uktam tat api asiddha tvāt asādhanam na hi yaḥ mayā kāṃcyām śabdaḥ śrutaḥ saḥ eva ujjayinyām śrūyate iti bhavati nanu saḥ eva anuvākaḥ aṣṭa kṛtvas adhītaḥ iti asti pratyabhijñā tathā sarveṣu padeṣu varṇeṣu ca pratyekam pratyabhijñā draṣṭavyā na pradīpa ādiṣu vyabhicārāt nanu ca liṅgasya vyabhicārāt asādhana tvam yuktam pratyabhijñā tu pratyakṣam upanyastam na ca pratyakṣasya anaikāntika tva doṣaḥ asti jala ādi jñānasya ekatra bhrānta tve api anyatra pramāṇa tva abhyupagamāt yatra eva hi bādhyate tatra eva pramāṇam yuktam na ca śabde pratyabhijñā deśa antare kāla antare puruṣa antare avasthā antare vā bādhyate iti na śabde api pratyabhijñāyā pratyakṣa anumānābhyām bādhyamāna tvāt 
[407,4^2]	pratyakṣeṇa tāvat asmin deśe śabdaḥ utpannaḥ śamitaḥ anena kalakalaḥ iti utpāda vināśau gṛhyete abhivyakti bhāva abhāvābhyām eva pratītiḥ iti ced na keśa nakha ādiṣu api evam prasaṅgaḥ tatra api hi pratyabhijñā mātreṇa nitya tvam abhyupagamya abhivyakti anabhivyakti kṛtau utpāda vināśa pratyayau iti bruvāṇaḥ kena vāryate na ca kvacid abhivyakti anabhivyakti kṛtau utpāda vināśa pratyayau dṛṣṭau pratyabhijñā tu sādṛśya vaśāt anekatra dṛśyate api ca eva laukika vākyānām api sarveṣām nitya tva prasaṅgaḥ tatra api aṣṭa kṛtvas uccāritam idam vākyam aṣṭa kṛtvas ayam paṭhitaḥ ślokaḥ iti asti pratyabhijña sarva vākyānām ca nitya tve prāk uktaḥ eva doṣaḥ 
[407,22]	kim ca vaidika śabdena api parokṣa adhyetṛ viśeṣa anumānam dṛṣṭam devadattaḥ adhīte viṣṇu mitraḥ adhītaḥ iti tat ca śabda abhede anupapannam na hi aneka sādhāraṇam daṇḍa chatra ādikam yadā yena dhṛtvā prakaṭam kriyate tadā tam anumāpayitum śaknoti tīvra mandatara ādi bheda upalabdheḥ ca na hi nityasya tīvratara ādi dharmaḥ asti na api ekasmin akhaṇḍa ātmani tīvra manda ādi bheda upalambhaḥ sambhavati 
[408,2]	vyaṃjaka tīvra manda ādi bhedāt sambavati ced kim vyaṃjaka tīvra manda ādi bhedena śabde tathā abhāvaḥ kriyate kim vā vyaṃjaka dharmaḥ eva āropyate iti na tāvat kriyate na hi nityasya bhedaḥ kenacid dhetunā kartum śakyate na api dharma bhedaḥ eva kriyate tīvra tva ādi dharmasya śabda tva ādi vat sāmānya lakṣaṇa tvena nitya tvāt abhivyakti bhedaḥ eva kriyate iti ced na tīvra tva ādi viruddha dharma bhedasya ekatra astitve pramāṇa abhāvāt asati ca tīvra tva ādi dharma bhede tathā abhivyakti bhedaḥ asatya artha tvāt visaṃvādi eva syāt atha mukha ādiṣu khaḍga ādi dharma āropa vat vyaṃjaka dharmaḥ eva śabde api āropyate na adṛṣṭa tvāt khaḍga ādi dharmaḥ hi dīrghatā ādiḥ samāna indriya dṛṣṭaḥ eva āropyate na adṛṣṭaḥ na anya indriya dṛṣṭaḥ vā śabda vyaṃjakasya vāyu saṃyoga ādeḥ sva rūpeṇa eva adṛṣṭa tvāt kutas tad dharma āropaḥ sambhavati na hi piśāca ādi dharmaḥ kvacid indriya buddhi āropitaḥ dṛśyate rūpa dharmaḥ tvac indriya buddhyā ca iti 
[408,13]	atha śrotra grāhyaḥ kaścid arthaḥ śabdasya vyaṃjakaḥ tīvra tva ādi dharmavān anityaḥ ca iṣyate na tasya api śabda avyatirekāt sāmānyavataḥ śrotra grāhya tvam hi śabda lakṣaṇam tad lakṣaṇa yuktasya ca tatas artha antara tvam ayuktam śrotra grāhyasya sāmānyavataḥ kasyacid api anitya tve sarvasya api anitya tva siddhiḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt iti uttaratra api abhivyaktau doṣam vakṣyāmaḥ 
[408,19]	yat ca uktam darśanasya parārtha tvāt iti anena kila arthāpattiḥ uktā katham darśanam uccāraṇam tat ca para pratipatti artham sā ca artha pratipattiḥ śabda nitya tvena syāt yaḥ hi gṛhīta sambandhaḥ śabdaḥ sa tadā eva naṣṭaḥ iti anitya tva ādinā niyama pūrvaḥ eva śabdaḥ śrūyate tena śabda artha pratipattiḥ na prāpnoti na hi agṛhīta sambandhāt śabāt artha pratipattiḥ yuktā iti tasmāt artha pratipattyā anyathā anupapattyā avagamyate na anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti na etat asti dhūma ādi vat anitya tve api artha pratipādaka tvasya upapatteḥ 
[409,3^1]	kim ca anena nyāyena arthasya api nitya tvam eka tvam ca tvayā abhyupagantavyam anyathā bāhuleye gṛhīta sambandhaḥ api go śabdaḥ śābaleya ādiṣu agṛhīta sambandhaḥ katham pratipattim kuryāt sāmānyasya eva śabda artha tvam liṅga tvam ca atas na doṣaḥ iti ced na sāmānyasya eva śabda artha tve sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi abhāva ādi doṣasya ukta tvāt sāmānya vicāraḥ liṅga liṅgi bhāve api vyāpti grahaṇa vicāre tadvatoḥ eva samarthitaḥ tathā tadvatoḥ vācya vācaka bhāve api adoṣaḥ kim ca yathā liṅga tvam sāmānyasya eva tvayā iṣyate tathā vācaka tvam api sāmānyasya eva astu vyāpti vat vācya vācaka sambandhaḥ api sāmānyayoḥ eva gṛhīṣyate iti kṣīṇa arthāpattiḥ 
[409,3^2]	nanu go śabde kim sāmānyam go śabda buddhi hetu tvam yena khalu sāmarthyena sarve go śabdāḥ sva ātmani eka ākāra buddhi hetavaḥ bhavanti tat sāmānyam na ca ekaḥ eva go śabdaḥ tasya tīvra manda ādi bheda bhinnasya prasiddha tvāt sukha ādi bheda siddhyā ca tulya yogakṣema tvāt yadi api go śabdeṣu sāmānyam sākṣāt na asti tathā api tatra pācaka ādiṣu iva kathañcid asti eva sāmānyam na hi anyathā bhinneṣu abhinna ākāraḥ pratyayaḥ sambhavati iti uktam tasmāt sāmānya āśrayaṇena anityānām eva śabdānām vācakatva upapatteḥ na artha āpattitaḥ api nitya tva siddhiḥ 
[409,19]	yat api sādhanam nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇa tvāt śabda tva vat iti tat na anaikāntika tvāt tathā hi svarga kāmaḥ śva māṃsam purīṣa ādikam ca khādet iti evam ādika ānupūrvī śrotra grāhyā na ca nityā sā api nityā iti ced na vaidika codanā vat prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt tad artha anuṣṭhāna atikrame ca pratyavāya prasaṅgāt tathā veda pāṭhaka kṛtaiḥ doṣaiḥ visvara ādibhiḥ anaikāntaḥ teṣām api nitya tve hi nityam visvara ādi doṣa upahatāḥ vedāḥ syuḥ 
[409,25]	kim ca tīvra manda ādi dharmaiḥ bherī ādi śabdaiḥ ca anaikāntaḥ teṣām api nitya tve pratinimittam śabda bheda upalabdhiḥ na syāt ekasya api hi anekam vyaṃjakam dṛṣṭam anekasya api ekam iti tatas ca śabda viśeṣeṇa nimitta viśeṣa anumānam na syāt na ca parokṣam vyaṃjakam vyaṅgyena anumīyamānam kvacid upalabdham yathā kāryeṇa kāraṇam iti atha kasyacid śabdasya śabda dharmasya vā anitya tvam api iṣyate yatas parkoṣa nimitta anumānam syāt tathā sati tena eva śrāvaṇa tvam anaikāntikam kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvam ca sarvasya api nitya tva sādhanasya vaktavyam 
[410,2^1]	pratyakṣeṇa api hi śabda abhāvaḥ gṛhyate yasmāt indriya vyāpāre sati na asti śabdaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ kalakalaḥ iti jñānam asaṃdigdham abādhyam ca bhavati asati na bhavati iti padārtha antara pratyakṣa tve api ayam eva upāyaḥ sambandha abhāvāt ayuktam pratyakṣa tvam iti ced syāt etat indriyeṇa śabda abhāvasya saṃyoga samavāya ādi anyatamaḥ na kaścid sambandhaḥ asti tasmāt na indriyeṇa śabda abhāvaḥ gṛhyate iti na viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva ākhyasya sambandhasya vidyamāna tvāt kasya punar śabda abhāvam prati viśeṣaṇa tva āviśeṣya tvam karṇa śaṣkulyā iti ācāryāḥ karṇa śaṣkulī ca tvac indriyeṇa gṛhyate bhinna indriya grāhyayoḥ api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ surabhi dravyam iti ādau dṛṣṭaḥ tena atra api aviruddhaḥ iti 
[410,2^2]	gṛha ādi pradeśaḥ vāstu viśeṣaṇam yathā eva hi śabdasya viśeṣaṇam tathā tad abhāvasya api yat viṣayasya viśeṣaṇa tvena viśeṣya tvena vā upalabdham tat tad abhāvasya api iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ tu viśiṣṭa pratīti vaśena vyavasthāpyate tena yatra viśiṣṭa pratītiḥ asti tatra deśa ādi pratyāsatti abhāvaḥ api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ iṣyate yathā gokṣetra ādibhiḥ śatru graha nakṣatra ādibhiḥ ca devadattasya iti pratyakṣa nimitta tvam api asya pratyakṣa jñāna utpattau vyavasthāpyate saṃyoga ādi vat na ekatra animitta tve sarvatra api animitta tvam yuktam iti tasmāt pratyakṣeṇa api śabdasya anitya tvam gṛhyate 
[410,18]	kim ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyavat tve sati asmad ādi bāhya indriya grahaṇa artha tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat viṣaya tvāt ca rūpa ādi vat na ca atra jñeya tvam eva viṣaya tvam vivakṣitam yena anaikāntika tvam syāt kim tarhi yaḥ arthaḥ pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyamānaḥ kasyacid rāgam janayati kasyacid vidveṣam kasyacid moham iti tasya abhāvaḥ atra viṣaya tvam abhipretam tat ca anitya tvam na vyabhicarati 
[410,24]	itas ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ tīvra tva ādi dharma yukta tvāt sukha duḥkha ādi vat vyaṃjaka dharma tve hi śrotra grāhya tva anupapattiḥ tena asiddha tvam na aśaṅkanīyam 
[411,9^1]	kim ca vastu tve sati kāryatvāt ghaṭa ādi vat asiddham iti ced na icchā prayatna dharma anuvidhāyi tvāt icchā anuvidhāyi tvam tāvat yādṛśa śabdam uccārayitum icchati tādṛśaḥ eva bhavati abhivyaktau ca na ayam niyamaḥ suvarṇa ādi abhivyakta abhiprāyeṇa upāttāt pradīpāt sarpa ādeḥ api abhivyakti darśanāt prayatna dharma anuvidhāyi tvam api tīvrāt prayatnāt tīvraḥ śabdaḥ mandān mandaḥ tīvratara mandatara ādi bhedāt tathābhūtaḥ iti tathā bherī ādi abhidhāta ādi dharma anuvidhāyī draṣṭavyaḥ na ca akāryasya evam prayatna ādi dharma anuvidhāyi tvam sambhavati 
[411,9^2]	na hi pradīpa ādi vyaṃjaka bhedāt tad dharma bhedāt ca ghaṭa ādi vyaṅgyam anyathā anyathā upalabhyamānam dṛṣṭam yadi ca evam kārya dharma anugata tvena gṛhyamāṇasya api śabdasya kāryatvam asiddham ucyate nanu evam buddhi ghaṭa ādīnām api kāryatvam katham sidhyati tatra api hi śakyate vaktum sati vyāpaka tva nitya tve buddhi ghaṭa ādīni cakṣuḥ ādi mṛd daṇḍa ādibhiḥ yatra vyajyante tatra eva gṛhyante iti atas kāryatva avyāpaka tva vyavahāra abhāva prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt ghaṭa ādi vat kāraka atiśayena atiśayyamāna tvāt kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ca anityaḥ asarva gataḥ ca iti 
[411,23]	kim ca ākāśa ādi vat anupalabhya svabhāva tve śabdānām kadācid api upalambhaḥ na syāt upalabhya svabhāva tve tu sarva daiva upalambhaḥ syāt anupalambha nimittānām āvaraṇa ādīnām asambhavāt vyaṃjaka abhāvāt anupalabdhiḥ iti ced na vyaṃjaka svarūpa anavadhāraṇāt 
[411,28]	saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ iti ced na cira nivṛtte api dāru paraśu ādi saṃyoga viśeṣe śabda upalabdheḥ vyaṃjaka nivṛttau ca vyaṅgya upalabdhiḥ na yuktā pradīpa saṃyoga nivṛttau iva 
[412,2_412,10]	prāpti aprāpti asambhavāt ca yadi tāvat indriya prāptim apekṣya saṃyogaḥ śabda vyaṃjakaḥ tadā bherī ādi saṃyogasya śrotra prāpti abhāvāt śabda vyaṃjaka tvam na syāt indriyāṇām vyāpaka tvāt na prāpti abhāvaḥ iti ced na sarva deśa avasthita puruṣāṇām grahaṇa prasaṅgāt yogya deśa avasthāne sati viṣaya ākāreṇa indriya pariṇāmataḥ tad viṣaya upalabdheḥ na sarva grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na indriya tad prāpti ādi vyatirekeṇa yogya deśa tvasya sambhavāt satkārya pradhānayoḥ siddhau hi sāṃkhya darśana siddhiḥ tayā vakṣyamaṇa nyāyena anupapatti ḥ tena tad prakriyā api anupapannā eva iti na vistareṇa pūrva pakṣyate atha indriya prāpti anapekṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ śabdasya vyaṃjakaḥ tadā api sarva puruṣa vyaṃjaka prasaṅgaḥ etena vaṃśa dala ādi vibhāgaḥ api śabdasya vyaṃjakaḥ pratyuktaḥ 
[412,13]	kim ca āśritasya abhivyaktiḥ anāśritasya vā yadi āśritasya abhivyaktiḥ tadā sāmānya vat āśrayeṇa saha abhivyakti prasaṅgaḥ gandha ādi vat āśraya anabhivyaktau api abhivyaktiḥ iti ced na gandha ādeḥ anitya tvāt utpādaka hetubhiḥ eva upalabdhi yogyasya utpādāt prāc anupalabdhi yogyasya indriya prāptasya api āśraya anabhivyaktau eva na kasyacid abhivyaktiḥ dṛṣṭā prasveda sparśasya api vāyu sambandhāt saha āśrayeṇa pūrvasya nivṛttau viśiṣṭasya upādāt na kasyacid avasthitasya āśraya abhivyaktau paścāt abhivyaktiḥ iti 
[412,21]	atha anāśritasya abhivyaktiḥ tatra api kim asarva gatasya atha sarva gatasya vā iti yadi asarva gataḥ abhivyajyate tadā yatra yatra bherī daṇḍa abhighāta ādiḥ vyaṃjakaḥ tatra śabda abhivyaktiḥ iti ayam niyamaḥ na syāt avyāpakasya ghaṭa ādi vat sarvatra asambhavāt na hi ghaṭa ādi abhivyakti arthinaḥ yatra yatra dīpa upādanam kurvate tatra tatra ghaṭa ādi abhivyaktiḥ bhavati 
[412,27_413,3]	atha vyāpakasya abhivyaktiḥ tadā sarva śabdānām eka deśa tvāt yugapad abhivyakti prasaṅgaḥ eka deśa avasthita ghaṭa ādi vat sarva puruṣa upalambha prasaṅgaḥ ca sarva puruṣa indriya sambaddhānām eva abhivyakta tvāt akhaṇḍa ātmanā vyāpaka tvāt sāmānyaiḥ vyabhicāraḥ iti ced na teṣām sva āśraya abhivyaktau eva abhivyakteḥ śabdānām tu āśrita tvam eva tvayā na iṣṭam nanu ca utpatti pakṣe api bherī ādi deśe prādurbhūtasya śabdasya śrotreṇa aprāpteḥ grahaṇa anupapattiḥ na santānena śrotra prāptasya grahaṇāt 
[413,6_413,10]	nanu śabda santānaḥ pramāṇena apa asta tvāt anupapannaḥ tathā hi yadi sva avaruddhe nabhaḥ deśe śabdam ārabhate śabdaḥ tadā śrotra deśe śabda ārambhaḥ kadācid api na syāt atha sva avaruddha vyatirikte nabhaḥ deśe śabdam ārabhate tadā bherī ādi deśe jātaḥ śabdaḥ śrotra deśaḥ eva ārabhatām kim antarāla deśe śabda ārambheṇa kim ca santāna uparama hetu abhāvāt dvīpa antara utpannasya api śabdasya santānena śrotra prāptau śravaṇa prasaṅgaḥ kim ca śabdam na ārabhate śabdaḥ śabda tvāt antya śabda vat ārambhaka tve tu pramāṇam na asti iti 
[413,14]	atra ucyate yat tāvat kim sva avaruddhe nabhaḥ deśe śabdaḥ śabdam ārabhate tad vyatirikte vā iti tatra prathama pakṣaḥ na abhyupagamyate dvitīye tu pakṣe yat uktam śrotra deśaḥ eva ārabhatām kim antarāla deśe śabda ārabheṇa iti tat ayuktam evam api santāna upapatteḥ śabdāt utpannaḥ hi śabdaḥ śabda santānaḥ ucyate tena eka śabda ārambhe api upapannaḥ santānaḥ kim ca saṃyoga ārambha vat tad upapatteḥ yathā iṣu ādi karma na pūrva saṃyoga avaruddhe nabhaḥ deśe saṃyoga antaram ārabhate na api ati dūra pradeśe kin tu tat pratyāsanne tatas krameṇa dūra deśe saṃyoga ārambhaḥ tatha śabdaḥ api sva pratyāsanne pradeśe śabda antaram ārabhate na sva avaruddhe dūra deśe vā 
[413,22]	niṣpradeśa tvāt ākāśasya tad pradeśa pratyāsattiḥ ayuktā iti ced na avyāpya vṛtti saṃyoga śabda upādhi kṛta tvāt pradeśasya tatra bherī ākāśa saṃyogāt tad avacchinne nabhaḥ deśe śabdaḥ utpadyate tatas śabdāt bherī pratyāsanna mūrta dravya saṃyoga avacchinne nabhaḥ deśe śabdaḥ utpadyate tatas punar tad dravya anantara mūrta dravya saṃyoga avacchinne nabhaḥ deśe śabda utpattiḥ iti evam uttarottara pratyāsanna mūrta dravya saṃyoga apekṣaḥ śabda ārambhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti 
[413,28]	yat api ayuktam santāna uparama hetu asambhavāt iti tat api ayuktam karma santāna uparama vat tad uparamāt yathā ākāśe prakṣiptānām iṣu ādīnām karmaṇaḥ taratama ādi bhāvena karma antarārambhaka tvam tatas atyanta mandasya anārambhaka tvāt tad santāna uparamaḥ tathā śabdasya api tīvra mandatara ādi bhāvena ārambhaka tvāt atyanta mandasya anārambhaka tvāt tad santāna uparamaḥ iti tathā ca bherī deśa sthaḥ tīvram śabdam śṛṇoti tatas dūra sthaḥ mandam ati dūra sthaḥ tu mandataram mandatamam iti na ca evam nitya tve tīvra mandatara ādi bhāvena śravaṇam upapadyate 
[414,5]	yat ca idam sādhanam śabdam na ārabhate śabdaḥ śabda tvāt antya śabda vat iti tatra ādya ādi śabda pakṣīkaraṇe dharmi grāhaka pramāṇa bādhita tvam na hi anārambhakasya ādya ādi bhāvaḥ upapadyate kaḥ api śabdaḥ na ārambhakaḥ iti pratijñā arthe siddhi sādhya tā antya śabdasya anārambhaka tvāt sarva sya anarambhaka tve sādhye dṛṣṭāntaḥ na asti antya vyatiriktasya api dharmi tve dharmi grāhaka pramāṇa bādhita tvam narambhakasya antya vyatirekitva asiddheḥ kim ca dṛṣṭānta grāhaka pramāṇa bādhita tvāt ayuktam na hi santāna abhāve śabdasya antya tvam sidhyati 
[414,13]	śabdasya śabda ārambhaka tve api pramāṇam na asti iti etat api ayuktam tathā hi asmad ādi indriya prāptaḥ śabdaḥ dharmī sajātīyāt utpannaḥ iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ asmad ādi bahya indriya pratyakṣa tve sati viśeṣa guṇa tvāt avayavi rūpa ādi vat iti 
[414,17]	grahaṇāni atha anupapatitaḥ ca śabda santānaḥ pratīyate na hi śrotram aprāptasya viṣayasya grāhakam bāhya indriya tvāt sarva śabda grahaṇa prasaṅgāt ca prāptiḥ ca santānam vinā na sambhavati na hi śabdaḥ āgatya śrotram prāpnoti amūrta tvena niṣkriya tvāt na api śrotram gatvā śabdam prāpnoti uktāt eva hetoḥ śrotra adhiṣṭhānam api na tadā gacchat upalabhyate tasmāt santānena eva śrotra prāptasya upalabdhiḥ iti 
[414,23]	nanu anyathā api grahaṇa upapattau santāna asiddhiḥ tathā hi sarve śabdāḥ vyāpakāḥ ākaśa vat tiṣṭhanti te vāyu saṃskāra upakṛtena śrotreṇa gṛhyante tatra go vivakṣā preritaḥ vāyuḥ sarva dikṣu stimitāni vāyu antarāṇi pratibādhamānaḥ śrotra deśam gacchati tena āvarakaḥ vāyuḥ protsāryate tasmin protsārite ca go śabdaḥ upalabhyate yat vā vivakṣā preritena vāyunā yaḥ śrotra deśasya saṃyogaḥ saḥ eva śabda vyaṃjakaḥ iti evam bheri daṇḍa abhighāta ādi preritasya api vāyoḥ śabda vyaṃjaka tvam draṣṭavyam iti na nitya tva asiddheḥ śabdānām nitya tva vyāpaka tva siddhau hi eṣā prakriyā śobheta tad asambhavaḥ ca pramāṇa abhāvāt uktaḥ sādhitam ca anitya tvam tad siddhau ca śabda santāna kalpanā eva jyāyasī na vyaṃjaka kalpanā iti 
[415,9]	sparśa ādi liṅga anupalabdheḥ ca ayuktā vāyu kalpanā yadi hi vāyuḥ vegena śrotra deśam āgacchati tadā tad liṅgasya sparśasya sukasukā śabdasya vā tṛṇa keśa ādi kampasya ca upalambhaḥ syāt yaḥ tu vāyuḥ tṛṇa ādika sparśane api aśaktaḥ saḥ api manda tvāt alpena api prativātena pratihanyate tatas ca prativāte bherī śabdasya agrahaṇam syāt atha bherī daṇḍa abhighāta jaḥ vāyuḥ balīyaḥ tvāt prativātam nirjitya āgacchati tathā sati prativātasya api tṛṇa ādi sahitasya pratyāgamanam syāt meṣa nirjita meṣā antara vat 
[415,16_415,24]	kim ca tad vāyu pratighāta jaḥ api śabdaḥ śrūyeta na ca etat kiṃcid upalabhyate tasmāt ayuktā vyaṃjaka vāyu kalpanā iti yadi ca vāyoḥ śabda vyaṃjana sāmarthyam syāt tadā yasya kasyacid vāyoḥ aviśeṣeṇa sarva śabda vyaṃjaka tvam syāt rūpa āloka vat yathā eva hi rūpa vyaṃjakānām ālokānām puruṣa abhiprāya tṛṇa kāṣṭha ādi hetu viśeṣa janya tve api na viśeṣaḥ kaścid iti kena api kṛtaḥ ālokaḥ sarveṣām yogya deśavasthitānām rūpa viśeṣāṇām vyaṃjakaḥ tathā vāyūnām api hetu viśeṣa janya tve viśeṣaḥ na asti iti kena api preritaḥ vāyuḥ sarva śabdānām vyaṃjakaḥ syāt sarveṣām vyāpaka tvena eka deśa avasthānāt vāyu saṃskṛtam śrotram śabdam gṛhṇāti iti atra api pratiniyama anupapattiḥ āloka aṃjana ādi saṃskṛta cakṣuḥ vat sarva sarva grāhaka tva prasaṅgāt 
[416,2]	prayogaḥ api atra pradarśyate samāna indriya grāhya samāna deśa arthānām grahaṇāya pratiniyata saṃskāraka saṃskāryam śrotram na bhavati indriya tvāt cakṣuḥ vat viṣaya saṃskāra pakṣe tu śabdāḥ pakṣīkartavyāḥ śabdāḥ pratiniyata saṃskāra saṃskāryāḥ na bhavanti samāna indriya grāhya tve sati yugapad indriya sambaddha tvāt eka deśa sthāḥ iva ghaṭa ādayaḥ 
[416,7]	tapta taila ādiṣu agni jvālāyāḥ saṃskāra antareṇa abhivyakteḥ anaikāntaḥ iti ced na abhivyakteḥ asiddha tvāt avasthitasya hi vyaktiḥ cintyate na ca jvālāyāḥ prāc avasthitau pramāṇam kiṃcid asti etena sudhā ādiṣu toyaiḥ uṣṇa sparśa abhivyaktiḥ pṛthivyām gandha abhivyaktiḥ ca pratyuktā utpatsyamānānām ca samāna deśa grahaṇena yugapad indriya sambandha grahaṇena ca vyavacchedaḥ kṛtaḥ tasmāt na anaikāntika tvam 
[416,13]	manda prakāśena śukla rūpa abhivyaktau api kṛṣṇa ādi rūpa viśeṣān abhivyakteḥ anaikāntaḥ iti ced na vipakṣa abhāvāt pratiniyata vyaṃjaka vyaṅgya tva abhāvaḥ hi sādhyaḥ tena pratiniyata vyaṃjaka vyaṅgyānām eva vipakṣa tvam na ca rūpa viśeṣāṇām pratiniyata vyaṃjaka vyaṅgya tvam asti kṛṣṇa rūpa abhivyaṃjaka prakāśena sarva rūpa viśeṣāṇām abhivyakteḥ śuklam tu ataijasam api rūpam īṣat prakāśa svabhāvam tena āloka viśeṣam na apekṣate na etāvatā pratiniyata vyaṃjaka vyaṅgya tvam 
[416,19]	anye tu anaikāntika tva parihāra artham samāna dharma āpanna tva viśeṣaṇam upādadate tat na asiddha viśeṣaṇa tva prasaṅgāt akārakakāra ādīnām hi asamāna dharma tvāt vaidharmya abhāve hi varna eka tvam syāt atha sati api vaidharmye śabda tvena sarva śabdānām samāna dharma tvam tadā śukla kṛṣṇa ādi rūpa viśeṣāṇām api sati api vaidharmye rūpa tvena samāna dharma tvam eva iti katham vyabhicāra parihāraḥ yadi punar sūkṣma sthūlaḥ jvālā anujvālā tva viśeṣa rahita tvam samāna dharma tvam vivakṣitam tadā na asiddham viśeṣaṇam bhavati yadi hi kakārasya abhivyaktau khakārasya sūkṣma tvāt anabhivyaktiḥ tadā khakāra abhivyaktau kakārasya abhivyaktiḥ bhavatu sarṣapa ādi abhivyaktau tad deśa stha bilva di abhivyakti vat atha kakāra abhivyaktau khakārasya anujvala tvena anabhivyaktiḥ tathā api khakāra abhivyaktau kakāra abhivyakti prasaṅgaḥ kṛṣṇa rūpa abhivyaktau śukla rūpa abhivyakti vat tat evam sataḥ śabdasya abhivyaktau yugapad grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ aparihārya eva iti anityasya eva santānena āgatasya grahanam eṣṭavyam tatra doṣa abhāvāt iti 
[417,7]	nanu anitya tve api tulya doṣaḥ kakāra artham preritaḥ hi vāyu varṇa antara utpādaka vāyubhiḥ aviśiṣṭha tvāt sarva varṇān api kuryāt sarva varṇānām tatra avidyamāna tva aviśeṣāt atha avidyamāna tva aviśeṣe api kakāra artham preritaḥ vāyuḥ kakāram eva kartum śaktaḥ na varṇa antaram yadi evam vidyamāna tva aviśeṣe api kakāra abhivyakti artham preritaḥ vāyuḥ kakāram eva saṃskartum śaktaḥ na varṇa antaram iti tulyaḥ parihāraḥ 
[417,13]	tat ayuktam kāraka vyaṃjakayoḥ vaidharmyāt kārake hi niyamaḥ dṛśyate na tu vyaṃjake tathā hi saḥ eva mṛd piṇḍa cakra ādi kāraka nikaraḥ kulāla abhiprāyeṇa niyamitaḥ śarāvam eva karoti ghaṭam eva iti na tu evam pradīpākṣa ādi vyaṃjakam kasyacid abhiprāyeṇa niyamitam tad abhipretam eva artham vyanakti iti asmad pakṣe ca vāyūnām kāraka tvam bhavat pakṣe vyaṃjaka tvam iti katham codya parihārayoḥ tulya tvam tasmāt anityāḥ sarve śabdāḥ tat na nitya tvena vedasya prāmāṇyam kin tu āpta ukta tvena iti sthitam 
[417,21]	eṣu eva upamāna arthāpatti sambhava abhāva etihya ādīnām antarbhāvaḥ tasmāt trīṇi eva pramāṇāni atra yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti upamānam śabda antarbhūtam vākya rūpa tvāt agnimān aya ityādi vākya vat upamāna rūpa tvena bhede tu vidhi artha vāda anuvāda ādi bhedāt api pramāṇa bheda prasaṅgaḥ tatas pramāṇānām ānantyam syāt 
[417,25]	nanu ca aṭavyām aṭataḥ gavaya piṇḍa darśane sati anena sadṛśī madīyāḥ gauḥ iti jñānam yat utpadyate tat upamānam iṣyate na ca tasya kvacid antarbhāvaḥ sambhavati aṭavyām sthitasya gṛha avasthite gavi pratyakṣa ādeḥ pravṛtti asambhavāt iti na etat asti prāk eva pratyakṣeṇa anubhūta tvāt tadā ca smṛtiḥ eva iyam madīyā gauḥ anena sadṛśī iti smṛti sādhanasya ca pramāṇa tvam tvayā api na iṣṭam 
[418,7]	sādṛśyasya prāk agṛhīta tvāt iti ced na etat evam pūrvam eva hi sādṛśya viśiṣṭaḥ gopiṇḍaḥ upalabdhaḥ kasmāt upalabdhi yogya tvāt sādṛśyasya viṣāṇa ādi vat upalabdhi ayogye vā sādṛśye abhyupagamyamāne kadācid api tat na upalabhyetādṛṣṭa vat tatas ca gavayam upalabhya paścāt gām paśyataḥ atena sadṛśīyam a iti pratītiḥ na syāt 
[418,12]	kim ca madīyayā gavā sadṛśaḥ ayam iti eṣā api pratītiḥ bhavati na ca evam kevala indriyeṇa piṇḍa mātra smṛti sahakāriṇā vā janyate vanecaraka indriyeṇa api mahiṣa ādi piṇḍa mātra smṛti sahakāriṇā api vā janyate atha viśiṣṭa piṇḍa smṛti sahakāriṇā indriyeṇa janyate nanu evam sati gavaya sādṛśya viśiṣṭa piṇḍa darśanam abhyupagantavyam anyathā hi viśiṣṭa piṇḍa smṛtiḥ na syāt adṛṣṭe smṛtya yogāt sādṛśya mātreṇa viśiṣṭa darśane api ati prasaṅgaḥ mahiṣa ādeḥ api sādṛśya mātra viśiṣṭa darśanāt iti gavaya adarśane api tad sādṛśya darśanam pratīti abhāvāt ayuktam iti ced na tad darśanasya nirvikalpaka tvāt nirvikalpakena hi pratyakṣeṇa gavaya darśanāt pūrvam tad sādṛśyam gopiṇḍa stham upalabdham tena tad upalabdhi abhimānaḥ na bhavati prathama gopiṇḍa upalambha kāle go tva upalambha vat 
[418,22]	nanu anena sadṛśī iti gavaya viśeṣaṇa tva pratīteḥ katham smṛti tvam evam hi sa vikalpa pratyakṣasya api smṛti tva prasaṅgaḥ tulya yogakṣema tvāt iti na arthāpattitaḥ tad siddheḥ yadi anena sadṛśī sā na syāt tatas tayā sadṛśaḥ ayam na upalabhyeta sādṛśyasya ubhaya niṣṭha tvāt upalabhyate ca ayam tayā sadṛśaḥ tasmāt sā api anena sadṛśī iti prayogaḥ api anena sadṛśī gauḥ sva sādṛśyena asya avacchedaka tvāt yat sva sādṛśyena yasya avacchedakam tat tena sadṛśam dṛṣṭam yathā bhrātrā bhrātṛ antaram 
[418,28]	kim ca evam pramāṇa antara tve ati prasaṅgaḥ syāt tathā hi pūrvam dṛṣṭam vastu etasmāt sthūlam etasmāt dīrgham etasmāt hrasvam iti evamādi jñānam na tāvat upamānam tasya sādṛśya aviṣaya tvāt na api pratyakṣa ādi antarbhūtam upamānena saha asya tulya yogakṣema tvāt atas pramāṇa parisaṃkhyā prasajyate tasmāt evaṃvidhasya jñānasya artha apatti anumāne antarbhāvaḥ smṛti tvam ca anirvikalpaka pratyakṣeṇa tathā arthasya darśanāt tathā hi katham jānīṣe tvam atra sthitaḥ anena sadṛśī sā gauḥ iti evam pareṇa pṛṣṭaḥ pratyakṣeṇa eva pūrvam dṛṣṭā mayā iti evam eva nirdiśati etasmāt tat sthūlam dīrgham ityādi jñānasya api smṛti tve ayam nyāyaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ 
[419,9]	smṛteḥ anubhava ākāra anukāri tvāt nirvikalpaka anubhave sa vikalpaka ākāra anukāriṇī smṛtiḥ ayuktā iti ced na nirvikalpala anubhave api sahakāri sāmarthyāt abhāva sāmānya sthūla tva dīrgha tva ādiṣu sa vikalpaka ākārāyāḥ smṛteḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt dṛṣṭa anumitānām hi niyogaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vā na yuktaḥ iti 
[419,14]	saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratipattiḥ upamāna artham iti apare kvacid yāga viśeṣe gavayasya upayogam śrutvā tad arthī kaścid ayādṛśaḥ goḥ tādṛśaḥ gavayaḥ a iti vanecara vākyam śrutvā gavaya anveṣaṇe pravṛttaḥ aṭavyām vṛtta kaṇṭham go sadṛśam ca artham dṛṣṭvā ayam gavayaḥ iti pratipadyate evam yathā māṣa stambaḥ tathā māṣaparṇī yathā mudga stambaḥ tathā mudgaparṇī iti vākyam śrutvā āhita saṃskāraḥ tad sādṛśyam dṛṣṭvā tām oṣadhīm pratipadya bhaiṣajyāya āharati evam anyaḥ api upamānasya viṣayaḥ lokataḥ bubhutsitavyaḥ iti tatra vākya ja jñāna janita saṃskāra janita smṛti sahakāriṇā indriyeṇa janitam sārūpya jñānam upamānam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ ca pratipattiḥ tad phalam iti 
[419,23]	tat api ayuktam yatas saṃjñi sambandha pratipattiḥ prāk eva āpta vacanāt utpannā gavaya darśane tad smṛtiḥ eva iti tathā hi katham jānīṣe ayam gavayaḥ iti evam pṛṣṭaḥ kenacid vanecaraka vacanāt avagataḥ mayā iti evam eva uttaram abhidhatte na tu upamānena jānāmi iti 
[420,5]	tathā hi yathā pratyakṣeṇa ghaṭam paśyāmi dhūmena agnim jānāmi āgamena svargam avagacchāmi iti pramāṇa traya nirdeśam sarvatra vyavahāriṇaḥ kurvantaḥ upalabhyante na tu evam upamāna nirdeśam pratipattāraḥ kvacid kurvantaḥ dṛśyante tasmāt na upāmānam pramāṇa antaram asti 
[420,10]	adṛṣṭe gavaye saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratipattiḥ ayuktā iti ced na apratyakṣe api śakra ādau tad pratipatti darśanāt saṃjñā kāraṇam api kvacid apratyakṣe putra ādau dṛṣṭam kim uta tad grahaṇam iti nimitta abhāvāt ayuktam iti ced syāt etat yathā śakra ādau netra sahasra ādikam saṃjñā grahaṇe nimittam asti na eva gavaya ādiṣu iti na atra api gavā ādi sādṛśyam nimittam upādāya gavaya ādi saṃjñā vyutpādyate gavayatvam eva gavaya saṃjñā pravṛttau nimittam tad agrahaṇe katham tad saṃjñā pravṛttiḥ iti ced nanu gavayatvam api tatas eva vākyāt pratipadyate 
[420,18]	yathā citra lekhā ādi ākṛtim pradarśya kaścid vyutpādayati itthaṃbhūtaḥ uṣṭraḥ itthaṃbhūtaḥ gajaḥ iti yat vā grīvā ādi parimāṇa viśeṣa abhidhānena uṣṭram danta ādi parimāṇa viśeṣa abhidhānena gajam ca vyutpādayati vyutpādyamānaḥ tu tadā vākyāt eva uṣṭra tva c aja tve api pratipadyate na hi grīvā danta ādi viśeṣa dvāreṇa uṣṭra gaja ādi saṃjñā vyutpādane tad vyutpattiḥ na bhavati pramāṇa antaram vā tatra sambhavati 
[420,24]	nanu vākyāt upaplutā pratipattiḥ āsīt upamānāt tu saṃjñi viśeṣa avacchedena vyavasthitā bhavati iti kaḥ ayam upaplavaḥ na tāvat bhrāntiḥ kāla antara ādiṣu abādhyamāna tvāt na api saṃśayaḥ sthāṇu puruṣa vat vikalpa ātmaka tvān anubhavāt go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti asyāḥ pratīteḥ sandeha tve viparyaya tve vā tad mūla upamānasya api tathā tva prasaṅgaḥ pramāṇa tve ca asyāḥ katham upaplavaḥ saṃjñi viśeṣa aniṣṭa tvam upaplavaḥ iti ced na ātma antaḥkaraṇa aṇu dharma adharma ādi pratīteḥ upapluta tva prasaṅgāt na hi tatra api ayam ātmā idam manaḥ ayam aṇuḥ ayam dharmaḥ iti evaṃprakārā pratītiḥ anumānāt āgamāt vā bhavati kim tarhi yatra icchā ādayaḥ samavetāḥ saḥ ātmā yatas yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ tat manoḥ yatas alpataram na asti sa paramāṇuḥ iti evaṃprakārā pratītiḥ bhavati tathā ca asyāḥ pratīteḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ yena ubhayoḥ upapluta tvam anupapluta tvam vā na ucyate 
[421,13]	nanu yatra go sādṛśyam asti sa gavayaḥ tasya gavaya saṃjñā vā iti evam saṅkete kṛte mā bhūt upamānam pramāṇa antaram yadā tu yādṛśaḥ gauḥ tādṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti vākyam tadā tatas sādṛśya mātram pratipannam na saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ tena tad artham upamānam iṣyate yadi vākyan na sambandhaḥ pratipannaḥ anarthakam tarhi vākyam sādṛśya mātram hi go smṛti sahitena aśruta vākyaḥ api cakṣuṣā pratipadyate na ca tatas sambandha pratītiḥ tasmāt yādṛśaḥ gauḥ tādṛśaḥ gavayaḥ tādṛśaḥ gavaya saṃjñakaḥ tādṛśasya gavaya saṃjñā iti eke eva arthaḥ pratīyate yathā icchā ādi liṅgaḥ ātmā icchā ādi liṅgasya ātma saṃjñā iti evamādi vākyaiḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ eva vyutpādyate anyathā gauḥ ayam iti evam saṅkete kṛte asya go śabdaḥ saṃjñā iti pratipattiḥ atra pramāṇa antaram vācyam samāna nyāya tvāt 
[421,25^1]	syāt etat asya gavaya śabdaḥ saṃjñā iti viśeṣa pratipattiḥ na pūrvam vākyāt utpannā iti tad artham upamānam iṣyate evam tarhi gauḥ ayam iti evam vākyāt anyaḥ api evambhūtaḥ gauḥ iti pratipattiḥ na jātā iti tatra api pramāṇa antaram vācyam kim ca piṇḍa antare asya go śabdaḥ saṃjñā iti pratītiḥ na pūrva vākyāt utpannā iti pratipiṇḍam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratipatti artham pramāṇa antaram vaktavyam tathā śabdān abhidhāne api pratipādaka pratipatroḥ evam eva abhiprāyaḥ īdṛśasya sarvasya go śabdaḥ saṃjñā iti sāmarthyāt tu evam pratipattiḥ iti ced samānam etat atra api go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti śabdāt ubhayoḥ evam abhiprāyaḥ go sadṛśasya arthasya gavaya śabdaḥ saṃjñā iti sāmarthyāt tu evam pratipattiḥ iti loke hi prastāva viśeṣāt anyathā abhiprāye api anyathā uktiḥ dṛśyate yathā viṣam bhuṅkṣva mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣva iti 
[421,25^2]	tena anyathā uktau api pratipattuḥ vaktṛ abhiprāya avagatiḥ bhavati sāmarthyāt vā iti sāma arthyam arthāpattiḥ yādṛśaḥ gauḥ tādṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti ukte arthāt āpadyate go sadṛśasya gavaya saṃjñā iti pratibhā vā sāmarthya śabdena uktāḥ atha vohaḥ śaktiḥ vā tena gauḥ ayam iti saṅkete api sarvasya go jātīya saṃjñā pratipadyate gavaya saṃjñā ca go sādṛśya viśiṣṭasya yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti abhidhāne api iti 
[422,20]	yadi upamānam na pramāṇa antaram tatas pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni iti atra sūtram kim artham pṛthak uktam na eṣa doṣaḥ pramāṇa nigraha sthānābhyām dṛṣṭānta hetu ābhāsa ādīnām iva prayojana vaśena pṛthak abhidhānāt vibhāga sūtram eva nyūna adhika saṃkhyā vyavaccheda artham na daṇḍaka sūtram iti ced na prāk eva ghrāṇa ādi sūtreṇa vyabhicāritva pratipādanāt trividham pramāṇam iti atra 
[422,26]	jāti nigraha sthāna vibhāga sūtrayoḥ ca na caturviṃśati saṃkhyā niyamaḥ asti iti uktam tasmāt yathā jātīnām kāsāṃcid pṛthak abhāve api ukti bhedena sammohaḥ mā bhūt iti etad artham tad dūṣaṇa prakāra vyutpatti artham ca pṛthak abhidhānam tathā upamānasya prayojana vaśena pṛthak abhidhānam tat tarhi prayojanam vācyam tat ucyate śabda prāmāṇya samarthanam prayojanam 
[423,11]	parikṣāyām mantra āyurveda sūtreṇa na karma kartṛ tva sādhana vaiguṇyāt ityādinā ca śabda prāmāṇya samarthanam kṛtam na ca tatra upamānasya upayogaḥ śrūyate iti na tatra anṛta tva ādi doṣa parihāreṇa śabda viśeṣasya prāmāṇyam samarthitam upamānasya pṛthak abhidhānena tu anyathā ākṣepa parihāreṇa śabda prāmāṇyam samarthyate katham 
[423,17]	kecid āhuḥ pratyakṣa anumāna viṣaya tve śabdasya anuvādaka tvam eva na prāmāṇyam tad aviṣaya tve ca sambandha agrahaṇāt avācaka tvam tathā hi padārthasya pratyakṣa anumānābhyām aprasiddha tvāt na padena sambandha grahaṇam śabdena ced padārtha prasiddhiḥ kim tena eva pada antareṇa vā yadi tena eva tadā itaretara āśraya tva prasaṅgaḥ pada antareṇa api padārtha prasiddhau tulyaḥ doṣaḥ anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ ca atha vākya arthe pada vacanāt vākyena artham abhidhāya tatra padam saṅketyate 
[423,23]	tat api ayuktam yasmāt vākya arthaḥ tu prasiddha arthānām padānām anvaya mātram prasiddhāḥ ca te arthāḥ ca prasiddhārthāḥ te eva padyante iti padāni teṣām anvaya mātram vākya sthārthaḥ atha vā prasiddhāḥ arthāḥ yeṣām tāni prasiddhārthāni padyante ebhiḥ iti padāni teṣām anvaya mātram vākyam eva arthaḥ vākya arthaḥ vākyāt api na aprasiddhaḥ arthaḥ pratipattum śakyate iti anvaya mātram iti uktam tasmāt na śabdasya prāmāṇyam iti evam kaiścid ākṣepe kṛte 
[423,30]	tad nirākaraṇa artham upamānam nidarśana artha tvena pṛthak uktam yathā kārya arthinaḥ aprasiddha gavayasya prasiddham go sādṛśyam upādāya upamāna ākhyena vākyena saṃjña saṃjñi sambandha pratipattiḥ kriyate tathā kiṃcid nimittam upādāya śakra ādi pada padārthayoḥ api iti na ca dṛṣṭe api anupapanna tā nāma dṛśyate hi pratyakṣa ādi aprasiddhe api arthe sādṛśya ādi nimittam upādāya vākyena pada sambandha apratītiḥ kriyamāṇā tasmāt na apratyakṣa ādya viṣaya tve śabdasya avācaka tvena prāmāṇyam pratyakṣa numāna viṣaya tve api na anuvādaka tvāt aprāmāṇyam samplava pratipādanāt prakaraṇa ādi apekṣasya viśiṣṭa artha pratipādaka tvāt ca tathā ca etat vākya vicāre prapañcitam tasmāt anya artham upamānasya uddeśa sūtre pṛthak abhidhānam atas na sūtra virodhaḥ 
[424,13_424,18]	pṛthak upadiṣṭasya api alakṣitasya sa prayojana tvam antarbhāvaḥ vā sukhena jñātum na śakyate iti atas lakṣaṇam api uktam prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam iti prasiddhāt prajñātāt sādharmyāt nimittāt yat vākyam niṣpadyate yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti ādikam tat eva sādhya sādhanam upamānam sādhyasya saṃjña saṃjñi sambandhasya sādhanam jñāpakam atha vā saṃjña saṃjñi sambandha viṣaya jñānam sādhyam tasya sādhanam niṣpādakam vākyam upamānam evam ca lakṣaṇa sūtrāt api na śabda vyatiriktam upamānam pratīyate na ca evam vyākhyāne doṣaḥ asti yena anyathā vyākhyānam kriyate loke api hi upamīyate anena iti upamānam vākyam eva prasiddham 
[424,23]	parīkṣātaḥ api etat vyākhyānam niścīyate tathā hi pūrva pakṣa sūtram tāvat atyanta prāya eka deśa sādharmyāt upamāna asiddhiḥ atyanta sādharmyāt tāvat na upamānam sidhyati na hi bhavati yathā gauḥ tathā gauḥ iti prāya sādharmyāt api asiddhiḥ na hi bhavati yathā anaṅvān evam mahiṣaḥ iti eka deśa sādharmyāt api asiddhiḥ na hi sarveṇa sarvam upamīyate iti 
[424,28^1]	atra uttara sūtram prasiddha sādharmyāt upamāna asiddheḥ yathā ukta doṣa anupapattiḥ yadi atyanta prāya eka deśa sādharmyāt upamānasya asiddhiḥ tadā anyathā siddhiḥ vācyā atha anyathā api asiddhiḥ tadā upamāna siddhiḥ eva iti vācyam tat api dṛṣṭi viruddham prasiddha sādharmyāt upamāna siddheḥ sarvathā api dṛṣṭa tvāt tatra atyanta sādharmyāt tad kriyayā eva tad kriyā antaram upamīyate yathā rāma rāvaṇayoḥ yuddham rāma rāvaṇayoḥ iva iti prāyas sādharmyāt api gavā gavayasya upamānam mahiṣasya tu avayava racana ādi sādharmyam tat aprasiddham tena na tasya upamānam 
[424,28^2]	yasya tu rūpeṇa balena vā sādharmyam prasiddham tasya bhavati eva upamānam yādṛś rūpī yādṛś balī vā ayam gauḥ tādṛśaḥ asau mahiṣaḥ iti eka deśa sādharmyāt api yathā rūpa mātra jijñāsāyām yādṛśaḥ sarṣapaḥ tādṛśaḥ meruḥ iti tasmāt atyanta prāya eka deśa sādharmyāt upamāna asiddhiḥ iti anupanannaḥ ayam doṣaḥ tat evam parīkṣātaḥ api śabda viśeṣaḥ eva upamānam iti gamyate yadi evam śabda parīkṣātaḥ asya pṛthak parīkṣā na yuktā na antarbhāve api artha apatti abhāvayoḥ pṛthak parīkṣā kāraṇāt pramāṇasya sataḥ pramāṇe antar bhāva jñāpanam pṛthak parīkṣāyāḥ prayojanam pṛthak uddeśe asya prayojanam uktam tat api aparīkṣitasya na upapadyate atas ca na ayuktā pṛthak parīkṣā api 
[425,17^1]	antarbhāvaḥ tu anumānaḥ eva asya pratiṣiddhaḥ na tu āgame antarbhāva pratiṣedhaḥ yathā śrutaḥ api asti tathā ca pūrva pakṣa sūtram upamānam anumānam pratyakṣeṇa apratyakṣa siddheḥ yathā pratyakṣeṇa dhūmena apratyakṣasya agneḥ siddhiḥ tathā pratyakṣeṇa gavā pratyakṣasya gavayasya siddhiḥ tasmāt anumānam eva upamānam atra pratisamādhāna sūtram kaṇṭha uktam na asti abhiprāyataḥ tu asti yatas tat abhiprāyam āśaṅkate paraḥ para artham upamānam iti ced yat avinābhauvi tvena parokṣa artha sādhakam tat anumānam uktam na ca upamānam pakṣa dharma tva ādi balena pravartate kin tu āpta prāmāṇya balena prasiddha ubhayoḥ prasiddha ubhayasya parasya prati iti artham tad prasiddha sādharmyam upādāya upamānam pravartayati iti evam ced manyase evam sūtrakāra abhiprāyam āśaṅkya paraḥ pratiṣedham āha na svayam api asya adhyavasāyāt 
[425,17^2]	vaktuḥ api upamāna vākyāt adhyavasāyaḥ bhavati eva tasmāt na para artham eva upamānam atra api ca udyasya asāra tām manyamānaḥ sūtrakṛt na kiṃcid api uktavān na hi vaktuḥ adhyavasāyaḥ na bhavati iti ucyate kin tu tasya tat upamānam na bhavati tad arthasya tena anyatas eva pratipanna tvāt na ca asau ātma pratipatti artham vākyam uccārayati kin tu para artham eva nanu anumāna vākyam api para artham eva uccāryate tatas tena saha upamānasya aviśeṣaḥ iti āha tathā iti upasaṃhārāt upamāna siddheḥ na aviśeṣaḥ upamānam hi yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti evam eva upasaṃhriyate na tu anumāna vat atra pakṣa dharma tva ādi api ucyate na ca anumānam yathā dhūmaḥ tathā agniḥ iti evam pravartate tasmāt na para artha anumānena api upamānasya aviśeṣaḥ tat evam āgama viśeṣaḥ eva upamānam parīkṣā sūtrebhyaḥ api pratīyate 
[426,18]	catuṣṭva parīkṣā virodhaḥ iti ced na pañcatva ādi āśaṅkā nirākaraṇa artha tvāt tathā ca na catuṣṭvam aitihya arthāpatti sambhāva prāmāṇyāt iti anena ādhikyam eva pūrva pakṣitam tasya eva ca pratiṣedham āha śabda aitihya anartha antara bhāvāt anumāne arthāpatti sambhava abhāva anartha antara bhāvāt ca apratiṣedhaḥ iti yathā indriya pañcatva parīkṣāyām nyūna tvam eva pratiṣiddham iti ādhikya abhyupagamaḥ pramāṇa siddha tvāt na virudhyate tathā pramāṇānām ādhikyam eva pratiṣiddham atas tritva abhyupagamaḥ pramāṇa siddha tvāt na virudhyate catuṣṭvavyavahāraḥ api padārtha ṣoḍaśa tva indriya pañcatva jāti caturviṃśati tva ādi vyavahāra vat draṣṭavyaḥ 
[426,26^1]	nanu yadi sūtrakārasya śabde antarbhūtam upamānam vivakṣitam tadā kimartham aitihya vat antarbhāvaḥ na abhihitaḥ tritvam vā pramāṇānām kim na kvacid uktam na asya sūtrakārasya evaṃsvabhāva tvāt yat siddhāntam api kvacid na abhidhatte śiṣyāṇām ūhā ādi śakti atiśaya yuktānām eva pradhānataḥ atra adhikāraḥ iti jñāpana artham yathā indriyāṇām ṣaṭtvam na uktam atha ca tad abhipretam tathā ca ādimattva ādīnām hetūnām ghaṭa abhāva sāmānya nitya tvāt ityādinā vyabhicāre kṛte bhāṣya kāraḥ svayam parihāram abhidhāya kasmāt punar sūtrakārasya asmin arthe sūtram na śrūyate iti anuyujya idam āha śīlam idam asya bhagavataḥ sūtrakārasya bahuṣu adhikaraṇeṣu dvau pakṣau na sthāpayati śāstra siddhāntāt tattvam pratipattum arhati iti manyate 
[426,26^2]	śāstra asiddhāntaḥ nyāya samākhyātam artha gatam bahu śākham anumānam iti tathā vidyā avidyā dvaividhyāt saṃśayaḥ tad asaṃśayaḥ pūrva hetu prasiddha tvāt iti abhidhāya kṛtsna eka deśa āvṛtti tvāt ityādinā avayavi ādikam nirākṛtasya sūtrakāraḥ tad samarthana artham sūtram na uktavān na ca etāvatā avayavi ādeḥ asiddhiḥ pradīpa sthānīyāni ca pramāṇāni ādau yatnena pratipādayan netat jñāpayati anuktam api ebhiḥ parīkṣya pratipattavyam iti yadi punar sūtra uktam ājñā siddham eva grāhyam iti tadā parīkṣām na kuryāt tasmāt sūtra uktam api parīkṣya pratipattavyam parīkṣitam ca yathopamānasya pramāṇa antara tvam na sambhavati iti tasmāt sthitam etat upamānam śabde antarbhūtam iti 
[427,22]	arthāpatteḥ api anumāne antarbhāvaḥ avinā abhāva balena artha pratipatti sādhana tvāt 
[427,24_428,1]	kā iyam arthāpattiḥ pramāṇa ṣaṭka vijñātaḥ yatra arthaḥ anyathā abhavan apūrvam kalpayet artham sārtha āpattiḥ udāhṛtā tatra agni sambandhāt anantaram visphoṭa ādi kāryam pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate tat anyathā anupapattyā agneḥ dāhikā śakti pratipattiḥ pratyakṣa pūrvikā artha āpattiḥ sāmānye anumite tat anyathā anupapattyā viśeṣa pratipattiḥ anumāna pūrvikā arthāpattiḥ śabdena ca sāmānye avagate tat anyathā anupapattyā viśeṣa pratipattiḥ śabda pūrvikā arthāpattiḥ upamānena viśiṣṭa go pratipattau tad anyathā anupapattyā vāha doha ādi sāmarthya pratipattiḥ upamāna pūrvikā arthāpattiḥ rūpa jñānāni atha anupapattyā cakṣuṣi pratipanne tat anyathā anupapattyā jñāna janana śakti pratipattiḥ arthāpatti pūrvikā arthāpattiḥ jīvataḥ puṃsaḥ gṛhe abhāvānyathā anupapattyā bahirbhāva pratipattiḥ abhāva pūrvikā arthāpattiḥ iti
