[428,10]	atra āhuḥ saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ agneḥ dāhikā śaktiḥ sā ca pratyakṣeṇa eva gṛhyate tatra artha āpattiḥ anarthikā anumāna pūrvikā ca arthāpattiḥ prāk eva nirastā tadvatoḥ eva avinābhāvaḥ gṛhyate iti atra tadvatas śabda artha samarthane śabda pūrvikā api ayukta upanyastā upamānasya apramāṇa antara tve tad pūrvikā api ayuktā tathā abhāva pūrvikā api abhāvasya vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena pramāṇa antara tva anupapatteḥ 
[428,15]	bahirbhāva pratipattiḥ kutas iti ced anumānāt tathā hi bahis deśe tiṣṭhati devadattaḥ jīvana sambandhi tve sati gṛhe anupalabhyamāna tvāt tad anya paridṛṣṭa puruṣa vat jīvana sambandhi tva asiddhau ca arthāpattiḥ api na syāt tathā ekatra sthitasya puṃsaḥ anyatra abhāva pratipādikā api arthāpattiḥ anumānam eva tathā hi vivāda viṣayāḥ sarve deśāḥ devadatta śūnyāḥ deva datta avaṣṭabdha deśa vyatirikta tvāt tad sannihita deśa vat devadatta avaṣṭabdhāḥ te deśāḥ tad sannihita deśa vyatirikta deśa tvāt iti pratyanumānam iti ced na idam sādhīyaḥ candra ādi deśena anaikāntika tvāt avisaṃvādi vacana bādhita tvāt ca tathā ayam devadattaḥ rātri bhojī divā bhojana rasāyana ādi siddhi rahita tve sati pīna tvāt ubhaya pratipanna nakta bhoji vat viśeṣaṇā siddhau ca arthāpatteḥ api anupapattiḥ cakṣuṣaḥ tad jñāna janana śakti pratipattiḥ anumita anumānam kriyā tvena karaṇa anumānam karaṇa tvena śakti anumānam iti nanu ca śaktiḥ kvacid api na pratyakṣā tat uktam 
[429,2]	śaktayaḥ sarva bhāvānām kārya arthāpatti gocarāḥ iti anumānena eva avinābhāva siddhau anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt na śakti pratipattiḥ ānumānikī iti yadi avinā abhāvena śaktiḥ na gṛhyate tadā arthāpattyā api sā piśāca ādi vat katham gamyate yatas anyathā na upapadyate iti ukte sati eva upapadyate iti labhyate ayam eva ca avinābhāvaḥ anvaya vyatireka rūpa tvāt na hi evam upapatti anavagame anyathā anupapattiḥ avagantum śakyate tat ubhaya avagame ca gṛhītaḥ avinābhāvaḥ iti 
[429,9^1]	yatra sāmānya ākāreṇa api anvaya grahaṇam na asti tatra artha āpattiḥ pramāṇa antaram iti ced na udāharaṇa abhāvāt nanu śaktiḥ eva udāharaṇam na śakteḥ saṃyoga ādi rūpa tvena kvacid pratyakṣa tvāt tathā hi yadi avyatirikta agni ādeḥ dāha ādi śaktiḥ tadā agni ādi pratyakṣa tvāt eva tad pratyakṣa tvam avyatireka virodhaḥ vā atha vyatiriktā sā dāha ādi hetuḥ vā na vā yadi na hetuḥ katham sā dāhāt anyathā anupapattyā avagamyate atiprasaṅgāt atha tad hetuḥ sā kim kevalā agni ādi sahitāḥ vā kevalā ced nanu agni ādīnām ahetu tvam syāt tatas ca viparītā eva hetu kalpanā syāt 
[429,9^2]	atha agni ādi sahitā nanu evam sahakāri kāraṇam eva śaktiḥ sahakāri kāraṇam ca sarvam atīndriyam atha na sarvam sahakāri kāraṇam śaktiḥ kim tu viśiṣṭam kaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ yadi ajahat vṛtti tvam tadā agni tva ādi sāmānyam auṣṇya ādi guṇaḥ vā śaktiḥ carama tvam viśeṣaḥ evam api saṃyoga ādeḥ anyā na śaktiḥ kim ca śakti śabda vācya sahakāriṇaḥ śaktiḥ asti vā na vā yadi na asti avyatiriktā vā asti tadā agni ādeḥ api anyā śaktiḥ na vācyā tulya nyāya tvāt atha śakteḥ api anyā asti śaktiḥ na tarhi caramam eva sahakāri śaktiḥ caramasya carama antara abhāvāt tasmāt anyaḥ anyam kārakāṇām saha kāri bhāva vat śakti bhāvaḥ api draṣṭavyaḥ iti 
[429,25_430,9]	nanu ca mantra ādi pratibandhāt agni saṃyoge sati api na dāha ādi kāryam dṛśyate tasmāt na sāmānya saṃyoga ādi sahakāri kāraṇam śaktiḥ iti tad anya śakti pakṣe api kasmāt na dāha ādi kāryam bhavati śakteḥ pratibaddha tvāt iti ced na sāmānyāt saṃyoga ādi śakti pakṣe api samānaḥ pratibandhaḥ tad pratibaddha tvam tarhi śakteḥ kāryānyathā anupapattim antareṇa katham gamyate na hi sarvasya daiva manuṣyasya mantra dhyāna oṣadhi prayogasya pratibandhakasya abhāvaḥ sarva vidā adhyakṣeṇa kvacid avagantum śakyate kim ca janaka tvam api mukhyam kāraṇasya sākalyam tat ca atīndriya tvāt na kvacid dṛṣṭam iti anumānataḥ api na gṛhyate tasmāt mukhya kāraṇa tva apratibaddha śaktyoḥ pratipattiḥ arthāpattitaḥ eva iti na tasyāḥ api kevala vyatireki anumānāt avyatirekāt yatra hi sādhya viśeṣeṇa anvaya dṛṣṭānta aprasiddhau vipakṣa bādhaka pramāṇena vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ samarthyate tatra vyatireki anumānam uktam asti ca etat rūpam atra api tathā hi yadi sarvathā api apratibaddha śaktikaḥ agniḥ na syāt tadā dāha ādi kāryam na kuryāt śakti pratibandha kārya kartṛ tvayoḥ virodhāt mantra ādi anyatamena api pratibandhe kārya akartṛ tva darśanāt virodha avagamaḥ 
[430,20]	śakteḥ ca yogyatā ākhyāyāḥ eva pratibandhaḥ na tu caramāyāḥ kāraka sākalyam hi caramā śaktiḥ na ca tasyāḥ pratibandhaḥ sambhavati anantaram eva kārya upapatteḥ anutpattau vā na sākalyam pratibandha abhāvaḥ api hi kāraṇam sa ca pratibandhe sati na asti iti katham sākalyam tasmāt yogyatā ākhyāyāḥ eva śakteḥ pratibandhaḥ sambhavati tena ca kārya utpatteḥ virodhaḥ iti kārya utpattiḥ vyatireka balena pratibandhaka abhāvam gamayati tathā eka kāraka vaikalye api kārya utpatti adarśanāt sāmastye sati kāraṇa tvam gamyate yad abhāve api kāryam utpadyate tad kāraṇam eva na bhavati yat ca kāraṇam tad vaikalye api katham kāryam bhavet iti atas kārya utpatti vyatireka balena sva hetu sāmastyam gamayati tasmāt na kevala vyatirekitaḥ arthāpattiḥ bhidyate arthāpattiḥ kevala vyatirekī iti saṃjñā bheda mātram anvaya abhāvāt na tadā anumānam iti ced na kevala anvayinaḥ api vyatireka abhāvena pramāṇa antara tva prasaṅgāt 
[431,7]	api ca avinā abhava balena artha pratipādaka tvam anumāna lakṣaṇam uktam tena ca arthāpattiḥ saṃgṛhītā katham pramāṇa antaram anvaya dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ tu avāntara vaidharmya mātram tāvatā eva pramāṇa antara tve pratyakṣa ādi bhedānām api avāntara vaidharmyam asti iti pramāṇa antara tva prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt avinā abhāva balena artha pratipādaka tvāt arthāpattiḥ api anumānam iti sthitam 
[431,13]	sambhavaḥ api avinā abhāva balena artha pratipādaka tvāt anumānam eva droṇa pūraṇa kṣamasya āḍhaka pūrṇa kṣamatva pratipattiḥ sambhavaḥ sahasra ādi saṃkhyā viṣayasya ca eka dvi tri ādi saṃkhyā viṣaya tva pratipattiḥ ca katham atra avinābhāvaḥ su alpa samāhāra rūpa tvāt prabhūtasya su alpa abhāve prabhūta anupapatteḥ iti 
[431,18_431,24]	abhāvasya tu triṣu api yathāsambhavam antarbhāvaḥ tathā hi kaurava ādīnām sadbhāva pratipatti vat abhāva pratipattiḥ api āgama bhāva abhāva anuvidhāyinī dṛśyate tatra pramāṇa antara kalpanā anupapannā ātma ādiṣu ca rūpa ādi abhāva pratipattiḥ ca anumānāt tathā jala phala ādīnām pātena guru tva pratibandhaka abhāvaḥ anumīyate tathā anupalabdhi prabheda udāharaṇeṣu abhāva anumānam draṣṭavyam bhū tala ādiṣu ghaṭa abhāva pratipattiḥ pratyakṣāt kara tala ādi pratipatti vat akṣa vyāpāra bhāva abhāva anuvidhāyi tvāt nanu anyatra tad bhāva bhāvi tvam paryavasitam yasmāt uktam gṛhītvā vastu sadbhāvam smṛtvā ca pratiyoginam mānasam na astita ajñānam jāyate akṣa anapekṣayā 
[431,28]	vastu garahaṇa abhāva jñānayoḥ āśu bhāvi tvena kramaḥ na lakṣyate vṛkṣa ādi kampa darśana anila anumānayoḥ iva iti na pramāṇa abhāvāt vastu grahaṇāt anantaram na asti iti anakṣa jam jñānam bhavati iti atra na pramāṇam kiṃcid asti vacana mātreṇa rūpa ādi pratyakṣa tva pratiṣedhaḥ api syāt tatra api evam śakyate vaktum rūpa ādīnām āśraya grahaṇe sattā rūpa tva ādi grahaṇe vā akṣa vyāpāraḥ paryavasitaḥ iti akṣa anapekṣam eva rūpa ādi jñānam bhavati iti atha rūpa ādi jñānasya sākṣāt akṣaja tve api bādhakam na asti cakṣuṣā rūpam paśyāmi ityādi pratīteḥ ca akṣaja tvam iṣṭam yadi evam abhāva jñānasya api akṣaja tve bādhakam na kiṃcid asti pratītiḥ api asti cakṣuṣā eva paśyāmi atra ghaṭaḥ na asti iti 
[432,14^1]	sambandha abhāvaḥ atra bādhakaḥ iti ced syāt etat sambaddham hi indriyam artha grāhakam bhavati na ca abhāvena saha indriyasya sambandhaḥ kaścid asti na hi abhāvasya saṃyogaḥ samavāyaḥ vā asti tad abhāvāt saṃyukta samavāya ādayaḥ api na sambhavanti tasmāt na akṣajam abhāva jñānam iti na etat asti sva para pakṣayoḥ asiddha tvāt tvad pakṣe tāvat na saṃyogaḥ samavāyaḥ vā kasyacid asti cakṣuḥ ādīnām tu sva arthaiḥ saha yogyatā ākhyaḥ eva sambandhaḥ iṣṭaḥ sa ca akṣaja anubhavān yatha anupapattyā avagamyate akṣa ja anubhavaḥ ca bhū tala ghaṭa abhāvayoḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ tena bhū talasya eva ghaṭa abhāvasya api indriyeṇa saha yogyatā ākhyaḥ sambandha siddhaḥ iti mad pakṣe api saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāva ādiḥ abhāva indriyayoḥ sambandhaḥ pratyakṣa paricchede darśitaḥ 
[432,14^2]	saṃyoga samavāya ādi rahitasya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva anupapattiḥ iti ced na ayam niyamaḥ tvayā abhyupagataḥ na api mayā iti atas svatantra prasaṅga sādhanayoḥ api anupapattiḥ saṃyoga ādi sambandha abhāve api hi viśiṣṭa pratyaya vaśena viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ iṣyate anyathā gomān itya ādi pratyayaḥ na syāt gomataḥ tarhi indriyeṇa saṃyoge vyavahite viprakṛṣṭe api gavi saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvāt upalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ iti na idam sādhīyaḥ kāryam hi dṛṣṭvā kāraṇa śaktiḥ niścīyate na ca yasya ekatra śaktiḥ aśaktiḥ vā tasya sarvatra śaktiḥ aśaktiḥ vā iti nyāyaḥ asti na hi yathā cakṣuḥ aṅguli mātra saṃyoge sati saṃyukta samavāya ādi sambandhāt rūpa tva ādi jñānam bhavati tathā hasta śarīra jñānam api iti vicitra śaktayaḥ hi padārthāḥ kasyacid kvacid śaktiḥ iti 
[433,2]	vivikta lakṣaṇa abhāvāt ca na abhāvaḥ pramāṇa antaram yathā hi pratyakṣa anumāna āgamānām anyaḥ anya vyavacchedakam lakṣaṇam uktam na tathā abhāvasya pratyakṣa ādibhyaḥ vyāvartakam lakṣaṇam asti 
[433,6^1]	na na asti yasmāt uktam pramāṇa pañcakam yatra vastu rūpe na jāyate vastu sattā avabodha artham tatra abhāva pramāṇa tā iti sa tarhi pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvaḥ kena avagamyate yadi prameya abhāvena tadā itaretara āśraya tva prasaṅgaḥ prameya abhāvaḥ yāvat na siddhaḥ tāvat na pramāna pañcaka abhāvaḥ sidhyati yāvat ca na tad siddhiḥ tāvat na prameya abhāva siddhiḥ iti pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvaḥ api anyena pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvena pratīyate saḥ api tarhi pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvaḥ ayena pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvena pratipattavyaḥ saḥ api anyena iti anavasthā atha indriya vat ajñātaḥ eva pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvaḥ prameya abhāva paricchedakaḥ iṣyate na matta mūrcchā ādi avasthāyām api paricchedaka tva prasaṅgāt vastu grahaṇa pratiyogi smṛti apekṣa tvāt aprasaṅgaḥ iti ced na anumāna āgamābhyām api deśe viśeṣa mātra grahaṇe tatra ghaṭa ādi smṛtau ca tad abhāva pratīti prasaṅgāt 
[433,6^2]	cakṣuṣā ca dūrāt gṛha ādi grahaṇe tatra smaryamāṇānām maṇi ratna auṣadha ādīnām rasa ādi viśeṣāṇām ca abhāva niścaya prasaṅgāt tvac indriyeṇa api andhakāre gṛha ādi mātra grahaṇe tatra satām smaryamāṇānām dravya viśeṣāṇām ca asattva niścaya prasaṅgāt deśa sannidhi indriya viśeṣa āloka ādi apekṣaṇe ca pratyakṣam eva abhāva paricchedakam astu tāvatī hi sāmagrī pratyakṣasya eva dṛṣṭā tad abhāve api yadi liṅga vat abhāvasya sāmarthyam kvacid upalabdham syāt tadā yuktam tasya pramāṇa antara tvam tathā hi yatas kutaścid pramāṇāt dhetu ādi grahaṇe anumānam pravartate tathā yatas kutaścid pramāṇāt bhū tala ādi grahaṇe yadi tatra dravya viśeṣasya rūpa ādi ciśeṣasya ca abhāvaḥ pratīyeta syāt abhāvasya pramāṇa antara tvam pṛthak sāmarthyān avadhāraṇe hi pramāṇān atara tve ati prasaṅgaḥ syāt 
[433,28]	yat ca atra uktam bhū tala ādikam dṛṣṭvā deśa antaram gataḥ pratiyoginam apūrvam yadā paśyati tad abhāvam tadā eva pratipadyate ayam padārthaḥ tatra pradeśe na asti iti tat ayuktam pradeśa upalambha kāle eva abhāvasya upalabdha tvāt pratiyogi darśane ca tad saṃskāra pratibodhāt smṛtiḥ eva bhavati na hi katham jānāsi iti anuyuktaḥ pramāṇa pañcaka abhāvena jānāmi iti abhidhatte kim tarhi smarāmi aham na ayam tatra āsīt iti na ayam dṛṣṭaḥ tadā iti ca anusmṛtiḥ na ayam dṛṣṭaḥ asya abhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti ekaḥ arthaḥ tathā hi pradeśa mātra smṛtau pratiyogi darśane api sandehaḥ eva bhavati dṛṣṭaḥ eva asau deśaḥ kim tu ayam mayā na nirīkṣitaḥ kim tatra asti na asti iti 
[434,9]	syāt etat pratiyogi vivikta vastu grahaṇam apekṣya abhāvaḥ pramāṇam bhavati atas pratiyogi vivikta tva apratītau vastu mātra grahaṇe api abhāva niścayaḥ tatra na bhavati iti sa tarhi vivekaḥ kena gṛhyate yadi pratyakṣeṇa tatas katham pratyakṣena abhāvaḥ na gṛhyate vivekasya abhāva lakṣaṇa tvāt abhāvena eva grahaṇe tu itaretara āśraya prasaṅgaḥ tathā hi yāvat na viveka grahaṇam tāvat na abhāvaḥ pramāṇam yāvat na abhāvaḥ pramāṇam tāvat na viveka grahaṇam iti 
[434,15]	nirvikalpaka pratyakṣeṇa abhāva grahaṇam iṣyate sa vikalpakena kaḥ aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yatas tena grahaṇam na iṣyate pratiyogi jñānam vinā na yuktam sa vikalpakam iti ced satyam tathā api nirvikalpa kena aśeṣa abhāva grahaṇe sati paścāt yadā yasya pratiyogi smṛti ādi sahakārī sampadyate tadā tasya sa vikalpakam grahaṇam bhavati eva iti 
[434,19]	deśa antare tarhi paścāt apūrva pratiyogi grahaṇe katham tad abhāvasya āsat nihita deśasya sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam smṛtiḥ api na yuktā tad sambandha tvena prāk ananubhūta tvāt na hi śuddham gām dṛṣṭvā anyatra tad svāminam paśyan asya gām aham dṛṣṭavān iti smartum arhati iti na mānasa pratyakṣeṇa tad sambandhi tvena abhāvasya prāk eva gṛhīta tvāt etat ca viśiṣṭa smṛti anyathā anupapattyā avagamyate vyāpti grahaṇa vat etasmāt tad adhikam sthūlam ityādi grahaṇāt ca atha vā paścāt eva abhāvasya tad sambandhi tvam gṛhṇāti na ca tad abhāvasya tadānīm asannihita tvena apratyakṣa tvam pratiyogi samīpe api tad abhāvasya sattvāt go tva ādi vat bheda abhāvāt ca tatas ca yathā go tvam pūrvam piṇḍa antara aviśiṣṭam eva dṛṣṭvā paścāt piṇḍa antare tad viśiṣṭam dṛṣṭvā prathama piṇḍe api tad viśiṣṭa tvena anusmarati etat sārūpyam tatra aham adrākṣam iti tathā pratiyogi avacchedena tad samīpa stham tad abhāvam gṛhītvā anyatra upalabdham api tad avacchedena eva anusmarati ayam padārthaḥ tatra na āsīt iti tasmāt na abhāvaḥ pramāṇam pṛthak asti iti 
[435,8]	anirdiṣṭa pravaktṛkam pravāda pāramparyam aitihyam pramāṇam kaiścid iṣṭam yathā iha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati iti tat ca yadi avitatham tadā śabde antarbhūtam yadi nāma prayojana abhāvāt āpta nirdeśaḥ atra na asti na etāvatā asya śabda rūpa tā nivartate iti 
[435,12]	anye tu ceṣṭā ākhyam pramāṇam icchanti kā punar iyam ceṣṭā iti prayatna janitā śarīra tad avayavānām kriyā ceṣṭā sā nāṭya śāstra prasiddha samaya balena loka kṛta samaya balena ca puruṣa abhiprāya viśeṣam artha viśeṣam ca pratipādayantī pramāṇam iṣyate tathā ca āgamāt na bhidyate tad lakṣaṇa yogi tvāt aśabda ātmaka tve na pramāṇa antara tve lipi akṣarāṇām api pramāṇa antara tva prasaṅgaḥ samāna nyāya tvāt avinābhauvi tvena prayatna ādi pratipādaka tve tu anumāna tvam ceṣṭāyāḥ draṣṭavyam iti tat evam vyavasthitam etat trīṇi eva pramāṇāni 
[435,20]	tatas kim na hi etāvatā eva apavarga siddhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ khalu kasyacid vastunaḥ heyasya upādeyasya vā tad sādhanasya vā adhigamāt niḥśreyasam iṣyate tat ca kecid pradhāna ādikam manyante apare nairātmya ādikam iti evamādi vipratipatteḥ sandihānaḥ praśnayati kim punar ebhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ pramātavyam iti ucyate prameyam pradhāna ādeḥ tu pramāṇa viṣaya tvam eva na asti atas tad viṣayam jñānam bhrānta tvāt na niḥśreyasa sādhanam 
[436,10]	kim lakṣaṇam iti praśna anupapattiḥ pramā viṣayaḥ prameyam iti ukta tvāt na prameya viśeṣa viṣaya tvāt praśnasya daṇḍaka sūtre prameya padena yasya uddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ tasya idānīm lakṣaṇam vaktavyam tat ucyate yat viṣayam tattva jñānam anya jñāna anupayogi tvena eva niḥśreyasa aṅgam bhavati mithyājñānam ca saṃsāram pratanoti tat prameyam tat eva tattvataḥ jñātavyam sarvadā bhāvitavyam ca na tu kīṭa saṃkhyā ādi api prameyam teṣām jñānasya niḥśreyasa anupayogi tvāt tat caturvidham heyam tasya nirvartakam hānam ātyantikam tasya upāyaḥ iti 
[437,2]	nanu ca dvādaśadhā sūtre prameyam vibhaktam tathā ca ātma indriya śarīra indriya artha buddhi manaḥ pravṛtti doṣa pretya bhāva phala duḥkha apavargāḥ tu prameyam iti sūtram tuśabdaḥ viśeṣaṇe asti anyat api prameyam kim tu ayam viśiṣṭa prameyasya nirdeśaḥ iti arthaḥ tasya lakṣaṇataḥ api dvādaśavidha tvam gamyate dvādaśānām lakṣaṇa abhidhānāt 
[437,8]	tatra ātma lakṣaṇam icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha jñāna ādi ātma liṅgam iti yathā vā icchā ādīnām ātma liṅga tvam tathā uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ liṅgam api tad lakṣaṇam bhavati asādhāraṇa tvāt mukta ātmanām avyāpaka tvāt alakṣaṇam iti ced na prāk eva vicārita tvāt dravya kriyāvat tva vat icchā ādeḥ api avyāpaka tvam dūṣaṇam yathā bhavati yathā na bhavati ca tathā prāk eva vicāritam 
[437,14]	ceṣṭa indriya artha āśrayaḥ śarīram kriyā viśeṣe ceṣṭā śabdaḥ loke api rūḍhaḥ adhāvati a alaṅghate a ityādi vat sā ceṣṭā yatra antyāvayavini samavetā tat śarīram indriya āśraya tvam na indriya samavāyi tvam kim tu tad upaghāta anugrahābhyām indriyāṇām tathā abhāvaḥ tena indriya āśraya tvam śarīrasya artha āśraya tvam api tasmin sati eva tad avacchinne ca ātma pradeśe sarve arthāḥ sukha duḥkha ādikam janayati iti 
[437,21]	ghrāṇa rasana cakṣuḥ tvac śrotrāṇi indriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ iti viśeṣa uddeśa artham viśeṣa lakṣaṇa artham ca sūtram sāmānya lakṣaṇam tu na uktam paribhāṣātaḥ api indriya śabda pravṛtteḥ svayam vohyam tatra jighratī anena iti ghrāṇam rasayati anena iti rasanam caṣṭe anena iti cakṣuḥ spṛśati anena iti sparśanam tat ca sthāna nimitta tvāt tvac iti upacaryate vyavahāra artham śṛṇoti anena iti śrotram evam ca atra viśeṣa lakṣaṇa arthāni pañca sūtrāṇi viśeṣa uddeśa artham ca ekam iti ṣaṣ sūtrī draṣṭavyā 
[438,1]	bhūtebhyaḥ iti āhaṃkārika tva pratiṣedha artham ahaṃkāraḥ api bhūta śabda vācyaḥ tasya ca triguṇa tvāt bahuvacanam api iti āśaṅkya āha pṛthivyāḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti bhūtāni tatra caturṇām indriya kāraṇa tvam ākāśasya tu viśiṣṭa pradeśasya indriya svabhāva tva jñāpana artham iti tattvam upacaryate yat vā karṇa śaṣkulī saṃyoga apekṣayā karaṇa tvam tena bhūtebhyaḥ iti nimitta pañcamī na virudhyate na hi eka prakṛti tve vyavasthita viṣaya tvam upapādayitum śakyate dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt nānā prakṛti tve tu pradīpa ādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ prāk uktaḥ tasmāt bhautikāni pañca bāhya indriyāṇi 
[438,10]	gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabdāḥ pṛthivī ādi guṇāḥ tad arthāḥ tad artha tvam eva atra arthānām lakṣaṇam pṛthivī ādayaḥ ca guṇāḥ ca iti arthānām vibhāgaḥ sarvasya āśritasya viśeṣaṇasya ca atra guṇa grahaṇena saṃgrahaḥ tatas ca bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ vā yaḥ kaścid indriya viṣayaḥ sa sarvaḥ api arthaḥ iti dehasya ca ceṣṭā ādi āśraya tvena bhoga āyatana tvena śarīra tvam indriya viṣaya tvena ca artha tvam draṣṭavyam 
[439,4]	gandha ādīnām tu pṛthak vacanam prādhānyena doṣa nimitta tva jñāpana artham yathā higandha ādīnām ekaikaśas api doṣa nimitta tvam na tathā anyeṣām dravya guṇa ādīnām gandha ādi upakṛtānām doṣa janane sāmarthyam asti tathā hi gandha upakṛteṣu puṣpa vṛkṣa ādiṣu rāga dveṣa ādayaḥ rasa upakṛteṣu āhāra viśeṣeṣu rūpa upakṛteṣu nṛtya stana mahat tva keśa ba hutva ādiṣu sparśa upakṛteṣu śayana ādiṣu śabda upakṛteṣu vaṃśa ādiṣu rati ādīnām ca pañca upakṛta tvam catusraya dvaya upakṛta tvam vā yathāsambhavam draṣṭavyam tathā iṣṭa viyoga ādeḥ abhāvasya api smṛti āropita rūpa ādi upalakṣitasya doṣa nimitta tvam iti evam ca doṣa nimittam rūpa ādayaḥ viṣayāḥ saṅkalpa kṛtāḥ tad nimittam tu avayavi abhimānaḥ iti etayoḥ sūtrayoḥ api avirodhaḥ iti 
[439,14]	buddhiḥ upalabdhiḥ jñānam iti anartha antaram pradhānasya ādyaḥ pariṇāmaḥ buddhiḥ puṃsaḥ pratibimba udaya lakṣaṇaḥ bhogaḥ upalabdhiḥ viṣaya ākāreṇa buddheḥ pariṇāmaḥ jñānam iti asya darśanasya nirākaraṇa artham paryāyaḥ api lakṣaṇam uktam pratītiḥ avagamaḥ vijñānam ityādi śabdānām api artha bheda kalpanāyām kim vaktavyam tatra api etat eva uttaram paryāya śabdaḥ eva ete iti sā ca iyam buddhiḥ doṣa nimittebhyaḥ prasaṃkhyānena nivartitāḥ apavarga hetuḥ anivartitā ca saṃsāra hetuḥ api evam jñātavyā 
[439,22^1]	yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ manasaḥ liṅgam atīndriyasya anyathā lakṣayitum aśakya tvāt ātma vat manasaḥ api liṅgam lakṣaṇam uktam ghrāṇa ādeḥ api gandha ādi jñānam liṅgam eva lakṣaṇam iti ātmā tāvat vyāpaka tvāt sarvaiḥ indriyaiḥ sambaddhaḥ indriyāṇi api anidrasya prekṣaṇa ādi avasare taiḥ taiḥ arthaiḥ sambaddhāni tathā api gandha ādi jñānāni yugapad na utpadyante vyāsaṅga darśanāt tatra yasya sannidheḥ asannidheḥ ca jñānasya utpattiḥ anutpattiḥ ca tat manaḥ 
[439,22^2]	prayogaḥ ca atra ātma indriya artha ādayaḥ krama saṃyogi sahakārī antara apekṣāḥ sannihitānām api krama kārya utpādaka tvāt vastra upakṣipta citra utpādakāḥ iva varṇaka ādayaḥ manasaḥ liṅgam iti asamāsa abhidhānāt liṅga antaram api sūtram sukha ādayaḥ indriya paricchedyāḥ pratyakṣa saṃvedya tvāt rūpa ādi vat bāhya indriyāṇām sāmarthya anupalabdheḥ sukha ādi paricchedakam yat indriyam tat manaḥ iti smṛti anumāna āgama saṃśaya ādi jñānānām ca karaṇa pūrvaka tvam indriya pūrvaka tvam vā sādhyate jñāna tvāt cakṣuḥ ādi janita jñāna ādi vat icchā ādeḥ api kriyā tvāt karaṇa pūrva tva siddhau pariśeṣāt manaḥ siddhim icchati yat vākṣaja tvam icchā ādīnām api sādhyam ātma viśeṣa guṇa tvena hetunā 
[440,10]	yadi manaḥ api indriyam tatas kim artham pṛthak uktam sarva artha tva abhautika tva ādi vaidharmyāt iti eke apare tu āha manaḥ mūla tvāt sarva indriyāṇām pravṛtteḥ tad jayāt eva sarva indriya jaya siddhiḥ atas manaḥ jaye mumukṣuṇā atiyatnaḥ kartavyaḥ iti jñāpana artham manaḥ pṛthak uktam iti 
[440,15]	pravṛttiḥ vāc buddhi śarīra ārambhaḥ vācikaḥ mānasaḥ kāyikaḥ ca vyāpāraḥ pravṛttiḥ iti arthaḥ manaḥ atra buddhi śabdena uktam karaṇa vyutpattyā sā ca iyam trividhā api vihita pratiṣiddha bhedena dvividhā pravṛtteḥ puṇyam pāpam phalam tad bhedaḥ ca sūkṣmaḥ parisaṃkhyātum na śakyate sthūlaḥ ca dharma śāstreṣu darśitaḥ iti 
[440,20]	pravartanā lakṣaṇāḥ doṣāḥ vihite pratiṣiddhe ce puruṣam pravartayanti iti pravartanāḥ rāga dveṣa mohāḥ tad lakṣaṇāḥ tad svabhāvāḥ iti arthaḥ anye tu varṇayanti pravartanā pravṛtti hetu tvam rāga ādi gataḥ dharmaḥ sva saṃvedyaḥ tad lakṣaṇam cihnam yeṣām tathā uktāḥ sarvathā api rāga ādayaḥ eva doṣāḥ ucyate tat trairāśyam rāga dveṣa moha artha antara bhāvāt iti vacanāt gamyate 
[441,2]	punar utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ pūrva upāttam śarīra ādikam hitvā punar śarīra ādi antara prāptiḥ ātmanaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ mṛtvā punar janma iti arthaḥ punar iti anādyā na kadācid ādyā yātmanaḥ utpattiḥ śarīra ādi sambandha viśeṣa lakṣaṇā sā sarvā punar bhavati na kadācid prathamā iti arthaḥ tasmāt anādiḥ ayam pretyabhāvaḥ paryavasānam api apavargam vinā asya na asti iti etajñāpana artham janma maraṇa duḥkha atiśaya bhāvanā artham ca deha akṣābhyām pretyabhāvaḥ pṛthak upadiṣṭaḥ 
[441,9]	pravṛtti doṣa janitaḥ arthaḥ phalam pravṛttiḥ doṣaḥ ca pūrva uktāḥ taiḥ kiṃcid vyavadhānena janitaḥ arthaḥ prayojanam phalam dvividham hi prayojanam heyam upādeyam ca tatra heyam mukhya gauṇa bheda bhinnam aneka prakāram duḥkham upādeyam tu aviduṣām mukhya gauṇa bheda bhinnam mukham viduṣām tu sarvam heyam sukhasya api duḥkha hetu tvena pratipādanāt tathā ca sarva duḥkham vivekinaḥ iti adhyātma vidaḥ tatra sukha duḥkhayoḥ sva karma upārjita tvena sama tā bhāvanā artham phalam duḥkhāt pṛthak upadiṣṭam 
[441,16]	bādhanā lakṣaṇam duḥkham bādhanā lakṣaṇam bādhana asvabhāvam mukhyam duḥkham gauṇa apekṣayā tu bādhanā lakṣaṇam yasya śarīra ādeḥ tat tathā uktam bādhanā pīḍā santāpaḥ iti arthaḥ 
[441,20]	tad atyanta vimokṣaḥ apavargaḥ tasmāt mukhya gauṇa bheda bhinnāt duḥkhāt atyanta vimokṣaḥ satatam vicchinna tā ātmanaḥ apavargaḥ iti tat evam lakṣaṇa bhedāt api dvādaśavidham prameyam uktam na tu caturvidham iti 
[441,25]	satyam dvādaśavidham uktam kim tu tad dvādaśavidham api heya ādi rūpena caturdhā bhāvyamānam niḥśreyasa nimittam bhavati iti atas caturvidham uktam sūtrakāraḥ tu nyāya prāptam cāturvidhyam iti manyamānaḥ sākṣāt na uktavān na hi heya ādi rūpā niścaye śarīra ādiṣu ahaṃkāra nivṛttiḥ vairāgya utpādana dvāreṇa tat atyanta vimokṣaḥ apavargaḥ sambhavati caturvarga antarbhūta tvāt ca dvādaśavidhasya api 
[442,5_442,10]	yadi evam cāturvidhyam eva sūtra kṛtā kasmāt na uktam na para mata niṣedha artha tvāt tatra sāṃkhyānām matam heyam duḥkham rajaḥ vṛtti ātmakam draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ saṃyogaḥ heya hetuḥ tasya hetuḥ avidyā tad abhāvāt saṃyoga abhāvaḥ hānam tad dṛśaḥ kaivalyam viveka khyātiḥ aviplavāḥ hāna upāyaḥ iti śākyānām ca duḥkham samudayaḥ virodhaḥ mārga ākhyam catur ārya satyam jñānam mukti artham iṣṭam tatra duḥkham saṃsāriṇaḥ skandhā rūpam saṃjñā vedanā vijñānam saṃskāraḥ iti pañca skandhāḥ tatra bhūta bhautika samudāyaḥ rūpam iti vacanāt rasa ādiḥ api rūpa skandhaḥ ucyate yena arthaḥ abhilapyate saḥ abhilāpaḥ sukha duḥkha ādiḥ vedanā bodha ākāraḥ vijñānam śubha ādi va āsanā saṃskāraḥ iti eṣām saṃsāri tvam duḥkha svabhāva tvam ca prapañcena śākyaiḥ samarthitam grantha atigaurava bhayāt na iha ucyate tasya hetuḥ samudayaḥ śarīra indriya sthāna ādiṣu ātma ātmīya abhiniveśa jāgraha lakṣaṇā tṛṣṇā pradhānam nimittam samudayaḥ vitṛṣṇasya hi avidyā karma ādi upanīteṣu api rajata rājya ādiṣu apravṛtteḥ sarva duḥkha hānam nirodhaḥ tasya upāyaḥ nairātmya jñānam mārgam iti tat evam para mate api heya ādi catuṣṭaya jñānam mukti nimittam iṣṭam tad mata niṣedha artham ātma ādi bheda upanyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ 
[442,22^1]	tatra ātma jñāne sati para loka ākāṅkṣā bhāvati na anyathā iti vakṣyāmaḥ tad vyatirikta deha jñāne ca tatra ātma buddhiḥ nivartate tatas tad artham hiṃsā ādikam na karoti duḥkha āyatanam ca pratipadya tatra agrahaḥ nivartate satsu api doṣa nimitteṣu indriyāṇām apravṛttau na doṣa utpattiḥ tad pravṛttau vā avaśyam doṣa utpattiḥ iti evam indriya svarūpam jñātvā tad pratyāhāra artham yatate yatamānaḥ tad artheṣu vipāka phala vat pariṇāma duḥkha hetu tvena avagateṣu upādeya buddhim tyaktvā vairāgyam bhāvayati mithyā tattva buddhīnām ca saṃsāra apavarga hetu tvam jñātvā mithyā buddhīḥ parisaṃkhyānena tirobhāvya tattva buddhim abhyāsena puṣṇāti manasaḥ tu pṛthak parigrahe prayojanam prāk eva uktam 
[442,22^2]	pravṛttīḥ ca dharma adharma ādi janana dvāreṇa duḥkha mūlam jñātvā pariharati na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya kṣīṇa kleśasya iti evam doṣa svarūpam jñātvā tad kṣaye atiyatnam karoti pretyabhāva phalayoḥ parijñāne prayojanam uktam duḥkham ca bhāvanā artham jñātavyam brahma ādi stamba antam viśvam sarvam duḥkha anuviddham jñātvā tatra virajyate viṣa anuviddha madhu ādiṣu iva apavargam ca anuttamam anantam ati nirmalam sarva duḥkha uparamam jñātvā tad artham eva yatate tat evam dvādaśa prakāreṣu api tattva jñāna bhāvanā ca upayujyate iti atas api dvādaśadhā prameyam uktam saṅkṣepa bhāvanā artham ca tasya cāturvidhyam ucyate 
[443,17]	tatra heyam duḥkham anāgatam atītam hi prahīṇa tvāt na heyam vartamānam api upabhoga prāpta tvāt aśakya hānam upabhogena tu hīyate atas eva tattva vidaḥ anāgatam eva duḥkham manyante na vartamānam na hi vartamānam ādhyātmika ādi duḥkham hiṃsā ādi rahitena śuddhena mārgeṇa parihartum śakyate ahiṃsā ādi krameṇa ca pariharataḥ anantam eva āgāmi duḥkham pariharanti anāgata duḥkha parihāre ca viśiṣṭaḥ eva upāyaḥ asti sa ca duḥkha sūtre pradarśitaḥ pradarśayiṣyate ca agratas tasmāt anāgatam eva duḥkham hātavyam 
[443,25]	tat ca duḥkham ekaviṃśati prakāram śarīram ṣaṣ indriyāṇi ṣaṣ viṣayāḥ ṣaṣ buddhayaḥ sukham duḥkham ca iti viṣayā katham ṣat iti ced ucyate ghrāṇa ādīnām pañcānām gandha ādayaḥ pañca viṣayāḥ prādhānyena uktāḥ ṣaṣṭham indriyam manaḥ tena saṃvedyamānaḥ yaḥ sukhasya duḥkhyasya ca hetuḥ bhavati sa ṣaṣṭhaḥ viṣayaḥ kaḥ asau sukha duḥkha ṣaṣ buddhi vyatiriktaḥ iti ced smṛti saṅkalpau iti eke nidrā ālasya ādiḥ iti anye kāma ādeḥ sva avacchinna ātma pradeśe sukha duḥkha ādi janaka tvam vā ceṣṭa indriya artha āśraya tvam vā iti indriyāṇi viṣayāḥ tad buddhayaḥ ca duḥkha sādhana tvena eva duḥkham iti ucyate 
[444,5_444,8]	sukham tu duḥkha anuṣaṅgāt duḥkham avinā bhāva tvam anuṣaṅga arthaḥ sukham bhoktu kāmina avaśyam duḥkham bhoktavyam duḥkham ca jihāsata avaśyam sukham hātavyam viveka hānasya aśakya tvāt iti anye tu āhuḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ parasparam janya janaka bhāvaḥ asti yathā hi kṣudh pipāsā ādi duḥkham vinā anna pāna āditas sukham na bhavati iti kṣudh ādi duḥkhasya api sukha hetu tvam tathā śarīra indriya viṣaya viśeṣeṣu sneha sukham vinā tad viyogataḥ tad virodhi saṃsargataḥ vā duḥkham na bhavati iti sukhasya api duḥkha sādhana tvam tatas viṣayāt artha antaram na vācyam 
[444,13]	na etat asti khaṅga prahāra ādibhyaḥ sukha abhāve api duḥkha utpatteḥ kim ca yathā viṣayaḥ anubhūyamānaḥ eva duḥkha hetuḥ na tathā sukham kim tu sukha apagamāt duḥkham anubhūyate atas eva sukha prāptau duḥkham na bhaviṣyati iti sarva saṃsāriṇām bhrāntiḥ vipāka phala upabhoga sukha vat sarvasya api viṣaya upabhoga sukhasya pariṇāme ati tīvra duḥkha hetu tvāt atas sarveṣu sukha tad sādhaneṣu āsakti pratiṣedha artham duḥkha tad sādhaneṣu dveṣa pratiṣedha artham ca ubhayoḥ sama tā bhāvanā artham sukham api duḥkham eva iti uktam duḥkham bādhana āpīḍā santāpa ātmakam mukhyatas eva duḥkham iti 
[444,21]	tasya ekaviṃśati prakārasya api duḥkhasya nirvartakam asādhāraṇam kāraṇam avidyā tṛṣṇe dharma adharmau iti 
[444,24]	tatra samyak adhyātma vidbhiḥ pradarśitasya arthasya viparīta jñānam avidyā tad saṃskāraḥ api avidyā eva ucyate ātmānam adhikṛtya yat vartate śarīra ādi apavarga paryantam tat adhyātmam tat ye tattvataḥ vivecayanti te samyak adhyātma vidaḥ taiḥ pradarśitam asthi sthūṇam snāyu yutam māṃsa śoṇita lepanam carma avanaddham durgandhi pūrṇam mūtra purīṣayoḥ jarā śoka samāviṣṭam roga āyatanam āturam rajasvalam anityam ca bhūtāvāsam imam tyajet iti evamādi rāga andhānām tu tad viparīta jñānam amṛtasya iva kuṇḍāni sukhānām iva rāśayaḥ rateḥ iva nidhānāni yoṣitaḥ kena nirmitāḥ iti evamādi evam ātma ādiṣu apavarga anteṣu rāga dveṣa mohaiḥ andhīkṛtānām viparīta jñānam draṣṭavyam duḥkha sūtre ca kiṃcid udāhṛtam tat iha avidyā iti uktam 
[445,9_445,16]	punarbhava prārthanā tṛṣṇā yathā viṣa saṃpṛkteṣu anna pāna viśeṣeṣu asaṃpṛkta adhyavasāye api para sveṣu apara sva adhyavasāye api vitṛṣṇaḥ na pravartate saḥ apravartamānaḥ na anarthena yujyate tṛṣṇā grastaḥ tu jānan api pravartate saḥ anarthena api yujyate tathā śarīra indriya ādiṣu yasya āgrahaḥ asti sa janmāntaram api prārthayamānaḥ tathā pravartate yathā asau punar bhavitum kaiḥ iṣṭa aniṣṭa sthāna śarīra indriya ādibhiḥ yujyate vitṛṣṇasya tu yadi kvacid kathaṃcid mohaḥ api bhavati tathā api asau vaitṛṣṇyāt apravartamānaḥ saṃsāram na adhigacchati iti atas tṛṣṇā api duḥkha kāraṇam avidyā tarhi asamartha iti ced na vitṛṣṇasya api aviduṣaḥ pravartamānasya api sarpa ādi duḥkha parihāra āsāmarthya vat anyatra api asāmarthyāt na vitṛṣṇaḥ api niścalī sthātum śaktaḥ prāṇi dharma tvāt āvaśyake api karmaṇi vidvān vivecya hiṃsā ādi parihāra dvāreṇa pravartamānaḥ anāgatam duḥkham na prāpnoti 
[445,21]	kim ca duḥkha sūtra ukta nyāyāt teṣām mohaḥ pāpīyān na amūḍhasya itara utpatteḥ iti sūtrāt ca niścitam pradhānam duḥkha nimittam avidyā iti avidyā tṛṣṇayoḥ nivṛttau api śīta vāta dharma sannipāta ādibhyaḥ duḥkha utpattiḥ dṛṣṭā iti atas dharma adharmayoḥ api duḥkha kāraṇa tvam niścīyate nanu ca dharmaḥ sukhasya asādhāraṇaḥ hetuḥ katham duḥkhasya kāraṇam iti na sukhasya api duḥkha tvena ukta tvāt yaḥ ca ayam śarīra indriya viṣaya ādi sampādana dvāreṇa sukha hetuḥ dharmaḥ saḥ atra duḥkha kāraṇa tvena uktaḥ tasya kiṃcid vyavadhānena mahataḥ duḥkhasya hetu tvāt yaḥ tu śuddhaiḥ īśvara bhakti yoga aṅga ādi sādhanaiḥ akāmita phalaiḥ janitaḥ tattva jñāna śama santoṣa sukha hetuḥ sa na duḥkhasya vyavadhānena api hetuḥ niḥśreyasa hetuḥ eva asau tathā ca tad artham yama niyamābhyām ātma saṃskāraḥ yogāt ca adhyātma vidyu pāyaiḥ iti uktam 
[446,7]	hānam duḥkha vicchedaḥ dharma adharma artha kāma vaidya śāstraiḥ uktānām upāyānām anuṣṭhāne api ādhyātmika ādi duḥkha viccheda ākhyam hānam bhavati iti tad vyavaccheda artham ātyantika grahaṇam na hi brahma loka ādi prāptasya api ātyantikam duḥkha hānam asti dharma kṣayāt āvṛtti śravaṇāt anyaḥ anya abhibhava vyāghāta ādi śravaṇāt ca apavarga prāptasya tu duḥkha hetoḥ avidyā tṛṣṇā ādeḥ atyanta ucchedāt na kadācid kathaṃcid duḥkha sambandhaḥ iti 
[446,13]	tasya ātyantika duḥkha hānasya upāyaḥ tattva jñānam tad upāya tve ca uktaḥ eva nyāyaḥ duḥkha sūtre kim viṣayam tattva jñānam apavarga nimittam ātma viṣayam nanu dvādaśa prameya viṣayam uktam satyam kim tu ātmanaḥ prādhānya jñāpana artham ātma viṣayam iti uktam atas eva ādau sa nirdiṣṭaḥ 
[446,18]	sa ca nitya vyāpaka acala nirmala svabhāvaḥ api śarīra ādibhiḥ daśabhiḥ yogāt jāyate mriyate pradeśa sthaḥ pravartate nirvartate rāgī dviṣṭaḥ mūḍhaḥ duḥkhī iti evam nikṛṣṭa rūpeṇa ābhāti yadā tu evam doṣa yuktāni śarīra ādīni duḥkha antāni bhāvanayā eva santi ajya ātma jñāna eka ratiḥ bhavati tadā svena eva nitya tva ādi rūpeṇa prakāśamānaḥ apavargam prāpya atyanta nirmalaḥ sva ātmani eva tiṣṭhati iti atas apavargaḥ ante abhihitaḥ tatas param hātavya prāptavyābhāvāt sarva vyāpāra nivṛtteḥ iti vede api ātmā eva ati prayatnena jñātavyaḥ iti upadiśyate tathā ca uktam ātmā vāre draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyaḥ mantavyaḥ nididhyāsitavyaḥ śrotavyaḥ śruti vākyebhyaḥ mantavyaḥ ca upapattibhiḥ matvā ca satatam dhyeyaḥ ete darśana hetavaḥ iti tathā tarati śokam ātma vid iti 
[447,6]	sa dvividhaḥ paraḥ ca aparaḥ ca ubhau api etau mumukṣuṇā jñātavyau tathā ca uktam dve brahmaṇī veditavye param ca aparam ca ityādi 
[447,11]	tatra paramātmā bhagavān maheśvaraḥ tasya lakṣaṇam parama aiśvarya viśiṣṭa tvam saṃsāra dharmaiḥ rāga dveṣa moha duḥkha ādibhiḥ anādya saṃspṛṣṭa tvam anādi sarvajña tvam sakala jagat vidhātṛ tvam ca iti katham evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ asau jñātavyaḥ iti anumānāt āgamāt ca 
[447,15]	tatra anumānam tāvat ucyate vivāda adhyāsitam upalabdhimat kāraṇam abhūtvā bhāvi tvāt vastra ādi vat iti dharmi viśeṣa anabhidhānāt sandigdhaḥ pakṣaḥ iti ced na vivāda viṣaya abhidhānena dharmi viśeṣa siddheḥ yatra dharmiṇi vivādaḥ saḥ eva pakṣaḥ iti vivādasya aneka rūpa tvāt aniścayaḥ eva iti ced na sādhya viśeṣa abhidhānena tad viśeṣa siddheḥ bhojana ādi kriyā viśeṣa vacanena brāhmaṇa ādi viśeṣa niścaya vat iti yatra eva buddhimat pūrvaka tvam vādinā abhyupagatam pareṇa na abhyupagamyate tasya eva vivāda adhyāsita śabdena abhidhānam na ākāśa ādeḥ vastra ādeḥ vā tat na abhyupagama virodhena api dṛṣṭānta asiddhiḥ iti cetana pūrvaka tvam vastra ādeḥ api asiddham cetanasya akartṛ tvāt iti ced na cetana prerita śarīra ādeḥ pravṛtteḥ cetanasya eva hi kartṛ tvam svatantraḥ hi kartā iti ucyate śarīra ādeḥ ca svātantryam na asti puruṣa abhiprāya anuvidhāyi tvāt mṛta śarīra ādeḥ kartṛ tva anupalambhāt ca 
[447,27]	vatsa ādi vivṛddhi artham acetanasya kṣira ādeḥ svātantryeṇa pravṛtti upalambhāt iti ced na sādhyena avyabhicāra abhāvāt evam hi sarvaḥ api hetuḥ vyabhicārī syāt cetanasya akartṛ tve anumānena āgamena ca virodhaḥ tathā hi loke api śāstra śilpa ādi kārya viśeṣam dṛṣṭvā jñāna viśeṣam tat kartuḥ anuminoti tad jñāna rahitānām ca akartṛ tvam eva iti āgameṣu api veda smṛti purāṇa ādiṣu jñāninaḥ eva kartṛ tvam śrūyate vidvān yajeta ityādi vacanāt dharma ādi kartṛ tvam api cetanasya eva iti nanu ca śāstra śilpa ādi kartṛ tvam jñāna icchā prayatnavataḥ acetanasya eva buddhi tattvasya na tu cetanasya iti tat idam mahā moha vijṛmbhitam yat jñānavān acetanaḥ iti yaḥ asau jñāna icchā ādīnām āśrayaḥ saḥ eva hi ātmā na tatas anyaḥ cetanaḥ asti iti vakṣyāmaḥ pratipāditam ca buddhiḥ upalabdhiḥ jñānam ityādi śabdānām paryāya tvam iti 
[448,11^1]	aparaḥ tu āha kasyacid hetu mātrasya yadi adhiṣṭhātṛtā ucyate karmabhiḥ sarva jīvānām tad siddheḥ siddha sādhanam iti idam tāvat asabaddha abhidhānam nigraha sthānam buddhimat pūrvaka tve sādhye kaḥ prastāvaḥ acetanaiḥ karmabhiḥ siddha sādhyatā udbhāvanasya buddhimat kṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ kṛtam sthāvara ādi kāryam katham na buddhimat pūrvakam iti ced na vivakṣita aparijñānāt buddhimatā hi sākṣātkṛtam buddhimat pūrvakam vivakṣitam na tu pāramparyeṇa api kṛtam buddhimat pūrvakam api hi karma yāvat na tad śaktim jñātvā vijñānavatā adhiṣṭhitam bhavati tāvat na sva kāryam karoti 
[448,11^2]	na hi buddhimat kṛtam sthālī ādi buddhimat adhiṣṭhātṛ nirapekṣam eva sva kāryam kartum śaknoti tad śarīreṇa eva anaikāntika tvāt tat śarīrasya api anya buddhimat kāraṇa tve vā anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na īśvarasya śarīra astitve pramāṇa abhāvāt na ca apramāṇakasya śarīrasya asiddhau tasya api asiddhiḥ atiprasaṅgāt kartṛ tvena eva śarīra yogam sādhayataḥ apasiddhānta prasaṅgaḥ kartṛ tvasya tvayā aniṣṭa tvāt prasaṅga sādhanam api ayuktam prasaṅgasya mūla anumāna bādhita tvāt āśraya asiddha tvāt ca 
[448,25]	nanu aśarīrasya mukta ātma vat vyāpāraḥ eva na asti nirvyāpārasya ca kartṛ tvam ayuktam mukta ātmanaḥ vā kartṛ ta prasaṅgaḥ kaḥ ayam vyāpāraḥ yadi utkṣepaṇa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ saḥ amūrta tvāt na kasyacid ātmanaḥ asti iti sarvasya ātmanaḥ akartṛ tva prasaṅgaḥ śarīrasya eva hi mukhyam utkṣepaṇa ādi karma tathā ca kartṛ tvam api śarīrasya eva mukhyam syāt na ātmanaḥ tatas ca anya kṛtam karma anyena upalabhya bhujyate iti syāt tatas sāṃkhya śāstra ādi mata anupraveśaḥ syāt dhātu artha lakṣaṇaḥ ced vyāpāraḥ saḥ aśarīrasya api ākāśa ādeḥ asti iti mukta ātmanām tu na karma ādi kṛtā asti śaktiḥ na api svābhāvikī iti akartṛ tvam parameśvarasya tu svābhāvikī śaktiḥ uttama aiśvarya lakṣaṇa asti tena tasya kartṛ tvam tathābhūtā ca śaktiḥ kārya viśeṣaiḥ vā anumīyate 
[449,9_449,14]	nanu evam viśiṣṭa kartṛ anumāne dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikalatā hetuḥ ca viruddhaḥ prasajyate iti tat uktam kumbhakāra ādi adhiṣṭhānam ghaṭa ādau yadi ca iṣyate na īśvara adhiṣṭhita tvam syāt asti ced sādhya hīna tā yathā siddhe ca dṛṣṭānte bhavet dhetoḥ viruddha tā asya arthaḥ kumbhakāra adhiṣṭhita tvam dṛṣṭānte yadi abhyupagamyate tadā īśvara adhiṣṭhita tvam na syāt tatas ca sādhya vikala tā atha īśvara adhiṣṭhita tvam api asti iti abhyupagamyate tathā api sādhya vikala tā yasmāt ubhaya sampati pattau dṛṣṭānta tvam yuktam na ca īśvara adhiṣṭhita tvam kvacid ubhayoḥ sampratipannam yena sādhya hīna tā na syāt yathā siddhe ca dṛṣṭānte na kevalam sādhya hīna tvam dṛṣṭāntasya hetoḥ api viruddha tā syāt yena yena dṛṣṭānte hetuḥ vyāptaḥ tam tam artham vyāpti balena sādhayati ghaṭa ādau ca dṛṣṭānte anīśvaraḥ śarīrī vināśī rāga ādi yogī ca kartā dṛṣṭaḥ tena sādhye api tathābhūtaḥ eva kartā prāpnoti iti 
[449,23^1]	tat etat avidita hetu dṛṣṭānta svarūpasya abhidhānam tathā hi kim śabda upātta sādhya apekṣayā sādhya hīna tva ādi doṣaḥ ucyate kim vā abhiprāya vyāpta sādhya apekṣayā iti prācīna pakṣe tāvat na sādhya hīna tva ādi dūṣaṇam na hi īśvara pūrvaka tvam sādhyam śabdena upāttam kim tarhi buddhimat mātra pūrvaka tvam sāmānyam tādṛśā ca sādhya sāmānyena vyāptiḥ prasiddhā eva iti katham sādhya hīna tva ādi avakāśaḥ atha abhiprāya vyāpta sādhya apekṣayā ucyate tadā sarva anumānānām sādhya hīna tva ādi prasaṅgaḥ sarva anumāneṣu api hi pratipatti viṣayasya artha viśeṣasya anumātra abhiprāyeṇa vyāpta tvāt na hi nirviśeṣam sāmānyam pratipatti pravṛttyoḥ viṣayaḥ tasya prāk eva siddha tvāt dāha ādya samartha tvāt ca 
[449,23^2]	na api agni mātreṇa tadvat tā sādhyate deśa kāla vyavahitena agninā tadvat tāyāḥ sādhayitum aśakya tvāt na api pradeśa mātrasya vaiphalyāt tasmāt ayam pradeśaḥ tena agninā agnimān iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ vādinaḥ tathā ca tādṛśā sādhya viśeṣeṇa sādhanasya vyāpteḥ asambhavāt apravṛttiḥ anumānasya tatas anumānāt agni arthinām deśa ādi viśeṣa ābhimukhyena pratipattiḥ pravṛttiḥ ca na syāt iti kim ca apūrva viśeṣa apratipādaka tvena anumānasya gṛhīta grāhi tvena smṛti vat aprāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ 
[449,23^3]	yaḥ ca apūrvaḥ aṃśaḥ sādhyate na tena dṛṣṭānte anvayaḥ pratīyate iti sādhya hīna tva ādi doṣa prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt abhiprāya vyāpta viśeṣa viruddha tvena sarva anumānānām aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt anumāna pramāṇa vādi tvam nivartate aprāmāṇya vādinaḥ api virodhaḥ prapañcena prāk eva uktaḥ pramāṇasya agauṇa tva ādi ityādi pūrva pakṣa dūṣaṇa avasare yat api uktam dṛṣṭānte hetuḥ yena yena vyāptaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tam tam pratipādayati iti tat api ayuktam na hi mahānasa ādau sthālī ādīnām sambandhī dṛṣṭaḥ dhūmaḥ sthālī ādikam api pratipādayati iti sthālī ādinā na niyataḥ dhūmaḥ tena tat na pratipādayati iti ced kaḥ ayam niyamaḥ 
[449,23^4]	yat api na abhāvāt anyaḥ tat na vidmaḥ atha avinābhāvaḥ eva tadā anīśvara tva ādibhiḥ api kāryatvasya niyamaḥ na asti tad pratipattiḥ api mā bhūt īśvarān i īśvara tva ādayaḥ hi kartṛ viśeṣāḥ sāmānyena ca vyāptiḥ na viśeṣeṇa na hi kāraṇa tva ādibhiḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ agniḥ dhūmasya vyāpakaḥ iti nanu ca dhūma viśeṣāt tāraṇa ādi viśeṣaḥ api tad vidā pratīyate satyam atra api kārya viśeṣeṇa kartṛ viśeṣam viśeṣya vyāpti jñaḥ pratipadyate eva viśeṣa vyāpti anabhijñaḥ tu dhūmāt api na tāraṇa ādi viśeṣam pratyeti tathā api agni mātram anuminoti 
[450,22^1]	syāt etat tāraṇa ādi viśeṣeṇa dhūma mātram na vyāptam dhūma mātrāt tāraṇa ādi viśeṣān anumāne api agni anumānam yuktam anīśvara śarīri tva ādi viśeṣeṇa tu kārya mātram vyāptam tena kārya mātrāt api anīśvara tva ādi viśeṣa apratītau kartuḥ anumānam na yuktam iti na etat asti yadi hi anīśvara tva ādi viśeṣeṇa api kārya mātram vyāptam syāt tadā yatra yatra kāryam dṛśyate tatra tatra anīśvara tva ādi viśeṣa yukta kartṛ siddhiḥ ekasya dhūma agni siddhi vat na ca etat asti na hi kṣiti ādi kāryam asmadvidhaḥ kartā janayitum śaknoti tat aśaktaḥ ca katham tad kartā vā tena anumīyate na ca dṛṣṭānte sambandha darśana mātreṇa vyāptiḥ sidhyati kāryatva anuṣṇa tva ādīnām api tathā tva prasaṅgāt 
[450,22^2]	na ca anīśvara tva ādi viśeṣa siddhau kartṛ tvasya api asiddhiḥ yuktā na hi tejasaḥ kāryatvena anuṣṇa tva asiddhau anitya tvasya api asiddhiḥ paramāṇūnām vā rūpa ādi saṃskāra samavāyi kāraṇa tvena anitya tva ādi viśeṣa asiddhau rūpa ādimattvasya api asiddhiḥ yuktā iti śarīritvā ādi viśeṣa siddhau hi abādhita viṣaya tva aṅga vikala tvāt asamarthaḥ hetuḥ na eva kartṛ mātra sādhane hetoḥ kenacid aṅgena vaikalyam asti yena tatra api asamarthaḥ hetuḥ syāt katham tarhi īśvara tva ādi viśeṣa siddhiḥ vyatireka balena saḥ eva hetuḥ pratipakṣa pratiṣedha pramāṇaiḥ upakṛtaḥ sarvajña tva ādi viśeṣa viṣaya tvena vyavatiṣṭhamānaḥ kevala vyatirekī bhavati iti uktam na hi anyathā kṣiti ādeḥ kartṛ sāmānyam sidhyati 
[451,8]	katham punar īśvara kṛta kārya viśeṣa aparijñāne api tad siddhiḥ kārya vailakṣaṇyāt yathāgaru kṛta dhūma viśeṣa aparijñāne api tṛṇa ādi kṛta dhūma viśeṣebhyaḥ vilakṣaṇam dhūmam upalabhamānaḥ tṛṇa ādibhyaḥ vilakṣaṇam iva indhanam anumāya tatra āptāt agaru saṃjñām pratyeti svayam vā saṃjñā antaram karoti tathā asmad ādi kṛta kārya viśeṣebhyaḥ vilakṣaṇam kṣiti ādi kāryam upalabhamānaḥ asmad ādhibhyaḥ vilakṣaṇam kartāram anumāya tatra āptāt īśvara saṃjñām pratyeti svayam vā saṃjñā antaram karoti iti 
[451,14]	yadi api anumātra agaru dravyam na dṛṣṭam tathā api anyena dṛṣṭam īśvaraḥ tu kena api na dṛṣṭaḥ iti ced kena api na dṛṣṭaḥ iti katham jānīṣe na hi tvam sarva prāṇinām darśanam vetsi kim ca adṛṣṭa indriya ādikena api na dṛṣṭam iti tad anumānam api na syāt na ca kriyātaḥ eva svarga naraka ādi phalam tasyāḥ kṣaṇika tvena janma antare phala ārambhe asāmarthyāt sūkṣmībhūtvā avatiṣṭate iti etat api na kenacid dṛṣṭam iti katham gamyate arthāpatteḥ ced na arthāpatteḥ anumāna antar bhāvi tvāt tathā na adhiṣṭhānam eva indriyam golakena aprāptasya candra ādeḥ grahaṇāt aprāptasya ca grāhaka tvam na asti iti uktam cakṣuḥ dṛṣṭāntena anya indriyāṇām api adhiṣṭhāna vyatireki tvam draṣṭavyam pārthiva apya ādi rūpa tvam ca indriyāṇām sādhitam atas api na adhiṣṭhānam indriyam tasmāt yathā sukha ādi liṅgena rūpa ādi upalabdhyā ca atyanta parokṣasya karma akṣa ādeḥ anumānam tathā kṣiti ādi kāryeṇa īśvarasya iti 
[451,25_452,1]	yathā ca karma akṣa ādau vyaṃjaka tva ādi dṛṣṭānta dharmaḥ na āpādyate tathā īśvare api dṛṣṭānta dharmaḥ anīśvara tva ādiḥ na āpādanīyaḥ utkarṣa ādi prasaṅgasya viśeṣa viruddhānām ca sarva anumāneṣu samāna tvāt na taiḥ anumānasya vighātaḥ sarva anumāna aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt syāt etat yadi sarva anumāneṣu utkarṣa apakarṣābhyām viśeṣa viruddhaiḥ ca sādhya viśeṣaḥ pratikṣipyate tadā karmendriya agni ādi viśeṣa abhāve sati sukha duḥkha rūpa ādi upalabdhi dhūma ādi viśeṣaḥ na upapadyate atra tu sarvajña tva ādi viśeṣa nirākaraṇe kim na upapadyate yena tat pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ syāt kṣiti ādi kāryam eva atra na upapadyate na hi ākasmikam kāryam sambhavati nityam sattvam asattvam ca ityādi ukta tvāt na api acetanebhyaḥ eva hetubhyaḥ kārya utpādaḥ acetanānām svatas pravṛtti asambhavāt svabhāvena hi pravṛttau anuparama prasaṅgaḥ tantu ādīnām api svatas pravṛtti prasaṅgaḥ ca viśeṣa abhāvāt 
[452,6]	karmāṇaḥ api acetana tvāt na svatas pravṛttiḥ na api pravartaka tvam na hi acetanaḥ hetuḥ cetanānām adhiṣṭhātā kaścid aviśeṣāt adṛṣṭa tvāt ca adhiṣṭhātuḥ acetana tve ca nirabhiprāya vyāpāra tvāt tad adhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ ghuṇa ādi pada vinyāsa vat na deśa ādi niyata svabhāvam kāryam upapadyate na hi sthāvara jaṅgameṣu avayava viśeṣāṇām bāhyānām ābhyantarāṇām ca niyata aniyata jātīyeṣu niyata aniyatām eva racanām buddhi viśeṣeṇa niyamitaḥ cetanaḥ hetuḥ kartum śaknoti buddhimat adhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ eva hi citra lekhā ādi upādāna upakaraṇebhyaḥ sthāvara jaṅgama jāti viśeṣa ākṛtiṣu avayava racanā viśeṣa niyama upalabdhiḥ tathā ca vivāda adhyāsitāni upādāna upakaraṇāni buddhimat adhiṣṭhitāni eva kāryam kurvanti acetana tvāt citra ādi upādāna upakaraṇa vat iti 
[452,16]	bhoktrā eva adhiṣṭhita tvāt siddhaḥ sādhyate iti ced na śarīra utpatteḥ prāktasya acetana tvāt asvatantra tvāt ca na hi garbha ādi duḥkha prāpti artham kvacid ātmanaḥ śarīra ādikam karoti yadā api tasya caitanyam svātantryam ca bhavati tat api na tad rasa maladhā tu adṛṣṭa ādi viṣayam jñānam adṛṣṭa ādi śaktim api hi jñātvā pravartamānasya icchā vighātaḥ kvacid api na syāt 
[452,21]	na ca ayam sva śarīre api asthi majjā śukra śoṇita ādīnām tad saṃcāraṇāya nāḍī viśeṣāṇām ca yathā hi sanniveśam kartum jānāti na api pratidinam śarīra upacaya artham rasa mala dhātu bhāvena āhāram pācayitvā rasa ādīn pṛthak pṛthak kṛtvā nāḍī viśeṣaiḥ yathāsthānam saṃcārayitum śaknoti etena pitroḥ api kartṛ tvam niṣiddham na hi tad viṣaya jñāna icchā prayatna abhāve api tad kartṛ tvam yuktam sarvasya sarva kartṛ tva prasaṅgāt sati bhāva mātreṇa api kartṛ tve vyoma ādeḥ api kartṛ tva prasaṅgāt yaḥ hi jñātvā sva icchayā upādāna upakaraṇāni prayuṅkte saḥ eva loke śāstre ca svatantraḥ kartā iti prasiddhaḥ tad buddhi icchā prayatna niyamitānām eva upādāna ādīnām svayam acetanānām apratiniyata sanniveśa ādi hetu tvam yujyate na anyathā mṛd piṇḍa ādīnām iva tat yaḥ asau sthāvara jaṅgameṣu antar bahis vartinām sūkṣmāṇām api upādāna ādīnām jñāna icchā prayatnaiḥ niyamayitā sa bhagavān īśvaraḥ 
[453,4]	śarīra ādi rahitaḥ api atas eva ayam śarīrī hi hasta ādinā sthāvara ādiṣu vyāpāram kurvan kulāla ādi vat pratyakṣaḥ eva syāt antar śuṣireṣu ca ati sūkṣmeṣu hasta ādeḥ anavakāśāt rasa ādi saṃcāraṇam na syāt tatas ca rūpa parivarta avayava vṛddhi puṣṭi ādikam na syāt duḥkha ādi yoge api tad abhibhavena śakti vyāghātāt sātatyena ca sthāvara ādīnām yathārtham utpatti vṛddhi ādikam na syāt iti evam ca śarīra vṛkṣa ādi kāryam api anīśvaraḥ śarīra ādi yogī ca kartum na śaknoti kim uta bhū bhūdhara ādi kāryam iti 
[453,11]	bhū bhūdhara ādeḥ ca kārya tvam sāvayava tvena pratīyate sāvayavasya nitya tva virodhāt khanana ādinā ca eka deśa vināśa darśanāt avayava vināśe api avayavi vināśaḥ iti ayuktam sarva avayavānāśe api avināśa prasaṅgāt iti yat ca uktam kulāla vat ca na etasya vyāpāraḥ yadi kalpyate acetanaḥ katham bhāvaḥ tad icchām anurudhyate 
[453,17]	yadi asya bhavataḥ kulāla ādi vat hasta ādi utkṣepaṇa ādi rūpaḥ vyāpāraḥ na asti iti kalpyate katham tarhi paramāṇu ādīnām tad vyāpārāt pravṛttiḥ tad icchā mātrāt tu na yuktā na hi kulāla icchātaḥ eva daṇḍa ādīnām pravṛttiḥ upalabhyate rājā it chātaḥ mantri prabhṛti vat iti ayuktam mantri prabhṛtayaḥ hi rājñā abhiprāyam kutaścid avagamya pravartante paramāṇu ādi bhāvaḥ tu acetanaḥ sa katham tad icchām vā iti ajānānaḥ ca katham tad icchā anuvidhānena pravartate iti 
[453,23^1]	atra ucyate kim anena ākasmikī paramāṇu ādīnām pravṛttiḥ pratipādayitum iṣṭā kim vā cetanā anadhiṣṭhita karma ādi nimittā uta deha ādimad puruṣa vyāpāra nimitta iti na tāvat ākasmikī kasyacid pravṛttiḥ deśa kāla ādi niyama abhāva prasaṅgāt na api cetanā anadhiṣṭhita karma ādi nimittā mṛd piṇḍa ādiṣu anupalambhāt acetanasya ca karma ādeḥ svatas pravṛttiḥ anya pravṛtti hetu tā ca prāk pratiṣiddhā iti śarīra ādimad puruṣa vyāpāra nimittā api sthāvara ādi upādāna ādīnām pravṛttiḥ anantaram eva pratiṣiddhā tat evam pariśeṣāt mūla anumānasya siddha tva ādi doṣa abhāvāt ca īśvara icchātaḥ eva paramāṇu ādīnām pravṛttiḥ siddhā kulālasya tu vyāhata śakti tvāt na tad icchā mātrāt daṇḍa ādīnām pravṛttiḥ 
[453,23^2]	yat ca uktam acetanaḥ katham bhāvaḥ tad icchām anurudhyate iti tat na śarīra tad avayavānām acetana tve api ātma icchā anuvidhānena pravṛtteḥ upalambhāt na hi ayam sva śarīram prerayan na ātmā śarīra antareṇa prerayati karmaṇā puruṣasya upabhogya tvena samarpitam śarīram tena tad icchā vaśena pravartate iti ced bhavatu nāma evam tathā yā acetana tvāt icchā mātrāt na paramāṇu ādeḥ pravṛttiḥ iti asya anaikāntika tvam parihṛtam yathā ca bhāvatām ayam viśeṣaḥ uktaḥ tathā asmābhiḥ api īśvara icchā lakṣaṇe viśeṣaḥ uktaḥ iti 
[454,8_454,13]	api ca viṣayaḥ api karmaṇā eva upabhogya tvena samarpitaḥ sa kim na śarīra vat icchā mātreṇa pravartate yathābhūtena karmaṇā śarīram samarpitam na tathābhūtena viṣayaḥ iti ced evam tarhi yathābhūteśvarasya icchā na tathābhūtā kulāla ādeḥ tena īśvara icchātaḥ eva paramāṇu ādeḥ pravṛttiḥ na daṇḍa ādeḥ kulāla icchā mātreṇa iti kim atra viruddham kim ca dhyāna vidaḥ kecid abhidhyāna mātreṇa dṛṣṭaka vat daṇḍa ādikam api prerayantaḥ dṛśyante tatas api paramāṇu ādeḥ īśvara icchātaḥ pravṛttiḥ na asambhāvyā śakti tāratamyam ca puruṣeṣu dṛṣṭam tena kasyacid īdṛśam sāmarthyam yat icchā mātreṇa sarva preraka tvam iti 
[454,18]	kaḥ ca ayam vādinām mohaḥ yena adṛṣṭa pūrvaka tā viśeṣe api karmaṇaḥ svātantryeṇa hetu tvam viruddham api abhyupagamyate bhagavataḥ tu aneka āgama yukti pratipāditam api na iṣyate na ca karma api cit rūpam yatas anena aham kṛtam iti jñātvā tasya eva śarīra ādi bhoga yogyam kṛtvā samarpayet na api śarīram cit rūpam yena aasya eva karmaṇā aham samarpitam a iti jñātvā bhṛtya vat icchā anurodhena pravarteta 
[454,24]	nanu ca svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti anena āgamena puruṣasya bhoktṛ tvam pratipāditam tat ca sarva karmaṇām bhoga sampādaka tvam śarīra anapekṣam na sambhavati bhogya tvam ca tad icchā anurodhi tve sati bhavati tasmāt śruta artha āpattyā sarvasya eva asya pratipādakaḥ vedaḥ kalpyate na ca paramāṇūnām īśvara icchā anurodhi tva pratipādakam pramāṇam kiṃcid asti iti 
[455,1_455,5]	tat etat ayuktam yatas svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti yena ayam niyogaḥ dattaḥ saḥ eva tad karma kāriṇam phalam dāsyati rāja ādi vat atas kṣīṇa arthāpattiḥ na karmaṇaḥ kāraṇa tvam pratipādayati samarthitam ca vedasya pauruṣeya tvam kim ca yathā karmaṇām sūkṣma rūpeṇa avasthānam apūrva utpādaka tvam vā artha āpattitaḥ śarīra ādi hetu tvam ca kalpyate tathā buddhimat adhiṣṭhita tvam api śruta arthāpattitaḥ kim na kalpyate anyathā hi acetanam karmam sva kartāram ajānat katham tasya eva phalam samarpayet tad svabhāva tve api ātma lābha anantaram eva phalam sampādayet pradīpa prakāśa vat cetana it śā pekṣi tve tu na ayam prasaṅgaḥ tad icchāyāḥ rāja ādi vat kāla niyama abhāvāt 
[455,10]	paramāṇūnām īśvara icchā anurodhi tva pratipādakam pramāṇam na asti iti etat api andha ceṣṭitam anumānasya ukta tvāt āgamasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt ca kim ca vivāda āspadībhūtāḥ paramāṇu ādayaḥ kasyacid icchā anurodhinaḥ pravṛttimat tvāt vastra ādi vat yasya icchā anurodhinaḥ sa bhagavān īśvaraḥ tasya hi svabhāvena parama aiśvarya sāmarthyāt sva śarīra kalpāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ tad icchā anuvidhānena pravartante asmad ādeḥ aiśvarya abhāvāt tad adhiṣṭhita karma vaśāt śva śarīram eva icchā anurodhi saṃjātam iti kaḥ atra virodhaḥ 
[455,15]	yat api āha pratyakṣa ādyavi saṃvādi prameya vādi yasya tu sadbhāva vāraṇe śaktam kaḥ nu tam kalpayiṣyati iti tat api ayuktam prameya tva ādeḥ sat asat ubhaya dharma tve api pratibandha asiddheḥ saddharmaḥ hi asattve sādhye viruddhaḥ eva syāt abhāva dharmaḥ tu asiddhe dharmiṇī asiddhaḥ syāt dharmiṇaḥ tu sattvena siddhau bādhita viṣayaḥ asattvena siddhau tu vyarthaḥ prameya tva ādi hetuḥ ubhaya dharmaḥ tu anaikāntikaḥ eva iti tasmāt na prameya tva ādi dharmaḥ asattvam sādhayati 
[455,24^1]	atha jagat kartṛ tva ādi dharmaḥ prameya tva ādinā pratiṣidhyate na tarhi dharmi sadbhāva vāraṇam na hi agneḥ śaitya ādi dharma pratiṣedhāt sadbhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ bhavati sāma arthyāt atra dharmi sadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti ced na āśraya asiddha tva doṣāt na hi asati dharmiṇi prameya tva ādeḥ pakṣa dharma tva siddhi s tad asiddhau ca katham gamaka tvam sva rūpeṇa api asiddham prameya tvam na hi pramāṇena apratīyamānasya īśvarasya prameya tvam yuktam pramāṇena pratītau ca katham kartṛ tva ādi niṣedhaḥ kartṛ tva ādi sādhanāt eva tad svarūpa asiddheḥ akartṛ tva ādi rūpeṇa prasiddhasya tu kartṛ tva ādi pratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ iti para abhyupagatasya dharmi tvam tasya para abhyupagamāt eva prameya tvam na asiddham iti ced sa para abhyupagamaḥ pramāṇam apramāṇam vā pramāṇam ced tena eva kartṛ tva ādi pratiṣedhaḥ bādhyate kartṛ tva ādi viśiṣṭasya eva pareṇa abhyupagata tvāt 
[455,24^2_456,16]	atha apramāṇam tatas katham na āśraya asiddha tva ādi doṣaḥ pramāṇāt prameya tva abhyupagamaḥ parasya apramāṇāt tu kartṛ tva abhyupagamaḥ iti ayam viśeṣaḥ kutas tvayā niścitaḥ para abhyupagata tva pratīteḥ ubhayatra aviśeṣāt na mayā kartṛ tva prameya tvayoḥ ekasya api siddhiḥ iṣyate kim tarhi prameya tvasya ājagat kartṛ tvena anyatra vyāpti upalabdheḥ iha api prameya tvam icchataḥ kartṛ tva prasaṅgaḥ codyate iti ced na prasaṅgasya kārya anumānena bādhita viṣaya tvāt samānam bādhita viṣa yavam iti ced na prasaṅgasya kārya anumāna anapekṣasya pakṣa dharma tva asiddhiḥ kārya anumānasya tu prasaṅgasya anapekṣasya eva pakṣa dharma tva siddhiḥ iti katham samāna tānayoḥ samāna tve ca ubhayoḥ īśvaraḥ kartā ca akartā ca prasajyate na ca etat upapādayitum śakyate kartṛ tva akartṛ tvayoḥ ekatra virodhāt kim ca evaṃbhūtaḥ prasaṅgaḥ sarva anumāneṣu api samānaḥ tathā hi cakṣuḥ ādeḥ prameya tvam icchataḥ anindriya tva ādi prasaṅgaḥ puruṣasya prameya tvam icchataḥ apara lokitvā ādi prasaṅgaḥ agneḥ prameya tvam icchate etat dhūmājanaka tva prasaṅgaḥ iti evam sarva anumāna ucchedaḥ prasajyate 
[456,21]	na ca jagat kartṛ tva ādinā saha prameya tva ādeḥ virodhaḥ kaścid asti yena prameya tva ādi abhyupagame jagat kartṛ tva ādi nivṛttiḥ prasajyate vyāpaka tva aṇu tvayoḥ iva ekatra anupalabdheḥ saha avasthiti lakṣaṇaḥ asti virodhaḥ iti ced na ubhaya pratipattim antareṇa virodhasya adhigantum aśakya tvāt koṭi yojana pramāṇa viṣāṇi tva prameya tvayoḥ iva anyatra adarśane api virodha avagatiḥ iti ced na atra api virodha asiddheḥ kvacid deśe kasyacid tādṛśam api astu viṣāṇam kaḥ virodhaḥ syāt virodhaḥ yadi yat jātīyāḥ viṣāṇinaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ tad jātīyasya kasyacid tādṛśam viṣāṇam brūyāt atra api yat jātīyāḥ kartāraḥ jñātāraḥ ca dṛṣṭāḥ tad jātīyasya eva yadi kasyacid jagatkartṛ tva ādi abhyupagamyate tadā syāt virodhaḥ kulāla ādi vilakṣaṇasya īśvarasya jagat kartṛ tva ādi abhyupagame tu avirodhaḥ iti 
[457,2]	etena īśvaraḥ kṣiti ādeḥ kartā sarvatra jñātā vā na bhavati puruṣa tvāt vaktṛ tvāt iti evamādayaḥ kuhetavaḥ ayuktāḥ tathā na īśvara kartṛkam kṣiti ādi kāryam prameya tvāt asmad ādi nirmitā itara tvāt ākāśa ādi vat ityādi api ayuktam viśeṣa pratiṣedhasya śeṣa abhyanujñāyām sāmarthya upapattau kartṛ antara prasiddhau apasiddhānta prasaṅgāt prameya tva asmad ādi nirmitā itara tva ādeḥ īśvara kartṛ tvena virodha asiddheḥ sandigdha anaikāntika tvam sandighā bādhita viṣaya tvam vā balīyasā ca kārya anumānena sarva sāpi īśvara pratiṣedha hetoḥ bādhita viṣaya tvena apramāṇa tvam draṣṭavyam kāryasya hi śarīra ādeḥ buddhimat kāraṇam vinā utpattau virodhaḥ pradarśitaḥ tena tasya sandigdha anaikāntika tvam api na asti iti niravadya tvāt balīyaḥ tvam iti 
[457,12]	nanu iṣṭa aniṣṭa upādāna pratiṣedha artham eva prekṣā pūrva kāriṇaḥ pravartante tathā eva īśvarasya api pravṛttau aprāpta kāma tvāt anīśvara tva prasaṅgaḥ asmad ādi vat apuruṣa arthāyām tu pravṛttau aprekṣā pūrva kāritā eva syāt apuruṣa artha kriyā anuṣṭhāna tvāt tat āha jagat ca asṛjataḥ tasya kim nāma iṣṭam na sidhyati prayojanam anuddiśya na mandaḥ api pravartate evam eva pravṛttiḥ ced caitanyena asya kim bhavet krīḍā arthāyām pravṛttau na vihanyeta kṛtārtha tā bahu vyāpāra tāyām hi kleśaḥ bahutaraḥ bhavet iti 
[457,20]	kim punar etat īśvara anumāna pratiṣedha artham upanyastam kim vā svatantra sādhanam īśvara pratiṣedha artham na tāvat anumāna pratiṣedha artham tasya asiddha tva ādi doṣa rahita tvena prāk samarthita tvāt niravadyasya dhūma anumāna vat niṣeddhum aśakya tvāt sāvadyatāyām vā sā eva vācyā kim anena asambaddhena na hi anena hetoḥ kaścid doṣaḥ pratipādyate iti 
[457,25_458,1]	atha īśvara pratiṣedha artham sādhanam anena uktam na jagataḥ sraṣṭā bhagavān dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa prayojana vikala tvāt mukta ātma vat iti atra api yadi dharmi na pratīyate tad āśraya asiddhaḥ hetuḥ atha pratīyate tadā tad grāhaka pramāṇena bādhyate para prasiddhi mātreṇa ca yathā pakṣa dharma tva ādi siddhiḥ tathā prāk eva prapañcitam kim ca sva niścaya vat anyeṣām niścaya utpādayiṣayā para artha anumānasya pravṛttim icchanti anumāna vidaḥ tena svayam niścita pakṣa dharma tva ādiḥ eva hetuḥ param pratyupādeyaḥ anyathā svayam apratipannaḥ tatas pratipādakaḥ api na syāt na hi avyutpannaḥ pratipādayitā kaścid asti 
[458,5]	api ca ayam pareṇa pratipannaḥ iti kutas tat niścayaḥ śāstrāt iti ced na vipratipatti kāle tasya apramāṇa tvāt pramāṇa tve vā hetu vat sādhyasya api tatas siddhiḥ aviśeṣāt prativādi vacanāt dhetu siddhiḥ iti ced tat kim idānīm pakṣa nirdeśa anantaram anena prativādī praṣṭavyaḥ kaḥ nu bhavataḥ prasiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti sa ca ajñānāt anyatas vā nimittān na bravīti iti katham tatas hetu siddhiḥ iti 
[458,11]	tathā api vicāryam etat kim artham pravartate bhagavān iti para anugraha artham iti eke na ca sthāna śarīra indriya ādi anutpādya para anugrahaḥ kartum śakyate iti sthāna ādikam api karoti sva ātmanaḥ tu na kiṃcid prayojanam mahā anubhāva tayā hi śaktaḥ para artham eva pravartate 
[458,16^1]	nanu evam sukham eva janayatu na hi mahā anubhavaḥ pareṣām moha duḥkha ādi utpādane pravartate vaidya vat iti ced na apravṛttyā eva tad siddheḥ syāt matam yathā gaṇḍa gulma ādi vyādhi nivṛtti artham dāha cheda tīvra auṣadha ādinā duḥkha utpādanam mahā anubhavaḥ api vaidyaḥ karoti tathā īśvaraḥ api adharma vyādhi nivṛtti artham duḥkham api utpādayati iti tat ca na evam kasmāt apravṛttyā eva tad siddheḥ aniṣṭa sthāna ādi utpattau adharma adhiṣṭhātṛ tve ca yadā bhagavān na pravartate tadā ca adharmasya vyādhi duḥkha anutpādaka tvam kim ca adharmam kasmāt kārayati na hi nivṛtti artham pravṛttaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ tam punar kārayati evam hi kuvaidyaḥ syāt 
[458,16^2]	na ca īśvareṇa anadhiṣṭhitasya avihite pravṛttiḥ adharma utpattiḥ ca sambhavati iti tad nimitta adharma kṣapaṇa artham adharme api pravartayati iti ced yadi anyathā tasya kṣapaṇam na sambhavati tadā tasya akṣapaṇam eva nyāyyam kṣapaṇe hi adharma vṛddhiḥ tad kṣapaṇe punar adharma vṛddhiḥ tad kṣapaṇe punar iti evam mahān anarthaḥ paścāt śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced asaṃkhyāta koṭi janmasu śāntiḥ na bhūtā paścāt bhaviṣyati iti kā pratyāśā kim ca vaidyaḥ api viveka jñaḥ saṅgraha paricchedam jñātvā pravartate bhagavataḥ tu sarvajña tvāt acikitsyeṣu pravṛttiḥ na yuktā iti 
[459,2^1]	atra ucyate yasya yat abhipretam tasya tat sampādana artham yaḥ pravartate sa para artham pravṛttaḥ iti ucyate sukham ca sarva saṃsāriṇām anādi vāsanā ataḥ abhipretam tad sampādana artham ca pravartamānaḥ bhagavān adharmam api anuṣaṅgataḥ kārayati na hi anyathā viṣaya upabhoga nimittam sukham sambhavati dharma pratibandhaka adharma anuparame ca na tasmāt dharmāt sukham bhavati iti tad nimitta sukha sampādana artham tad pratibandhakam adharmam eva tāvat adhiṣṭhāya phala dvāreṇa nivartayati anyathā tad nivṛtti asambhavāt 
[459,2^2]	yasya tu prāyaścitta ādi dvāreṇa nivṛttiḥ sambhavati tasya tathā nivṛtti yogyasya utpanna tvāt tathā eva nivṛttim kārayati tat evam para artham pravṛttaḥ api anuṣaṅgataḥ naraka ādi duḥkham api janayati iti evam saṃsāra cakre sukha prārthanātaḥ parivartamānānām yadā kasyacid kadācid kathaṃcid mukti mārga pravṛtti bīja utpādane sahakāriṇam hetum prāpnoti tadā tad bījam janayitvā tatpuruṣam mukti mārge api pravartayati tatas pratijanma abhyāsena pravartayan saṃsāra hetūn saṃskārān tanūkārayati mukti upāya hetūn saṃskārān ca pratānayati tāvat yāvat mokṣam prāpayati iti tat na para artha pravṛtti abhyupagame api kaścid virodhaḥ 
[459,17]	atha vā sva artham eva pravartate kim tat bhagavataḥ prayojanam iti ced jagat utpatti ādi eva katham iti ced sukha prāpti duḥkha abhāvau api katham prayojanam yadi tad artham puruṣasya pravṛtta tvāt iṣṭa tvāt ca tadā bhagavataḥ api jagat utpatti ādi artham pravṛtta tvāt iṣṭa tvāt ca tat eva prayojanam kim artham tat iṣṭam iti ced sukham kim artham puruṣasya iṣṭam iti yat kiṃcid etat tasmāt yaḥ yam artham adhikṛtya pravartate tat tasya iṣṭa tvāt prayojanam iti na ca sva artham pravartamānasya anāpta kāma tvāt anīśvara tvam prasajyate yasya hi yathā abhipretam na sidhyati saḥ anāpta kāmaḥ iti ucyate bhagavataḥ tu tat tathā eva sidhyati iti katham anāpta kāma tvam 
[459,25]	atha vā āditya vat svabhāvena eva pravartate yathā ādityaḥ svabhāvena jagat prakāśayati prakāśite ca jagati sva karma anuvidhānena sukha duḥkha ādi vaicitryam prāṇinaḥ anubhavanti tathā bhagavān api svabhāvena eva jagatām utpatti sthiti vināśān karoti prāṇinaḥ ca tad karma anurūpaiḥ sukha duḥkha jñāna ajñāna ādibhiḥ saṃyojayati iti na ca svabhāvataḥ pravṛttau caitanya virodhaḥ cetanānām api svabhāva niyama upalabdheḥ viduṣaḥ api kasyacid anarthakeṣu tṛṇa khaṇḍana ādiṣu pravṛtti niyama upalambhena svabhāva niyama vyavasthānāt vyasanam tat iti ced bhagavataḥ api vyasanam eva etat yat niratiśaya jñāna aiśvaryaḥ api san yeṣām bhāvānām yadā utpatti hetavaḥ santi tadā tad hetūn adhiṣṭhāya tān utpādayati iti tat ca vyasanam bhagavataḥ kutaścid na utpannam iti svabhāvaḥ iti ucyate 
[460,8]	na ca adṛṣṭa upāna ādi hetu anurūpam kāryam kurvataḥ svātantrya virodhaḥ svatantrāṇām api upādāna ādi anurūpa kārya kartṛ tva upalambhāt paridṛṣṭa sāmarthya kāraṇaka prayoktṛ tvam hi svātantryam ucyate tat ca asti maheśvarasya iti yathā yathā bhagavataḥ kṣiti ādi kārya kartṛ tvam sambhavati tathā tathābhūtaḥ bhagavān abhyupagantavyaḥ kārya anumāna balena tasya niravadya tvena samarthita tvāt 
[460,14]	āgamāt api ekaḥ bhagavān aśeṣa jagat utpādana śaktimān niścīyate yat āha ekaḥ rudraḥ na dvitīyaḥ yaḥ sūryaḥ iva imām lokān īśate īśanībhiḥ iti na tasya kāryam karaṇam ca vidyate na tad samaḥ ca abhyadhikaḥ ca dṛśyate parā asya śaktiḥ vividhā eva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñāna bala kriyā ca iti śvetāśvatara upaniṣad tathā sarva upaniṣatsu api jagat vidhātṛ tva ādi dharmaka ātma jñānam mukti nimittam niścitam tathā viśvatas cakṣuḥ uta viśvatas mukhaḥ viśvatas bāhuḥ uta viśvataspād sam bāhubhyām dhamati sam yattaiḥ dyāvābhūmī janayan devaḥ ekaḥ iti punar ca āha etasya ca akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dyāvāpṛthivī vidhṛte tiṣṭhataḥ iti manu ādayaḥ api āhuḥ praśāsitāram sarveṣām aṇīyāṃsam aṇoḥ api rukma ābham svapna dhī gamyam vidyāt tam puruṣam param eṣa sarvāṇi bhūtāni pañcabhiḥ vyāpya mūrtibhiḥ janma vṛddhi kṣayaiḥ nityam sambhrāmayati cakra vat iti evamādi 
[461,6]	na svarūpa pratipattau aprāmāṇyam eṣām pratipattavyam medhya amedhya tva svarūpa pratipādakānām svarga naraka ādi svarūpa tad sādhana aṅga svarūpa pratipādakānām ca vākyānām prāmāṇya upapatteḥ na hi svarūpa pratipattim antareṇa upādāna parihārau upapadyete anyasmin pratīte anyatra pravṛttau atiprasaṅgāt vidhi pratiṣedha aṅga tvāt pravṛtti nivṛtti paratvam na svarūpa artha tvam iti ced na svarūpa pratipattim antareṇa tatas tat niyatayoḥ pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ ayogāt na hi śaśa viṣāṇa ādi vacasām vidhi aṅga tvena api prāmāṇyam pravṛtti nivṛtti paratvam ca santaḥ anumanyante tasmāt ātmā vāre draṣṭavyaḥ ityādi vidhi aṅga tve api jagat sraṣṭṛ tva sarvajña tva ādi vacanānām ghṛta yūpa ādi vacasām iva yathārtha tvam eva svarūpa artha tvāt iti 
[461,16_462,4]	yat ca uktam ātma jñānam yāga pravṛtti artham vihitam na tu mokṣa artham aśruta tvāt iti tat ayuktam vedasya prāmāṇya niścaye arthinām ātma ajñānam vinā api agnihotra ādi jñānāt eva pravṛttiḥ bhavati arthāpattitaḥ vā ātmā api jñāyate aprāmāṇye tu ātma jñāna vidhāne api na pravṛttiḥ tasmāt na yāga pravṛtti artham ātma jñānam vihitam kim tu mokṣa artham vākya antareṣu śruta tvāt veda aham etam puruṣam mahāntam āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt tam eva viditvā ati mṛtyam eti na anyaḥ panthāḥ vidyate ayanāya iti evamādiṣu yāga artha tvam ca vākya antare api na śrutam iti apramāṇakam eva kalpitam tasmāt yāvat jīvam agnihotram juhuyāt ityādeḥ iva vākya antara ukta phalena sambandhaḥ veditavyaḥ yasya yena artha sambandhaḥ ityādi nyāyena anyathā niṣphalaḥ vidhiḥ na kenacid anuṣṭhīyate iti anarthakaḥ syāt pratyavāya parihāra artham anuṣṭhīyate iti ced na tasya api aśruta tvāt śruta hānya śruta kalpanā doṣaḥ ca evam syāt tasmāt mukti artham ātma jñānam vihitam sa ca ātmā kiṃdharmakaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti apekṣāyām pūrva uktāni vākyāni arūpam arasam agandhavat evamādīni ca sambadhyante evam ca āgama bādhi tvena api aprāmāṇyam īśvara pratiṣedha hetūnām draṣṭavyam 
[462,8]	etena asarva artham īśvara jñāna tvāt asmad ādi jñāna vat iti evamādeḥ api dharmi grāhaka pramāṇa bādhita tvam āśraya asiddha tvam vā pūrva uktam draṣṭavyam na hi asarvajña tve bhagavataḥ ananta kārya utpattiḥ sambhavati anadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ acetana hetubhyaḥ kārya utpatti asambhavāt aniścita kāraka śakteḥ adhiṣṭhātṛ tva asambhavāt ca iti uktam samasta kāryāṇām upādānāt i avaboddhṛ tve ca siddham sarvajña tvam iti 
[462,14_462,19]	tatas ca yat uktam sarvajñaḥ dṛśyate tāvat na idānīm asmad ādibhiḥ nirākaraṇa vat śakyā na ca āsīt iti kalpanā sarvajñaḥ ayam iti hi evam tad kālaiḥ api boddhṛbhiḥ tad jñāna jñeya vijñāna rahitaiḥ jñāyate katham na hi asarva jñaḥ sarvajñam jānāti iti tat apāstam tat jñāna jñeya vijñāna rahita tve api hi laukikaiḥ śāstra śilpa ādi abhijñāḥ tad śiṣyaiḥ ca jñāyante anyathā jñāna upārjana artham teṣām śāstra śravaṇa ādiṣu pravṛttiḥ na syāt yathā ca śāstra ādi anabhijñaiḥ śāstra ādi abhijñaḥ tad kāryeṇa āpta vacanena ca niścīyate tadvat asarva jñaiḥ api sarvajñaḥ iti 
[462,24]	yat ca uktam prathama sargā parijña tvam tad parijñāne ca saṃsāra an ādi tva virodhaḥ iti tat ati jāḍya vijṛmbhitam na hi khara mastake viṣāṇam apaśyan andhaḥ bhavati yat asti tat sarvam paśyati iti asataḥ prathama sarga ādeḥ adarśane api sarvajña tvam na vihanyate kutsita rasa āsvādanāt api ayuktam yasya hi indriyeṇa rasa gandha ādi viśeṣam gṛhṇataḥ sukha duḥkha rāga dveṣa ādi yogaḥ bhavati tasya āsvādana ādi vyapadeśaḥ tad kṛta doṣaḥ vā bhagavataḥ tu na indriya jam jñānam na api rāgaḥ kvacid dveṣaḥ vā na api kiṃcid pavitram apavitram vā kin tu yat yathā avasthitam kiṃcid tat tathā vā iti nityena eva jñānena paśyati acakṣuḥ ityādi vacanāt 
[463,8]	cakṣuṣā vinā katham paśyati iti vyavahāraḥ iti ced upacārāt tad jñānasya aparisphuṭa tva āśaṅkā nivṛttiḥ upacārasya prayojanam nimittam punar cākṣuṣena jñānena sādharmyam īśvara jñānasya aparokṣa ākāra tvam tasya hi sva kara tala vat sarvaḥ arthaḥ aparokṣaḥ eva iti etena pratyakṣa vyavahāraḥ api vyākhyātaḥ pramājanaka tva abhāvāt na īśvara jñānam mukhyam pratyakṣam na api akṣajanya tvena pratyakṣam nitya tvāt 
[463,14_463,26]	nitya tvam kutas iti ced anumānāt āgamāt ca tatra nityam parameśvara jñānam gandha adharma dhvani samavāyi kāraṇa artha antara nitya dravya viśeṣa guṇa tvāt toya ādi paramāṇu rūpa ādi vat iti anumānam gandha adharma dhvaninām samavāyi kāraṇāni kṣiti apara ātma ākāśāni tebhyaḥ artha antaram yat nityam dravyam tad guṇa tvāt iti arthaḥ tatra kārya toya ādi guṇaiḥ vyabhicāra nivṛtti artham nitya dravya guṇa grahaṇam nitya dravya guṇaiḥ saṃyoga ādibhiḥ vyabhicāra nivṛtti artham viśeṣa guṇa grahaṇam tathā api pāka jaiḥ apara ātma viśeṣa guṇaiḥ śabdena ca vyabhicāraḥ tad nivṛtti artham gandha adharma ityādi viśeṣaṇam nanu parama yogī gandha ādi samavāyi kāraṇebhyaḥ artha antaram tasya viśeṣa guṇaḥ jñānam tat ca anityam iti anekāntaḥ na etat asti na hi karoti iti eva kāraṇam kim tarhi kariṣyati akārṣīt iti api yasmāt anirdiṣṭa kālāḥ pratyayāḥ triṣu api kāleṣu bhavanti iti śabda vidaḥ tatas kāraṇāt idam kāryam niṣpannam ityādi vyavahāraḥ api asti kārya kāraṇa anumānayoḥ atīta anāgata viṣaya tva prasiddheḥ ca tat ayam arthaḥ gandha adharma ityādi vākyasya nityam parameśvara jñānam kṣiti ākāśa saṃsāri puruṣān āśrita tve sati nitya dravya viśeṣa guṇa tvāt śalila ādi paramāṇu rūpa ādi vat iti parameśvara icchā prayatnābhyām anekāntaḥ iti ced na tayoḥ api atas eva hetoḥ nitya tva siddheḥ sādhyena vyabhicāra abhāvāt ca iti 
[464,4^1]	kevala vyatirekī vā hetuḥ tathā hi nitya jñāna āśrayaḥ bhagavān niratiśaya kartṛ tvāt vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ asmad ādiḥ aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ iti ced na aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvāt eva kevala vyatireki tvam viśeṣaṇa prasiddhau hi anvayaḥ api syāt aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvam ca doṣam abhyupagacchataḥ sarva anitya vādinam pratyākāśa ādau nitya tva siddhiḥ anumānāt na syāt na ca asmad ādi pratyakṣeṇa kvacid na nitya tvam gṛhyate anādi ananta sattāyāḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratibhāsanāt anitya tvam ghaṭa ādiṣu dṛṣṭam tad ākāśa ādau pratiṣidhyate iti tatas katham nitya tva siddhiḥ 
[464,4^2]	sāmarthyāt iti ced kim idam sāmarthyam nāma na hi pratyakṣa āgama vyatiriktam anumānāt anyat pratipatti sādhanam asti atha anumānam eva sāmarthyam tatas api nitya tva siddhau katham na aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvam kim ca atra api asmad ādau nitya jñānān āśraya tvam dṛṣṭam tad īśvare pratiṣidhyate tat pratiṣedhe ca sāmarthyāt nitya jñāna āśraya tva siddhiḥ iti yadi evam nitya jñānān āśrayaḥ bhagavān na bhavati iti evam sādhya nirdeśaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ evam kāraṇe api saḥ eva arthaḥ pratiṣedha dvayasya vidhi artha tvāt 
[464,20]	nanu ca nitya jñāna āśraya tva niratiśaya kartṛ tvayoḥ pratibandhā siddheḥ nitya jñāna āśraya tva nivṛttau eva niratiśaya kartṛ tva nivṛttiḥ ayuktā nitya duḥkha ādi āśraya tva nivṛttau api tad nivṛtti prasaṅgāt tatas ca niratiśaya kartṛ tvena nitya jñāna āśraya tva siddhi vat nitya duḥkha āśraya tva siddhiḥ api syāt vipakṣa darśana avi abhicārasya ubhayatra viśeṣāt iti na etat asti nitya jñāna āśraya tvena hi niratiśaya kartṛ tvasya vyāpti pratipakṣa bādhaka pramāṇaiḥ kākatīra adarśana nyāyena pakṣaḥ eva siddhyati na tu evam nitya duḥkha ādi āśraya tvena tat asiddhau eva niratiśaya kartṛ tva upapatteḥ sarvadā niḥśeṣa kārya utpādana sāmarthyam hi niratiśaya kartṛ tvam ucyate tat ca duḥkha ādi mātreṇa api abhibhūtasya na upapadyate kutas nityaiḥ duḥkha dveṣa ādibhiḥ abhibhūtasya iti tathā śaśa viṣāṇa ādi āśraya tva siddhiḥ api na codanīyā tad abhāvena niratiśaya kartṛ tvasya virodha asiddheḥ 
[465,4]	na ca evam nitya jñāna āśraya tvena vinā niratiśaya kartṛ tvam upapadyate tathā hi acetanasya asarvajñasya vā bhuvana ādi aśeṣa kārya kartṛ tvam na sambhavati iti uktam sarvajña tvam ca anādi ananta kālam avyucchedena bhagavataḥ abhyupagantavyam avyucchedena atra trasa sthāvara ādi ananta kārya utpatti darśanāt tat ca sātatyena sarva artha viṣaya tvam sa hetuka tve jñānasya na syāt na hi eka ākāra kārya utpādaka kāraṇa sāmagrīṇām aviguṇānām pūrva apara kāla avacchinnaḥ santānaḥ sambhavati anityānām khalu para adhīna ātma lābha tayā utkarṣa apakarṣa ādi yogasya kadācid avaśyaṃbhāvi tvena sambhāvya tvāt na tad sāmagrya āyatta janmanaḥ jñānasya niratiśayaḥ avadhi varjitaḥ santānaḥ upapadyate 
[465,12]	kāraṇam ca īśvara jñānasya abhyupagacchatā paridṛṣṭa sāmarthyam eva abhyupagantavyam dhūma agni ādi vat sāmarthyam tu jñāna utpattau śarīra indriya ādeḥ sukha ādi utpattau iva niścitam śarīra ādi utpattau api avidyā tṛṣṇā ādeḥ sāmarthyam niścitam tena anityam jñānam icchataḥ sarva saṃsāri dharma abhyupagamaḥ prasajyate tatas ca niratiśayam kartṛ tvam sarvajña tvam ca virudhyate tad virodhāt ca jagat utpatti virodhaḥ iti 
[465,18^1]	nityam śarīram indriyam ca bhagavataḥ iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt yukti virodhāt ca evam eva nitya tva abhyupagame ca patnī ādayaḥ api nityāḥ eṣṭavyāḥ paramāṇu ādi eva śarīram iti api ayuktam ceṣṭa indriya artha āśraya tva abhāvāt bhoga āyatanam ca śarīram ucyate na ca bhagavataḥ kiṃcid bhoga āyatanam asti kṣiti ādi mūrti pratipādaka āgama virodhaḥ iti ced na tasya upacāreṇa pravṛtteḥ śarīra vat icchā mātra anuvidhāyi tvāt anyathā yajamānaḥ api śarīram syāt na ca cetanam śarīram yuktam tathā indriyasya api nitya tvam ayuktam ākāśa manasoḥ api adṛṣṭa upagṛhīta tvena indriya tvāt tad vaikalye vā anindriya tvāt 
[465,18^2]	na ca īśvarasya dharmaḥ adharmaḥ vā asti asaṃsāri tva virodhāt kevala dharma astitve ca pramāṇa abhāvāt nitya anitya vikalpā sambhavāt nitya tve ca jñānam eva nityam astu kalpanā gaurava parihāraḥ ca evam bhavati anitya tve ca tad sādhanam anutiṣṭhataḥ saṃhāra kartṛ tva ādi virodhaḥ para duḥkha utpādana ādeḥ adharma hetu tvāt yat ca uktam ajñānam eva adharma hetuḥ tad abhāvāt viśeṣataḥ api na adharmaḥ iti tat ayuktam jānataḥ pratiṣiddha ācaraṇe asya abhyadhika prāyaścitta śravaṇāt kṣīṇa doṣasya na adharma utpattiḥ iti ced dharma utpādaḥ api tasya na asti tulya pramāṇa tvāt tat evam jñāna utpādaka hetoḥ śarīra ādeḥ abhāvāt nityam eva jñānam bhagavataḥ iti 
[466,6^1]	nanu ca jñāna mātrasya anitya tvena avyabhicāri tvāt katham kasyacid nitya tva siddhiḥ siddhau vā na kena api kasyacid avinā abhāva siddhiḥ sarva tra anāśvāsa prasaṅgāt iti na etat asti sa atiśayasya eva hi jñānasya anitya tvena avyabhicāraḥ upalabdhaḥ na niratiśayasya mahat tva aṇu tva ādi vat yaiḥ ca pratipakṣa bādhaka pramāṇaiḥ nitya jñāna āśraya tva niratiśaya kartṛ tvayoḥ pratibandhaḥ prasādhitaḥ taiḥ eva anitya tva sādhanasya jñāna tva vibhu dravya viśeṣa guṇa tva ādeḥ bādhita tvāt aprāmāṇyam eva draṣṭavyam 
[466,6^2]	na hi yathā jñāna tva vibhu dravya viśeṣa guṇa ādeḥ nitya tvena saha virodhaḥ kaścid asti yena niratiśaya kartṛ tvasya nitya jñāna viparyayeṇa virodhaḥ pradarśitaḥ tathā jñāna tva ādeḥ anitya tvena na vyabhicāraḥ sidhyet na ca vipakṣa adarśana mātreṇa avyabhicāra siddhiḥ atiprasaṅgāt na ca anyatra adarśanam eva virodhaḥ mahattva aṇu tva ādeḥ api nitya tvena virodha prasaṅgāt na ca evam paridṛṣṭa sāmarthya kāraṇa abhāvaḥ api parameśvara jñānasya kāraṇa antarāt utpattau avirodhaḥ paridṛṣṭa sāmarthya kāraṇa abhāve kāraṇa antarāt kārya utpāda virodhasya dṛṣṭa pramāṇa siddha tvāt agni dhūma ādiṣu 
[466,6^3]	anyathā kṣiti ādeḥ api upalabdha upādāna ādi sāmarthya kartuḥ abhāve api kāraṇa antarebhyaḥ kārya utpattau avirodha prasaṅgāt tatas ca īśvara siddhiḥ eva na asti kasya jñānam nityam anityam vā cintyeta tasmāt kṣiti ādi kārya anumānasya balīyaḥ tvāt tad kartuḥ yathā diś deśa kālān avacchinna ananta tad kārya utpādaka tvāni atha anupapattyā asmad ādi dharmaiḥ duḥkha asarvajña tva ādibhiḥ asaṃsparśaḥ anumīyate tadvat anitya jñāna dharma śarīra ādi apekṣa kartṛ tva abhāvaḥ api iti tathā ca satyam jñānam anantam brahma iti śrutiḥ na tasya kāryam karaṇam ca ityādinā apāṇi pādaḥ ādi vākyena ca akṛtakam jñānam niṣkalasya kartṛ tvam ca bhagavataḥ pratipāditam icchā prayatnayoḥ api atas eva nitya tvam siddham śarīra ādi abhāve tayoḥ api utpatteḥ asambhavāt nitya tvena eka tve api tayoḥ kārya bhedena bhedaḥ traikālika tvam ca upacaryate jñeya bhedena jñāna vat yat atra anuktam para ukta codya pratisamādhānam pratipakṣa bādhakam ca tat nitya jñāna viniścaye draṣṭavyam svayam ca anyat api ūhyam 
[467,2_467,7]	aparaḥ tu āha nityam pramāṇam na eva asti prāmāṇyāt vastu sat gateḥ jñeya anityatayā tasyāḥ adhrauvyāt kramajanmanaḥ nityāt utpatti viśleṣāt apekṣāyāḥ ayogataḥ kathaṃcid na upakārya tvāt anitye api apramāṇa tā na eva nityam pramāṇam asti vastu sat gateḥ prāmāṇyāt yadi nāma vastu sataḥ gatiḥ pramāṇam nitya tvam kim na iti āha jñeya anityatayā tasyāḥ vastu sat gateḥ adhrauvyāt na hi anutpanne naṣṭe vā vastuni tad gatiḥ yuktā jñeya anitya tvena jñānasya astu anitya tvam jñātā tu nityaḥ eva iti atra āha kramajanmanaḥ jñānasya nityāt utpatti viśleṣāt nityāt eka svabhāvāt krama utpatteḥ asambhavāt iti arthaḥ sahakāri kramāt api na kramaḥ apekṣāyāḥ ayogāt nityasya anupakārya tve parāpakṣā na yuktā anitye api īśvara jñāne na pramāṇa tā kathaṃcid anupakārya tvāt yaḥ hi kathaṃcid kenacid upakṛtaḥ tad anyeṣām upakāra artham karuṇayā upadiśati sa lokasya pramāṇam bhavati na ca īśvarasya iyam vyutpattiḥ asti na hi akhaṇḍitaḥ paṇḍitaḥ bhavati iti 
[467,17]	atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam nityam pramāṇam na eva asti iti tatra yadi pramāsādhanam nityam pratiṣidhyate tat na antaḥkaraṇa ādeḥ pramāṇa sādhanasya nitya tvāt sāmagryavastham tu na kiṃcid nityam iti atra siddha sādhanam antaḥkaraṇa ādeḥ api anitya tva abhyupagame nityam na eva asti etāvat vācyam pramāṇa grahaṇam anarthakam pramāṇasya api nitya tva pratiṣedhe siddha sādhanam na ca īśvara jñānam aṃjasā pramāṇam phalam ca iti uktam 
[467,22]	atha avisaṃvādi jñānam nityam na eva asti iti ucyate tat ayuktam parameśvara jñānasya hi tad sattva grāhaka pramāṇāt eva avisaṃvādi tvam ca siddham tathā ca vyatireki anumānam prāk samarthitam tena eva jñeya anityatayā iti ādi bādhita tvāt anupapannam na ca artha ja tvena eva jñānasya artha viṣaya tvam yena arthasya krama bhāvāt jñānasya api krama bhāvaḥ syāt tathā ca ajanakasya api arthasya viṣaya tvam samarthitam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe na ca ajanakasya viṣaya tve sarveṣām sarvajña tva prasaṅgaḥ saṃsāri puruṣa jñānānām dharma ādi sāmagrī viśeṣa niyamitānām niyata artha viṣaya tvena utpādāt atas eva parameśvara jñānam sarva artha viṣayam upapannam nirhetukasya niyata artha tve niyāmaka abhāvāt sarva artha viṣaya tvam hi parameśvara jñānasya svābhāvikaḥ dharmaḥ iti ākāśāṇu ādīnām sarva gatā sarva gata tva ādi dharma vat na paryanuyogam arhati iti 
[468,5^1]	nanu ca nityasya eka jñānasya sarva artha viṣaya tve atīta anāgata arthānām api vartamāna tva prasaṅgaḥ eka jñāna ālambana tvāt kṛtikā ādi vat iti na etat asti yogi jñānam khalu ekam api atīta anāgata vartamāna artha viṣayam samādhi balāt bhavati na ca sarva arthānām vartamāna tvam yathā vā sattā ākhyena ekena sāmānyena sambaddhānām arthānām na eka deśa tvam eka svabhāva tvam vā pratyakṣa ādi virodhāt tatra keṣāṃcid arthānām deśa antaram gacchatām na sat tayā saha gamanam na api sattā viyogaḥ tat eka sambandhi tve teṣām pūrva deśa ādi aparityāgaḥ api na asti etat ca sāmānya samarthane vistareṇa prasādhitam 
[468,5^2]	tadvat maheśvara jñānena ekena sambaddhānām arthānām na eka kāla ādi yogaḥ iti anāgataḥ arthaḥ parameśvara jñāna viṣayaḥ sva kāraṇa sāmarthyāt vartamānī bhavat na āgamam eva svabhāvam hitvā bhavati na tu īśvara jñāna sambandham jahāti vartamāna svabhāvam hitvā atīta bhāvam upagacchan na īśvara jñāna sambandham jahāti iti evam ca sati yaḥ kaścid arthaḥ pūrva dharma sat rūpam asat rūpam vā parityajya dharma antaram āpadyate sa sarvaḥ parameśvara jñāna sambaddhaḥ eva āpadyate sattā sambandha vat iti 
[468,19]	etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ sattāyā sadbhiḥ saha āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ samavāya ākhyaḥ sambandhaḥ tena atīta anāgata arthaiḥ saha sambandhaḥ na bhavati maheśvara jñānasya tu sarvaiḥ api arthaiḥ saha viṣaya viṣayi bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ sa ca atīta ādi arthaiḥ api asti iti samarthitam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe tat evam arthaḥ eva anyathā anyathā bhavati na īśvara jñānam tat dhi eka svabhāvam api anyathā anyathā abhavadbhiḥ arthaiḥ anyathā anyathā upadhīyamānam darpaṇa sphaṭika ādi vat anyathā anyathā vyapadiśyate tat na meyā nitya tayā api īśvara jñānasya adhrauvyam na api avisaṃvādi tvam nivartate iti 
[468,24]	yadi īśvara jñānam na arthe vyāpriyate na api arthāt utpannam tad svabhāvam vā tatas katham tena arthaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti ucyate na tena sambaddhaḥ eva arthaḥ tena dṛṣṭaḥ iti ucyate atīta anāgata artha vat iti uktam 
[469,2_469,6]	yat api āha sambandhaḥ anvaya pūrveṇa vyatirekeṇa siddhyati nityasya avyatirekasya kutas sambandha sambhavaḥ tat api atīta anāgata artha tad jñānayoḥ sāmānya tadvatoḥ ca sambandha samarthanena pratyuktam yat api āha sarva artha darśanāt jātaḥ śabdaḥ sarvasya vācakaḥ vivakṣā niyamaḥ nāma na nityasya upapattimān tat api ayuktam na hi yasya yāvatī arthe jñānam asti tena uccāritaḥ śabdaḥ tāvataḥ arthasya vācakaḥ bhavati na ca jñānam eva vivakṣā jñānavantaḥ api hi mauna vratāḥ kecid upalabhyante nityā eva icchā bhagavataḥ sarva kṛtyeṣu yathā deśa kāla upādāna ādi apekṣā utpāde api aviparyayeṇa svabhāvataḥ vartate tatas kāryam api deśa kāla ādi aviparyayeṇa eva bhavati tasmāt vivakṣā niyamaḥ na nityasya upapattimān iti etat api ayuktam nityasya api dravya guṇa sāmānya ādeḥ pratiniyata svabhāvasya pramāṇena upalambhāt 
[469,16_469,19]	yat ca uktam na hi akhaṇḍitaḥ paṇḍitaḥ bhavati tat api nitya anitya tva anabhyupagamena eva nirastam svābhāvikam hi bhagavataḥ pāṇḍityam iti nanu rāga ādi ananubhave katham tad pratipakṣam jānāti ajānānaḥ ca katham upadiśan pramāṇam bhavati rāga ādi anubhave tu rāga ādi yuktaḥ prāptaḥ tatas ca saṃsāri eva asau iti tat ayuktam na hi rāga ādi jñānāt eva tadvān bhavati kim tu tad samavāyāt anyathā buddha avasthāyām api rāga ādi mattva prasaṅgaḥ a arvajña tvam vā 
[469,23]	yat ca atra uktam heya upādeya tattvasya hāni upāyasya vedakaḥ yaḥ pramāṇam asau iṣṭaḥ na tu sarvasya vedakaḥ dūram paśyatu vā mā vā tattvam iṣṭam tu paśyatu pramāṇam dūra darśī ced ete gṛdhrān upāsmahe tasmāt ārya satya catuṣṭaya darśana mātram buddhasya sarvajña tvam iti evam api rāga ādi ananubhave katham duḥkha satya darśanam tad anubhave vā katham na rāga ādimat tvam
