[470,6]	kim ca ārya satya catuṣṭaya ātmakaḥ buddhaḥ prāptaḥ catuṣṭaya anubhavāt ananubhave tu catuṣṭayasya api avedakaḥ katham pramāṇam krameṇa vedakaḥ iti ced na ekasya krama vedakatva asambhavāt kim ca mārga vedana kāle nirodha vedanam tasya asti vā na vā yadi asti tadā virodha ātmaka tva prāpte mārga abhyāse pravṛttiḥ na syāt atha na asti tathā api na mārga abhyāse pravṛttiḥ tad prayojana apratīteḥ anumānāt upadeśāt vā jñātvā pravartate iti ced anumāna āditaḥ api tad ākārān āpāttau katham tad vedanam yadi syāt pratyakṣataḥ api tad ākārān āpattau eva tad vedanam bhaviṣyati avirodhāt vistareṇa ca artha ākāra tvam pratyakṣa jñānasya api nirastam tasmāt taṭa sthaḥ eva bhagavān īśvaraḥ parātma sthān rāga ādīn paśyan na tadvān bhavati iti 
[470,15]	yat api āha vara pradāna śaktiḥ sā vidyate tasya tādṛśī yayā anuṣṭhāna hīnaḥ api dadāti aiśvaryam arthine atha na asti eva sā śaktiḥ tasya anyā api katham bhavet iti tat api ayuktam yatas anyasya api kāraṇasya yā yathā śaktiḥ asti sā tathā kārya utpattyā eva niścīyate hutabhuja tṛṇa ādi dahana taṇḍula vikledana ādi śakti vat tasmāt yatra yathā kārya prādurbhāvaḥ dṛśyate tatra tathā bhagavataḥ śaktiḥ gamyate iti 
[470,23^1]	yat api āha īdṛśī tasya sā śaktiḥ kāraṇāt kutas āgatā svabhāvaḥ eṣa tasya iti kutas etat pratīyatām tat api ayuktam yatas svābhāvikī tasya śaktiḥ kārya anumeya iti uktam nanu yadi nirhetukeśvarasya tādṛśī śaktiḥ tatas asmad ādeḥ api kim na tādṛśī śaktiḥ iti atra vastu svabhāvaiḥ uttaram vācyam yaḥ evam bhavati agneḥ dāha śaktiḥ asti na ākāśa ādeḥ iti kasya atra paryanuyogaḥ kriyate yat ca uktam svabhāve adhyakṣataḥ siddhe yadi paryanuyujate tatra uttaram idam nyāyam na dṛṣṭe anupapanna tā anyathā yat kiṃcid abhidhāya niruttaraḥ tatra kṛtaḥ pareṇa vastu svabhāvaiḥ iti ādi uttaram uktvā tiṣṭhet tatas sarvaḥ api vijayī syāt iti 
[470,23^2]	yat api asat pratyakṣa siddhi vat anumāna ādi siddhe api svabhāve paryanuyuṃjānam prati etat uttaram nyāyyam eva anyathā dharma adharma apavarga ādau pratiniyata sādhana sādhya tva ādi svabhāve paryanuyuṃjānam prati etat uttaram na vācyam syāt janma antara sukha duḥkha ādi janana svabhāvau dharma adharmā viśiṣyete na ca tādṛś svabhāvau kvacid adhyakṣeṇa siddhau tatas ca tatra api evam paryanuyogaḥ syāt yāvat itas sādhanāt dharmasya janma tāvat adharmasya kha puṣpa ādeḥ vā kim na hetu paramparātaḥ api yāvat asya eva śaktiḥ āyātā tāvat anyasya kim na iti evam sarvatra paryanuyogaḥ kartum śakyate tasmāt kutas pramāṇāt itthaṃsvabhāvaḥ niścīyate iti evaṃvidhaḥ eva paryanuyogaḥ nyāyyaḥ pramāṇa siddhe tu svabhāve paryanuyogaḥ anupapannaḥ eva iti parameśvarasya hi tathāvidhaḥ svabhāvaḥ kārya anumāna balena siddhaḥ tasmāt ayuktaḥ tatra paryanuyogaḥ iti 
[471,19]	nanu tat anumānam eva na yuktam yat āha sthitvā apravṛtti saṃsthāna viśeṣa artha kriyā ādiṣu iṣṭa siddhiḥ asiddhiḥ vā dṛṣṭānte saṃśayaḥ atha vā vivakṣitam upādāna ādi buddhimat adhiṣṭhitam sthitvā pravartamāna tvāt daṇḍa ādi vat kṣiti ādi kāryam buddhimat kṛtam saṃsthāna viśeṣa viśiṣṭa tvāt gṛha ādi vat dharma ādi nimittam buddhimat adhiṣṭhitam pravartate artha kriyā kāritvāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti evamādiṣu kārya viśeṣeṣu hetuṣu yadi sāmānyam sādhyam tadā iṣṭa siddhiḥ siddham sādhyate iti arthaḥ atha īśvara ādiṣṭhānam sādhyam tatas asiddhiḥ dṛṣṭānte sādhya hīna tā iti arthaḥ saṃśayaḥ vā dṛṣṭānte daṇḍa ādau īśvara adhiṣṭhānasya aniścayāt atha vā saṃśayaḥ anaikāntika tvam tena eva īśvareṇa saḥ api hi sthitvā pravartate na ca kenacid adhiṣṭhitaḥ anavasthā prasaṅgāt saṃsthāna viśiṣṭa tvam api tena eva vā anaikāntikam vastu vyatirekeṇa saṃsthāna viśeṣa abhāvāt vastu tvam ca īśvare api asti iti tathā artha kriyā kāri tvam api tena eva anaikāntikam iti 
[472,5]	atra ucyate yat tāvat tad siddha sādhanam iti tat ayuktam na hi anīśvara vādinām kṣiti ādeḥ kartā tad upādāna ādeḥ adhiṣṭhātā ca kaścid siddhaḥ yena siddha sādhanam syāt 
[472,06^1]	nanu ca karma ja loka vaicitryam icchadbhiḥ saugataiḥ na kartṛ mātrasya adhikṣepaḥ kriyate na ca karmaṇaḥ acetana tvāt tena siddha sādhyatā anupapattiḥ cetanā mānasam karma iti vacanāt tad anyasya cetanatva asiddheḥ cetanasya api anya cetana adhiṣṭhita tve anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ iti tat api asat na hi karmaṇaḥ cit rūpa tve kiṃcid pramāṇam asti tathā ca ātmā eva caitanya yogāt cetanaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ tatas artha antaram ca karma na cetanam iti api ca tasya karmaṇaḥ samasta upādāna ādi parijñānam asti vā na vā yadi asti tatas saṃjñā mātram bhidyate atha na asti tatas katham tasya kartṛ tvam na hi yasya tantu ādi śakti parijñānam na asti sa paṭam racayitum śaknoti 
[472,06^2]	cetanaḥ api hi yaḥ yatra anabhijñaḥ sa tatra anya buddhi upagṛhītaḥ pravartamānaḥ kāryam niṣpādayitum śaknoti na anyathā etena etat api pratikṣiptam yat āha cetanā karma rūpā eva pravṛtteḥ yadi kāraṇam nirūpaṇe api na param tad nirūpaṇam iṣyate kāryam pratyupādāna ādi śakti parijñānam hi nirūpaṇam ucyate na ca karmaṇaḥ tat asti tasya eva īśvara tva prasaṅgāt yaḥ hi idam atra śaktam na idam atra iti evam nirūpya jagat utpattau pravartate saḥ eva īśvaraḥ iti kulāla ādiḥ ghaṭa ādau tad upādāna ādi śaktim nirūpya eva pravartate iti na dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ kulāla ādeḥ svātantrye ajñaḥ jantuḥ anīśaḥ ayam ityādi virodhaḥ iti ced na sarvatra svātantrya anabhyupagamāt daṇḍa ādi preraka tve hi tasya svātantryam prasiddham tāvatā aṃśena ca dṛṣṭānta tvam iti 
[473,8]	yat ca uktam akulāla ādi vat īśvaraḥ api anena preryaḥ syāt a iti anavasthā iti tat ayuktam yaḥ hi yatra anabhijñaḥ san pravartata sa tatra anyena jñānavatā preryate iti yuktam na ca īśvaraḥ kvacid anabhijñaḥ sarvajña tvāt yat ca uktam kartṛ tva siddhau sarvajña tva siddhiḥ sarvajña tve caa preraka tvam iti anyonya āśrayaḥ iti tat ayuktam na hi devakula ādi kāryeṇa tad upādāna ādi abhijña kartṛ anumāne anyonya āśraya doṣa avakāśaḥ asti iti 
[473,14_474,10]	nanu yadi sarvajñaḥ śaktaḥ ca īśvaraḥ tatas kim ajñam janam asat vi avahāre pravartayati evam hi anucita karaṇāt aviveka jñaḥ syāt tathābhūtam adharma phalam anubhāvayan ucita kārī eva ataḥ asau vivekavān ced na etat asti yasmāt adharma karaṇe api eṣa vartayati eva janminaḥ ayuktam kārayitvā asau katham yukte pravartayet pāpam kārayitvā tad vyāvartanāya dharme pravartayati iti kā iyam prekṣā pūrva kāritā bhagavataḥ tat idam āyātam prakṣālya tyakṣyāmi iti krīḍā arthā eva pravṛttiḥ ced prekṣā pūrva kriyā kutas ekasya kṣaṇikā tṛptiḥ anyaḥ prāṇaiḥ viyujyate kim ca śāstra antarāṇi sarvāṇi yadi īśvara vikalpataḥ satyāsatya upadeśasya pramāṇam dānataḥ katham asatya upadeśasya api dānāt asau pramāṇam iti mahat adbhutam atha asatyāni śāstrāṇi na īśvara kṛtāni tadvat anyat api kāryam na īśvara kṛtam iti 
[474,16]	atra ucyate yat tāvat ajñam janam asat vi avahāre kim pravartayati iti tat na vicāri tvāt vicāritam etat yathā bhagavān adharme api janam pravartayan na ayukta kārayitā bhavati iti krīḍā artha tve ca yat uktam tad abhyupagamena eva parihṛtam na hi bhagavataḥ krīḍā rāja ādi vat sukha arthā kim tu bāla krīḍā vat svabhāva viśeṣaḥ kiṃcid sādharmyāt bāla udāharaṇam 
[474,23_474,28]	nanu rāga ādi viyuktasya audāsīnyam eva yuktam atha loka karma ādhipatyāt audāsīnyam labhate tadā anya karma paratantraḥ katham īśvaraḥ kim ca upekṣā eva hi sādhūnām yukta asādhau kriyā krame na kṣate kṣāra nikṣepaḥ sādhūnām sādhu ceṣṭitam atha evaṃbhūtaḥ eva ayam kramaḥ tam eva asau prakāśayati ceṣṭate ca tad karaṇāya evaṃbhūtaḥ eva krama svabhāvaḥ na mayā nivārayitum śakyaḥ tatra lokaiḥ yathāyogam vihartavyam iti na etat tathā hi ātmani api vaśī na asau iti sa sphuṭam īśvaraḥ sva karma ucita ceṣṭasya lokasya kim anīśatā 
[475,4]	tat etat api ayuktam tathā hi rāga ādi viyuktasya audāsīnyam eva yuktam iti kim idam prasaṅga sādhanam uta svatantram iti yadi udāsīnaḥ bhagavān rāga ādi viyukta tvāt mukta puruṣa vat iti svatantra sādhanam ucyate tathā sati avinā abhau a siddhi artham dharmaḥ pratipattavyaḥ tasya ca kārya anumānena eva pratīteḥ katham audāsīnya siddhiḥ tad apratītau vā āśraya asiddhaḥ hetuḥ 
[475,9]	atha rāga ādi viyukta tvam abhyupagacchata audāsīnya abhyupagama artham prasaṅgaḥ kriyate na tasya kṣiti ādi kārya anumānena bādhita tvāt na hi rāga ādi yukte udāsīne vā bhagavati trasa sthāvara ādi ananta kārya utpattiḥ sambhavati iti uktam yat ca uktam anya karma tantraḥ katham īśvaraḥ iti tat na anabhyupagamāt cetanatantram hi acetanam na tu acetanaḥ tantraḥ cetanaḥ kuvinda tantu ādi dṛṣṭāntāt na ca karma anurūpam kāryam kurvan īśvaraḥ karma tantraḥ bhavati na hi tantu ādi anurūpa paṭa ādi kārī kuvinda ādiḥ tantu ādi tantraḥ iti ucyate 
[475,16]	nanu evam tarhi yathā tantu ādiṣu satsu api kṛtārthaḥ kuvinda ādiḥ paṭa ādi kāryam na karoti eva tathā īśvaraḥ kṛtārtha tvāt karma ādiṣu satsu api udāsīnaḥ kim na āste vayam api na jānīmaḥ saḥ eva praṣṭavyaḥ kasmāt tvam bhagavat na udāsīnaḥ iti vayam tu kārya darśanena tad anurūpam kartāram avagacchantaḥ na upālambham arhāmaḥ prāk uktam ca para artham pravartate para artham pravṛttasya api yathā duḥkha ādi janaka tvam tathā uktam tatas na kṣata kṣāra nikṣepaḥ ityādi api ayuktam 
[475,22]	svabhāvataḥ pravṛtti pakṣe api yat uktam ātmani api vaśī na asau ityādi tat api ayuktam na hi vaśī iti kṛtvā nityān ityādi tattva viparyayam karoti akaraṇe vā tasya vaśitvam nivartate kṣiti ādi ananta kārya kartṛ tvam eva hi vaśitvam parama aiśvaryam ca iti 
[475,28]	yat api śāstra antarāṇi ityādi tat api ayuktam sarva śāstrāṇām sākṣāt īśvara praṇīta tva anabhyupagamāt yat ca śāstram sākṣāt īśvareṇa uktam tat satyam eva atas satya upadeśa dānāt pramāṇam eva bhagavān mithyājñāna ādi nimitta adṛṣṭa adhiṣṭhātṛ tva dvāreṇa sarvasya hetuḥ kartā iti atas asau sarva śāstra kṛt api ucyate na tu evam asatya upadeśa dātā yathā svapna indrajāla ādi nimittena alīka arthān upadiśantaḥ eva asatya upadeśa dātāraḥ bhaṇyante na tu tad nimitta prayoktāraḥ api iti 
[476,5]	nanu ca ekasya api kāryasya ekaḥ kartā bahavaḥ ca dṛśyante tathā bahūnām api ekaḥ bahavaḥ ca iti tat katham avagamyate sarvasya jagataḥ ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ kartā na tu bahavaḥ anīśvarāḥ iti uktam atra yaḥ paridṛṣṭāni kāraṇāni prayuṅkte taiḥ ca na prayujyate sa svatantraḥ kartā iti ucyate na ca anīśvarasya paramāṇu adṛṣṭa ādiṣu bhū bhūdhara śarīra abhyantara avayava ādiṣu ca paridarśana pūrvakam prayoktṛ tvam sambhavati tatra bahavaḥ api anīśvarāḥ kṣiti ādeḥ kartāraḥ prāsāda viśeṣasya eva asaṃkhyātāḥ api stanandhayā iti 
[476,13]	atha īśvarāḥ eva bahavaḥ kṣiti ādeḥ kartāraḥ iṣyate tathā sati apasiddhāntaḥ te prāpnoti eka nirākaraṇe ca bahu abhyupagamaḥ aniṣṭa parihāre ati kauśalam khyāpayati kim ca teṣām īśvarāṇām kim aiśvaryam sarvajña tvam anuttamā śaktiḥ ca asti na vā yadi asti tadā aneka īśvara kalpanayā kim vaiyarthyāt atha na asti tadā teṣām niyamayitā kaścid prabhuḥ asti anyathā katham avirodhena sadā jagat utpatti ādiṣu pravarteran iti 
[476,20]	nanu ca guṇa tāratamya darśanāt abhiyoga viśeṣāt sāmarthya sambhavaḥ prāk asamarthanām api paścāt iti yuktam etat atyanta vilakṣaṇasya tu svabhāva siddha sāmarthya ātmanaḥ anugama rahitasya sādhana asambhavāt kutas siddhiḥ tat āha saṃsthāna saṅgamāt bhāvāḥ kṛtāḥ kartā iti sidhyatu ahetu guṇa yuktasya kutas eva tu siddha tā svābhāvika tve tattvasya jagat svābhāvikam bhavet tasya eva ekasya tat idam vyaktam īśvara ceṣṭitam kim ca īśvarāt īśvara tvasya prāptiḥ tasya api sānyatas tad anyasya api sā anyasmāt na svābhāvikaḥ īśvaraḥ utkarṣaḥ asti guṇānām ced śakra brahma tva sambhave īśvara tvam api prāptam na asti nityeśvara sthitiḥ 
[477,9]	atra ucyate yadi kṣiti ādīnām īśvaraḥ kartā na asti eva tatas saṃsthāna saṅgamāt bhāvāḥ kṛtāḥ kartā ityādi sarvam ayuktam eva syāt atha asti tathā api na īśvare vivādaḥ kin tu tad nitya tve na ca asmābhiḥ prathamam nitya īśvara pūrvaka tvam kṣiti ādiḥ sādhyate kin tu buddhimat kartṛ mātra pūrvaka tvam tatas adhikaraṇa siddhānta balena īśvara siddhiḥ anīśvarasya kṣiti ādi utpattau asāmarthyāt iti uktam siddhe tu sāmānyena īśvare paścāt tasya nitya tvam vicāryate tat ca vicāritam prāk iti tatas ca svābhāvika tvena tattvasya ityādi api ayuktam 
[477,17_477,21]	api ca bhuvana prakāśana tāpana svabhāva tve arkasya jagat tad svabhāvam bhavet iti apūrvā eṣā vācaḥ yuktiḥ svābhāvika tvam na asti arkasya iti ced nanu viśiṣṭa hetuka tve api jagat tad hetukam bhavet iti samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ kim ca nityānām api go tva aśva tva ādīnām niyata svabhāva tvam prapañcena prāk samarthitam iti īśvarāt īśvara tvasya ityādi api ayuktam dharmi grāhakeṇa kṣiti ādi kārya anumānena bādhita tvāt āśraya asiddha tvam vā 
[477,24]	yat api utkarṣaḥ asti guṇānām ityādi tat api ayuktam na hi āgamāt ṛte śakra ādi utkarṣa sadbhāve asti pramāṇam na ca āgamaḥ te pramāṇam tad prāmāṇye vā tatas eva nityasya īśvarasya api siddhiḥ buddha āgamaḥ ca asmākam na pramāṇam kim ca śakra ādi vat anīśvarasya api yadi yoga abhyāsa tapaḥ caraṇa ādi anuṣṭhānāt vā utkarṣaḥ tatas sātatyena asaṃkhyā trasa sthāvara ādi utpatti vināśau na syātām hiṃsā ādi a dharma utpādana abhibhavāt iti uktam 
[478,1]	nanu jñāna ādi prakarṣasya abhyāsa prabhava tvam sa anugamam yaḥ pratyācakṣīta tasya niranugame svābhāvika tve katham na pratikṣepaḥ yaḥ hi grāmam api muṣṇāti tasya araṇye trāṇā sambhavini kākṣam eti tat ayuktam na hi vayam jñāna ādeḥ abhyāsāt tāratamya bhāvinam prakarṣam pratyācakṣmahe yoginām tathā abhyupagamāt jagatkartuḥ ca tad kāryāni atha anupapatti balena svābhāvika tvam jñāna ādeḥ iṣṭam paramāṇu ākāśa ādeḥ aṇu tva mahat tva ādi vat niranugamasya pratikṣepe tu kṣaṇika tva ādeḥ api pratikṣepaḥ syāt tatra bādhaka pramāṇāt anugama siddhau atra api tatas eva siddhaḥ pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇika tvasya vastu nivṛttya uttādātmyasya ca grahaṇe api aniścayāt tad moha nivṛttiḥ eva bādhaka pramāṇāt kriyate iti ced nanu evam kṣiti ādīnām nitya aiśvarya upeta kartṛ pūrvaka tve pratyakṣeṇa gṛhīte api aniścayāt tad moha nivṛttiḥ eva bādhaka pramāṇena kriyate iti bruvāṇaḥ katham vāryate codya parihārayoḥ samāna tvāt iti 
[478,13_478,19]	tat evam sthitvā pravṛtti saṃsthāna viśeṣa artha kriyā ādiṣu na iṣṭa siddhiḥ na api asiddhi dṛṣṭānte daṇḍa ādau buddhimat adhiṣṭhānasya siddha tvāt sādhya viśeṣa apekṣayā tu sarva anumāneṣu api asiddhiḥ dṛṣṭānte syāt etena saṃśayaḥ api dṛṣṭānte pratyuktaḥ sādhya sāmānyasya niścita tvāt iti yat api saṃśayaḥ anaikāntika tvam iti tat api ayuktam yasmāt ubhaya saṃpratipanne vipakṣe vyabhicāra udbhāvanam yuktam na ca īśvaraḥ tvayā pratipannaḥ kim ca acetanasya kāla deśa ādeḥ viveka śūnyasya sthitvā pravṛttiḥ na sambhavati cetanaḥ tu svayam deśa kāla ādi nimittam tad prayojanam ca jñātvā sthitvā api pravartate iti avirodhaḥ 
[478,23]	saṃsthānam aviśeṣaḥ api īśvareṇa anaikāntikaḥ iti etat api vyāmoha jṛmbhitam na hi vastu mātram saṃsthāna viśeṣa tvena loke api prasiddham kim tarhi avayavānām saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ saṃsthāna viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate prasādhitaḥ ca avayavānām saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ avayavī ca atas paramāṇu vyatirekeṇa saṃsthānam na asti etat api ayuktam kim ca paramāṇavaḥ api kutaścid atiśayāt tri koṇa catuṣkoṇa vartula ādi a ākāreṇa pratibhāsantaḥ iti avaśyam eṣṭavyam anyathā tad pratibhāsasya avisaṃvādaḥ na syāt yatas ca atiśayāt trikoṇa ādi pratibhāsaḥ saḥ eva saṃsthāna viśeṣaḥ sa ca īśvare na asti iti katham bhagavān api saṃsthāna viśeṣaḥ iti yat api ayuktam artha kriyā kāritvam api tena eva anaikāntikam iti tat api ayuktam sa viśeṣaṇasya artha kriyā kāri tvasya anaikāntika tva abhāvāt acetanasya sataḥ kāryasya ca artha kriyā kāri tvam hi na buddhimat prayukta tvam vyabhicarati na hi bhagavataḥ acetana tvam kāryatvam vā asti iti 
[479,10]	yat api āha aprekṣā pūrvaka tvasya padārtheṣu upalabdhitaḥ acetana tvam tad hetoḥ iti yukti vidām nayaḥ aprekṣāvat padārthānām kāraṇam na ca yuktimat chāga ādīnām purīṣa ādeḥ vartulīkaraṇena kim tat api ayuktam prekṣā pūrva kāri nimitta abhāve hi cakṣuḥ ādiṣu api danta utthānam apāna ādiṣu api jihvā api syāt tad hetūnām nirviveka tvāt iti 
[479,18]	chāga ādi purīṣa ādeḥ vartulīkaraṇe prekṣāvataḥ kim prayojanam iti ced chāga ādīnām tādṛśena eva purīṣa viśeṣeṇa utsarga kāle sukham duḥkham ca bhavati iti tad nimitta karma phala sampādaka tvam eva prayojanam etena badarī kaṇṭaka mayūra candrikā ādi vaicitrya karaṇe api prayojanam draṣṭavyam tatra api avaśyam kasyacid sukham duḥkham vā darśanam sparśanam vā bhavati iti atas vicitram prāṇinām karma adhiṣṭhāya tad anurūpam phalam kurvataḥ katham aprekṣā pūrva kāri tvam bhavatu vā niṣprayojanam kāryam tathā api na īśvarasya asiddhiḥ tad anumānasya niravadya tvāt yathā bāla krīḍā kṛtāni hasti aśva ratha ādīni niṣprayojanāni api na acetanaiḥ eva hetubhiḥ kṛtāni tathā kṣiti ādīni api iti na khalu asiddha tva ādi doṣa rahitasya hetoḥ sādhya sādhaka tvam na yuktam asiddha tva ādi doṣa sadbhāve tu saḥ eva vaktavyaḥ kim anyena vikalpena asādhana aṅgena iti 
[480,2]	nanu asiddhatva doṣaḥ api atra asti buddhimat adhiṣṭhātṛ vyāptasya sanniveśa ādeḥ kṣiti ādau anupalambhāt tat āha siddham yādṛś adhiṣṭhātṛ bhāva abhāva anuvṛttimat sanniveśa ādi tat yuktam tasmāt yat anumīyate akriyā darśane api kṛta vṛddhiḥ bhavati prāsāda ādi bhedeṣu iva yadi tādṛśam sanniveśa ādi kṣiti ādiṣu api syāt tadā tatas adhiṣṭha atra numānam yuktam tad vilakṣaṇa sanniveśa ādi darśane tu adhiṣṭhātṛ a numitiḥ na yuktā iti āha vastu bhede prasiddhasya śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ na yuktā anumitiḥ pāṇḍu dravyāt iva hutāśane vastu bhede dṛṣṭe saṃsthāna ādi viśeṣe ghaṭa ādau yaḥ prasiddhaḥ viśeṣaḥ puruṣa adhiṣṭhāna lakṣaṇaḥ tasya kṣiti ādi gatasya anumitiḥ saṃsthāna ādi śabda sāmyena abheda mātrāt na yuktā 
[480,13_480,15]	na hi pāṇḍu śabda sāmyena abhedavataḥ vāṣpāditaḥ api agnau anumitiḥ bhavati pratyakṣa ābādhātaḥ pāṇḍu tvāt agni anumānam pravartate īśvara anumānam tu na bādhyate tatas tad pravṛttiḥ yuktā iti ced na etat yasmāt na na bādhyate iti evam anumānam pravartate sambandha darśanāt tasya pravartanam iti īritam anyathā kumbhakāreṇa mṛd vikārasya kasyacid ghaṭa ādeḥ karaṇāt sidhyet valmīkasya api tad kṛtiḥ 
[480,21]	kulāla anupalambhaḥ eva atra bādhā iti ced īśvare kim kim upalambhaḥ asti tasmāt ghaṭa valmīka ādīnām iva vastu sādṛśya abhāvāt na anumānam yuktam vastu sāmānya abhāve api śabda anuvṛttitaḥ eva anumānam bhaviṣyati iti ced tat ayuktam yatas jāti antare prasiddhasya śabda sāmānya darśanāt na yuktam sādhanam go tvāt chāga ādīnām viṣāṇi vat vivakṣā paratantra tvāt na śabda arthaḥ santi kutra vā tad abhāvāt artha siddhau tu sarvam sarvasya siddhyati 
[481,3]	kim ca yathā bhagavān nitya vyāpi tva ādi dharma yuktaḥ tathā ākāśam api tatra īśvaraḥ eva kāraṇam na ākāśam iti kutas ayam vibhāgaḥ yadi ca sadbhāva mātreṇa kāraṇa tvam kalpyate tadā śāstra auṣadha ādi sambandhāt caitrasya vraṇa rohaṇe asambaddhasya kim sthāṇau kāraṇa tvam na kalpyate atha sthāṇau vyāpārānupalambhāt akāraṇa tvam yadi evam īśvarasya api svabhāva bhedena vinā vyāpāraḥ api na yujyate nityasya avyatireki tvāt sāmarthyam ca duranvayam kim ca yeṣu satsu bhavati eva yat tebhyaḥ anyasya kalpane tad hetu tvena sarvatra hetūnām anavasthitiḥ tasmāt yatas yatas yat yat tat tat astu tatas tatas kiṃcid cetanataḥ kiṃcid anyatas ca iti niścayaḥ 
[481,18]	atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam yādṛś sanniveśa ādi prāsāda ādiṣu dṛṣṭam tādṛś eva yadi kṣiti ādiṣu syāt iti tat na maṭha prāsāda ghaṭa ādiṣu tad bhedeṣu mithas saṃsthāna vailakṣaṇye api adhiṣṭhātṛ pūrvaka tva avyabhicārāt atha teṣu sarvatra akriyā darśane api kṛta buddhiḥ bhavati na kṣiti ādiṣu iti tat kim idānīm akārya tvam eva kṣiti ādīnām na hi kṛtaka tvena apratīyamānānām kārya tvam vaktum śakyam kṛtaka tvena pratītau ca katham na kṛta buddhiḥ sarveṣām tu prāsāda ādiṣu api kṛta buddhiḥ na bhavati yathā ca cirantaneṣu prāsāda ādiṣu vyāpti abhijñasya eva kṛta buddhiḥ bhavati vyāpti mūḍhānām tu akṛtabuddhiḥ eva bhavati tathā kṣiti ādiṣu api iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ 
[481,26]	puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ prāsāda ādiṣu iva na kṣiti ādiṣu bhavati iti ced keṣām na bhavati kim prasiddha avina abhāvānām api uta vyāpti smṛti vikalānām prasiddha avina abhāvānām abhraṣṭa smaraṇānām tāvat bhavati eva puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ loke api hi vaicitryam jagataḥ kenacid dhātrā nirmitam iti asti pratītiḥ vyāpti grahaṇa smṛti vimūḍhānām tu prāsāda ādiṣu api keṣucid na puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ bhavati na etāvatā teṣām apuruṣa kṛta tvam api ca evam vedeṣu api puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ laukikānām mīmāṃsakānām ca na bhavati iti atas ca tatra api puruṣa kṛta tva sādhanāya uktāḥ vākya tva ādayaḥ asiddhāḥ hetavaḥ syuḥ 
[482,5_482,9]	kim ca anitya tva siddhi artham api uktam kṛtaka tva ādi sādhanam asiddham syāt na hi yādṛśam kṛtaka tva ādi ghaṭa ādiṣu dṛṣṭam yat śotra grāhyam na bhavati tādṛśam śabde asti iti tasmāt dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭa antika vaidharmya mātram etat sarva anumāneṣu samānam na īśvara anumānasya eva bādhakam iti yat punar etat pāṇḍu dravyāt iva iti tat ayuktam pāṇḍu tvasya hi dahana siddhau anaikāntika tvam bādhita viṣaya tvam vā 
[482,11_482,14]	yat punar etat na na bādhyate iti evamādi tat na anabhyupagamāt na khalu abādhātaḥ eva anumāna pravṛttim brūmaḥ kim tu pakṣa dharma tva ādi rūpāṇām pañcānām caturṇām vā grahaṇāt iti yat ca uktam anyathā kumbhakāreṇa ityādi tatra kumbhakāra śabdasya kaḥ arthaḥ abhipretaḥ kim avivakṣita viśeṣaḥ kaścid cetanaḥ kartā kim vā cakra ādi sāmagrī yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ iti kim ca atas prathame pakṣe na kiṃcid bādhitam valmīka ādeḥ api cetana kartṛ pūrvaka tva abhyupagamāt dvitīye tu pakṣe pratyakṣa bādhā api bhavati cakra ādi sāmagrī yukta puruṣa viśeṣa anupalambhe api valmīka ādeḥ utpatti darśanāt 
[482,19_482,22]	yat punar etat īśvarasya api anupalambhāt abhāvaḥ iti tat ayuktam dṛśya anupalambhaḥ hi abhāvam sādhayati na anupalambha mātram dharma adharma ādeḥ api anupalambhāt abhāva prasaṅgāt yat api āha nanu evam adṛṣṭam karma api na kalpanīyam tat kim idānīm śuṣiram iti eva jānu praveśaḥ yadi hi karma api parikalpya aparaḥ īśaḥ kalpyate tatas tatas api aparam iti anavasthā iti tat api ayuktam karmaṇaḥ hi kāraṇa śakti parijñāna pūrvaka prayoktṝtvā abhāvāt mṛd piṇḍa ādi vat adhiṣṭhātṛ apekṣi tvam yuktam tad adhiṣṭhānāt kulāla ādi vat paridṛṣṭa śaktīni kārakāṇi sva icchayā prayuṃjānaḥ tulya jñāna śaktikam adhiṣṭhātṛ antaram na apekṣate iti katham anavasthā adhika jñāna śaktikam apekṣate tatas anavasthā iti ced na yāvatsu tasya vyutpattiḥ tāvatsu anapekṣi tvāt 
[483,1]	na ca adhika apekṣa tve api anavasthā niratiśayāt nivṛtteḥ yatas hi anyasya adhikam jñānam sāmarthyam ca na asti sa niratiśayena jñānena sāmarthyena ca yuktaḥ adhiṣṭa atrantaram na apekṣate iti atas anavasthā nivartate niratiśaya anabhyupagame anavasthām sādhayataḥ pramāṇam na asti kārya utpatti virodhaḥ ca tasmāt yaḥ yatra anabhijñaḥ sa tatra anyam tad jñam apekṣate na tad jñaḥ api anyam tad jñam iti 
[483,7_483,10]	yadi tarhi bhū bhūdhara ādi kāryam prekṣāvatā kṛtam tadā tad saṃsthānam kim iti ati śobhanam na bhavati evam tarhi yeṣām bhū bhūdhara pradeśānām śarīra vṛkṣa ādi viśeṣāṇām ca saṃsthānam ati śobhanam teṣām kartā prekṣāvān abhyupagantavyaḥ kim ca kena api prajñā kṛtānām citra ādi kārya viśeṣāṇām na sarveṣām saṃsthānam ati śobhanam bhavati yathā eva hi prekṣāvān eva citrakāra ādiḥ vicitram kāryam kartum icchan kiṃcid śobhana saṃsthānam kiṃcid madhyama saṃsthānam karoti tathā bhagavān api sarvajñaḥ eva vicitra saṃsthānam jagat karoti iti atha vā śarīra indriya vat bhūmi ādikam api prāṇi karma anurūpam bhagavān karoti tatra devānām dharma bahula tvāt ati śobhanam saṃsthānam eva tat bhūmi ādikam karoti nārakiṇām tu adharma bahula tvāt tat bhūmi ādikam aśobhana saṃsthānam eva karoti idam bhū bhūdhara ākhyam bhukta śeṣa dharma adharma vipākavatām prāṇinām sthānam tena tad sukha duḥkha prakāra nimittam kṛtavān iti 
[483,18]	yat punar jāti antare prasiddhasya ityādi śloka dvayam tat api ayuktam na hi yathā vāc ādiṣu navasu artheṣu abhinnam nimittam vinā eva go śabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ tathā kṣiti ādiṣu api iti yadi hi ghaṭa ādiṣu kṣiti ādiṣu ca ekam vastu gatam kāryatva ādi lakṣaṇam sāmānyam na asti tatas katham saṃsthāna tvena kārya tvam sādhyate kāryatvena anitya tvam iti na hi atra viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti yena anitya tva sādhane kṣiti ādiṣu kārya śabda sāmya mātra tvena asiddham na bhavati buddhimat adhiṣṭhātṛ pūrvaka tva sādhane tu asiddham ubhayatra api ghaṭa ādiḥ eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ tatra anitya tvena yathā kāryatvasya vyāptiḥ prasiddhā tathā buddhimat adhiṣṭhātṛ pūrvaka tvena iti ubhayoḥ siddhiḥ asiddhiḥ vā astu na ca acetanānām viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti yena bhaṭa ādi hetavaḥ eva acetanāḥ buddhi madanadhiṣṭhāḥ na pravartante kṣiti ādi hetavaḥ tu acetanāḥ api buddhi madanadhiṣṭhāḥ eva pravartante iti 
[483,29]	yat punar etat nitya vyāpi tvā ādya viśeṣe api īśvaraḥ eva kāraṇam na ākāśam iti kutas ayam vibhāgaḥ iti tat api avicārita artham kārya anumānena eva vibhāgasya pradarśita tvāt kumbha ādau dṛṣṭānte hi buddhimān eva kartā laukika parīkṣāṇām prasiddhaḥ na tu ākāśam tena kṣiti ādau sādhye api buddhimān eva kartā sidhyati saḥ eva īśvaraḥ anīśvarasya tatra sāmarthya abhāvāt iti uktam etena śāstra auṣadha ādi sambandhāt ityādi api nirastam yadi nāma vraṇa rohaṇa ādiṣu sthāṇoḥ kāraṇa tvam pramāṇa abhāvāt na kalpyate bhagavataḥ kṣiti ādiṣu kāraṇa tvam kim na kalpyate na hi atra api pramāṇa abhāvaḥ na api īśvaraḥ pratyakṣaḥ yena sthāṇu vat asya kṣiti ādi kāryam prati asambaddha tā gṛhyate 
[484,10^1]	atha matam nirvyāpārasya kāraṇa tvam na yuktam vyāpāraḥ ca īśvarasya svabhāva bhedena vinā na yujyate iti svabhāva bhedena vinā iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim sahakāri bhedena vinā kim vā dharma bhedena vinā āhosvit ātma bhedena vinā iti tatra yadi sahakāri bhedena vinā iti abhipretam tatas asiddham yasmāt īśvarasya api sahakāri bhedaḥ asti eva tat atad rūpa akaraṇe api yathā na sahakāri vaiyarthyam tathā vakṣyāmaḥ atha dharma bhedena vinā iti abhipretam tat api asiddham bhagavataḥ api dharmāṇām sarvajña tva jagat kartṛ tva nitya tva ādīnām paraspara bheda upapatteḥ atha dharmāṇām bhedena vināśena vinā iti abhipretam tat api asiddham saṃyoga ādi dharmāṇām vināśa upapatteḥ 
[484,10^2]	atha sarva dharma vināśena vinā vyāpāraḥ na yujyate iti tat api ayuktam sarva dharma vināśe tu prārabdhasya vyāpāra asambhavāt atha ātma bhedena vinā iti arthaḥ tatra īśvara ātmā kim parasmāt na bhidyate kim vā svasmāt iti parasmāt na bhidyate iti ayuktam advaita prasaṅgāt advaitam ca nirākariṣyāmaḥ atha svasmāt na bhidyate tadā anyasya api kārakasya svasmāt bhedaḥ na asti iti na vyāpāraḥ syāt tatas sarvam jagat niṣkāraṇam syāt atha svabhāva bhedaḥ sva ātma vināśaḥ tena vinā vyāpāraḥ na yujyate tat kim idānīm vinaṣṭasya vyāpāraḥ sambhavati iti atha ajanaka svabhāva nivṛttau janaka svabhāvasya utpattau ca vyāpāraḥ sambhavati na nityasya iti etat ca kṣaṇika tva pratiṣedhe nirākariṣyāmaḥ 
[484,28]	yat punar etat nityasya avyatireki tvāt sāmarthyam duranvayam iti tat ayuktam tad sattva grāhaka pramāṇāt eva sāmarthya siddheḥ na hi anyathā kṣiti ādi kārya utpattiḥ sambhavati iti uktam go tva ādeḥ ca sāmānyasya nitya tve api anugata vyāvṛtta go pratyaya ādiṣu sāmarthyam vistareṇa prasādhitam atas ca na nityasya sāmarthyam duranvayam iti 
[485,4^1]	yadi api yeṣu satsu ityādi tat api ayuktam karma ādeḥ api akalpanā prasaṅgāt na hi pitṛ ādiṣu satsu bhavataḥ śarīra ādeḥ karma tṛṣṇā ādikam hetu tvena upalabhyate tatas tad kalpane api hetūnām avasthitiḥ syāt atha karma tṛṣṇā ādeḥ ekatra sāmarthyam dṛṣṭvā anyatra anumānena gamyate buddhimat adhiṣṭhātuḥ api ekatra sāmarthyam dṛṣṭvā anyatra anumānena kim na gamyate yatra dṛṣṭam tatra gamyatām na kṣiti ādi upādāna upakaraṇeṣu iti ced karma tṛṣṇā ādeḥ api yatra sāmarthyam dṛṣṭam tatra gamyatām na garbha śarīra ādiṣu iti 
[485,4^2]	śarīra tva ādi aviśeṣāt garbha śarīra ādiṣu api gamyate iti ced acetana tva ādi aviśeṣāt kṣiti ādi upādāna upakaraṇeṣu api kim na gamyate buddhimataḥ api adhiṣṭhātṛ mātrasya sāmarthyam gamyatām na īśvarasya adṛṣṭa tvāt iti ced yadi evam karma tṛṣṇā ādi mātrasya sādharmyam gamyatām na janma antara utpannasya adṛṣṭa tvāt garbha śarīra ādi hetoḥ sāmarthyāt janma antara utpāda siddhiḥ iti ced yadi evam kṣiti ādi upādāna adhiṣṭhātuḥ buddhimataḥ sāmarthyāt īśvara tva siddhiḥ iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tat evam sarva kāryāṇām buddhimat pūrvakatva siddheḥ kiṃcid cetanataḥ kiṃcid anyatas ca iti etat api ayuktam 
[485,18_485,22]	nanu īśvarasya kāraṇa tve vyartham karma syāt karmaṇaḥ kāraṇa tve vā na īśvaraḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ tathā hi yadi karma ādi nirbhartsya kāraṇam kāraṇam bhavet anyathā kāraṇam sarvam sarvasya api prasajyate tat etat ayuktam na hi kulālasya kāraṇa tve cakradaṇḍa ādeḥ vaiyarthyam cakra ādi nirbhartsya vā ghaṭa ādīnām kulālaḥ kāraṇam tad anirbhartsane vā na eva kāraṇam iti bhinna pramāṇa grāhya tvāt ca tathā hi buddhimat pūrvakatva anumānena īśvaraḥ pratīyate janma ādi vaicitryeṇa tu karma iti vicitram hi kāryam vicitra kāraṇa prabhavam dṛṣṭam yathā citra ādi tathā ca janma ādi kāryam vicitram dṛśyate 
[485,28]	janma tāvat vicitram kasyacid praśaste kule janma kasyacid apraśaste kasyacid sa dhane kasyacid nirdhane taratama yogena api draṣṭavyam jāti prajñā śīla rūpa vairūpya vyādhi vaicitriyeṇa ca iti 
[486,2]	tathā maraṇam vicitram kasyacid garbhe kasyacid jāta mātrasya māsa varṣa ādi kāla vikalpena dīrgha dīrghatara ādi duḥkha vikalpena ca praśasta apraśasta nimitta vikalpena ca iti na ca etat janma maraṇa vaicitryam bhūta vaicitrya ādi uktam āhāra ādi nimitta aviśeṣe api vaicitrya upalabdheḥ puruṣāṇām svabhāvena vicitra tvāt tad kṛta karma vaicitryāt eva janma ādi vaicitryam iti gamyate tad adhiṣṭhānāt ca īśvaraḥ citra ādi upakaraṇānām adhiṣṭhāne vā asti iti katham itarasya avaiyyarthyam iti 
[486,9_486,16]	yat api āha svabhāva pariṇāmena hetuḥ aṅkura janmani bhūmi ādiḥ tasya saṃskāre tad viśeṣasya darśanāt īśvarasya tu svabhāva pariṇāme api na asti saṃskārya tātaḥ na bhūmi ādi vat api kāraṇam tasmāt pṛthak aśakteṣu yeṣu sambhāvyate guṇaḥ saṃhatau hetu tā teṣām na īśvara ādeḥ abhedataḥ tat api ayuktam na hi pariṇāmāt eva hetuḥ tathā hi sthita upaviṣṭa gacchatām prāṇinām dhāraṇe sva ātmani jñāna utpādane ca bhūmi ādiḥ avikṛtaḥ api hetuḥ upalabhyate maṇi viśeṣaḥ ca niścalaḥ api jñāna sukha ādi hetuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ keṣucid kāryeṣu svabhāva pariṇāmena hetu tva siddhau sarvasya tathā eva hetu tvam viśeṣa abhāvāt iti ced na kṣaṇika tva prasaṅgāt kṣaṇika tvam ca niṣetsyāmaḥ 
[486,22^1]	kim keṣāṃcid acetanānām cetanā adhiṣṭhita tvena hetu tva siddhau sarveṣām acetana tva aviśeṣāt tathātvam kim na anumīyate bhūmi sphaṭika ādi vikārasya hi anupalambhāt abhāvaḥ sidhyati upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpti tvāt na tu adhiṣṭhātuḥ tasya atīndriya tvāt kulāla ādeḥ aindriyaka tvāt tasya katham na anupalambhāt abhāva siddhiḥ iti ced na sva vyatiriktasya cetanasyā pratyakṣa tvāt śarīra mātram tu kulāla ādeḥ pratyakṣam tasya ca anupalambhāt abhāvaḥ sidhyatu na tatas anyasya buddhimate iti deha abhāva siddhau etasya abhāva siddhiḥ adehasya kartṛ tva anupalambhāt iti ced evam tarhi mṛtasya aśarīra tvāt janma antara ārambhaka tvam na syāt tathā upalambha abhāvāt na api sa dehaḥ eva janma antaram ārabhate tathā upalambha abhāvāt eva na hi ekam deha santānam tyaktvā anyatra buddheḥ anupraveśaḥ kadācid dṛṣṭaḥ bāla kaumāra ādi bhedeṣu saṃkramaṇa vat iti ced na avasthā bhede api eka santāna tvāt saḥ eva jīvati iti darśanāt 
[486,22^2]	viparyayaḥ tu janma antareṇa ca buddha śarīram tyaktvā garbha śarīra anupraveśaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ svapne śarīra antara anupraveśaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti ced na tasya hi mithyātvāt satya tve hi suptasya prāṇa ādi nirodhaḥ api anyaiḥ upalabhyeta na ca apādāna kāraṇāt viprakṛṣṭa deśe kārya utpattiḥ dṛṣṭā tasmāt yathā adṛṣṭa mātra anuvādinām para loka siddhiḥ durlabha iti tasmāt kārya sāmānyena kāraṇa sāmānya anumitau tad kārya viśeṣa anurūpa s tad kāraṇa viśeṣaḥ api pratipattavyaḥ anyathā tad sāmānya anumitiḥ eva syāt iti yat api uktam tasmāt pṛthak aśakteṣu ityādi tat api ayuktam yasmāt atra api dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi ghaṭa ādau cetanānām kartṛ karma ādīnām pṛthak asāmarthyam ca dṛṣṭam tena kṣiti ādiṣu api saṃhatānām eva kartṛ karma ādīnām sāmarthyam anumīyate teṣām kartṛ karma ādīnām nitya tvam bhavatu anitya tvam vā vyāpaka tvam avyāpaka tvam vā yathābhūtānām tad kārya utpādaka tvam sambhavati tathābhūtānām eva siddhiḥ abhyupagantavyā iti alam asat graha abhiniveśena iti 
[487,19_487,22]	evam tāvat paramātmā nirṇītaḥ sāmpratam aparamātmā vicāryate saṃsāra phala upabhoktāḥ nāma anantaḥ aparaḥ sa khalu buddhi ādi kārya viśeṣāṇām āśraya bhūtaḥ anumātavyaḥ buddheḥ ādayaḥ buddhi ādayaḥ jñāna antāḥ icchā ādayaḥ iti arthaḥ tathā ca sūtram icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha jñānāni ātmanaḥ liṅgam vaiśeṣika pāṭha prasiddhyā tu buddhiḥ ādiḥ yeṣām iti draṣṭavyam katham punar buddhi ādibhiḥ ātmā anumīyate tat ucyate buddhi ādayaḥ kvacid samavetāḥ kāryatvāt guṇa tvāt vā rūpa ādi vat nanu atra sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ rūpa ādeḥ ātma āśrita tva aprasiddheḥ viruddhaḥ ca hetuḥ sādhya viparyayeṇa vyāpta tvāt iti na eṣa doṣaḥ sāmānyena āśraya mātra āśrita tva sādhanāt 
[488,4]	evam tarhi siddha sādhya tā buddhi ādīnām śarīra indriya āśrita tva abhyupagamāt na etat asti yaḥ hi buddhi ādīnām na eva āśrita tvam gamyate tam prati tāvat āśrita tvam eva sādhyate tad siddhau ca śarīra ādi āśraya pratiṣedhāt ātma siddhiḥ bhavati tathā hi śarīram buddhi ādi adhikaraṇam na bhavati bhūta kārya tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat 
[488,9]	nanu sādhya hīnam nirdarśanam buddhi ādi śūnya tvena ghaṭa ādeḥ pratyakṣataḥ adhigantum aśakya tvāt anumānena eva adhigame ca anavasthā prasaṅgāt iti na ghaṭa ādi āśraya tve tad darśibhiḥ bahubhiḥ buddhi ādeḥ grahaṇam prasajyeta bāhya indriya grahaṇa prasaṅgāt ca na hi bhūta āśrayiṇām guṇānām niyata eka puruṣa grāhya tvam antaḥkaraṇa eka grāhya tvam ca dṛṣṭam kim ca yāvat āśraya upalambha prasaṅgāt rūpa ādi vat na hi bhūta kārya viśeṣāṇām āśraye sati api atyanta ucchedaḥ dṛśyate lāvaṇya ādi vat iti ced na lāvaṇya ādīnām rūpa saṃyoga sparśānām anyatama svabhāva tvāt na ca rūpa ādi mātram mṛta śarīre api atyantam ucchidyate 
[488,16_488,25]	kim ca jīvat śarīra vat aghaṭa ādau api buddhi ādi sūcakasya pravṛtti ādeḥ upalambha prasaṅgāt dvayoḥ buddhi ādi āśraya tva aviśeṣāt jīvat śarīreṣu eva pravṛtti ādi janana samartham buddhi ādi na ghaṭa ādau tena tatra sati api buddhi ādau tad sūcakasya pravṛtti ādeḥ anupalambhaḥ iti ced na tad anupalambhe buddhi ādi mātrasya api sattve pramāṇa abhāvāt asattve api pramāṇam na asti iti ced na tathāvidhasya aprasiddha tvāt na hi yatra kadācid api pravṛtti ādi liṅgam na upalabhyate tatra buddhi ādi prasiddhiḥ asti tathā bhūtam vā astu mā vā bhūt yat tāvat prasiddham buddhi ādi tasya abhāvaḥ tāvat ghaṭa ādau niścita tad liṅgasya tatra pravṛtti ādi anyatamasya kadācid api anupalambhāt tatas na sādhya hīnam nidarśanam iti etena indriya manasām karaṇa tvena buddhi ādi āśraya tvam pratiṣiddham eva syāt nidarśanasya sādhya hīna tvam parihṛtam draṣṭavyam evam ca śarīra indriya ādi guṇa tve pratiṣiddhe pariśeṣāt yatra ete guṇāḥ vartante saḥ ātmā iti gamyate 
[488,29]	kim ca yena krameṇa icchā ādayaḥ guṇāḥ utpadyamānāḥ dṛśyante tena krameṇa eṣām śarīra āśraya tve sati utpattiḥ na syāt tathā hi yat jātīyasya arthasya sannikarṣāt sukham ātma upalabdha tvāt tad jātīyam artham paśyan ādātum icchati sā iyam ādātum icchā ekasya aneka artha darśinaḥ darśana pratisandhānāt bhavantī liṅgam ātma tattvasya na hi anyena anubhūte sukha hetau anyasya pratisandhānāt icchā bhavati iti 
[489,4]	tathā yat jātīyasya arthasya sannipāte duḥkham anubhūtavān ātmā tad jātīyam artham dṛṣṭvā dveṣṭi saḥ ayam dveṣaḥ ekasya aneka artha darśinaḥ darśana pratisandhānāt bhavan ātma liṅgam na hi anyathā asya darśana pratisandhānāt utpādaḥ sambhavati anya dṛṣṭe anyasya pratisandhānā sambhavāt na api anyadīyāt duḥkha hetu darśana pratisandhānāt anyasya dveṣaḥ sambhavati iti 
[489,9_489,12]	yat jātīyasya arthasya sannipāte sukha hetuḥ duḥkha hetuḥ vā avadhāritaḥ tad jātīyam artham paśyan īpsan jihāsan vāpti parihāra artham prayatate saḥ ayam prayatnaḥ ekasya aneka artha darśinaḥ darśana pratisandhānāt bhavan ātma liṅgam pūrva uktān nyāyāt yat jātīyasya arthasya sannidhāne sukham upalabdhavān tad jātīye arthe pratisandhānāt uktasya sukham utpadyate tat idam sukha darśana pratisandhāna jāt rāgāt utpannam ātma liṅgam niyata viṣaye hi buddhi bheda mātre na syāt deha antara vat 
[489,15_489,18]	tathā yat jātīya artha sannipāte duḥkham upalabdhavān tad jātīyam artham cireṇa api dṛṣṭvā tad pratisandhānāt dviṣataḥ duḥkham utpadyate tat idam duḥkham ted hetu darśana pratisandhāna bhāvinaḥ dveṣāt utpannam liṅgam ātmanaḥ na hi anyathā pratisandhāna ādi kramaḥ sambhavati iti kim ca anyat ūrddha tva ādi dharmakam artham dṛṣṭvā tad viśeṣa apekṣāyām vimṛśan bubhutsate tatas asya viśeṣa darśanāt nirṇaya jñānam bhavati tat idam jñānam vimarśa bubhutsābhyām saha eka kartṛkam gṛhyamāṇam ātmanaḥ liṅgam iti na hi adṛṣṭe anya dṛṣṭe vā smṛtiḥ pratisandhānam ca bhavati tad abhāve tad eka kartṛkāṇām icchā ādīnām api utpādaḥ na syāt iti 
[489,23_489,27]	indriyāṇām kartṛ tve api eka kartṛka tva sambhavāt na ātma siddhiḥ iti ced na indriyāṇām nānātvāt ekatva anupapatteḥ tatas ca eka indriya viṣaya upalabdhau indriya antar viṣaye smṛti pratisandhāna ādikam na syāt dṛśyate ca tat tasmāt na indriya vṛttayaḥ icchā ādayaḥ iti kim ca indriya upaghāte api tad viṣaye smṛti darśanāt na ca anubhavituḥ upaghāte smṛtiḥ sambhavati sādhāraṇa vigraha prasaṅgāt tatas ca bhinna abhiprāyeṇa pravṛtteḥ kadācid dehaḥ khaṇḍaśas bhavet 
[490,1_490,4]	kim ca nānā deheṣu iva nānā cetanā anumāpikā sukha ādi vyavasthā ekasmin api dehe gṛhyate vipratipattiḥ ca syāt eka gṛha avasthita aneka cetanānām iva kadācid vivāda ādayaḥ ca pravarteran śiṣya ācārya ādi sambandhaḥ api kvacid śarīre gṛhyeta cetanāni indriyāṇi vyavasthita viṣaya tvāt sat gṛha stha vat iti ced na vyavasthita viṣaya tvāt eva hi pradīpa ādi vat acetanāni na ca rūpa ādiṣu vyavasthita viṣayaḥ kaścid cetanaḥ asti yaḥ atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt 
[490,8]	pravṛtti nivṛttyā abhāva prasaṅgaḥ ca yasmāt odana ādau dṛṣṭe tad rasa ādi anumānāt puruṣaḥ pravartate nivartate vā tat ca anumānam na cakṣuṣaḥ na api rasanā ādeḥ sambhavati rūpa rasa ādīnām anyonya adṛṣṭa tvena tad sambandhasya kenacid api agṛhīta tvāt sva artha para artha asambhavāt ca na sva artham cakṣuḥ pravartate sva arthasya tena ananubhūta tvāt rasa ādikam ca pravartamānam api anubhavitum na śaknoti na api rasanā ādi artham pravartate saha tad arthena rasanā ādi svarūpa aparijñānāt na api rasanā ādeḥ eva pravṛttiḥ tasya hi deśa ādi ajñāne kva pravṛttiḥ syāt tasmāt ekaḥ rūpa rasa ādīnām indriya vyatiriktaḥ anubhavitā smartā vā asti yaḥ rūpam dṛṣṭvā rasa ādikam anumāya pravartate iti 
[490,17]	dehaḥ eva tarhi astu tathā ca uktam caitanya viśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣaḥ iti kaḥ ayam kāyaḥ kim avayavāḥ āhosvit avayavi iti yadi avayavāḥ tatas teṣām bahu tvāt bhinna abhiprāyeṇa pravṛtti ādayaḥ doṣāḥ pūrva uktāḥ bhaveyuḥ khaṇḍa khaṇḍīkṛtānām ca avayavānām jñāna ādayaḥ sva liṅgaiḥ upalabhyeran rūpa ādi vat na hi rūpa rasa ādayaḥ khaṇḍa khaṇḍīkṛtānām avayavānām na upalabhyante iti 
[490,23]	atha tad saṅghātaḥ kāyaḥ uktaḥ sa kim avyatiriktaḥ vyatiriktaḥ vā yadi avyatiriktaḥ tadā avayavāḥ eva nāma antareṇa uktāḥ tatra ca uktam doṣa jātam kenacid dharmeṇa viśiṣṭāḥ avayavāḥ saṅghātaḥ iti atra api cetana bahutva ādi doṣa anivṛttiḥ atha vyatiriktaḥ saṅghātaḥ sa sanniveśa rūpaḥ avayavī vā syāt ubhayathā api pratidinam vināśa tvāt kāla antara anubhūteṣu artheṣu smṛti pratisandhāna ādi anupapattiḥ saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ hi saṃyogasya niveśe sañcaya saṃsthāna ādi śabdaiḥ abhidhīyate tasya ca pratimuhūrtam vināśaḥ anyathā hi anna pāna upabhoga anupabhogābhyām dehasya puṣṭi daurbalya ādayaḥ na syuḥ saṃyoga vināśāt ca avayavinaḥ api vināśaḥ 
[491,7]	kim ca yat pratikṣaṇam kṣīyamāṇam hetum āśritya avatiṣṭhate tad sadṛśa para apara utpattiḥ santānena eva avatiṣṭhate yathā tailam āśritya pradīpaḥ tathā ca āhāram āśritya dehaḥ tiṣṭhati tasmāt pratikṣaṇa vināśī santānena utpadyamānaḥ pradīpa vat upalabhyate pratyabhijñāyate ca iti 
[491,12_491,15]	tathā ca yat kaiścid uktam bāla kaumāra ādi avasthāḥ eva bhidyante na tu avasthāvān iti tat nirastam evam hi pradīpa ādeḥ api vināśa siddhiḥ na syāt tatra api avasthāḥ eva bhidyante iti pāda prasārikā upapatteḥ satkārya siddhiḥ ca prasajyate mṛd piṇḍa ghaṭa kapāla ādi avasthāḥ eva vyakta avyakta sthūla sūkṣma dṛśya adṛśya ādi avasthāḥ eva bhidyante tathā ca pradhāna brahma dvaitādi siddhiḥ ekasya eva hi pṛthivī udaka jyotiḥ anila ādi avasthā eva iti avasthāḥ ca avasthāvataḥ anyatva ananya tvābhyām anirvacanīyāḥ iti evam pādau prasārya tiṣṭhan advaita vādī sāṃkhyaḥ ca katham pratyākhyātum śakyate tasmāt bheda vādabhicchadbhiviruddha dharma adhyāsāt bhedaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ sa ca dehe asti bāla kaumāra ādi dharmāṇām pariṇāma bhedasya ca viruddha tvāt iti tat evam dehasya api anavasthitvāt na smṛti pratisandhāna ādi āśraya tvam sambhavati 
[491,23]	kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt uttara dehasya pūrva deha anubhūte arthe smṛti ādi utpattiḥ iti ced kim punar pūrva dehaḥ uttara deham prati samavāyi kāraṇam uta asamavāyi kāraṇam āhosvit nimitta kāraṇam iti kim ca atas samavāyika kāraṇa tve vṛddha śarīra kāle api tad āśraya tvena pūrva śarīrāṇām sarveṣām grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ samavāyi kāraṇasya kāryeṇa virodha abhāvāt na ca samavāyi kāraṇa nivṛttau kāryasya avasthānam kvacid asti 
[491,28]	kim ca dvayoḥ bahūnām vā dravyāṇām dravyam prati samavāyi karaṇa tvam na tu ekasya na hi eka dravyāśritam dravyam kvacid upalabhyate iti kim ca atas samavāyi kāraṇa tvam dravyasya asamavāyikaraṇa tva asambhāvāt kārya anādhāra tve sati anyatarayā pratyāsattyā pratyāsannam yat kāraṇam tat asamavāyi kāraṇam ucyate 
[492,5]	pratyāsattiḥ tu kārya kāraṇa eka artha samavāyi lakṣaṇā yathā avayava rūpa ādīnām avayavi rūpa ādibhiḥ saha kāryā eka artha samavāyi lakṣaṇā ca laghvī yathā antaḥkaraṇa saṃyoga ādeḥ buddhi ādibhiḥ saha iti 
[492,9_492,12]	evam ca icchā ādīnām prayatna ādi ārambhe nimitta kāraṇa tvam ayuktam asamavāyi kāraṇa lakṣaṇa upapatteḥ avadhṛta sāmarthya tva abhāvāt na iti ced sāmarthyān avadhāraṇe tarhi kāraṇa tvam eva na asti atha antaḥkaraṇasya yathā sarva ātma viśeṣa guṇa utpattau sāmarthyam na tathā iccha ādīnām tena teṣām asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam na iṣṭam manaḥ saṃyogasya eva samartha tvāt iti na adṛṣṭa abhāve manaḥ saṃyogasya sāmarthya an avadhāraṇāt adṛṣṭasya api vā asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam astu 
[492,16_492,20]	kim ca guru tva drava tva ādīnām karma utpattau asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam na abhyupagantavyam mūrteḥ eva samartha tvāt na hi mūrti abhāve kvacid kriyā bhavati tasyāḥ ubhayoḥ atha samavāyi kāraṇa tvam na ca ayam niyamaḥ asti ekasya eva vā samavāyi kāraṇa tvam iti āstām tāvat ayam vicāraḥ tat na dehaḥ asamavāyi kāraṇam nimitta kāraṇa tve tu na smaraṇa ādi upapattiḥ pitṛ prapitāmaha ādi anubhūta artheṣu api smaraṇa ādi prasaṅgāt 
[492,23]	syāt etat na asmākam bauddhānām iva niranvayaḥ vināśaḥ kin tu avayavi vināśa anantaram avasthita saṃyogaiḥ avayavaiḥ anyat dravya antaram ārabhyate tatra yathā pūrva deha āśrita rūpa ādi vināśe api tad sadṛśaḥ eva rūpa ādayaḥ tad avayava rūpa ādibhiḥ ārabhyante tathā pūrva deha saṃskāra nivṛttau api tad sadṛśaḥ eva saṃskāraḥ tad avayava saṃskāraiḥ ārabhyate tatas pūrva deha anubhūteṣu api artheṣu uttara dehe smaraṇa ādi upapattiḥ iti 
[493,6]	na etat asti rūpa ādīnām hi sarvatra kārya dravye kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ tena yāvat paramāṇuṣu guṇa antara prādurbhāvaḥ na bhavati tāvat yaḥ avayavī taiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ pāramparyeṇa api ārabhyate tatra tatra tad sadṛśāḥ eva rūpa daye utpadyante iti yuktam na tu evam paramāṇuṣu saṃskārāḥ santi ananubhavitṛ tvāt anubhavitṛ tve tu cetana bahu tva ādayaḥ doṣāḥ uktāḥ śarīrasya ca anubhavitṛ tve tasya eva saṃskāraḥ astu na tad avayavānām tatas anya tvāt 
[493,12_493,20]	kim ca māṃsa āśinām śarīram śaśa mahiṣa varāha ādi śarīra avayavaiḥ api ārabhyate tatas tadā anubhava saṃskārāṇām api utpattau tad anubhūta artheṣu api smṛti ādi prasaṅgaḥ syāt atha vā śaśa mahiṣa ādi deha avayavānām carvaṇa ādi abhighātāt āparamāṇu antaḥ vināśaḥ tena saṃskāraḥ na anuvartate iti evam tarhi bāla ādi śarīra avayavānām api āparamāṇu antaḥ vināśaḥ sarvatra saṃcaradbhiḥ vāyu agni rasa ādibhiḥ kriyate tatas tad saṃskāra anuvṛttiḥ api ayuktā avināśe vā bāla ādi deha avayavānām aṅguli ādīnām tathābhūtānām eva sarvadā eva grahaṇam syāt pathya auṣadha ādi kṛta viśeṣa upalabdhiḥ ca na syāt iti tasmāt śarīrasya api pratikṣaṇa vināśi tvāt na icchā ādya āśraya tvam yuktam kim ca pūrva abhyasta smṛti anubandhāt ityādi nānādiḥ icchā ādīnām āśrayaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ tat na dehaḥ indriyāṇi vā prāṇa ādiḥ vā viṣayaḥ vā icchā ādīnām āśrayaḥ sambhavati deha vat indriya ādīnām api anādi tva asambhavāt iti 
[493,24]	manasaḥ tarhi nitya tvāt icchā ādi āśraya tvam astu na tasya api karaṇa tvāt vā asya asya ādi vat asiddhim iti ced na tad sattva grāhaka pramāṇaiḥ eva karaṇa tva siddheḥ kim ca icchā ādya ādhārasya vibhu tva pratipādanāt manasaḥ tu yugapad jāna anupapattyā aṇu tvam prasādhitam manasaḥ khalu vibhu tva icchā ādhāra tva abhyupagame saṃjñā mātre vivādaḥ iti 
[493,29]	jñānam eva vāsanābhiḥ vāsitam manaḥ iti ucyate tad āśrayaḥ eva icchā ādyaḥ iti ced na asthira tvena jñānasya vāsanā ādya āśraya tva anupapatteḥ sthiram hi vāsakena vāsyamānam dṛṣṭam sambaddham ca yathā puṣpa ādinā vastra ādikam āśraya tvam api sthirasya sambaddhasya ca dṛṣṭam yathā kuḍya ādeḥ iti na ca jñānasya sthairyam asti jñāna antareṇa icchā ādinā vā vinaṣṭa tvāt tasmāt na jñānam kenacid vāsitam na api kasyacid āśrayaḥ iti 
[494,6]	nanu idam asiddham nidarśanam na hi kṣaṇika vādinām sthiram kiṃcid asti na api sambandhaḥ kasyacid vastra ādeḥ api hi vāsanā puṣpa ādi sahitāt pūrva kṣaṇāt viśiṣṭa utpādaḥ eva āśraya bhāvaḥ tu kuḍya ādeḥ api janakatva viśeṣaḥ eva iti na atra api dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt na hi akṣaṇika vādinām kiṃcid asambaddham bhinna kālam ca vāsyamānam dṛṣṭam na api bhinna kālasya asambaddhasya ca kasyacid āśraya tvam dṛṣṭam iti 
[494,12]	bīja ādi vat iti ced atha manyase yathā śāli bījāt aṅkuraḥ tad śakti viśiṣṭaḥ utpadyate tatas api patra nāla ādikam tad śakti anuvidhānena utpadyamānam śālibījam eva janayati na yāvadi bījam atat pūrvaka tvāt tathā pūrva buddhi viśeṣāt uttarottaram buddhi antaram pūrva buddhi śakti anuvidhānena sakala āhita śakti kalāpam utpadyate yat ca tad uttara buddhiṣu pūrva buddhi śaktīnām ādhānam sā vāsanā iti 
[494,18^1]	na asiddha tvāt na tāvat bīja ādīnām niranvayau vināśa utpādau siddhau na api uttara buddhiṣu pūrva buddhi śaktīnām ādhānam siddham bīja ādīnām tāvat sūkṣma avayava anuvṛttiḥ asti śukra śoṇita ādi avayava anuvṛtti vat yathā mātuḥ udare śukra śoṇita ādi avayava nivṛttau tad avayavaiḥ avasthitaiḥ eva rasa avayava sahitaiḥ avayavi antaram ārabhyate garbhāt niṣkrāntasya api avayavi nivṛttau avayava anuvṛttiḥ draṣṭavyā tathā bīja ādi nivṛttau api tad avayavaiḥ avasthitaiḥ eva bhūmi avayava sahitaiḥ patra nālā ādikam ārabhyate tatra śukra śoṇita ādi avayavaiḥ sthirāḥ sambaddhāḥ ca rasa avayavāḥ bīja ādi avayavaiḥ bhūmi avayavāḥ ca bhāvyante te tathā bhāvitāḥ tad aviparītam kāryam ārabhante tathā pūrva buddhibhiḥ sthiraḥ sambaddhaḥ ca ātmā bhāvyate kim uktam bhavati tatra saṃskāra viśeṣaḥ kriyate sa ca tathā bhāvitaḥ tad buddhi anukāreṇa smṛtim pratisandhānam ca sva ātma samavetam karoti iti evam ca sāṃkhyā uktā prakriyā na naiyāyikānām siddhā na api naiyāyikā uktā prakriyā sāṃkhyānām siddhā 
[494,18^2]	tatas ca pakṣa dvaye api ubhaya prasiddhaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ na asti tatas kasya atra siddhiḥ syāt yatra pakṣe smṛti pratisandhāne ca upapadyete tasya siddhiḥ na ca anātma vādinām smṛtiḥ sambhavati anya dṛṣṭasya anyena smaraṇa asambhavāt anyathā ekena dṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ sarvaiḥ smaryeta yathā ca asmākam anya anubhūtaḥ arthaḥ na anyena smaryate iti atra ubhaya prasiddhaḥ asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ santāna antaram na tathā bhavataḥ kiṃcid ubhaya prasiddham udāharaṇam asti saḥ eva anubhavaḥ smartā na dṛṣṭaḥ iti asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti ced mā bhūt anubhavaḥ smartā anubhāvitā hi smartā iṣyate na ca anubhavaḥ eva anubhāvitā tayoḥ kriyā kartṛ rūpayoḥ eka tva ayogāt na hi cchedaḥ evat chetā iti yuktam yaḥ ca anubhāvitā sa yadi tathā eva smartā na bhavati mā bhūt kāla antareṇa bhaviṣyati iti kaḥ atra virodhaḥ tatas anyasya ca kāla antareṇa api smartṛ tve santāna antarāṇām api smartṛ tva prasaṅgaḥ iti uktam 
[495,11]	kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt aprasaṅgaḥ iti ced atha manuṣe syāt ayam prasaṅgaḥ yadi aviśeṣeṇa anya dṛṣṭam anyaḥ smarati iti ucyate kin tu kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt anya tve api smṛtiḥ iti bhinna santāna buddhīnām tu kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na asti tena santāna antarāṇām smṛtiḥ na bhavati na punar eka santānikīnām buddhīnām kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na asti yena pūrva buddhi anubhūte arthe tad uttara buddhīnām smṛtiḥ na syāt iti 
[495,16_495,20]	na nānā tvasya avañcanāt nānātvam hi smṛtya sambhave sādhanam uktam tat ca kārya kāraṇa abhidhāne api na vañcitam na hi kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhidhānena tasya asiddha tva ādīnām anyatamaḥ doṣaḥ pratipādyate na api sva pakṣa siddhiḥ anena kriyate na hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt smṛtiḥ iti atra ubhaya prasiddhaḥ asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ karpāse rakta tāvat iti ced atha api syāt yasmin eva hi santāne āhitā karma vāsanā phalam tatra eva badhnāti karpāse rakta tā yathā iti 
[495,23]	na sādhana dūṣaṇa asambhavāt anvaya ādi abhāvāt na sādhanam na hi kārya kāraṇa abhāvāt smṛtiḥ karpāse rakta tāvat iti anvayaḥ sambhavati na api yatra na smṛtiḥ tatra na kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti vyatirekaḥ asti asiddha tva ādi anudbhāvanāt na dūṣaṇam na hi pūrva buddhi anubhūte arthe uttara buddhīnām smṛtiḥ na sambhavati iti tatas nyatvāt santānānatara buddhi vat iti asya hetoḥ karpāse rakta tāvat iti anena kaścid doṣaḥ pratipādyate 
[496,2]	pariśeṣa asiddha tva pratipādanāt iti ced syāt etat na khalu pratyakṣeṇa anubhava smṛtyoḥ kvacid eka ādhāra tvam dṛṣṭam yena tayoḥ ātma āśrita tvam pratipadyemahi pariśeṣaḥ ca asiddhaḥ kārya kāraṇa abhāvena smaraṇe api avirodhāt atha anya tve smaraṇam na dṛṣṭam nanu eka tve api na dṛṣṭam iti samānam kim ca anyasmin rakte anyat raktam na dṛśyate iti karpāsa bīje rakte tad santāna bhāvinaḥ api karpāsasya rakta tā mā bhūt tatra api ātma āśritā rakta tā iti abhyupagantavyam tulya nyāya tvāt 
[496,8]	kim ca tvad pakṣe api karma anavasthāyi grahaṇāt iti anena sūtreṇa buddhīnām āśutara vināśi tvam pratipāditam tatas ca yena anubhavena anubhūtaḥ arthaḥ sa naṣṭaḥ kāla antare smṛtiḥ kutas syāt saṃskārāt iti ced na tasya anubhavāt artha antara tvāt tad artha antarasya ca tad artha smṛti hetu tve hi atiprasaṅga syāt atha artha antara tva aviśeṣe api yaḥ saṃskāraḥ yena anubhavena janitaḥ saḥ eva tad artha smṛtim janayati iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ yadi evam tvayā api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva niyāmakaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ tatas saḥ eva niyāmakaḥ astu kim tatra antar gaḍuna ātmanā kalpitena 
[496,17]	atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam pratyakṣeṇa anubhava smṛtyoḥ kvacid eka ādhāra tvam na dṛṣṭam iti tat na dṛṣṭa tvāt tathā hi pūrvam yam artham anubhūtavān aham tam etarhi smarami iti yaḥ aham anubhavitā saḥ aham smartā iti anubhava smaraṇayoḥ abhinna ātma ādhāra tvam liṅga liṅgi sambandha smṛti anapekṣam āpta upadeśa anapekṣam ca niścinoti na ca iyam bhrāntiḥ visaṃvāda abhāvāt sukha ādeḥ api pratyakṣa tvam apahnuvānaḥ anena eva nyāyena pratibodhayitavyaḥ tathā anusandhāna icchā dveṣa ādīnām api eka kāraṇa tvam pratyakṣataḥ gṛhyate yam aham asprākṣam tam etarhi paśyāmi iti tam dṛṣṭvā aham eva icchāmi vā dveṣmi vā tam icchan dviṣan vā prayate prayatamānaḥ aham tam artham prāpya sukhī duḥkhī vā saṃvṛttaḥ asmi iti tat evam aham iti etasmin vijñāne yaḥ arthaḥ cakāsti tad adhikaraṇāḥ smṛti anusandhāna icchā ādayaḥ pratyakṣataḥ pratibhānti iti atas pratyakṣeṇa api ātmā gṛhyate na hi aham iti jñānam sandigdham bhrāntam vā na api laiṅgikam śābdam vā 
[496,29_497,3]	na api śarīra ālambanam tad ālambana tve hi bālya avasthāyām mūrkhaḥ aham sukhī sukhī duḥkhī vāsam idānīm tu vidvān nirujaḥ rogī vā abhūt iti avagamaḥ na syāt bālya ādi śarīrāṇām bhinna tvāt na hi yaḥ aham gauraḥ saḥ aham kṛṣṇaḥ iti nanu asti pīnaḥ aham gauraḥ aham iti evamādi pratyayaḥ sa katham ātma ālambanaḥ syāt tasya pīna tva ādi dharma asambhavāt tat kim idānīm ākhavaḥ santi iti gṛham ādīpyate na hi nīlaḥ sphaṭikaḥ iti evamādi jñānam yathārtham na sambhavati iti etāvatā śuklaḥ sphaṭikaḥ iti api mā bhūt pīnaḥ aham ityādi api jñānam śarīra upādhikam ātma ālambhanam eva tatra yadi bhedam tiraskurvat upajā tadā tat bhrāntam eva nīlaḥ sphaṭikaḥ iti ādika jñāna vat atha pīnaḥ aham pīna śarīravān aham iti evam pratyeti tatas satyam eva iti 
[497,11]	asti ca bhedena api pratipattiḥ sthūlam kṛśam vā mama śarīram iti gauram kṛṣṇam vā madīyam śarīram iti tathā mama atra icchā dveṣaḥ vā iti asti me prayatnaḥ sukham mama utpannam duḥkham vā iti guru prasādāt mayā viśiṣṭam jñānam prāptam iti evam icchā ādayaḥ api bhedena eva pratīyante tathā madīyam cakṣuḥ iti evamādi jñānam ātma indriya bheda grāhakam draṣṭavyam 
[497,17]	nanu madīyaḥ ātmā iti eṣā api pratipattiḥ asti yadi evam pratipannaḥ ātmā pratipanne ca vivādaḥ na yuktaḥ sva vacana virodhāt aniṣṭa āpādana artha tvāt iti ced syāt etat mama śarīram mama indriyam mama icchā ādayaḥ iti atra śarīra ādi vyatiriktam ālambanam aham iti jñānasya abhyupagacchataḥ mama ātmā iti atra ātma vyatiriktam ālambanam prasajyate iti na apratibhāsanāt na hi mama ayam ātmā iti śarīra icchā ādi vat pratyakṣatas pratibhāti na api indriya vat anumānena mad pratyaya viṣayāt anyaḥ ātmā pratibhāti kim tu aham iti ātmānam pratyakṣatas pratipadya ātma antara vyavacchedena para prati iti artham ātmā iti nirdiśati mama ātmā aham eva iti arthaḥ yadā punar śarīram indriyam vā ātma śabdena nirdeṣṭum icchati tadā mama ātmā iti bheda abhidhānam eva idam śarīra ādeḥ api ātma upakāraka tvena bhṛtya vat ātma tvena upacārāt 
[497,28_498,7]	kim ca mad pratyaya viṣayāt bhedena ātma jñānam yadi bādhyamāna tvāt bhrāntam bhavati śarīra ādi bheda jñānam tu kasmāt bhrāntam na hi ekatra keśa ādi jñānasya bhrānta tve sarvatra bhrānta tvam yuktam bhrānta abhra anta viśeṣaṇa abhāva prasaṅgāt tasmāt yathā atīta anāgata vartamānānām śarīra bhedānām mama iti eka adhiṣṭhātṛ tvena pratisandhīyamāna tvāt mad pratyaya ālambanāt artha antara tvam tathā icchā dveṣa prayatna sukha duḥkha bheda jñāna bhedānām traikālikānām mama iti eka sambandhi tvena pratisandhānāt tat ekasmāt artha antara tvam tat eka kartṛka tvam ca iti kim ca abhinna sambandhinaḥ icchā ādi bhedāḥ mama iti eka pratisandhāna viṣaya tvāt eka nartakī pratisandhāna viṣayaḥ iva prekṣakāḥ iti enu mānena api eka ādhāra tvam smṛti anubhava icchādi bhedānām niścitam tasmāt yat uktam na anubhava smṛtyoḥ kvacid eka ādhāra tvam dṛṣṭam iti etat ayuktam 
[498,12]	yat api uktam pariśeṣaḥ ca asiddhaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena smaraṇe api avirodhāt iti tat api ayuktam śiṣya ācārya ādi buddhīnām kāraṇa bhāve api smṛti ādi darśanāt eka santāna tve satī iti ced kārya kāraṇa bhāvam muktvā kaḥ anyaḥ santānaḥ tad abhyupagame vā ātmā eva nāma antareṇa abhyupagataḥ syāt 
[498,17]	upādānakāraṇa kṛtaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva santānaḥ iti ced na sambandha viśeṣa abhāva kāraṇa tva mātrā viśeṣāt upādān a itara vibhāga anupapatteḥ yathā asmākam janakatvā aviśeṣe api samavāyi asamavāyi nimitta kāraṇa vibhāgaḥ sambandha viśeṣāt na tathā tava kāraṇānām upādān a itara vibhāge nimittam paśyāmaḥ santāna janakam yat tat upādānakāraṇam iti ced na itaretara āśraya tva prasaṅgāt santāna janaka tvena upādāna kāraṇa tvam upādāna kāraṇa janya tvena ca tad santāna tvam iti loke tu samāna jātīyānām kārya kāraṇa bhāve santāna vyavahāraḥ tat yathā brāhmaṇa santānaḥ śūdra santānaḥ iti tad prasiddhyā ca asmābhiḥ api śabda pradīpa ādiṣu santāna vyavahāraḥ kriyate 
[498,27]	tava api yadi evam abhipretaḥ santānaḥ tatas katham na śiṣya ācārya buddhīnām eka santāna tvam na hi āsām samāna jātīya tvam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vā na asti tatas śiṣyasya yathā cira vyavahitāḥ api buddhayaḥ pāramparyeṇa kāraṇam iti tat anubhūte api arthe smṛtiḥ bhavati tathā upādhyāya buddhayaḥ api ājanma prabhṛti utpannāḥ pāramparyeṇa kāraṇam iti tad anubhūte api arthe smṛtiḥ bhavet 
[499,4_499,7]	kim ca dhūma śabda ādīnām upādānakāraṇam vinā eva utpattiḥ syāt na hi teṣām api anādi prabandhena samāna jātīyam kāraṇam asti iti śakyate vaktum tathā ca jñānasya api garbha ādau anupādāna eva utpattiḥ syāt iti para loka abhāvaḥ atha dhūma śabdānām vijātīyam api upādānam iṣyate evam tarhi jñānasya api garbha śarīram eva astu na janma antara jñānam kalpanīyam yathādarśanam hi upādānam iṣṭam anyathā dhūma śabda ādīnām api anādi santānaḥ kalpanīyaḥ syāt 
[499,11]	nanu śarīrasya upādāna tve tasya aviśeṣāt aneka vikalpa jñāna utpattiḥ na syāt na hi dhūma śabda ādīnām tad upādānāt aviśiṣṭāt viśeṣaḥ sambhavati iti na vīṇā ādi upādāna aviśeṣe api śabda vailakṣaṇya upalabdheḥ prayatna ādi vailakṣaṇyāt atra vailakṣaṇyam iti ced evam tarhi pratikṣaṇam rasa dhātu ādi pariṇāma vailakṣaṇyāt jñāna vailakṣaṇyam bhaviṣyati na ca śarīra antarvartinaḥ avayavāḥ pitta vāta ādayaḥ pratyakṣāḥ yatas teṣām viśeṣa aviśeṣau pratyakṣau syātām tayoḥ kārya eka samadhigamya tvāt 
[499,18_499,23]	etena yat uktam ayādṛśāt vāta ādi vaiṣamyāt maraṇam tad nivṛttau punar ujjīvana prasaṅga a iti tat api apāstām maraṇa hetoḥ api antar varti tvena kārya eka samadhigamya tvāt na tad nivṛttiḥ api apratyakṣā bāhyasya api hi padārthasya hi maraṇa śakti aśaktī na pratyakṣe mantra ādinā apahata śaktiṣu viṣa dravyeṣu saṃskrāmita viṣa śaktiṣu ca dadhi ādiṣu apratibhāsanāt etena yat uktam atathābhūtāt eva vyādhi viśeṣāt kaścid mriyate kaścid na iti atas na vāta ādi vaiṣamyam api maraṇasya hetuḥ iti tat api nirastam tathābhūta tvasya niścetum aśakya tvāt 
[499,26]	na ca karma nimittam maraṇam api tvad pakṣe sambhavati karmaṇaḥ anavasthita tvena hetu tva asambhavāt vinaṣṭasya api hetu tve mokṣa abhāva prasaṅgāt śakti utpāda paramparayā niyata kāla phala hetu tvam karpāse rakta tāvat iti ced na dṛṣṭāntasya api asiddha tvāt na hi karpāse api niranvaya vināśa utpāde rakta tā sambhavati kim tarhi bīja ādi avayava anvaye sati iti api ca evam bhūta caitanya vādinaḥ api śaknuvanti vaktum mātā pitroḥ anvaye kenacid kṛtam karma śukra śoṇita ādi śakti utpāda paramparayā kiyati puruṣe kadācid phalati karma vipāka kālaḥ tu aniyataḥ tvayā api iṣṭaḥ akṛta abhyāgama ādi doṣaḥ api ubhayoḥ samaḥ iti 
[500,9]	yadi ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt smṛti ādi niyamaḥ tadā bīja aṅkura patra nāla ādi vat avasthā niyamena eva kāla niyamena ca bhavet tathā hi bījāt bhūmi udaka ādi sambandhāt niyatena eva kālena aṅkuraḥ eva bhavati na parṇa nāla ādīnām anyatamam aṅkurāt patram eva bhavati na nāla ādi anyatamam bījam vā patrāt na alam eva bhavati yathā dṛṣṭa kāla niyamena tantu anantaram eva dvitra ādi māsavyavadhādena vā na ca evam smṛti anubhava ādīnām avasthā niyamaḥ kāla niyamaḥ vā asti tasmāt na kārya kāraṇa abhāvāt smṛti ādi niyamaḥ iti 
[500,16]	kim ca sarva karma vāsanānām eka jñāne tādātmyena avasthānāt eka vipāka kāle sarva vipāka prasaṅgaḥ tādātmya virodhaḥ vā bīja vat iti ced syāt etat yathā aṅkura nāla ādi aneka vāsanā ātmakasya api bījasya na yugapad sarva janaka tvam tathā jñānam api aneka saṃskāra ātmakam na yaugapadyena smṛti sukha ādīni ca janayati iti na anahi upagamāt na mayā bījasya nāla ādi janikāḥ api śaktayaḥ iṣyante kin tu viśiṣṭam bījam viśiṣṭa aṅkura utpattau eva śaktam viśiṣṭaḥ aṅkuraḥ tu viśiṣṭa parṇa utpattau eva iti yugapad vicitra śakti yuktam jñānam na ca yugapad vicitram kāryam janayati iti ati yuktimat 
[500,24_501,3]	atha krameṇa utpadyamānānām jñānānām krameṇa eva śakti yogaḥ tatas krameṇa smṛti ādi utpattiḥ api krameṇa api śaktiḥ bhavantī kim ananta rakṣaṇāt eva bhavati uta vyavahita kṣaṇāt api iti yadi ananta ra kṣaṇāt eva bhavati tatas para loka vādasya dattaḥ jala aṃjaliḥ syāt arddha muhūrta antarita anubhava ādeḥ api smṛti ādi janana nimitta vāsanā dhāya tvam na asti kutas janma antara kṛtasya karma ādeḥ tvad mate hi na sukha duḥkha maraṇa ādi janana śakti vyatirekeṇa puṇya apuṇya saṃskāra ādi śabdānām anyaḥ arthaḥ asti śaktiḥ ca ananta rakṣaṇāt eva iṣṭā atha vyavahitāt api kṣaṇāt śaktiḥ bhavati iti na kāla vyavahitasya akaraṇa tvāt pāramparyeṇa tu sarveṣām api anubhava karmaṇām kāraṇa tvāt ekasya api sarva śakti utpāda prasaṅgaḥ tad kārya yaugapadya prasaṅgaḥ iti tat eva dūṣaṇam 
[501,7_501,12]	nanu ca kāla vyavahitam api sākṣāt kāraṇam dṛṣṭam yat āha gāḍha suptasya vijñānam prabodhe pūrva vedanāt jāyate vyavadhāne api kālena iti viniścitam na hi pūrva abhyāsam antareṇa smṛti ādi pāṭavam sambhavati tena smṛti rāga dveṣa ādi pāṭava upalambhāt tad abhyāsasya vyavahitasya api kāraṇa tvam vyavahitasya avidyamāna tvāt katham kāraṇa tvam iti ced avidyamāna tvam anantarasya api tulyam sva kāle tu vyavahitasya api vidyamāna tvam kārya utpāda kāle yat asti tat eva kāraṇam iti ced kaḥ ayam utpatti kālaḥ kim kārya kālaḥ eva atha tatas prāk iti kārya kāla tve dvayoḥ eka kāla tvāt kārya kāraṇa viveka anupapattiḥ artha kāryāt prāk tadā kārya abhāve katham tad utpādaḥ na hi asati dharmiṇi dharmaḥ kim ca tad utpādasya api tad kāraṇa tva prasaṅgāt tad prāk kāla bhāvi tva aviśeṣāt 
[501,18]	etena utpadyamāna tā api pratyuktā paryāya tvāt ca utpāda utpatti utpadyamānatā ādi śabdānām tasmāt na kārya kāle kāraṇam na kāraṇa kāle kāryam atas na parasparataḥ sambandhaḥ api pāratantryam hi sambandhaḥ siddhasya ca kim pāratantryam asiddhasya api svayam asataḥ kim pāratantryam iti tasmāt tad bhāva bhāvi tva mātre kārya kāraṇa bhāva vyavahāraḥ tad bhāva bhāvi tvam vā nu aya vyatireki tvam eva na ca kāla vyavadhāne api asti iti cira nivṛttam api kāraṇam iti 
[501,25_502,1]	tat etat ayuktam nivṛttasya asattvāt asataḥ ca janaka tve śaśaviṣāṇa ādeḥ api janaka tvam syāt asattva aviśeṣāt atha vinaṣṭam prāk āsīt tena tad janakam yadā tat asti tadā na janayati yadā na asti tadā janayati sādhvī vyavasthitiḥ tat idam āyātam jīvan aśaktaḥ aham mṛtaḥ te putram janayiṣyāmi iti kim ca nivṛttasya api kāraṇa tve kārya utpāda anuparama prasaṅgaḥ kāraṇa vyāvṛttau hi kārya utpatti uparamaḥ iti pramāṇa siddham etat agni dhūma ādi aneka udāharaṇāt yadā tu vyāvṛttāt api kārya utpattiḥ tadā sātatyena tad kārya utpāda prasaṅgaḥ tad hetoḥ tad janana śakti vyāghāta abhāvāt na hi vyāvṛttasya punar vyāvṛttiḥ asti na ca tad avasthe hetau kārya anutpādaḥ tadā api anutpāda prasaṅgāt tad sahakāri vyavāvṛttau tad kārya utpatti uparamaḥ iti ced na sahakāriṇaḥ api vyāvṛttasya eva hetu tvāt tulya nyāya tvāt vyāvṛttasya ca punar vyāvṛttiḥ na asti iti uktam yadi ca sahakāri vyāvṛttau eva kārya vyāvṛttiḥ tadā vyāvṛttau ca kārya utpattiḥ tatas tasya eva hetu tvam na naṣṭasya tatra hetu dharmān anuvṛtteḥ nitya hetuvādi vat mama api parihāraḥ iti ced na avyatirikta śakti abhyupagama virodhāt nityasya sahakāri pratikṣepe ca asambaddhatva prasaṅgāt iti 
[502,12_502,16]	etena anāgatasya api kāraṇa tvam pratikṣiptam kim ca anāgatasya kāraṇa tve kāraṇa niṣpatti artham kāryam upādatte iti syāt etat ca viruddham nanu kāraṇa tvam api tasya asti eva na hi prāgbhāvinaḥ kāraṇa tvam niṣidhyate kim tarhi bhāvya vyabhicāra apekṣayā tasya kāryatvam api asti iti bhaṇyate yat ca kāraṇa tve sati upādānam tad kārya tve bhaviṣyati kaḥ hi upādāne viśeṣaḥ avyabhicāra mātreṇa upādānam iyatā kid na paryāptam iti tat etat api ayuktam parasparam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ prāk eva nirastaḥ kāraṇa anumānam ca samarthitam tatas para loka anumānam bhaviṣyati na tad uparodhena samasta maryādām atikramya kāraṇe api kāryatvam abhyupagantavyam 
[502,22]	sarva loka śāstreṣu hi yat niṣpatti artham yat upādīyate tat tasya kāraṇam iti prasiddham na ca etat rūpam bhāvinaḥ asti tasmāt bhūtam eva kāraṇam bhāvi iti 
[502,25]	nanu evam tarhi sarvasya bhūtasya kāraṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ avyabhicāra viṣaya tve tat eṣa kāraṇa tvam atha avyabhicāra viṣaya tve pūrva bhāvaḥ tat api yat kiṃcid tathā hi tad bhāva bhāvitā mātrāt yadi kāraṇa kārya tā kaḥ virodha s tadā pūrva para bhāvaḥ kim arthakaḥ 
[503,4_503,8]	tat ayuktam akṛtaka tva nitya tva ādīnām api kārya kāraṇa tva prasaṅgāt artha antara tva abhāvāt na iti ced tat ayuktam yatas tad bhāva bhāvitā mātrāt yadi kāraṇa kārya tā tadā anartha antara tve api tad bhāvaḥ kā virodhatā na hi yadṛcchātaḥ saṃjñā karaṇe kvacid virodhaḥ asti yena artha antaraḥ eva vyāpake kāraṇā saṃjñā kriyate na anartha antare janakatvam ca na yathā sva ātmanaḥ sambhavati tathā atīta anāgatayoḥ api janaka tvam na sambhavati iti uktam 
[503,11_503,13]	yat ca uktam na kārya kāle kāraṇam na kāraṇa kāle kāryam iti atas na tayoḥ sambandhaḥ api iti tat na kṣaṇika tva anabhyupagamāt yat api uktam pāratantryam hi sambandhaḥ tat ca siddhasya asiddhasya vā na upapadyate iti tat api ayuktam hetu anāyatta tve hi kāryasya nirhetuka tvāt nityam sattvam asattvam vā syāt anya anapekṣa tvāt hetu apekṣi tve vā katham na pāratantryam 
[503,17_503,22]	tasmāt siddhasya asiddhasya vā avasthā dvaye api pāratantryam tathā hi yadi asiddham paratantram na syāt tatas asiddham eva sadā tiṣṭhet svayam vā siddhyāt niyata deśa kāla ādi yogam na upekṣeta tasmāt svabhāvataḥ asiddham eva hetubhiḥ balāt sādhyate iti paratantram atas eva asat kāryam ucyate kha puṣpa ādi api hetubhiḥ kim na sādhyata iti ced etat uttaratra vicārayiṣyāmaḥ siddhasya api pāratantryam samavāyi kāraṇeṣu avasthānāt dṛṣṭam ca loke api siddhasya bhṛtya putra ādeḥ pāratantryam svātantryam ced siddham kadācid api na vinaśyet tasmāt asti sambandhaḥ yadi nāma kṣaṇika vādinā sambhavati 
[503,26]	nanu akṣaṇika vādinām api sāmagryavastham janakam tat ca kārya kāle na asti tat katham janya janaka sambandhaḥ iti na niyama anabhyupagamāt na ayam niyamaḥ samāna kālayoḥ eva sambandhaḥ iti kin tu yathādarśanam abhyupagamyate janya janaka sambandhaḥ tu evam eva dṛśyate yat kāraṇa sāmagrī anantaram kāryam iti kṣaṇika vādinām tu asya eva grahaṇam na sambhavati iti vakṣyāmaḥ tena tad mate sambandhāsambhavaḥ ucyate 
[504,3]	na ca anantara bhāvi vat kāla vyavadhāne api janya janaka bhāvaḥ kaścid aṃjasā pratīyate tat na naṣṭa anutpannayoḥ aṃjasā kāraṇa tvam yadā khalu sāmagrī avastham kāraṇam bhavati tadā eva aṃjasā kārya kāraṇa sambandhaḥ tena vidyamānasya eva janakatvam asat kārya tvam ca pramāṇa siddham na virudhyate kārya sattva kāle tu janakatva kalpane kim syāt avidyamānena vidyamānam janyate iti syāt etat ca loka śāstrayoḥ viruddham tasmāt na naṣṭasya anubhāva ādeḥ smaraṇa ādi janaka tvam na ca pūrva abhyāsam antareṇa smṛti ādeḥ utpattiḥ sambhavati tasmāt pūrva abhyāsāt utpannaḥ saṃskāraḥ kaścid avinaśyan eva avasthitaḥ sahakāri viśeṣa prāptau smṛti anusandhāna rāga dveṣa ādikam janayati tad nivṛttau ca anya nimitta sadbhāve api smṛti ādikam na utpadyeta iti yuktam 
[504,13_504,16]	anātma vādinām tu pūrva abhyāsasya saha saṃskāreṇa nivṛtta tvāt kutas smṛti ādikam syāt santānena avasthitau ca jñāna santāna ucchedāt yadi tasya ucchedaḥ tādātmya virodhaḥ vā niraṃśasya aṃśena uccheda abhāvāt etena karma jasya api saṃskārasya anātma vādinām janma antara phala hetu tvam pratyuktam tasya api jñānāt avyatireke jñāna ākāra vat na upabhogāt api nivṛttiḥ na api kutaścid dhetoḥ saṃskāra viviktasya jñānasya utpattau saṃskāra nivṛtti vyavahāraḥ saṃskārasya jñāna utpādana tvāt tad uttaram ca jñānam yadi upādānākāram tatas saṃskāra ākāram eva bhavet no ced tadā jñāna ākāram api na bhavet niraṃśasya aṃśena ākāra arpaṇā sambhavāt 
[504,22]	ghṛta ādi vat iti ced atha manyase yathā agni sambandhāt ghṛta jatu suvarṇa ādikam drutam bhavati śaitya sambandhāt punar kaṭhinam iti na suvarṇa ādi ākāra vat sarvadā druta ādi ākāra anuvṛttiḥ tathā jñāna ākāra anuvṛttau api na sarvadā saṃskāra anuvṛttiḥ iti 
[504,26]	na anabhyupagamāt na mayā kāṭhinya drava tva ādeḥ tādātmyam iṣyate yena dṛṣṭānta siddhiḥ syāt dhama adharmiṇoḥ hi artha antara bhāvaḥ prasādhitaḥ tena dharma nivṛttau api dharmiṇaḥ anuvṛttiḥ yuktā tādātmye tu anuvṛtti ananuvṛttī durghaṭe eva iti 
[505,2]	atha jñānāt artha antaram saṃskāraḥ sa kim āśritaḥ anāśritaḥ vā yadi anāśritaḥ tadā anyatra api sva kārya ārambhakaḥ syāt vṛkṣa phala ādi vat yathā vṛkṣāt patitāni phala ādīni pṛthak eva santāna anantarāṇi kurvanti tathā saṃskārāḥ api jñāna santānam parityajya svam svam santānam kuryuḥ santāna anantara udbhūtaiḥ vā saha kārya janakāḥ sphuran duhitaraḥ iva anya putraiḥ saha iti 
[505,7]	atha āśritaḥ saṃskāraḥ tad āśrayi sambandhaḥ vācyaḥ saṃyogaḥ samavāyaḥ vā na tvayā iṣyate tādātmya sambandhe tu āśraya āśrayi bhāva anupapattiḥ na hi sva ātma apekṣayā āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ ca pūrvam tādātmya sambandhaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ iti ced na kārya kāraṇa bhāve api vṛkṣa phala ādi vat pṛthak gamana prasaṅgāt 
[505,13]	yat punar etat naiyāyikaiḥ api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva niyāmaka dṛṣṭaḥ tatas saḥ eva astu kim ātmanā iti tat na asmākam jāti āśraya viśeṣa niyamena kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya niyāmaka tvāt 
[505,17]	tatra jāti viśeṣa niyamāt yathā śāli tva bīja tva viśiṣṭāt aṅkura tva śāli tva viśiṣṭam eva kāryam bhavati tatas śāli tva patra tva viśiṣṭam eva bhavati tatas śāli tva nāla tva viśiṣṭam iti evam uttarottaram draṣṭavyam bīja avayava anuvṛtteḥ āśraya niyamaḥ api asti tathā pūrva abhyāsa viśeṣāt saṃskāra viśeṣaḥ tatas smṛti viśeṣaḥ tatas anusandhānādi viśeṣaḥ iti 
[505,23]	tathā āśraya niyamaḥ api yatra eva abhyāsaḥ tatra eva saṃskāraḥ yatra eva saṃskāraḥ tatra eva smṛti anusandhāna ādayaḥ iti evam niyamaḥ upapadyate 
[505,26]	yat ca uktam rakta tā api ātma āśrita abhyupagantavyā iti tat na anyathā api rakta tā upapatteḥ tathā ca bīja avayava vāsanā krameṇa raktatā upapattiḥ prāk uktā iti yathā tarhi bīja avayavaiḥ vāsitaiḥ tad sahakāri tvena sambaddheṣu bhūmi avayaveṣu tad saṃskāraḥ kriyate tathā anubhava janita saṃskāra āśrayaḥ anyatra api tad saṃskāram kariṣyati na tad saṃskāra āśraya bāhulya agrahaṇāt na hi yathā rakta tā saṃskāraḥ bahu āśrayaḥ tad phalānām yugapad upalambhena gṛhyate tathā anubhava saṃskāraḥ api iti tathā abhāve hi karpāsa vat eka santānāt aparimita santāna utpādaḥ api syāt yathā ca ekasmāt pradīpa santānāt bahavaḥ api pradīpa santānāḥ bhavanti sarveṣām atyanta ucchedaḥ api kadācid bhavati tadvat atra api syāt tasmāt eka āśraya niyata tvena eva icchā ādīnām eka santāna niyamaḥ krama utpāda niyamaḥ ca iti 
[506,9]	nanu āśrayaḥ asataḥ sataḥ vā syāt asataḥ tāvat āśrayaḥ na asti na hi khara viṣāṇasya kaścid āśrayaḥ kevalam asat kāraṇāt utpattim īhate tatas asataḥ kāraṇam eva sambhavati na āśrayatā sataḥ api na āśrayaḥ akiṃcitkara tvāt na hi sataḥ kiṃcid āśrayeṇa kriyate sthitiḥ kriyate iti ced na vyatireka avyatireka asambhavāt avyatireke saḥ eva kṛtaḥ syāt na ca svarūpam eva sthitiḥ sati api svarūpe gati darśanāt na api vyatiriktā sthiteḥ api vyatiriktā sthitiḥ iti anavasthā syāt sthiti hetuḥ ca katham bhaviṣyati āśrayaḥ na hi ghaṭasya hetuḥ paṭasya ādhāraḥ yuktaḥ tasmāt na kaścid kasyacid ādhāraḥ iti 
[506,18]	tat etat api asat yat tāvat asataḥ na asti āśrayaḥ iti atra avivādaḥ sataḥ api na asti etat na kṣamyate dṛṣṭa tvāt dṛṣṭaḥ hi sataḥ āśrayaḥ samavāyī saṃyogī ca tatra rūpa ādīnām ghaṭa ādiḥ samavāyī jala ādīnām tu saṃyogi iti na ca dṛṣṭam vikalpa śatena api apākartum śakyate 
[506,23]	kalpanayā eva ādhāra ādheya bhāva pratītiḥ iti ced na dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa kalpanā anupapatteḥ yadi sthāṇu ādau puruṣa ādika kalpanā vat anyatra dṛṣṭasya anyatra kalpanā tadā na ādhāra ādheya bhāvasya atyanta asattvam atha pradhāna ādi śabda vāsanātaḥ kalpanā iti tat api asat nirarthikāḥ hi kalpanā katham artha viśeṣeṣu eva bhavet viśiṣṭa artha darśanāt pratibuddhā vāsanā kalpanām janayati iti ced kaḥ asau arthasya viśeṣaḥ saḥ eva hi ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ yad abhāvāt anyatra artha darśane api ādhāra ādheya tva pratītiḥ na bhavati tathā utpatti hetuḥ eva ādhāraḥ iti ced syāt etat pratikṣaṇa vināśinām aparāpara deśa utpādavatām upādāna deśa utpattiḥ ādhāra samāgama kṛtā tena bhūmi ādiḥ jala ādīnām viśiṣṭa avasthām kurvan ādhāraḥ iti ucyate tasmāt viśiṣṭa hetuḥ eva ādhāraḥ iti na kṣaṇika tva asiddheḥ syāt etat eva yadi kṣaṇika tvam syāt tat ca asiddham iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[507,6_507,8]	akṣaṇika tve tu siddhe dharma dharmi bhede ca sati bhū jala ādīnām avaśyam ādhāra ādheya abhāvaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ tad pratīteḥ nīla sphaṭika ādi pratīti vat aprāmāṇya abhāvāt yat punar etat na hi sataḥ kiṃcid āśrayeṇa kriyate iti tat ayuktam na hi hetuḥ eva āśrayaḥ abhyupagamyate yena akiṃcitkara tve ca āśrayaḥ na syāt kim tarhi āśraya darma yogāt āśraya paratva aparatva ādi dharma yogāt parāpara ādi vat 
[507,12_507,17]	iha idam iti pratipattiḥ ca avisaṃvādinī na ādhāra ādheya bhāvam antareṇa yuktā yasya vā yena sthitiḥ kriyate sa tasya ādhāraḥ krameṇa aneka kārya kartṛ tvam sthitiḥ sā ca avayavi guṇa karma ādīnām āśraya sāmarthyāt bhavati iti uktam nanu gati nivṛttiḥ sthitiḥ prasiddhā satyam asmābhiḥ api evam vyākhyātā tad ādhāra abhāve hi anityānām vināśaḥ eva gatiḥ ityādinā yadi ādhāraḥ sthitiḥ tadā śabda buddhi ādīnām nitya ādhāra tvāt asthitiḥ kadācid na syāt iti ced na tad nāśa hetvabhāva sāhitasya ādhārasya sthiti hetu tvāt nāśa hetu sambandhāt tu sati api ādhāre na sthitiḥ iti 
[507,21_507,26]	yat ca uktam yadi vyatiriktā sthitiḥ tatas sthiteḥ api anyā sthitiḥ iti anavasthā syāt iti tat api asat prakāśa satta ādi vat tad svabhāvasya tad svabhāva antara anapekṣi tvāt na hi yathā ghaṭa ādayaḥ pradīpena prakāśyante tathā pradīpaḥ api pradīpa antareṇa yathā vā dravya ādiṣu sattātaḥ sat iti pratyayaḥ tathā sattāyām api sattā antarāt iti yat punar etat sthiti hetuḥ tad anyasya sthātuḥ katham ādhāraḥ iti na sthiteḥ tad dharma tvāt sthātuḥ dharmaḥ hi sthitiḥ tena tad hetuḥ sthātuḥ ādhāraḥ paṭasya tu ghaṭaḥ na dharmaḥ iti 
[508,2]	śabda ādi hetuḥ tarhi ākāśa ādeḥ ādhāraḥ prāptaḥ śabda ādeḥ ākāśa dharmavāt na anabhyupagamāt na brūmaḥ dharma mātrasya hetu dharmiṇi ādhāraḥ kim tu yasya sthitim prati yaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ hetuḥ sa tasya ādhāraḥ iti ātma ākāśa ādeḥ tarhi sthitim prati kaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ hetuḥ na kaścid atas eva teṣām nirādhāra tvam na hi ātma ākāśa ādeḥ saṃyogī samavāyī vā kaścid ādhāraḥ sambhavati sahakāri mātre vā ādhāra vyavahāraḥ na asti yathā tvad pakṣe na hetu mātram upādānam ādhāraḥ vā kim tu viśiṣṭaḥ eva hetuḥ yathā daghnaḥ kṣīram eva upādānam kuṇḍam eva ādhāraḥ iti tadvat asmākam hetu viśeṣaḥ sahakāri viśeṣaḥ vā ādhāraḥ sa ca saṃyogī samavāyī vā yathābhūte hi ādhāra vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tathābhūtaḥ eva hetuḥ sambandhī vā ādhāraḥ pratipattavyaḥ na tu adṛṣṭa īśvara ādeḥ api iti 
[508,14_508,22]	nanu yadi ādhāreṇa bhāvasya sthitiḥ paścāt kriyate tadā sthiti utpatteḥ prāc asthitaḥ bhāvaḥ syāt vyatirikta utpannā ca katham bhāvasya tādātmya tad utpattiḥ sambandha abhāvāt iti atra ucyate yasya paścāt acalana lakṣaṇā krameṇa aneka sahakāri lābha lakṣaṇā vā sthitiḥ bhavati sa tad apekṣayā bhavatu asthitaḥ kaḥ doṣaḥ sadbhāva lakṣaṇā tu sthitiḥ paścāt kriyate iti etat na iṣyate tad utpādaka hetubhiḥ eva tad sadbhāva karaṇāt tādātmya tad utpatti sambandha abhāve api katham bhāvasya sthitiḥ iti etat api ayuktam sambandha dvaya niyamasya apramāṇaka tvāt tādātmya sambandhasya ca niṣiddha tvāt tatas sāmānya ādeḥ iva sthiteḥ api asti sambandhaḥ kaścid iti sthiti hetuḥ ādhāraḥ iti etasmin api pakṣe na doṣaḥ kaścid iti 
[508,24_508,28]	prasādhitam ca rūpa ādīnām dravya āśrita tvam tadvat icchā ādīnām api āśrayaḥ kaścid asti yaḥ svayam anubhūya smarati smṛtvā ca anusandhatte anusandhāya ca icchati dveṣṭi vā tatas prayatamānaḥ sukham duḥkham vā anubhavati yaḥ ca para loka artham pravartate sva kṛta karma vipākam ca yaḥ anubhavati sa katham asthiraḥ śarīra ādi lakṣaṇaḥ vā syāt iti etena eva kṣaṇika tvam nirastam na hi sarvasya kṣaṇika tve svayam anubhūtasya eva smṛtiḥ iti ādi upapādayitum śakyate 
[509,6]	pratyabhijñā ākhyena ca pratyakṣeṇa sphaṭika ādiṣu akṣaṇika tvam gṛhyate yasmāt akṣa vyāpāra anantaram eva asaḥ eva ayam sphaṭikaḥ a iti pūrva apara kāla avacchinna artha grāhi vijñānam utpadyate tathā aneka kāla avacchinna pramātṛ svarūpa grāhi pratyabhijñānam bhavati tat yathā yasya aṅkuram aham adrākṣam tasya aham eva idānīm phalam paśyāmi iti 
[509,10]	pradīpa ādiṣu iva bhrāntam iti ced na atra bādhaka abhāvāt na ca ekatra bādhya tvena bhrānta tve siddhe pratyabhijñā sā dharmya mātrāt sarvatra bhrānta tva kalpanā yuktā atiprasaṅgāt tathā hi jala keśa ādi jñānasya ekatra bhrānta tva darśanāt sarvatra bhrānta tvam syāt tasmāt yat eva pratyabhijñānam bādhyate tat eva bhrāntam yuktam keśa ādi jñāna vat na sarvam iti 
[509,16_509,20]	nanu ca sarvam pratyabhijñānam bhrāntam eva akṣaṇikā ākāra avabhāsi tvāt na ca akṣaṇikaḥ arthaḥ kaścid asti tat āha yat eva artha kriyā kāri tat atra paramārtha sat asantaḥ akṣaṇikāḥ teṣām krama akrama virodhataḥ tathā hi na tāvat anekaḥ arthaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti eka svabhāva tvāt sa hi eka svabhāvaḥ yāvatām kāryāṇām utpādane samarthas tāvanti sakṛt eva kuryāt samarthasya kṣepā yogāt kṣepe vā prathama kārya utpādakaḥ api na syāt prathama kārya utpādana kāle tasya āgami kārya utpattau asāmarthyam iti ced evam tarhi na tatas kadācid āgāmi kārya utpattiḥ tad aśakta svarūpa aparityāgāt parityāge vā na pūrva uttara kriyā hetoḥ ekatvam tat bhede ca prāptam kṣaṇika tvam na api yugapad eva karoti tathā nirvartana svabhāvasya aparibhraṃśāt satatam eva artha kriyā yaugapadyam kuryāt tad svabhāva nivṛttau vā uktam kṣaṇika tvam iti na api sahakāri kramam apekṣya krameṇa ekaḥ kāryam karoti anupakāri vī apekṣā yogāt tat uktam apekṣyeta paraḥ kāryam yadi vidyeta kiṃcana yadi kiṃcitkaram vā astu kim kenacid apekṣyate 
[510,2]	anupakāri tvam ca vyatirikta avyatirikta upakāra asambhavāt yadi hetoḥ avyatiriktaḥ sahakāribhiḥ upakāraḥ kriyate tadā saḥ eva kriyate iti āpadyate tathā ca vyarthāḥ sahakāriṇaḥ tad rūpasya prāk eva siddha tvāt vyatiriktaḥ ced upakāraḥ sa tasya iti kaḥ sambandhaḥ tādātmya pakṣe na vyatirekaḥ tad utpatti pakṣe api yadi sahakāri nirapekṣāt tatas utpattiḥ tadā katham na vyarthāḥ sahakāriṇaḥ tad apekṣi tve vā punar tatas upakāraḥ eṣṭavyaḥ tatas pūrvavat vyatirikta avyatirikta pakṣayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ tatas anavasthā syāt tasmāt na sahakāriṣu apekṣaṇam yuktam 
[510,10]	śakta aśakta vikalpā sambhavāt ca yadi śaktaḥ hetuḥ tatas svayam śakta tvāt eva kāryam karoti na saha kāribhiḥ kiṃcid aśaktaḥ ca sahakāri sadbhāve api na karoti pāṣāṇaḥ iva tailam sahakāriṣu satsu śaktaḥ bhavati iti ced evam tarhi aśakta svabhāva nivṛttau sahakāritaḥ śaktam rūpam utpannam iti āpannam tathā ca anitya tvam iti tat evam krameṇa utpadyamānaḥ eva hetuḥ krameṇa kārya kārī bīja ādi vat na tu ekaḥ akramaḥ krama kārī kaścid asti iti 
[510,16]	prayogaḥ api atra yat akṣaṇikam tat san na bhavati yathā śaśaviṣāṇa ādi sat ca sarvam tasmāt kṣaṇikam iti sattvasya akṣaṇikāt vyatireka siddhi artham krama yaugapadyābhyām artha kriyā yogāt iti bādhakam uktam śaktiḥ khalu bhāva lakṣaṇam sarva śakti virahaḥ tu abhāva lakṣaṇam tat ca śakti lakṣaṇam sattvam kramākrama kārya utpādena vyāptam tena tathā utpādaḥ akṣaṇikān nirvartamānaḥ sva vyāpyam sattvam gṛhītvā nivartate tasmāt na sataḥ akṣaṇika tvam iti 
[510,24^1]	atra pratividhīyate yadi tāvat akṣaṇikānām asattvam prasādhayitum abhipretam tadā kasya atra dharmi tvam tasya eva dharmi tve tasya eva asattva asādhanam ayuktam na hi asati dharmiṇi hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam na ca asati pakṣa dharma tve gamaka tvam tasmāt asantaḥ akṣaṇikā iti uktā pratijñā atha santaḥ arthāḥ akṣaṇikāḥ na bhavanti iti pratijñā arthaḥ tathā api tasyām kramākrama virodhāt iti asya katham pakṣa dharma tvam atha sattvam eva hetuḥ kṣaṇika tvam sādhayat akṣaṇika tva abhāvam sādhayati iti tathā api na anvayaḥ na vyatirekaḥ iti asādhāraṇaḥ katham hetuḥ pratipakṣe api samāna tvāt 
[510,24^2_511,13]	pradīpa ādau asti anvayaḥ iti ced na asiddha tvāt na hi pradīpa ādeḥ api kṣaṇika tvam siddham jātasya nāśa hetu pratīkṣaṇāt iti vakṣyāmaḥ vyatireka balena eva asya gamaka tvam iti ced na vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntasya api abhāvāt śaśa viṣāṇa ādiḥ eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti ced na tasya pratipatti aviṣaya tvāt na hi sva rūpeṇa api yat na pradīyate tat sādhya sādhana dharma rahitam pratipattum śakyate na ca apratipannasya dṛṣṭānta tvam yuktam śabdāt tad pratipattiḥ asti eva iti ced sā kim pramāṇam apramāṇam vā pramāṇam ced na tādātmya tad utpatti pratibandha abhāvāt pratibandhe hi vastu tva prasaṅgaḥ tatas akṣaṇikam api vastu asti iti pratibandha abhāve api pramāṇa tva abhyupagame na antarīyaka tā bhāvāt ityādi virodhaḥ atha apramāṇam tatas katham adṛṣṭaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sidhyati apramāṇa pratīteḥ pratidṛṣṭānte api sambhavāt na vyatireka dṛṣṭāntasya api siddhiḥ 
[511,16]	syāt etat pakṣaḥ eva bādhaka sāmarthyāt anvaya vyatireka siddhiḥ tathā hi kṣaṇikasya artha kriyāyām krama akrama virodhate iti uktam tena artha kriyā lakṣaṇam sattvam akṣaṇikāt vyāvṛttam kṣaṇike artha kriyā virodha abhāvāt anvitam iti 
[511,20]	tat ayuktam virodhya pratītau virodhasya pratyetum aśakya tvāt na hi dahana tu hinayoḥ anyatarā pratītau virodha pratītiḥ asti kramākrama virodhi ca akṣaṇikam yadi pratīyate tatas katham asat pratipatti rūpa artha kriyā kāritvāt atatkāri tve ca katham pratīyate na hi tvayā artha antaram ajanakam pratīti viṣaya tvena iṣṭam atha akṣaṇikam na eva pratīyate tatas katham tasya krama ākramābhyām virodhaḥ avagamyate na hi tayoḥ sva rūpeṇa eva virodhaḥ sva rūpeṇa virodhe hi sarvasya pralaya prasaṅgāt
