[511,27]	saṃvṛtti siddhena akṣaṇikena virodha siddhiḥ iti ced saṃvṛtti siddham api vāstavam kālpanikam vā syāt yadi vāstavam tatas katham tasya asattvam katham vā artha kriyā virodhaḥ artha kriyām kurvat dhi vāstavam ucyate atha kālpanikam tad virodhaḥ kim vāstavaḥ kālpanikaḥ vā na tāvat vāstavaḥ kalpita virodhi virodha tvāt vandhyā putra virodha vat atha virodhaḥ api kālpanikaḥ eva na tarhi paramārthataḥ akṣaṇikasya artha kriyāyām krama ākramābhyām virodhaḥ iti atas akṣaṇikāt sattvasya vyatireka siddhiḥ api apāramārthikī iti avāstava vyatireka tvāt sattāyāḥ tat āyattam kṣaṇika tvam api avāstavam eva iti tathā ca etat aśakyam iva cchidra pidhāna āyāsa bahulam kṣaṇa bhaṅga vāda vyasanam eka prahāreṇa nihatam 
[512,9_512,16]	syāt etat bīja ādi kāraṇa kramāt aṅkura ādi kārya kramasya upalambhāt eva na kramāt kramiṇām bhāvaḥ iti vyatirekaḥ api sidhyati iti ced katham upalambhaḥ kim kramavataḥ eva kāraṇāt ayam kārya kramaḥ kim vā anavadhāraṇena eva upalambhaḥ iti yadi kramavataḥ eva ayam kārya kramaḥ iti upalambhaḥ saḥ akṣaṇikā bhāva niścaye katham na hi anya abhāvā niścaye atra idam eva iti upalambhaḥ pramāṇam bhavati abhāvaḥ ca anupalabdhyā api dṛśyasya eva niścīyate dṛśya tve ca akṣaṇikasya kvacid asti darśana hetu tvam atha kramavataḥ kāraṇāt kārya kramaḥ iti anavadhāraṇena eva upalambhaḥ tadā na akramāt kramiṇaḥ bhāvaḥ iti katham niścayaḥ na hi pitṛ āditaḥ putra ādi janma darśanāt eva karma āditas na tad janma iti niścayaḥ sambhavati 
[512,18]	syāt etat yathā dahanāt dhūmaḥ iti upalambhāt eva na adahanāt dhūmaḥ iti niścayaḥ bhavati tathā kramavataḥ kramiṇām bhāvaḥ iti upalambhāt eva na akramāt kramiṇām bhāvaḥ iti niścayaḥ bhavati viṣamaḥ ayam upanyāsaḥ tatra hi satsu api anyeṣu dahana abhāvāt dhūmaḥ na upalabhyate agni sadbhāvāt tu upalabhyate iti anvaya vyatireka siddhau kārya kāraṇa niyamaḥ sidhyatu na punar atra satsu api krameṣu kramavataḥ abhāvāt na kramiṇām bhāvaḥ iti upalambhaḥ asti yena vyatireka siddhiḥ syāt 
[512,27]	upalambhe ca upalambha lakṣaṇa artha kriyā kāri tvāt akramasya na asattvam yathādarśanam ca kārya kāraṇa svabhāva abhyanujñātam yuktam na sarva aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ sādhīyaḥ tathā hi dhūma kāraṇa tva aviśeṣe api na kāṣṭha ādīnām api agni svabhāva tā dahana janya tva aviśeṣe api na bhasma visphoṭa ādīnām api dhūma svabhāva tā tasmāt aṅkura ādi janakatva aviśeṣe api bīja ādīni eva kramavanti na īśvara śāli tva ādīni tathā krama bhāvi tva aviśeṣe api aṅkura ādīni eva ekasmāt bījān na utpadyante jñāna ādīni tu kānicid utpadyante tathā bījam krameṇa api kiṃcid karoti kāraṇa tvāt cakra ādi vat evam aṅkura ādeḥ api eka eka ātmanaḥ krama kartṛ tvam sādhanīyam cakra ādi vat iti yathā ekasmāt cakrāt ghaṭa ādīni krameṇa eva bhavanti kuṭhārāt vṛkṣa cheda ādīni evam anyat api maṇi prabhṛti bhinna svabhāvam krameṇa kāryāṇi kurvat upalabdham iti sādhya sama tvāt anudāharaṇam iti ced pratyakṣa siddhasya sādhya sama tva ayogāt evam hi na kiṃcid udāharaṇam sidhyet sarvatra sādhya sama tva dūṣaṇasya apratīghātāt 
[513,11]	nanu ca vartamāna mātra grāhakam pratyakṣam na tad pūrva uttara kāla vyāpi tvam paricchinatti apratibhāsanāt na hi pratyakṣa jñāne pūrva uttara kāla avasthita rūpeṇa vastu pratibhāti apūrva darśinaḥ api pratibhāsa prasaṅgāt tasmāt na akṣaṇika tvam pratyakṣa grāhyam kim tu kṣaṇika tvam eva pratyakṣeṇa api gṛhyate kṣaṇa antara asaṃsṛṣṭam hi vastu kṣaṇikam ucyate tat ca tathā pratibhāti eva iti 
[513,17]	tat api ayuktam kṣaṇa mātra pratibhāsi tve hi kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratipattiḥ api na syāt kutas eva kramavat kāraṇāt kramavat kārya utpāda siddhiḥ tathā hi kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratītiḥ arthayoḥ syāt artha jñānayoḥ vā kim vā jñānayoḥ iti 
[513,21_513,24]	na tāvat arthayoḥ karaṇa kāle kāryasya kārya kāle kāraṇasya ca apratibhāsanāt na ca ekasya eva grahaṇe kārya tvam kāraṇa tvam vā sidhyati tayoḥ itaretara sambandha grahaṇāt tattva vyavasthiteḥ svarūpam eva kārya tvam kāraṇa tvam iti ced tathā api eka svarūpa grahaṇe asya idam kāryam kāraṇam vā iti pratipattiḥ kutas paraspara sambandhi tvena apratipattau ca kāryeṇa kāraṇa anumānam kāraṇena kārya anumānam ca na syāt tathā ca iṣṭā aniṣṭa prāpti parihāra arthinām tad sādhaneṣu pravṛtti nivṛttī na prāpnutaḥ iti apuruṣa artham śāstram api syāt 
[514,2]	tad bhāve bhāvāt tad abhāve ca abhāvāt kārya kāraṇa bhāva vyavasthā iti ced na eka kṣaṇa mātra vedinā tad bhāve bhāvasya adhigantum aśakya tvāt krameṇa dvayoḥ api vedanam iti ced kasya krameṇa vedanam na hi kṣaṇa dvaya anugāmi tvam ekasya kasyacid asti yasya krameṇa vedanam syāt dvayoḥ tu krama utpannayoḥ api itaretara svarūpā saṃvedanāt na sambandha grahaṇam vikalpāt sambandha apratītiḥ iti ced vikalpaḥ khalu katarat pramāṇam na hi pratyakṣa anumānam vyatiriktam pramāṇam tava asti na ca ayam vikalpaḥ anumānam trirūpa liṅga pūrvaka tva abhāvāt na api pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍha tva abhāvāt pratyakṣa gṛhīta anusandhātṛ tvam api asya na asti pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇa asambhavāt 
[514,11]	api ca tad bhāvi tva mātreṇa kārya kāraṇa tve gardabha ādi bhāve api dhūma ādeḥ bhāva darśanāt tasya api tad kāraṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ tad abhāve api tad bhāvāt aprasaṅgaḥ iti ced na etat asti yaḥ hi dhūma ādi kṣaṇaḥ tad bhāve bhavati sa katham tad abhāve api bhavati utpannasya punar utpāda ayogāt anyaḥ eva hi kṣaṇāḥ gardabha ādi abhāve api sambhavanti tān prati gardabha ādeḥ tu akāraṇa tvam 
[514,17_514,20]	atha santānasya anvaya vyatirekābhyām kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iṣyate na santānasya kṣaṇa vyatirekeṇa asambhavāt bhāve vā tasya eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ kṣaṇānām ca sāmarthya an avadhāraṇāt asattva prasaṅgaḥ artha kriyā lakṣaṇa tvāt vastunaḥ iti santānaḥ ca akṣaṇikaḥ iti akṣaṇikasya eva sāmarthyam iṣṭam syāt santānaḥ api kṣaṇikaḥ eva iti ced na tasya api anvaya vyatireka asiddheḥ sāmarthya asiddhiḥ na hi kṣaṇa mātra sthāyinām anvayaḥ sambhavati tad abhāvāt vyatirekasya api asiddhiḥ ananvayaḥ na vyatirekaḥ iti hi tvayā eva abhyupagatam 
[514,24_515,3]	tatra api santāna apekṣayā anvaya vyatireka grahaṇam iti ced nanu evam sati anavasthā syāt tad santānasya api kṣaṇika tvena santāna antara apekṣi tvāt atha sāmānyena agni bhāve dhūma bhāvaḥ tad abhāvāt na dhūma bhāvaḥ iti anvaya vyatireka grahaṇam iti na atra api pramāṇa abhāvāt na tāvat pratyakṣeṇa anvayaḥ gṛhyate pratyakṣam hi dvayoḥ krameṇa sva rūpa mātra grāhakam na janya janaka sambandha vedakam na hi agni saṃvittyaivetad sambandha pratītiḥ adṛṣṭa anvaya vyatirekasya api agni darśanāt eva dhūma janaka tva viniścaya prasaṅgāt na api dhūma vittya eva tad sambandha pratītiḥ adṛṣṭa anvaya vyatirekasya api dhūma darśanāt eva agni janya viniścaya prasaṅgāt nanu agni bhāva darśanāt anantaram eva dhūma bhāvaḥ dṛśyate tena agniḥ kāraṇam dhūmaḥ kāryam iti na atra api samāna tvāt tat ā ānantaryam api na agni saṃvittyā na api dhūma saṃvittyā gṛhyate na hi eka artha saṃvedanam apareṇa adṛṣṭam sva rūpeṇa ānantaryam api grahītum śaknoti 
[515,8_515,17]	api ca kāraṇa bhāvāt kārya bhāvaḥ katham gṛhyate kim atas eva bhavati āhosvit atas bhavati eva kim vātaḥ api bhavati iti na atra pakṣa antaram paśyāmaḥ tatra yadi atas eva bhavati sāmarthyāt anyatas bhavati iti gamyate tatra api vikalpa dvayam idānīm anyadā vā iti yadi idānīm atas eva iti matiḥ anyadā na hi bhavati anyatas iti syāt anyadā api atas eva iti na atra pratyakṣasya vyāpāraḥ idānīm api deśa antareṇa bhavati anyatas iti kutas pratītiḥ na ca evam kārya kāraṇa bhāve niyama abhāvāt na api atas bhavati eva iti avadhāraṇam deśa antare kāla antare kadācid na bhavati eva iti atas na anvaya vyatireka gatiḥ adhyakṣāt atha atas api bhavati iti pakṣaḥ tatra api sāmarthyāt anyatas api bhavati iti svayam eva vyabhicāra avagamāt na kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ anvaya vyatireka asiddheḥ 
[515,20]	atha etad abhāve na bhavati iti anupalambhataḥ pratīyate kaḥ ayam anupalambhaḥ pratyakṣam anumānam vā na tāvat pratyakṣam tasya kṣaṇa antara asaṃsṛṣṭa vastu viṣaya tvāt tena ca yathā na anvaya vyatireka grahaṇam tathā uktam na api anumānam eva anupalambhaḥ kasmāt anumānasya anvaya vyatireka grahaṇa pūrvaka tvāt tat yadi tena eva anvaya vyatireka grahaṇam tadā itaretara āśraya doṣaḥ syāt atha anupalambha antareṇa tatra api anvaya vyatireka grahaṇam anyena anupalambha antareṇa iti anavasthā syāt 
[515,24]	etena pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhanaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti api pratyuktam tathā hi pratyakṣa anupalambha śabdena yadi anvaya vyatirekau eva ucyete tadā tayoḥ agṛhītayoḥ sādhaka tvam na asti grahaṇam ca pratyakṣena anumānena vā yathā na sambhavati tathā uktam atha vidhi pratiṣedha grāhi pratyakṣam eva tathā ucyate tat api ayuktam na pratyakṣeṇa tad bhāve bhāvaḥ gṛhyate na api tad abhāve abhāvaḥ iti uktam avyabhicāreṇa kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pratipattavyaḥ anyathā kāryāt kāraṇa anumānam na syāt pratyakṣam tu kṣaṇa antare api na vyāpṛtam kutas deśa kāla ananta bhedeṣu 
[516,5]	na api pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvinau vidhi pratiṣedha vikalpau pratyakṣa anupalambha śabda vācyau tayoḥ apramāṇa tvāt na hi anumānāt anyaḥ api vikalpaḥ pramāṇam tvayā iṣyate na api pramāṇa pṛṣṭha bhāvi tvena pramāṇa upavāraḥ tad hetoḥ pratyakṣasya kārya kāraṇa bhāva grāhaka tvena pratiṣiddha tvāt na api pratyakṣam anupalambha ākhyaḥ hetuḥ ca pratyakṣa anupalambha śabda vācyau pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ ekatra vyāpāra asambhavāt anvaya vyatireka grahaṇam antareṇa anupalambha ākhyasya api anumānasya avatāraḥ na asti tena eva ca anvaya vyatireka grahaṇe tu itaretara āśraya ādi doṣaḥ uktaḥ iti tasmāt na arthayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva avagamaḥ sambhavati 
[516,14]	na api artha jñānayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ gṛhyate samāna tvāt na hi atra viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti yena arthayoḥ eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pratipattum na śakyate jñāna arthayoḥ tu śakyate iti kim ca yaḥ ayam pratibhāti arthaḥ sa jñānasya eva ākāraḥ iti abhimatam na ca sva ātma bhūtena arthakāreṇa janya janaka bhāvaḥ sambhavati sva ātmani kriyā virodhāt tatas anyaḥ ca arthaḥ kadācid na gṛhyate jñāna saṃśliṣṭa asaṃśliṣṭa artha ākāra dvaya apratibhāsanāt pratyakṣeṇa sambandha agrahaṇāt anumānasya api apravṛttiḥ na ca artha ākāra darśanena arthasya kāraṇa tva vyavasthāpanam bhrānti jñāne api artha ākāra darśanāt 
[516,22]	saṃvādinaḥ eva ākārasya arthāt utpattiḥ iti ced kutas ayam avinābhāvaḥ siddhaḥ kim ca saṃvādaḥ api artha kriyā artha prāptiḥ vā tat ubhayam jñāna avyatiriktam avyatiriktam vā vyatiriktam ced sādhane aparaḥ anarthaḥ syāt atha avyatiriktam tatra api dvayī gatiḥ tat eṣa jñānam aparam vā yadi tat eva jñānam punar utpadyamāna saṃvādaḥ tadā abhrānti jñāne api syāt bhrānti jñānam api punar punar utpadyate eva na hi ekaḥ eva bhrānti jñānam 
[516,29]	atha aparam sparśa ādi vijñānam tat api asat na hi artha antara vijñāne artha antara vijñānasya saṃvādaḥ ati prasaṅgāt kena vā viśeṣeṇa cakṣuḥ ādi vijñānasya sparśa ādi vijñānāt saṃvādaḥ ucyate na hi naiyāyika vat tvayā darśana sparśanābhyām eka arthasya grahaṇam iṣṭam na api pūrva uttara kāla vijñānānām eka viṣaya tvam tat katham jñāna antara utpattau pūrva jñānasya saṃvādaḥ 
[517,5]	paritoṣāt iti ced syāt etat jala ādi arthasya cakṣuḥ vijñāne jāte api anāśvāsaḥ tāvat yāvat na sparśa ādi jñānam bhavati sparśa ādi jñāne ca paritoṣaḥ bhavati tatas anāśvāsa nivṛtteḥ prāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ iti na etat asti paritoṣasya pūrva jñāna artha pratibandha asiddheḥ na hi pratyakṣeṇa sparśa ādi jñānāt utpannaḥ paritoṣaḥ cakṣuḥ vijñāna satya tva pratibaddhaḥ kvacid upalabdaḥ na api anumānena tad pratibandha asiddhau anumāna pravṛtteḥ ayogāt na ca apratibaddhāt eva paritoṣāt prāmāṇya siddhiḥ atiprasaṅgāt kim ca svapna ādiṣu api paritoṣa sambhavāt api ca 
[517,12_517,19]	saṃvedanam pramāṇam ced paritoṣaḥ kim arthakaḥ yadi saṃvedanam pramāṇam tatas eva artha siddhiḥ kim aparam paritoṣaḥ kariṣyati saṃvedanāt na siddham yat paritoṣa śataiḥ api katham tat sādhyam saṃvedanāt aparasya hi paritoṣasya kaḥ upayogaḥ artha sādhanam iti ced katham anyena anyasya siddhiḥ sambandhāt ced sambandhaḥ kena siddhaḥ paritoṣataḥ eva iti ced tatra api sambandha siddhiḥ apekṣaṇīya iti anavasthā saṃvedanāt ced tatas eva artha siddhiḥ iti vyarthaḥ paritoṣaḥ saṃvedanāt artha siddhi pakṣe api uktaḥ eva doṣaḥ etena artha avimuktiḥ api pratyuktā tasyāḥ api saṃvedanāt artha antara tve paritoṣa vat na artha sādhaka tvam tad anartha antara tve api su a ākāra mātra vedanāt bhrānti jñāna vat na artha sādhaka tvam iti uktam etena smṛti abhilāṣa dveṣa ādayaḥ pratyuktāḥ iti tasmāt na jñāna arthayoḥ api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sidhyati 
[517,24_518,1]	na api jñānayoḥ sva ātma saṃvid mātra tvāt na hi tvad mate jñānam jñāna antaram vetti na ca kāraṇa kāle kārya saṃvittiḥ anutpanna tvāt eva na api kārya kāle kāraṇa saṃvittiḥ vinaṣṭa tvāt eva na ca eka rūpa saṃvittau eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratipattiḥ iti uktam paritoṣa avimukti smṛti ādīnām tu pūrva uktena eva nyāyena atra api pratikṣepaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tatas ca anvaya vyatireka adhigamaḥ api asambhavī tena anumānāt api jñānayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ aśakya niścayaḥ tat evam vartamāna eka kṣaṇa mātra grahaṇa vādinām na kathaṃcid kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pratīyate tad apratītau ca artha kriyā lakṣaṇam sattvam asiddha tvāt na sādhanam tathā krama ākramābhyām kārya utpattiḥ vyāptā iti etat api asiddham 
[518,3_518,6]	nanu yadi api paramārthataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratipattiḥ na asti saṃvṛttyā tu asti eva tāvatā eva anumānam pravartate paramārthataḥ hi śūnyatā eva avaśiṣyate na tatra vyavahāra hetuḥ pramāṇa vṛttiḥ tasmāt saṃvṛttyā eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratipattiḥ kā punar iyam saṃvṛttiḥ pramāṇa antareṇa prati iti abhimāna mātram saṃvṛttiḥ anādi vyavahāra vāsanātaḥ artha adhimuktiḥ eva saṃvṛttiḥ iti arthaḥ avicāra pratīti arthaḥ hi saṃvṛtti arthaḥ yathā kvacid devadatta ādau adṛṣṭe api dṛṣṭa abhimānaḥ sa parāmarśāt nivartate tathā ca asau na parama arthaḥ tathā sakalaḥ api loka vyavahāraḥ evam eva iti saṃvṛtti mātram sakalam jagat tathā hi anvaya vyatirekābhyām kārya kāraṇa tā gatiḥ pramāṇam ca na tatra asti pratyakṣam anumānam api vā 
[518,13]	atha tarka pramāṇa gamyaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ adṛṣṭa sambandhāt parīkṣā artha pratipattiḥ iti tarka lakṣaṇam tathā hi tad bhāve abhāvaḥ upalabhyate na kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ agni dhūmayoḥ niyama lakṣaṇam sambandhaḥ api na tad bhāva bhāvena saha kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya upalabhyate pratiyanti ca laukikāḥ yasmāt atas idam bhavati tasmāt asya idam kāryam iti atas iyam pratītiḥ tarkataḥ arthāpattitaḥ vā yadi etat kāryam na syāt atas asya bhavanam eva na ghaṭataḥ iti adṛṣṭa artha parikalpana artha āpattiḥ 
[518,20_518,24]	tat ayuktam yadi hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pratīti viṣayaḥ bhavet tatas tasya pratītiḥ tarkataḥ anyatas vā syāt na ca ayam tatas bhāvāt apareṇa rūpeṇa nirūpyate prayatnavatā api na ca niyamena tatas bhāvaḥ iti kutaścid pratītiḥ tāvat kālasya eva tad bhāvasya grahaṇāt na vā asau karya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ atha tarkāt arthāpatteḥ vā niyamaḥ pratīyate yatas idānīm etad anantaram upalabhyate tatas anyadā api atas eva etat iti anyathā etat eva na bhavet tat ayuktam yadi nāma idānīm atas upalabhyate anyadā api iti kutas pratītiḥ evam eva iti ced ghaṭaḥ api paṭa anantaram upalabhyate tatra api evam bhavet dṛśyate atra vyabhicāraḥ iti ced anena eva tarhi tatra api anāśvāsaḥ anāśvāsa pratītiḥ na asti eva iti ced adīrgha darśinām bhūyas darśanāt etat loka vyavahāraḥ evam eva iti ced yadi evam katham na saṃvṛttyā kārya tā ādi gatiḥ anirūpita tattvā hi pratītiḥ saṃvṛttiḥ matā tathā ca evam eva vyavahāraḥ na kutas na loka vyavahāre parama arthaḥ upayujyate adhimukti vibhāga mātreṇa siddheḥ svapna niyata vyavahāra vat parama artha vicāreṇa hi loka vyavahāra pralopa prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt kṣaṇika pakṣe api saṃvṛtti siddhiḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti 
[519,6^1]	tat etat api ayuktam yadi hi saṃvṛttyā eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tatas sarveṣām saṃvṛtti sattvam syāt na kiṃcid parama artha sat sidhyet paramārthataḥ kasya api artha kriyā sāmarthyā siddheḥ satyam eva etat iṣṭam iti ced sāmānya avayavi saṃyoga ādeḥ kim na tathā sattvam iṣṭam tasya saṃvṛttyā api asāmarthyam iti ced na anvaya vyatireka pratibhāsasya ubhayatra tulya tvāt tathā hi yatra yatra cakṣuḥ pravartate tatra tatra taimirika keśa ādi pratibhāsa van na stambha ādi pratibhāsaḥ bhavati iti stambha ādeḥ sāmarthya gatiḥ tathā mahiṣa ādiṣu gavānvaya buddhiḥ na bhavati paramāṇu mātreṣu saṃyoga ādi rahiteṣu ca avayavi saṃyoga ādi buddhiḥ na bhavati iti sāmānya ādeḥ api sāmarthya gatiḥ kim ca yadi anirūpita tattva apratītiḥ saṃvṛttiḥ tatas eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva vyavasthitiḥ iṣṭā tathā sati akṣaṇikānām eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sarva vyavahāri prasiddhaḥ abhyanujñeyaḥ kim tatra sūkṣma vicāreṇa 
[519,6^2]	sūkṣma īkṣikayā hi kārya kāraṇa bhāva ucchedaḥ eva syāt uktāt nyāyāt tathā api asiddha tvāt na sattvena kṣaṇika tva siddhiḥ na api artha kriyāyāḥ krama ākramābhyām vyāpti siddhiḥ sūkṣma īkṣikayā api tvad mataḥ eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva grahaṇam na sambhavati anyena anyasya apratibaddhasya grahaṇa anabhyupagamāt pratibandhaḥ ca dviṣṭhaḥ pratyakṣeṇa anvaya grāhiṇā na gṛhyate iti anumānasya api tatra apravṛttiḥ asmad mate tu kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya api na grahaṇa anupapattiḥ pratyakṣasya ekakṣaṇika viṣaya tva niyama anabhyupagamāt tathā ca vyāpti grahaṇa samarthana prastāve asmad ādi pratyakṣam api atīta anāgata ādi viṣaye kadācid adṛṣṭa ādi hetu viśeṣāt pravartate iti samarthitam na hi anyathā kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādi pratītiḥ sambhavati anādi vyavahāra abhyāsanātaḥ eva iyam pratītiḥ iti ced na atra api pramāṇa abhāvāt asaṃsṛṣṭa ekakṣaṇa mātra vedana vādinaḥ hi vyavahārasya anādiḥ abhyāsaḥ tatas vāsanā tatas mithyā pratītiḥ iti etat sarvam andha paramparāvat apramāṇakam iti 
[519,29_520,4]	yathā ca idam asya kāryam iti asyāḥ pratīteḥ visaṃvāda abhāvāt eva prāmāṇyam tathā anena etāni krameṇa kṛtāni etāni yugapad iti pratīteḥ asaḥ eva ayam sphaṭikaḥa asaḥ eva aham a iti evamādi pratyabhijñāyāḥ ca visaṃvāda abhāvāt eva prāmāṇyam eṣṭavyam tulya yogakṣema tvāt atha visaṃvādinī api pratyabhijñā dṛśyate kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratītiḥ kim na visaṃvādinī api dṛśyate yā visaṃvādinī sā kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratītiḥ eva na bhavati apramāṇa tvāt iti ced samānam atra api visaṃvādinī yā sā pratyabhijñā eva na bhavati iti tad ābhāsa tvāt iti bhrāntā api pratyabhijñā vaśyam sādṛśya nimitta abhyupagantavyā an yathā sarvatra bhavet sādṛśyam tu anugata eka vastu anabhyupagamāt na sambhavati iti vicāritam tad abhyupagame ca katham sarvam kṣaṇikam 
[520,11^1]	yat ca uktam akṣaṇikaḥ arthaḥ kim krameṇa karoti yugapad vā iti yathādarśanam ubhayathā api karoti yeṣu kāryeṣu yugapad sahakāri prāptiḥ tāni yugapad karoti yeṣu krameṇa sahakāri prāptiḥ tāni krameṇa eva karoti iti tad atad rūpā kāraṇe sahakāri vaiyarthyam iti ced na tad sāhitye kāryasya eva niṣpatteḥ taiḥ vinā api yadi akṣaṇikaḥ kāryam kuryāt syāt teṣām vaiyarthyam sahakāriṇaḥ tasya kam upakāram kurvati yena taiḥ vinā na karoti iti ced kāryam eva kurvanti anya upakāra karaṇe hi sahakāri tvam eva na syāt tathā hi yadi tam eva kurvanti tadā tad kāriṇaḥ eva syuḥ na tad sahakāriṇaḥ atha tat anyat tat akāryam kurvanti tathā api katham tad sahakāriṇaḥ tena saha ekam kāryam kurvantaḥ hi tad sahakāriṇaḥ abhidhīyante 
[520,11^2]	na hi bhavat pakṣe api yeṣām rūpa āloka manaskāra ādīnām sahakāri tvam teṣām eka kārya kāraṇa vyatirekeṇa anyaḥ paraspara upakāraḥ asti na api eka sāmagrī adhīnānām iva sahakāri niyamaḥ ālokena janitasya api vijñānasya viśiṣṭa jñāna utpattim pratyāloka sahakāri tvāt tat api āloka sahakāri vijñānam ālokena janitam iti ced na kim kevalena vijñāna sahitena vā kevalena iti ced katham vijñāna upādānam vinā vijñāna utpattiḥ utpattau vā para loka siddhiḥ na syāt atha vijñāna sahitena tat api vijñānam yadi ālokena janitam tad āloka santānaḥ api anādiḥ eṣṭavyaḥ tatra ca pratyakṣa bādhā api syāt atha na janitam tadā tasya vijñānasya anupakārakaḥ eva ālokaḥ sahakārī katham anupakāriṇaḥ sahakāri tvam na asti 
[520,30]	bhavatu nāma anupakārakaḥ api sahakārī tathā api yadi tasya prāk eva śaktiḥ asti kim na karoti na asti ced paścāt api aśaktaḥ katham karoti paścāt śaktaḥ ced śakta aśaktayoḥ katham na anyatvam viruddha dharma adhyāsasya bheda lakṣaṇa tvāt iti na etat asti sahakāri sākalyam hi tasya śaktiḥ tad vaikalyam ca aśaktiḥ tena saha kāri vaikalye prāk aśaktaḥ ucyate paścāt tad sākalye ca śaktaḥ iti dharma dharmiṇoḥ bhedaḥ prasādhitaḥ tena śakti utpāde api na avaśyam tadvataḥ utpādaḥ śakteḥ nivṛttau api na avaśyam tadvataḥ nivṛttiḥ pratibandha abhāvāt katham artha antaram artha antarasya śaktiḥ iti ced ātmā eva ātmanaḥ katham śaktiḥ tādātmyāt iti ced atādātmyāt kim na iṣyate sarvam sarvasya śaktiḥ prasajyeta iti ced na ālokaḥ vijñānāt bhinnaḥ api na sarvasya sahakārī tasya sva hetu niyamāt tathā utpattiḥ iti ced sahakāri sākalyam api sva hetu niyamāt tathā utpannam yena kasyacid eva śaktiḥ na sarvasya iti 
[521,12]	kim ca kāraṇam api na artha antarasya kāryasya yuktam sarvam sarvasya prasajyeta sarvasya tatas anutpādāt tena na sarvasya tad kāraṇam iti ced etat eva kutas yat artha antara tva aviśeṣe api kasyacid eva tatas utpattiḥ na sarvasya iti vastu svabhāvaḥ eṣaḥ iti ced tat kim asat graha abhiniveśa nā atra api vastu svabhāvaḥ eva eṣa yat artha antara tva viśeṣe api kiṃcid eva kasyavid eva śaktiḥ na sarvam sarvasya iti 
[521,18]	yathā eva artha antara tva aviśeṣe api anvaya vyatirekābhyām pratiniyata svabhāvayoḥ eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pratīyate tathā artha antara tva aviśeṣe api anvaya vyatirekābhyām pratiniyata svabhāvayoḥ eva sahakāri sākalya hetvoḥ śakti śaktimat bhāvaḥ pratīyate yathā loka ādi sahakāri sākalyam cakṣuṣaḥ eva śaktiḥ na ghrāṇa ādeḥ sva viṣaya vijñāna utpādane tu rūpasya eva sā śaktiḥ na gandha ādeḥ tathā hi rūpam eva nayana āloka ādi sākalye sati sva ātmani jñānam utpādayat upalabhyate na asati tad sākalye atas eva na śaktiḥ eva hetuḥ śaktimataḥ api anvaya vyatirekābhyām hetu tva avadhāraṇāt iti 
[521,26]	yat ca uktam śakta aśaktayoḥ viruddha dharma adhyāsāt bhedaḥ iti tat na kāla bhedena avirodhāt yathā kriyā utpatteḥ pūrvam niṣkriyaḥ sphaṭikaḥ saḥ eva paścāt sa kriyaḥ iti sādhya tvāt adṛṣṭāntaḥ iti ced na pramāṇa siddhasya sādhya tva ayogāt evam hi viruddha dharma adhyāsāt bhedaḥ asiddhaḥ iti api bruvāṇaḥ katham vāryate tasmāt yayoḥ dharmayoḥ yathā virodhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tayoḥ tathā eva abhyupagantavyaḥ yathā saḥ eva hetuḥ sva kāryam prati śaktaḥ kārya antaram prati aśaktaḥ iti ekasya eva viṣaya bhedena śakti aśaktī na viruddhe tathā kāla bhedena api śakti bhede api śaktimat abhedasya pramāṇa siddheḥ ubhayatra aviśeṣāt iti 
[522,6^1]	yadi api bhinnā śaktiḥ śaktimataḥ abhyupagamyate tathā api na avaśyam śakta aśaktayoḥ bhedaḥ kasmāt tvad mate api dharma bhedāt dharmi bheda niyama asiddheḥ tathā ca abhinne api kārye sahakāriṇām pṛthak upayogam darśayata abhihitam yathā mṛd piṇḍa kulāla sūtra ādibhyaḥ bhavataḥ ghaṭasya mṛd piṇḍāt amṛd svabhāvebhyaḥ bhedaḥ kulālāt tasya eva saṃsthāna viśiṣṭaḥ sūtrāt tasya eva cakrāt vibhaktaḥ svabhāvaḥ tat evam na kulālāt mṛd svabhāva tā na mṛdaḥ saṃsthāna viśeṣaḥ tathā cakṣuḥ vijñāne api pūrva jñāna kṣaṇāt upalambha ātma tā nayanāt rūpa grahaṇa yogya tā viṣayāt tad tulya rūpa tā iti evam sarvatra sahakāriṇām pṛthak upayogaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ 
[522,6^2]	yathā ca atra mṛdā ātma tā ādi svabhāva bhede api na kāryasya bhedaḥ tathā śakta aśakta tā ādi svabhāva bhede api abhedaḥ bhaviṣyati abādhita eka tva adhyavasāyasya samāna tvāt svabhāva bheda bādhakasya ca vyabhicāri tvāt atha na eva abhinna ātmanaḥ kasyacid svabhāva bhedaḥ iṣyate evam tarhi sahakāriṇām pṛthak upayoga kathanam bāla unmatta pralapitam syāt na ca pṛthak upayogam antareṇa kārya viśeṣasya pratiniyata kāraṇa pūrvaka tvam sidhyati sarva kāla bhāvinaḥ trailokyasya api kāraṇa tva prasaṅgāt tatas ca kārya viśeṣāt kāraṇa viśeṣa anumānam na syāt 
[523,2_523,5]	atha ātat vyāvṛtti bhedena svabhāva bhedaḥ kalpyate tat kiṃbhukti bheda mātrena eva vayam pratārayitavyāḥ na hi atad vyāvṛtti śakti dharma ākāra śabdaiḥ svabhāva śabda arthāt anyaḥ arthaḥ abhidhīyate tvad śāstre api eka artha tvena vyavahāra darśanāt atha ātat vyāvṛtti bhedaḥ api kalpanātaḥ eva ucyate asan eva tarhi vyāvṛtti bhedaḥ kalpita svabhāva tvāt rajju ādiṣu sarpa ādi a ākāra vat tatas ca vyāvṛtti bhedena liṅga liṅgi svabhāvaḥ mithyā eva syāt tasmāt na dharma bhedāt eva dharmi bhedaḥ iti 
[523,9]	yat punar idam uktam prathama kārya utpādana kāle api uttara kārya utpādana svabhāvaḥ akṣaṇikasya asti abhinna ātmaka tvāt atas prathama kārya kriyā kāle eva aśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuryāt iti tat idam mātā vandhyā ityādi vat sva vacana virodhāt ayuktam yaḥ hi uttara kārya karaṇa svabhāvaḥ sa katham ādau tat kāryam kuryāt atha kuryāt na tarhi asau uttara kārya karaṇa svabhāvaḥ na hi nīla utpādana svabhāvaḥ pīta ādikam api karoti na ca prathama uttara kārya utpādana svabhāva bhedāt tadvataḥ api bhedaḥ svabhāva bhedasya vyabhicāri tvena ukta tvāt 
[523,16_523,24]	api ca yena svabhāvena rūpam rūpa antaram karoti na tena eva rasa ādikam rasa ādeḥ api rūpa svabhāva tva prasaṅgāt tatas sarvam rūpa kāryam cakṣuṣā gṛhyeta na ca etat iṣṭam tasmāt yathā rūpam rūpa antara utpādana svabhāvena tat eva karoti jñāna utpādana svabhāvena jñānam eva karoti na rūpa ādikam rasa utpādana svabhāvena ca rasam eva gandha sparśa janana svabhāvābhyām tau eva janayati iti tadvat akṣaṇikaḥ api ādya kārya utpādana svabhāvena ādyam eva utpādayati na tat uttaram tad uttara kārya utpādana svabhāvena tad uttaram eva janayati na ādyam uttarottaram vā evam uttarottara kāryeṣu ananta kāla bhāviṣu api pratiniyatāḥ svabhāvāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ svabhāvāḥ eva hetavaḥ na svabhāvi iti api ayuktam rūpasya api ahetu tva prasaṅgāt svabhāvānām eva hetu tvāt 
[523,27]	atha na rūpasya svabhāva bhedaḥ iṣyate kim tu ekaḥ eva tathābhūtaḥ svabhāvaḥ yena bhinna ākāram bhinna deśam ca kāryam utpādayati tasya abhinna svabhāvasya eva bhinna svabhāva kārya utpādana anurodhena svabhāva bhedaḥ kalpitaḥ iti 
[524,4_524,11]	nanu evam paraḥ api abhinna svabhāvasya eva akṣaṇikasya krama bhāvi aneka svabhāva kārya utpādana anurodhena svabhāva bhedam kalpayan na upālambham arhati iti na ca anantara bhāvi tvena eva kāraṇa tvam trailokyasya api anantara bhāvinaḥ kāraṇa tva prasaṅgāt tasmāt yat eva kārya utpattau vyāpriyate tat eva kāraṇam tatas ca nityam api krama vyāpāraṇa svabhāva tvāt krameṇa vyāpriyamāṇam krama bhāvi kāryāṇām kāraṇam krama vyāpāraṇa svabhāva tvam ca akṣaṇikasya krama bhāvi kārya upalambhāt eva avagamyate yathā yugapad kārya upalambhāt yugapad vyāpāraṇa svabhāva tvam niraṃśasya yugapad vyāpāra lalpanā api na yuktā iti ced yadi yugapad vyāpāram vinā eva rūpa ādi hetuḥ yugapad anekam kāryam karoti tadā asmākam api krama vyāpāra kalpanayā na kiṃcid prayojanam tad svābhāvyāt eva akṣaṇikaḥ krameṇa kāryam kariṣyati iti 
[524,15]	nanu yadi akṣaṇikaḥ krama karaṇa svabhāvaḥ tadā kim na tad svabhāvaḥ eva pratibhāti kaḥ evam āha na pratibhāti tad kārya apratibhāsane api katham tad janana svabhāvaḥ pratibhāti iti ced na tad kāryāṇām tatas artha antara tvāt tad apratibhāsane teṣām janakaḥ ayam iti evam pratibhāsaḥ mā bhūt viśeṣaṇa agrahaṇe viśeṣya buddheḥ anutpatteḥ svarūpataḥ tu gṛhyate eva yathā tvad mate rasa ādi agrahaṇe api tad janana svabhāvam rūpam gṛhītam eva niraṃśasya aṃśena grahaṇa yogāt na ca rasa ādayaḥ api cakṣuṣā gṛhyante api ca pāṣāṇa ādīnām guru tvam darśana mātreṇa eva na gṛhyate na ca tat bhinnam tvayā iṣṭam na api tat na asti eva kim ca kṣaṇikatā ādi a ākāraḥ api rūpa ādiṣu gṛhyamāṇeṣu na pratibhāti anumāna vaiphalya prasaṅgāt 
[524,25_525,1]	gṛhītaḥ eva kṣaṇikatā ādi a ākāraḥ kim tu tad grahaṇasya āpaṭu tvāt tat niścayaḥ na bhavati iti ced yadi evam nitya vyāpita ādi ākāra grahaṇe api pāṭava abhāvāt niścayaḥ na bhavati iti evam kasmāt na kalpyate na ca sarvatra grahaṇa asyā paṭu tvam sambhāvyate na hi kha puṣpa ādayaḥ api arthāḥ gṛhītāḥ eva tad grahaṇasya apaṭu tvāt na niścīyante iti yuktam krama karaṇa svabhāve tu kvacid niścayaḥ api asti tena tad grahaṇasya kvacid apāṭava kalpanā api yuktā tṛṇa ādi grahaṇānām niścayābhyām pāṭavāt krama karaṇa svabhāva tvāt na kadācid tatas yugapad kārya utpattiḥ iti ced na tad karyā apekṣayā yugapad karaṇa svabhāva tvāt 
[525,4]	krama yugapad karaṇa svabhāvayoḥ virodhaḥ iti ced na bhinna viṣaya tvena avirodhāt kāraṇa akāraṇa svabhāva vat yathā sva kārya apekṣayā agni ādiḥ kāraṇa svabhāvaḥ atad kārya apekṣayā tu akāraṇa svabhāvaḥ tadvān nityaḥ api hetuḥ keṣāṃcid krameṇa keṣāṃcid yugapad utpattim karoti iti evaṃsvabhāvaḥ svabhāvataḥ tathābhūta tve nityasya sahakāri anapekṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na īdṛśa svabhāva tvāt tasya yat anya sahitaḥ eva yugapad ca kārya viśeṣam karoti iti nityasya evam svabhāvaḥ kutas abhūt iti ced nitya tvāt eva na kutaścid nityasya anādeḥ nirhetukasya hetum pṛcchati iti aho pāṇḍityam prabhāta bhojinaḥ 
[525,13]	yadi ca avaśyam vayam praṣṭavyāḥ tatas evam pṛccha nitya sadbhāve kim pramāṇam iti tatra vipakṣa bādhaka sādhanam vyatireki anumānam iti uktam iti nirhetuka tve nityasya sarvatra sa svabhāvaḥ prasajyeta niyāmaka hetoḥ abhāvāt iti ced na nitya svabhāva tvena eva anādi tvāt yaḥ hi svabhāvaḥ kadācid bhavati sa hetu niyamāt niyataḥ yujyate na tu anādiḥ hetu niyamāt eva niyata svabhāvaḥ arthaḥ iti na ayam ṛṣi samabhivyāhāraḥ pramāṇa siddha tvam ca itaratra api samānam tathā ca nirhetukānām api go tva aśva tva ādīnām pratiniyata svabhāva tvam pratyakṣeṇa api gṛhyate iti samarthitam pratyabhijñāyāḥ ca aprāmāṇye anvaya vyatireka grahaṇam api na prāpnoti eka jāti eka santāna tvasya api asiddheḥ kṣaṇānām ca anvaya grahaṇam na sambhavati iti uktam tasmāt abādhita pratyabhijñānasya prāmāṇyam eṣṭavyam tad anya pratyakṣa anumāna jñāna vat sphaṭika ādiṣu ca pratyabhijñānam na bādhyate krama yaugapadyādi bādhakasya parihṛta tvāt 
[525,25]	śarīra ādiṣu iva sphaṭika ādiṣu api pratyabhijñānam sadṛśa apara apara utpatteḥ viveka agrahaṇāt avitatham iva pratibhāti iti ced na utpatti vināśa kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ na hi yathā śarīrasya pratidinam utpatti kāraṇam anna pāna ādi vināśa kāraṇam ca avayava kriyā ādi pramāṇena upalabhyate tathā sphaṭika ādeḥ pratikṣaṇam utpatti vināśa kāraṇam kiṃcid upalabhyate na ca ākasmikaḥ kasyacid vināśaḥ sambhavati utpatti vat vināśasya api anvaya vyatirekābhyām hetutaḥ eva upalambhāt iti 
[526,7]	nanu ca vināśa hetuḥ asāmarthya vaiyarthyābhyām apāstaḥ tathā hi yadi ayam bhāvaḥ sva hetoḥ eva anaśvara svabhāvaḥ utpannaḥ tatas asau nāśayitum aśakyaḥ iti asāmarthyam nāśa hetoḥ na hi aśukla svabhāvaḥ sva hetoḥ utpannaḥ hetu antareṇa śukla svabhāvaḥ kartum śakyate tad anyaḥ nāśaḥ ced kriyate tadā nāśa utpāde api kim tasya iti na hi nāśena api asau nāśyate na api āvriyate anāvṛta svabhāvaḥ hi utpannaḥ katham āvṛta svabhāvaḥ kartum śakyate na khalu kṛṣṇa svabhāvaḥ kenacid śuklaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ upalabhyate 
[526,14]	atha naśvara svabhāvaḥ sva hetoḥ eva utpannaḥ tadā tad svabhāva tayā eva nāśāt vyarthaḥ nāśa hetuḥ yaḥ hi yat svabhāvaḥ sva hetutaḥ utpannaḥ sa punar tad bhāve hetu antaram na apekṣate prakāśa uṣṇa kaṭhina tva ādi vat na hi prakāśa ādi svabhāvāḥ pradīpa ādayaḥ sva kāraṇāt utpannāḥ punar prakāśa ādi bhāve hetu antaram apekṣante tasmāt vināśam prati nirapekṣaḥ bhāvaḥ sa apekṣa tve ca avaśyambhāva niyamaḥ na syāt vastre rāga ādi vat atas kṛtakānām ghaṭa ādīnām keṣāṃcid nityatā api syāt yadi api bahulam vināśa kāraṇāni santi teṣām api sva pratyaya bhāva adhīnam sannidhi tvāt na avaśyam sannidhānam iti kaścid na vinaśyet api na hi avaśyam hetavaḥ phalavantaḥ vaikalya pratibandha sambhavāt iti tat uktam ahetu tvāt vināśasya svabhāvāt anubandhitā sa apekṣāṇām hi dharmāṇām na avaśyambhāvita īkṣyate bāhulye api tad hetoḥ bhavet kvacid asambhavaḥ iti 
[527,2]	atra ucyate yat tāvat naśvara svabhāvasya anaśvara svabhāvasya iti tat na hetvāda uccheda prasaṅgāt ittham vikalpasya sarvatra sambhavāt tathā hi hetuḥ kim bhavana svabhāvaḥ bhavati āhosvit abhavana svabhāvaḥ iti yadi ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā svayam eva bhavati tad svabhāva tvāt iti vyarthaḥ hetuḥ dvitīya pakṣe tu asamarthaḥ na hi abhavana svabhāvaḥ śaśaśṛṅga ādiḥ kenacid utpādayitum śakyate tathā cheda dāha ādi hetavaḥ api tad svabhāvā tad svabhāva pakṣayoḥ vaiyarthya asāmarthyābhyām anupapannāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ tathā ca evam sarva hetu pratikṣepa sambhavān mokṣa arthaḥ api prayāsaḥ śāstra śravaṇa ādau vyarthaḥ iti 
[527,10_527,15]	atha agnibhāve dhūma bhāvaḥ tad abhāve vā abhāvaḥ iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām agni dhūmayoḥ hetu hetum at bhāvaḥ sarva loka pratipannaḥ sa vikalpa śatena api apākartum na śakyate na ca bhāvasya nirhetuka tve pratiniyata deśa kāla ādi yogaḥ sambhavati yadi evam vināśaḥ api pratiniyata deśa kāla ādimān na eva nirhetukaḥ sambhavati anvaya vyatirekābhyām ca nāśa hetavaḥ api dṛśyante ghaṭa ādeḥ mudgara ādayaḥ kāṣṭha ādeḥ agni ādayaḥ ca iti nanu atra uktam sattā mātra anubandhi tvāt nāśasya anitya tā dhvaneḥ agneḥ artha antara utpattau bhavet kāṣṭhasya darśanam 
[527,18]	asya arthaḥ sattā mātra anubandhī nāśaḥ sattā svabhāvaḥ eva iti arthaḥ tena dhvaneḥ anyasya vā sattā hetutaḥ eva anityatā utpannā na nirhetukī jāta svabhāvaḥ hetu antaram na apekṣate iti ahetukaḥ nāśaḥ uktaḥ kāṣṭhasya api na agninā vināśaḥ kriyate kim tarhi pūrvasya svarasa nirodhe anyasya agninā adhikṛtasya utpattiḥ anyathā agneḥ artha antara utpattau bhavet kāṣṭhasya darśanam na hi artha antarāt artha antara janmani kāṣṭham nāma na dṛśyate atiprasaṅgaḥ hi evam syāt iti 
[527,25]	tat api ayuktam sattā nāśayoḥ tādātmye hi sarva daiva upalabdhiḥ syāt svabhāvena virodha abhāvāt virodhe ca ekakṣaṇa upalambhaḥ api na syāt tad virodhinaḥ tad ātma tvena tad sahabhāvi tvāt atha na asya svabhāvena virodhaḥ kim tarhi sva hetoḥ eva ayam eka kṣaṇa sthāyī jātaḥ kṣaṇa antare na upalabhyate tathā ca āha bhāvaḥ eva kṣaṇa sthiti dharmāḥ nāśaḥ iti ucyate yadi evam kṣaṇa sthitiḥ iti abhidhānā kṣaṇāt ūrdhvam asya āsthitiḥ tathā katham tādātmyam krama utpannayoḥ eka tva ayogāt bīja aṅkura vat atas eva bhinna hetuka tvam eka sāmagrī āpanna janmanoḥ krama asambhavāt iti 
[528,4]	nanu yadi ayam bhāvaḥ naṃṣṭā tadā svayam eva naṃkṣyati kaḥ hi nāśavidhnaḥ tasya na ced naṃṣṭā tatas na eva naṃkṣyati iti naṃṣṭā iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim nāśa ātmakaḥ eva āhosvit na aśakṛt iti yadi tāvat nāśa ātmakaḥ eva tadā ekakṣaṇa upalambhaḥ api na syāt nāśā viśiṣṭasya upalambha sambhavāt upalambhe vā sarva daiva upalambhaḥ syāt tad svarūpa aparityāgāt parityāgaḥ vā saḥ eva nāśa utpādaḥ tasya vastu svarūpa parityāga lakṣaṇa tvāt tasya ca tādātmya anupapattiḥ vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ ekatva virodhāt na hi tat eva tat asti tat eva tat na asti yat eva sthitiḥ tat eva āsthitiḥ iti yuktam atha naṃṣṭā na aśakṛt iti ucyate tathā api na tādātmyam kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt agni dhūmayoḥ iva nāśasyā kāryatva abhyupagama virodhaḥ tad atad rūpā kāraṇāt ca ākiṃcitkaraḥ iti asya virodhaḥ ca atha naṃṣṭā naśvaraḥ iti ucyate naśvaraḥ iti asya api kaḥ arthaḥ nāśa svabhāvaḥ na aśakṛt vā iti ubhayatra api uktaḥ doṣaḥ 
[528,16]	prakāśa ādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ api ayuktaḥ tathā hi na tāvat asmad mate pradīpa prakāśa ādīnām eka tvam siddham na api eka hetuka tvam dravya utpatti antaram hi sāmagryantarataḥ prakāśa ādayaḥ guṇāḥ utpadyante iti naḥ siddhāntaḥ tvad mate tu pradīpa ādi vastu rūpa ādi ātmakam eva iti asti prasiddhiḥ na tu tad vināśaka tvam yuktam nāśaḥ hi abhāvaḥ ucyate na ca bhāvaḥ eva abhāvaḥ tayoḥ bhedasya avisaṃvādena sarva jana prasiddha tvāt tvayā api lakṣaṇa bheda abhidhānāt na ca bhāvasya utpatti kāle api sattva vicchedaḥ paścāt iva prāk api artha kriyā sāmarthya viraha prasaṅgāt avināśe vā prāk iva paścāt api avasthāna prasaṅgaḥ sthiteḥ apratiṣedhāt paścāt asya sarva sāmarthya virahaḥ iti ced nanu saḥ eva nāśaḥ sarva loka prasiddhaḥ sa ca paścāt bhavati iti katham bhāva nāśaḥ krama bhāvinoḥ eka tva ayogāt iti uktam na ca ahetuka tve api paścāt bhāva niyamaḥ sambhavati iti 
[528,28]	yat ca uktam hetu apekṣa tve nāśasya avaśi ambhāva niyamaḥ na syāt vastre rāga vat iti tat na anekāntāt sa apekṣasya api maraṇa ādeḥ avaśyambhāva darśanāt prāṇa ādi nirodha lakṣaṇam hi maraṇam ucyate na tad svabhāvataḥ eva bhavati adṛṣṭa ādi nimitta akṣi tvāt pradīpa ādeḥ santāna ucchittiḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ asabhāga kṣaṇa utpattiḥ candra ādeḥ uditasya astamaya iti evam ādikam nimitta viśeṣa apekṣam kāla antareṇa avaśyam bhavati iti atas sa apekṣa tve api abhicāraḥ 
[529,5]	samarthitam ca kāraṇa anumānam tatas na hi avaśyam hetavaḥ phalavantaḥ iti etat api ayuktam na ca atra nāśasya hetuḥ kālaḥ vā niyamyate kim tu kṛtakam vastu kadācid kutaścid naśyati iti tena ekadā ghaṭa ādi nivartakasya mudgara ādeḥ pratibandha vaikalya sambhave api anyadānyatas ca ghaṭa ādi nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati iti bhavatā api etat avaśyam abhyupagantavyam anyathā mṛtyoḥ pratyaya antara apekṣi tvāt avyabhicāraḥ na syāt pratyaya antara anapekṣi tve ca sarva prāṇinām janma antaram eva maraṇam syāt na ca jātaḥ api kaścid amaraḥ sambhavati sarva prāṇinām maraṇa dharmi tva upalambhāt tasmāt bāhulye api hi tad hetoḥ ityādi api ayuktam 
[529,14]	yat punar etat agneḥ artha antara utpattau ityādi tat ayuktam bhāva abhāvayoḥ paraḥ para viruddhayoḥ eka ātma tva abhāva lakṣaṇa tvāt itara ātmahāneḥ katham naṣṭa ātmanaḥ kāṣṭhasya darśanam bhavet tad abhāva upalambhāt eva tat na upalabhyate tat na asti iti ca bhavati tādātmya vādinaḥ tu dṛśyamānam eva kāṣṭham adṛṣṭam naṣṭam ca iti syāt artha antara tva aviśeṣe api katham kaścid eva kasyacid nāśaḥ iti saḥ eva praṣṭavyaḥ yaḥ evam vadati dṛśyate hi dahanāt utpannaḥ kāṣṭhasya eva nāśo na ākāśa ādeḥ na ca asau nāśaḥ kāṣṭham eva pratyakṣa virodhāt anyatas eva utpanna tvāt ca na ca utpannasya punar utpattiḥ sambhavati 
[529,22]	na ca artha antara tva mātra sāmyāt dṛṣṭasya svabhāva viśeṣasya pratyākhyānam yuktam na hi yathā ghaṭaḥ paṭa ādeḥ aprakāśakaḥ yathā pradīpaḥ api artha antara tva aviśeṣāt iti yuktam yathā ca anyeṣām ahetuḥ agniḥ tathā dhūma ādeḥ api mā bhūt artha antara tva aviśeṣāt iti evaṃvidham etat hṛdayam tasya uttaram svabhāva paryanuyogasya ubhayatra aviśeṣāt iti 
[529,27]	nanu bhāvena svarasa nirodhinā na eva nāśa hetuḥ apekṣyate tasya asāmarthyāt kriyā pratiṣedhāt ca asamarthaḥ tāvat nāśa hetuḥ siddhe hi bhāve na tam karoti na api anya karaṇe tasya kiṃcid iti tad atad rūpā karaṇāt ca ākiṃcitkaraḥ na apekṣyate kriyā pratiṣedhāt ca katham vināśaḥ iti hi bhāva abhāvam manyante tat ayam vināśa hetuḥ abhāvam karoti iti prāptam tatra yadi abhāvaḥ nāma kaścid kāryaḥ syāt svabhāvaḥ tatas saḥ eva bhāvaḥ iti na abhāvaḥ syāt tasmāt abhāvam karoti bhāvam na karoti iti 
[530,4]	kriyā pratiṣedhaḥ asya kṛtaḥ syāt tathā api akiṃcitkaraḥ kim iti apekṣyate iti tat etat api ayuktam tathā hi bhāvasya vināśaḥ kim asti vā na vā na asti ced sarvadā eva bhāva upalambhaḥ syāt tad svarūpasya tad avastha tvāt atādavasthye ca katham na asti vināśaḥ atādavasthyasya eva vināśa tvāt atha asti vināśaḥ sa yadi avyatiriktaḥ tadā paścāt iva bhāvasya prāk api anupalambha prasaṅgaḥ paścāt api vā prāk iva upalambhaḥ syāt tad upalambha vighāta anutpatteḥ utpattau ca paścāt bhāvī vināśaḥ katham na hetu antarā apekṣī 
[530,11_530,14]	yat punar etat yadi abhāvaḥ kāryaḥ syāt tadā bhavati iti bhāvaḥ eva syāt iti tat ayuktam nimitta antarāt saṃjñā antara saṃyojane api artha tathā bhāvasya pratiṣeddhum aśakya tvāt vipratipatti avyavasthā ādiṣu sampratipatti vyavasthā ādi saṃjñā saṃyojana vat yat api akiṃcitkaraḥ na apekṣyate iti tat api ayuktam bhāvasya sāmarthya vighātam kurvat katham akiṃcitkaraḥ sāmarthya avighāpte ca prāk iva paścāt api kartṛ tva prasaṅgaḥ durnivāraḥ iti 
[530,18]	nanu agni janitena vināśena saha kaḥ sambandhaḥ kāṣṭhasya na tāvat āśraya āśrayi bhāvaḥ kuṇḍadadhi ādi vat iva tayoḥ upalambha prasaṅgāt na api tad utpattiḥ kāṣṭhāt anutpatteḥ na vā dahanāt utpattiḥ tad apekṣāt kāṣṭhāt tad utpattiḥ iti ced anatiśaya lābhinaḥ kāpekṣā na ca kārya utpattau kāraṇam tad avastham eva naṣṭam nāma bhavati artha antaram nāśaḥ kāṣṭham kasmāt na dṛśyate kaḥ ayam artha antara utpatti kāṣṭha darśanayoḥ virodhaḥ tena artha antareṇa parigṛhīta tvāt eva kāṣṭham na dṛśyate iti evam api āvaraṇam tad kāṣṭhasya prāptam na ca etat yuktam āvaranam hi darśanam vibadhnīyāt na abhi ghāta ādīni dravya sāmarthyāni iti 
[530,26]	tat etat api asat yat tāvat nāśena saha kaḥ sambandhaḥ iti tat na āśraya āśrayi bhāva ādayaḥ sambandhāḥ na eva abhyupagamyante kim tu bhāva abhāvayoḥ pratiṣedhya pratiṣedhana lakṣaṇayoḥ eva sambandhaḥ te eva na āvaraṇa kalpaḥ nāśaḥ āvaraṇena hi darśana śaktiḥ pratibadhyate pracyāvyate vā na tu nāśena kasyacid pratibandhaḥ pracyāvaḥ vā kriyate nāśaḥ eva hi kāṣṭhasya sarva śakti pracyāvaḥ sa ca agni ādinā kṛtaḥ iti 
[531,6]	nanu yadi nāśaḥ api kriyate tadā tasya api nāśi tvam syāt kṛtaka tvāt tatas punar kāṣṭha ādeḥ unmajjanam syāt hantṛ ghāte caitrasyānunmajjana vat iti ced na hantuḥ nāśa hetu tvāt na hi hantā eva caitrasya nāśaḥ tayoḥ sahabhāvasya api darśanāt nāśa hetoḥ ca agni ādeḥ nivṛttau kāṣṭhasya unmajjananam mā bhūt nāśaḥ tu bhāvasya abhāvaḥ tad abhāva nivṛttau ca bhāvasya kā anyā gatiḥ pratiṣedha dvaye vidheḥ sambhavāt iti 
[531,12]	na asiddha tvāt na eva nāśasya nāśi tvam siddham nanu utpattyā abhyupagamaḥ katham asiddhaḥ na nimitta kāraṇa mātrāt utpatteḥ yasya hi samavāyi asamavāyi nimitta kāraṇebhyaḥ utpattiḥ tasya eva utpannasya nivṛttiḥ iti bhāva dharma viparītaḥ hi abhāva dharmaḥ tena bhāve ayam niyamaḥ kṛtakasya eva nāśaḥ nāśaḥ eva ca kṛtakasya iti abhāve tu ayam na asti niyamaḥ tathā hi prāgabhāvaḥ akṛtakaḥ eva naśyati pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ punar kṛtakaḥ api avināśya iva iti na ca ayam sa hetuka nāśa vādinām prasaṅgaḥ upapadyate sa hetukasya avaśyambhāva niyama abhāvāt na hi sarvatra hetavaḥ sambhavanti 
[531,21]	nanu evam sarvatra vināśa nivṛtti hetavaḥ na santi iti etat api aniścayam yadi evam nāśasya api kvacid nivṛttiḥ bhavatu śrūyate api kāṣṭha kūṭa pitraḥ ayam ātharva vaśiṣṭha ādīnām ca śarīram naṣṭam bhasmībhūtam punar maheśvara anugrahāt pratyupasthitam mṛtāḥ ca punar ujjīvitāḥ iti dīpa āloka ādayaḥ api kārya viśeṣāḥ kecid naṣṭāḥ punar bhavantaḥ dṛśyante tatra na jñāyate kim tat nāśa apagame punar te eva bhavanti kim vā anye tad sadṛśāḥ iti na ca anyatara pakṣe api bādhakam asti 
[531,28]	muktasya duḥkha nivṛtti nivṛttau punar duḥkhi tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na hetu abhāvāt bhāva utpādakaḥ hi hetuḥ abhāvasya nivartakaḥ muktasya tu duḥkha utpādakaḥ na asti hetuḥ tena duḥkha abhāvaḥ na nivartate yathā śaśa viṣāṇa ādi utpādaka hetu abhāvāt tad prāc abhāvaḥ na nivartate śaśa viṣāṇa ādeḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ na prāc abhāvaḥ iti ced na abhāvat vaividhyā abhyupagamāt tathā ca sūtram prāk utpatteḥ abhāva upapatteḥ ca iti caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇa arthaḥ itaretarābhāvasya api prāc abhāve antarbhāvāt ye tu caturvidham abhāvam icchanti te caśabdam samuccaye vyācakṣataḥ tad mate api na avaśyam prāgabhāvasya nivṛttiḥ muktasya duḥkha ādi prāc abhāva anivṛtteḥ tad nivṛttau hi muktasya api duḥkha ādi udaya prasaṅgaḥ syāt na ca asau api atyanta abhāvaḥ svabhāvam ukta tva prasaṅgāt īśvara ākāśa ādi vat tatas apavarga artham prayāsaḥ vyarthaḥ syāt tasmāt prāgabhāvasya pradhvaṃsasya vā na sarvasya nivṛttiḥ kim tu yasya eva tad pratiyogi utpādakāḥ hetavaḥ santi tasya eva nivṛttiḥ iti kaḥ atra virodhaḥ 
[532,12]	nanu evam bhāvasya api kṛtakasya sarvasya api nāśaḥ akṛtakasya tu anāśaḥ eva iti ayam niyamaḥ na syāt akṛtakaḥ api kaścid kutaścid vinaśyati kṛtakaḥ api kaścid dhetu abhāvāt na vinaṃkṣyati iti 
[532,16]	syāt etat evam yadi akṛtakasya api bhāvasya nivartakaḥ hetuḥ kadācid kenacid upalabdhaḥ kṛtakasya vā yadi nivartakaḥ hetuḥ na eva upalabhyate tathā hi dravyasya tāvat avayavi nāśaḥ tad saṃyoga vināśaḥ ca nivartakau hetū pramāṇena pratipannau tayoḥ anyataraḥ api hetuḥ ākāśa ātma ādeḥ na sambhavati niravayava tvāt kṛtakasya tu dravyasya sarvasya sāvayava tvāt avaśyam kadācid kutaścid avayava viyogaḥ sambhavati ghaṭa ādi vat iti evam guṇa ādiṣu kṛtaka akṛtaka vargayoḥ nāśa hetūnām sambhava asambhavau pramāṇataḥ sādhayitavyau eva iti 
[532,24]	sa hetuka tve tāvat nāśasya nivartaka hetu asambhavāt anāśi tvam yuktam nirhetuka tve tu sarva nāśānām nāśi tvam aparihāryam akṛtaka tvāt na nāśi tvam kha puṣpa ādi abhāva vat iti ced tadvat eva tarhi anādi tva prasaṅgaḥ tatas khapuṣpa ādi vat na kadācid bhāvaḥ upalabhyeta tad virodhinaḥ sarvadā avasthānāt avirodhi tve ca bhāva tad nāśayoḥ sarvadā sahabhāvaḥ syāt iti 
[533,2_533,5]	nanu etat bhadantena svayam eva āśaṅkya parihṛtam yasmāt uktam ahetu tve api nāśasya nitya tvāt bhāva nāśayoḥ sahabhāva prasaṅgaḥ ced asataḥ nityatā kutas nitya aniti a vikalpaḥ hi na nāśe sambhavati tayoḥ vastu dharma tvāt nāśasya ca ākiṃcid tvāt iti tat ayuktam paścāt bhavataḥ akiṃcid tvā ayogāt abhavane vā na kadācid naṣṭaḥ bhāvaḥ syāt na hi asiddha nāśaḥ naṣṭaḥ nāma pratyutpanna avasthāyām iva iti 
[533,10]	atra āha na vai vināśaḥ na asti eva sa tu na asti yaḥ bhāvasya bhavati bhāvaḥ eva kṣaṇa sthāyī nāśaḥ tamasya manda svabhāvam ūrdhvam vyavasyati na prāc darśane api pāṭava abhāvāt tad vaśena paścāt vyavasthāpyate vikāra darśanena eva viṣama jñaiḥ iti tat etat api asaṅgatam yadi hi nāśaḥ na asti tat kim ucyate sa tu na asti yaḥ bhāvasya bhavati iti bhāvasya eva hi vināśaḥ bhavan upalabhyate na tu anyasya kasyacid na ca bhāvaḥ eva nāśaḥ tasya bhāva pratiṣedha lakṣaṇa tvāt na hi bhāvaḥ sva rūpeṇa naṣṭaḥ iti pratīyate 
[533,15]	yat ca uktam darśane api pāṭava abhāvāt na prāc vyavasyati iti tat na yadi bhāvasya darśanam eva nāśa darśanam syāt tasya paṭu tvam kutas na apaṭu tve hi bhāva vyavasāyaḥ na syāt atha bhāve asti tasya pāṭavam nanu kim tasya bhinnaḥ viṣayaḥ yena ekatra pāṭavam anyatra apāṭavam iti tathā ca na bhāvaḥ eva nāśaḥ syāt na ca nāśaḥ iti saṃjñā karaṇāt eva bhāvaḥ bhāva svarūpam jahāti atyakta svarūpaḥ ca katham na prāk iva upalabhyeta 
[534,2]	vikāra darśanena eva iti etat api asambaddham na aśasyā kiṃcid tvena vikāra asambhavāt vikāra kārī ca katham akiṃcid iti ucyate bhāva vikāraḥ eva nāśa vikāraḥ tayoḥ tādātmyāt iti ced kim sarve eva bhāva vikāraḥ nāśa vyavasthāpakaḥ kim vā kaścid eva iti sarvaḥ ced na adṛṣṭa tvāt na hi yatas api vikārāt bhāvasya sthitim laukikāḥ vyavasyanti tatas api vināśam iti uttara vikalpā tu kaścid eva bhāva viśeṣaḥ nāśaḥ syāt viṣa vat kṣaṇa sthāyi tvāt ca kṣaṇāt ūrdhvam sthiti abhāva utpatteḥ katham sa tu na asti yaḥ bhāvasya bhavati iti ucyate 
[534,10]	nanu sthiti abhāvaḥ api na tasya bhavati artha antara anartha antara vikalpaḥ asambhavāt tasmāt itthaṃsvabhāvaḥ asau sva hetoḥ utpannaḥ yena svayam eva na tiṣṭhati iti svayam na tiṣṭhati iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim tad avasthaḥ eva anupalabhyaḥ kim ca hetu antara anapekṣaḥ svayam nāśam anubhavati iti tad avasthaḥ eva anupalabhyate iti ced kutas idam amantra auṣadham indrajālam bhāvena śikṣitam yat ayam anutpanna vināśaḥ avyavadhānādūra sthānaḥ tad avastha indriya ādeḥ eva puruṣasya kadācid adhyakṣaḥ atyakṣaḥ ca iti kaḥ hi evam śraddadhīta pratyutpanna avasthāyām eva san bhāvaḥ paścāt tu asan na ca paścāt naśyati iti atha svayam paścāt nāśam anubhavati sa nāśaḥ artha antaram anartha antaram vā iti ahetuka nāśa vāde api samaḥ doṣaḥ iti 
[534,20_535,1]	nanu etat api āśaṅkya parihṛtam yat āha svatas api bhāve bhāvasya vikalpaḥ ced ayam samaḥ na tasya kiṃcid bhavati na bhavati eva kevalam nirhetuka tve api nāśasya tattva anyatva vikalpaḥ samaḥ tulyaḥ doṣaḥ tad anya utpāde bhāvaḥ kim na dṛśyate ananya tve api saḥ eva bhavati iti sutarām dṛśyate atra uttaram na tasya kiṃcid bhavati ityādi na hi ayam vināśaḥ anyaḥ vā kaścid bhāvasya bhavati iti āha kim tarhi saḥ eva bhāvaḥ na bhavati yadi hi kasyacid bhāvam brūyāt bhāvaḥ anena nivartitaḥ syāt tathā ca bhāva nivṛttau prastutāyām aprastutam eva uktam syāt na hi kasyacid bhāvena bhāvaḥ na bhūtaḥ nāma tadā ayam abhūtaḥ yadi svayam na bhavet iti 
[535,5_535,8]	satyam āśaṅkitam na tu parihṛtam tathā hi yadi na tasya kiṃcid bhavati tatas pratiṣedhaḥ api tasya na bhavati iti apratiṣedha svarūpaḥ tad avastha tvāt prāk eva upalabhyeta nanu saḥ eva bhavati iti uktam satyam uktam idam ayuktam tu uktam pramāṇa paridṛṣṭasya apahnavā yogāt na hi pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyamānaḥ agniḥ agniḥ eva ayam na bhavati iti yuktam kṣaṇa mātram eva upalabhyate iti ced kṣaṇa antare kim tasya jñānam na kiṃcid iti ced tat kim na upalabhyate svayam na upalabhyate svabhāvaḥ iti ced prāk api tarhi na upalabhyeta śaśa viṣāṇa ādi vat paścāt eva bhāvaḥ anupalabhya svabhāvaḥ iti ced nanu evam bhinna kāla tvāt upalabhya anupalabhya svabhāvayoḥ katham aikyam 
[535,15_535,18]	kim ca abhāvaḥ yadi paścāt na bhāvaḥ tasya kim iṣyate saḥ api na pratiṣedhaḥ yam abhāvaḥ kim niṣidhyate yaḥ ca bhāvasya paścāt abhāvaḥ saḥ eva nāśaḥ iti ucyate katham bhāvasya vināśaḥ anyaḥ vā kaścid na ucyate atha bhāvasya vināśaḥ ucyate kim tu sa bhavati iti na ucyate bhavati iti abhidhāne api kaḥ doṣaḥ bhāvaḥ eva syāt iti ced tat kim idānīm abhidhānāt eva arthasya rūpa parivartaḥ bhavati yadi bhāvaḥ atra jāyate iti evam ucyate janma api abhāvasya kutas iti ced kādācid ka tvāt bhāva vat akādācitka tve tu pratyutpanna avasthāyām api abhāvaḥ syāt 
[535,24]	yat ca uktam yadi hi kasyacid bhāvam brūyāt na bhāvaḥ anena nivartitaḥ syāt iti tat api ayuktam vacanasya jñāpaka tvāt na hi vacanena kiṃcid nivartyate janyate vā kim tu abhūta pūrvakaḥ kulāla ādibhiḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ janyate tadvat abhūta pūrvaḥ saḥ eva gudgara ādibhiḥ nivartyata iti āgopāla aṅganā ādi prasiddham etat anvaya vyatireka pratīteḥ ubhayatra api aviśeṣāt iti atha ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi kasyacid bhāvam brūyāt tadā na bhāvaḥ anena nivṛttaḥ khyāpitaḥ bhavet iti satyam eva tat yadi kasyacid bhāvam bhāva antarasya utpādam brūyāt tadā na bhāva nivṛttiḥ uktā bhavati yadā tu tad nivṛtteḥ eva bhāvam bravīti tadā katham bhāva nivṛttau prastutāyām aprastuta abhidhānam na bhavati na tasya kiṃcid bhavati iti abhidadhataḥ hi bhāva nivṛttau prastutāyām aprastuta abhidhānam prasaktam tad nivṛtteḥ anabhidhānāt 
[536,4]	yat punar etat tadā ayam abhūtaḥ yadi svayam na bhavet iti tat api ayuktam svayam api hi anutpanna vināśaḥ katham abhūtaḥ pratyutpanna avasthāyām iva na hi anutpanna rāgaḥ svayam eva raktaḥ bhavati iti evamprakārakam abhidhānam matimatā kenacid pramāṇīkriyate tasmāt yathā prāk araktaḥ kāraṇa antarāt rāga utpattau eva raktaḥ bhavati tathā prāk anaṣṭaḥ kāraṇa antarāt nāśa utpattau eva naṣṭaḥ bhavati iti 
[536,09]	nanu na bhavati iti ayam prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ na kasyacid bhāva abhidhāyī paryudāsaḥ eva anyathā syāt na ca saḥ api yuktaḥ kasyacid apratiṣedhāt yadi hi kiṃcid nivartyeta tadā tad vyatireki saṃspṛśyeta tad paryudāsena tat ca na asti sarvatra nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti ukte kasyacid bhāvasya eva pratīteḥ tathā ca anena artha antara bhāvaḥ eva uktaḥ syāt na tayoḥ parasparam vivekaḥ aviveke ca na paryudāsaḥ tat evam vyatireka abhāvāt anvayaḥ api na syāt tasya eka svabhāva sthiti lakṣaṇa tvāt sthitiḥ ca tad anya viveke sati syāt sa ca na asti iti apravṛtti nivṛttikam jagat syāt tasmāt yasya nāśaḥ bhavati iti ucyate sa svayam eva na bhavati iti uktam syāt iti 
[536,19]	tat etat api ayuktam yaḥ hi abhāvam na abhyupagacchati tasya eva prasajya paryudāsān upapattau ukta nyāyena apravṛtti nivṛttikam jagat prasajyate na asmākam yadi hi abhāvaḥ abhyupagamyate tatas saḥ avaśyam bhāva lakṣaṇa tva abhyupeyaḥ anyathā hi bhāvaḥ eva abhāvaḥ syāt na ca paryāya abhidhānāt eva pratiṣedha siddhiḥ na hi ghaṭa ādeḥ kalaśa ādi śabda abhidhānena kaścid artha atiśayaḥ sidhyati na ca eka ātmanaḥ aṃśa bhedaḥ api asti yena kaścid eva aṃśaḥ pratiṣedha viṣayaḥ syāt nirviṣaya tve ca pratiṣedhasya aprāmāṇyam eva syāt tatas ca anitya tā ādi siddhiḥ avāstavī syāt bhede tu bhāva abhāvayoḥ tad śabdau api arthavantau syātām prasajya paryudāsa bhedaḥ api asti prasajyasya abhāvaḥ eva viṣayaḥ paryudāsasya tu bhāva antaram iti bhāvayoḥ paraspara vivekaḥ api itaretarābhāvaḥ tad kroḍīkṛtaḥ hi bhāvaḥ bhāva antara viviktaḥ iti ucyate yadi api abhāvaḥ api bhāva viviktaḥ tathā api asau na paryudāsa viṣayaḥ tad viviktasya api tasya tad abhāva rūpa tvāt 
[537,2]	nanu yadi itaretarābhāvaḥ api bhāvāt artha antaram tatas tad vyāvartakaḥ aparaḥ itaretarābhavaḥ abhyupeyaḥ punar tad vyāvartakaḥ aparaḥ iti anavasthā iti pradīpa prakāśa vat na anavasthā iti eke vayam tu paśyāmaḥ tatra anavasthā na abhyupagamyate yatra anavasthayā kiṃcid dṛṣṭam virudhyeta na ca atra dṛṣṭam kiṃcid virudhyate yat tāvat ghaṭasya paṭa ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ tayā eva ghaṭaḥ paṭa ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttaḥ siddhaḥ tatra vyāvṛtti antara anavasthayā na kiṃcid vighaṭitam vyāvṛtti paramparā grahaṇa upakṣīṇa śakti tvāt vastu vyāvṛttam na sidhyati iti ced na viśeṣa viśeṣaṇānām api grahaṇa anabhyupagamāt atha ca anirvikalpena mecaka jñānena vyāvṛttiḥ vyāvṛtti ānantyam api gṛhītam iti 
[537,11]	nanu svarūpeṇa tat vastu vyāvṛttam avyāvṛttam vā yadi vyāvṛttam tadā anarthikā anyā vyāvṛttiḥ na ced vyāvṛttam vastu saṅkara prasaṅgaḥ iti svarūpeṇa iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim vyāvṛttim vinā kim vā vyāvṛtti vyatiriktena rūpeṇa vyāvṛttim vinā iti na yuktam vyāvṛtteḥ nitya dharma tvāt yaḥ hi dharmaḥ kadācid bhavati tena vinā anyathā dharmī vyapadiśyate yathā kuṇḍalena vinā puruṣaḥ akuṇḍalī iti nāśāt prāk anaṣṭaḥ iti na ca vastu antarāt vyāvṛtti vihīnam vastu kadācid asti yathā na go tva vihīnaḥ asti gauḥ na auṣṇya vihīnaḥ agniḥ iti atha vyāvṛtti vyatiriktena rūpeṇa svarūpeṇa vyāvṛttam iti abhipretam tat iṣṭam asmākam bheda abhyupagamāt na ca evam vyāvṛttiḥ anarthikā yadi nāma dhana vyatiriktena rūpeṇa dhanī puruṣaḥ kim etāvatā dhanam vyartham bhavet tasmāt itaretarābhāvaḥ api bhāvāt artha antaram eva iti 
[537,23]	yat ca uktam sarvatra nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti ukte kasyacid bhāvasya eva pratīteḥ iti tat api ayuktam na hi utpattiḥ bhāvasya lakṣaṇam yena nivṛttiḥ bhavantī bhāvaḥ syāt anutpattimatām api ākāśa ādīnām bhāva tvāt svarūpa nivṛtti lakṣaṇā ca utpattiḥ pradhvaṃsasya iṣyate na tu prāk asataḥ sattā sambandha lakṣaṇā kāraṇa samavāya lakṣaṇā vā 
[538,2]	svarūpa nivṛttiḥ api ādimatī eva ucyate sā ca nivṛttiḥ abhāva sva rūpeṇa eva ādimatī bhāva upalambha kāle tad rūpa anupalambhāt ādimattvāt ca sa hetuka tvam sa hetuka tva ādimattva mātra sādharmyāt nivṛttiḥ bhavati iti ucyate na etāvat mātreṇa bhāva antara tva prasaktiḥ na api artha kriyā hetu tva mātreṇa bhāva tva prasaktiḥ tvad ukta bhāva lakṣaṇa anabhyupagamāt kim tarhi bhāvasya vastu tvam lakṣaṇam dravya ādiṣu anugataḥ prāc abhāva ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttaḥ ca dharmaḥ vastu tvam ucyate tad saṃśliṣṭa asaṃśliṣṭa tvena bhāva abhāvayoḥ bhedaḥ vidhi pratiṣedhānapratīti viṣaya tvena vā tayoḥ bhedaḥ 
[538,10]	svatantra paratantra upalabdhi bhāvāt vā tathā hi bhāvaḥ svadharmeṇa eva samāna asamāna lakṣaṇa yogibhyaḥ pratyekam vyāvṛttaḥ upalabhyamānaḥ vivecyate ayam ghaṭaḥ ayam paṭaḥ iti vilakṣaṇaḥ ayam vilakṣaṇaḥ ayam iti vā na tu evam abhāvaḥ pratiyogi grahaṇam vinā api svadharmeṇa pratyekam lakṣyate na khalu ekatra api ānantyena avasthitānām abhāva bhedānām pratyekam viśeṣaḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ api lakṣayitum śakyate atas pratiyogi grahaṇataḥ eva pratyekam tad viśeṣa upalabdhi vyavasthāpanāt paratantra upalabdhiḥ abhāva lakṣaṇam iti atas na bhāvaḥ eva abhāvaḥ 
[538,18]	kim ca tvayā api bhāva abhāvayoḥ lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ abhihitaḥ tat katham eka tvam sarva arthānām lakṣaṇa bhedāt eva bheda vyavasthā tatas api ced na bheda vyavasthitiḥ na kasyacid kutaścid bheda siddhiḥ iti advaita prasaṅgaḥ sarva śaktiḥ iha api bhāvasya yadi paścāt bhavati tatas avaśyam bhinna hetukaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ atha prāk api asti tadā prāk api bhāvaḥ kāryam na kuryāt iti duruttaraḥ prasaṅgaḥ sarva śakti virahaḥ hi sarva ākāra pratiṣedhaḥ tasya bhavanam ayuktam iti ced tat kim idānīm bhāvasya sarva śakti virahaḥ na bhavati eva tathā ca prāk iva śaktaḥ eva bhāvaḥ syāt pratiṣedha dvaye hi prakṛtaḥ eva arthaḥ syāt avṛkṣaḥ na bhavati iti yathā syāt etat bhāva pratiṣedhaḥ eva iṣyate sa tu kāraṇāt bhavati iti na iṣyate bhavatā hi vastutas tattva anya tva bhājā bhavitavyam tatra uktam dūṣaṇam yasya tu vinaśyataḥ bhāvasya na kiṃcid bhavati tasya na tattva anyatva vikalpa avakāśaḥ asti bhāve hi eṣa vikalpaḥ syāt vidheḥ vastu anurodhataḥ 
[539,2_539,8]	yat api ayam bhāvasya bhāvaḥ bhavati iti āha tat api bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti eva uktam bhavati evam hi nivartitaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhe vidheḥ asambhavāt atas eva asya vināśe kaścid na hetuḥ tathā hi apekṣyeta paraḥ kāryam yadi vidyeta kiṃcana yat akiṃcitkaram vastu kim kenacid apekṣyate sati hi kārye kāraṇam bhavati na ca naśyataḥ kiṃcid kāryam iti tat api ayuktam bhāva pratiṣedhaḥ hi yadi kādācid kaḥ tatas katham na sa hetukaḥ sarvadā ced na kadācid api apratiṣiddham vastu syāt iti uktam 
[539,11_539,16]	tattva anyatva vikalpaḥ ca tava eṣa doṣa kṛt na asmākam bhede hi padārtha vaicitrya upalambhāt kaścid kīdṛśaḥ dharmaḥ tena ghaṭa vināśaḥ ghaṭasya virodhī dharmaḥ sva hetu niyamita svabhāvaḥ utpannaḥ tasmin utpanne katham ghaṭaḥ asti iti ucyate nakula ādi virodhi utpāde api sarpa ādiṣu sat vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti ced na nakula ādīnām upacāreṇa virodhi tvāt tad sādhanāt anna prāṇa vat mukhyaḥ tu bhāva abhāvayoḥ eva virodhaḥ iti yat punar etat bhāve hi eṣa vikalpaḥ syāt iti tat api sva vacana virodhāt ayuktam tvayā hi bhāva abhāvayoḥ tādātmyam uktam tat ca tattva anabhyupagame virudhyate tattva abhyupagame api lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ virudhyate yasya hi lakṣaṇa bhedena bhedaḥ ucyate tasya katham tattvam tattva aniḥ vacanīya tvam vā 
[539,20]	yat api ayuktam abhāvaḥ bhavati iti bruvatā api bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti eva uktam bhavati iti tat api yat kiṃcid na hi abhidhāne vipratipattiḥ kim tarhi arthe nañarthaḥ eva tāvat vicāryate kim asti na asti vā bhāvāt artha antaram anarthānataram ca iti niścitasya hi arthasya kriyā viśeṣaṇa tvena kāraka viśeṣaṇa tvena vā vyavahita anvayena api abhidhānam yuktam na ca tvad mate nañarthaḥ kaścid asti uttara padārtha vyatireka avyatireka asambhavāt bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti kasya atra pratiṣedhaḥ kim ākhyāta arthasya nāma arthasya vā ubhayoḥ vā iti yadi ākhyātikā artha pratiṣedhaḥ padā bhavaḥ na pratiṣiddhaḥ syāt na hi devadattaḥ na bhuṅkte iti bhojana kriyā pratiṣedhāt devadattasya asattvam gamyate atha nāma arthasya pratiṣedhaḥ tathā api apratiṣiddhā kriyā kiṃcid āśrayam ākṣipati tena abhāva abhāvaḥ nāma kaścid bhavati iti gamyate atha ubhayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sa yadi bhāva kāle tadā yadā eva bhāvaḥ bhavati tadā eva bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti syāt atha uttaratra tad abhāva abhāvayoḥ kramavat tvāt siddham bhinna hetuka tvam 
[540,3]	yat ca uktam sati hi kārye kāraṇam iti tat api asat abhāva anutpattau hi tad avasthaḥ eva bhāvaḥ katham naṣṭaḥ nāma nanu artha antara utpttau api tad avasthaḥ bhāvaḥ katham naṣṭaḥ nāma na bhāvasya bhāva tādavasthya lakṣaṇa tvāt atādavasthye ca utpanne katham bhāvaḥ tad avasthaḥ kāryam api atas eva na karoti sarva śakti virahaḥ hi asya abhāvaḥ na tu artha antara mātram nanu abhāvasya sarva bhāva dharma viveka lakṣaṇa tvāt utpattiḥ na yuktā sā hi bhava dharmaḥ eva iti na jñeyatā ādeḥ bhāva dharmasya abhāve api sadbhāvāt anyathā hi asau ajñātaḥ eva syāt pratiṣedhe vidhiḥ katham iti ced nanu bhāvasya asau pratiṣedhān ātmanaḥ sarva śakti virahaḥ api asau bhāvasya eva na tu sva ātmanaḥ eva svayam sva ātma upalambha ādi karaṇa samartha tvāt yathā prakāśaḥ tamasaḥ eva virodhī na ātmanaḥ iti 
[540,14_540,19]	svayam na bhavati iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim svayam eva ayam abhāvaḥ kim vā svayam abhavanam karoti uta bhavanam na karoti kim vā na kiṃcid karoti svayam vā kiṃcid kim vā svayam abhāvī bhavati iti na tāvat bhāvaḥ eva svayam abhāvaḥ sambhavati virodhāt na api svayam abhavanam karoti abhavanasya tattva anyatva asambhavāt 
[540,20_540,26]	atha bhavanam na karoti tadā api viśeṣa pratiṣedhāt śeṣa abhyanujña upapatteḥ anyat kiṃcid karoti iti prāptam atha kiṃcid api na karoti tat kim udāsīnaḥ bhūtvā tiṣṭhati na eva iti ced tat katham na kiṃcid karoti akurvan api na tiṣṭhati iti ced tat kim deśa antaram vā kāla antaram vā avasthā antaram vā yāti tathā ca deśa ādi vyāpī bhāvaḥ syāt 
[540,26_541,3]	atha svayam na kiṃcid tat ayuktam nīla ādi svabhāvaḥ arthaḥ pratīyamānaḥ katham svayam na kiṃcid iti ucyate atha paścāt asau kiṃcid paścāt api asau tad svabhāvaḥ eva na kiṃcid uta atat svabhāvaḥ iti tad svabhāvaḥ eva iti ced prāk api na kiṃcid syāt svabhāva aviśeṣāt atha paścāt atad svabhāvaḥ san na kiṃcid atad svabhāvaḥ paścāt kutas asau jātaḥ sva hetutaḥ hi tad svabhāvaḥ atad svabhāvāt vyāvṛttaḥ utpannaḥ sa katham paścāt api atad svabhāvaḥ syāt na hi laghuḥ tu abhāvāt vyāvṛttaḥ pāṣāṇaḥ kadācid laghuḥ syāt iti etena svayam abhāvī bhavati iti pratyuktam svayam hi abhāvāt vyāvṛttaḥ asau sva hetubhyaḥ utpannaḥ katham kadācid abhāvī bhavet iti tasmāt sva hetoḥ ayam bhāva svabhāvaḥ utpannaḥ karaṇa antarāt eva abhāvī bhavati yathā śuklaḥ paṭe utpannaḥ kāraṇa antarāt eva kṛṣṇībhavati iti 
[541,7^1]	evam tarhi bhāvaḥ eva anyathā anyathā bhavati na abhāvaḥ anyaḥ asti na pariṇāma vāda prasaṅgāt sa ca satkārya tve sati yujyate tasya ca anupapattim vakṣyāmaḥ pūrva svarūpa aparityāge ca katham bhāvaḥ anyathā bhavati tad rūpasya api upalambha prasaṅgāt tad parityāge vā saḥ eva abhāvaḥ paścāt utpannaḥ tasya rūpa parityāga lakṣaṇa tva ādi yuktam pratīyamānaḥ ca abhāvaḥ katham na asti na ced pratīyate kiṃviṣayaḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ na hi asat iti anena tat eva vastu abhidhīyate vividha viṣaya tvāt vastunaḥ sat asat śabdayoḥ paryāyatva aprasiddheḥ ca 
[541,7^2]	na api artha antaram tasya api vastu tvena vidheḥ viṣaya tvāt avastu ca vastunaḥ artha anataram pratīti gocara āpannam tvayā na iṣṭam nirviṣayaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ apramāṇam eva syāt tatas pratiṣiddham vastu sadā syāt apramāṇataḥ pratiṣedha asiddheḥ sarva pratiṣedha prasaṅgaḥ vā vacana mātrasya apramāṇasya sarvatra sambhavāt artha antara viṣayaḥ api pratiṣedhaḥ katham vastu pratiṣedhakaḥ iti ced tad abhāva abhidhāyī katham na tad pratiṣedhakaḥ tayoḥ eva bhāva abhāvayoḥ itthaṃdharma tvāt yat eka vidhānena itarat pratiṣiddham bhavati 
[541,21_541,24^1]	atas eva ca na aprastuta abhidhāna prasaṅgaḥ evam eva hi bhāva nivṛttiḥ prastutā bhavati yadi tad nivṛttiḥ eva abhidhīyate anyathā hi bhāva nivṛtti prastāvaḥ api na syāt iti aprayogaḥ eva pratiṣedhasya tad artha abhāvāt vikalpa ākāraḥ pratiṣedha arthaḥ iti ced tat kim idānīm yat kiṃcid aśaṅkitena vaktavyam iti ayam vidhiḥ anuṣṭhātum bhavatā abhipretaḥ sa hi vikalpa ākāraḥ vastunaḥ artha antaram katham tad abhidhānāt vastu pratiṣiddham bhavati na hi vastu antare abhihite vastupratiṣīddham nāma avastu ced vikalpa ākāraḥ tathā api kaḥ sambandhaḥ yena tad abhidhānāt vastu pratiṣiddham syāt pratiṣedhya pratiṣedhana lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ iti ced siddham tarhi naḥ samīhitam nāma mātre hi vivādaḥ atha vastu dharmaḥ kaścid pratiṣedha arthaḥ sa tasmāt bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā yadi bhinnaḥ tadā asman mata anupraveśaḥ atha abhinnaḥ tadā tat eva vastu pratiṣedha arthaḥ syāt na ca etat yuktam na hi ghaṭaḥ asti iti asya yaḥ arthaḥ saḥ eva ghaṭaḥ na asti iti asya api arthaḥ iti vastunaḥ avasthā viśeṣaḥ pratiṣedha arthaḥ iti ced na tasya api bhinna abhinnatva asambhavāt artha antaram iva pratibhāsamānaḥ tathā abhidhīyate iti ced samāropita arthaḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ tathā ca apramāṇam eva syāt 
[541,24^2]	rajju ādiṣu sarpa ādi vidhāna vat bhedaḥ samāropyate na arthaḥ api iti ced pratiṣedhasya kaḥ viṣayaḥ arthaḥ bhedaḥ vā yadi arthaḥ eva tatas punar āyātam vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ eka viṣaya tvam atha bhedaḥ tatas katham na samāropita viṣaya tvena pratiṣedhasya aprāmāṇyam samāropita viṣayasya api pāramparyeṇa artha pratibandhāt na aprāmāṇyam maṇi prabhāyām iva maṇi jñānasya iti ced kim vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ ekasmin eva arthe pratibandhaḥ paṭavastra śabdayoḥ iva kim vā śukla kṛṣṇa śabdayoḥ iva pratiniyata artha pratibandhaḥ iti prācīne pakṣe katham na paryāya tvam paryāya abhidhāne ca katham vastu pratiṣīddham bhavati dvitīye tu pakṣe śukla kṛṣṇayoḥ iva siddham bhāva abhāvayoḥ anya tvam atha api nīlotpala śabdayoḥ iva ekasmin arthe pratibandhaḥ iti na tatra api viśeṣaṇa bhedāt iti samarthitam yadi ca nīlotpala śabdayoḥ iva ekasmin arthe dharma bhedam āśritya vidhi pratiṣedhau pravartayetām tadā deśa kāla bhedena eva pravṛttiḥ na syāt na hi bhavati prāk atra deśe ca yat nīlam tat eva paścāt anyatra ca utpalam iti 
[541,24^3]	sa kriya niṣkriya vat iti ced na kṣaṇika tva prasaṅgāt na hi kṣaṇika tve krameṇa aneka dharma yogaḥ eva ātmanaḥ sambhavati bhinna hetuka tvam ca sa kriya tva niṣkriya tvayoḥ iva syāt atha yaḥ anyadā anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ tasya anupalambhaḥ eva viṣayaḥ yasmāt anupalabdhiḥ eva arthānām asattvam iti kaḥ ayam anupalambhaḥ nāma yadi upalambha abhāvaḥ sa katham ghaṭa ādi pratiṣedhasya viṣayaḥ na hi anyasya abhāva abhidhānena anyat pratiṣiddham bhavati atiprasaṅgāt na api anupalambhāt kasyacid bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ vyavahārasya eva siddhiḥ iti ced sa viṣayasya 
[541,24^4]	nirviṣayasya vā sa viṣayasya ced kaḥ asau viṣayaḥ saḥ eva vicārayitum prārabdhaḥ nirviṣaya vyavahārasya tu sādhanam na pramāṇam iti uktam kim ca yat tat na asti iti jñānam ghaṭa ādi abhāva vyavahāra sādhanam tat kim sa viṣayam nirviṣayam vā nirviṣayam tāvat na sādhanam anaikāntika tvāt sati api ghaṭa ādau kutaścid nimittān na asti iti mithyājñānam dṛṣṭam atha sa viṣayam kaḥ asya viṣayaḥ na tāvat ghaṭa ādiḥ eva tasya deśa kāla antara vyavahita tvāt asti iti jñāna viṣaya tvāt ca na api artha antara mātram atiprasaṅgāt 
[541,24^5]	atha tad viviktaḥ pradeśa ādiḥ eva ghaṭa ādi anupalambha viṣayaḥ saḥ eva vā ghaṭa ādi anupalambhaḥ tad abhāva vyavahāra viṣaya tvāt na bhū tala ādiḥ vastu antara tvāt na vastu antare pratipādite pratīte vā ghaṭa ādi vastu abhūtam iti pratipāditam pratītam vā bhavati evam hi vastu antaram eva nāśaḥ iti asmin mate yat dūṣaṇam uktam tat svayam eva parihṛtam syāt na ca tad viveka apratītau tad vivikta grahaṇam sambhavati tad vivekaḥ ca na bhū tala ādi svarūpam eva viśeṣaṇa tvāt tad saṃsarga vat tad saṃsargaḥ api bhū tala ādi svarūpam eva iti ced na viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣyāt artha antara tvāt daṇḍa ādi vat abhede tu na pramāṇam kiṃcid asti yadi ca ghaṭaḥ atra na asti iti asya jñānasya abhidhānasya ca bhū talam eva viṣayaḥ na tatas anyaḥ ghaṭa abhāvaḥ tadā atra ghaṭaḥ asti iti asya api bhū talam eva viṣayaḥ syāt ghaṭaḥ api tatas anyaḥ na kalpanīyaḥ tathā utpādena viśiṣṭam bhū talam eva ubhayatra api astu iti na ca etat yuktam tasmāt ghaṭa sadbhāva vat ghaṭa asadbhāvaḥ api bhū tale tatas anyaḥ pratibhāti evam hi vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ prayogaḥ api arthavān bhavet 
[543,14^1]	samasta āloka abhāve sva gṛha ādiṣu tamaḥ andhakāraḥ iti pratibhāti na tatra āloka viviktam kiṃcid vastu antaram gṛhyate sparśa ādeḥ tu nayanā viṣaya tvāt indriya antareṇa tad vivikta grahaṇe api na abhāva siddhiḥ andha ādeḥ api āloka abhāva pariccheda prasaṅgāt atas eva na āloka vivikta jñāna grahaṇāt api āloka abhāva siddhiḥ tasya api nayana aviṣaya tvāt andha ādeḥ api tathābhūta jñāna grahaṇāt gṛha ādi rūpam tu āloka abhāvāt eva na pratibhāti kṛṣṇam tamaḥ iti pratibhāsanāt rūpa viśeṣaḥ eva tamaḥ tasya loka viviktasya grahaṇam āloka anupalambhaḥ iti ced na kṛṣṇa rūpasya alokena vinā grahītum aśakya tvāt tathā pratibhāsaḥ ca nimīlita akṣasya api asti na ca tāvatā eva āloka abhāva niścayaḥ sandeha darśanāt 
[543,14^2]	yadā tu cakṣuḥ unmīlī ā īkṣate tadā nissandigdhaḥ tad abhāva niścayaḥ bhavati yathā tu ca āloka grahaṇam prati cakṣuḥ ālokam anyat na apekṣate tathā tad abhāva grahaṇe api ālokam na apekṣate yaḥ hi bhāvaḥ yāvatyā sāmagryā gṛhyate tad abhāvaḥ api tāvatyā eva iti tat evam bhāva abhāvayoḥ tādātmya anupapatteḥ sa hetukaḥ nāśaḥ tatas ca sphaṭika ādiṣu pratikṣaṇam vināśa kāraṇān upalabdheḥ na kṣaṇika tvam atas tatra pratyabhijñānam na bhrāntam tathā ātmani api pratyabhijñānam icchā ādīnām eka āśraya tva grāhakam na bhrāntam abādhyamāna tvāt tat evam icchā ādīnām āśrayaḥ śarīra ādi viyatiriktaḥ siddhaḥ iti 
[544,7_544,14]	sa kimparimāṇakaḥ iti vicāryate eke tāvat bāla agra śata sahasradhā kalpita bhāga parimāṇakam manyante tat ayuktam sarva śarīreṣu sukha duḥkha ādeḥ anupalambha prasaṅgāt tad āśrayasya sarvatra asambhavāt krameṇa sarvatra sambadhyate iti ced na yugapad api sarva śarīreṣu sukha ādi utpāda darśanāt āśu bhāvāt yugapad abhimānaḥ iti ced na nitya āśu saṃcāritvā sambhavāt kadācid ekatra sthitau śeṣāḥ śarīra avayavāḥ nirjīvāḥ syuḥ kim ca aṇu tve sati āśu sañcāri tvam kalpayitum yuktam na ca ātmanaḥ aṇu tva siddhau pramāṇam kiṃcid asti śarīra mātra parimāṇa tvam api ayuktam dehasya vṛddha kṣayābhyām ātmanaḥ api vṛddhi kṣaya dharmi tva prasaṅgāt tatas ca anitya tvam syāt tasmāt ākāśa vat vyāpakaḥ puruṣaḥ 
[544,17]	vyāpaka tve api kim pramāṇam iti ced ucyate mad śarīram muktvā anyāni mūrta dravyāṇi sarvāṇi mad ātmanā saṃyuktāni mūrta tvāt mad śarīra vat dharma ādeḥ sva āśraya saṃyoga apekṣasya guru tva ādi vat āśraya antare vāyyādi kriyā hetu tvāt tathā yogī khalu aṇima aghṛddhau prādurbhūtāyām sa indriyāṇi śarīrāṇi asaṃkhyātāni nirmāya yugapad bhogān bhuṅkte iti śrūyate tat ca etat vibhau jñātari sati upapadyate na aṇau deha mātre vā yadi ca deha mātraḥ syāt ātmā tadā sa avayavaḥ vināśī ca syāt vyāpaka paramāṇu vyatirekeṇa sarva dravyāṇām sāvayava tva vināśi tva upalambhāt tasmāt vibhuḥ ātmā para māṇu parimāṇān āśraya tve sati nitya dravya tvāt ākāśa vat 
[545,03]	nitya tvam kutas iti ced anādi tvāt tat eva kutas iti ced ucyate pūrva abhyasta smṛti anubandhāt jātasya harṣa bhaya śoka sampratipatteḥ pretya āhāra abhyāsa kṛtāt stanya abhilāṣāt na hi sukha duḥkha sādhana anusmṛtim antareṇa harṣa bhaya śoka ādeḥ utpattiḥ sambhavati dṛśyante ca jāta mātrasya api harṣa ādayaḥ taiḥ smṛtiḥ anumīyate smṛtyā ca saṃskāraḥ saṃskāreṇa pūrva abhyāsaḥ sa ca iha janmani na sambhavati iti janma antara bhāvi iti gamyate yathā supta pratibuddhasya harṣa ādayaḥ pūrva dina abhāvinam abhyāsam gamayanti 
[545,16]	nanu evam tarhi dina antara anubhūta vat janma antara anubhūtasya smṛti prasaṅgaḥ iti na tad saṃskārasya maraṇa ādi duḥkhena ati tīvreṇa vinaṣṭa tvāt harṣa bhaya śoka ādi saṃskārasya ca ati dṛḍha tvāt avināśaḥ iti eke vayam tu brūmaḥ sati api saṃskāre tad pratibodhaka nimitta abhāvāt api smaraṇam na bhavati yatra sat su udbodhaka nimitteṣu smaraṇam na bhavati tatra avaśyam saṃskāra vināśaḥ kalpanīyaḥ 
[545,22^1]	kāni punar tāni nimittāni yebhyaḥ saṃskāra pratibodhaḥ bhavati iti ucyate praṇidhānāt iti tathā ca sūtram praṇidhāna nibandha abhyāsa liṅga lakṣaṇa sādṛśya p a r i g r a h ā ś r a y ā ś r ita sambandhāna antarya viyoga eka kārya virodha atiśaya prāpti vyavadhāna sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa bhaya arthi tva kriyā rāga dharma adharma nimittebhyaḥ su smūrṣayā manasaḥ dhāraṇam praṇidhānam citta samādhānam ekāgra tā iti arthaḥ sāmānyena artham smṛtvā tad viśeṣān anusmartum icchan praṇidhānam karoti nibandhaḥ tu eka grantha upayamaḥ arthānām eka grantha upayamāḥ hi arthāḥ parasparam smṛti hetavaḥ bhavanti ānupūrvyā anyathā vā iti atha vā smartavyānām upanikṣepaḥ kvacid pradeśe vastre granthe vā anyatra vā nibandhaḥ iti abhyāsaḥ samāne viṣaye jñānānām abhyāvṛttiḥ tatas pūrva saṃskāra pratibodhaḥ saṃskāra atiśaya utpattiḥ ca su alpa abhyāsena hi grantha avadhāraṇe pūrva saṃskāra pratibodhaḥ anumīyate gṛhīta vismṛta abhyāsa vat liṅgam dhūma ādi dahana ādeḥ smṛti hetuḥ 
[545,22^2]	lakṣaṇam paśu ādi avayava stham cihnam śṛṅga ādi go tvasya smārakam sādṛśyam citra ādi gatam siṃha ādeḥ parigrahaḥ sva svāminaḥ āśrayaḥ grāmaṇīḥ tad adhīnasya smārakaḥ tad viparyayeṇa āśritaḥ vyākhyātaḥ sambandhaḥ śiṣya ācārya ādīnām anyonya smārakaḥ ānantaryāt iti karaṇīyeṣu artheṣu krameṇa smṛtiḥ viyogāt yaḥ yena kena viyuktaḥ sa tam smarati eka kāryāt kartṛ antare smṛtiḥ virodhāt vijigīṣamāṇayoḥ eka daśanāt itaratra smṛtiḥ atiśaya prāpteḥ yena yatas atiśayaḥ prāptaḥ prāptavyaḥ vā sa tam abhīkṣaṇam smarati vyavadhānāt kośa ādibhiḥ asi prabhṛtīni sukhāt tad hetum smarati duḥkha hetum ca duḥkhāt icchā dveṣābhyām yam icchati yam dveṣṭi tam abhīkṣṇam smarati bhayāt yatas bibheti tam smarati arthi tvāt yena arthī tam smarati kriyayā sthena rathakāram rāgāt yatra strī ādau viṣaye raktaḥ tam smarati dharma adharmābhyām janma antara anubhūteṣu api smṛtiḥ 
[546,15]	nidarśana artham ca idam sūtram smṛti nimittānām saṃskāra pratibodhakānām aparisaṃkhyāta tvāt sarvāṇi nimittāni dharma adharmābhyām anugṛhītāni saṃskāra pratibodhakāni bhavanti tad pratibandhakāni ca apratibodhakāni atas eva kaścid eva jāti smaraḥ bhavati na sarvaḥ tathā ca jaigīṣavya prabhṛtīnām yoga ja dharmeṇa anugṛhītebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ aneka sahasreṣu pūrva janmasu yathā anubhavam smṛtiḥ bhūta iti śrūyate itareṣām tu prāṇinām janma antara anubhūteṣu artheṣu sāmānyatas eva smṛtiḥ bhavati na tu deśa kāla ādi viśeṣeṇa iti viśeṣa smṛti hetu anugrāhakasya adṛṣṭa viśeṣasya abhāvāt pratibandhakasya sadbhāvāt ca tathā ca evam api smṛtiḥ upalabhyate yathā ayam puruṣaḥ kvacid mayā dṛṣṭaḥ eva iti smarāmi kva dṛṣṭa kadā iti etat na smarāmi tathā idam mayā bhakṣitam kva kadā iti etat na smarāmi iti 
[546,25]	nanu ca yadi janma antare amukasmin deśe vā kāle vā amum artham aham dṛṣṭavān iti evam smṛtiḥ na bhavati tadā janma antara anubhūteṣu sukha sādhana ādiṣu smṛtiḥ bhavati iti atra kim pramāṇam uktam atra harṣa ādi sampratipatteḥ iti na hi ananubhūta pūrveṣu sukha duḥkha sādhana viśeṣeṣu tad bhāva anusandhānam antareṇa harṣa āt ayaḥ sambhavanti tathā tiryañcaḥ api apatya ādi viyogāt śoka āpannāḥ tat liṅgataḥ upalabhyante jāta mātrasya ca bālasya ruditena śokaḥ anumīyate saḥ api pūrva abhyāsam gamayati stanyam kṣīram tad abhilāṣeṇa jāta mātrasya api bāla ādeḥ stana deśa upasarpaṇam dṛśyate na ca tena iha janmani stana pānam abhyastam atas avagamyate pūrva janma abhyāsāt pratyeha bhavati iti yathā uttara dineṣu pūrva dina abhyāsāt iti evam pūrva pūrva janmasu tad abhyāsasya anumita anumānāt siddhau anādi tvam ātmanaḥ sidhyati 
[547,4]	na ca evam tarhi viḍāla ādīnām pūrva janmasu api viḍāla ādi bhāvaḥ anumātavyaḥ anyathā katham mūṣika ādiṣu abhilāṣa ādi niyamaḥ syāt iti satyam eva etat na tu anantara janmani eva iti niyamaḥ yathā vidyā śilpa ādiṣu kauśalam pūrva abhyāsam sāmānyena eva gamayati na tu anantare dine tṛtīye caturthe vā abhyāsam gamayati evam viḍāla ādīnām mūṣika ādi grahaṇe kauśalam pūrva abhyāsam antareṇa na yuktam iti etāvat anumīyate sa tu abhyāsaḥ anantare vā janmani aneka janma vyavahite vā bhavatu na atra viśeṣa hetuḥ asti 
[547,11]	nanu jñāna maraṇa duḥkha virodhī saṃskāraḥ tasya aneka janma vyavahitasya kutas avasthānam pratipakṣa jñānena aneka prakāreṇa maraṇa ādi duḥkhena ca vināśāt na pramāṇa abhāvāt pratipakṣa jñāna ādinā avaśyam saṃskārasya vināśaḥ iti atra pramāṇam na asti vismaraṇam tu pratipakṣa jñāna ādi janita saṃskāreṇa adṛṣṭa viśeṣeṇa vā pratibandhe api upapadyate yathā grantha śilpa ādi saṃskārasya tad pratipakṣa saṃskāreṇa iti yadi tu na dṛṣṭaḥ eva tad saṃskāraḥ tadā yāvatā prayāsena apūrvasya grantha ādeḥ grahaṇam tāvatā eva gṛhīta vismṛtasya api syāt na ca ayam niyamaḥ asti tasmāt na jñāna maraṇa duḥkhaiḥ naṣṭaḥ eva iti yaḥ tu nāśam eva abhyupaiti tad mate mṛga vara āha śva viḍāla ādīnām sva jāti karmasu kauśalam na syāt na hi teṣām atra janmani kaścid upādhyāyaḥ asti ekīkṛtya poṣotānām api tad karma kauśala darśanāt na api teṣām janmani janmani tat jātīya tvam eva vicitra karma viśeṣa aneka jātiṣu krameṇa janma sambhavāt iti 
[547,23]	bhavatu saṃskārasya aneka janma avasthānam tathā api anantara janma bhāvi saṃskāra anabhibhūya aneka janma vyavahita saṃskārāṇām eva vṛtti lābhaḥ na yujyate na hi yasya aneka saṃvatsara vyavahita abhyāsa jaḥ saṃskāraḥ smṛtim janayati tasya anantara dina abhyāsa jaḥ na janayati iti na ukta tvāt uktam atra śubha aśubha ākhyam karma saṃskāra pratibodhe pradhānam nimittam tena yatas karma viśeṣāt niyata jāti yogi tvam tatas eva tad jāti saṃskārāṇām vṛtti lābhaḥ anya saṃskārāṇām pratibodhaḥ ca iti anyathā hi tad karma anupabhogyam eva syāt tathā hi śva varāha ādi janmani api yadi brāhmaṇa ādi saṃskārāṇām vṛtti lābhaḥ syāt tatas asya purīṣa ādi bhakṣaṇe maithune ca pravṛttiḥ na syāt brāhmaṇa ādeḥ tad viṣaye hi vicikitsā eva asti na rāgaḥ iti tasmāt janma viśeṣa nimitta karma sāmarthyāt tad jāti saṃskārāṇām eva vṛtti lābhaḥ iti 
[548,6_548,9]	karma viśeṣa sāmarthyāt eva prāṇinām sva karmasu kauśalam hi sampratipattiḥ ca kim saṃskāreṇa iti ced karma abhyupagame api ātmanaḥ anādi tvam na nivartate na hi karmaṇā vinā janma na api janmanā vinā karma iti na ca karma hetuka tve api dṛṣṭa pratyākhyānam yuktam dṛṣṭam tāvat etat yena yat abhyastam tasya tatra kauśalam iti ananubhūta pūrvaka tve ca maṇḍūka ādeḥ makṣikā ādiṣu iva bhakṣaṇa abhilāṣeṇa sarpa ādibhya iva makṣikā ādibhyaḥ api bhayāt nivartanam eva syāt na hi maṇḍūka ādinā atra janmani sarpa ādibhyaḥ maraṇam svayam anubhūtam yena tasya sarpa ādi darśanāt eva trāsaḥ syāt tasmāt aneka janma antara mṛtyu duḥkha anubhava janita saṃskārāt mṛtyu hetum smarataḥ eva bhayam bhavati tathā eka kula sambhūtānām api brāhmaṇa ādīnām kasyacid kasmin arthe avagama ādīnām ca taratama ādi yogena pāṭavam apāṭavam ca dṛśyate tat api pūrva janma saṃskāra vaicitryāt eva upapadyate iti tat evam pūrva pūrva janma anumānāt anādi tva siddhiḥ tatas kṛtaka tva ādi vināśa hetu asambhavāt ca nitya ātmā iti sthitam 
[548,19]	nanu ittham ātma jñānena kim prayojanam yena atra ati yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ para loka siddhiḥ eva prayojanam aniścite hi tasmin para lokinaḥ asiddheḥ para lokasya api asiddhiḥ iti prekṣāvataḥ svarga arthā api pravṛttiḥ na syāt atas para lokisadbhāvena para loka sadbhāve niścite para loke pravṛttiḥ tatas abhipreta artha siddhiḥ tat evam para loke pravṛtti upayogi tvāt adharma kṣaya hetu tvāt ca niḥśreyāṅgam ātma jñānam adharma kṣaya hetu tvam ca tasya tarati śokam ātma vid iti evamādi āgamāt avagantavyam 
[548,27]	nanu ātma jñānam mumukṣuṇā na kartavyam tasya saṃsāra hetu tvāt tathā ca āha yaḥ paśyati ātmānam tatra asya aham iti śāśvataḥ snehaḥ snehāt sukheṣu tṛṣyati tṛṣṇā doṣān tiras kurute doṣān pracchādya tṛṣṇā guṇān darśayati iti arthaḥ tatas ca guṇa darśī paritṛṣyan mama iti tad sādhanāni upādatte tena ātma abhiniveśaḥ yāvat tāvat sa saṃsārī satya ātmani para saṃjñā sva para vibhāgāt parigraha dveṣau anayoḥ sampratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante 
[549,8_549,12]	tat etat ayuktam tathā hi kim śarīra ādiṣu ātma jñānam saṃsāra nimittam kim vā tad vyatirikte yadi ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā na kiṃcid bādhitam anātmani ātma jñānasya saṃsāra hetu tva abhyupagamāt dvitīye tu pakṣe pramāṇam na asti na hi yathā ukta ātma parijñāne sati kaścid saṃsārī dṛśyate ātma jñānāt ātmani snehaḥ iti tat api ayuktam na hi yatra yatra jñānam bhavati tatra tatra snehaḥ iti asti vyāptiḥ tṛṇa paśu ādi darśane api sneha anupalabdheḥ tṛṇa ādiṣu ātma upayogi tvena darśana abhāvāt na snehaḥ iti ced evam tarhi ātmani api ātma upayogi tvena darśanam na asti iti tatra api snehaḥ mā bhūt yasya ātma upayogini snehaḥ tasya katham na ātmani iti ced na ātma upayogini avidyā sāmarthyāt sneha sambhavāt avidyā kṣepe tu ātma upayogiṣu api na snehaḥ iti 
[549,19_549,25]	api ca para lokī padārthaḥ ātmā iti ucyate tad parijñānam ca tvayā api yatnena kṛtam tad darśane api ayam doṣaḥ prasaktaḥ kṣaṇika tva jñānāt sneha nivṛttiḥ iti ced na kṣaṇika pakṣaḥ eva upakārya upakāraka bhāvasya tvayā iṣṭa tvāt tatas ca ātma tvena pratipanneṣu ananta santāneṣu api snehaḥ asti eva na anyathāmokṣe pravṛttiḥ syāt tatas ca mokṣa artha pravṛtti upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ tasmāt ātma snehāt eva sukha sādhaneṣu iva mokṣa sādhane api pravṛttiḥ tena yat uktam yasya hi yatra snehaḥ sa tad sukhena harṣavān yathā putra ādi sukhena iti tat sva jñāna santāne api samānam 
[549,28]	atha anātma vādinām sva jñāna santāne api na asti snehaḥ para santāneṣu katham na hi yasya ātmani api na snehaḥ tasya paratra iti yuktam mahā anubhāva tayā karuṇātaḥ paratra snehaḥ iti ced na sva artha samūḍhasya abuddhi pūrvakatva prasaṅgāt para artha kriyā eva mahā anubhāvasya sva arthaḥ iti ced evam tarhi gaṇikā aṅga mardana ādi api kuryāt tatra api para artha upapatteḥ naraka ādi gamana prasaṅgāt na kriyate iti ced nanu para arthe naraka ādi gamana aṅgīkaraṇe mahatī mahā anubhāva tā syāt tasmāt anātma vādinaḥ api sva duḥkha parihāreṇa pravṛtteḥ sva buddhi santāne asti eva snehaḥ putra ādiṣu iva lokasya tatas tad snehāt sukham tṛṣṇā tatas doṣa tiraskāreṇa guṇa darśī śākyaḥ paritṛṣyan mama idam iti tad sādhanāni upādatte tena mama iti abhiniveśāt buddhasya api saṃsāraḥ na nivartate 
[550,9]	satya ātmani para saṃjñā ityādi api ayuktam na hi sva para vibhāga jñāna mātrāt eva parigraha doṣa ādayaḥ bhavanti buddhasya api hi para vibhāga jñāna mātram asti eva anyathā upadeśa dāna ādau na pravartate karuṇā abhyāsaḥ ca bhavatām sarvajña tva sādhanam iṣṭam na ca sva para vibhāga jñānam antareṇa karuṇā sambhavati sva ātma duḥkha anusmaraṇa pūrvikā hi pareṣu duḥkha viyoga icchā bhavati sā ca kṛpa iti ucyate tasmāt na sva para vibhāga jñāna mātram tṛṣṇā parigraha ādīnām nimittam kim tarhi mithyā saṃkalpaḥ tathā ca bhagavān vyāsaḥ indriya arthāḥ hi anarthāya yadi sphuṭam vikalpitāḥ sarvaḥ anarthena yujyeta caran indriya gocare 
[550,19_550,22]	idam ca tāvat atra vicāryate kim atra ātmā iti saṃjñā eva duṣṭā kim vā mama iti aham iti vā jñānam duṣṭam kim vā tad viṣayaḥ eva duṣṭaḥ iti yadi ātmā iti saṃjñā duṣṭā tadā vayam api saṃjñā antaram kariṣyāmaḥ atha ahaṃkāraḥ duṣṭaḥ sa katham nivartate kṣaṇika vijñāna vādinaḥ api asti eva iṣṭa aniṣṭa prāpti parihāreṇa pravṛtti darśanāt idam aham anubhūtavān idam aham jānāmi iti pratīteḥ ca atha pūrva saṃskārāt anātma vādinaḥ ahaṃkāraḥ sa nairātmya abhyāsāt nivartate na asambandhāt nirahaṃkāra abhyāsāt ca ahaṃkāra nivṛttiḥ yuktā nirvikalpa abhyāsāt vikalpavat tattva jñāna abhyāsāt atattva jñāna vat ca ātmā tu tattva antaram katham tad abhāva abhyāsāt ahaṃkāra nivṛttiḥ vacana mātreṇa nirbuddha tva abhyāsāt eva ahaṃkāra nivṛttiḥ syāt
