[551,1]	atha ātmā ahaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ tena ātmani sati ahaṃkāra nivṛttiḥ na prāpnoti na sva para matā sambhavāt tvad mate tāvat nityasya janaka tvam eva na asti asmad mate tu na ekasya eva janakatvam atas sahakāri virahāt sati api viṣaye ahaṃkāra nivṛttiḥ sati api agnau indhana abhāvāt dhūma nivṛtti vat tvayā api etat avaśyam abhyupagantavyam anyathā buddhi santāna anivṛttau ahaṃkāra nivṛttiḥ na syāt tvad pakṣe buddheḥ eva ātma tvāt 
[551,7_551,14]	atha nitya tva ādi jñānam tatra duṣṭam tat api ayuktam yasmāt anitya tva ādi jñānāt ātma rakṣā ādi abhiprāyeṇa akārye api pravṛttiḥ syāt yadā tu evam jānāti vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naraḥ aparāṇi tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāni anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī na enam chindanti śastrāṇi na enam dahati pāvakaḥ na ca enam kledayanti āpaḥ na śoṣayati mārutaḥ iti tadā śarīra ādiṣu nirapekṣaḥ eva bhavati kutas tad parigraha dveṣa ādayaḥ tathā ca prameya vibhāga sūtre śarīra ādiṣu heya buddhiḥ ātma tattva jñānāt yathā bhavati tathā uktam 
[551,17]	nairātmya jñānam saṃsārasya eva nimittam viparyaya jñāna tvāt anityeṣu nitya tva adhyavasāya vat asiddham iti ced syāt etat ātmanaḥ asattvam ajāta tva ādi sādhanaiḥ sādhitam tat na nairātmya jñānam mithyā iti tat ayuktam yasmāt na asiddhe bhāva dharmaḥ asti vyabhicārya bhaya āśrayāḥ dharmaḥ viruddhaḥ abhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham sat tāvat asattā sādhane api samānaḥ doṣaḥ 
[551,24_552,1]	nanu atra uktam anādivāsanana udbhūta vikalpa pariniṣṭhitaḥ śabda arthaḥ trividhaḥ dharmī bhāṣā abhāva ubhayāśrayaḥ tasmin bhāvānupādāne sadhyasya anupalambhanam tathā hetuḥ na tasya eva abhāvaḥ śabda prayogaḥ tatra nīla ādi vikalpasya bhāva āśraya tvam sva lakṣaṇa jñāna ahita vāsanā pūrvaka tvāt śaśa viṣāṇa ādi vikalpasya tu abhāva āśra tvam abhāva jñāna ahita vāsanā pūrvaka tvāt prameya amūrta ādi vikalpaḥ punar ubhaya āśrayaḥ sat asatoḥ api prameya tva amūrta tva ādi dharma sambhavāt tat evam śabda arthasya tri prakāra tva darśanāt tasmin ātma ādi śabda arthe sandehe sati bhāvān upādāna tvam sādhyam iti atas na āśraya asiddha tva ādi doṣaḥ iti 
[552,7_552,13]	tat etat api ayuktam śabdānām hi vastu viṣaya tvam eva samarthitam vikalpa pratibandha viṣaya tvam ca pratiṣiddham prāk iti kutas ca ātma ādi vikalpasya bhāvānupādāna tva siddhiḥ tathā anupalabdheḥ iti ced na sādhya viśiṣṭa tvāt na hi bhavati agni upādānaḥ dhūmaḥ tathā upalabdheḥ iti kim ca meru pātāla ādi vikalpasya tad bhāva upādāna tve na anupalambhe api na meru pātāla ādeḥ abhāva niścayaḥ kim ca dharma adharma buddha ādi vikalpasya api tad upādāna tvena anupalabdheḥ teṣām api abhāvaḥ syāt sat vyavahāra niṣedhaḥ vā atha teṣām astitve asti anumānam tatas na sat vyavahāra niṣedhaḥ api tatra yuktaḥ yadi evam ātma ādi astitve api anumānam samarthitam tena atra api ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti 
[552,18]	nanu nityasya avikāri tvāt sukha duḥkha ādi saṃsarga anupapattiḥ tad upapattau vā na nitya tvam tat āha varṣa ātapābhyām kim vyomnaḥ carmaṇi asti tayoḥ phalam carma upamaḥ ced saḥ anityaḥ kha tulyaḥ ced asat phalaḥ tat api ayuktam anitya tve hi akṛta abhyāgama ādi doṣasya ukta tvāt eka santāna niyamaḥ api na sambhavati iti uktam prāk iti 
[552,21]	aparaḥ tu āha nitya tve puruṣasya eka svabhāva tvāt sukha duḥkha bandha mokṣa ādi krama anupapattiḥ sadā eva ātmā sukhī duḥkhī ca syāt tad svabhāva avināśāt na api anityaḥ eva akṛta abhyāgama ādi doṣaḥ tasmāt anekānta pakṣaḥ eva nirduṣṭaḥ tat uktam ekānta agraha raktānām nātha sva para vairiṇām kuśala akuśalam karma bandha mokṣau tu na kvacid 
[553,1_553,4]	pramāṇa siddhaḥ ca anekānta pakṣaḥ iti āha kaṭa moli suvarṇa arthī nāśa utpāda vyayeṣu ca śoka pramodam ādhyasthyam janaḥ jāti traya ātmakam anekāntataḥ sapta padārtha jñānāt mokṣaḥ iti āha jīvājīvau tathā anyonyam āsravaḥ saṃvaraḥ tathā nirjarā ca tathā bandhaḥ mokṣaḥ sambhramaḥ iṣyate syāt vāda lāñchitāḥ ca ete parijñeyāḥ samīritāḥ tad jñānāt āśrava apetaḥ jīvaḥ mokṣaḥ iha uditaḥ 
[553,10_553,14]	tatra cetanā svabhāva tvāt tad vikalpa lakṣaṇaḥ jīvaḥ tasyāḥ cetanāyāḥ vikalpāḥ paryāya ajñāna sukha duḥkha icchā ādayaḥ te lakṣaṇam yasya asau jīvaḥ tad vilakṣaṇaḥ tu ajīvaḥ iti puṇya pāpa āgama dvāra lakṣaṇaḥ āsravaḥ āsravaḥ iva āsravaḥ kaḥ upamā arthaḥ yathā mahā udadhiḥ nadī ādi salilaiḥ aharahar āpūryate tathā mithyā darśana ādi dvāra anupraviṣṭaiḥ karmabhiḥ aniśam prāṇī pūryate iti mithyā darśana ādi dvāram āsravaḥ 
[554,4_554,14]	āsrava nirodha lakṣaṇaḥ saṃvaraḥ saṃvriyate anena iti saṃvaraḥ yathā kapāṭena saṃvṛte gṛhe duṣṭasya praveśaḥ na asti tadvat śubha anuṣṭhānena saṃvṛte puṃsi puṇya pāpa lakṣaṇasya bandha hetoḥ karmaṇaḥ praveśaḥ na asti iti abhinava karma āgama dvāra saṃvaraṇāt saṃvaraḥ eka deśa karma saṅkṣaya lakṣaṇā nirjjarā nirjarā iva nirjarā yathā mantra auṣadha bala ādibhiḥ jīrṇa vīryam viṣam na kopa karam tathā upāttam karma tapaḥ viśeṣeṇa nirjīrṇa rasam na saṃsāra phala pradam ātma karmaṇoḥ anyonya praveśa anupraveśa lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ bandhaḥ bandhaḥ iva bandhaḥ yathā nigaḍa ādi bandhena baddhaḥ puruṣaḥ asvatantraḥ tathā karma bandhena api iti kṛtsna karma viyoga lakṣaṇaḥ mokṣaḥ nigaḍa ādi mukta vat svātantrye sati abhipreta deśa gamanāt eva pumān sukhī bhavati iti arthaḥ 
[554,18]	syāt vāda lāñchitāḥ iti syāt asti syāt na asti syāt asti ca na asti ca syāt avaktavyam syāt asti ca avaktavyam ca syāt na asti ca avaktavyam ca syāt asti ca na asti ca avaktavyam ca iti eṣā sapta bhaṅgī syāt vāda iti ucyate tad viśiṣṭāḥ jīva ādayāḥ parijñeyāḥ kiṃlakṣaṇā asau saptabhaṅgī iti ced ucyate ekasmin vastuni praśna vaśāt dṛṣṭeṇa iṣṭena ca pramāṇena aviruddha vidhi pratiṣedha vikalpanā sapta bhaṅgī tat yathā syāt ghaṭaḥ syāt aghaṭaḥ syāt ghaṭaḥ ca aghaṭaḥ ca syāt avaktavyaḥ syāt ghaṭaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca syāt aghaṭaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca syāt ghaṭaḥ ca aghaṭaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca iti 
[554,26]	tatra sva ātmanā asti ghaṭaḥ para ātmanā na asti ghaṭa buddhi abhidhāna anuvṛtti liṅgaḥ sva ātmā yatra tad buddhi abhidhāna anuvṛttiḥ sa para ātmā paṭa ādiḥ kapāla ādi avasthā ca tatra sva ātmanā api yadi na asti ghaṭaḥ tadā ghaṭa vyavahāraḥ eva na syāt tathā para ātmanā api yadi asti tadā paṭa ādi vyavahāraḥ api tatra syāt tasmāt sva rūpeṇa san ghaṭaḥ para rūpeṇa tu asan iti 
[555,1]	uktaiḥ prakāraiḥ arpitam ghaṭa tvam aghaṭa tvam ca parasparataḥ na bhinnam bhede hi tad buddhi abhidhāna anuvṛttiḥ na syāt tatas ca sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi abhāvaḥ syāt na ca evam asti tasmāt tad ubhaya ātmakaḥ asau krameṇa tat śabda vācya tām āskandan syāt ghaṭaḥ ca aghaṭaḥ ca iti ucyate yadi tad ubhaya ātmakam vastu ghaṭaḥ iti eva ucyate tadā itara ātmā saṅgrahāt atattvam eva syāt atha aghaṭe eva iti ucyeta tad ā ātmā anupādānāt anṛtam eva syāt na vastu tāvat eva iti na ca anyaḥ śabdaḥ tad ubhaya ātmā avasthānatva abhidhāyī vidyate tatas asau ghaṭaḥ vacana gocara atīta tvāt asyāt avaktavyaḥ a iti ucyate ghaṭa ātma arpaṇa mukhena ukta avaktavya svarūpa nirūpaṇena ca adiśyamānaḥ saḥ eva arthaḥ iti asyāt ghaṭaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca a nirūpitā ghaṭa bhaṅgi āsaṅgena pradarśitā vaktavya vartmanā ca upadeśyaḥ saḥ eva arthaḥ iti syāt aghaṭaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca tad ubhayoḥ abhidhāna krama ākrama arpaṇa vaśāt āvirbhūta tad vyapadeśaḥ saḥ eva arthaḥ iti syāt ghaṭaḥ ca aghataḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca iti 
[555,13_555,15]	evam sarveṣu artheṣu sapta bhaṅgī yojyā na tathābhūtaḥ kaścid arthaḥ asti yatra sapta bhaṅgī na asti nanu ekānta anabhyupagamāt niyamena anekānta abhyupagamaḥ prāptaḥ tatas saḥ eva ekāntaḥ iti katham sarvatra saptabhaṅgī iti na anekānte api ekānta anabhyupagamāt tathā hi syāt ekāntaḥ syāt anaikāntaḥ syāt ekāntaḥ ca anekāntaḥ ca syāt avaktavyaḥ syāt ekāntaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca syāt anaikāntaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca syāt ekāntaḥ ca anekāntaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca iti 
[555,21]	atra ucyate yat tāvat ekānta graha raktānām ityādi tat ayuktam ekānta pakṣaḥ eva kuśala akuśala karma ādi upapatteḥ tathā hi yadi yaḥ eva karmaṇaḥ kartā saḥ eva tad phala upabhoktā iti ayam ekāntaḥ syāt tadā iṣṭā aniṣṭa prāpti parihāra arthā tad karmasu prekṣāvataḥ pravṛttiḥ ghaṭate anekānta pakṣe tu anya kṛtam api anyena upabhujyate iti syāt tathā ca bhojana ādi kriyāsu api prekṣāvatā na pravartitavyam rāja ādi kṛteṣu eva bhojana ādi karmasu nagna śramaṇakasya api tṛptiḥ bhaviṣyati abhavane hi ekānta grahaḥ syāt 
[555,28]	kim ca nitya anityayoḥ doṣam dṛṣṭvā anekāntam abhyupagacchatā pakṣa dvayasya api abhyupagamaḥ syāt tad abhyupagame ca ubhaya pakṣa uktāḥ api doṣāḥ prāptāḥ iti kaḥ evam vigranthāt anyaḥ doṣān parihartum jānāti tasmāt nityaḥ eva ātmā tad samaveta sukha utpattau sukhī duḥkha utpattau duḥkhī iti ucyate sukha duḥkha ādīnām eva utpatti vināśau na ātmanaḥ sa hi nityaḥ api tena tena dharmeṇa utpadyamānena vinaśyatā ca tadvān vyapadiśyate yathā daṇḍa ādi sambandha asambandhābhyām daṇḍī kuṇḍalī chatrī vādaṇḍaḥ akuṇḍalaḥ achatraḥ ca iti caitraḥ vyapadiśyate 
[556,6]	kaṭa mauli suvarṇa arthī ityādi api ayuktam tatra hi pūrva avayavinaḥ kaṭaka tva suvarṇa tva jāti yuktasya vināśaḥ eva tad vināśaḥ api jātiḥ ekā api na vinaṣṭā suvarṇa tva vat kaṭaka tvasya api vyakti antare pratyabhijñānāt uttaram ca dravyam kaṭaka tva yuktam na utpāditam iti tad arthinaḥ śokaḥ pūrva dravyam ca mauli tva yuktam na āsīt idānīm tu tat jāti yuktam utpannam iti tad arthinaḥ pramodaḥ suvarṇa tvena anuyogaḥ pūrva uttarayoḥ api avayavinoḥ asti iti tad arthinaḥ mādhyasthyam yathā kenacid kirāṭa gṛhe sthāpitam dravyam tat ca kirāṭena ātma upayogam kṛtvā tathābhūtam tasya dattam tatas asau mādhyasthyam eva yāti 
[556,14]	suvarṇa tva jātiḥ tu avayava avayaveṣu api asti tena tad avayavi nāśe api avayaveṣu anantara bhāvya vaya vī antare ca suvarṇa pratyaya sātatyāt avinaṣṭa abhimānaḥ pradīpa gaṅgā udaka ādi vat vā tad sadṛśa nirantara bhāvāt tat eva iti manyamānaḥ tad arthī mādhyasthyam yāti tasmāt na ekasya nitya tvam anitya tvam ca iti anitya tvam hi nāśi tvam prasiddham nitya tvam ca anāśi tvam tat ca etat ubhayam viruddha tvāt na ekatra sambhavati na hi naṣṭam anaṣṭam ca iti ekam kiṃcid pratibhāti 
[556,20]	yadi api kaṭa mukuṭa ākārayoḥ nāśa utpādau suvarṇakārasya ca ghrauvyam tathā api atra kasyacid ekasya nitya anitya tva siddhiḥ trayāṇām ākarāṇām anyonya dharma asaṃsargāt saṃsarge vā kaṭaka arthinaḥ śoka vat pramoda mādhyasthye api syātām atas eva trayāṇām ākārāṇām na aikyam bhede api sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapattiḥ iti ced na tadvati sāmānādhikaraṇyāt daṇḍa kuṇḍala ādīnām bhede api tad āśraye puṃsi daṇḍī kuṇḍalī ityādi sāmānā adhikaraṇya vat yadi punar abhedaḥ syāt tadā kaṭaka ākāra grahaṇāt eva mukuṭa ākāra ādi grahaḥ api syāt gṛhīta agṛhīta ākārayoḥ eka tva ayogāt eka tve vā khara jina ādīnām api bhedaḥ na syāt paryāyāṇām parasparam bhedaḥ asti eva na tu paryāya paryāyinoḥ iti ced na tatra api paraspara parihāreṇa upalambhāt bheda siddheḥ tathā hi keyūra ādau suvarṇakāra upalambhe api na kaṭākāra upalambhaḥ tathā rājāta kaṭa ākāra upalambhe api na suvarṇakāra upalambhaḥ tasmāt upalambha anupalambha ādi viruddha dharma adhyāsāt khara uṣṭra ādīnām iva bhedaḥ eva iti 
[557,2]	nanu astu nāma bhedaḥ tathā api bhedaḥ eva iti ayuktam yatas syāt bhedaḥ syāt abhedaḥ syāt bhedaḥ ca abhedaḥ ca syāt avaktavyaḥ syāt bhedaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca syāt abhedaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca syāt bhedaḥ ca abhedaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca iti tat evam sarvam jagat sapta bhaṅgya āghrātam na kiṃcid ekānta sādhane asti udāharaṇam iti 
[557,7^1]	nanu jinasya mukta tva sarvajña tva ādi svabhāvaḥ khara uṣṭra sūkara ādi svabhāvebhyaḥ ati nikṛṣṭebhyaḥ ekāntena bhinnaḥ iti katham na asti udāharaṇam na hi evam bhavantaḥ śaknuvanti vaktum muktā avasthaḥ jinaḥ syāt nikṛṣṭatamaḥ syāt anikṛṣṭatamaḥ syāt nikṛṣṭatamaḥ ca anikṛṣṭatamaḥ syāt avaktavyaḥ syāt nikṛṣṭatamaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca syāt anikṛṣṭatamaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca syāt nikṛṣṭatamaḥ ca anikṛṣṭatamaḥ ca āvaktavyaḥ ca iti atra api evam sapta bhaṅgīṣyate iti ced tat etat apeta āgama yuktikam para sparddhayā abhidhīyamānam na vidvan manaḥ prīṇāti yadi khalu bhavantaḥ khara uṣṭra sūkara ādikam jinam iva kadācid upāsate pāṣāṇa purīṣa ādikam ca guḍa dadhi takra ādi vat bhakṣayanti tadā na syāt ekānta siddhiḥ kaḥ hi jinasya atiśayaḥ yaḥ khara uṣṭra ādau na asti eva kaḥ vā khara uṣṭra ādeḥ nikṛṣṭa bhāvaḥ yaḥ na asti eva jine yatas khara uṣṭra ādi parihāreṇa saḥ eva upāsyate 
[557,7^2]	tathā pāṣāṇa purīṣa ādīnām kaḥ doṣaḥ yaḥ guḍa ādiṣu na asti eva guḍa ādīnām vā kaḥ atiśayaḥ yaḥ pāṣāṇa ādiṣu na asti eva yatas pāṣāṇa ādi parihāreṇa guḍa ādīni eva bhakṣyante atha asti eva kaścid atra eva atiśayaḥ yad vaśāt atra eva pravṛttiḥ iti na tarhi sarvatra anekāntaḥ atha kvacid ekāntaḥ kvacid anekāntaḥ iti pakṣaḥ evam tarhi yatra ekāntaḥ sa tāvat dṛṣṭāntaḥ tava tu anekānta siddhau na dṛṣṭāntaḥ kvacid asti tathā hi yadi asmāt bhinnam tat tasmāt ekāntena bhinnam tatas artha antara tvāt khara uṣṭra ādibhyaḥ jina ādi vat sattva ādi ākāreṇa abhedaḥ api atra asti iti ced na yasya ākārasya ekāntena bhedaḥ ubhayoḥ siddhaḥ tasya dṛṣṭānta tvena upādānāt atha na kasya api ekāntena bheda siddhiḥ tatas upāyasya anupāyasya bhakṣya abhakṣya ādi viveka niyama abhāvāt na kasyacid kvacid pravṛtti niyamaḥ prāpnoti iti uktam 
[557,28]	yat punar etat sva ātmanā asti ghaṭaḥ para ātmanā tu na asti iti kim etena bhavati yadi tāvat ekasya ghaṭasya aneka dharma yogi tvam iti tadā na asti vivādaḥ ekasya api dharmiṇaḥ vidhi pratiṣedha ātmaka aneka dharma yogitva abhyupagamāt atha bhāva abhāva ubhayātmakaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti ubhaya ātmakaḥ iti kaḥ arthaḥ yadi ubhaya dharmakaḥ tadā na asti vivādaḥ iti uktam atha ghaṭaḥ eva tad anyā bhāvaḥ iti nanu evam śākya matam bhavatā abhyupagatam bhavati vyāvṛttāt anyā na eva vyāvṛttiḥ iti abhidhānāt tatra ca dūṣāṇam prapañcena uktam 
[558,5]	nanu asmad mate bhāva tad anyā bhāvayoḥ bhedaḥ api asti ubhaya ātmaka tva abhyupagamāt na abhyupagama mātrāt artha siddheḥ asiddheḥ pramāṇataḥ hi padārtha sadbhāva siddhiḥ pramāṇam ca tvayā na uktam yatas tad ubhaya ātmaka tva siddhiḥ syāt asmābhiḥ tu uktam pramāṇam yadi atas artha antaram tat anekāntena eva tatas artha antaram iti 
[558,9]	kim ca vivakṣitaḥ paṭa ādi abhāvaḥ na ghaṭa ātmakaḥ paṭa ādyabhāva tvāt tad pradhvaṃsa vat katham tarhi ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ na bhavati iti pratibhāsaḥ itaretara abhāva nibandhanaḥ ayam nanu itaretara abhāvena saha bhāvasya kaḥ sambandhaḥ sambandhe api ghaṭe paṭaḥ na asti iti pratītiḥ syāt iti yat tāvat kaḥ sambandhaḥ iti tat na ukta uttara tvāt uktam atra bhāvatad anyā bhāvayoḥ sannidhi viśeṣaḥ kaścid tāvat asti yatas tayoḥ viśleṣeṇa grahaṇam tatra yatheṣṭam saṃjñā api kriyatām 
[558,16]	yat ca uktam sambandhe api ghaṭe paṭaḥ na asti iti pratītiḥ syāt bhū tale ghaṭa abhāva pratīti vat tat ayuktam bhāva vat sambandha viśeṣataḥ pratīti vailakṣaṇya upapatteḥ yathā bhāva sambandha viśeṣāt pratīti vailakṣaṇyam dṛṣṭam kuṇḍe asti nīlī dravyam iti nīlaḥ paṭaḥ iti mama pratītiḥ pratītaḥ arthaḥ iti evamādi evam abhāva sambandha viśeṣaḥ api pratīti vailakṣaṇye hetuḥ asti iti gamyate sarvatra hi kārya viśeṣeṇa hetu viśeṣa siddhiḥ iti 
[558,22]	api ca abhāvasya paratantra upalabdhiḥ iti uktam tena yasya pratiyogī yathā buddhi upasthāpitaḥ tad abhāvasya tathā pratītiḥ bhavati atas bhū tala ādheya tvena buddhi upasthāpitasya ghaṭasya abhāvaḥ bhūta lādheyaḥ iva pratīyate na asti atra ghaṭaḥ iti yadā tu tad pratiyogī tad ātmaka tvena buddhi upasthāpitaḥ tadā tad abhāvaḥ api tad ātmā eva pratibhāti aghaṭaḥ ayam paṭaḥ iti tasmāt na bhāva abhāvayoḥ aikyam 
[558,28]	yat ca uktam ghaṭa tvam aghaṭa tvam ca parasparataḥ na bhinnam iti tat ati vyāmūdha bhāṣitam vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ abhedasya sarva loka pratīti bādhita tvāt 
[559,2_559,5]	prasajya paryudāsa pakṣe api abheda anupapatteḥ ca prasajya pakṣe tāvat ghaṭa tva abhāvaḥ eva aghaṭa tvam na ca tat eva tad abhāvaḥ sarpa abhāvaḥ asarpaḥ eva syāt tatas ca sarva vat tad abhāvāt api bhayam syāt tad vivikta avivikta pradeśayoḥ tulya upalambhaḥ ca syāt paryudāsa pakṣe api ghaṭa tvāt anyat aghaṭa tvam paṭa tva ādikam ucyate tat ca bhinnam eva abhede hi ghaṭa ādiṣu api paṭa buddhi abhidhāna anuvṛttiḥ syāt paṭe api ghaṭa ādi buddhiḥ syāt 
[559,8]	paṭa ātmanā asau aghaṭaḥ iti api ayuktam paṭa ātmanā hi kim ghaṭaḥ san aghaṭaḥ kriyate atha jñāpyate iti prathama pakṣe pramāṇam na asti na hi yathā mṛd piṇḍaḥ kulāla ādibhiḥ ghaṭa ātmanā kriyamāṇaḥ upalabhyate tathā saḥ eva tadā eva anyadā vā kenacid aghaṭaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ dṛśyate vinaṣṭaḥ hi yadi aghaṭaḥ syāt tadā ca asau na ghaṭaḥ tasmāt na paṭa ātmanā ghaṭaḥ eva aghaṭaḥ kriyate na api jñāpyate mithyā jñapti prasaṅgāt arajate rajata jñapti vat atha paṭa ātmanā na ghaṭaḥ pratibhāti iti aghaṭaḥ api asau ucyate na viruddha tvāt yatas eva paṭa rūpeṇa na pratibhāti atas eva eka ātmakaḥ asau ghaṭaḥ eva iti ucyate 
[559,16]	api ca yatra api ubhaya dharma adhikaraṇa tvena ubhaya ātmaka tvam ucyate tatra api na sva ātma para ātmā apekṣayā tad ubhaya ātmakam yathā nīlam ca tad utpalam ca iti na hi para ātmanā tat nīlam utpalam ca iti ucyate kim tu sva rūpeṇa eva tathā sat asat ātmaka tvam api sva rūpeṇa eva vācyam na anya rūpeṇa sattvam asattvam vā mukhyam na hi suvarṇa ādeḥ mṛd ā ādi rūpeṇa sattvam na api kha puṣpa ādeḥ stambha ādi rūpeṇa asattvam sva rūpeṇa eva asattvāt iti tat yadi bhāvānām ubhaya ātmaka tvam syāt tadā sva rūpeṇa eva ghaṭaḥ ca aghaṭaḥ ca syāt para rūpeṇa aghaṭa tve hi gauṇam tat aghaṭa tvam vaṭumāṇavaka ādeḥ agni tva siṃha tva ādi vat atas gauṇam tad ubhaya ātmakam vastu mukhyatas tu sva rūpeṇa eva yad ātmakam yat tad ātmakam eva tat iti 
[559,26]	sva rūpeṇa eva ubhaya ātmakam vastu iti ced na iṣṭa aniṣṭa svabhāva avyavasthiteḥ prāṇi vyavahāra abhāva prasaṅgāt yathā eva hi prāṇinām sukha ādi sattvam iṣṭam tathā tat asattvam aniṣṭam yathā ca duḥkha ādi sattvam aniṣṭam tathā tat asattvam iṣṭam tatas ca svarūpeṇa eva sat asat ātmaka tvam sukha duḥkha ādi sādhanānām iṣṭa aniṣṭa tvena vyavasthānāt tad prāpti parivarjana arthe pravṛtti nivṛttī na syātām api ca ayam sukha ādi hetuḥ sattvāt sva kārya karaṇa pravṛttaḥ api asattvāt na śaknoti kartum akurvataḥ api asya mokṣaḥ na asti sattvāt tat ayam sattva asattvābhyām ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ kām avasthām ca tat prāpnotu dustare hi vyasane nagna śramaṇaka durbuddhinā ayam varākaḥ patitaḥ iti 
[560,4]	api ca tvad tīrthaṅkara vacanam kim satyam āhosvit asatyam iti satyam eva iti na yuktam ekānta vāda prasaṅgāt atha atra api sapta bhaṅgīṣṭā syāt satyam syāt asatyam syāt ubhayam syāt avaktavyam iti evamādikā tadā pramāṇa apramāṇa vyavasthā anupapattiḥ syāt vādasya sarvatra aviśeṣāt tathā tvad tīrthaṅkarāṇām api anuṣṭhānam syāt kutsitam syāt akutsitam syāt ubhayam caura ādīnām api tathā eva iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tathā ca āśrava ādi vyavasthā anupapattiḥ kila viśiṣṭa anuṣṭhānavatām eva saṃvara nirjara amokṣāḥ bhavanti aviśiṣṭa anuṣṭhānavatām tu āsrava bandhau eva iti abhyupagamaḥ tat ca ubhayam api anuṣṭhānam yadā syāt viśiṣṭam syāt aviśiṣṭam iti avyavasthitam tadā katham āsrava ādi vyavasthā 
[560,15]	tathā jīvājīva vyavasthā api ayuktā syāt vāde hi jīvaḥ api ajīvaḥ syāt ajīvaḥ api jīvaḥ syāt iti kutas tayoḥ vyavasthā atha avyavasthā api asti sā kim paramārthataḥ kim vā asmān evam eva pratārayasi na hi ekānta pakṣa anabhyupagame kvacid vyavasthā upapadyate yena ca prakāreṇa arthānām vyavasthā ucyate saḥ eva teṣām tāttvikaḥ svabhāvaḥ yaḥ tu avyavasthita svabhāvaḥ sa na tāttvikaḥ sphaṭika ādeḥ pīta ādi svabhāva vat upapluta tvāt tasmāt na vastutas sat asat ātmakam vastu 
[560,22_561,1]	na api nitya aniti ātmakam tathā hi yadi ātma ādi vastu svena paryāyi rūpeṇa nityam tadā vastutas tat nityam eva tatra paryāya anitya tvena anitya tvam kalpyamānam gauṇam eva syāt na ca svarūpeṇa eva ca tat naṣṭam anaṣṭam ca iti upapadyate naṣṭam eva iti niścaya pūrvakaḥ sarva prāṇi vyavahāraḥ ca dṛśyate saḥ api na syāt atha ātmanaḥ sukha ādi rūpeṇa anitya tvam api asti na sukha ādeḥ tatas anya tvāt tad anya tvam ca śākya mata dūṣaṇa prastāve samarthitam ananya tvam api asti iti ced na anya tva niścayena eva ananya tvasya bādhita tvāt candra ādityayoḥ iva ananya tvasya vāstava tve ca anya tvam avāstavam taimirika upalabdha candra antara vat 
[561,4]	kenacid rūpeṇa nityaḥ puruṣaḥ kenacid anityaḥ iti bruvāṇaḥ idam ca praṣṭvyaḥ atha te rūpe puruṣāt parasparam ca kim bhinne uta abhinne ca iti bheda pakṣe tāvat na tayoḥ nitya anitya tvena puruṣasya nitya anitya tvam atiprasaṅgāt abheda pakṣe tu yena eva rūpeṇa nitya tvam tena eva anitya tvam iti prāptam tatra uktam eva dūṣaṇam atha bhinna abhinne tatra api kim yena eva rūpeṇa bhedaḥ tena eva abhedaḥ atha rūpa antareṇa iti yadi tena eva tadā punar tat eva dūṣaṇam atha rūpa antareṇa tatas anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ tatas ca idam ittham eva iti niścayaḥ kvacid na syāt tad niścaya abhāve tu tad pūrvaka vyavahāra sādhyaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ kasyacid na syāt dṛśyate ca buddhimatām niścaya pūrvakāt vyavahārāt uruṣa arthaḥ tasmāt na nitya anitya bhinna abhinna ādya vyavasthā iti 
[561,14]	mīmāṃsaka pakṣe tu bhinna abhinna tvam nitya antam anupapannam tad mate hi nityaḥ eva ātmā iṣyate tasya anityaiḥ sukha ādibhiḥ tādātmyam na yuktam nitya tva eka tva virodhāt sukha ādīnām vā nānātvam anitya tvam ca virudhyate na tu atādātmyam api asti bhinna abhinna tva abhyupagamāt na ca abheda pakṣaḥ doṣa abhidhānāt bheda abhyupagame api abheda pakṣaḥ tvayā atyantam na tyaktaḥ tena abheda pakṣe puruṣasya anitya tva nānātva prasaktiḥ bheda pakṣe tu aprasaktiḥ iti jina mata anupraveśaḥ 
[561,21]	etena sāmānyasya vyaktibhyaḥ bhinna abhinna tvam api apāstam tatra api yāvatā aṃśena bhedaḥ tāvatā aṃśena sāmānya vyakti dharma aniṣaṅgaḥ tatas ca nitya tva vyāpaka tva ādi dharmakam sāmānyam na syāt vyaktīnām vā sāmānya tādātmyena nitya tva ādi anuṣaṅgaḥ prāptaḥ tathā ca ekāntena anitya tva avyāpaka tva ādi dharmakāḥ pradīpa ādayaḥ api na upalabhyeran atha sāmānyam nitya tva ādi rūpeṇa viśeṣebhyaḥ ekāntena bhidyate na tarhi kathaṃcid tat abhinnam tat eva hi sāmānyasya rūpam yat viśeṣebhyaḥ artha antaram tat ca nitya tva ādi dharmakam na abhinnam iti bhedaḥ eva sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ svarūpa antareṇa abhede api na abhedaḥ svarūpa antarasya asāmānya ātmaka tvāt 
[562,2]	nanu yadi ekāntena bhinnam sāmānyam tad ādeśa bhedena api kadācid upalabhyeta na sva rūpa ādibhiḥ anekāntāt yathā vā sukha ādayaḥ śarīrāt na deśa bhedena upalabhyante kim ca deśa bhedaḥ yadi anyena deśa bhedena upalabhyate saḥ api deśa bhedaḥ anyena deśa bhedena iti anavasthā paramāṇu ākāśa ādīnām tu bhede api deśa bheda abhāvāt abhedaḥ prāptaḥ etena indriya bhedāt bhedaḥ pratyuktaḥ svarūpa bhedaḥ tu sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ api upalabhyate nitya anitya anugata vyāvṛtta ādi svarūpa bheda pratīteḥ iti alam prasaṅgena tat evam dharma dharmiṇoḥ ca ekānta bheda siddhau nitya tva vyāpaka tva ādi dharma upapannaḥ puruṣaḥ jñāna ādi āśrayaḥ sidhyati iti 
[562,11]	nanu ca jñāna sukha duḥkha ādi āśraya tvam puruṣasya na yuktam pradhāna kārya tva prasaṅgāt yat yat sukha duḥkha mohaiḥ anvitam tat sarvam pradhāna kāryam yathā śabda ādayaḥ viṣayāḥ iti na pramāṇa abhāvāt na hi pradhāna astitve pramāṇam kiṃcid asti 
[562,15]	na na asti anvaya parimāṇa śakti pravṛtti kārya kāraṇa bhāva vaiśvarūpyebhyaḥ asti pradhānam pradhatte vikārān pradhīyante vā asmin vikārāḥ iti pradhānam mūla bhūtam kāraṇam tat ca pañcabhyaḥ vītebhyaḥ niścīyate tathā hi 
[562,19]	vivāda gocara āpannā bhedāḥ eka kāraṇa pūrvakā anvita tvāt ghaṭa śarāva ādi vat yat tat ekam kāraṇam tat pradhānam 
[562,21]	kim ca parimita tvāt mūla ādi vat yathā vrīhau saṃśliṣṭānām mūla aṅkura parṇa nāla kāṇḍa prasava śūka tuṣa puṣpa kṣīra taṇḍula kaṇānām parimāṇam dṛṣṭam tathā ca pakṣīkṛtānām bhedānām asti parimāṇam ekādeśa indriyāṇi pañca tanmātrāṇi pañcabhūtāni pañca viparyaya bhedāḥ iti evamādi tasmāt ete api bhedāḥ kvacid ekasmin kāraṇe saṃsṛṣṭāḥ yatra saṃsṛṣṭāḥ tat pradhānam 
[563,5]	kim ca śaktitas pravṛtteḥ triṣu api kāleṣu kārya pravṛtti samarthā śaktiḥ mṛd tattva ādi dṛṣṭāntena mṛd tattva ādi śaktiḥ api tad kāraṇeṣu avasthitā gamyate tad kāraṇa śaktiḥ api tad kāraṇa kāraṇeṣu iti evam tāvat yāvat akāraṇam 
[563,9]	śakti śabdena ca avyakta rūpeṇa avasthitam kāryam eva ucyate tasya vyakta bhāva āpattiḥ pravṛttiḥ iti ucyate pravṛtteḥ prāk api asti śaktiḥ labdha ātmakānām pravṛtti darśanāt pravṛtti kāle api asti tirobhāva darśanāt tad ūrdhvam api asti punar pravṛtti darśanāt tat evam yatas śakteḥ sarvam vyaktam pravartate sā śaktiḥ sadā avasthāyinī pradhānam iti ucyate 
[563,15]	itas ca asti pradhānam kārya kāraṇa bhāva upalabdheḥ āsandikā ādi vat kārya kāraṇa bhāva śabdena upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ ucyate upakārya upakāraka bhāvena avasthitānām hi eka kāraṇa prabhava tvam dṛṣṭam yathāsandikā ādīnām asti ca kārya kāraṇānām bhūtānām ca parasparam upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ evam manuṣya ādīnām ca atas asti eṣām ekam kāraṇam iti 
[564,2]	itas ca asti pradhānam vaiśvarūpya upalabdheḥ kṣīra ādi vat tat yathā kṣīrāt dadhi dadhnaḥ takram ghṛtam ca tad upayogāt puṣṭiḥ tatas api putra ādayaḥ kadācid mṛtasya śarīrasya kvāthaḥ kuthitasya kṛmi bhāvena pariṇāmaḥ kuthitam śarīram vṛkṣāyurvede vṛkṣāṇām vṛddhi artham iti śrūyate tena ca vṛkṣāṇām api tad kārya tvam vṛkṣāt ca phalam phalāt rasaḥ tad upayogāt puṣṭi balam iti etat sarvam kṣīre asti kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhedāt evam sthāvarāṇām jaṅgameṣu sadbhāvaḥ jaṅgamānām ca sthāvareṣu iti evam jāti anucchedena sarvam sarva ātmakam deśa kāla ākāra nimitta pratibandhāt na samāna kāla abhivyaktiḥ tat etat sthāvara jaṅgama vaiśvarūpyam jala bhūmyoḥ pāriṇāmikam jala ādi pariṇāmaḥ api anyasya kasyacid saḥ api anyasya saḥ api anyasya saḥ api anyasya tāvat yāvat avibhāgaḥ kvacid abhūt yatra ca avibhāgaḥ tat pradhānam iti 
[564,13_564,17]	tat etat sarvam ayuktam yat tāvat anvita tvāt iti tat na anaikāntika tvāt puruṣāḥ api caitanya sattva jñeya tva ādibhiḥ anvitā iti atha kāraṇa dharma saṃsargi tvam anvita tvam abhipretam tathā api dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvam ghaṭa śarāva ādīnām eka kāraṇa pūrvakatva asiddheḥ atha ye bhedāḥ yena anvitāḥ te tad ātmakāḥ eva dṛṣṭāḥ yathā candanena anvitāni candana śakalāni candanāt na vyatiricyante mṛdā ca anvitāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ na amṛd ātmakāḥ tathā sarve bhāvāḥ sukha duḥkha mohaiḥ anvitāḥ tasmāt sarve sukha ādi ātmakāḥ iti na asiddha tvāt na hi sarva bhāvānām sukha ādi anvita tve pramāṇam kiṃcid asti 
[564,22_564,25]	nanu uktam pramāṇam śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandhāḥ pañca api trayāṇām sukha duḥkha mohānām sanniveśa viśeṣāḥ kasmāt pañcānām pañcānām eka kārya bhāvāt sāttvika rājasa tāmasa pañcaka traya avarodha artham vīpsā abhidhānam eka kārya bhāvāt iti atra api vīpsā draṣṭavyā tatra sāttvikānām pañcānām ekam kāryam dṛṣṭam prasāda lāghava prasava abhiṣvaṅga uddharṣa prītayaḥ tathā hi putraḥ te jātaḥ iti śabdam śrutvā asya prasādaḥ svastha indriyam bhavati dehasya laghu tvam lāghavam tuṣṭa sādhana dātṛ tvam prasavaḥ tatra eṣā śaktiḥ abhiṣvaṅgaḥ romāñcanam uddharṣaḥ prītiḥ sukham iti evam sparśa ādiṣu api yojyam 
[565,4]	tathā rājasānām pañcānām ekam kāryam dṛṣṭam śoṣa tāpa bheda stambha udvega apadveṣāḥ tatra putraḥ te mṛtaḥ iti śabdam śrutvā asya śoṣaḥ bhavati udaka prārthana paratvam tāpaḥ duḥkham bhedaḥ aśru prasveda amedhya ādi utsargaḥ stambhaḥ kim karomi iti upāya aparijñānam aratiḥ udvegaḥ pratikūla karaṇa icśāpadveṣaḥ evam sparśa ādiṣu api yojyam 
[565,8]	tathā tāmasānām pañcānām ekam kāryam dṛṣṭam varaṇa sādana apadhu aṃsa bībhatsa dainya gauravāṇi tatra putraḥ te mṛtaḥ iti śabdam śrutvā asya varaṇam kriyā pratibandhaḥ sādanam viṣaṇṇa tā apadhvaṃsanam nistejaḥ tvam pratyaya lopaḥ vā bībhatso vikṣata rūpa tvam dainyam yat kiṃcid prārthana paratvam gauravam sva hasta ādīnām api utkṣepaṇa ādya sāmarthyam evam sparśa ādiṣu api yojyam etaiḥ ca śabda ādibhiḥ ārabdhāni pṛthivī ādīni pañca mahābhūtāni tasmāt tāni api sattva ādīnām sanniveśa viśeṣa mātram tathā karaṇa ātmanām sukha duḥkha mohānām trayodaśānām tat eva kāryam prasāda ādi tathā deva manuṣya tiryagyoni ātmakānām prakāśa pravṛtti niyamānām tat eva kāryam prasāda ādi tasmāt sarvam jagat sukha ādīnām sanniveśa mātram iti 
[565,18]	tat etat api ayuktam yadi nāma śabda ādīnām prasāda ādi kārya janaka tvam sukha ādi svabhāva tve kim āyātām na hi atra pratibandhaḥ kaścid asti nanu atra uktam śabda ādayaḥ sukha ādi svabhāvāḥ prasāda ādi janaka tvāt sukha ādi vat iti na kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvāt sukha ādi svabhāva tve hi śabda ādīnām antaḥkaraṇa eka saṃvedya tva prasaṅgaḥ badhira ādi abhāva prasaṅgaḥ ca na hi sukha ādayaḥ śrotra ādi vikalaiḥ na gṛhyante iti śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandhānām pratiniyata indriya grāhya tvam ca na syāt eka svabhāva tvāt nīla ādi buddhi vat aviśeṣeṇa sukha ādi buddhi prasaṅgaḥ ca yathā nīla ādi svabhāve vastuni sarveṣām tad draṣṭṝṇām aviśiṣṭaḥ nīla ādi pratibhāsaḥ bhavati evam yadi sukha ādi svabhāvaḥ api bāhyaḥ arthaḥ syāt tadā tatra sukha ādi pratibhāsaḥ api sarveṣām tad draṣṭṝṇām aviśiṣṭaḥ syāt tasmin eva arthe kasyacid sukham kasyacid duḥkham kasyacid tīvram kasyacid mandam iti evamādi viśeṣaḥ na syāt tasmāt na sukha ādi svabhāvāḥ śabda ādayaḥ iti 
[566,2]	yat ca uktam etaiḥ ca śabda ādibhiḥ ārabdhāni ityādi tad viparītam eva kalpitam yasmāt ākāśa ādibhiḥ śabda ādayaḥ ārabhyante na tu śabda ādibhiḥ ākāśa ādīni iti ākāśasya paramāṇūnām ca nitya tvāt na ca yena yat ā ārabdham tat tad ātmakam eva bheda abhāve hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva na syāt siddha asiddha avasthayoḥ sva ātmani kriyā virodhāt na api eka jāti tvam niyamena kārya kāraṇayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa api kuvinda turī paṭa ādīnām jāti bheda upalambhāt na ca jāti jāti matoḥ tādātmyam siddham yena eka jāti tve api kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhedaḥ syāt jāti tadvatoḥ atyanta bhedasya vistareṇa prasādhita tvāt sattā sambandhi tvena ca puruṣāṇām api ekatva prasaṅgāt tatas ca mūlaprakṛtiḥ avikṛtiḥ mahat ādyāḥ prakṛti vikṛtayaḥ sapta ṣoḍaśakaḥ ca vikāraḥ na prakṛtiḥ na vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ iti ayam abhyupagamaḥ virudhyate 
[566,14^1]	rūpa ādi vaidharmyāt ca na sukha ādi svabhāvāḥ pṛthivī ādayaḥ sukha ādīnām pariṇāma viśeṣāḥ pṛthivī ādayaḥ iti ced te kim sukha ādibhyaḥ anye ananye vā anya tve puruṣa vat atri guṇa tvam ananya tve tu rūpa ādimat tvam aindriyaka tvam ca virudhyeta pradhāna vat dharma antara āpattau sattva ādiṣu eva pṛthivī ādi vyavahāraḥ iti ced dharma antarasya tatas anya tve puruṣa vat atri guṇa tvam ananya tve ca pradhāna vat niyata deśa kāla tva anupapattiḥ svabhāva vailakṣaṇya abhāva prasaṅgaḥ ca kenacid rūpeṇa anyat kenacid tat eva na anyat iti atra api uktam eva pṛthivī ādīnām ca dūṣaṇam tattva anya tvābhyām anirvacanīya tvāt iti ced na pañcaviṃśati tattva abhyupagama virodhāt 
[566,14^2]	na hi buddhi ādīnām pradhānāt anya tvena avacane pañcaviṃśati tattvāni upapadyante viruddha dharma adhyāsāt ca mithas śabda ādīnām indriyāṇām ca pṛthivī ādīnām ca bheda siddheḥ katham anya tva avacanam puruṣasya api vā anya tva avacanam syāt api ca sukha duḥkha mohānām eka indriya saṃvedyā rūpa ādi tva sādharmye api ekāntena bhedaḥ iṣyate śabda ādīnām tu pratiniyata indriya grāhya tva ādi vaidharmye api na ekāntena bhedaḥ iti aho prāmāṇika tvam pratyakṣa ādinā upalabhyamāne api sukha ādibhyaḥ śabda ādīnām atyanta bhede kiṃcid sādharmyāt abheda siddhau advaita siddhiḥ eva syāt guṇa puruṣāṇām api sādharmi a sadbhāvāt tasmāt na anvayāt pradhāna siddhiḥ 
[567,2]	na api parimāṇa asiddhiḥ parimitānām eka kāraṇa saṃsṛṣṭa tve dṛṣṭānta asiddheḥ mūla aṅkura ādīnām tu brīhi avayavebhyaḥ avayava antara sahitebhyaḥ pūrva pūrva avayava vināśe sati krameṇa utpattiḥ na ekatra saṃsargaḥ asti na api ekasmāt utpattiḥ sarva kāryāṇām kartṛka karaṇa upādāna pūrvakatva siddheḥ na api eka upādāna pūrvaka tvam kasyacid dravyasya ekasya api asti atha eka jātīya upādāna pūrvaka tvam tadā siddha sādhya tā dravya eka jātīyasya eva upādāna tva abhyupagamāt avāntara jāti bhedaḥ tu kṣiti udaka ādi upādānānām pratyakṣeṇa api upalabhyate tatas tad apahnave pratyakṣa ādi bādhā api syāt sukha ādīnām tu na kvacid upādāna tvam siddham guṇa tvāt tat na parimāṇāt api pradhāna siddhiḥ 
[567,11]	etena upakārya upakāraka bhāvāt pradhāna siddhiḥ iti apāstam 
[567,13]	na api śakti pravṛtteḥ pradhāna siddhiḥ triṣu api kāleṣu kāryam kāraṇeṣu avasthitam asti iti kena etat śraddheyam na hi kanyakā udare putra pautra ādayaḥ prāk api avasthitāḥ santi iti atra pramāṇam kiṃcid asti 
[567,17]	etena vaiśvarūpya hetuḥ api apāstaḥ satkārya tva sāmarthyāt eteṣām siddhiḥ iti ced na tasya eva asiddha tvāt na hi kāryasya prāk astitve pramāṇam kiṃcid asti 
[567,20_567,25]	nanu uktam pramāṇam asat akaraṇāt upādāna grahaṇāt sarva sambhava abhāvāt śaktasya śakti akaraṇāt kāraṇa bhāvāt ca satkāryam ete ca avīta hetavaḥ yadi asat kriyate śaśa viṣāṇa ādi api kriyate na tu kriyate tasmāt sat eva kāryam yadi ca tantu ādiṣu paṭa ādi kāryam na asti tadā paṭa ādi arthinaḥ tantu ādi upādānam na kuryuḥ tad kārya śūnya tvāt vīraṇa ādi vat 
[568,1_568,4]	yadi ca āsan eva paṭaḥ tantubhyaḥ bhavati tatas sarvam kāryam bhavet asattva aviśeṣāt na tu bhavati atas sarva sambhava abhāvāt niścīyate yat eva yatra asti tat eva tatas bhavati iti śaktasya ca kartṛ tvam sarvaiḥ eva iṣyate na ca śakti vikalam śaktam yuktam śaktim ca na kāryāt anyām paśyāmaḥ śakyam ca kriyate tena na asataḥ śakya tvam yuktam kim ca yadi asya kāraṇam tat tatas bhavati na ca asati kārye asya idam kāraṇam iti upapadyate tasmāt sat eva kāryam iti 
[568,9_568,10]	tat etat api ayuktam yat tāvat asat akaraṇāt iti tat na paratibandha asiddheḥ yadi nāma śaśa viṣāṇāt yasat kriyamāṇam na dṛṣṭam paṭa ādi api asat na kriyate iti kutas yathā eva hi śaśa viṣāṇa ādeḥ asattvam akriyamāṇa tvam ca sarva loka avisaṃvādinā pratyakṣa ādinā pramāṇena siddham tathā eva paṭa ādīnām prāk asattvam kriyamāṇa tvam ca siddham kim na iṣyate kim ca asat akaraṇāt asat kāryam kim na iṣṭam tatra api evam śakyate vaktum yadi sat kriyate puruṣa ādi api kriyeta na tu kriyate tasmāt asat kāryam iti 
[568,17]	yat tu uktam upādāna grahaṇāt iti tat api ayuktam viruddha tvāt yadi hi prāk api asti kāryam tatas tad artham tad kāraṇeṣu na kaścid pravarteta vaiyarthyāt na hi loke yasya yat asti sa tad artham yatate iti nanu pṛṣṭham me kuru keśān me kuru ityādi vyavahāra darśanāt sataḥ api kriyamāṇa tvam siddham na tasya aupacārika tvāt pṛṣṭha keśa ādiṣu anyat eva kiṃcid kāryam kriyate pṛṣṭha keśa ādikam tu upacāreṇa kriyate iti ucyate na tu aṃjasā tasya prāk eva niṣpanna tvāt niṣpannasya ca niṣpādanā sambhavaḥ tatra anarthakaḥ hetuḥ syāt yadi asan eva paṭaḥ tantubhiḥ kriyate vīraṇa ādibhiḥ api kim na kriyate iti ced na vīraṇa ādīnām tatra asāmarthyāt sāmarthyam eva kāryam iti ced na śakteḥ kāraṇa dharma tvāt tatas paścāt bhavat kāryam katham tad ātmakam syat yogyatām vijñāya ca pratiniyata kāraṇa upādānam na tu kārya darśanāt na hi aniṣpannaḥ paṭaḥ draṣṭum śakyate kim ca sarvam sarva ātmakam iti evaṃvādīnām vīraṇa ādiṣu api paṭaḥ asti iti kim na taiḥ paṭaḥ kriyate kasmāt ca na tāni paṭa arthibhiḥ upādīyante 
[569,2_569,3]	etena sarva sambhava abhāvaḥ api pratyuktaḥ yathā uktam śakyam ca kriyate na ca asat kartum śakyam iti sat katham śakyam na hi pradhānam puruṣaḥ vā kenacid kartum śakyate 
[569,5]	yat ca uktam kāraṇa bhāvāt iti tat api viruddha tva apayuktam yadi hi prāk api asti kāryam tadā kāraṇena kim kartavyam akiṃcitkaram ca katham kāraṇam na hi kṣetrajñānām parasparam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sambhavati kāryasya abhivyaktiḥ kāraṇena kriyate iti ced sā yadi asatī kriyate tatas asat kāryam syāt sati ced abhivyaktiḥ tad avastham kāraka ānarthakyam abhivyakteḥ api abhivyaktiḥ kriyate iti ced sā api satī syāt asatī vā iti aparyavasānam sarvatra sattva abhyupagame sarvam sadā eva abhivyaktim iti ānarthakyam eva kārakāṇām etena dharma antara apravṛtti lābhāt yukti bhedaḥ pratyuktaḥ yat kiṃcid prayojanam kārakāṇām ucyate tat sarvam sarva ākāreṇa prāk eva asti iti ānarthakyam eva kārakāṇām yena vā ākāreṇa prāk asti sa tasya akāraḥ prāk asan eva paścāt dhetubhyaḥ bhavati iti katham na asatkāryam 
[569,16^1]	mādhava mata abhyupagame tu sāṃkhya nāśaḥ eva syāt katham yadi hi abhivyaktiḥ anyaḥ vā kaścid dharmaḥ asan eva kriyate tatas asat akaraṇāt iti evamādayaḥ asamarthāḥ hetavaḥ syuḥ tatas satkārya tva asiddhau vaiśvarūpya ādya siddheḥ pradhāna ādya siddhiḥ iti na ca atra viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti yena paṭa ādi kāryasya eva asataḥ karaṇam sataḥ ca ātmahānam ca na sambhavati tad dharmasya tu kasyacid sambhavati eva iti na ca kiṃcid api asat na bhavati iti śakyam vaktum visphūrjata api hi kārakāṇām avaśyam kiṃcid phalam vācyam yat asiddham taiḥ sādhyate iti yadi kiṃcid na asat jāyate na sannivartate tadā deśa kāla ākāra nimitta pratibandhāt na samāna kāla abhivyaktiḥ iti etat api vyāhanyate 
[569,16^2]	yadi hi sadā eva santi abhivyaktayaḥ katham na samāna kālāḥ na ced santi paścāt api katham na bhaviṣyanti tathā deśa ādi pratibandhaḥ api san ced na kadācid nivartiṣyate iti sadā eva anabhivyakti prasaṅgaḥ atha āsan eva pratibandhaḥ tathā api kutas anabhivyaktiḥ iti yat punar etat na vastutas kiṃcid utpadyate nivartate vā guṇānām hi saṃyoga viyoga mātre pravṛtti nivṛtti vyavahāraḥ sattva ādīnām eva anyathā sanniveśe kārya bheda upacāraḥ śikyākṣa sūtra ādi vat iti tat ayuktam avayavebhyaḥ artha antarasya avayavinaḥ samarthita tvāt saṃyogasya ca artha antara tvāt utpatti vināśa dharmaka tvāt ca katham na kiṃcid utpadyate 
[569,16^3]	api ca rajju ādīnām mūrta tvāt sāvayava tvāt avayava kriyā dvāreṇa anyathā anyathā sanniveśaḥ kartum śakyate sattva ādīnām vibhu tva niravayava tvāt puruṣa vat na anyathā anyathā sanniveśeḥ sambhavati viyogaḥ api vibhūnām ayuktaḥ kim ca arūpādimatām sanniveśa viśeṣe api katham rūpa ādi upalabdhiḥ na hi vāyūnām sanniveśa viśeṣe api śukla ādi rūpam upalabhyate yeṣām hi yathā bhūtāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ teṣām anyathā anyathā āsanniveśe api tathābhūtāḥ eva rūpa ādayaḥ upalabhyante yathā kṛṣṇa tantūnām tasmāt na guṇa sanniveśa mātre pṛthivī ādi vyavahāraḥ atas eva na pradhānasya upādāna tvam tad upādāna tve hi pṛthivī ādīnām vicitra rūpa ādi yogi tvam na syat kārya dravyasya upādāna rūpa ādi anuvidhāna darśanāt pradhānasya api vicitra rūpa ādi yogitva abhyupagame paramāṇuṣu eva pradhāna saṃjñā kṛtā syāt ekasya vicitra rūpa ādi yoga asambhavāt dravya upādānasya ca alpa parimāṇa tva nānātva niyama upalambhāt paramāṇūnām ca sukha ādi āśraya tvam prāk eva pratiṣiddham tasmāt na sukha ādi āśraya tve puruṣasya pradhāna tva prasaṅgaḥ pradhānasya ca sukha ādi āśraya tve puruṣaḥ niṣprāmāṇikaḥ syāt 
[570,16]	nanu bhogyena bhoktuḥ anumānam uktam sa vikāram pradhānam bhoktra vinābhūtam bhogya tvāt odana ādi vat tathā para arthaḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ saṃhata tvāt śayana ādi vat iti tat ayuktam bhoga svarūpa asiddheḥ sukha duḥkhe tat jñānam ca loke api bhoga tvena prasiddham tat ca bhavatā buddheḥ karaṇasya iṣṭam tad anyaḥ tu kaḥ puruṣasya bhogaḥ iti etena parārtha tvam pratyuktam kaḥ hi deha ādibhiḥ puruṣasya arthaḥ sampādyate dharma ādayaḥ api hi buddheḥ eva iṣyante 
[570,23]	nanu dvividhaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ uktaḥ śabda ādi upalabdhiḥ guṇa puruṣa antara darśanam ca pūrvena bhogaḥ uktaḥ uttareṇa mokṣaḥ iti katham bhogaḥ iti ced ucyate buddheḥ ākūtam viditvā indriyāṇi viṣaya ākāreṇa pariṇamante tatas tad indriya vṛtti ākāreṇa buddheḥ parimāṇaḥ tasyām buddhi vṛttau caitanya abhivyaktiḥ na bhavati yathā sūryakāntāt iti araśmi sannipāte tala ādiṣu agni jvālā abhivyajyate tathā viṣaya indriya manaḥ vṛtti sannipāte antaḥkaraṇa vṛttau caitanyam abhivyajyate saḥ ayam buddheḥ abhivyaktiḥ pariṇāmaḥ bhogaḥ iti ucyate tatra yasya mate trayāt aśavidham karaṇam tad mate mahat tattvam buddhi śabdena ucyate ye tu ekādaśavidham karaṇam icchanti tad mate tu manaḥ eva buddhiḥ tat uktam puruṣaḥ avikṛta ātmā eva sva nirbhāsam acetanam manaḥ karoti sānnidhyāt upādhiḥ sphaṭikam yathā vivikte dṛś pariṇatau buddhau bhogaḥ asya kathyate pratibimba udayaḥ svacche yathā candramasaḥ ambhasi 
[571,5]	saḥ ayam prakṛti puruṣayoḥ bhoktṛ bhogya lakṣaṇaḥ anādi sambandhaḥ bandhaḥ iti ucyate sa ca adarśana mūlaḥ tena asau darśanāt nivartate tad nivṛttau ca nirupādhiḥ puruṣaḥ svabhāva nirmalaḥ muktaḥ iti ucyate tat uktam pañcaviṃśati tattva jñaḥ yatra tatra āśrame rataḥ jaṭī muṇḍī śikhī vā api mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ 
[571,10_571,23]	punar api uktam samyak jñāna adhigamāt dharma ādīnām akāraṇa prāptau tiṣṭhati saṃskāra vaśāt cakra bhrama vat ghṛta śarīraḥ prāpte śarīra bhede caritārtha tvāt pradhāna vinivṛttau ekāntikam ātyantikam ubhayam kaivalyam āpnoti autsukya nivṛtti artham yathā kriyāsu pravartate lokaḥ puruṣasya vimokṣa artham pravartate tadvat avyaktam raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt puruṣasya tathā ātmānam prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ upāyaiḥ upakāriṇi anupakāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ guṇavatī aguṇasya sataḥ tasya artham apārthakam carati prakṛteḥ sukumārataram na kiṃcid asti iti me matiḥ bhavati yā dṛṣṭā asmi iti punar na darśanam upaiti puruṣasya tat evam dvividha puruṣa artha upapatteḥ na parārtha tva anupapattiḥ iti 
[571,25_571,26]	tat etat ākāśa carvaṇa vat anupapannam yat tāvat agni jvālā vat caitanyam abhivyajyate iti tat na satkārya tva niṣedhāt agni jvālāyāḥ api abhivyakti anupapatteḥ satkārya pakṣe api tirohitasya abhivyaktiḥ sambhavati na ca tvad mate caitanyasya tirobhāvaḥ asti apariṇamitvā abhyupagamāt na hi viśiṣṭa ākāra pariṇatāyām api buddhau citeḥ pūrva svabhāvānyathātvam bhavati apariṇāmi tva virodhāt 
[572,3]	svabhāva aviśeṣe api bhoga abhyupagame tu sadā eva aviśeṣeṇa bhogaḥ syāt tathā ca kaḥ puṃsaḥ pradhāna kṛtaḥ bhogaḥ caitanya ākāreṇa eva buddheḥ pariṇāmaḥ eva bhogaḥ iti ced sa kim puruṣa nimittaḥ vā na vā puruṣa nimittaḥ ced na tarhi udāsīnaḥ puruṣaḥ sva bhoga kartṛ tvāt atha kriyā pariṇāmaḥ api tasya na asti sannidhi mātreṇa kartṛ tvāt tena kurvan api udāsīnaḥ iti ucyate na atiprasaṅgāt yadi nirvyāpārasya api sannidhi mātreṇa kartṛ tvam tad ātmanām vyāpaka tvena sarvatra sānnidhyāt sarva ātmānaḥ sarveṣām kartāraḥ syuḥ mukta ātmānaḥ api bhoktāraḥ syuḥ tad sannidhi mātrā viśeṣāt atha bhogam akurvan eva bhoktā na aprasiddha tvāt na hi bhuji kriyām akurvan eva kaścid bhoktā prasiddhaḥ kim ca mukta ātmanām api bhoktṛ tva prasaṅgāt viśeṣa abhāvāt etena pratibimba udayaḥ pratyuktaḥ citi svabhāva aviśeṣe api sarva puṃsām vyāpaka tvena sannidhāna aviśeṣe api ca kasyacid eva puṃsaḥ pratibimba udayaḥ na sarva puṃsām iti kiṃkṛtaḥ ayam niyamaḥ kleśa karma ādi viśeṣa kṛtaḥ iti ced na kleśa ādeḥ buddhi vṛtti tva abhyupagamāt 
[572,17]	nanu buddhi vṛtti tve api sva svāmi sambandha niyamāt puruṣa vṛtti tva upacāraḥ śrūyate hi bhṛtya aparādhena svāminaḥ daṇḍaḥ iti na sarvathā udāsīnasya svāmi tvena dṛṣṭānta aprasiddheḥ viparyaye tu rāja ādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ asti sva tvam api upakārakasya eva bhṛtya ādeḥ dṛṣṭam na ca buddhiḥ puṃsaḥ svabhāva nirmalasya kiṃcid upakāram kartum śaknoti 
[572,21]	nartakī vat ātmānam darśayanti eva upakārikā iti ced na etat asti nartakī hi raṅgasya sva ātma darśanam janayantī sva ātmānam darśayati iti ucyate na ca buddhiḥ puṃsaḥ kiṃcid janayati sarvathā anupakārya tvāt na ca nartakī api adidṛkṣoḥ kasyacid ātmānam darśayitum śaknoti didṛkṣavaḥ ca sukha abhilāṣāt punar punar cakṣuḥ vyāpārayantaḥ paśyanti iti katham udāsīnāḥ tasmāt na udāsīnasya bhogaḥ kvacid prasiddhaḥ iti 
[572,27_573,3]	etena mokṣaḥ api prayuktaḥ kim ca yasya sambandhaḥ tasya tad abhāvāt mokṣaḥ iti ucyate bandhaḥ ca ajñānam abhimataḥ yasmāt uktam dharmeṇa gamanam ūrdhvam gamanam adhastāt bhavati adharmeṇa jñānena ca apavargaḥ viparyayāt iṣyate bandhaḥ vairāgyāt prakṛti layaḥ saṃsāraḥ bhavati rājasāt rāgāt aiśvaryāt avighātaḥ viparyayāt tad viparyāsaḥ tat ca ajñāna rāga ādikam buddheḥ eva iṣṭam na puruṣasya iti katham anya kṛtena ajñāna ādinā puruṣasya bandha saṃsāra ādi upapattiḥ na hi taskara aparādhāt sādhūnām bandhaḥ nyāyyaḥ sādhu kṛtāt vā sukṛtāt taskarāṇām mokṣaḥ iti 
[573,7]	nanu upacāreṇa eva puruṣasya bandha ādikam ucyate yasmāt uktam rūpaiḥ saptabhiḥ eva tu badhnāti ātmānam ātmanā prakṛtiḥ sā eva ca puruṣasya artham vimocayati eka rūpeṇa iti na nimitta abhāvāt upacārasya api anupapatteḥ sva svāmi bhāvaḥ api tvad pakṣe na upapayate iti uktam bhinna abhinna anupapatteḥ ca na tāvat sva svāmi bhāvaḥ prakṛti puruṣābhyām bhinnaḥ svayam anabhyupagamāt na hi guṇa puruṣa vyatiriktam tvayā kiṃcid abhyupagamyate atha abhinnaḥ tadā prakṛti puruṣayoḥ anucchedāt anucchedyaḥ sva svāmi bhāvaḥ tatas mokṣa anupapattiḥ 
[573,16]	caritārtham pradhānam na pravartate iti etat api anena pratyuktam pravṛtti nimittasya anucchedāt ucchede vā pradhānasya api ucchedaḥ tat abhedāt etena autmukya nivṛttiḥ pratyuktā śabda ādi upalabdhi vat vā yathā śabda ādi upalabdhim kṛtvā na carita artham bhavati punar śabda ādi upalabdhi darśanāt tathā kṛtvā api guṇa puruṣa antara darśanam punar tad artham eva pravarteta 
[573,21]	syāt etat śabda ādi upalabdhim kṛtvā guṇa puruṣa antara darśana artham pravartate tasmin api kṛte na aparam pravṛtti nimittam asti iti kutas pravarteta yadi evam śabda ādi upalambham kṛtvā tam prati nivṛtta autsukya tvāt guṇa puruṣa antara darśanam eva karotu kimartham janmani janmani śabda ādi upalambham eva karoti evam hi apuruṣa arthā eva prakṛteḥ pravṛttiḥ syāt yad artham pravṛttā na tat sampādayati śabda ādi upalambha artham ca na pravṛttiḥ ghaṭate tatra autsukya abhāvāt janma antareṣu kṛta tvāt aprekṣā pūrva kāri tvāt anya artham pravṛttā api anyat sampādayati iti ced yadi evam saṃsārya ātma artham pravṛttā api kadācid mukta ātmanaḥ api bhogam sampādayet viveka vikala tvāt 
[574,2_574,4]	buddheḥ ākūtam viditvā ityādi api ayuktam karaṇa tvāt indriyāṇām vā asya ādi vat na ākūta parijñānam na api svatas pravṛttiḥ iti buddheḥ api dharma jñāna ādi adhikaraṇa tvam ayuktam karaṇa tvāt acetana tvāt ca khanitra ādi vat puruṣasya api na dharma ādi adhikaraṇa tvam cetana tvāt mukta ātma vat iti ced na dharmi dṛṣṭānta grāhaka pramāṇa bādhita tvāt na hi jñāna vyatiriktam caitanyam kutaścid siddham yasya jñānam tasya eva sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma adharma saṃskārāḥ ca iti samarthitam duḥkha tad hetu viyuktaḥ tu loke api muktaḥ prasiddhaḥ tena amukta ātmanām duḥkham tad nimittam adharma avidyā ādikam ca abhyupagantavyam iti vyavasthitam tāvat yathā uktam apara ātma jñānam niḥśreyasa aṅgam iti 
[574,12]	atha idānīm paramātma jñānam niḥśreyasa aṅga tvena vaktavyam 
[574,14]	nanu ca para apara bhedena ātma jñānam na eva niḥśreyasa sādhanam kasmāt avidyā rūpa tvāt bheda jñānasya candra ādi bheda jñāna vat tathā ca śrutiḥ ekam eva idam na dvitīyam dvitīyāt vai bhayam bhavet mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha nānā iva paśyati sarvam khalu idam brahma yasya sarvāṇi bhūtāni ātmā eva abhūt vijānataḥ tasya kaḥ śokaḥ mohaḥ eka tvam anupaśyataḥ yaḥ tu sarvāṇi bhūtāni ātmani eva anupaśyati sarva bhūteṣu ca ātmānam tatas na vijugupsate ekaḥ eva hi bhūtātmā dehe dehe vyavasthitaḥ ekadhā bahudhā ca eva dṛśyate jala candra vat 
[574,25_575,1]	anumānam api ucyate sarvam jagat paramātmanaḥ na bhidyate sattva jñeya tva ādibhyaḥ tad svarūpa vat na ca pratyakṣa virodhaḥ tasya bheda aviṣaya tvāt tat uktam āhuḥ vidhātṛ pratyakṣam na niṣeddhṛ vipaścitaḥ na ekatva āgamaḥ tena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate kim ca sarvam vivāda āspadībhūtam bheda jñānam bhrāntam bheda jñāna tvāt candra ādi bheda jñāna vat advaita jñānam bheda jñānasya bādhakam eva tad uttara kāla bhāvi tvāt śuktikā ādi jñāna vat veda artha paryālocanāt uttara kālam advaita jñānam bhavati bheda jñānam tu anādya vidyā vaśāt sarveṣām prāk eva asti tatas tat na bādhakam rajata jñāna ādi vat 
[575,5^1]	trailokya agrahaṇe ca tatas bhinnaḥ katham ghaṭaḥ pratīyate na hi yena aśvaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ aśvāt bhedena anaśvam pratipattum śaknoti ghaṭa paṭayoḥ api bhedaḥ katham gṛhyate yadi lakṣaṇa bhedāt lakṣaṇayoḥ api katham bhedaḥ tatra api lakṣaṇa bheda āśrayaṇe anavasthā syāt atha pratibhāsa bhedāt bhedaḥ pratibhāsayoḥ api katham bhedaḥ tatra api pratibhāsa bheda āśrayaṇe anavasthā prasarantī kena vāryate itaretara āśraya doṣāt ca yāvat na ghaṭaḥ paṭāt vyāvṛttaḥ pratītaḥ tāvat na ghaṭāt vyāvṛttaḥ paṭaḥ pratipattum śakyate yāvat ca na ghaṭāt vyāvṛttaḥ paṭaḥ pratītaḥ tāvat na paṭāt vyāvṛttaḥ ghaṭaḥ pratipattum śakyate iti 
[575,5^2]	sat ākāra pratīti aviśeṣāt ca na hi eka ākāreṇa pratīyamānasya nānātvam yuktam abheda vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt atha ghaṭa ādi ākāreṇa nānātvam pratīyate ghaṭa ādi ākāraḥ sat ākārāt anyaḥ ananyaḥ vā yadi anyaḥ tatas asan eva asau sataḥ anya tvāt śaśa viṣāṇa vat vastunaḥ ca advaitam cintyate atha abhinnaḥ tadā ghaṭa ādi ākāraḥ api sat ākāraḥ eva iti katham bhedaḥ tasmāt avidyā nibandhanaḥ ayam bheda pratibhāsaḥ sā ca avidyā brahmaṇaḥ tattva anya tvābhyām anirvacanīyā tena advaita pakṣe api jagat vaicitryam na virudhyate svapna upalabdha artha vaicitrya vat avicāra kṣama tvāt iti 
[575,20]	tat etat sarvam ayuktam yat tāvat āgama balena advaita sādhanam tat na dvaita pakṣe api āgama sadbhāvāt tatra śrutau tāvat uktam dvā suparṇā sa yujā sakhāyā samānam vṛkṣam pariṣasvajāte tayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādvatti anaśnan anyaḥ abhicākaśīti tathā dve brahmaṇī veditavye param ca aparam ca ityādi tathā tam īśvarāṇām paramam maheśvaram tam daivatānām paramam ca daivatam patim patīnām paramam parastāt vidāma devam bhuvaneśam īḍyam karmabhiḥ mṛtyum ṛṣayaḥ niṣeduḥ prajāvantaḥ draviṇam īhamānāḥ atha apare ṛṣayaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ param karmabhyaḥ amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ iti evamādi smṛtau api uktam uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ tu anyaḥ paramātmā iti udāhṛtaḥ yaḥ lokatrayam āviśya bibharti avyayaḥ īśvaraḥ iti evamādi 
[576,6]	tatra dvaita pakṣe yāni advaita abhidhāyīni vākyāni tāni paramātma viṣaya tvena arthavanti vyākhyeyāni ekam eva idam param brahma iti draṣṭavyam sarvam ca jagat brahma adhiṣṭhita tvena brahma kṛta tvena vā sarvam khalu idam brahma iti uktam evam anyāni vākyāni avirodhena vyākhyeyāni yasya tu mate dvitīyam na kiṃcid asti tasya dvaita abhidhāyīni vākyāni apramāṇāni eva prāptāni na hi teṣām upacāreṇa api arthaḥ sambhavati upacāra animitta abhāvāt na ca ekasmin eva āgame keṣāṃcid vākyānām prāmāṇyam keṣāṃcid aprāmāṇyam iti atra nyāyaḥ kaścid asti atha saṃsāra avasthāyām dvaitam mokṣa avasthāyām tu advaitam iti ubhayeṣām viṣaya vibhāgena prāmāṇyam varṇyate tat ayuktam dvaita an abhyupagame saṃsārasya eva anupapatteḥ yaḥ hi tāvat paramātmā saṃsthāna śarīra ādi ākāraḥ na bhavati na api asau rāga ādi yogāt deva manuṣya tiryakṣu saṃsarati na tasya kāryam karaṇam ca vidyate ityādi vākyaiḥ tasya sadā eva rūpa ādi rahita tva asaṃsāri tva pratipādanāt tad vikāra saṃsāra upapattiḥ iti ced na pariṇāma pakṣasya niṣiddha tvāt 
[576,20]	syāt matiḥ eṣā dvividhā tasya paramātmanaḥ śaktiḥ kriyā jñāna lakṣaṇā tatra kriyāśaktitaḥ tāvat pradhānam bhavati pradhānāt tu mahat ādi vikāra prapañcaḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ ca bhedaḥ na asti tena pradhāna ādeḥ kriyāśaktitaḥ na bhedaḥ śakti śaktimatoḥ api bhedaḥ na asti atas sarvam viśvam brahma ātmakam jñāna śaktitaḥ tu jīva ātmānaḥ bhavanti te api tatas na bhidyante teṣām ca avidyā vaśena utpannānām rāga ādi yogāt saṃsāraḥ tatra ye jīvāḥ avidyāvantaḥ eva pare brahmaṇi layam gacchanti teṣām maṇḍūka cūrṇa vat anirdagdha bīja bhāva tvāt punar utapattiḥ tatas rāga ādi yogāt punar saṃsāraḥ iti ye tu jñāna agninā dvaita bhāvanā sthirībhūta lakṣaṇena bheda vāsanā ākhyam saṃsāra bījam dagdhvā brahmaṇi līyante teṣām nirdagdha bīja tvāt na punar āvṛttiḥ tathā ca śrutiḥ kāmayamānaḥ atha akāmayamānaḥ yaḥ akāmaḥ niṣkāmaḥ ātma kāmaḥ āpta kāmaḥ bhavati na tasya prāṇāḥ utkrāmanti tatra eva samavalīyante brahma eva san brahma āpnoti iti tathā na paśyati iti āhuḥ ekī bhavati na śṛṇoti iti āhuḥ ekībhavati ityādi 
[577,5]	tat ca na evam kasmāt pariṇāma pakṣasya niṣiddha tvāt na hi rūpa ādi vihīnasya rūpa ādi ākāreṇa pariṇatau kiṃcid pramāṇam asti satkārya pratiṣedhāt ca kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhedaḥ api niṣiddhaḥ śakti śaktimatoḥ api bhedaḥ prasādhitaḥ upādānakāraṇa tvam ca mūrtam prati amūrtasya na asti iti uktam tasmāt na īśvarasya upādāna kāraṇa tvam brahma eva san iti ādi a āgamena yoga utkarṣaḥ praśasyate parama utkarṣāt naḥ hi yogī brahma vat atyanta nirmala tvāt brahma eva iti uktaḥ tathābhūtaḥ eva san param brahma paśyati iti arthaḥ ekībhavati iti atra api upamā draṣṭavyā para brahma niṣṭhaḥ hi yogī na dvitīyam ātmānam api paśyati tena ekībhavan iva ekībhavati iti ucyate yat vā mukta eka varga antar bhavan ekībhavati iti ucyate na tu vastutas artha antara bhūtānām ekībhāvaḥ kadācid sambhavati 
[577,15^1]	nanu toya ādīnām ekībhavaḥ dṛśyate toyam toya antareṇa saṃśliṣṭam ekībhavati dīpaḥ dīpa antareṇa mṛd mṛd antareṇa ghṛta taila ādikam ghṛta taila ādi antareṇa iti na etat asti na hi toya ādīnām api vastutas ekībhāvaḥ siddhaḥ kim tarhi teṣām pareṇa saṃśliṣṭānām eka avayava vyārambhaka tvena ekatvam upacaryate vibhāga adarśana mātreṇa vā toya ādi vat ekībhāva abhyupagame ca ātmanām vināśaḥ api tadvat eva syāt tasmāt na mokṣa avasthāyām api advaitam ye tu īśvarasya pariṇāmam na icchanti tad mate tu na īśvarasya kāraṇa tvam kārya abhāvāt na hi kāryam akurvat kāraṇam yuktam na ca ātmānam eva karoti sva ātmani kriyā virodhāt 
[577,15^2]	saṃsāra mokṣayoḥ api anupapattiḥ īśvarasya sadā eva mukta tvāt tad vyatirikta bandha abhāvāt ca avidyā prayoktṛ tvam eva bhagavataḥ kartṛ tvam iti ced na advaita pakṣe tasya api anupapatteḥ nānātve hi sati avidyā prayoktṛ tvam api dṛṣṭam yathā indrajāla ādi kartā mantra auṣadha ādi prayoga dvāreṇa laukikānām viparyaya jñāna ākhyām avidyām pravartayati bheda abhāvāt ca keṣām avidyā kiṃlakṣaṇā vā avidyā kena ca nimittena īśvaraḥ tām prayuṅkte vidyā api kā yadi brahma svabhāvā eva tadā nityam vidyā asti iti avidyā utthānam eva na syāt na hi vidyāyām satyām avidyā avakāśam labhate tayoḥ saha avasthiti virodhāt avirodhe vā na kadācid avidyā ucchittiḥ iti apavarga anupapattiḥ 
[578,2]	tattva anyatva aniḥ vacanīya tva parihāraḥ api ayuktaḥ tattva pratiṣedhāt eva anya tva siddheḥ anya tva pratiṣedhāt vā ananya tva siddheḥ iti katham ubhayathā api anirvacanīya tvam keśoṇḍukasya jñānāt anya tvena nirvacanīya tvāt tathā ca viparīta khyātiḥ samarthitā tatra eva sat asat tva anirvacanīya tva pratiṣedhaḥ api kṛtaḥ sataḥ eka deśa kāla ākāra anyatvena pratibhāsanāt iti uktam 
[578,7]	na ca keśoṇḍukaḥ eva avidyā kim tu tad avabhāsi jñānam tat ca utpatti vināśa dharmaka tvāt katham kūṭasthāt brahmaṇaḥ na bhinnam anādi tvam ca avidyāyāḥ pravāha apekṣayā anyathā pratyakṣa virodhaḥ api syāt tasmāt advaite sati avidyā api na sambhavati iti atas na avidyā kṛta bheda apekṣayā api bheda abhidhāyīni veda vākyāni arthavanti sambhavanti 
[578,13]	etena yat āhuḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ upaplava darśanāt vedānām tu anupaplava tvāt na tad pratipāditasya advaitasya pratyakṣa anumānābhyām bādhāḥ iti tat api apāsatam veda vākyaiḥ eva bādha pratipādanāt kim ca pratyakṣasya upapluta tve veda siddhiḥ kutas syāt agṛhītāt ca vedān na artha pratipattiḥ pauruṣeya tvam ca vedānām samarthitam tena pratyakṣa mūla tvena eva īṣām prāmāṇyam anumānasya api upapluta tve pada vākya artheṣu vipratipattau katham nirṇayaḥ kutas viruddha aviruddha vya ākhyāna niścayaḥ sva para vākyānām ca prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya niścayaḥ kutas iti yat api uktam āhuḥ vidhātṛ pratyakṣam ityādi tat api ayuktam niṣeddhṛ tvena api pratyakṣasya samarthita tvāt pramāṇa antarbhāva prastāve tena bhū tala ādiṣu ghaṭa ādi abhāva vat itaretarābhāvaḥ api pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate tathā ca akṣavyā pāra bhāva anuvidhāyinī ghaṭa ādīnām sattā saṃvitti vat paraspara bheda saṃvittiḥ api sarva loka avisaṃvādena bhavantī dṛśyate tasmāt pratyakṣeṇa api advaita jñānam bādhyate aṅgulyā agre kari śatam asti ityādi jñāna vat 
[578,27]	yat ca uktam vivāda āspadībhūtam bheda jñānam bhrāntam bheda jñāna tvāt candra ādi bheda jñāna vat iti tat api ayuktam vidyā vidyayoḥ bheda jñānena anaikāntika tvāt tasya api pakṣa tvam eva iti ced tat kim idānīm avidyā eva ekāti tattva jñānam tu na asti eva tathā ca advaita siddhiḥ api kutas bhrānta jñānena eva advaita siddhau bheda siddhiḥ api tatas syāt aviśeṣāt atha advaita jñānam bhrāntam na bhavati bhrāntāt bhinnam tarhi tat pratipattavyam tad bheda pratipattiḥ ca na bhrāntā iti katham na anaikāntika tvam 
[579,4]	hetu arthaḥ ca kaḥ kim pratijñā arthaḥ eva kim vā tatas artha antaram yadi pratijñā arthaḥ eva tadā artha punarukta tvam sādhya aviśiṣṭa tvam ca syāt na hi bhavati agniḥ atra vahneḥ iti atha bhinnaḥ eva hetu arthaḥ tadā api advaita virodhaḥ tathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ api yadi pratijñā arthaḥ eva tadā na sādhakaḥ asiddha tvāt punarukta doṣaḥ ca bheda abhyupagame tu advaita virodhaḥ pratijñā arthaḥ ca kaḥ kim pramāṇa prameya ityādi sūtrasya yaḥ arthaḥ saḥ eva kim vā tatas anyaḥ yadi pramāṇa ādi sūtra arthaḥ eva sādhyaḥ tatas siddha sādhanam tatas anyaḥ ced tadā api advaita virodhaḥ 
[579,12]	yat api uktam advaita jñānam bheda jñānasya bādhakam eva tad uttara kāla bhāvi tvāt śuktikā ādi jñāna vat iti tat api anaikāntikam nakha agre kari śatam asti iti jñānam anāpta vacanāt paścāt bhavat na pūrva bhāvinaḥ tad abhāva jñānasya bādhakam iti na ca advaite sādhya sādhana pratipādya pratipādaka ādi bhāvaḥ upapadyate iti maunam eva advaitam icchatā kartavyam iti uktam 
[579,18]	yat punar etat trailokya agrahaṇe tatas anyaḥ katham ghaṭaḥ pratīyate iti tat na nirvikalpaka buddhau pratiyogi grahaṇam antareṇa api abhāva pratibhāsanāt gṛhīteṣu ca abhāveṣu yathā yathā pratiyogi jñānam bhavati tathā tathā tad vikalpena smṛtiḥ eva bhavati iti uktam yaḥ asau arthaḥ mayā dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ etat ātmakaḥ na bhavati iti evam smṛtiḥ sarva avisaṃvādena bhavantī dṛśyate tasmāt nirvikalpaka jñānena trailokya agrahaṇe api tatas bhinnaḥ eva ghaṭaḥ gṛhītaḥ tatas ghaṭa smṛti sahakāriṇā indriyeṇa ghaṭāt bhinnaḥ paṭaḥ iti jñānam sa vikalpakam eva janyate tatas ca na itaretarāśrayaḥ doṣaḥ eka deśa avasthitānām ca ghaṭa paṭa ādīnām aṅgulyoḥ iva yugapad api bhedaḥ gṛhyate tatas api na itaretara āśraya tvam 
[579,27]	yat ca uktam kim lakṣaṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ pratibhāsa bhedāt vā iti tat na ukta uttara tvāt uktam atra ādau eva saṃśaya viṣaye lakṣaṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ gamyate sarvatra ca saṃśaya nimittam na asti tatas nānā avasthā pratibhāsa bhedāt bhede api nānā avasthā na hi pratibhāsānām bheda grahaṇe na arthānām bheda vyavasthitiḥ iṣyate yena anavasthā syāt kim tarhi arthānām bheda pratibhāsi jñānam ekam api pratibhāsa bhedaḥ iti ucyate tasya agrahaṇe api tad viṣayasya na agrahaṇam iti samarthitam saha upalambha nirākaraṇa prastāve 
[580,7^1]	yat punar etat sat ākāra pratīti aviśeṣāt iti tat na tulya pramāṇa tvāt yatas eva pramāṇāt sat ākāra pratīti aviśeṣaḥ avagamyate tatas eva pramāṇāt deśa kāla avayava guṇa kriyā jāti ādi viśeṣa ākāraiḥ pratīti viśeṣaḥ api pratibhāti eva iti viśeṣa ākārāṇām sat ākārāt anya an anya tvābhyām anupapatteḥ iti ced kaḥ ayam sat ākāraḥ kim sattā eva kim tadvān iti yadi sattā sāmānyam tadā tatas bhinnāḥ eva viśeṣa ākārāḥ sāmānya tadvatoḥ bheda samarthanāt na ca śaśa viṣāṇa vat asattva prasaṅgaḥ śaśa viṣāṇasya sattā sambandha abhāvāt vivakṣita viśeṣāṇām tu sattā sambandhi tvāt 
[580,7^2]	atha sattāvān eva sat ākāraḥ ucyate tatas sat ākārān na deśa kāla ādi viśeṣa ākārāḥ bhidyante tathā api sat ākāra aviśeṣāt varga eka tvam sidhyatu na vyaktyā ekatvam vyakti eka tva sādhane hi pratyakṣa ādi virodhaḥ uktaḥ tathā ca sūtram saṃkhyā ekānta asiddhiḥ pramāṇa anupapatti upapattibhyām iti pramāṇa anupapattau tāvat na siddhiḥ sarva vāda siddhi prasaṅgāt pramāṇa upapattau ca pramātṛ ādi bheda siddhiḥ tathā ca uktam catasṛṣu ca idam vidhāsu tattvam parisamāpyate iti avidyā nibandhanaḥ sarvaḥ ayam bheda pratibhāsaḥ iti atra api pramāṇam vaktavyam na hi vāc mātreṇa kasyacid arthasya siddhiḥ sarva vāda siddhi prasaṅgāt iti uktam pramāṇa abhidhānena ca pratipādya pratipādaka ādi bheda siddhiḥ aparihārya iti 
[580,24_581,1]	etena śabda advaitam pratyuktam yat āhuḥ anādya nidhanam brahma śabda tattvam yat akṣaram vivartate artha bhāvena prakriyā jagataḥ yatas na saḥ asti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte anuviddham iva ābhāti sarvam śabde pratiṣṭhitam yat yena anuviddham tat tatas na bhidyate yathā mṛdā anuviddhāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ na amṛd ātmakāḥ yaḥ vā yasya parivartaḥ sa tatas na bhidyate yathā candra parivartaḥ jalacandraḥ śabda parivartaḥ ca sarvaḥ arthaḥ śabda ākāreṇa pratibhāsanāt tasmāt sarvaḥ arthaḥ śabda ātmakaḥ iti śabdāḥ api sarvaiḥ varṇaiḥ anuviddhā varṇāḥ ca svaraiḥ anuviddhāḥ svarāḥ ca nādena ekena anuviddhāḥ tasmāt ekam śabda ātmakam sarvam jagat iti advaita abhidhānāt eva vijñāna advaita brahma advaita śabda advaita ādīnām na kaścid viśeṣaḥ pratiṣṭhāpana prakriyā bhedam muktvā vijñāna advaitam anyathā pratiṣṭhāpayanti brahma advaitam anyathā śabda advaitam anyathā iti etāvat mātreṇa advaita vādinām mata bhedaḥ na tu advaite api kaścid bhedaḥ tathā ca sūtra kṛtā sarveṣām advaita vādinām pratiṣedha artham ekam eva sūtram uktam sāṃkhya ekānta asiddhiḥ ityādi satkārya pratiṣedhāt na sparśa ādi ākāreṇa śabda tattvasya pariṇāmaḥ iti 
[581,12]	na api avidyā vaśena bheda pratītiḥ avidyā hi mithyājñānam ucyate tat ca deśa kāla bhedena nimitta bhedena ca svarūpataḥ ca bhidyate anyathā sarvatra sarvadā sarveṣām ca keśa ādi bhrānti prasaṅgaḥ tattva jñānānudaya prasaṅgaḥ ca nimitta abhāvāt nimitta sadbhāve ca nimittā naimittakayoḥ bheda advaita virodhaḥ tatra api avidyātaḥ eva bhedaḥ iti ced evam tarhi na vastutas tattva jñānam kutaścid kadācid utpadyate iti apavarga anupapattiḥ avidyā nimitta tve ca tattva jñāna apavargayoḥ keśoṇḍuka ādi vat avāstava tva prasaṅgaḥ tatas ca itara śāstra vat advaita śāstram api apuruṣa artham vastutas prāptam 
[581,20]	api ca mokṣaḥ kasya cintyate tasya eva brahmaṇaḥ iti ayuktam tasya svabhāva m ukta tvāt saṃsāri tve vā na kaścid muktaḥ asti iti mokṣa tad upāyayoḥ kenacid api adṛṣṭa tvāt anupadeśa prasaṅgaḥ tad anupadeśe ca kutas tatra pravṛttiḥ pravartamānaḥ api yadā ekaḥ muktaḥ tadā eva saṃsāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ anyasya saṃsāriṇaḥ asambhavāt avidyā vaśāt na ātma abhimānaḥ iti ced kim apavarge api avidyā na kṣīṇā na ca muktāt anyaḥ api ātmā asti yasya avidyā syāt jīvātmānaḥ santi iti ced te kim anye ananye vā yadi anye tadā ekatva virodhaḥ atha muktāt ananye tatas katham jīva ātmanām saṃsāraḥ 
[582,2_582,4]	etena jala candra vat iti apu nirastam yathā eva hi rāhu channe candre na kvacid jalacandraḥ upalabhyate evam parama ātmanā apavarga prāpte saṃsārī na kvacid upalabhyate sukha duḥkha ādi vyavasthā anupapatti prasaṅgaḥ ca yathā yādṛśam ākāśa sthasya candrasya rūpam upalabhyate tādṛśam eva sarva jala candrāṇām na praticandram rūpa vyavasthā asti tathā yādṛśam eva sva ātmanaḥ sukham duḥkham vā jñāna icchā ādikam vā tādṛśam eva sarvasya syāt prati puruṣam sukha ādi vyavasthā anupapattiḥ śarīra bhedāt vyavasthā iti ced na adṛṣṭa tvāt bāla kaumāra yauvana ādi śarīra bhede api vyavasthā na dṛṣṭā pūrva śarīreṣu anubhūtāni sukha ādīni śāstra ādīni ca vṛddha śarīre api anusandhatte mama sukham āsīt iti 
[582,11]	etena ghaṭa ākāśa maṭha ākāśa ādi udāharaṇam pratyuktam kim ca yathā ghaṭa nivṛttau eva ghaṭa ākāśam muktam bhavati evam deha nivṛttau eva tad avacchinnaḥ pumān muktaḥ syāt iti ayatna siddhaḥ mokṣaḥ prasaktaḥ tatas ca mokṣa śāstram vyartham 
[582,15_582,25]	deha nivṛttau api avidyā ādi saṃskāraḥ tad kṛtaḥ asti tad avacchinnasya pṛthak bhūtasya iva ātma pradeśasya saṃsāraḥ iti ced na vikalpa anupapatteḥ sa hi deha kṛtaḥ saṃskāraḥ kim deha vat paricchinna deśaḥ kim vā ākāśa sat tāvat vyāpakaḥ iti prācye pakṣe citrakūṭa deśa sthena dehena sva avacchinnaḥ eva ātma pradeśaḥ kṛta saṃskāraḥ tatra eva janma antaram janayet sukha duḥkha ādi upabhogaḥ api tatra eva syāt anya pradeśasya tad saṃskāreṇa avachinna tvāt atha gatvaraḥ saṃskāraḥ pradeśa antaram api avachinatti na avidyā dharma ādi saṃskārasya niṣkriya tvena gamana anupapattiḥ kim ca muktam api pradeśam gatvā avacchindyāt tad avacchede ca muktasya punar saṃsāri tva prasaṅgaḥ tatra eva avasthitaḥ pradeśa antare api sva kāryam saṃskāraḥ karoti iti ced evam api mukta pradeśe api kuryāt iti saḥ eva prasaṅgaḥ atha ākāśa sattāvat vyāpakaḥ saṃskāraḥ tena tarhi sarve api ātma pradeśāḥ vyāptāḥ iti na kaścid pradeśaḥ apavṛktaḥ syāt etena maṇi sūtra ādi nidarśanam pratyuktam ghaṭa ākāśa ādi dhvāntena asya api tulya doṣa tvāt tasmāt na sarva deheṣu ekaḥ eva ātmā iti 
[583,2]	atha tapta ayaḥ piṇḍāt agni kaṇāḥ iva ātma tattvāt jīva ātmānaḥ asaṃkhyātāḥ utpadyante teṣām saṃsāra mokṣa jñāna ādi vyavasthā iti na saṃsāriṇām api ātmanām anādi tvasya prasādhita tvāt kṛtakānām ca anitya tva prasaṅgaḥ tatas apara loki tvam 
[583,6]	atha samudrāt udaka vat tatas eva niḥsaranti punar tatra eva līyante iti na samudra vat brahmaṇaḥ sāvayava tva ādi doṣa prasaṅgāt pratiṣiddhaḥ ca satkārya vādaḥ tena pariṇāma laya pakṣe na dṛṣṭāntaḥ kaścid siddhaḥ 
[583,10^1]	atha avidyā eva jīva ātmā tasya ca anādi tvam asaṃkhyāta tvam saṃsāri tvam ca tad nivṛttiḥ ca mokṣaḥ iti sa kasya iti vācyam brāhmaṇaḥ tāvat na sambhavati iti uktam pradīpa nirvāṇa vat iti ced tad artham kaḥ pravartate jīvātmā eva iti ced na ātma nivṛtteḥ apuruṣa artha tvāt avidyā svabhāvaḥ hi jīvātmā kim artham ātmānam nivartayati na ca tasya ātma nivṛttau upāyaḥ asti vidyā hi tāvat na avidyā ātmake jīve prādurbhavati virodhāt na api brahmaṇi tatra nitya tvāt na ca upāya antareṇa avidyāyāḥ ātyantikaḥ kṣayaḥ sambhavati na ca mithyājñānāt anyā kācid avidyā asti jñānasya ca sarvasya āśrita tvam samarthitam tena avidyā kasya iti vācyam brahmaṇaḥ tad pradeśasya vā na sambhavati iti uktam na hi eka āśraya tve sukha duḥkha smṛti ādīnām vyavasthā sambhavati śarīra bhede api anusandhāna darśanāt garbha śarīra anubhūteṣu ananu sandhāna vat iti ced na tatra smṛti hetoḥ saṃskārasya anutpanna tvāt vinaṣṭa tvāt vā abhibhūta tvāt vā śarīra antareṣu api evam iti ced na tatra api asmṛti prasaṅgāt 
[583,10^2]	dṛśyate ca upādhyāyasya śāstra artha ādi anusmṛtiḥ tatas tad saṃskāraḥ anabhibhūtaḥ eva asti iti gamyate tatas śiṣya ādeḥ api smṛti prasaṅgaḥ tad ātmā eka tvāt kaumāra ādi śarīreṣu iva tasmāt pratiśarīram sukha duḥkha smṛti ādi vyavasthā upalambhāt na anā ātmā iti nanu bhavat pakṣe api sarve api ātmānaḥ vyāpaka tvāt sarvasmin api śarīre santi iti vyavasthā anupapattiḥ ekasmin ca śarīre sarva puruṣāṇām liṅgam gṛhyeta na adṛṣṭa niyamāt vyavasthā upapatteḥ yad kṛtena adṛṣṭa viśeṣeṇa yat śarīram utpāditam tat tasya eva bhoga āyatanam bhavati ātma antarāṇām tu tatra sannidhi mātreṇa sattvam na tu adhiṣṭhātṛ tvena iti atas na ekasmin api śarīre sarveṣām liṅga upalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ iti tat evam sthitam etat saṃsārya ātmānaḥ asaṃkhyātāḥ paramātmā tu ekaḥ eva iti atas parama upāsana dvāreṇa keṣāṃcid mokṣa gamane api avirodhaḥ tasmāt paramātmanā upāsana aṅga tvena apavarga sādhana tvāt uktam paramātmanaḥ aparam ātmabhyaḥ artha antara tvena parijñānam iti 
[584,9]	kaḥ punar tasya upāsana vidhiḥ iti ucyate sa ca upāsana vidhiḥ kleśa kṣaya samādhi lābha artham anuṣṭhānam yena kenacid upāyena kleśāḥ rāga dveṣa moha ākhyāḥ kṣīyante maheśvara viṣayam citta aikāgryam ca prāpyate saḥ upāyaḥ anuṣṭhīyamānaḥ parameśvara upāsana vidhiḥ iti ucyate tatra yogāt ca adhyātma vidhi upāyaiḥ iti vacanāt pātañjala ādi śāstreṣu api upadiṣṭaḥ upāyaḥ sva śāstra virodhena pratipattavyaḥ tatra yukti sāmarthyāt ca para matam apratiṣiddham anumatam iti hi tantra yuktiḥ tena ajñāna ātmakāḥ suvarṇa dāna ādīkṣa ādayaḥ upāyāḥ na atra gṛhyante teṣām rāga ādi kṣapaṇe sāmarthya abhāvāt akṣapiteṣu ca saṃsāra nivṛttiḥ na sambhavati iti vicāritam duḥkha sūtre dvādaśavidha prameya tattva jñānam antareṇa anyathā jñānam na upāyaḥ iti api vicāritam dvādaśa prameya jñānam api na utpanna mātram asahāyam rāga ādi nivṛttau samartham kim tarhi yoga upāya anuṣṭhāna sahitam 
[584,21]	yogaḥ ca vyutthita avyutthita avasthā bhedena dvividhaḥ tatra vyutthita avasthāyām tapaḥ svādhyāya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ kriyā yogaḥ sevanīyaḥ tathā ca uktam tapaḥ svādhyāya īśvara praṇidhānāni kriyā yogaḥ kleśa tanu karaṇa arthaḥ samādhi bhāvanā arthaḥ ca artha kramam āśritya iha viparyayeṇa pāṭhaḥ kṛtaḥ pātañjale tu sūtre samādhi bhāvanā arthaḥ kleśa tanu karaṇa arthaḥ ca iti pāṭhaḥ tatra ādhyātmika ādi duḥkha sahiṣṇu tvam tapaḥ bāhya nimitta nirapekṣam śarīram mānasam ca duḥkham ādhyātmikam manuṣya paśu ādīni bhūtāni adhikṛtya utpannam ādhibhautikam deva prayuktam śīta ātapa ādi nimittam adhikṛtya utpannam ādhidaivikam tat etat trividham api duḥkham śānta bhāvena niyamam kṛtvā sahamānasya dharma adharmayoḥ saṃcaya kṣayau kurvat tapaḥ iti ucyate tatas dharma saṃcayāt yoga pravṛtti hetuḥ śraddhā ādi atiśayaḥ bhavati adharma kṣayāt ca vyādhi saṃstyāna saṃśaya pramāda ālasya ādīnām antarāyāṇām upaśamaḥ tatas anākulam cittam samādhīyate 
[585,4]	nanu duḥkhebhyaḥ citta vikṣepaḥ eva bhavati atas na yoga arthinā tapaḥ kartavyam dharma adharmayoḥ saṃcaya kṣayau ca japa pratyāhāra ādibhyaḥ eva bhavataḥ tapaḥ sādhana tve tu pramāṇam na asti iti na etat asti yaḥ hi unmāda kāma ādibhiḥ abhibhūtaḥ sa katham japa pratyāhāra ādikam kartum śaknoti atas tena tapaḥ kartavyam yathā vastrasya sthūlaḥ malaḥ sthūla upāyena nivartyate sūkṣmaḥ tu sūkṣma upāyena iti tathā ātmanaḥ sthūlaḥ malaḥ tāvat sthūla upāyena nivartyate sūkṣmaḥ tu paścāt sūkṣma upāyena japa pratyāhāra ādinā nivartyate iti 
[585,12]	yat ca uktam dharma saṃcaya ādeḥ tapaḥ sādhana tve pramāṇam na asti iti tat na āgama siddha tvāt tathā ca manuḥ tapaḥ mūlam idam sarvam yat daivam mānuṣam sukham tapaḥ madhyam budhaiḥ proktam tapaḥ antam veda darśibhiḥ mahāpātakinaḥ ca eva śeṣāḥ ca akārya kāriṇaḥ tapasā eva su taptena mucyante kilbiṣāt tatas yat kiṃcid enaḥ kurvanti manaḥ vāc mūrtibhiḥ janāḥ tat sarvam ninudanti āśu tapasā eva tapodhanāḥ 
[585,20]	yadi api tapaḥ svarga ādi phalakam api bhavati tathā api viśiṣṭa jñāna vairāgya ādi sahakārī upakṛtam citta prasādam eva īṣat vyavadhānena karoti prasanne tu citte tapaḥ niyamam cāndrāyaṇa ādikam parisamāpya yoga aṅgāni eva anutiṣṭheta yaḥ tu pūrva janma kṛta tapaḥ sāmarthyāt pratyāhāra ādiṣu samarthaḥ eva tam prati tapaḥ na upadiśyate tad arthasya siddha tvāt iti 
[585,26]	praśānta mantrasya īśvara vācinaḥ abhyāsaḥ svādhyāyaḥ kṣudra siddhi hetuḥ api īśvara vācī mantraḥ asti iti tad pratiṣedha artham praśānta grahaṇam parama ātma ekaniṣṭhena bhavitavyam iti jñāna artham īśvara grahaṇam yoga śāstra artha abhyāsaḥ vā svādhyāyaḥ iti parameśvara tattvasya bhakti atiśayāt prabandhena anucintanam paryālocanam īśvara praṇidhānam stuti japa puṣpa ādibhiḥ ārādhanam vā sarva kriyāṇām parama gurau arpaṇam vā tad vācakasya praṇavasya japaḥ tad artha bhāvanam ca iti sā iyam tapaḥ svādhyāya ādi lakṣaṇa kriyā yoga hetutvāt yogaḥ iti ucyate sa ca kriyā yogaḥ saṃsevyamānaḥ samādhim bhāvayati kleśān ca tanūkaroti 
[586,8^1]	ke punar atra kleśāḥ kriyantaḥ vā iti ucyate samāsatas rāga dveṣa mohāḥ kleśāḥ te hi samādhi pratyanīka tvena saṃsāra āpatti hetu tvena ca puruṣam kleśayanti iti tatra aśakti lakṣaṇaḥ rāgaḥ asahiṣṇu tva lakṣaṇaḥ dvaṣaḥ mithyā pratyayaḥ mohaḥ iti nanu avidyā smitā rāga dveṣa abhiniveśāḥ kleśāḥ iti patañjaliḥ tatas asmitā abhiniśeśayoḥ kim na atra abhidhānam na asambhavāt atra eva antarbhāvāt ca tathā hi dṛś darśana śaktyoḥ eka ātma tā iva asmitāḥ iti lakṣaṇam uktam asya arthaḥ puruṣaḥ dṛś śaktiḥ buddhiḥ darśana śaktiḥ tayoḥ eka svarūpa āpattiḥ iva asmitā bhoktṛ bhogya śaktyoḥ atyanta asaṃkīrṇayoḥ avibhāga prātvau iva satyām bhogaḥ prakalpyate svarūpa pratilambhe hi tayoḥ kaivalyam eva bhavati iti etat ca pradhāna pratiṣedhāt bhoga pratiṣedhāt ca pratiṣīddham vibhakte ca avibhāga jñānam avidyā eva na tatas anya asmitā tathā abhiniveśa lakṣaṇam svarasa avāhī viduṣe api tathā rūdhaḥ abhiniveśaḥ yaḥ ayam ātma āśīḥ jāta mātrasya api sarva prāṇinaḥ bhavati mā na bhūvam bhūyasam iti maraṇa trāsaḥ saḥ abhiniveśaḥ 
[586,8^2]	saḥ anādi maraṇa duḥkha anubhava ārūḍha vāsanā ātma tvāt svarasa vāhī iti ucyate sa ca yathā atyanta mūḍheṣu dṛśyate tathā viduṣaḥ api jñāta pūrva apara antasya ārūḍhaḥ pratīyate iti asya api mohe dveṣe vā antarbhāvaḥ avaśyambhāvini maraṇe jīvita āśā tasmin tat iti pratyaya rūpa tvāt mohaḥ viduṣaḥ api adhyātma doṣa vaśāt diś moha ādi vat mohaḥ sambhavati iti uktam maraṇa duḥkha asahiṣṇu tvam eva maraṇa trāsaḥ tena dveṣāt na bhidyate kiṃcid vaidharmyāt bhede tu īrṣyāmanyu mātsarya mada māna ādīnām api bheda prasaṅgaḥ tatas ca pañcatva niyamaḥ api na syāt tasmāt trividhaḥ eva kleśaḥ tathā ca sūtram tad trairāśya rāga dveśa moha artha antara bhāvāt iti nanu doṣāṇām trairāśyam uktam kleśāḥ kim tatas anye doṣāḥ eva hi na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīna kleśasya iti atra kleśa śabdena uktāḥ sūtra kṛtā iti te ete kleśāḥ kriyā yogam anutiṣṭhadbhiḥ vidvadbhiḥ pratidinam tanūbhavantaḥ pratyakṣeṇa api upalabhyante iti yathā ca kriyā yogaḥ kleśa kṣaya hetuḥ tathā yoga aṅgāni api iti atas tāni api ati yatnena anuṣṭheyāni 
[587,7]	kāni punar tāni yoga aṅgāni kiyanti ca iti ucyante yama niyama āsana prāṇāyāma pratyāhāra dhāraṇa dhyāna samādhayaḥ aṣṭau aṅgāni aṅgāni nirvartakāni iti arthaḥ samādhitaḥ kaḥ anyaḥ yogaḥ yasya samādhiḥ aṅgam iti ced samādhiḥ eva antya prakarṣa āpannaḥ yogaḥ tasya pūrvaḥ samādhiḥ aṅgam antya śabdasya ādya madhya śabda vat atha vā sarvaḥ api samādhi prakarṣaḥ pūrva samādhi janya tvena yogaḥ uttara prakarṣa janaka tvena aṅgam iti yadi samādhitaḥ eva samādhiḥ bhavati nanu evam ekam eva aṅgam prāptam atas aṣṭau aṅgāni iti na vācyam na pūrva pūrva siddhau uttarottra asiddheḥ na hi yama asiddhau niyamaḥ sidhyati niyama asiddhau ca āsanam na sidhyati āsana asiddhau ca prāṇayāmaḥ na sidhyati tad asiddhau pratyāhāraḥ na sidhyati tad asiddhau dhāraṇā na sidhyati tad asiddhau dhyānam na sidhyati dhyāna asiddhau ca samādhiḥ na sidhyati atas ṣṭa aṅgānām api yoga aṅga tvam iti 
[587,19_587,23]	tatra deśa kāla avasthābhiḥ aniyatāḥ puruṣasya śuddhi vṛddhi hetavaḥ yamāḥ śuddhiḥ adharma kṣayaḥ vṛddhiḥ dharma upacayaḥ atha vā śuddhiḥ citta vaimalyam vṛddhiḥ yoga utkarśaḥ tad hetavaḥ ye deśa ādibhiḥ aniyatāḥ sarvasmin deśe anuṣṭhīyante sarvasmin kāle sarvasyām avasthāyām te yamāḥ ahiṃsā ādayaḥ nanu ahiṃsā ādayaḥ api kaiścid deśa ādi niyamena anuṣṭhīyante yathā tīrthe hiṃsām na kariṣyāmi sarva divaseṣu vā ayuddha avasthāyām vā prāṇi vadham na kariṣyāmi iti na deśa ādi apekṣi tve ahiṃsā ādīnām api niyama tvāt atas eva gṛhastha ādeḥ paramārthataḥ niyamāḥ santi yamaiḥ upetaḥ hi yatiḥ iti ucyate yama abhāve katham gṛhastha ādeḥ niyama niṣpattiḥ iti ced na pravartaka dharma niṣpādaka niyama niṣpatteḥ avirodhāt nivartakaḥ hi yati dharmaḥ tad hetavaḥ niyama abhraṣṭayam asya na niṣpadyante iti 
[588,6]	deśa kāla avasthāpekṣiṇaḥ puṇya hetavaḥ kriyā viśeṣa niyamāḥ tatra deśa apekṣi devatā pradakṣiṇam kāla apekṣi sandhyā upāsanam japa kriyā tu śudhi avasthā mātram apekṣate puṇya atiśayam pratideśa ādi apekṣita tvam asti anantam śiva sannidhau ityādi śravaṇāt evam anye api kriyā viśeṣāḥ deśa ādi apekṣa tvena niyamāḥ iti pātañjala abhiprāyeṇa tu nivṛtti lakṣaṇāḥ yamāḥ pravṛtti lakṣaṇāḥ niyamāḥ iti yama niyama lakṣaṇam draṣṭavyam tathā ca uktam ahiṃsā satya asteya brahmacarya aparigrahāḥ yamāḥ śauca santoṣa tapaḥ svāya adhya īśvara praṇidhānāni niyamāḥ iti 
[588,15]	yoga karma virodhi kleśa jayā artham karaṇa bandhaḥ āsanam yoga kriyāyāḥ virodhinaḥ kleśāḥ vyādhi ādayaḥ teṣām hi āsana jayāt jayaḥ śruyate karaṇāni atra śarīra avayavāḥ pāda ādayaḥ teṣām bandhaḥ saṃyamaḥ prāṇāyāma ādi siddhi arthaḥ tat āsanam sthiram sukhena upaveśanam iti arthaḥ tat ca padmaka svastika ādi aneka prakāram 
[588,20]	koṣṭha sthavāyoḥ śvāsa praśvāsa lakṣaṇasya gati chedaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ pracchanne nivāte nirjane niḥśabde ca pradeśe yathāsukham āsanam baddhvā recaka pūraka kumbhaka prakāraḥ kartavyaḥ sa ca śanais śanais jetavyaḥ vana gaja indra vat yathā vana gaja indraḥ prayogena śanais jīyamānaḥ mahāntam upakāram karoti haṭhāt aprayogena gṛhītaḥ tu vināśam eva karoti tathā vāyuḥ prayogeṇa śanais jīyamānaḥ aśeṣam adharmam rāga ādi malam ca nirnāśya yogam prāpayati aprayogeṇa atikramya avagṛhītaḥ tu vāta gulma ādi anartham eva karoti iti 
[588,27]	samādhi prayatnīka arthebhyaḥ samantāt cetasaḥ vyāvartanam pratyāhāraḥ pratyāhṛte hi cetasi indriyāṇi api pratyāhṛtāni bhavati kasmāt tad mūlana tvāt indriyāṇām pravṛtteḥ pratyāhāra abhiyuktasya indriya jayaḥ samādhi lābhaḥ ca bhavati na anyathā iti 
[589,10]	deśa bandhaḥ cittasya dhāraṇā kaḥ atra deśaḥ kaḥ ca deśaḥ cittasya bandhaḥ iti śarīra ādi avayavaḥ pāda ādiḥ bāhyaḥ vā sūrya maṇḍala ādiḥ deśaḥ iti eke vayam tu brūmaḥ paramātmā eva atra deśaḥ abhipretaḥ tad ārādhana pravṛtta tvāt mokṣa asthinaḥ pāda ādiṣu dhāraṇānam hi viṣṇu loka ādi prāptiḥ phalam śrūyate cittasya manasaḥ prayatnena dhāraṇam niścalīkaraṇam bandhaḥ iti ucyate sādhāraṇa iti 
[589,16]	tatra ekatānātā dhyānam tasmin dhāraṇā deśe dhyeya ālambanasya pratyayasya sadṛśaḥ pravāhaḥ pratyaya antareṇa apareṇa aparāmṛṣṭaḥ dhyānam tatra ekatānatā iti ukte api cittasya iti anuvṛtteḥ cittasya ekatānatā iti gamyate manasaḥ ca sadṛśa pratyaya pravāha kartṛ tvam eva ekatānatā iti 
[589,21]	tat eva artha mātra nirbhāsa svarūpeṇa śūnyam iva samādhiḥ dhyānam eva dhyeya ākāra mātra nirbhāsa pratyaya ātmakena svarūpeṇa śūnyam iva yadā bhavati upādhi saṃsargāt sphaṭika vat tadā samādhiḥ iti ucyate yat vā dhyāna utkarṣāt nivāta acala pradīpa avasthānam iva ekatra eva cetasaḥ avasthānam samādhiḥ abhidhīyate sa ca prajñā loka cihnaḥ samādhi utkarṣa tāratamyāt vipra jñā loka utkarṣa tāratamyam bhavati 
[589,26_590,13]	tat evam etāni yoga aṅgāni mumukṣuṇā sarveṣu brahma ādi sthāneṣu aneka prakārāṇi sa atiśaya kṣaya vadha bandha parikleśa ādīni duḥkhāni bhāvayatā sarvatra anabhirati saṃjñitam param vairāgyam āśritya maheśvare tu atyanta utkṛṣṭa guṇa darśanāt paramām bhaktim āśritya tad darśana artham atyanta abhiyogena sevitavyāni tatas samādhi prakarṣa atiśayam prāptau acireṇa eva kālena bhagavantam anaupamya svabhāvam śivam avitatham pratyakṣatas paśyati dṛṣṭvā niratiśayam śreyaḥ apavarga ākhyam prāpnoti tathā ca uktam yadā carma vat ākāśam veṣṭayiṣyanti mānavāḥ tadā śivam avijñāya duḥkhasya antaḥ bhaviṣyati tam eva viditvā atimṛtyum eti ityādi ca ātma tva aviśeṣa iti kasmāt na anya darśanāt mokṣaḥ iti ced na anyasya sarva animitta tvāt na hi anyaḥ api ātmā sarva utpattimatām nimittam iti diś kālayoḥ api sarva utpattimatām nimitta kāraṇa tvāt aviśeṣaḥ iti ced na apramāṇaka tvāt 
[590,17]	nanu apramāṇaka tvam asiddham yatas kālaḥ parāpara vyatikara yaugapadya ayaugapadi acira kṣipra pratyaya liṅgaḥ teṣām viṣayeṣu pūrva pratyaya vilakṣaṇānām utpattau anya nimitta asambhavāt yat atra nimittam sa kālaḥ kṣaṇa lava nimeṣa kāṣṭhākalā mūhūrttayām āhorātra ardha māsa māsa tvaryana saṃvatsara yuga kalpa manvantara pralaya mahāpralaya vyavahāra hetuḥ ca sarva kriyāṇām ca utpatti sthiti vināśa hetuḥ tad vyapadeśāt sa ca tad liṅga viśeṣāt ekaḥ eva kriyā bhedāt mati vat pācaka vat vā nānā upacaryate guṇavat tvāt anāśrita tvāt ca dravyam iti 
[590,24]	tathā diś pūrva apara ādi pratyaya liṅgā mūrta dravyam avadhim kṛtvā mūrteṣu eva etasmāt idam pūrveṇa idam paścimena idam dakṣiṇena iti evamādayaḥ daśa pratyayāḥ yatas bhavanti sā diś iti nimitta asambhavāt dravyam ca diś guṇavat tvāt anāśrita tvāt ca diś liṅga aviśeṣāt eka tve api sūrya saṃyoga upādhi vaśāt pracīti ādi bhedena daśa diśaḥ iti upacāraḥ tathā lokapāla parigraha vaśāt moha indrīya ādi bhedena tad daśatvā upacāraḥ sarva kārya utpatti ādi hetu tvam ca diśaḥ api tad vyapadeśāt gamyate iti 
[591,2]	atra ucyate sāmānyena nimitta mātra pūrvaka tve sādhye siddha sādhanam īśvara ādi nimitta tvāt bhūta ātmā antaḥkaraṇa tad guṇa ādi vyatirikta nimitta pūrvaka tve sādhye tu dṛṣṭāntaḥ na asti nanu pariśeṣa siddhiḥ iṣṭā yasmāt uktam teṣām ityādiḥ teṣām yugapad ādi pratyayānām viṣayeṣu paṭa ādiṣu pūrva pratyayaḥ kriyā guṇa sāmānya ādi viśeṣaṇāḥ paṭa ādi pratyayāḥ tad vilakṣaṇaḥ tu yugapad a ādi pratyayaḥ eva teṣām utpattau kālāt anya nimittam na sambhavati iti arthaḥ na pariśeṣasya asiddha tvāt 
[591,9]	tathā hi bhagavān īśvaraḥ tāvat sarveṣām jñāna ajñāna ātmakānām kāryāṇām nimittam asti karma īdriyā ādikam ca yathāsambhavam asti navī īśvara ādi nimittam paṭa ādi pratyayeṣu api sādhāraṇam tatas tad nimitta tve paṭa ādi pratyayaiḥ aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti na samāna tvāt diś kālāyoḥ api sarva utpattimatām nimitta kāraṇa tvam bhavadbhiḥ iṣṭam tatas tad nimitta tve api aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti 
[591,14_591,19]	nanu yugapad ādi pratyayeṣu eva kālasya asādhāraṇa nimitta tvam pūrva apara ādiṣu eva diśaḥ asādhāraṇa nimitta tvam kārya antareṣu ca sarveṣu sādhāraṇam tatas na aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti na tad ātma bhedāt na hi kālasya diśaḥ vā kārya viśeṣam pratyātma bhedaḥ asti abhinne ca ātmanā sarva kārya nimitta tve maheśvara vat katham kvacid asādhāraṇa tvam atha ekasya iva ittham svabhāvaḥ abhyupagamyate yena keṣāṃcid utpattau sādhāraṇam nimittam bhavati keṣāṃcid asādhāraṇam iti tathā api na kiṃcid kāla kalpanayā maheśvarasya eva tathā svabhāvaḥ kalpyatām tasya hi jagat nimitta tvam sādhitam diś kālayoḥ tu na sarva kārya nimitta tve asti pramāṇam 
[591,24_591,28]	nanu tad vyapadeśāt iti uktam satyam uktam idam ayuktam tu uktam na hi yena yat vyapadiśyate tat tasya nimittam iti asti vyāptiḥ kākadaṇḍa ādīnām gṛha puruṣa ādi a nimitta tve api tad vyapadeśaka tvāt utpatti ādi api rūpa ādinā vyapadiśyamānam dṛṣṭam śuklam utpannam śuklam tiṣṭhati śuklam vinaṣṭam iti tṛtīyāsaptamī antena api ajanakena vyapadeśaḥ dṛśyate yathā devadattasya sutaḥ kṛṣṇena rūpeṇa viśālena akṣṇā ca utpannaḥ śikhayā parivrājakaḥ tiṣṭhati raktena vāntena mṛtaḥ puruṣaḥ iti sabhāyām me śūlam utpannam sabhāyām caitraḥ tiṣṭhati mṛtaḥ ca iti mama bhrātar yāgate sutaḥ utpannaḥ tvayi āgate vṛṣṭiḥ utpannā iti evamādi
