[592,3]	atha yugapad ādi pratyaya viśeṣāṇām eva nimittam kālaḥ iṣyate na yugapad pratyaya abhāva prasaṅgāt tathā hi yat kārya jātam ekasmin kāle kṛtam tat yugapad kṛtam iti ucyate tat yadi ekaḥ eva kālaḥ tatas sarva kriyāṇām eka kāla utpādāt na kiṃcid ayugapad kṛtam syāt cira kṣipra vyavahāra abhāva prasaṅgaḥ ca yat khalu bahunā kālena kṛtam tat cireṇa kṛtam iti ucyate yat ca su alpena kālena kṛtam tat kṣipram kṛtam iti ucyate tat ca etat ubhayam kāla eka tve durghaṭam 
[592,10_592,13]	nanu maṇi vat upādhi bhedāt kāla bhedam iti uktam kaḥ punar atra upādhi bhedaḥ kriyā bhedaḥ eva iti ced nanu yugapad kṛtam iti atra api kriyā bhedaḥ asti eva kim iti ayugapad pratyayaḥ na bhavati krama bhā vi kriyā bhedaḥ kāla abheda vyavahāra hetuḥ iti ced krama bhāvaḥ iti kaḥ arthaḥ yugapad anutpādaḥ yugapad anutpādaḥ iti kaḥ arthaḥ ekasmin kāle anutpādaḥ nanu evam itaretara āśraya tva prasaṅgaḥ yāvat na kālasya bhedaḥ sidhyati tāvat na kriyāṇām bhinna kāla utpāda lakṣaṇaḥ kramaḥ sidhyati yāvat ca kriyāṇām na krama bhāvaḥ sidhyati tāvat na kālasya upādhi bhedāt bhedaḥ sidhyati iti tasmāt kriyā dharmaḥ eva kaścid kṣaṇa paryāyaḥ kāla śabdasya arthaḥ tad samāhāreṣu lava nimeṣa ādi vyavahāraḥ api draṣṭavyaḥ eka samāhāreṣu dvi tri ādi vyavahāra vat guru tva samāhāreṣu karṣa pala ādi vyavahāra vat ca evam ca eka kālam idam cira utpannam kṣipram utpannam anantara utpannam iti evamādi vyavahāraḥ upapadyate 
[592,23]	etena para apara vyatikaraḥ pratyuktaḥ katham dikkṛta aparatva ādhāre yūni aparatvam dikkṛta paratva ādhāre tu sthavire paratvam iti ayam parāparayoḥ vyatikaraḥ saḥ api kāla eka tve durghaṭaḥ yathā hi bhūmi avayavaiḥ āloka avayavaiḥ vā bahubhiḥ antaritam vastu viprakṛṣṭam param iti ca ucyate su alpaiḥ tu antaritam sannikṛṣṭam aparam iti ca ucyate tathā bahubhiḥ kṣaṇaiḥ ahorātra ādibhiḥ vā antaritam viprakṛṣṭam param iti ca ucyate su alpaiḥ tu antaritam sannikṛṣṭam aparam iti ca ucyate iti bahu alpa bhāvaḥ ca guru tva parimāṇa ādi vat apekṣā nibandhanaḥ kāla eka tve durghaṭaḥ iti 
[593,2]	na api kriyā eva kālaḥ tad viśeṣaṇa tvāt parimāṇa ādi vat yathā eṣām ekam parimāṇam eteṣām bhinnam parimāṇa tvam tathā eṣām ekaḥ kālaḥ eteṣām bhinna kāla tvam iti pratītiḥ tatra yathā aṇu tva mahat tva ādayaḥ parimāṇa viśeṣāḥ tathā kṣaṇa lava ādayaḥ kāla viśeṣāḥ tathā hi yatas na alpataram parimāṇam tat parama aṇu tvam tathā yatas na alpataraḥ kālaḥ sa kṣaṇaḥ iti evam ca tad liṅga aviśeṣāt ekatvam iti ayuktam guru tva parimāṇa ādeḥ api ekatva prasaṅgaḥ tulya codya parihāra tvāt 
[593,9]	dravya tvam api anena eva pratyuktam kālasya kriyā viśeṣaṇa tvena parimāṇa ādi vat pratibhāsamānāt anāśrita tvam asiddham parimāṇa ādeḥ api vānāśritasya eva viśeṣaṇa tvam astu na ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣaṇa tve api daṇḍa ādeḥ iva mad tvam upalabhyante tat na guṇavat tvam api asti saṃkhyā ādi mātreṇa ca sāmānya ādeḥ api guṇavat tva prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt na dravyam kālaḥ 
[593,15_593,18]	etena diśaḥ api dravya tvam pratyuktam mūrta dravya dharma tvāt diśām dīrgha tva hrasva tva ādi vat tad viśiṣṭa pratyayānām mūrteṣu eva bhāvāt daśadhā bhedaḥ tu diśām vāstavaḥ api astu kaḥ virodhaḥ nanu vāstava tve yathā vārāṇasyāḥ paścimena prayāgaḥ tathā kānyakubjāt api syāt na anaikāntāt sannikarṣa viprakarṣa ādayaḥ hi dharmāḥ vāstavāḥ iṣyante na ca yathā pratiṣṭhāna apekṣayā sannikṛṣṭaḥ prayāgaḥ tathā kān kubja apekṣayā api iti tasmāt pratiniyata nimitta apekṣayā prācī a ādi dharmāṇām api abhivyaktiḥ iti alam prasaṅgena tat na diś kālayoḥ sarva utpattimatām nimitta kāraṇa tvam 
[593,23]	api ca yadi upādāna ādi abhijñasya kālasya diśaḥ vā jagat nimitta tvam iṣṭam tadā maheśvaraḥ eva nāma antareṇa uktaḥ syāt acetana tve tu anupāsya tvāt na tad darśanam śreyaḥ sādhanam syāt cetanaḥ hi rājarṣi prabhṛtibhiḥ pratidinam vinayena dṛśyamānaḥ kadācid prasannaḥ bhūtvā anugraham yathāsāmārthyena kurvan upalabhyate na acetanaḥ asamarthaḥ vā tasmāt śiva darśanāt eva mokṣaḥ iti 
[594,8]	kaḥ punar ayam mokṣaḥ iti eke tāvat varṇayanti samasta ātma viśeṣa guṇa ucchittau saṃhāra avasthāyām ākāśa vat ātmanaḥ sarvadā avasthānam mokṣaḥ kasmāt sukha duḥkhayoḥ avinā abhauvi tvena viveka hāna anutpatteḥ na ca sukha arthā eva prekṣāvatām pravṛttiḥ kaṇṭaka ādi duḥkha parihāra artha tvena api pravṛtteḥ upalambhāt na ca etat śāstram viṣayiṇaḥ pratyārabdham yena nirviṣaye mokṣe pravṛttiḥ na syāt kim tu ye atyantam duḥkhāt nirviṇṇāḥ tān prati duḥkha uccheda artham mokṣe pravartate teṣām duḥkha traya abhighātāt tad uccheda mātra arthi tvāt iti 
[594,16]	moha avasthātvāt mūrcchā ādi avasthāvat atra vivekinām pravṛttiḥ na yuktā iti āhuḥ anye tat uktam duḥkha hānāya naḥ yuktam sukham duḥkha ātmakam varam na hi kaścid padārtha jñaḥ moha siddhyai pravartate varam vṛndāvane ramye śṛgāla tvam vṛṇomi aham na tu nirviṣayam mokṣam gautamaḥ gantum icchati 
[594,22_594,27]	kim ca yathā saṃsāra avasthāyām sukham iṣṭam duḥkham vā aniṣṭam tathā mokṣa avasthāyām duḥkha nivṛttiḥ iṣṭā sukha nivṛttiḥ tu aniṣṭā iti samavyaya phala tvāt tatra pravṛttiḥ ayuktā yat uktam anantāni durantāni samavyaya phalāni ca aśakyāni ca vastūni na ārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥ tasmāt prekṣāvatām pravṛtti anyathā anupapatteḥ sukha saṃvittiḥ muktasya abhyupagantavyā 
[595,11]	yat punar etat duḥkha parihāra arthā api pravṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā iti tat na duḥkha parihāra mātra arthāyām pravṛttau dṛṣṭānta asiddheḥ tathā hi duḥkhe sati sukha upabhogasya asambhavāt kaṇṭaka ādi duḥkha parihāraḥ api sukha upabhoga artham eva iti asamaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ duḥkha avinā bhāvi tvam tu vaiṣayikasya eva sukhasya na tu nityasya iti 
[595,16_595,21]	kutas muktasya sukha upabhoga siddhiḥ iti ced nanu arthāpatteḥ iti uktam kim ca āgamāt uktam hi sukham ātyantikam yat tat buddhi grāhyam atīndriyam tam vai mokṣam vijānīyāt duṣprapyam akṛtātmabhiḥ ānandam brahmaṇaḥ rūpam tat ca mokṣe abhivyajyate vijñānam ānandam brahma iti ca 
[595,23]	duḥkha abhāva mātre ayam sukha śabdaḥ iti ced na mukhya gauṇa asambhavāt na tāvat añjasā duḥkha abhāvaḥ eva sukham yena kenacid āhāreṇa kṣudh duḥkha nivṛtteḥ viśeṣāt ānanda viśeṣaḥ na syāt tathā yuvati mātreṇa kāma duḥkha nivṛtteḥ yuvati viśeṣāt ānanda viśeṣaḥ na syāt gandha rūpa śabda viśeṣebhyaḥ tu sukha viśeṣaḥ eva bhavan upalabhyate tatra api autsukya duḥkham nivartate iti ced na autsukya abhāve api śabda ādi viśeṣa upanipāte sukha viśeṣa upalabdheḥ 
[596,1_596,7]	tat na duḥkha abhāvaḥ eva sukham atha upacāreṇa duḥkha abhāve sukha śabdaḥ pravartate yathā bhāra apagame sukhī saṃvṛttaḥ asmi iti na mokṣasya apuruṣa artha tva prasaktau prekṣāvatām tatra apravṛtti prasaṅgāt tathā hi duḥkha abhāvaḥ api na āvedyaḥ puruṣa arthatayā iṣyate na hi mūrcchā ādi avastha artham pravṛttaḥ dṛśyate sudhīḥ kim ca bhāra udvahana ādi duḥkha apagame pratibandhaka abhāvāt iṣṭa māruta ādi samāgamāt api sukham bhaviṣyati iti manyamānaḥ sukhī saṃvṛttaḥ asmi iti upacarati na etat upacāra nimittam mokṣe asti na ca asaṃvedyamāne api duḥkha abhāve bhāktaḥ api sukha śabdaḥ pravartate 
[596,12]	mūrcchā avasthāyām api pravarteta suṣuptau avasthāyām sukha śabda pravṛtti vat iti ced na tatra saṃvedana abhāva siddhau pramāṇa abhāvāt anyasya khalu abhāvaḥ saṃvedanena gṛhyate saṃvedanasya ca abhāvaḥ kena gṛhyate yadi saṃvedanena eva tatas katham saṃvedanam na asti tathā ca sarva saṃvedana abhāvena sambandhaḥ api liṅgasya pratipattum na śakyate iti liṅgataḥ api na suṣuptasya sarva jñāna abhāva gatiḥ 
[596,18]	kim ca sukhena aham asvāpsam iti anusmṛteḥ sukham tad saṃvedanam ca suṣuptasya abhyupagantavyam pūrva dineṣu api tad abhyupagame ayam eva nyāyaḥ duḥkha smṛti anupalambha mātrāt anubhava abhāvam anumāya nirduḥkhaḥ aham asvāpsam iti enam artham sukhena aham asvāpsam iti upacarati iti ced na smṛti anupalambhasya anubhava abhāva siddhau anaikāntika tvāt sukha anubhava smṛtau bādhaka abhāvāt ca 
[596,23]	nanu yadi suṣupta avasthāyām jñānam asti tadā supta avasthātaḥ mokṣasya kaḥ viśeṣaḥ sarva jñāna viraha upalakṣitā suṣupta avasthā iti ucyate na anyathā viśeṣa upapatteḥ tathā hi bāhya indriya ja jñāna upalakṣitā tāvat jāgrat avasthā bāhya indriyeṣu nirvyāpāreṣu satsu yatra bāhya indriya jam iva jñānam bāhya artham smaraṇam bhavati sā supta avasthā yatra uparata indriya grāmasya aśeṣa vikalpa śūnyasya sukha mātra avabhāsi jñānam sā suṣupta avasthā tatra ca sukham nityam vā pratibhātu nidrā sahakāri dharma viśeṣa janitam vā iti tasmāt na asaṃvedye duḥkha abhāve sukha upacāraḥ kvacid prasiddhaḥ mukhya arthe bādhaka abhāvāt ca na khalu mokṣe sukha astitva abhidhāyinām āgamānām mukhya arthe bādhakam kiṃcid paśyāmaḥ yena bhāktam artham pratipadyemahi 
[597,11]	sukha tad saṃvedanayoḥ nitya tvāt mukta saṃsāra avasthāyoḥ aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na cakṣuḥ ghaṭayoḥ kuḍya ādeḥ iva sukha saṃvedanayoḥ viṣaya viṣayi sambandha pratyanīkasya adharma duḥkha ādeḥ saṃsāra avasthāyām sadbhāvāt tad nāśe ca muktā avasthāyām bhavati sukha saṃvedanayoḥ sambandhaḥ kuḍya ādi nāśe cakṣuḥ ghaṭa sambandha vat sambandha virodhi tva mātreṇa kuḍya ādi udāhṛtam na kuḍya ādi vat adharma ādeḥ vyavadhāyaka tvam asti amūrtavāt eka deśayoḥ vyavadhānāsambhavāt ca kim tu tat ca mokṣe abhivyajyate iti vacanāt samasta adharma ādi nivṛttau sukha saṃvedanayoḥ sambandha viśeṣa lakṣaṇa abhivyaktiḥ bhavati iti gamyate tena upacāreṇa adharma ādeḥ vyavadhāyaka tva abhidhāne api adoṣaḥ tasmāt abhivyakti viśeṣāt na mokṣa saṃsārayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ 
[597,23]	tasya sambandhasya kṛtaka tvena kadācid nāśa prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na pradhvaṃsena anekāntāt vastu tve sati iti ced na dravya ādiṣu anantara bhāvena tat asiddha tvāt tad antarbhāve vā sāmānya samavāya abhāvaiḥ saha tad saṃvedanasya sambandhaḥ na syāt adṛṣṭa ādi vaśāt karma kārakam viṣayaḥ tat janitam jñānam viṣayi iti ced na īśvara jñānasya nityasya arthaiḥ saha sambandha abhāva prasaṅgāt asmad ādi jñānasya api atīta anāgata arthaiḥ saha sambandha abhāva prasaṅgāt ca tasmāt nitya sukha saṃvedanayoḥ sambandhasya kṛtaka tve api vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt nitya tvam eva iti 
[598,10]	nanu rāgasya sambandhana ātmaka tvāt nitya sukha rāgena pravṛttaḥ na mucyate na rāgasya viṣaya śakti lakṣaṇa tvāt yaḥ hi sukha sādhaneṣu śabda ādi viṣayeṣu abhiṣvaṅgaḥ sa rāgaḥ iti ucyate sa hi bandhana ātmakaḥ tasya viṣaya arjana rakṣaṇa ādi pravṛtti dvāreṇa saṃsāra hetu tvāt nitye tu sukhe yadi api rāgaḥ tathā api asau sarva viṣaya arjana ādi nivṛtti mokṣa upāya pravṛtteḥ eva hetuḥ anyathā tasya sukhya prāptum aśakya tvāt na hi tad viṣaya sādhyam na api tat kṣiyate yena viṣaya sukha artham iva punar punar tad artham hiṃsā ādiṣu api pravarteta tat na bandha prasaṅgaḥ 
[598,17_598,19]	kim ca evam dveṣasya api banda ātmaka tvāt saṃsāra duḥkha dveṣeṇa pravṛttaḥ na mucyeta atha na asti eva asya tatra api dveṣaḥ tatas katham saṃsāra hetum pariharati kim ca atyantika duḥkha abhāva rāgeṇa api pravṛttasya mokṣaḥ na syāt duḥkha abhāve na mānam asti iti ced kutas tam prārthayate rāgam vinā evam eva iti ced nitya sukhe api tarhi asya rāgaḥ na asti tat api rāgam vinā evam eva prārthyate iti yat kiṃcid etat tasmāt viṣaya rajata icchā lakṣaṇaḥ rāgaḥ puṇyaḥ puṇya pravṛtti hetu tvāt bandha hetuḥ na tu arthi tva mātram dveṣaḥ api na jihāsā mātram kin tu śrīmat ācārya bhāsarvajñaviracite nyāya bhūṣaṇe saṅgraha vārttike tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ sampūrṇaḥ ayam granthaḥ
